当天的活跃度未达上限时，将于次日激活1枚悠游便签，最多同时激活3枚。（激活时间为次日服务器时间04:00）

（日常任务本身的奖励不会受到影响）
LUA_ADVENTUREBOOK_DAILY_BP_ABSENT_DESC.en:
If max Activity Points is not reached for the day, 1 Vacation Tag will be activated (at 04:00 server time in the following day). Up to 3 tags can be activated.
After earning max Activity Points and claiming the rewards, 1 activated Vacation Tag will be consumed to give double Pass EXP.
(Daily task rewards are not affected by this).

LUA_GACHA_ITEM_INSTRUCTION_DESC_POTENTIA.cn:

LUA_GACHA_ITEM_INSTRUCTION_DESC_POTENTIA.en:
Acquire a bonus <color=#060606>%2$s</color> for every <color=#060606>%1$d</color> headhunting attempts performed. There is no limit to this.

In Chartered Headhunting, every 240 headhunting attempts gives a bonus token of the 6★ operator featured in the said headhunting banner. The bonus token is automatically given once the conditions are met.

LUA_GACHA_ITEM_INSTRUCTION_DESC_TESTIMON.cn:
累计寻访<color=#060606>%1$d次</color>后，可额外获得一份<color=#060606>%2$s</color>，当前寻访仅限一次。

寻访情报书在满足条件后自动获得。在下一个特许寻访开启时，寻访情报书将自动转化为对应特许寻访的专有十连凭证，此十连凭证将在对应寻访结束后失效。
LUA_GACHA_ITEM_INSTRUCTION_DESC_TESTIMON.en:
Perform <color=#060606>%1$d</color> headhunting attempts to acquire a bonus <color=#060606>%2$s</color> (only 1 is available in this banner).

Headhunting Dossier is automatically acquired after meeting the conditions. Once the next Chartered Headhunting banner begins, this Headhunting Dossier will be automatically converted to a special 10×Permit of the Chartered Headhunting banner. However, this 10×Permit will also expire once that banner ends.

a1m3_desc_001.cn: 工人之家的小女孩卡莉想要见管理员一面。前往工人之家，了解具体发生了什么。
a1m3_desc_001.en: A girl named Carly living in the Worker Dorms wants to meet the Endministrator. Go to the place and find out what is going on.

a1m3_desc_002.cn: 帮卡莉完成故事书后，和卡莉聊一聊。
a1m3_desc_002.en: You helped Carly complete her storybook and decided to have a chat with her.

a1m3_desc_003.cn: 卡莉想要画一本让大家开心的故事书。帮助她完成故事书。
a1m3_desc_003.en: Carly wants to draw a storybook that makes everyone happy. Help her complete the book.

a1m4_desc_001.cn: 前往枢纽区基地，与后勤干员赛尔乔·莱昂交谈。
a1m4_desc_001.en: Go to the Hub Base and talk to Logistics Operator Sergio Leon.

a1m4_desc_002.cn: 体验影拓丰碑，挑战大地的弃子中的任意关卡。
a1m4_desc_002.en: Experience the Umbral Monument and challenge any stage in Those Forsaken by the Land.

black_c13m2_1_001.cn: 一番挖掘后，你们找到了一页被撕碎的日记……
black_c13m2_1_001.en: You spend some time digging and find a torn page of a diary.

black_c17m3_1_001.cn: 与法比安等人告别后，你们回到最初涂鸦的地点……
black_c17m3_1_001.en: After bidding farewell to Fabian and the others, you return to the initial graffiti site...

black_c6m1_2_001.cn: 之后，你与狼卫一同跟随乔万尼前往谷地通道。
black_c6m1_2_001.en: After that, you and Wulfgard follow Giovanni to the Valley Pass.

black_c6m1_4_001.cn: 狼卫带着乔万尼的尸首离开了谷地通道。
black_c6m1_4_001.en: Wulfgard carries Giovanni's body out of the Valley Pass.

black_e1m5_1_001.cn: 佩丽卡为阿吉注射了矿石病抑制剂。
black_e1m5_1_001.en: Perlica gives Ginny a dose of Oripathy suppressants.

black_e1m8_1_001.cn: 道路被完全破坏，众人只能返回枢纽区基地商议对策。
black_e1m8_1_001.en: The road is completely out. The team has no choice but to return to the Hub Base and find a solution.

black_e4m1d5_1_001.cn: 为了维系生命的存续，你已经付出了所有。
black_e4m1d5_1_001.en: You gave everything to ensure the survival of life.

black_e4m1d5_1_002.cn: 当一切不再拥有退路，你把希望埋进了“零号委托”。
black_e4m1d5_1_002.en: With all retreat cut off, you placed your hope in the Zeroth Directive.

black_e4m2_1_001.cn: 一阵运转后，石棺开启，你重新躺进石棺。

black_e5m2_1_001.cn: 你们向佩丽卡解释了陈千语的“锦囊妙计”……
black_e5m2_1_001.en: You explain Chen's "brilliant plan" to Perlica

black_f1m9d2_1_001.cn: 你们将所有伤员运回了基建前站。
black_f1m9d2_1_001.en: You moved all the injured back to the Infra-Station.

black_f1m9d4_1_001.cn: 之后，众人一同返回了基建前站。
black_f1m9d4_1_001.en: Your group returns to the Infra-Station afterwards.

black_gm01m1_1_001.en: Vallia follows you into the BPPP.

black_gm01m1_2_001.en: You spend quite some time on this.

black_gm01m1_3_001.cn: 一个工人从角落里爬了出来。
black_gm01m1_3_001.en: A crew mate crawls out from a dark corner.

black_gm01m6_1_001.cn: 你们一起修好了伸缩桥。
black_gm01m6_1_001.en: You and Hermann successfully repaired the collapsible bridge.

black_gm02m6_1_001.cn: 对方有些惊魂未定，颤颤巍巍地站了起来……
black_gm02m6_1_001.en: Still visibly shaken, he rises to his feet unsteadily.

black_sm1l1m10_1_001.cn: 希茜反复调试了脉冲发射器。

black_sm1l1m1_1_001.cn: 你联系上了菲奥娜，向她简单说明了现场的情况。
black_sm1l1m1_1_001.en: You call Fiona and explain the situation.

black_sm1l1m1_1_002.cn: 你耗费了一些时间，终于将找到的物资全部收集完毕。
black_sm1l1m1_1_002.en: You spend some time and recover all of the lost supplies.

black_sm1l1m2_1_001.cn: 伴随机关启动的声音，沉重的石门轰然打开。
black_sm1l1m2_1_001.en: The mechanisms spring into life as the heavy stone door slowly opens.

black_sm1l1m2_2_001.cn: 你破坏了门锁，将乔斯特从笼子里救了出来。
black_sm1l1m2_2_001.en: You smash the lock and free Jouster from the cage.

black_sm1l1m2_3_001.cn: 耗费了一些时间，终于将得到的物资全部收集完毕。
black_sm1l1m2_3_001.en: You spend some time and recover all of the lost supplies.

black_sm1l1m8_1_001.cn: 经过一番时间，成功排除了所有风险。
black_sm1l1m8_1_001.en: The team works for a while and successfully eliminates the threat.

black_sm1l2m1_1_001.cn: 佩丽卡和陈千语在谷地通道入口与你会合。
black_sm1l2m1_1_001.en: Perlica and Chen Qianyu meet you at the entrance of Valley Pass.

black_sm1l2m2_0d5_001.cn: 你们脊背一凉，听见身后传来一阵响动……
black_sm1l2m2_0d5_001.en: You feel a shiver up your spines as you hear riotous howlings coming from behind you...

black_sm1l2m2_1_001.cn: 裂地者头目应声倒地。就在这时，弧光那边传来了好消息。
black_sm1l2m2_1_001.en: The Landbreaker chief collapses. You then receive some good news from Arclight.

black_sm1l2m2_1_002.cn: 热能刀将铁丝网熔开，受困的人们重获自由，一举冲出。
black_sm1l2m2_1_002.en: The thermal lance successfully cuts through the metal fence and frees those who have been trapped inside the cage.

black_sm1l2m2_2_001.cn: 刺眼的阳光和清新的空气，阻隔了地牢的陈腐气味。
black_sm1l2m2_2_001.en: The bright sunlight and fresh air purged the dank smells of the LB lair.

black_sm1l2m2_3_001.cn: 把米娅平安地送回了暂居处，你们远远看见一个焦急的男子赶了过来。
black_sm1l2m2_3_001.en: You escort Mia safely back to the camp and see a distressed-looking figure in the distance.

black_sm1l2m4_0d2_001.cn: 伴随巢雕雾气对视觉的影响，你的眼前再次出现了那些图案……
black_sm1l2m4_0d2_001.en: The denstack haze changes your vision. Once again you see those strange glyphs...

black_sm1l2m4_0d6_001.cn: 在一番挖掘后，你找到了一张放在瓶中的纸条。
black_sm1l2m4_0d6_001.en: You dig around and find a note hidden in a bottle.

black_sm1l2m4_1_001.cn: 轰隆的声音响起，大门打开了。
black_sm1l2m4_1_001.en: The gate opens with loud rumbling.

black_sm1l2m4_2_001.cn: 在一番挖掘后，你找到了一个装满物资的箱子。
black_sm1l2m4_2_001.en: You spend some time digging and find a crate filled with supplies.

black_sm1l3m2_3_001.cn: 将事情经过告知了佩妮。

black_sm1l3m2_4_001.cn: 几个眨眼的工夫，佩妮已经借助手上的攀爬工具爬到了高处。
black_sm1l3m2_4_001.en: Penny uses her climbing tools and reaches the top in an astonishing speed.

black_sm1l3m2_5_001.cn: 你将佩妮的情况告知拉蒙，并向他讲解了佩妮教给自己的方法。
black_sm1l3m2_5_001.en: You tell Ramon about Penny's situation and the solution she taught you.

black_sm1l3m3_1_001.cn: 你们向菲莉丝讲述了来到此地的整个过程。
black_sm1l3m3_1_001.en: You tell Phyllis about your SAR mission thus far in the Aburrey Quarry.

black_sm1l5m1_1_001.cn: 接到通讯后，艾莱扎·柯林斯连忙赶到了现场。
black_sm1l5m1_1_001.en: Aleeza Collins rushes to the site after receiving the message.

black_sm1l5m2_1_001.cn: 你和艾维文娜一同将拉奎尔从裂地者的牢笼中救出。
black_sm1l5m2_1_001.en: Together, Avywenna and you help Raquel escape the Landbreaker cage.

black_sm1l6m1_1_001.cn: 你们帮助越医生把莉莉卡送到病床上。
black_sm1l6m1_1_001.en: You help Surgeon Yue move Lilica to her bed

black_sm1l6m2_1_001.cn: 裂地者砸坏了装满药物的箱子。
black_sm1l6m2_1_001.en: The Landbreaker smashes the crate filled with the medication.

black_sm1l6m3_0d5_001.cn: 之后，越医生给詹娜注射了配好的药剂。
black_sm1l6m3_0d5_001.en: Yue administers some medicine to Jenner.

black_sm1l6m3_2_001.cn: 你和阿丽娅将厨师带到一边，悄声向他解释了詹娜现在的情况。
black_sm1l6m3_2_001.en: Endmin and Alia take the Chef aside and quietly explain Jenner's current situation.

black_sm1l6m3_3_001.cn: 你将詹娜描述的流程记了下来，然后把它交给了厨师。
black_sm1l6m3_3_001.en: You jot down what Jenner says, and hand it over to the chef.

black_sm1l6m3_4_001.cn: 你向马特维解释了詹娜的情况。
black_sm1l6m3_4_001.en: You explain Jenner's situation to Matvei.

black_sm1l6m4_1_001.cn: 詹娜像往常一样为源石树苗浇了水，阿丽娅也像往常一样送她回了家。次日……
black_sm1l6m4_1_001.en: Jenner tended to the Originium sapling as usual, and Alia walked her home like always. The next day...

black_sm1l7m2_1_001.cn: 你将自己的所见所闻告诉了小女孩。
black_sm1l7m2_1_001.en: You tell the little girl about what you've seen.

black_sm1l7m2_2_001.cn: 你将自己的所见所闻告诉了技术员。
black_sm1l7m2_2_001.en: You tell the technician about what you've seen.

black_sm1l7m2_3_001.cn: 你将自己的所见所闻告诉了技术专家。
black_sm1l7m2_3_001.en: You tell the tech expert about what you've seen.

black_sm2l1m1_1_002.cn: 度渡接过材料，三下五除二地修好了竹筏。
black_sm2l1m1_1_002.en: Dudu takes the materials and quickly fixes the raft.

black_sm2l1m1_1_003.cn: 一番忙碌后，你们救起了受伤的人。
black_sm2l1m1_1_003.en: You manage to save the injured person after putting some work into it.

black_sm2l1m5_1_001.cn: 你们打开笼门，长耳兽重获自由，飞快地跑掉了……
black_sm2l1m5_1_001.en: You open the cage and free the long-ear. She quickly runs away...

black_sm2l1m5_2_001.cn: 阿土慷慨地展示了锦草的烹饪方法，技惊四座。
black_sm2l1m5_2_001.en: Ah Tu demonstrates how to cook jincao, her skill leaving everyone impressed.

black_sm2l1m5_3_001.cn: 笼门打开的一瞬间，小吴往寨民脸上一人蹬了一脚，飞速逃脱了……
black_sm2l1m5_3_001.en: The cage opens. Woolsey leaps onto the stockade residents', kicks them, and then runs away in a flash...

black_sm2l1m5_3_002.cn: 阿土后退两步，待你回头时已经逃走了。
black_sm2l1m5_3_002.en: Ah Tu back off two steps. She already ran away when you turned around.

block_quest_login_days.en: Log in after {0} day(s) to progress mission

block_quest_max_level.cn: 需管理员权限等阶达到{0}级

block_quest_toast.cn: 后续任务暂未解锁，可前往任务界面查看详情
block_quest_toast.en: Subsequent missions not yet unlocked. Go to the mission screen for details.

c13m1_desc_001.cn: 正在枢纽区基地帮忙的洁尔佩塔发来讯息，她希望管理员能帮她一个小忙。答应了请求的管理员决定前去赴约。
c13m1_desc_001.en: Having largely recovered, Gilberta sends you a message asking if you can help her out with something small. You agree to help and meet her at the appointed location.

c13m2_desc_001.cn: 得知小女孩卡莉不见了，管理员与洁尔佩塔决定一同将她找回。
c13m2_desc_001.en: You learn that a little girl named Carly has gone missing. Gilberta and you decide to find her.

c13m2_desc_002.cn: 管理员与洁尔佩塔决定帮助安德烈寻找关于过滤装置的线索。
c13m2_desc_002.en: You and Gilberta decide to help Andre locate the water purifier prototype.

c13m3_desc_001.cn: 成功取得锁有过滤装置的保险柜之后，管理员与洁尔佩塔决定将这件事告诉工团在此处的负责人。
c13m3_desc_001.en: You and Gilberta successfully retrieve the safe with the filter locked within it. You decide to inform the UWST site monitor of your finding.

c16m1_desc_001.cn: 在发生了这么多事情之后，佩丽卡希望管理员能够回一趟帝江号的静滞核心，确认记忆是否有所恢复。
c16m1_desc_001.en: Following recent events, Perlica invites you to return to Dijiang's Stasis Core to assess memory recovery progress.

c16m1_desc_002.cn: 管理员在神秘痕迹的引导下，来到了一片陌生的冰原。跟随红发萨卡兹少女，走出此地。
c16m1_desc_002.en: Following mysterious traces, you reach an uncharted icefield. Follow the crimson-haired Sarkaz girl to find a way out.

c16m2_desc_001.cn: 管理员在协议空间中遇到的红发萨卡兹少女似乎并不简单。根据线索，前往四号谷地，寻找她的踪迹。
c16m2_desc_001.en: That red-haired Sarkaz girl you met in the Protocol Space isn't ordinary. Follow the clues to Valley IV and track her down.

c16m3_desc_001.cn: 那位红发萨卡兹少女就是与罗德岛失联已久的再旅者莱万汀。管理员决定再度进入协议空间，找到莱万汀并探寻自己的记忆。
c16m3_desc_001.en: That red-haired Sarkaz girl is Laevatain, Rhodes Island's long-missing reconvener. You decide to re-enter the Protocol Space to find her and recover what was lost.

c16m3_desc_002.cn: 要利用协议奇点，准确进入莱万汀所在的协议空间，需要更多与她直接相关的源石反应参数。管理员决定前往枢纽区基地，调查她可能活动过的地方，以搜集足够的信息。
c16m3_desc_002.en: To leverage the Protocol Singularity and accurately enter the Protocol Space where Laevatain is, more direct Originium reaction parameters linked to her are required. You decide to proceed to the Hub Base and investigate areas where she may have been active, in order to gather sufficient data.

c16m4_desc_001.cn: 获得所需的信息之后，管理员准备返回帝江号的静滞核心，再度利用协议奇点进入协议空间，寻找莱万汀。
c16m4_desc_001.en: After obtaining the necessary information, you decide to return to the Stasis Core of Dijiang to once again utilize the Protocol Singularity and enter the Protocol Space in search of Laevatain.

c16m4_desc_002.cn: 管理员成功与莱万汀会合。二人决定一同踏入协议空间深处，探寻深埋于此的记忆。
c16m4_desc_002.en: You successfully meet up with Laevatain. Together, you venture deeper into the Protocol Space, seeking the memories buried within.

c16m4_desc_003.cn: 莱万汀已经找到了新的寄托。和她一起挣脱记忆的枷锁，离开这里。
c16m4_desc_003.en: Laevatain has found a new anchor. Break free from the chains of memory with her and leave.

c17m1_desc_001.cn: 应安德烈所托，取到包裹并带给伊冯。
c17m1_desc_001.en: Retrieve the package as requested by Andre and deliver it to Yvonne.

c17m1_desc_002.cn: 跟上伊冯，看看她的计划。
c17m1_desc_002.en: Follow Yvonne and see what she's planning

c17m2_desc_001.cn: 前往枢纽区基地寻找涂鸦灵感。
c17m2_desc_001.en: Head to the Hub Base for graffiti inspiration.

c17m2_desc_002.cn: 前往矿区营地寻找涂鸦灵感。
c17m2_desc_002.en: Head to the Mining Camp for graffiti inspiration.

c17m2_desc_003.cn: 前往超域试验场寻找涂鸦灵感。
c17m2_desc_003.en: Head to the Æther Test Site for graffiti inspiration

c17m3_desc_001.cn: 返回源石实验园区，协助伊冯完成作品。
c17m3_desc_001.en: Head back to the Originium Science Park and help Yvonne finish her project

c17m3_desc_002.cn: 涂鸦似乎还不够完美，陪伊冯再去一个地方，寻找她最想“呐喊”出的东西。
c17m3_desc_002.en: Yvonne doesn't seem too pleased. Go to one more place with her to find what she most wants to "scream" out.

c17m3_desc_003.cn: 陪伊冯进入车间并解决里面的天使。
c17m3_desc_003.en: Enter the underground production floors with Yvonne and defeat the Aggeloi.

c6m1_desc_001.cn: 管理员接到洛茜发来的通信，得知她似乎有件要紧事要找自己帮忙。
c6m1_desc_001.en: The Endministrator receives a message from Rossi, learning that she seemed to have something urgent and needed their help.

c6m1_desc_002.cn: 了解狼卫的目的后，管理员决定与他一起继续追查狼群叛徒的踪迹。
c6m1_desc_002.en: You learn what Wulfgard is after and decide to help him track down the Pack traitor.

c6m1_desc_003.cn: 管理员和狼卫决定同乔万尼一起深入营地，探寻真相。
c6m1_desc_003.en: You and Wulfgard decide to follow Giovanni into the camp to uncover the truth.

c6m1_desc_004.cn: 事情告一段落，叛徒得到了应有的下场，而狼卫与管理员也将离开地下营地。
c6m1_desc_004.en: The incident is over and the traitor got what he deserved. Endministrator and Wulfgard are leaving this underground camp.

chr_0016_ep1_name.en: Let Fire Consume the Ashen Past

cs_video_e0m0_3_02.en: I'll be waiting in the North.

cs_video_e0m2_1_02.en: Do not forget who you are.

cs_video_e0m2_6_01.cn: 三天前，各信息渠道都发来反馈

cs_video_e0m2_6_01d5.cn: 说天使有频繁的异常活动
cs_video_e0m2_6_01d5.en: abnormal spikes in Aggeloid activity three days ago...

cs_video_e0m2_6_02.cn: 按照管理员你留下的预案
cs_video_e0m2_6_02.en: We followed the contingency plan you left us

cs_video_e0m2_6_02d3.cn: 我们紧急将你沉睡的石棺秘密运回最近的基地
cs_video_e0m2_6_02d3.en: and quickly moved you and the Sarcophagus to our nearest base

cs_video_e0m2_6_03.cn: 但是，在经过四号谷地的途中

cs_video_e0m2_6_03d5.cn: 飞行器遭遇了攻击，被击落了
cs_video_e0m2_6_03d5.en: was shot down as it flew across Valley IV.

cs_video_e0m2_6_04.cn: 根据线人的情报，这必然是一次有预谋的伏击
cs_video_e0m2_6_04.en: Our intel tells us that this is a premeditated attack.

cs_video_e0m2_6_05.cn: 我们在坠落点发现了奄奄一息的你
cs_video_e0m2_6_05.en: We found you barely alive at the crash site

cs_video_e0m2_6_05d5.cn: 将你紧急送上了帝江号
cs_video_e0m2_6_05d5.en: and quickly sent you aboard Dijiang.

cs_video_e0m2_6_06.cn: 而石棺则继续送往四号谷地的基地
cs_video_e0m2_6_06.en: The Sarcophagus was sent to a base in Valley IV.

cs_video_e0m2_6_06d5.cn: 只有在那里，石棺才能进行充能
cs_video_e0m2_6_06d5.en: It's the only place where it can be charged.

cs_video_e0m2_6_07.cn: 同时，我们也检测到了极强的天使能量信号
cs_video_e0m2_6_07.en: We also picked up extremely powerful Aggeloid energy signatures.

cs_video_e0m2_6_09.cn: 我们向枢纽区基地发送了许多讯息，但都没有答复
cs_video_e0m2_6_09.en: We hailed the Hub Base many times but they failed to respond.

cs_video_e0m2_6_10.cn: 原计划是十天后带管理员前往基地，洁尔佩塔她
cs_video_e0m2_6_10.en: The plan was to bring the Endmin to the Base in ten days, but the Hub—

cs_video_e0m2_6_11d5.en: Fiona, prep for my drop at once.

cs_video_e0m2_6_12.en: Wait, wha? Now? Okay. I'll run the checks...

cs_video_e0m2_6_13.cn: 地面有信号干扰，要进行无引导紧急降落的话，一定会存在误差
cs_video_e0m2_6_13.en: There's surface interference. Unguided emergency drops might deviate.

cs_video_e0m2_6_14.cn: 安全起见，只能在基地周边地区着陆
cs_video_e0m2_6_14.en: We'll drop you near the Base, just to be safe.

cs_video_e0m2_6_15d5.cn: 秦茳尺工程师和安德烈都在枢纽区基地，我相信他们能应对
cs_video_e0m2_6_15d5.en: Director Qin and Andre are at the Base and should keep things together.

cs_video_e0m2_6_16.cn: 不论有没有来自地表的回复

cs_video_e0m2_6_16d3.cn: 都继续向枢纽区基地发送通讯
cs_video_e0m2_6_16d3.en: regardless of whether we have received any response from them.

cs_video_e0m2_6_16d5.en: Inform them that I'm coming soon.

cs_video_e0m2_6_16d7.cn: 另外，通知陈千语在基地和我会合
cs_video_e0m2_6_16d7.en: Also, tell Operator Chen to rendezvous with me there.

cs_video_e1m1_1_01.cn: 某种阴影，已经笼罩了这里……
cs_video_e1m1_1_01.en: This place has fallen under a dark shadow...

cs_video_e1m1_1_02.cn: 菲奥娜，你那边进展如何？

cs_video_e1m1_1_03.en: I'm still trying to re-establish contact...

cs_video_e1m1_1_04.cn: 慢着！佩丽卡，有未知物正在飞速接近！小心！
cs_video_e1m1_1_04.en: Wait! Perlica, we have multiple unknown objects coming in fast! Watch out!

cs_video_e1m8_4_02.en: You put up quite a show.

cs_video_e1m8_4_04.en: You lie to hide your greed.

cs_video_e1m8_4_05.cn: 掠夺不属于自己的土地，却察觉不到彼此力量的差距
cs_video_e1m8_4_05.en: You exploit lands that were never yours. You fail to realize that we are way beyond you.

cs_video_e1m8_4_06.cn: 看不清的话，不如上前一步？
cs_video_e1m8_4_06.en: Need a closer look? Just take another step forward.

cs_video_e3m5_3_01.cn: 如果你真的只有这点程度
cs_video_e3m5_3_01.en: If this is all the fight you can give me...

cs_video_e3m5_3_02.cn: 那他们究竟在害怕什么？
cs_video_e3m5_3_02.en: ...I wonder why they're so afraid of you?

cutscene_c13m3_1_01.cn: 管理员 为什么 那只是一封信……
cutscene_c13m3_1_01.en: It's just a letter. Why, Endmin?

cutscene_c13m3_1_02.cn: 但那是洁尔佩塔的宝藏 对吧？
cutscene_c13m3_1_02.en: {F}But it's something you treasure, right?{M}But it's something you treasure, right?

cutscene_c16m4_1_03.cn: 说好的承诺 只完成了一半
cutscene_c16m4_1_03.en: Remember your promise? You only delivered half.

cutscene_c16m4_1_08.cn: 我答应过你的事 无论到哪里 都不会改变
cutscene_c16m4_1_08.en: I'll keep my promise, wherever I go, whatever happens.

cutscene_c17m3_1_01.cn: 不要故意做鬼脸啦 塔塔的笑容才不是……
cutscene_c17m3_1_01.en: Stop making that face! Tata doesn't smile like that...

cutscene_c17m3_1_02.cn: 塔塔消失时 是不是很害怕？
cutscene_c17m3_1_02.en: Was ... was Tata scared ... before it was gone?

cutscene_c17m3_1_03.cn: 塔塔是笑着的 像这样
cutscene_c17m3_1_03.en: {F}Tata was smiling. Like this.{M}Tata was smiling. Like this.

cutscene_c17m3_1_05.cn: 如果我再厉害一点 或许它……
cutscene_c17m3_1_05.en: If I had been better, maybe it...

cutscene_c6m1_1_03.cn: 碾骨 输给 狼群？！

cutscene_e0m0_01_01.cn: 管理员已进入任务待命位置

cutscene_e0m0_02_03.cn: 抱歉 耽搁了一会儿
cutscene_e0m0_02_03.en: {F}Sorry. I was held up.{M}Sorry. I was held up.

cutscene_e0m0_02_07.cn: 你的命运并非只有一种选择
cutscene_e0m0_02_07.en: Your fate isn't confined to one path.

cutscene_e0m0_1_01.cn: 管理员已进入任务待命位置

cutscene_e0m0_2_06.cn: 文明的恩惠，也是灾祸的根源

cutscene_e0m0_2_07.cn: 真庆幸还能和你一起前进
cutscene_e0m0_2_07.en: I'm glad to be with you again.

cutscene_e0m0_3_01.cn: 标准日-丢失 00：00：00   北极点 远征尽头
cutscene_e0m0_3_01.en: Standard day - DATA LOST, 00:00:00   North Pole: End of the Expedition

cutscene_e0m0_3_04.en: North Pole: End of the Expedition

cutscene_e0m0_5_02.en: I'll be waiting in the North.

cutscene_e0m2_02_03.cn: {F}没事 她只是有些虚弱{M}没事 他只是有些虚弱
cutscene_e0m2_02_03.en: {F}It's alright... The Endmin's just a little weak.{M}It's alright... The Endmin's just a little weak.

cutscene_e0m2_04_02.cn: 也许这个全新的开始也并非是坏事……
cutscene_e0m2_04_02.en: this fresh new beginning might just work out.

cutscene_e0m2_04_03.cn: 总之 欢迎回家 管理员
cutscene_e0m2_04_03.en: In any case, welcome home, Endministrator.

cutscene_e0m2_1_02.en: Do not forget who you are.

cutscene_e0m2_2_03.en: It's alright... The Endmin's just a little weak.

cutscene_e0m2_2_03_m.en: It's alright... The Endmin's just a little weak.

cutscene_e0m2_3_2_01d5.cn: 也许这个全新的开始也并非是坏事……
cutscene_e0m2_3_2_01d5.en: this fresh new beginning might just work out.

cutscene_e0m2_4_02.en: I saw it in my memories.

cutscene_e0m2_5_01.cn: 这个星球 很壮观 对吧？

cutscene_e0m2_5_02.en: {F}I saw it in my memories.{M}I saw it in my memories.

cutscene_e0m2_6_01.cn: 就在刚才 轨道着陆点中继无人机群发生了连续自毁
cutscene_e0m2_6_01.en: Just moments ago, simultaneous self-destruction occurred to the orbital landing relay drone squadrons.

cutscene_e0m2_6_02.cn: 通信故障范围正向四号谷地延伸 已经无法确认沿途设施的状态
cutscene_e0m2_6_02.en: The communication blackout is expanding towards Valley IV, and the status of facilities along the route is now unverifiable.

cutscene_e0m2_6_03.cn: 同时 我们也检测到了极强的天使能量信号
cutscene_e0m2_6_03.en: At the same time, we are picking up extremely intense Aggeloid energy signals in the affected area.

cutscene_e0m2_6_04.cn: 目前 枢纽区基地依然沉默 所有信道的呼叫都没有回应
cutscene_e0m2_6_04.en: We are hailing the Hub Base on every channel. So far they haven't responded... The whole place is offline.

cutscene_e0m2_6_05.cn: 原计划是十天后带管理员前往基地 枢纽区已经——
cutscene_e0m2_6_05.en: The plan was to bring the Endmin to the Base in ten days, but the Hub —

cutscene_e0m2_6_07.cn: 菲奥娜 我现在就出发
cutscene_e0m2_6_07.en: Fiona, prep for my drop at once.

cutscene_e0m2_6_10.cn: 地面有信号干扰 要进行无引导紧急降落的话 一定会存在误差
cutscene_e0m2_6_10.en: There's surface interference. Current situation is too risky. Unguided emergency drops might deviate.

cutscene_e0m2_6_11.cn: 安全起见 只能在基地周边地区着陆
cutscene_e0m2_6_11.en: We'll drop you to the area near the Base, out of concern for safety.

cutscene_e0m2_6_12.cn: 秦茳尺和安德烈都在枢纽区基地 根据预案 他们会接管现场
cutscene_e0m2_6_12.en: Director Qin and Andre are at the Hub Base. In accordance with the contingency plan, they will take control of the scene as critical events happen.

cutscene_e0m2_6_13.cn: 不论有没有来自地表的回复 都继续向枢纽区基地发送通讯
cutscene_e0m2_6_13.en: Fiona, keep hailing the Hub Base, regardless of whether we have received any response from them.

cutscene_e0m2_6_14.en: Inform them that I'm coming soon.

cutscene_e0m2_6_15.cn: 另外 通知<@qu.key>陈千语</>在基地和我会合
cutscene_e0m2_6_15.en: Also, tell <@qu.key>Operator Chen</> to rendezvous with me there.

cutscene_e0m2_6_16.cn: 收到 马上准备投送

cutscene_e1m10_2_01.cn: 超域 反常的空间 生命的禁区
cutscene_e1m10_2_01.en: The Ætherside — an aberrant dimension, forbidden to life.

cutscene_e1m10_2_02.cn: 从遭遇它的第一刻起 牺牲就常伴我们左右
cutscene_e1m10_2_02.en: Death has trailed us ever since that first encounter.

cutscene_e1m10_2_03.cn: 一支探索队 一处观测所 一座移动城市……
cutscene_e1m10_2_03.en: An exploration team. An observatory. A nomadic city...

cutscene_e1m10_2_04.cn: 我们踏在危险边缘 用牺牲丈量未知
cutscene_e1m10_2_04.en: We explored the unknown — each step bought with sacrifice.

cutscene_e1m10_2_06.cn: 然而 越是探索 结论越是残酷
cutscene_e1m10_2_06.en: But the deeper we search, the crueler the truth we find.

cutscene_e1m10_2_07.cn: 超域抗拒生命的存续 摧毁信息的联结
cutscene_e1m10_2_07.en: The Æther resists the preservation of life and breaks information links.

cutscene_e1m10_2_08.cn: 在超域的影响范围内 生命停止延续 源石设备失灵
cutscene_e1m10_2_08.en: Where Æther flows, life withers, and Originium fails.

cutscene_e1m10_2_09.cn: 任何曾经被超域覆盖的物质 都会成为侵蚀现象的源头
cutscene_e1m10_2_09.en: Anything tainted by Æther will inevitably turn into a source of the Blight.

cutscene_e1m10_2_10.cn: 超域的活动无法预测 我们被迫筑起堡垒 与灭顶之灾为邻
cutscene_e1m10_2_10.en: We can't predict the Æther. We can only raise strongholds, for we dwell beside oblivion.

cutscene_e1m10_2_11.cn: 能保护我们的 唯有逐渐累积的知识
cutscene_e1m10_2_11.en: But true protection comes only from knowledge gathered.

cutscene_e1m10_2_12.cn: 第一次天使战争期间 目睹极光笼罩天空的幸存者总结了简易深度测量法
cutscene_e1m10_2_12.en: During the First Aggeloi War, witnesses of the Aurora devised a simple method of Depth measurement.

cutscene_e1m10_2_13.cn: 战争结束次年 众生长地找回了失踪科研团队遗留的手册 顺利补全了裂隙形成的理论
cutscene_e1m10_2_13.en: A year after the war, the Hannabit Circuit found the lost science team's manual. It completed the theory of rift formation.

cutscene_e1m10_2_14.cn: 塔罗斯历17年 《环带公约》签订
cutscene_e1m10_2_14.en: Talosian Calendar, Year 17, the Band Accord was signed.

cutscene_e1m10_2_15.cn: 实验观测项目“沉郁”重启 成功记录到侵蚀物质的转化临界点
cutscene_e1m10_2_15.en: Experimental GLOOM Project resumed. Blight matter conversion threshold logged.

cutscene_e1m10_2_16.cn: 146年 武陵甚大裂隙监测站完成重建 投入运行后成功突破36秒的观测极限
cutscene_e1m10_2_16.en: Year 146. A monitoring station at the Wuling Very Large Rift was rebuilt, exceeding the 36-second observation limit.

cutscene_e1m10_2_17.cn: 我们在未知中一寸又一寸摸索 直到黑暗深处出现了前所未见的敌人……
cutscene_e1m10_2_17.en: Inch by inch, we elucidated the unknown — till an unprecedented threat emerged from the darkness...

cutscene_e1m10_2_18.cn: 在那之后 除了细枝末节的边缘研究 我们对超域再未接近一步
cutscene_e1m10_2_18.en: Since then, our research has stayed on the fringe, never venturing into the Ætherside.

cutscene_e1m10_2_19.cn: 一切超域研究都被严格监控 避免任何不必要的风险
cutscene_e1m10_2_19.en: All Æther-related projects are closely monitored to avoid any risks.

cutscene_e1m10_2_20.cn: 然而现在 一个人轻易触碰着超域 拾起了毁灭的种子
cutscene_e1m10_2_20.en: Now someone who can manipulate the Æther has appeared — she holds the seed of destruction.

cutscene_e1m10_2_21.cn: 她在茫茫荒原上投下了一颗火星
cutscene_e1m10_2_21.en: And she has lit a fire in the wilds.

cutscene_e1m1_2_01.cn: 管理员，接下来不要离我太远

cutscene_e1m1_2d1_01.cn: 管理员 接下来不要离我太远

cutscene_e1m1_5_01d5.en: Am I the first to arrive or what?

cutscene_e1m1_5d1_01d5.en: Am I the first to arrive or what?

cutscene_e1m1_6_01.cn: 菲奥娜 你那边进展如何？

cutscene_e1m1_6_02.en: I'm still trying to re-establish contact...

cutscene_e1m1_6_03.cn: 慢着 佩丽卡 有未知物正在飞速接近 小心！
cutscene_e1m1_6_03.en: Wait! Perlica, we have multiple unknown objects coming in fast! Watch out!

cutscene_e1m3_2_02.en: New message! New message! New message...

cutscene_e1m3_2_03.cn: 欸？怎么会这么多未读信息……
cutscene_e1m3_2_03.en: That's ... a lot of new messages…

cutscene_e1m3_2_04d5.cn: 谷地要塞……好多裂地者，救——
cutscene_e1m3_2_04d5.en: The Valley Fort ... so many Landbreakers... HELP—

cutscene_e1m3_2_06.cn:
初始化
启动中
启动完毕
界面载入中
载入完毕
有一条新的讯息

cutscene_e1m3_2d1_03.cn: 欸 怎么会有这么多未读信息？
cutscene_e1m3_2d1_03.en: That's ... a lot of new messages...

cutscene_e1m3_2d1_04d5.cn: 谷地要塞 好多裂地者 救——
cutscene_e1m3_2d1_04d5.en: The Valley Fort ... so many Landbreakers... HELP—

cutscene_e1m3_2d1_05.cn: 别吵 被豢养的垃圾

cutscene_e1m8_1_02.cn: 很高兴你还活着 我差点就失去耐心了
cutscene_e1m8_1_02.en: I'm pleased to see you alive. My patience almost ran out.

cutscene_e1m8_1_03.cn: 每次睁眼都有痛苦相伴的滋味如何？
cutscene_e1m8_1_03.en: What's it like waking up to pain each time?

cutscene_e1m8_1_05.en: Take good care of our guests.

cutscene_e1m8_1_07.cn: 管理员小心 让我来！

cutscene_e1m8_3_03.en: Straight to the point. Nicely done.

cutscene_e1m8_3_04.cn: 如果不是管理员把他逼入绝境——
cutscene_e1m8_3_04.en: You have the Endmin to thank. His weakness was exposed and...

cutscene_e1m8_4_02.cn: 我该由衷地 称赞你一番

cutscene_e1m8_4_03.cn: 你确实失去了记忆 不过……
cutscene_e1m8_4_03.en: Your memories may be gone, but...

cutscene_e1m8_4_04.cn: 你依然会努力成为一个领导者
cutscene_e1m8_4_04.en: Look at you, still striving so hard to be a leader...

cutscene_e1m8_4_05.en: Do you and I truly differ?

cutscene_e2m1_1_01.cn: 当然 发电站易守难攻

cutscene_e2m5_1_06.cn: 别让他们靠近塔塔和伊冯！
cutscene_e2m5_1_06.en: Keep them off Tata and Yvonne!

cutscene_e2m5_1_07.cn: 看来灰砂的情报没问题

cutscene_e2m5_1_12.cn: 别让他们靠近塔塔和伊冯！
cutscene_e2m5_1_12.en: Keep them off Tata and Yvonne!

cutscene_e2m5_2_01.cn: 检修工序启动之后就不能暂停，我没法直接支援你们，但我叫了迷你暴鸰来！
cutscene_e2m5_2_01.en: Sorry, maintenance can't be paused, so I can't join the fight. But I've called in my Mini-Bombtail!

cutscene_e2m5_2_11.cn: 检修程序启动之后就不能暂停 我没法直接支援你们 但我叫了迷你暴鸰来！
cutscene_e2m5_2_11.en: Sorry, maintenance can't be paused, so I can't join the fight. But I've called in my Mini-Bombtail!

cutscene_e2m5_3_01.cn: 敌人越来越多了——我帮你们准备个大家伙！
cutscene_e2m5_3_01.en: More enemies—?! I got a big bad boy ready for you!

cutscene_e2m5_3_11.cn: 敌人越来越多了 我帮你们准备个大家伙！
cutscene_e2m5_3_11.en: More enemies—?! I got a big bad boy ready for you!

cutscene_e2m6_1_03.cn: 唉 猎杀这些软骨头 真是提不起兴趣
cutscene_e2m6_1_03.en: You are the worst prey I've ever seen. Cowards.

cutscene_e2m6_1_04.cn: 都别愣着啦 已经搞定了

cutscene_e2m6_1_05.cn: 你们几个 赶紧把食物都搬回去
cutscene_e2m6_1_05.en: You, carry the food back ASAP.

cutscene_e2m6_1_06.cn: 还有你 去通知越医生 药品抢回来了
cutscene_e2m6_1_06.en: And you! Tell Mr. Yue we got the meds back.

cutscene_e2m6_1_09.cn: 佩丽卡姐姐 原来你们已经到这里——
cutscene_e2m6_1_09.en: Perlica! You're already here! And I was—

cutscene_e2m6_1_12.cn: 难 难道说这位就是……

cutscene_e2m6_2_01.cn: 不破坏锚点 天使还会不断出现……
cutscene_e2m6_2_01.en: They'll keep coming until we destroy the Ankhors...

cutscene_e2m6_2_02.cn: 但也不能放任它们袭击工人们呀
cutscene_e2m6_2_02.en: But we can't just let them attack the crew!

cutscene_e2m6_2_03.cn: 请快去处理锚点吧 管理员
cutscene_e2m6_2_03.en: Go and take care of the Ankhors, Endmin.

cutscene_e2m6_2_07.cn: 哪怕失去了记忆 拖着这样的身体
cutscene_e2m6_2_07.en: Even with such conditions, and zero memories...

cutscene_e2m6_2_08.cn: 你就不能学着点吗 卡特洛？
cutscene_e2m6_2_08.en: Can't you be more like Endmin, Catello?

cutscene_e2m6_2_10.cn: 你偷偷来四号谷地的事 管理员知道吗？
cutscene_e2m6_2_10.en: You slipped into Valley IV alone. Does the Endmin know?

cutscene_e2m6_2_11.cn: 别 别废话了 先解决它们！
cutscene_e2m6_2_11.en: Ugh, knock it off! Take 'em out first!

cutscene_e2m6_2_12.cn: 只要把大家团结在一起 也能做到这么多的事……
cutscene_e2m6_2_12.en: So long as everyone's united, great deeds can be achieved...

cutscene_e2m7_1_02.en: The shockwave... It has been blocked.

cutscene_e2m7_1_06.cn: 是管理员的源石技艺引发的？
cutscene_e2m7_1_06.en: Did the Endmin's Originium Arts create this?

cutscene_e2m7_1_07.cn: 我们可以在前进途中好好利用这些树枝
cutscene_e2m7_1_07.en: We can use these saplings as we continue our path.

cutscene_e3m1_1_05.cn: 看来你们为了这场无望的抵抗，准备了不少花招
cutscene_e3m1_1_05.en: You waddled into this fight with quite a few tricks.

cutscene_e3m1_1_07.cn: <@nar.quote>你们一次次为自己的游戏添加规则，却从不计后果</>
cutscene_e3m1_1_07.en: <@nar.quote>You kept adding rules to your little game and ignored the consequences...</>

cutscene_e3m1_1_11.cn: 看来基石的担忧是多余的

cutscene_e3m1_1_12.cn: 现在的你不再是救世主，只是一具空壳
cutscene_e3m1_1_12.en: I see no savior. You are but an empty husk.

cutscene_e3m1_1_13.en: ...Learn to accept what you are, just as I have done.

cutscene_e3m1_1_14.cn: 就像雨水冲刷掉泥泞的足迹，无足轻重
cutscene_e3m1_1_14.en: ...like footprints in the rain. None will remember your passing.

cutscene_e3m4_1_01.cn: 谁也 不能阻挠 聂菲斯！！

cutscene_e3m4_1_02.en: We don't have time for this—

cutscene_e3m4_1_05.en: Seems we are not too late.

cutscene_e3m4_1_06.en: It's our turn to help you out!

cutscene_e3m4_1_08.en: Drive them out of Valley IV!

cutscene_e3m4_1_09.cn: 我一定会彻底“咬断”他们的脖子 请您不要有后顾之忧
cutscene_e3m4_1_09.en: I shall tear through their throats. Rest assured, Endmin.

cutscene_e3m5_2_01.cn: 这是你“第一次”直面超域
cutscene_e3m5_2_01.en: This is your "first" gaze at the Æther.

cutscene_e3m5_2_03.cn: 这是不祥的象征 是光和时间的尸骸
cutscene_e3m5_2_03.en: A monument of calamity, a carcass of light and time.

cutscene_e3m5_2_04.cn: 或许你应该亲身体验一下……
cutscene_e3m5_2_04.en: Perhaps you should have a taste of this yourself...

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_01.cn: 你诞生的瞬间 塔卫二上泰拉人的总数是十二万八千七百九十三
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_01.en: There were 128,793 Terrans on Talos-II at your birth.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_02.cn: 一扇门联系着两颗星 我们跨过遥远与无限 踏上了这片陌生的故乡
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_02.en: A single gate bridged two worlds. We crossed the vast cosmos and arrived at this foreign home.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_03.cn: 然而 一切梦想和计划都和那扇门一起化为了废墟
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_03.en: However, all our dreams and plans fell into ruin with that same gate.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_04.cn: 断桥正在我们身后崩塌 每一次饥荒 每一次大规模伤亡 都可能让文明万劫不复
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_04.en: Behind us, the broken bridge crumbled. Every famine and mass casualty risked dooming our civilization.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_05.cn: 第一次天使战争 这颗星球的恶意释放了无穷无尽的战争兵器
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_05.en: The First Aggeloi War saw this world spawn countless war machines, steeped in malice.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_06.cn: 你带领新生的同盟发起反击 将威胁放逐进了超域
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_06.en: You led the fledgling alliance and banished the threat into the Ætherside.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_07.cn: 作为代价 开拓基地全面失陷 源石和你严重受损
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_07.en: Pioneering bases lost, Originium and you ravaged — victory's toll was heavy.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_08.cn: 耻辱战争 我们与全面内战擦肩而过 泰拉人险些用自己的武器杀死自己
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_08.en: Then the Humiliation War reignited fratricide, nearly pushing Terrans to the edge of full-scale civil war.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_09.cn: 你留下的种子及时萌发 人们在悬崖边缘止住脚步 《环带公约》正式缔结
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_09.en: The seed you sowed bloomed in time. At the cliff's edge, people paused and pledged the Band Accord.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_10.cn: 随后数十年 繁荣的年代拉开了帷幕
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_10.en: Decades later, we ushered in an age of prosperity.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_11.cn: 城市在南方再次兴起 文明环带快速发展
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_11.en: Cities rose in the south. The Civilization Band grew rapidly.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_12.cn: 一次又一次 你从沉睡中苏醒 引导文明迈向正轨 努力将我们带离这座断桥
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_12.en: Time and time again, you rose from your slumber to guide civilization, leading us away from the broken bridge.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_13.cn: 然而 宿敌默默舔舐伤口 我们却在为了资源与生存挣扎 无暇顾及最初的使命
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_13.en: However, as the enemy licked its wounds, we scrounged for resources and survival, neglecting our original vision.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_14.cn: 源石的伤痕从来没能真正恢复
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_14.en: And the Originium's wounds never truly healed.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_15.cn: 衰颓逐渐蔓延 每一次沉睡 你都在失去更多
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_15.en: The decay spread. With every slumber, you lost more.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_16.cn: 139年 被放逐者们再次叩响门扉 第二次天使战争近在咫尺
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_16.en: In Year 139, as the exiles returned, the Second Aggeloi War stood at our doorstep.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_17.cn: 我们不得不仓促发起远征 这一次苏醒 你的牺牲越过了最后的界限
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_17.en: We were forced to initiate an ill-prepared expedition. Your sacrifice exceeded the worst thresholds.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_18.cn: 源石的崩溃还在继续 我们从没有真正逃离断桥
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_18.en: The Originium is still collapsing. We never truly left that broken bridge.

cutscene_e4m1d5_1_19.cn: 执行“零号委托” 部署协议核心 恢复生命的脉动
cutscene_e4m1d5_1_19.en: Execute the Zeroth Directive. Deploy the PAC. Revive the pulse of life.

cutscene_e5m1_1_02.cn: 只是叙旧而已 不要冒犯我们的朋友
cutscene_e5m1_1_02.en: We just reminisced. Best if you keep it courteous.

cutscene_e5m1_1_03.cn: 抱歉 管理员 事发突然 没能好好准备
cutscene_e5m1_1_03.en: Sorry, Endmin. Please pardon the suddenness of this.

cutscene_e5m1_1_04.cn: 我只是希望我们可以坐下来谈一谈
cutscene_e5m1_1_04.en: I only hope to have a proper discussion.

cutscene_e5m1_1_07.cn: 可我们本不应该自相残杀
cutscene_e5m1_1_07.en: We have no cause to kill each other.

cutscene_e5m1_1_11.cn: 看来我们彼此都不能放下仇恨
cutscene_e5m1_1_11.en: Seems we are still chained by hatred.

cutscene_e5m1_1_12.cn: 但我们短暂的交谈真的很愉快 管理员
cutscene_e5m1_1_12.en: We had a delightful talk. Thank you, Endmin.

cutscene_e5m1_2_04.cn: （哼唱）破桨拍起嵌晶玉 烂网兜了个胖酒坛
cutscene_e5m1_2_04.en: Oroberyls sprinkle me broken oar! A holey net dredged a cask of kohl!

cutscene_e5m1_2_05.en: Oy! Eyes open! Hey, hey! Wake up!

cutscene_e5m1_2_06.cn: 怎么光喘气儿不出声啊？

cutscene_e5m1_2_09.cn: 好啊你 跟姑奶奶我玩装死是吧！
cutscene_e5m1_2_09.en: Little brat, playing dead on me, huh?

cutscene_e5m1_2_10.cn: （哼唱）筏子哆嗦递欠条 芦杆子跪倒交租单 哼哼——
cutscene_e5m1_2_10.en: Rafts-a-trembling, savings all spent. Reeds on them knees, paying me rent. Hmm-hmm—

cutscene_e5m3_1_01.cn: 弭队 这边也放好了

cutscene_e5m3_1_02.cn: 为什么要把这些破烂儿放这里啊 都是多旧的型号了
cutscene_e5m3_1_02.en: Why leave the old junk here? Even a thief wouldn't want it.

cutscene_e5m3_1_04.cn: 不过难得 都过了这么久了 他们也没什么动静
cutscene_e5m3_1_04.en: But they are behaving... Haven't made a scene in a while.

cutscene_e5m3_1_07.cn: 白面书生 小青龙 黑面煞！
cutscene_e5m3_1_07.en: Pale Scribe! Green Scales! And Darkmask!

cutscene_e5m3_1_11.cn: 这个交给我 你们 抓住剩下的
cutscene_e5m3_1_11.en: She's mine. You two, nab the rest!

cutscene_e5m3_1_15.cn: 嘁 今儿来得挺快啊
cutscene_e5m3_1_15.en: Tsk. Caught the smell quick, huh?

cutscene_e5m3_1_18.cn: 后面交给你们啦 速战速决！
cutscene_e5m3_1_18.en: Cover the retreat, peeps! Hit and run!

cutscene_e5m3_1_22.cn: 哼 我看肯定是怕了 估计应该不会再来了——
cutscene_e5m3_1_22.en: Hmph. They must be scared of us. Bet they'll never be back...

cutscene_e6m3_2_01.cn: 二十年前 我们和终末地共同开始筹备第四次大规模扩张性科考
cutscene_e6m3_2_01.en: Twenty years ago, we worked with Endfield to prepare our Fourth Scientific Survey for Expansion.

cutscene_e6m3_2_02.cn: 多年后 我主动申请加入科考团 第一次走出修建在环形山内部的城市
cutscene_e6m3_2_02.en: Years later, I volunteered for the Science Expedition, and left the growing cities within the Hongshan Crater for the first time.

cutscene_e6m3_2_03.cn: 远眺裂隙的时光 清晰过任何我留在宏山的记忆
cutscene_e6m3_2_03.en: My observations of the Rift left me memories far clearer than the others I made at Hongshan.

cutscene_e6m3_2_04.cn: 而经历长久的辩论之后 老师终于为科考站定下名字 “武陵”
cutscene_e6m3_2_04.en: After a lengthy debate, my Mentor finally named the Science Station — Wuling.

cutscene_e6m3_2_05.cn: 武以止戈 安民合众 陵水经地 厌难折冲
cutscene_e6m3_2_05.en: Wu, the pacifying force of martial might. Ling, the riparian ridge denying the Blight.

cutscene_e6m3_2_06.cn: 宏山科学院和它最强大的盟友们倾力创造了息壤
cutscene_e6m3_2_06.en: The Hongshan Academy of Sciences and its greatest allies committed every resource to create Xiranite.

cutscene_e6m3_2_07.cn: 源石技术和岁兽研究的结晶铸就了武陵科考站的第一座丰碑
cutscene_e6m3_2_07.en: By combining our knowledge of Originium and the Feranmut Sui, we forged the first milestone of Wuling Science Station.

cutscene_e6m3_2_08.cn: 息壤逆转侵蚀 隔绝裂隙 清水自息壤堰上奔流而下
cutscene_e6m3_2_08.en: The Xiranite reversed the Blight and isolated the Rift. Clean water cascaded from the Xiranite Dam.

cutscene_e6m3_2_10.cn: 至少在那场意外前 我一直都这么认为
cutscene_e6m3_2_10.en: At least that was what I believed until the accident.

cutscene_e6m3_2_11.cn: 离别是如此漫长 而武陵是他们存在过的最后痕迹 我怎敢忘记？
cutscene_e6m3_2_11.en: Parting lasts an eternity, and Wuling is the final mark they left behind. How could I ever forget?

cutscene_e6m3_2_12.cn: 当我回头时 一个站 竟成了一座城
cutscene_e6m3_2_12.en: In the blink of an eye, the Science Station had birthed a city.

cutscene_e6m3_2_13.cn: 武陵人自己找到了在绝地上安居的道路
cutscene_e6m3_2_13.en: The people of Wuling found a way to thrive upon the harshest lands.

cutscene_e6m3_2_14.cn: 安民合众 厌难折冲 有了人 才终有了城
cutscene_e6m3_2_14.en: To shelter the citizens. To fend off threats. A city is nothing without its people.

db01m1_desc_001.cn: 查看联络员菲奥娜发来的消息，确认发生了什么事。
db01m1_desc_001.en: Read messages from Fiona the Comms Officer to verify the situation.

db01m1_desc_002.cn: 前往帝江号的静滞核心附近，与相关研究人员阿奎多交谈，确认现场的情况。
db01m1_desc_002.en: Talk to Aquito near the Dijiang Stasis Core to verify the current situation.

db01m1_desc_003.cn: 初次探索取得了成功。与阿奎多交谈，商讨后续计划。
db01m1_desc_003.en: The first exploration has been a success. Talk to Aquito and discuss about future plans.

db01m1_desc_004.cn: 完成研发委托，解锁辅助探测技术中的“协议稳定”项目。
db01m1_desc_004.en: Complete research commissions and unlock the exploration support tech research: Stable Protocols.

db01m1_desc_005.cn: 返回谷地像差，扫描“重点目标”，完成委托“像差探索计划Ⅱ”。
db01m1_desc_005.en: Return to the Valley's Aberrants, scan the "key target", and complete the commission "Aberrant Exploration Ⅱ".

db01m1_desc_006.cn: 扫描工作已经完成。与阿奎多交谈，商讨后续计划。
db01m1_desc_006.en: Scanning task complete. Talk to Aquito and discuss about future plans.

db01m1_desc_008.cn: 进入谷地像差，确认周边区域是否发生变化，进行更深入的探索。
db01m1_desc_008.en: Enter the Valley's Aberrants, check the nearby zones for any changes, and explore the deeper zones.

db01m1_desc_009.cn: 对谷地像差的探索取得了初步进展。与阿奎多交谈，商讨后续计划。
db01m1_desc_009.en: The first steps for exploring the Valley's Aberrants have been completed. Talk to Aquito and discuss about future plans.

db01m1_desc_010.cn: 进入谷地像差，进行深入探索。
db01m1_desc_010.en: Enter the Valley's Aberrants and go deeper.

db01m1_desc_011.cn: 探索再次取得进展。与阿奎多交谈，商讨后续计划。
db01m1_desc_011.en: The exploration has made more progress. Talk to Aquito and discuss about future plans.

db01m1_desc_012.cn: 进入谷地像差，进行更深入的探索。
db01m1_desc_012.en: Enter the Valley's Aberrants and go even deeper.

db01m1_desc_013.cn: 赛希报告了帝江号舰体出现的异状。前往总控中枢与赛希交谈，确认具体情况。
db01m1_desc_013.en: Xaihi has reported an anomaly that occurred aboard Dijiang. Go to the Control Nexus to talk to her and verify the situation.

db01m1_desc_014.cn: 进入谷地像差，尽可能深入到探索区域的极限。
db01m1_desc_014.en: Enter the Valley's Aberrants and try to go to the most extreme depths of the explorable zones.

db01m1_desc_015.cn: 与阿奎多确认她的研究发现，商讨后续计划。
db01m1_desc_015.en: Talk to Aquito to verify her research findings and discuss about future plans.

db01m1_desc_016.cn: 进入谷地像差，进行更深入的探索。
db01m1_desc_016.en: Enter the Valley's Aberrants and go even deeper.

db01m1_desc_017.cn: 与阿奎多交谈，将赛希的报告和众人的分析同步给她。
db01m1_desc_017.en: Talk to Aquito and inform her of Xaihi's report and the analysis made by the team.

db01m1_desc_018.cn: 对谷地像差的探索取得了进一步进展。与阿奎多交谈，商讨后续计划。
db01m1_desc_018.en: Progress has been made for the exploration of the Valley's Aberrants. Talk to Aquito and discuss about future plans.

db01m1_desc_019.cn: 完成研发委托，获得辅助探测技术“爆炸物携行”。
db01m1_desc_019.en: Complete the research commission and acquire the exploration support tech: Portable Explosives.

db01m1_desc_020.cn: 探索再次取得进展。与阿奎多交谈，商讨后续计划。
db01m1_desc_020.en: The exploration has made more progress. Talk to Aquito and discuss about future plans.

db01m1_desc_021.cn: 进入谷地像差，进行更深入的探索。
db01m1_desc_021.en: Enter the Valley's Aberrants and go even deeper.

db01m3_desc_001.cn: 第一次来到协议空间，这里有我们希望找寻的目标。
db01m3_desc_001.en: This will be our first dive into this Protocol Space. Hopefully we can find our target.

db01m3_desc_002.cn: 前方出现了结核物质“沉积晶石”，需要前往调查并采集。
db01m3_desc_002.en: A nodular matter known as "Precipitation Crystals" has appeared. Investigate and gather the nodules.

db01m3_desc_003.cn: 继续前进，探索更深处的秘密。
db01m3_desc_003.en: Go deeper and explore its secrets

db01m3_desc_004.cn: 击败出现的裂地者，确保探索继续进行。
db01m3_desc_004.en: Defeat the Landbreakers that just appeared so that you can keep exploring the place.

db01m3_desc_005.cn: 阿奎多发现了不寻常的能量反应，前往能量反应所在位置进行调查。
db01m3_desc_005.en: Aquito has found several sites with unusual energy reactions. Go to those locations and investigate.

dlg_e1m3_14_006.cn: 工人们使用晶体外壳修好了信号塔。
dlg_e1m3_14_006.en: The crew repaired the Signal Tower with the Origocrusts.

dlg_e1m9_9_01.cn: 工人们把车转移到了部署区......
dlg_e1m9_9_01.en: The crew mates move the vehicle to the deployment area...

dlg_e2m5_1_001.cn: 小队跟随伊冯通过隐藏电梯到达了一楼
dlg_e2m5_1_001.en: The team followed Yvonne and used the secret elevator to reach 1F.

dlg_e2m6_22_001.cn: 众人在门口焦急地等待。
dlg_e2m6_22_001.en: Everyone is waiting nervously by the entrance.

dlg_sm1l1m6_1_01.cn: 哈特曼和亚历山大看着各自的照片，露出复杂的表情……随后与众人告别了
dlg_sm1l1m6_1_01.en: Hartmann and Aleksandr look conflicted as they study the photograph and then say goodbye to everyone.

dlg_sm1l5m1_13_01.cn: 接到通讯后，艾莱札·柯林斯连忙赶到了现场。
dlg_sm1l5m1_13_01.en: Aleeza Collins rushes to the site after receiving the message.

dlg_sm1l5m1_13_02.cn: 拉奎尔暂时被带回工团……
dlg_sm1l5m1_13_02.en: Raquel is brought back to the UWST, for now...

dlg_sm1l5m2_7_01.cn: 你和艾维文娜一同将拉奎尔从裂地者的牢笼中救出。
dlg_sm1l5m2_7_01.en: Together, Avywenna and you help Raquel escape the Landbreaker cage.

dungeon_bossrush_text_5.en: Go to the exit of the Protocol Space

dungeon_challenge_01_puzzle03_text_01.cn: 在限定时间内抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_01_puzzle03_text_01.en: Reach the exit within the time limit

dungeon_challenge_01_puzzle05_text_01.cn: 在限定时间内抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_01_puzzle05_text_01.en: Reach the exit within the time limit

dungeon_challenge_01_puzzle07_bonus.cn: 找齐6只长耳兽并抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_01_puzzle07_bonus.en: Find all 6 long-ears and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg001_text_1.cn: 灵活利用重物和压力感应开关，抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg001_text_1.en: Use heavy objects and pressure switches to reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg002_text_1.cn: 操作场中设备，抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg002_text_1.en: Operate the machinery in the training site and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg003_text_1.cn: 利用涡流团加速，尽快抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg003_text_1.en: Use the vortices to accelerate and reach the exit as quickly as you can

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg005_text_1.cn: 利用涡流团加速，躲避激光，尽快抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg005_text_1.en: Use the vortices to accelerate, dodge the beams, and reach the exit as quickly as you can

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg006_text_1.en: Make smart use of the explosives and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg007_text_1.en: Follow the long-ear and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg007_text_2.cn: 找到全部6只长耳兽，并抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg007_text_2.en: Find all 6 long-ears and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg008_text_1.cn: 躲避天使的轰击，抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg008_text_1.en: Dodge the Aggeloid bombardment and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg010_text_1.cn: 躲避激光，排除障碍，抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_dung01_cdg010_text_1.en: Dodge the beams, overcome the obstacles, and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_text_11.en: Speed up and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_text_14.cn: 躲避天使的轰击，抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_text_14.en: Dodge the Aggeloid bombardment and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_text_15.cn: 找到全部3个储藏箱，并抵达终点
dungeon_challenge_text_15.en: Find all 3 storage crates and reach the exit

dungeon_challenge_timelimit_toast.en: Follow the nav point and proceed

dungeon_chartrial_common_chartrial_guide.cn: 作战演练已完成，可继续体验试用干员或退出当前关卡
dungeon_chartrial_common_chartrial_guide.en: Combat drill complete. You can keep playtesting the operator or exit this stage.

dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.cn: 连续普通攻击，发动重击
dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.en: Keep performing basic attacks to unleash the Final Strike

dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.cn: 使用洁尔佩塔的战技吸引所有敌人并施加自然附着
dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.en: Use Gilberta's battle skill to pull in all enemies and apply Nature Infliction

dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.cn: 使用秋栗的战技对敌人施加燃烧
dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.en: Use Akekuri's battle skill to apply Combustion on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.cn: 与秋栗和佩丽卡配合，对敌人施加导电，触发洁尔佩塔的连携技
dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.en: Cooperate with Akekuri and Perlica to apply Electrification on the enemy and trigger Gilberta's combo skill

dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.cn: 使用洁尔佩塔的连携技，对敌人造成击飞
dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.en: Use Gilberta's combo skill to Lift the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.cn: 与佩丽卡配合，使用洁尔佩塔的战技与连携技，完成终结技充能
dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.en: Cooperate with Perlica and use Gilberta's battle skill and combo skill to reach max ultimate energy

dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.cn: 使用洁尔佩塔和佩丽卡的终结技，对敌人施加法术脆弱，造成高额伤害
dungeon_chartutorial_aglina_chartrain01_.en: Use Gilberta and Perlica's ultimates to apply Arts Susceptibility on the enemy and deal massive DMG

dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.cn: 连续普通攻击，发动重击
dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.en: Keep performing basic attacks to unleash the Final Strike

dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.cn: 使用艾尔黛拉的战技，对敌人造成伤害并生成3个多利先生的影子
dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.en: Use Ardelia's battle skill to deal DMG to enemies and generate 3 Shadows of Mr. Dolly

dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.cn: 触碰3个多利先生的影子，回复管理员的生命值
dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.en: Touch the 3 Shadows of Mr. Dolly to restore the Endministrator's HP

dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.cn: 触发并使用艾尔黛拉的连携技，对敌人施加腐蚀
dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.en: Trigger and use Ardelia's combo skill to apply Corrosion on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.cn: 使用艾尔黛拉的战技消耗腐蚀，对敌人施加物理脆弱和法术脆弱
dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.en: Use Ardelia's battle skill to consume Corrosion and apply Physical Susceptibility and Arts Susceptibility on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.cn: 与管理员配合，使用艾尔黛拉的战技和连携技，完成终结技充能
dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.en: Cooperate with the Endministrator and use Ardelia's battle skill and combo skill to reach max ultimate energy

dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.cn: 使用艾尔黛拉的终结技
触碰多利先生的影子回复生命值
dungeon_chartutorial_ardelia_chartrain01.en: Touch the Shadows of Mr. Dolly to restore HP

dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.cn: 连续普通攻击，发动重击
dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.en: Keep performing basic attacks to unleash the Final Strike

dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.cn: 使用昼雪的战技反击敌人，对敌人施加寒冷附着
dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.en: Use Snowshine's battle skill to perform a retaliation bash and apply Cryo Infliction on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.cn: 使用秋栗的战技，对敌人施加燃烧
dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.en: Use Akekuri's battle skill to apply Combustion on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.cn: 在敌人攻击主控干员后，触发昼雪的连携技
dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.en: Let the controlled operator get attacked by the enemy to trigger Snowshine's combo skill

dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.cn: 使用昼雪的连携技，持续回复主控干员的生命值
dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.en: Use Snowshine's combo skill to continuously restore the controlled operator's HP

dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.cn: 使用昼雪的终结技生成冰雪地带，对敌人施加冻结
dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.en: Use Snowshine's ultimate to create a Snow Zone and apply Solidification on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.cn: 与管理员配合，对敌人造成碎冰
dungeon_chartutorial_aurora_chartrain01_.en: Cooperate with the Endministrator to shatter the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.cn: 连续普通攻击，发动重击
dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.en: Keep performing basic attacks to unleash the Final Strike

dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.cn: 对处于电磁附着或导电状态的敌人造成重击，触发艾维文娜的连携技
dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.en: Perform a Final Strike on enemies with Electric Infliction or Electrification to trigger Avywenna's combo skill

dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.cn: 使用艾维文娜的连携技生成3枚雷枪
dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.en: Use Avywenna's combo skill to throw 3 Thunderlances

dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.cn: 与佩丽卡配合，使用艾维文娜的连携技生成3枚雷枪
dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.en: Cooperate with Perlica use Avywenna's combo skill to throw 3 Thunderlances

dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.cn: 使用艾维文娜的战技召回所有雷枪并使雷枪命中敌人
dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.en: Use Avywenna's battle skill to retrieve Thunderlances and have all the returning Thunderlances hit enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.cn: 与佩丽卡配合，使用艾维文娜的终结技对敌人造成伤害并生成强雷枪
dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.en: Cooperate with Perlica and cast Avywenna's ultimate to deal DMG to the enemy and generate a Thunderlance EX

dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.cn: 使用艾维文娜的战技召回所有雷枪，使雷枪全部命中敌人
dungeon_chartutorial_avywen_chartrain01_.en: Use Avywenna's battle skill retrieve Thunderlances and have all the returning Thunderlances hit enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_azrila_chartrain01_.cn: 连续普通攻击，发动重击
dungeon_chartutorial_azrila_chartrain01_.en: Keep performing basic attacks to unleash the Final Strike

dungeon_chartutorial_azrila_chartrain01_.cn: 在余烬使用战技期间承受敌人的伤害，造成额外失衡
dungeon_chartutorial_azrila_chartrain01_.en: When Ember takes DMG from enemies when using her battle skill, she deals more Stagger

dungeon_chartutorial_azrila_chartrain01_.cn: 再次在余烬使用战技期间承受敌人的伤害，造成额外失衡
dungeon_chartutorial_azrila_chartrain01_.en: Use Ember's battle skill again; if the enemy deals DMG to her during this time, the battle skill deals more Stagger

dungeon_chartutorial_azrila_chartrain01_.cn: 使用余烬的战技对敌人造成破防
dungeon_chartutorial_azrila_chartrain01_.en: Use Ember's battle skill to apply Vulnerability on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.cn: 使用伊冯的战技消耗寒冷附着，对敌人施加冻结
dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.en: Use Yvonne's battle skill to consume Cryo Infliction and apply Solidification on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.cn: 与埃特拉配合，对敌人施加冻结
dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.en: Cooperate with Estella to apply Solidification on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.cn: 对处于冻结状态的敌人造成重击
dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.en: Perform a Final Strike on the Solidified enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.cn: 与埃特拉配合，对敌人施加冻结
dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.en: Cooperate with Estella to apply Solidification on the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.cn: 对处于冻结状态的敌人造成重击，触发并使用伊冯的连携技对敌人施加冻结
dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.en: Perform a Final Strike on an enemy with Solidification to trigger Yvonne's combo skill and apply Solidification

dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.cn: 使用伊冯的终结技，持续对敌人造成伤害
dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.en: Use Yvonne's ultimate to deal continuous DMG to the enemy

dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.cn: 在伊冯的终结技结束时消耗冻结，对敌人造成高额伤害
dungeon_chartutorial_yvonne_chartrain01_.en: When Yvonne's ultimate ends, she consumes Solidification and deals massive DMG to the enemy

dungeon_levelcheck_common_text_1.cn: 击败所有敌人，完成试炼挑战
dungeon_levelcheck_common_text_1.en: Defeat all enemies and complete the challenges of the trial

dungeon_source_tips_kill_atk.cn: <@gd.key>击败敌人可以短暂获得攻击力提升</>
dungeon_source_tips_kill_atk.en: <@gd.key>Defeat enemies to get a temporary ATK buff</>

dungeon_source_tips_kill_sp.en: <@gd.key>Defeating enemies gives a lot of SP</>

dungeon_source_tips_magical_abnormal.cn: <@gd.key>法术异常触发时，对目标有奇效</>
dungeon_source_tips_magical_abnormal.en: <@gd.key>Triggering Arts Reactions is an effective way to fight the target</>

dungeon_source_tips_physical_abnormal.cn: <@gd.key>物理异常触发时，对目标有奇效</>
dungeon_source_tips_physical_abnormal.en: <@gd.key>Triggering Physical Statuses is an effective way to fight the target</>

dungeon_source_tips_room05_2.cn: 利用场地中的攻击开关
dungeon_source_tips_room05_2.en: Use the attack switch in this place

dungeon_source_tips_room06_2.cn: 小心场地外敌人的轰炸
dungeon_source_tips_room06_2.en: Faraway enemies are bombing this place

dungeon_source_tips_room07_2.cn: 小心场地中的那个家伙
dungeon_source_tips_room07_2.en: Be wary of the enemy in the middle of the field

dungeon_source_tips_room11_2.cn: 物理异常触发时，对目标有奇效
dungeon_source_tips_room11_2.en: Triggering Physical Statuses is an effective way to fight the target

dungeon_source_tips_room12_2.cn: 法术异常触发时，对目标有奇效
dungeon_source_tips_room12_2.en: Triggering Arts Reactions is an effective way to fight the target

dungeon_source_tips_room13_2.cn: 小心敌人具有更高的失衡值
dungeon_source_tips_room13_2.en: Careful, enemies have longer Stagger Meters

dungeon_train_train01_text_01.cn: 当敌人<@gd.key>蓄力</>时，对其施放技能
dungeon_train_train01_text_01.en: Cast skills at the enemy when he starts <@gd.key>charging up</>

dungeon_train_train01_text_02.cn: 合理利用<@gd.key>打断</>，击败敌人
dungeon_train_train01_text_02.en: <@gd.key>Interrupt</> the enemy wisely to defeat him

dungeon_train_train02_text_01.cn: 对敌人使用带有<@gd.key>猛击</>的技能
dungeon_train_train02_text_01.en: Cast skills with the <@gd.key>Crush</> effect on the enemy

dungeon_train_train03_text_01.cn: 对敌人使用带有<@gd.key>击飞</>的技能
dungeon_train_train03_text_01.en: Cast skills with the <@gd.key>Lift</> effect on the enemy

dungeon_train_train04_text_01.cn: 对敌人使用带有<@gd.key>倒地</>的技能
dungeon_train_train04_text_01.en: Cast skills with the <@gd.key>Knock Down</> effect on the enemy

dungeon_train_train05_text_02.en: Trigger an <@gd.key>Arts Burst</> on the enemy

dungeon_train_train06_text_02.cn: 施加<@gd.key>灼热附着</>使敌人<@gd.key>燃烧</>
dungeon_train_train06_text_02.en: Apply <@gd.key>Heat Infliction</> to trigger <@gd.key>Combustion</> on the enemy

dungeon_train_train07_text_02.cn: 施加<@gd.key>寒冷附着</>使敌人<@gd.key>冻结</>
dungeon_train_train07_text_02.en: Apply <@gd.key>Cryo Infliction</> to trigger <@gd.key>Solidification</> on the enemy

dungeon_train_train07_text_04.cn: 施加破防或<@gd.key>物理异常</>，触发<@gd.key>碎冰</>
dungeon_train_train07_text_04.en: Apply Vulnerability or <@gd.key>Physical Statuses</> to trigger <@gd.key>Shatter</>

dungeon_train_train08_text_02.cn: 施加<@gd.key>电磁附着</>使敌人<@gd.key>导电</>
dungeon_train_train08_text_02.en: Apply <@gd.key>Electric Infliction</> to trigger <@gd.key>Electrification</> on the enemy

dungeon_train_train09_text_02.cn: 施加<@gd.key>自然附着</>使敌人<@gd.key>腐蚀</>
dungeon_train_train09_text_02.en: Apply <@gd.key>Nature Infliction</> to trigger <@gd.key>Corrosion</> on the enemy

dungeon_train_train10_text_01.cn: 及时<@gd.key>闪避</>，仅用普通攻击与<@gd.key>重击</>击败敌人
dungeon_train_train10_text_01.en: Perform well-timed <@gd.key>dodges</>. Defeat the enemy with just basic attacks and <@gd.key>Final Strikes</>.

dungeon_train_train11_text_01.cn: 打破敌人的第一个<@gd.key>失衡节点</>

dungeon_train_train11_text_02_1.cn: 以任意方式将敌人的失衡值累积至最大
dungeon_train_train11_text_02_1.en: Use any means to build up the enemy's Stagger

dungeon_train_train11_text_02_2.cn: （可选）利用<@gd.key>物理异常</>累积敌人失衡值
dungeon_train_train11_text_02_2.en: (OPTIONAL) Apply <@gd.key>Physical Statuses</> to build up enemy Stagger

dungeon_train_train12_text_01.cn: 对敌人使用带有<@gd.key>碎甲</>的技能
dungeon_train_train12_text_01.en: Cast skills with the <@gd.key>Breach</> effect on the enemy

dungeon_training_train01_1.cn: 当敌人<@gd.key>蓄力</>时，对其施放技能
dungeon_training_train01_1.en: Cast skills at enemies when they start <@gd.key>charging up</>

dungeon_training_train01_2.cn: 合理利用<@gd.key>打断</>效果，击败所有敌人

dungeon_training_train04_1.en: Inflict the <@gd.key>Knocked Down</> effect on the enemy

dungeon_training_train05_2.cn: 在敌人身上触发<@gd.key>法术爆发</>效果

dungeon_training_train06_2.cn: 施加<@gd.key>灼热附着</>使敌人<@gd.key>燃烧</>
dungeon_training_train06_2.en: Apply <@gd.key>Heat Infliction</> to trigger <@gd.key>Combustion</> on the enemy

dungeon_training_train07_2.cn: 施加<@gd.key>寒冷附着</>使敌人<@gd.key>冻结</>
dungeon_training_train07_2.en: Apply <@gd.key>Cryo Infliction</> to trigger <@gd.key>Solidification</> on the enemy

dungeon_training_train07_4.cn: 施加<@gd.key>物理异常</>效果使冻结的敌人<@gd.key>破碎</>

dungeon_training_train08_2.cn: 施加<@gd.key>电磁附着</>使敌人<@gd.key>导电</>
dungeon_training_train08_2.en: Apply <@gd.key>Electric Infliction</> to trigger <@gd.key>Electrification</> on the enemy

dungeon_training_train09_2.cn: 施加<@gd.key>自然附着</>使敌人<@gd.key>腐蚀</>
dungeon_training_train09_2.en: Apply <@gd.key>Nature Infliction</> to trigger <@gd.key>Corrosion</> on the enemy

dungeon_training_train10_1.en: <@gd.key>Interrupt</> every charging attack of the enemy

dungeon_training_train11_1.cn: 在不受伤害的情况下击败所有敌人
dungeon_training_train11_1.en: Defeat all enemies without taking DMG

dungeon_training_train12_1.cn: 在不受伤害的情况下击败所有敌人
dungeon_training_train12_1.en: Defeat all enemies without taking DMG

dungeon_training_train_failedCondition.en: Don't let any operator in the team get disconnected

e0m0_desc_001.cn: 最终任务开始。管理员来到地面，见到了在那里等待自己的“她”。
e0m0_desc_001.en: The final mission has begun. The Endministrator lands at the surface and sees "her" waiting at the place.

e0m2_desc_002.cn: 为了重新了解关于自己的一切，醒来的管理员决定跟随佩丽卡四处转转。
e0m2_desc_002.en: You have been awakened and you need to relearn your past. You decide to follow Perlica for a tour of the ship.

e0m2_desc_003.cn: 管理员需要重新了解关于自己的一切。
e0m2_desc_003.en: Endmin must relearn everything about themselves.

e1m10_desc_001.cn: 帝江号的修复工程有了超出预期的进展。通过协议传送返回帝江号，听取干员赛希的报告。
e1m10_desc_001.en: Repair work on Dijiang has gone better than expected. Tele-protocol to Dijiang and hear Xaihi's report.

e1m10_desc_002.cn: 秦茳尺发来了联络。查看她的消息，确认发生了什么事。
e1m10_desc_002.en: Qin Jiangchi has sent a message. Check it and see what's going on.

e1m10_desc_003.cn: 枢纽区基地与帝江号的联系得到了进一步恢复。前往中控塔，完成返回帝江号的准备工作。
e1m10_desc_003.en: Contact between the Hub Base and Dijiang has been further restored. Head to the Control Tower and complete preparations for return.

e1m1_desc_001.cn: 枢纽区基地与帝江号失去了联络，并出现了极强的天使信号。佩丽卡与管理员决定提前启程来到枢纽区查看究竟。
e1m1_desc_001.en: Dijiang lost contact with the Hub Base, where strong Aggeloid signals were also detected. Perlica and the Endmin decide to set out early for the Hub Base to investigate.

e1m1_desc_002.cn: 前往旧工厂区，破坏锚点并救出工程师安德烈。
e1m1_desc_002.en: Go to the Old Factory, take out the Ankhor and rescue a fellow engineer named Andre.

e1m1_desc_003.cn: 安德烈已经获救。与秦茳尺会合，为她提供支援。
e1m1_desc_003.en: Andre has been rescued. Meet with Director Qin and back her up.

e1m2_desc_001.cn: 启动协议共振塔能够恢复枢纽区基地的供电。前往基地外的预留地点，部署协议核心。
e1m2_desc_001.en: Activating the Protocol Resonance Tower will restore power to the Hub Base. Head to the reserved location outside the base and deploy the Protocol Automation-Core.

e1m3_desc_001.cn: 源石副产物中心可能有大量修复工作要做。前往集成核心区域，利用集成工业系统准备材料。
e1m3_desc_001.en: There may be extensive repair work at the Originium Byproduct Processing Center. Go to the Core AIC Area and use AIC facilities to prepare the necessary materials.

e1m3_desc_002.cn: 枢纽区还有许多设备需要修复。部署便携源石矿机，自动采集源矿，生产更多晶体外壳。
e1m3_desc_002.en: Many facilities in the Hub still need repair. Deploy Portable Originium Rigs to automatically mine Originium Ore and produce more Origocrusts.

e1m3_desc_005.cn: 安德烈在原型机里找到了一些有趣的信息。前往地下实验室，与安德烈聊聊他的想法。
e1m3_desc_005.en: Andre finds something interesting in the Prototype. Go to the underground lab and talk to Andre.

e1m3_desc_006.cn: 锚点袭击发生前，谷地要塞方向出现过可疑的异状。返回中控塔，尝试恢复枢纽区与谷地要塞的联络。
e1m3_desc_006.en: Anomalies were detected near the Valley Fort before the Ankhorfall. Return to the Control Tower and try to restore contact between the Hub and the Valley Fort.

e1m3_desc_007.cn: 需要的修复材料已经准备完毕。前往源石副产物中心，回收原型机的技术资料与零件。
e1m3_desc_007.en: All repair materials are ready. Head to the Originium BPPC to retrieve the Prototype parts and technical documents.

e1m3_desc_008.cn: 躲藏在源石副产物中心的工人已经被救出，原型机的零件与资料也被找回了。离开源石副产物中心，将零件与资料交给安德烈。
e1m3_desc_008.en: You saved the crew mates hiding in the Originium Byproduct Processing Center, and retrieved the Prototype parts and documents. Time to leave the processing center and give Andre the parts and documents.

e1m3_desc_009.cn: 失联的武库工程师很可能被困在军械库中，制备源石粉末，爆破堵在军械库大门前的建筑残骸。
e1m3_desc_009.en: The missing arsenal engineer may be trapped inside the arsenal. Make some Originium Powder to blast apart the building rubble blocking the way into the arsenal.

e1m3_desc_010.cn: 裂地者正在源石副产物中心寻找什么。利用扫描功能检查周围，寻找更多线索。
e1m3_desc_010.en: The Landbreakers are looking for something at the Originium Byproduct Processing Center. Use the scanning feature to locate more useful clues.

e1m4_desc_001.cn: 裂地者已经袭击了谷地要塞。在桥头工事与“裂地者专家”会合，前往谷地通道。
e1m4_desc_001.en: The Landbreakers have attacked the Valley Fort. Rendezvous with the Landbreaker specialist at the Bridge Approach and go to the Valley Pass.

e1m4_desc_002.cn: 裂地者破坏了大桥的供电与控制系统。用裂地者身上获得的零件修复升降开关，并用协议核心为供电终端供电。
e1m4_desc_002.en: The Landbreakers have damaged the bridge's power and control systems. Use parts taken from them to repair the bridge switch and power the Electric Nexus with the PAC.

e1m5_desc_001.cn: 为了解救遇袭的工人们，必须进入谷地要塞。前往谷地通道，寻找深入推进的方法。
e1m5_desc_001.en: To save the workers caught in the attack, you must enter the Valley Fort. Head to the Valley Pass and find a way to push deeper.

e1m5_desc_002.cn: 卡贾的妹妹急需帮助。跟随卡贾，前往难民的避难所。
e1m5_desc_002.en: Karja's sister is in critical condition. Follow Karja to the shelter.

e1m6_desc_001.cn: 避难所的难民们需要一处条件更好的居所。跟随索斯前往空地，清理裂地者的营地。
e1m6_desc_001.en: The refugees in the shelter need a better place to live. Follow Soth to the open field and clear out the Landbreaker camp.

e1m6_desc_002.cn: 四号谷地出现了一些奇怪的源石反应。进入未知的协议空间，探查其中的情况。
e1m6_desc_002.en: Strange Originium reactions have been detected in Valley IV. Enter the unknown Protocol Space and investigate the situation.

e1m7_desc_001.cn: 难民的困境暂时靠据点得以缓解。借助地下通风管道深入裂地者聚集地，向谷地要塞前进。
e1m7_desc_001.en: The outpost has provided temporary relief for the refugees. Enter the underground ventilation shaft to infiltrate the Landbreaker camp and advance toward the Valley Fort.

e1m7_desc_002.cn: 为了驱散拦路的烟雾，管理员一行需要破坏碾骨氏族建造的巢雕。
e1m7_desc_002.en: You must destroy the Bonekrusher denstacks in order to clear the haze blocking your way.

e1m8_desc_001.cn: 谷地要塞近在咫尺。深入其中，准备面对可能的战斗。
e1m8_desc_001.en: The Valley Fort is within reach. Get inside and prepare for battle.

e1m8_desc_002.cn: 为了阻止聂菲斯，管理员一行必须击败眼前的裂地者——罗丹。
e1m8_desc_002.en: To stop Nefarith, you must first defeat her fearsome champion, the Landbreaker named Rhodagn.

e1m8_desc_003.cn: 罗丹已经被击败。乘坐电梯，前往谷地要塞上层，追上聂菲斯。
e1m8_desc_003.en: Rhodagn has been defeated. Take the elevator and reach the upper floors of the fort to catch up to Nefarith.

e1m9_desc_001.cn: 由于连接谷地通道与供能高地的大桥被破坏，管理员一行需要另寻他路。
e1m9_desc_001.en: The bridge connecting the Valley Pass to the Power Plateau has been destroyed. You must search for another way.

e1m9_desc_002.cn: 为了清理另一条前往供能高地的道路，使用集成工业系统，与工团的工人们一起完成各项物资的筹备。
e1m9_desc_002.en: To clear out another way to the Power Plateau, work with the UWST crew mates and use the AIC Factory to prepare various supplies.

e1m9d5_desc_001.cn: 距离清障车队打通道路还有一段时间。为了妥善应对后续危机，进行必要的准备工作。
e1m9d5_desc_001.en: It will take a while for the vehicle crew to clear the road. To better tackle the growing crisis, you must carry out the necessary preparations.

e2m1_desc_001.cn: 清障工作已经告一段落。前往集成核心区域，与秦茳尺和安德烈商讨接下来的计划。
e2m1_desc_001.en: The rubble-clearing work is complete. Head to the Core AIC Area and discuss the next steps with Qin Jiangchi and Andre.

e2m1_desc_002.cn: 为了解决新一轮的危机，管理员一行需要带上TA-TA原型机前往供能高地。
e2m1_desc_002.en: A new crisis has struck Valley IV. You must bring the TA-TA Prototype to the Power Plateau.

e2m1_desc_003.cn: 为了更好地应对危机，需要先进行妥善准备。
e2m1_desc_003.en: Proper preparation is key to handling the crisis effectively.

e2m2_desc_001.cn: 为了前往供能高地，管理员一行需要沿着公路穿过源石研究园。
e2m2_desc_001.en: To reach the Power Plateau, you must follow the road and make your way through the Originium Science Park.

e2m2_desc_002.cn: 为了前往供能高地，管理员一行需要想办法让侵蚀核心暴露出来，以清除此地的侵蚀。
e2m2_desc_002.en: To reach the Power Plateau, you must find a way to expose the Blight Core and clear out the Blight here.

e2m3_desc_001.cn: 从艾莱扎·柯林斯处获得权限卡后，管理员一行继续前往源石实验园区。
e2m3_desc_001.en: After Aleeza Collins gives you an access card, you continue to make your way to the Originium Science Park.

e2m4_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行试图穿过源石实验园区。受到侵蚀的影响，园区内各处难以通行，管理员等人必须设法找出一条能够通行的路线。
e2m4_desc_001.en: You try to make your way across the Originium Science Park but many paths within the Park are blocked by the Blight. You must figure a way to safely navigate through this Blighted mess.

e2m4_desc_002.cn: 为了修理塔塔，管理员一行决定前往伊冯所在的研究所。
e2m4_desc_002.en: To get Tata repaired, you decide to head to the Research Center and find Yvonne.

e2m5_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行需要前往研究所二楼的实验室找到伊冯。
e2m5_desc_001.en: You must head to a lab on 2F of the Research Center and find Yvonne.

e2m5_desc_002.cn: 伊冯还在做维修准备，为她选一首适合的伴奏吧。
e2m5_desc_002.en: Yvonne's still getting ready for the repairs. Pick a fitting soundtrack for her.

e2m5d5_desc_001.cn: 塔塔已经恢复了状态，管理员一行决定前往矿脉源区。
e2m5d5_desc_001.en: Tata has regained its vigor. You decide to head to the Origin Lodespring.

e2m5d5_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行决定做足准备后，再前往矿脉源区。
e2m5d5_desc_002.en: You decide to prepare yourselves before proceeding to the Origin Lodespring.

e2m6_desc_001.cn: 告别伊冯，管理员一行人带着塔塔继续前进，穿过矿脉源区。
e2m6_desc_001.en: You bid Yvonne farewell, and press on with Tata through the Origin Lodespring.

e2m6_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行人察觉到了矿脉源区存在的异样，在商议时，一名叫作阿丽娅的工团少女突然出现。她声称遭遇裂地者袭击，而一名出手相助的狼群成员正陷入苦战，急需支援。
e2m6_desc_002.en: You sense something off in the Origin Lodespring. As you're discussing your next move, a UWST girl named Alia suddenly arrives. She says they were ambushed by Landbreakers and the Pack member who stepped in is now struggling and urgently needs support.

e2m6_desc_003.cn: 管理员一行人遇见了阿丽娅口中的狼群成员——洛茜，她提供了一条关键线索：正在矿区医疗站接受治疗的搜救队队员艾尔法斯很可能知道那些异常锚点的情报。众人决定前去寻找这位艾尔法斯。
e2m6_desc_003.en: You meet Rossi, the Pack member Alia mentioned. She offers a key clue: Alfass, an SAR crew mate under treatment at the Mining Area Clinic, may have intel on the abnormal Ankhors. You decide to go find him.

e2m6_desc_004.cn: 管理员一行人跟随洛茜抵达了矿区医疗站，和她聊聊看接下来怎么做。
e2m6_desc_004.en: You follow Rossi to the Mining Area Clinic. Talk to her and decide what to do next.

e2m6_desc_005.cn: 这里是越医生开办的矿区医疗站，向他了解情况，问一问艾尔法斯的所在之处。
e2m6_desc_005.en: This is the Mining Area Clinic run by Medical Officer Yue. Speak with him to learn more about the situation and where Alfass is.

e2m6_desc_006.cn: 越医生告诉管理员一行人艾尔法斯就在医疗站二楼，去和他谈谈吧。
e2m6_desc_006.en: Medical Officer Yue tells you Alfass is on the 2F of the clinic. Go speak with him.

e2m6_desc_007.cn: 洛茜接回了晚归的探查队队员，并称查到了重要的信息。前往洛茜所在的位置，汇总现有的情报。
e2m6_desc_007.en: Rossi has brought back a survey team member who just made it back. She claims to have found critical intel. Head to her location and piece together your findings.

e2m6_desc_008.cn: 罗伊尔提到源石树枝可以抵挡震荡波。矿区营地的詹娜奶奶常年照料一棵活着的源石树苗，去找她打听一下树苗的来历吧。
e2m6_desc_008.en: Royle mentions that Originium branches can block shockwaves. Granny Jenner at the Mining Camp has long cared for a living Originium sapling. Go ask her about its origins.

e2m6_desc_009.cn: 随着锚点的异动，矿脉源区突然涌现大量天使。一部分天使已经攻入了矿区营地。霎时间，营地内警报大作。管理员一行人立刻动身，处理眼下的危机。
e2m6_desc_009.en: Due to Ankhor anomalies, a wave of Aggeloi surges across the Origin Lodespring. Several have already breached the Mining Camp. Sirens blare instantly. You spring into action to handle the emergency.

e2m6_desc_010.cn: 众人发现塔塔已被天使包围。塔塔是解决裂隙的关键，消灭它旁边的天使！
e2m6_desc_010.en: You find Tata surrounded by Aggeloi. Tata is the key to resolving the rift. Take down the enemies around it!

e2m6_desc_011.cn: 大量天使涌入了矿区营地，它们会威胁到营地内人们的安全。需要尽快消灭此处所有的天使！
e2m6_desc_011.en: The Mining Camp is being overrun by Aggeloi. They're a threat to everyone's safety. Clear them out immediately!

e2m7_desc_001.cn: 面对矿脉源区危险的局面，管理员一行需要将锚点尽数破坏，消除震荡波带来的威胁。
e2m7_desc_001.en: To counter the danger in the Origin Lodespring, you need to destroy all Ankhors and eliminate the shockwave threat.

e2m8_desc_001.cn: 所有的锚点已被摧毁，世代摇篮前的屏障也随即消失。深入世代摇篮，消除其中潜藏的威胁。
e2m8_desc_001.en: All Ankhors have been destroyed, and the barrier before the Cradle of the Ages has vanished. Go deeper into the Cradle of the Ages and eliminate the hidden threats.

e2m8_desc_002.cn: 世代摇篮内的威胁已经解除，继续探索世代摇篮内部，寻找通往供能高地的路。
e2m8_desc_002.en: The threat in the Cradle of the Ages has been neutralized. Keep exploring the area within the Cradle of the Ages, and find a way to the Power Plateau.

e2m8d5_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行人抵达了通往供能高地的索道，但接下来的道路更加危机四伏，佩丽卡建议管理员做足准备后再继续前进。
e2m8d5_desc_001.en: You have arrived at the shaft leading to the Power Plateau, but the path ahead is even more perilous. Perlica advises making thorough preparations before moving on.

e3m1_desc_001.cn: 抵达供能高地后，裂隙下方的超域试验场近在眼前，众人决定加快脚步，朝着此行的终点前进。
e3m1_desc_001.en: Upon reaching the Power Plateau, you spot the Æther Test Site beneath the rift. You decide to pick up the pace toward your final destination.

e3m1_desc_002.cn: 四周的线索显示供能高地已被裂地者所占领，两侧的道路被破坏，前进的路线只剩下眼前的源石发电站。管理员一行人不得不进入这片危机四伏的区域，找到穿越它的方法。
e3m1_desc_002.en: Clues in the area suggest the Power Plateau has been taken over by Landbreakers. With the side routes ruined, the only path forward is through the Originium Power Plant ahead. You have no choice but to enter this perilous zone and find a way through.

e3m1_desc_003.cn: 源石发电站内布满了裂地者四处破坏的痕迹。在入口徘徊的敌人阻挡了前路，想要继续前进就必须消灭他们。
e3m1_desc_003.en: The Originium Power Plant shows clear signs of destruction left by Landbreakers. Enemies are blocking the entrance. Clear them out to proceed.

e3m2_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行人收到了源石发电站负责人克劳的临时通信。众人决定前往克劳发送的坐标，掌握源石发电站的现状。
e3m2_desc_001.en: You receive a radio message from Crowe, head of the Originium Power Plant. You decide to head to the coordinates he provided to assess the situation at the power plant.

e3m2_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行人在源石发电站内遇见了工团研究员安格鲁，他正在躲避裂地者的搜索。和他聊一聊，或许能得知更多源石发电站内所发生的事。
e3m2_desc_002.en: Inside the Originium Power Plant, you encounter Angro, a UWST scientist hiding from Landbreaker patrols. Speak with him — he may know more about what's happening here.

e3m2_desc_003.cn: 安格鲁告诉管理员一行人，克劳就在不远处的操作间。找到他，并问问他在通信中没有说完的事。
e3m2_desc_003.en: Angro tells you that Crowe is in a nearby control room. Find him and ask about what he left unsaid in the radio comm.

e3m3_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行人决定帮助克劳找到失散的学徒——他们负责外出回收“烙铁指令”相关设备。根据克劳的提示，在源石发电站内展开搜救。
e3m3_desc_001.en: You decide to help Crowe find the missing apprentices, who were tasked with retrieving equipment related to the Utjug Order. Follow Crowe's guide and begin the search within the Originium Power Plant.

e3m3_desc_002.cn: 裂地者在存放发信器的实验室内大肆破坏。为了解除危机，必须消灭眼前的裂地者。
e3m3_desc_002.en: The Landbreakers are tearing through the lab where the signal emitter is stored. Take them down to neutralize the threat.

e3m3_desc_003.cn: 发送“烙铁指令”的准备已经完成了，现在该回操作间通知克劳：反击的时刻到了。
e3m3_desc_003.en: Preparation for sending out the Utjug Order is complete. Head back to the control room and tell Crowe it's time to strike back.

e3m3_desc_004.cn: 克劳发现了管理员一行人身后的塔塔，于是决定改变现有的计划。跟上他，看看他要说什么。
e3m3_desc_004.en: Seeing Tata behind you, Crowe decides to change his original plan. Follow him and hear what he has to say.

e3m3_desc_005.cn: 管理员一行人从邓恩口中得知克莱维尔前往了发电站内的实验室。进入实验室，找到克莱维尔和“烙铁指令”所需的发信器。
e3m3_desc_005.en: You learn from Dean that Clavell went to the lab inside the Power Plant. Head inside the lab and find both Clavell and the signal emitter required for the Utjug Order.

e3m3_desc_006.cn: 实验室已经安全了。搜索实验室，克劳委托众人寻找的发信器就在这里。
e3m3_desc_006.en: The lab is now secure. Search the area. The signal emitter Crowe asked you to find should be here.

e3m4_desc_001.cn: 为了抵达超域试验场，管理员一行人需要用信标在巢雕附近进行定位。工团会根据坐标位置提供火力支援并占领该区域，协助众人继续前进。
e3m4_desc_001.en: To reach the Æther Test Site, you must use beacons to mark locations near the denstacks. The UWST will then provide fire support based on the coordinates and secure the area to help you move forward.

e3m4_desc_002.cn: 沿途的巢雕已经被炸毁，工人们也控制了交战区域。朝着超域试验场前进吧。
e3m4_desc_002.en: The denstacks along the route have been destroyed, and the workers have secured the warzone. Time to push toward the Æther Test Site.

e3m4_desc_003.cn: 眼前就是超域试验场，做好作战准备，该进去做个了断了。
e3m4_desc_003.en: The Æther Test Site is just ahead. Get ready for battle — it's time to end this.

e3m5_desc_001.cn: 眼前就是超域试验场，做好作战准备，该进去做个了断了。
e3m5_desc_001.en: The Æther Test Site is just ahead. Get ready for battle — it's time to end this.

e3m6_desc_012.cn: 危机已经告一段落。和大战之后的众人聊一聊，分享胜利的喜悦。
e3m6_desc_012.en: The crisis is over. Take a moment to talk with everyone after the battle and celebrate your victory together.

e4m1_desc_002.cn: 四号谷地仍有许多侵蚀引发的问题需要解决。前往源石研究园，寻求伊冯的意见。
e4m1_desc_002.en: Valley IV remains plagued by Blight issues. Go to the Originium Science Park and seek advice from Yvonne.

e4m1_desc_003.cn: 超域能量的定位最终落在了源石发电站。前往源石发电站，确认信号的来源。
e4m1_desc_003.en: The Æther energy signal has finally settled at the Originium Power Plant. Head there to confirm its source.

e4m1d5_desc_002.cn: 联盟工团、环塔商会和宏山科学院联合来讯，希望与终末地工业进行秘密会晤。前往帝江号，与三方代表进行远程会议。
e4m1d5_desc_002.en: The United Workers' Syndicates of Talos II (UWST), Talos-II General Chamber of Commerce (TGCC), and Hongshan Academy of Sciences (HAS) have jointly requested a secret meeting with the Endfield Industries. Go to Dijiang to join a remote conference with representatives from the three parties.

e4m1d5_desc_003.cn: 佩丽卡似乎需要一些时间处理工作，在舰桥附近找地方休息一会儿吧。
e4m1d5_desc_003.en: Perlica seems to be tied up with work. Find a spot near the Bridge to take a short break.

e5m0d5_desc_001.cn: 处理宏科院的高密级授权协议还需要一段时间。为了妥善应对在武陵可能遭遇的麻烦，需进行必要的准备工作。
e5m0d5_desc_001.en: It will take a while to reach the high Authority Level required to handle the matter from the Hongshan Academy of Sciences (HAS). To better tackle the potential issue in Wuling, you must carry out the necessary preparations.

e5m1_desc_001.cn: 菲奥娜告知前往武陵城的准备已经妥当，需要管理员返回帝江号进行下一步的商讨。
e5m1_desc_001.en: Fiona informs that preparations for heading to Wuling City are complete. She needs you to return to Dijiang for further discussions.

e5m1_desc_002.cn: 众人着陆的位置偏离了原定目标，所幸还在武陵界内。想办法找到前往武陵城的方法。
e5m1_desc_002.en: The landing site deviated from the planned target, but fortunately, it's still within Wuling's borders. Find a way to reach Wuling City.

e5m1_desc_003.cn: 和阿达希尔一同乘上动力竹筏。
e5m1_desc_003.en: Board the powered bamboo raft with Ardashir.

e5m1_desc_004.cn: 众人与阿达希尔同行，不料却被竹林分隔。眼下只能各自寻找通路了。
e5m1_desc_004.en: You travel alongside Ardashir, only to be separated by the bamboo. For now, you must search for your own way through.

e5m1_desc_005.cn: 管理员一行终于穿过了竹林迷阵，再次与阿达希尔会合。
e5m1_desc_005.en: The Endmin's team exits the grove labyrinth and meets up with Ardashir again.

e5m2_desc_001.cn: 坠入溶洞后众人失散。面对名叫汤汤的少女，管理员和陈千语决定商量一下该怎么办。
e5m2_desc_001.en: After falling into the limestone cave, the group is separated. Faced with a young girl named Tangtang, you decide to discuss what to do next with Chen Qianyu.

e5m2_desc_002.cn: 在汤汤的帮助下，管理员和陈千语成功找到了佩丽卡。为了前往武陵城，三人决定跟随她前往清波寨。
e5m2_desc_002.en: With Tangtang's help, you and Chen Qianyu successfully find Perlica. To reach Wuling City, you decide to follow Tangtang to Qingbo Stockade.

e5m2_desc_003.cn: 到达清波寨，寨子正被天使侵袭，当务之急是解救遇险的寨民。
e5m2_desc_003.en: You arrive at Qingbo Stockade, only to find it under attack by the Aggeloi. The immediate priority is to rescue the endangered Stockaders.

e5m2_desc_004.cn: 众人救下了被困的清波寨寨民，汤汤依约告知了前往武陵城的方法。
e5m2_desc_004.en: You successfully rescue the trapped Stockaders of Qingbo Stockade. Tangtang, keeping her promise, reveals the way to reach Wuling City.

e5m3_desc_001.cn: 通路已开，汤汤决定与管理员一同前往武陵城。
e5m3_desc_001.en: With the path now opened, Tangtang decides to go to Wuling City with you.

e5m3_desc_002.cn: 汤汤炸穿的储备站墙壁背后，武陵巡卫队已恭候多时。面对队长弭弗，陈千语有些紧张。
e5m3_desc_002.en: Behind the wall of the Field Logistics Depot blasted open by Tangtang, the Watch from Wuling has been waiting for some time. Facing Captain Mi Fu, Chen Qianyu can't help but feel a bit nervous.

e5m3_desc_003.cn: 要前往武陵城，管理员一行需要先修好停摆的水车。
e5m3_desc_003.en: You must repair the stalled waterwheels to go to Wuling City.

e5m3_desc_004.cn: 管理员取得了射流无人机。为射流无人机装填水，就能利用它打开前路。
e5m3_desc_004.en: You successfully acquire the jet drone. Fill it up with water to open up the path ahead.

e6m1_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行人准备进入武陵城，面见管代庄方宜，并与之达成合作。
e6m1_desc_001.en: Your group prepares to enter Wuling City to meet with Viceroy Zhuang Fangyi, and establish cooperation.

e6m2_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行暂别庄方宜，前往划拨的工业用地部署协议核心。
e6m2_desc_001.en: You bid farewell to Zhuang Fangyi for now, and head to the allocated AIC site to deploy the Protocol Automation-Core.

e6m3_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行受庄方宜邀请，前往武陵天师府学院内的息壤中心实验室，推进技术合作。
e6m3_desc_001.en: Zhuang Fangyi invites your group to the Xiranite Central Laboratory within the Tianshi Bureau Academy of Wuling to advance technical collaboration.

e6m3_desc_002.cn: 管理员受庄方宜邀请，在新设备的蓝图尚未返回前，一同四处走走。
e6m3_desc_002.en: The Endministrator receives Zhuang Fangyi's invitation for a city tour while waiting for the new facility blueprints to be delivered.

e6m4_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行人正式开始为息壤的生产做准备。
e6m4_desc_001.en: Your group officially starts preparing for Xiranite production.

e6m4_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行先与弭弗会合，然后共同前往观测站解决麻烦。
e6m4_desc_002.en: The Endministrator must rendezvous with Mi Fu, then head to the monitoring center to handle the problem.

e6m4_desc_003.cn: 观测站的麻烦被解决后，管理员一行准备前往总桩办公室与庄方宜见面。
e6m4_desc_003.en: After resolving the issue at the monitoring center, the Endministrator proceeds to head to the Main Pillar Office to meet with Zhuang Fangyi.

e6m5_desc_001.cn: 汤汤邀请管理员一行人前往清波寨，帮忙建设集成工业系统。
e6m5_desc_001.en: Tangtang invites you to help with AIC Construction at Qingbo Stockade.

e6m5d5_desc_001.cn: 事情暂告一段落了，在后续行动开始之前，继续探索塔卫二吧。
e6m5d5_desc_001.en: All major operations have been concluded for now. Keep exploring the world of Talos-II before the next operation begins.

errMsg.2000.cn: 奖励发送失败，请稍后重试
errMsg.2000.en: Failed to send rewards. Please wait and try again.

errMsg.sendRewardFailed.cn: 奖励发送失败，请稍后重试
errMsg.sendRewardFailed.en: Failed to send rewards. Please wait and try again.

f1m10_desc_001.cn: 诺夫曼发来消息，他的朋友维拉遇到了点麻烦。维拉在基建前站附近的生态种植区工作，去那里查看一下情况。
f1m10_desc_001.en: Noffman has sent you a message. His friend Vera has an issue on her hands. She works at the Eco-Farm near the Infra-Station. Go there and check the situation.

f1m10d1_desc_001.cn: 菲奥娜发来消息，称实验作物试点区的农业天师似乎遇到了难题，希望管理员前往那里给予他们一些帮助。
f1m10d1_desc_001.en: Fiona sent a message stating that the Nongye Tianshi in the Agricultural Test Site seem to have encountered a problem, and they hope you can go to provide some assistance.

f1m10d1_desc_002.cn: 找到植物学家维尔莫林，向他购买金石稻种子。
f1m10d1_desc_002.en: Locate Wellmorin the botanist, and purchase Amber Rice seeds from him.

f1m10d1_desc_003.cn: 使用简易制作，制作用于种植的田块。
f1m10d1_desc_003.en: Use Crafting to craft plots for planting.

f1m10d1_desc_004.cn: 完成种植后，将情况告知田悯。
f1m10d1_desc_004.en: Inform Tian Min of the situation once you are done.

f1m18d1_desc_001.cn: 庄方宜发来消息称，武陵城的天师在天王坪的复合式农场遇到了麻烦。前往天王坪援建点，确认现场的状况。
