f1m18d1_desc_001.en: Zhuang Fangyi sends you a message. Wuling Tianshi have encountered issues at the farm complex at Sky King Flats. Go to the Sky King Flats Construction Site and assess the situation.

f1m18d1_desc_002.cn: 浪头不愿意武陵城参与复合式农场的建设，要求管理员和天师洪波挑战他设置的“三大难”。通过三项挑战，获得浪头的承认。
f1m18d1_desc_002.en: Lang Tou opposes Wuling's involvement in the farm complex's construction. He demands you and Hong Bo face his Three Super Dares. Pass all three to earn his recognition.

f1m18d1_desc_003.cn: 青芜似乎发现了说服浪头的机会。跟随青芜找到浪头，确认发生了什么事。
f1m18d1_desc_003.en: Qingwu seems to have found a chance to persuade Lang Tou. Follow Qingwu to locate Lang Tou and confirm what's happening.

f1m18d1_desc_004.cn: 浪头不慎把小宝的风筝掉进了侵蚀污染区。设法取回风筝，替浪头解围。
f1m18d1_desc_004.en: Lang Tou accidentally caused a child's kite to fall into a Blighted zone. Find a way to help get the kite back.

f1m18d1_desc_005.cn: 为天王坪援建点供应所需物资，提升它的发展值。
f1m18d1_desc_005.en: Give supplies to the Sky King Flats Construction Site to help it develop.

f1m18d1_desc_006.cn: 查看庄方宜发来的消息，确认发生了什么事。
f1m18d1_desc_006.en: Read the messages from Zhuang Fangyi to verify the situation.

f1m18d1_name.cn: 据点建设·天王坪援建点·一
f1m18d1_name.en: OD Project: Sky King Flats I

f1m20_desc_001.cn: 跟随陈千语前往选剑局，与武陵选剑局负责人交谈，了解装备精锻的方法。
f1m20_desc_001.en: Follow Chen Qianyu to Hongshan Swordmancers, talk to the person in charge, and learn about gear artificing.

f1m21d1_desc_001.cn: 联络员菲奥娜告知了管理员装备模板箱项目的详情。根据终端上的位置信息，前往回收装备模板箱。
f1m21d1_desc_001.en: Fiona the Comms Officer informs you about the details of the Gear Template Crate project. Based on the location data on your terminal, head out to recover the crates.

f1m22_desc_001.cn: 查看赛希发来的消息，确认发生了什么事。
f1m22_desc_001.en: Read the messages from Xaihi to verify the situation.

f1m22_desc_002.cn: 帝江号已经完成了建造更多舱室的准备。前往帝江号，与赛希会合。
f1m22_desc_002.en: Dijiang is ready to construct more cabins. Return to Dijiang and meet with Xaihi.

f1m22_desc_003.cn: 帝江号已经做好了升级总控中枢的准备。与总控中枢交互，进行升级。
f1m22_desc_003.en: Dijiang is ready for a Control Nexus upgrade. Interact with the Control Nexus to perform the upgrade.

f1m22_desc_004.cn: 总控中枢已经升级完成。与赛希交谈，完成后续的扩建工作。
f1m22_desc_004.en: The Control Nexus upgrade has been completed. Talk to Xaihi and complete the subsequent expansion tasks.

f1m22_desc_005.cn: 舱室建造成功。与赛希交谈，了解本次升级的更多信息。
f1m22_desc_005.en: The cabin has been constructed. Talk to Xaihi and learn more about this upgrade.

f1m24_desc_001.cn: 一位干员在被裂地者围攻，去解救她。
f1m24_desc_001.en: An operator is surrounded by Landbreakers. Go and rescue her.

f1m24d1_desc_001.cn: 仓储节点已重新解锁。提升操作等级，获取更多功能权限。
f1m24d1_desc_001.en: The Depot Node has been unlocked. Increase the operations level for access to more features.

f1m25_desc_001.cn:
去指定仓储节点取货后，再将货物运送至指定目标处，即可获得尾款调度券。
以较高的货物完整度送达时会获得额外尾款，完整度每降低一定程度则会损失一定尾款。
f1m25_desc_001.en:
Collect goods from a depot node, then deliver them to the marked destination to earn a final delivery fee of stock bills. 
NOTE: Successful delivery at high Goods Integrity gives you a final fee. If Goods Integrity falls too low, your final fee will incur a penalty instead.

f1m25_desc_002.cn: 将货物运送至指定目标处
f1m25_desc_002.en: Deliver the goods to the marked destination

f1m26_desc_001.cn: 菲奥娜发来消息，向管理员介绍了“集成管家”，并告知管理员可以通过它完成集成核心区域的升级。
f1m26_desc_001.en: Fiona sent a message introducing the "AIC Steward", noting that it can be used to upgrade the Core AIC Area.

f1m26_desc_002.cn: 集成管家可以被用来扩张和升级集成核心区域。前往枢纽区的集成核心区域，查看集成管家。
f1m26_desc_002.en: The AIC Steward can be used to expand and upgrade the Core AIC Area. Head to the Core AIC Area of the Hub to check it out.

f1m26_desc_003.cn: 解锁基础工业计划中的仓库存取线。
f1m26_desc_003.en: Unlock the Depot Bus Plan in the BASIC AIC PLAN.

f1m26_desc_004.cn: 使用集成管家升级需要对应地区的调度券。获取足够的<image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>谷地调度券，为升级做准备。
f1m26_desc_004.en: Upgrading with the AIC Steward requires Stock Bills for the corresponding area. Acquire enough <image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>Valley Stock Bills to prepare for the upgrade.

f1m26_desc_005.cn: 使用<image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>谷地调度券，完成枢纽区集成核心区域的仓库存取线升级。
f1m26_desc_005.en: Use <image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>Valley Stock Bills to complete the Depot Bus upgrade in the Hub's Core AIC Area.

f1m3_desc_001.cn: 查看秦茳尺发来的消息，确认发生了什么事。
f1m3_desc_001.en: Read the messages from Qin Jiangchi to verify the situation.

f1m3_desc_002.cn: 终末地的物资调度员与基地恢复了联系。前往工人之家，与她商议接下来的行动计划。
f1m3_desc_002.en: Endfield's Stock Redistributor has reestablished contact with the Hub base. Proceed to the Worker Dorms to discuss the next steps with her.

f1m3_desc_003.cn: 获取足够数量的<image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>调度券，升级物资调度系统。
f1m3_desc_003.en: Acquire enough <image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>stock bills to upgrade the stock redistribution system.

f1m3_name.cn: 重启地区物资调度·其一

f1m3d1_desc_001.cn: 物资调度系统可以使用<image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>调度券进行升级。与“幸运萝卜”交谈，完成升级并了解该系统的更多功能。
f1m3d1_desc_001.en: The stock redistribution system can be upgraded using <image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>stock bills. Speak with Lucky Carrot to complete the upgrade and learn more about the system.

f1m3d1_name.cn: 重启地区物资调度·其二

f1m4d1_desc_001.cn: 为难民暂居处供应所需物资，提升它的发展值。
f1m4d1_desc_001.en: Give supplies to the Refugee Camp to help it develop.

f1m4d1_desc_002.cn: 索斯发来了仓促的留言。前往难民暂居处，确认现场是否有状况发生。
f1m4d1_desc_002.en: You receive a rushed message from Soth. Go to the refugee camp to see what's going on.

f1m4d1_desc_003.cn: 难民暂居处突然多了许多伤员。帮助阿吉，给暂居处的伤员们分发物资。
f1m4d1_desc_003.en: Many injured people have suddenly arrived at the Refugee Camp. Help Ginny distribute the supplies.

f1m4d1_desc_004.cn: 卡贾似乎去了裂地者出没的地方。搜索卡贾的踪迹，将他带回难民暂居处。
f1m4d1_desc_004.en: Karja seems to have run off to areas where Landbreaker bands have been seen. Track down Karja and bring him back to the Refugee Camp.

f1m4d1_desc_005.cn: 索斯希望管理员前往工人之家寻求更多帮助。和罗曼交谈，为支援难民暂居处进行准备。
f1m4d1_desc_005.en: Soth asks the Endmin to seek help from the Worker Dorms. Talk to Roman and prepare for support.

f1m4d1_desc_006.cn: 罗曼准备亲自去难民暂居处提供帮助。协助罗曼备齐他需要的样本，并取回放在培育室的应急经验笔记。
f1m4d1_desc_006.en: Roman is heading to the refugee camp to offer support. Help Roman in gathering all the required samples and retrieve the emergency field notes from the cultivation chamber.

f1m4d1_name.cn: 据点建设·难民暂居处·其一

f1m4d2_desc_001.cn: 为难民暂居处供应所需物资，提升它的发展值。
f1m4d2_desc_001.en: Give supplies to the Refugee Camp to help it develop.

f1m4d2_desc_002.cn: 难民暂居处的建设工作已经进行了一段时间。与索斯交谈，确认据点的发展近况。
f1m4d2_desc_002.en: The Outpost Development Project of the camp has progressed for a while. You decide to verify current growth with Soth.

f1m4d2_desc_003.cn: 陈千语有些担心阿杜的状态。找到阿杜，确认他在做什么。
f1m4d2_desc_003.en: Chen is concerned about Dewey. Find him and ask what's going on.

f1m4d2_desc_004.cn: 阿杜坚持要外出营救幸存者。前往目标地点，帮助阿杜开展行动。
f1m4d2_desc_004.en: Dewey insists on rescuing the survivors. Go to the marked location and help him.

f1m4d2_desc_009.cn: 管理员等人在裂地者聚集处救出了一名幸存者。返回难民暂居处，安置这位工人。
f1m4d2_desc_009.en: After extracting a survivor from Landbreaker territory, your team returns to the temporary refugee shelter to secure the rescued worker.

f1m4d2_desc_010.cn: 安德烈希望管理员带一些紫晶零件到集成核心区域。筹备所需的紫晶零件，交给安德烈。
f1m4d2_desc_010.en: Andre needs the Endmin to bring some Amethyst Parts to the Core AIC Area.

f1m4d2_desc_011.cn: 了解难民暂居处遭遇的安保问题，完成相关防御体系建设。
f1m4d2_desc_011.en: Learn about security issues faced by the refugee camp, then finish constructing some defenseworks.

f1m4d2_name.cn: 据点建设·难民暂居处·其二

f1m4d3_desc_001.cn: 为难民暂居处供应所需物资，提升它的发展值。
f1m4d3_desc_001.en: Give supplies to the Refugee Camp to help it develop.

f1m4d3_desc_002.cn: 卡贾希望能与管理员进行一次单独交谈。前往难民暂居处，与卡贾见面。
f1m4d3_desc_002.en: Karja asks if you can arrange a private meeting with him. Go to the Refugee Camp and meet with Karja.

f1m4d3_desc_018.cn: 卡贾想要为支援难民暂居处的各位准备一份惊喜。打探罗曼和安德烈的喜好，帮助卡贾准备礼物。
f1m4d3_desc_018.en: Karja wants to prepare surprise gifts for everyone who supported the Refugee Camp. Investigate what Roman and Andre like so that Karja can prepare proper presents.

f1m4d3_desc_020.cn: 管理员准备好了适合送给罗曼与安德烈的礼物，庆祝活动即将开始。前往难民暂居处，加入大家的行列。
f1m4d3_desc_020.en: You have prepared the gifts that Roman and Andre might like. The Refugee Camp is about to start their celebrations. Go to the Camp and join the fun.

f1m4d3_name.cn: 据点建设·难民暂居处·其三

f1m5_desc_001.cn: 丹尼尔似乎心事重重。管理员一行决定和他聊聊，确认是否仍有问题困扰着他。
f1m5_desc_001.en: Daniel seems to be troubled by something. You decide to talk to him to understand what bothers him.

f1m5_desc_003.cn: 管理员一行人顺利击败了入侵者。与丹尼尔交谈，商议今后的相关对策吧。
f1m5_desc_003.en: Your team defeats the Landbreakers. Talk to Daniel and figure out a more permanent raider-proof solution.

f1m5_desc_004.cn: 难民暂居处需要更完善的预警与防御体系，帮助难民抵御潜在的各路袭击。设置预警终端，完成一次“干员介入”区域防护。
f1m5_desc_004.en: The Refugee Camp needs better warning and defense systems to help the residents protect themselves against various threats. Set up the Early Warning Terminal and complete one [Operator Intervention] in Area Defense.

f1m5_desc_006.cn: 建设完成的区域防护系统需要在无人状态下处理防卫任务。再次启动预警终端，完成一次“自动防御”区域防护。
f1m5_desc_006.en: With the Area Defense system now operational, it's time to test Auto-Defense. Reactivate the Early Warning Terminal and initiate a full "Auto-Defense" drill.

f1m6_desc_001.cn: 赛希汇报称，帝江号已经做好了升级准备。返回帝江号，与赛希会合。
f1m6_desc_001.en: Xaihi reports that Dijiang is ready for an upgrade. Return to Dijiang and meet with her.

f1m6_desc_002.cn: 查看赛希发来的消息，确认发生了什么事。
f1m6_desc_002.en: Read the messages from Xaihi to verify the situation.

f1m6_desc_003.cn: 帝江号已经做好了升级总控中枢的准备。与总控中枢交互，进行升级。
f1m6_desc_003.en: Dijiang is ready for a Control Nexus upgrade. Interact with the Control Nexus to perform the upgrade.

f1m6_desc_004.cn: 总控中枢已经升级完成。与赛希交谈，询问培养舱的相关事宜。
f1m6_desc_004.en: The Control Nexus upgrade has been completed. Talk to Xaihi and ask her about the Growth Chamber.

f1m6_desc_005.cn: 前往基建区，将空闲的待建舱室（中型）建设为培养舱。
f1m6_desc_005.en: Go to the Working Sector and construct a Growth Chamber in an Empty Cabin [M].

f1m6_desc_006.cn: 使用操作台，尝试培养轻红柱状菌、晶化多齿叶或轻黯石中的任意一种。
f1m6_desc_006.en: Use the control panel and try cultivating any one of these: Pink Bolete, Kalkodendra, or Kalkonyx.

f1m6_desc_007.cn: 培养舱已经成功运行。与赛希交谈，向她告知建设的结果。
f1m6_desc_007.en: The Growth Chamber is working successfully. Talk to Xaihi and inform her of the results.

f1m7d1_desc_001.cn: 克劳发来通信，要商讨重建四号谷地，恢复地区生态的事。
f1m7d1_desc_001.en: You receive a message from Crowe. He wants to discuss the reconstruction of Valley IV.

f1m7d1_desc_002.cn: 前往供能高地与克劳进行会面。
f1m7d1_desc_002.en: Go to the Power Plateau and meet with Crowe

f1m7d1_desc_003.cn: 艾尔黛拉带着管理员一行人前去和克劳会合，商讨重建相关事宜。
f1m7d1_desc_003.en: Ardelia and the Endministrators meet up with Crowe to talk about the reconstruction.

f1m7d1_desc_005.cn: 协助克劳，开展重建指挥部的生态研究工作。
f1m7d1_desc_005.en: Assist Crowe in initiating ecological research operations for the reconstruction.

f1m7d1_desc_006.cn: 前往克劳提供的第一处地点，采集所需的土壤样本。
f1m7d1_desc_006.en: Go to the first site marked by Crowe and gather the required soil samples

f1m7d1_desc_007.cn: 前往克劳提供的第二处地点，采集所需的土壤样本。
f1m7d1_desc_007.en: Go to the second site marked by Crowe and gather the required soil samples

f1m7d1_desc_008.cn: 把收集到的土壤样本带回重建指挥部。
f1m7d1_desc_008.en: Bring the gathered soil samples back to the Reconstruction HQ.

f1m7d2_desc_001.cn: 管理员收到了艾尔黛拉的联络，建造工作似乎遇到了困难。
f1m7d2_desc_001.en: You receive a message from Ardella. She seems to be struggling with the reconstruction.

f1m7d2_desc_002.cn: 建造工作似乎遇到了一些问题，找到艾尔黛拉向她了解情况。
f1m7d2_desc_002.en: Construction efforts appear to be facing unexpected complications. Talk to Ardelia.

f1m7d2_desc_003.cn: 问问艾尔黛拉，邓恩和克莱维尔之间发生了什么。
f1m7d2_desc_003.en: Ask Ardelia what happened between Dean and Clavell

f1m7d2_desc_004.cn: 找到情绪激动的邓恩，并与其交谈。
f1m7d2_desc_004.en: Find the agitated Dean and talk to him

f1m7d2_desc_005.cn: 为了让邓恩静下心来与管理员等人交谈，众人决定帮他寻找长耳兽。
f1m7d2_desc_005.en: To calm Dean for proper communication, everyone agrees to assist in tracking down the long-ear.

f1m7d2_desc_006.cn: 找到情绪低落的克莱维尔，并与其交谈。
f1m7d2_desc_006.en: Find the upset Clavell and talk to him

f1m7d2_desc_007.cn: 为了让克莱维尔恢复精神，众人决定帮他找到档案箱。
f1m7d2_desc_007.en: To help Clavell regain his focus, the team resolves to find his missing box of documents.

f1m7d2_desc_008.cn: 邓恩和克莱维尔打算好好谈谈。回到重建指挥部，看看现在的情况如何。
f1m7d2_desc_008.en: With Dean and Clavell finally sitting down for proper dialogue, you return to the Reconstruction HQ to assess progress.

f1m7d2_name.cn: 据点建设·重建指挥部·其一

f1m7d3_desc_001.cn: 克劳希望管理员来重建指挥部看看，他似乎有事相求。
f1m7d3_desc_001.en: Crowe has a request from the Reconstruction HQ.

f1m7d3_desc_002.cn: 前往重建指挥部，看看克劳遇到了什么问题。
f1m7d3_desc_002.en: Go to the Reconstruction Headquarters and see what's troubling Crowe

f1m7d3_desc_003.cn: 寻找克莱维尔和邓恩留下的线索。
f1m7d3_desc_003.en: Find clues left by Clavell and Dean

f1m7d3_desc_004.cn: 根据地图上的位置信息找到邓恩。
f1m7d3_desc_004.en: Find Dean based on the coordinates on the map

f1m7d3_desc_005.cn: 击败天使，拯救克莱维尔！
f1m7d3_desc_005.en: Defeat the Aggeloi and Save Clavell!

f1m7d3_desc_006.cn: 解救克莱维尔，看看他的情况如何。
f1m7d3_desc_006.en: Save Clavell and check on his condition.

f1m7d3_desc_007.cn: 返回重建指挥部，看看邓恩和克莱维尔的工作有没有新进展。
f1m7d3_desc_007.en: Return to the Reconstruction Headquarters and check if Dean and Clavell have made any progress.

f1m7d3_name.cn: 据点建设·重建指挥部·其二

f1m7d4_desc_001.cn: 大型地质探针的建设进入尾声，去看看重建指挥部的工作是否还顺利。
f1m7d4_desc_001.en: Construction of the large geological probe nears completion. Check if things are still running smoothly at the Reconstruction HQ.

f1m7d4_desc_002.cn: 重建指挥部陷入混乱，去问问克劳现在的情况。
f1m7d4_desc_002.en: The Reconstruction HQ is in chaos. Go ask Crowe about the situation.

f1m7d4_desc_003.cn: 邓恩和克莱维尔在地质探针的攻坚阶段遇到了麻烦，问问他们发生了什么，帮他们解决问题。
f1m7d4_desc_003.en: Dean and Clavell hit a major snag while deploying the geological probe. Find out what the issue is.

f1m7d4_desc_005.cn: 击败被机器震动吸引过来的潜地虬兽。
f1m7d4_desc_005.en: Defeat the Tunneling Nidwyrms drawn by the machine's vibrations.

f1m7d4_desc_006.cn: 克莱维尔和邓恩似乎还遇到了其他问题。向二人了解情况，并尝试帮助他们。
f1m7d4_desc_006.en: Clavell and Dean appear to be facing additional complications. Find out how you can help them.

f1m7d4_desc_007.cn: 样本仓无法正常使用，而里面放置的错误生物样本也需要替换，邓恩和克莱维尔向管理员请求帮助。
f1m7d4_desc_007.en: The specimen containment unit has experienced a critical failure. The wrong biological specimen placed within it must be replaced as well. Once again Dean and Clavell asks the Endmin for help.

f1m7d4_desc_008.cn: 击败被震动吸引过来的潜地虬兽。
f1m7d4_desc_008.en: Defeat the Tunneling Nidwyrms drawn by the vibrations.

f1m7d4_desc_009.cn: 平息种种意外后，大型地质探针的启动计划终于可以推进了。
f1m7d4_desc_009.en: After calming the chaos, the launch of the large geological probe can finally proceed.

f1m7d4_name.cn: 据点建设·重建指挥部·其三

f1m9d1_desc_001.cn: 管理员接到柯林斯兄妹的通信，得知作为临时避难点的基建前站正需要帮助，决定前往帮忙。
f1m9d1_desc_001.en: Incoming communication from the Collinses confirms their Infra-Station, currently serving as an emergency shelter, requires immediate assistance.

f1m9d2_desc_001.cn: 管理员从大潘那里得知，基建前站负责人诺夫曼带队进行搜救，却久久未归。管理员决定出发寻找诺夫曼。
f1m9d2_desc_001.en: The Endministrator learned from Da Pan that Noffman, chief of the Infra-Station, had led a search party out. Yet none had returned, long past their due. The Endministrator resolved to set out and find him.

f1m9d2_name.cn: 据点建设·基建前站·其一

f1m9d3_desc_001.cn: 避难点遭到了裂地者袭击，现场一片混乱。为了稳定士气，管理员决定前往基建前站。
f1m9d3_desc_001.en: The refuge point came under attack by the Landbreakers, leaving chaos in their wake. To steady the faltering morale, the Endministrator resolved to make for the Infra-Station.

f1m9d3_name.cn: 据点建设·基建前站·其二

f1m9d4_desc_001.cn: 菲奥娜发来通信，向管理员转达了四号谷地应急委员会对终末地的感谢，以及对失踪人员的关注。管理员决定再次前往现场，了解最新进展。
f1m9d4_desc_001.en: Fiona sent word, relaying the Valley IV Emergency Committee's gratitude to Endfield, and their concern for the missing. The Endministrator decides to find out what's going on.

f1m9d4_name.cn: 据点建设·基建前站·其三

giude_text_pushedbox1_2.cn:
靠近并按下<@gd.key>交互键</>后，箱体会微微悬浮并跟随干员移动，但是无法避开障碍物。
再次按下<@gd.key>交互键</>可以放下悬浮箱子。
giude_text_pushedbox1_2.en: Approach the crate and press the <@gd.key>interact button</> to make it float and move along with the operator. Note that floating crates cannot go around obstacles. Press the <@gd.key>interact button</> again to drop the floating crate.

giude_text_pushedbox2_2.cn: 悬浮箱子可以用来作为垫脚抵达高处或作为重物启动<@gd.key>感应开关</>。
giude_text_pushedbox2_2.en: Floating crates can be used to reach higher places or as a heavy object for activating <@gd.key>pressure switches</>.

gm01m10_desc_001.en: Go to the location marked by Rosa.

gm01m10_desc_002.cn: 与罗马诺交谈，听听他的说法。
gm01m10_desc_002.en: Talk to Romano and listen to what he has to say.

gm01m10_desc_003.cn: 将从罗马诺处得到的手表交给罗莎。

gm01m10_desc_004.cn: 管理员遇到了一个焦急的人，上前询问对方需要什么帮助。
gm01m10_desc_004.en: You encounter a worried-looking person and ask if she needs any help.

gm01m11_desc_001.cn: 与工团成员聊聊，询问他遇到的情况。
gm01m11_desc_001.en: Talk to the UWST crew mate and ask him about his situation.

gm01m11_desc_002.cn: 抓住逃到附近的那只源石虫，并把它交给奥列格。
gm01m11_desc_002.en: Catch the Originium Slug nearby and give it to Oleg.

gm01m11_desc_003.cn: 将抓到的源石虫交给奥列格。
gm01m11_desc_003.en: Give Oleg the slugs you caught.

gm01m12_desc_002.cn: 枢纽区的事件现场调查告一段落。与瑟斯顿交谈，讨论目前已知的情报。
gm01m12_desc_002.en: The investigation at the Hub area scene has concluded for now. Speak with Thurston to discuss the intel gathered.

gm01m12_desc_003.cn: 一位终末地干员似乎正在调查什么。与他交谈，确认现场的情况。
gm01m12_desc_003.en: An Endfield operator appears to be investigating something. Speak with them to assess the situation.

gm01m12_desc_004.cn: 瑟斯顿在枢纽区发现了新的事件现场。与他交谈，确认现场的情况。
gm01m12_desc_004.en: Thurston has discovered a new incident scene in the Hub area. Speak with him to assess the situation.

gm01m13_desc_001.cn: 一位终末地干员似乎正在调查什么。与他交谈，确认现场的情况。
gm01m13_desc_001.en: An Endfield operator appears to be investigating something. Speak with them to assess the situation.

gm01m13_desc_003.cn: 阿伯莉采石场的事件现场调查告一段落。与瑟斯顿交谈，讨论目前已知的情报。
gm01m13_desc_003.en: The investigation at the Aburrey Quarry scene has concluded for now. Speak with Thurston to discuss the intel gathered.

gm01m13_desc_004.cn: 瑟斯顿在阿伯莉采石场发现了新的事件现场。与他交谈，确认现场的情况。
gm01m13_desc_004.en: Thurston has discovered a new incident scene at the Aburrey Quarry. Speak with him to assess the situation.

gm01m13_name.cn: 风雨欲来·阿伯莉采石场

gm01m14_desc_001.cn: 瑟斯顿在矿脉源区发现了新的事件现场。与他交谈，确认现场的情况。
gm01m14_desc_001.en: Thurston has discovered a new incident scene in the Origin Lodespring area. Speak with him to assess the situation.

gm01m14_desc_002.cn: 侵蚀挡住了事件现场的通路。消除侵蚀障碍，进入现场。
gm01m14_desc_002.en: The Blight is blocking access to the incident site. Clear the obstacles to enter the area.

gm01m14_desc_003.cn: 矿脉源区的事件现场调查告一段落。与瑟斯顿交谈，讨论目前已知的情报。
gm01m14_desc_003.en: The investigation at the Origin Lodespring scene has concluded for now. Speak with Thurston to discuss the intel gathered.

gm01m15_desc_002.cn: 设法消除侵蚀，进入供能高地的事件现场，调查周围可用的线索。
gm01m15_desc_002.en: Clear the Blight and access the attack scene at the Power Plateau to investigate available clues nearby.

gm01m15_desc_003.cn: 一位终末地干员似乎正在调查什么。与他交谈，确认现场的情况。
gm01m15_desc_003.en: An Endfield operator appears to be investigating something. Speak with them to assess the situation.

gm01m15_desc_004.cn: 瑟斯顿在供能高地发现了新的事件现场。与他交谈，确认现场的情况。
gm01m15_desc_004.en: Thurston has discovered a new incident scene in the Power Plateau area. Speak with him to assess the situation.

gm01m15_desc_005.cn: 供能高地的事件现场调查告一段落。与瑟斯顿交谈，讨论目前已知的情报。
gm01m15_desc_005.en: The investigation at the Power Plateau scene has concluded for now. Speak with Thurston to discuss the intel gathered.

gm01m16_desc_001.cn: 两个工团研究员正在因为一瓶药剂的丢失而感到困扰。了解情况后，管理员打算帮助他们。
gm01m16_desc_001.en: Two frustrated UWST scientists are trying to look for a missing medicinal sample. You decide to help them out.

gm01m17_desc_001.cn: 尝试打开这座紧闭的大门。
gm01m17_desc_001.en: The gate is shut. Try to open it.

gm01m17_desc_002.cn: 尝试修理仓库里的故障机器人。
gm01m17_desc_002.en: Try fixing the damaged robots in the warehouse.

gm01m17_desc_003.cn: 似乎有人遇到了麻烦，管理员打算调查周围，看看声音是从哪里传来的。
gm01m17_desc_003.en: Someone seems to be in trouble. Look around and investigate the source of the voice.

gm01m17_desc_004.cn: 修理二层所有故障的Delta型多功能机器人。
gm01m17_desc_004.en: Fix every damaged Delta general purpose robot on the second floor.

gm01m17_desc_005.cn: 把修理完毕的消息告知布龙泽。
gm01m17_desc_005.en: Tell Bronzer that you finished fixing the robots.

gm01m1_desc_001.cn: 帮助瓦利亚重启源石副产物中心大楼一层的总控开关。
gm01m1_desc_001.en: Help Vallia re-activate the main switch at the first floor of the Originium BPPC building.

gm01m1_desc_002.cn: 生产系统的主电源无法打开，查看源石副产物中心大楼二层是否发生了故障。
gm01m1_desc_002.en: The power mains of the production system cannot be switched on. Check the second floor of the Originium BPPC building to see if anything else broke down.

gm01m1_desc_003.cn: 生产系统主电源已经被打开了，去问问瓦利亚情况如何。
gm01m1_desc_003.en: You switched on the production system power mains. Talk to Vallia about the situation.

gm01m1_desc_004.cn: 与焦急的工团成员对话，了解情况。
gm01m1_desc_004.en: Talk to the worried UWST crew mate to learn about the situation.

gm01m1_desc_005.cn: 源石副产物中心大楼的门因为断电而无法开启，想办法给它通电。
gm01m1_desc_005.en: The gate of the Originium Byproduct Processing Center main building cannot be opened. Figure out a way to connect it to the power grid.

gm01m1_desc_006.cn: 进入源石副产物中心大楼，查看目前的情况。
gm01m1_desc_006.en: Enter the main building of the Originium Byproduct Processing Center and check the situation.

gm01m1_desc_007.cn: 总控开关已经成功开启，去找瓦利亚了解情况。
gm01m1_desc_007.en: The main switch has been activated. Talk to Vallia to see what is next.

gm01m1_desc_008.cn: 管理员收到了源石副产物中心的求助信号，决定前往调查。
gm01m1_desc_008.en: You receive an SOS call from the Originium Byproduct Processing Center and decide to investigate.

gm01m1_desc_009.cn: 尝试操作装置，开启生产系统主电源。
gm01m1_desc_009.en: Try using the device to switch on the production system power mains.

gm01m20_desc_001.cn: 库珀称还有很多Delta型多功能机器人未被回收，他希望管理员帮忙修理这些散落在外的故障机器人。
gm01m20_desc_001.en: Copper says that plenty of Delta general purpose robots have not been salvaged. He wonders if the Endministrator can help repair these lost and broken robots.

gm01m20_desc_002.cn: 管理员已经修理好了一些Delta型多功能机器人，可以去库珀那里领取报酬了。
gm01m20_desc_002.en: You repaired quite a few Delta general purpose robots. Talk to Copper for your rewards.

gm01m20_desc_003.cn: 继续帮库珀修理更多Delta型多功能机器人。
gm01m20_desc_003.en: Keep helping Copper and repair more Delta general purpose robots.

gm01m20_desc_004.cn: 管理员修好了所有机器人，可以去库珀那里领取报酬了。
gm01m20_desc_004.en: You have repaired all robots. Talk to Copper and claim your compensation.

gm01m22_desc_002.cn: 深入源石实验园区的地下区域，帮助基特回收研究资料。
gm01m22_desc_002.en: Head into the Originium Science Park underground areas and help Kitt retrieve his research data files.

gm01m22_desc_003.cn: 第二份研究资料位于源石培育区，需要管理员尽快回收。
gm01m22_desc_003.en: The second research file is located at the Originium Cultivation Area. Recover it ASAP.

gm01m22_desc_004.cn: 最后一份资料位于这片区域的最深处，需要管理员前往回收。
gm01m22_desc_004.en: The last data file is deep within this area. Reach the place and retrieve the file.

gm01m22_desc_005.cn: 源石实验园区的一位工团成员似乎有事情想要拜托你。
gm01m22_desc_005.en: A UWST crew mate at the Originium Science Park needs your help with something.

gm01m3_desc_001.cn: 秦茳尺告诉管理员，因锚点袭击而被封锁的山顶区域已初步清扫完毕，可以去看看情况。
gm01m3_desc_001.en: Director Qin tells you the disaster-stricken hilltop area has been cleaned up and can now be explored. Go there and take a look.

gm01m3_desc_002.cn: 升降平台的控制台在一栋建筑上，想办法到达那里。
gm01m3_desc_002.en: The platform lift control panel is atop another building. Find a way to reach that place.

gm01m3_desc_004.cn: 升降平台已经被成功修复。回去和莱昂聊一聊。
gm01m3_desc_004.en: The platform lift has been repaired. Head back and talk to Leon.

gm01m4_desc_001.cn: 货运平台的罗克遇到了麻烦，他拜托管理员帮忙找回坠落的无人机。
gm01m4_desc_001.en: Rorke at the Logistics Platform needs you to help recover a crashed drone.

gm01m4_desc_002.cn: 收集散落在货运平台的无人机机身和两块电池。
gm01m4_desc_002.en: Search the Logistics Platform for the crashed drone and its 2 batteries.

gm01m4_desc_003.cn: 把找到的无人机机身和电池交还给罗克。
gm01m4_desc_003.en: Give Rorke the drone and batteries you recovered

gm01m6_desc_001.cn: 与附近的工团成员对话，了解这里发生了什么。
gm01m6_desc_001.en: Ask the UWST crew nearby about the situation.

gm01m6_desc_002.cn: 帮助赫尔曼救回被困在高架桥上的运输人员。
gm01m6_desc_002.en: Help Hermann save the trucker trapped on the elevated bridge.

gm01m6_desc_004.cn: 重启伸缩桥，跨越侵蚀洪流。
gm01m6_desc_004.en: Re-activate the collapsible bridge to reach the other side.

gm01m6_desc_005.cn: 跟随协议同步器的指示，前往指定位置，使用扫描功能寻找备用元件。
gm01m6_desc_005.en: Use the Protosync and head to the marked locations. Then use the scanning feature to find backup parts.

gm01m6_desc_006.cn: 寻找并解决掉袭击工团成员的“那个天使”。
gm01m6_desc_006.en: Find and defeat the Aggelos that attacked the UWST crew mate.

gm01m6_desc_007.cn: 前往高架桥上，完成货物回收。
gm01m6_desc_007.en: Go to the elevated bridge and retrieve the supplies.

gm01m7_desc_001.cn: S.O.W.对碾骨氏族遇袭事件给出了详细的分析和结论。找到瑟斯顿，与他讨论相关信息。
gm01m7_desc_001.en: SOW has delivered a detailed analysis and conclusions regarding the Bonekrusher Clan attacks. Find Thurston and discuss the intel with him.

gm01m7_desc_002.cn: 狼卫找到了疑似“影子”留下的活动踪迹。与狼卫会合，尝试从“影子”口中得到更多情报。
gm01m7_desc_002.en: Wulfgard has found traces of activity suspected to be left by "Shadow". Meet up with Wulfgard and attempt to extract more intel from "Shadow".

gm01m7_desc_003.cn: “影子”布兰娜死于重伤。与狼卫和瑟斯顿交谈，为一系列遇袭事件做出总结。
gm01m7_desc_003.en: "Shadow" Brenna has succumbed to her injuries. Speak with Wulfgard and Thurston to draw conclusions about this series of attacks.

gm01m7_desc_004.cn: 查看联络员菲奥娜发来的消息，确认发生了什么事。
gm01m7_desc_004.en: Read messages from Fiona the Comms Officer to verify the situation.

gm01m7_desc_005.cn: S.O.W.完成了四号谷地一系列碾骨氏族遇袭事件的分析总结。开启情报档案库，查看相关分析报告。
gm01m7_desc_005.en: SOW has completed the analysis summary of the series of attacks on the Bonekrusher Clan in Valley IV. Access the Intel Archive to review the relevant analysis report.

gm01m8_desc_001.cn: 根据菲奥娜的提示，前去求救信号的来源处查看情况。
gm01m8_desc_001.en: Follow Fiona's lead and investigate the source of the SOS signal.

gm01m8_desc_002.cn: 检查散落在附近的零件，看看有没有相关线索。
gm01m8_desc_002.en: Investigate the parts scattered around the place for more clues.

gm01m8_desc_003.cn: 解救出被裂地者围困的人。

gm01m8_desc_004.cn: 与被解救的人对话，了解现场情况。
gm01m8_desc_004.en: Talk to the rescued prisoner and understand what is going on.

gm01m8_desc_005.cn: 帮助库珀修复故障的Delta型多功能机器人“凯文”。
gm01m8_desc_005.en: Help Copper repair Kevin, a malfunctioning Delta general purpose robot.

gm01m9_desc_001.cn: 一个工人在醇化合物工厂的大门附近徘徊，她似乎在想办法进入工厂。
gm01m9_desc_001.en: There is a worker loitering around the gate of the Kohl Plant. She seems rather intent to get inside.

gm02m10_desc_001.cn: 与池边的可疑人士交谈，了解他的意图。
gm02m10_desc_001.en: Talk to the suspicious guy by the pond to find out his intentions.

gm02m10_desc_002.cn: 将水泵接入池中，帮助阿宝抽尽池中的水。
gm02m10_desc_002.en: Connect the Fluid Pump to the pond and help Bao drain it.

gm02m10_desc_003.cn: 耐心等待水泵将池中的水抽尽。
gm02m10_desc_003.en: Wait patiently for the Fluid Pump to drain all the pond water.

gm02m10_desc_004.cn: 查看阿宝发来的最新消息。

gm02m10_desc_005.cn: 阿宝发来消息，告知管理员水池里的水已经被抽尽。前往天井院底部，查看现场。
gm02m10_desc_005.en: Bao just messaged you, saying the pond's completely drained now. Head to the bottom of the Tianjing Courtyard and check things out.

gm02m10_desc_007.cn: 在天井院地下探索，寻找激活天井院底部大门机关的“钥匙”。
gm02m10_desc_007.en: Explore the undergrounds of the Tianjing Courtyard and find the "keys" to activate the mechanisms at the gate.

gm02m10_desc_008.cn: 使用找到的“钥匙”，激活天井院底部大门前的机关。
gm02m10_desc_008.en: Use the "keys" to activate the mechanisms at the gate.

gm02m10_desc_009.cn: 进入大门，寻找阿宝爷爷留下的宝藏。
gm02m10_desc_009.en: Enter the gate and search for the treasure left behind by Bao's grandfather.

gm02m10_desc_010.cn: 寻找离开天井院底部的路。
gm02m10_desc_010.en: Find a path to leave the undergrounds.

gm02m4_desc_001.cn: 在生态实验站附近，一位天师学徒似乎遇到了麻烦，管理员决定上前询问。
gm02m4_desc_001.en: A Tianshi disciple near the Ecological Research Station looks troubled. You decide to ask what's going on.

gm02m4_desc_007.cn: 所有辅桩都已顺利启动，回去告知林轲。
gm02m4_desc_007.en: All auxiliary pillars have been successfully activated. Go back and tell Lin Ke.

gm02m4_desc_008.cn: 根据天师桩上的提示，按顺序启动六个辅桩。
gm02m4_desc_008.en: Activate the six auxiliary pillars in the correct order according to the hint on the Tianshi Pillar.

gm02m5_desc_001.cn: 在武陵城居民区帮助方泽天师检修阵列稳定桩，将异常桩的能量恢复至平衡状态，完成检修。
gm02m5_desc_001.en: Assist Tianshi Fang Ze in stabilizing the anomalous rods within Wuling's Residential Area. Restore energy equilibrium and complete critical maintenance protocols.

gm02m6_desc_001.cn: 向景洪打听有关水渠异动的流言。
gm02m6_desc_001.en: Ask Jing Hong about disturbances in the waterways.

gm02m6_desc_002.cn: 与熟悉水渠的天师学徒厉衡交谈，进一步了解水渠的情况。
gm02m6_desc_002.en: Consult Li Heng, the Tianshi disciple and gather critical intel on the disturbances.

gm02m6_desc_003.cn: 检查方兴衢旁的水渠，找出异动的源头。
gm02m6_desc_003.en: Investigate the canal near Fangxing Avenue for abnormalities.

gm02m6_desc_004.cn: 检查天师府学院旁的水渠，找出异动的源头。
gm02m6_desc_004.en: Investigate the canal near the Tianshi Bureau Academy for abnormalities.

gm02m6_desc_005.cn: 返回方兴衢，把找到的装置带给厉衡。
gm02m6_desc_005.en: Return to Fangxing Avenue and hand the scanner to Li Heng.

gm02m6_desc_006.cn: 把第一个装置安装在选剑局东侧的水渠里。
gm02m6_desc_006.en: Set up the first device in the canal east of HS.Swords.

gm02m6_desc_007.cn: 把第二个装置安装在选剑局东侧的水渠里。
gm02m6_desc_007.en: Set up the second device in the canal east of HS.Swords.

gm02m6_desc_008.cn: 告知厉衡，装置已经安装完毕。
gm02m6_desc_008.en: Notify Li Heng that the devices are set up.

gm02m6_desc_009.cn: 找到水渠的出口，离开此处。
gm02m6_desc_009.en: Find the canal exit and leave this place.

gm02m6_desc_010.cn: 使用水位控制阀，将水位复原。
gm02m6_desc_010.en: Reset the water level using the control valve

gm02m8_desc_001.cn: 为三到钟表面的三个符文组件注入足量的息壤。
gm02m8_desc_001.en: Supply the three runes carved into the bell with enough Xiranite.

gm02m8_desc_002.cn: 回到三到钟下方，与尚进交谈。
gm02m8_desc_002.en: Return to the Bell of Three Presences and talk to Shang Jin

guide.lines.cn: 管理员，假期休息得如何？这段日子，帝江号上又多了些有趣的事，医疗部门的干员也催着我提醒你别忘了预约体检！大家都很想你，我……也在等你，管理员。
guide.lines.en: Endmin, how was your holiday break? Plenty of things happened aboard Dijiang and our Medical Division operators kept asking me to remind you to register for your physical examination! Everyone misses you, and I ... I'm also waiting for you, Endmin.

guide_blackbox_5_powerline_1.cn: 按下<@gd.key>开始电力运输</>按钮即可开始进行电力输送。
guide_blackbox_5_powerline_1.en: Select <@gd.key>Start Transmission</> to start power transmission.

guide_blackbox_5_powerline_2.cn: 之后将电力运输到<@gd.key>供电桩</>处，再<@gd.key>完成电力运输</>即可将其接入电网。
guide_blackbox_5_powerline_2.en: Then drag the power transmission cable to the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> and select <@gd.key>Plug Transmission Cable</> to connect it to the power grid.

guide_blackbox_miner_3_helper_1.cn: 参考<@gd.key>虚影位置</>，在湖边放置<@gd.key>水泵</>吧。
guide_blackbox_miner_3_helper_1.en: Place the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> at the lakeside position indicated by the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_blackbox_miner_3_helper_2.cn: 接下来，用<@gd.key>管道</>将<@gd.key>水泵</>连向<@gd.key>水驱矿机</>。
guide_blackbox_miner_3_helper_2.en: Next, connect the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to the <@gd.key>Hydro Mining Rig</> with <@gd.key>pipes</>.

guide_blackbox_miner_3_helper_3.cn: 放置更多的<@gd.key>水泵</>并使用<@gd.key>管道分流器</>，供水给水驱矿机吧。
guide_blackbox_miner_3_helper_3.en: Place more <@gd.key>Fluid Pumps</> and use <@gd.key>Pipe Splitters</> to supply water to the Hydro Mining Rigs.

guide_blackbox_miner_3_start_1.cn: 水驱矿机是<@gd.key>由水驱动</>的设备。
guide_blackbox_miner_3_start_1.en: The Hydro Mining Rig is a facility <@gd.key>driven by water</>.

guide_blackbox_miner_3_start_2.cn: 所以我们需要建立稳定的供水管道。
guide_blackbox_miner_3_start_2.en: This requires us to place a pipe to provide a stable supply of water.

guide_desc_battle_building_energy_1.cn:
作战设备发动攻击的前提为设备已通电且<@gd.key>当前充能满足攻击条件</>。
可通过设备外部或设备详情界面中的<@gd.key>充能环</>判断当前充能情况。
guide_desc_battle_building_energy_1.en: Combat facilities must be powered and have <@gd.key>enough charges</> to attack enemies. Combat facility charging status is visible from its appearance. The <@gd.key>charging ring</> shown in the facility panel also indicates its charging status.

guide_desc_battle_building_energy_2.cn:
当作战设备<@gd.key>接入电网</>后，会随时间逐渐获得充能，充能设有上限。
发动攻击需要消耗充能。<@gd.key>如果充能不满足消耗，则作战设备无法发动攻击</>。
guide_desc_battle_building_energy_2.en: Once <@gd.key>connected to the power grid</>, the combat facility will slowly charge itself. There is also a charge limit. A combat facility must consume charges to attack, and will be <@gd.key>unable to attack if it lacks the minimum charges required</>.

guide_desc_belt1_e1m6_8.cn: <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>点击地面</>选择传送带的起始点，通过<@gd.key>移动并<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角</>可将虚影路径连接至传送带的终点处，<@gd.key>再次点击地面</>完成传送带的放置。
guide_desc_belt1_e1m6_8.en: <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>Click on the ground</> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3></> to draw out the belt to a desired destination, then <@gd.key>click the ground again</> to place it.

guide_desc_belt1_e1m6_8_ct.cn: <@gd.key>按下<action=fac_build_confirm></>开始放置传送带，通过<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>可将虚影路径连接至传送带的终点处，<@gd.key>再次按下<action=fac_build_confirm></>，完成传送带的放置。
guide_desc_belt1_e1m6_8_ct.en: <@gd.key>Press <action=fac_build_confirm></> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to follow the guiding lines and connect the belt to the destination. Finally, <@gd.key>press <action=fac_build_confirm> again</> to complete transport belt placement.

guide_desc_belt1_e1m6_8_mb.cn: <@gd.key>点击"确认起点"</>开始放置传送带，通过<@gd.key>移动并转动视角</>可将虚影路径连接至传送带的终点处，<@gd.key>点击"确认终点"</>完成传送带的放置。
guide_desc_belt1_e1m6_8_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap [Confirm Starting Point]</> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view</> to follow the guiding lines and connect the belt to the destination. Finally, <@gd.key>tap [Confirm Ending Point]</> to complete transport belt placement.

guide_desc_domain_dev_transport_1.cn: 四号谷地地区已经满足<@gd.key>向其他地区传输物品</>的条件，在其他地区的集成工业系统解锁后，可以向其他地区传输仓库中的物品。
guide_desc_domain_dev_transport_1.en: The region of Valley IV has met the criteria for <@gd.key>transferring items to other regions</>. Once an AIC Factory is unlocked in a new region, items can be transferred from the Valley IV depot to that new region.

guide_desc_domain_dev_transport_2.cn: 跨地区传输界面需在协议核心的<@gd.key>协议管理</>界面中进入。
guide_desc_domain_dev_transport_2.en: The Regional Transfer screen can be accessed via the PAC <@gd.key>Protocol Management</> screen.

guide_desc_domain_dev_transport_2_1.cn: 四号谷地地区已经满足向其他地区<@gd.key>超库存传输</>物品的条件，可以向其他地区传输任意一种本地区集成工业可生产的物品，<@gd.key>不会消耗仓库中的库存</>。
guide_desc_domain_dev_transport_2_1.en: The region of Valley IV has met the criteria for <@gd.key>Metastorage Transfer</> and can now transfer any selected producible item from the Valley IV AIC Factory to any region <@gd.key>without depleting the Valley IV depot stockpile</>.

guide_desc_domain_development_10.cn:
随<@gd.key>地区建设等级</>提升，将开放各种功能，提升世界中的矿物产率，增加各区域中可放置的工业设备等。
地区建设等级提升到最高意味着地区已被高度开发，以此为目标建设地区吧。
guide_desc_domain_development_10.en: Raising <@gd.key>Regional Development Level</> (RDL) makes various functions available. It also increases mineral ore yields and AIC Factory facility placement limits in various areas. Only the most well-developed regions can reach the highest RDL. This is also a goal we should aim for.

guide_desc_domain_development_9.cn: 探索地区、向地区据点供货及其他各种方式都将获得<@gd.key>地区建设值</>，累计地区建设值提升<@gd.key>地区建设等级</>。
guide_desc_domain_development_9.en: There are multiple ways to earn <@gd.key>Regional Development Metrics (RDM)</>, including exploration and supplying goods to regional outposts. Earning enough RDM will raise the <@gd.key>Regional Development Level</>.

guide_desc_domain_transport_1.cn: 各地区仓库是<@gd.key>互相独立</>的，可以从其他地区的仓库传输物品到本地区仓库。
guide_desc_domain_transport_1.en: The depots of various regions are <@gd.key>independent of one another</>. Items from depots of other regions can be transferred into the local depot.

guide_desc_domain_transport_2.cn: 可以靠近协议核心打开<@gd.key>协议管理</>界面进行跨地区传输物品的操作。
guide_desc_domain_transport_2.en: Approach the PAC and open the <@gd.key>Protocol Management</> screen to set up regional transfer routes of selected items.

guide_desc_fac_region_levelup_intro_1.cn: 每个集成核心区域都可以进行升级，靠近区域附近的<@gd.key>集成管家</>，可以进入扩张管理系统界面。
guide_desc_fac_region_levelup_intro_1.en: Every Core AIC Area can be upgraded. Approach the <@gd.key>AIC Steward</> near the Core AIC Area to open the Expansion Management System.

guide_desc_fac_region_levelup_intro_2.cn: 可以消耗地区的<@gd.key>调度券</>来升级集成核心区域，升级后区域面积将会扩大，还会有其他功能随着探索进度而解锁。
guide_desc_fac_region_levelup_intro_2.en: Regional <@gd.key>stock bills</> can be spent to upgrade the Core AIC Area. An upgraded Core AIC Area will be bigger. Exploration progress will also make other functions available.

guide_desc_loader_e1m6_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议核心、次级核心</>和<@gd.key>仓库</>是相连的，在取货口选定物品后，这个取货口将试图向外运输仓库中的选定物品。
guide_desc_loader_e1m6_1.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) and Sub-PAC</> are connected to the <@gd.key>Depot</>. Once an item is selected for an output port, it will start to unload the selected item from the Depot into the Core AIC Area.

guide_desc_place_battle_turret_1.cn: 铳械塔是一种作战设备，作战设备在正常运转过程中，会对攻击范围内的敌对目标进行自动攻击。
guide_desc_place_battle_turret_1.en: The Gun Tower is a combat facility. When operational, it automatically attacks enemy targets within its attack range.

guide_desc_place_battle_turret_2.cn:
在选择作战设备的放置位置时，将会出现表示其<@gd.key>攻击范围</>的蓝色指示圈。
作战设备会对<@gd.key>攻击范围内的敌对目标</>进行自动攻击。
guide_desc_place_battle_turret_2.en: When placing a combat facility, the blue circle indicates its <@gd.key>attack range</>. Combat facilities will automatically attack <@gd.key>enemy targets within their attack range</>.

guide_desc_place_battle_turret_3.cn:
作战设备既受到<@gd.key>协议容量</>限制，也会受到<@gd.key>专属数量</>限制。
放置作战设备时，两种限制提示均会出现。
guide_desc_place_battle_turret_3.en: The number of combat facilities that can be placed is limited by <@gd.key>Protocol Capacity</> as well as a separate <@gd.key>Combat Facilities Limit</>. Both restrictions will be displayed when placing combat facilities.

guide_desc_settlement_defense_prepare2_1.cn: 完成干员介入作战后，据点内可以布置的<@gd.key>作战设备数量上限</>增加了，在放置作战设备时可以在界面上方看到数量上限提示。
guide_desc_settlement_defense_prepare2_1.en: Completing the Operator Intervention battle increases the <@gd.key>combat facilities placement limit</> of this outpost. This increase can be seen at the top of the UI screen when placing combat facilities.

guide_desc_settlement_defense_prepare_1.cn:
预警终端在据点中已经显示出敌人的入侵路线。
敌人会以此路线行动，破坏终点的指挥核心。
guide_desc_settlement_defense_prepare_1.en: The Early Warning Terminal has indicated the enemy's route of invasion. Enemies will travel along this route to attack and destroy the Command Core of the outpost.

guide_desc_settlement_defense_prepare_2.cn: 一旦防守作战开始，指挥核心将投入运行，必须保护指挥核心不被敌人摧毁。
guide_desc_settlement_defense_prepare_2.en: Once the defense battle begins, the Command Core will be activated. Keep the Command Core protected against the enemy.

guide_desc_settlement_defense_sum_1.cn: 部分据点中会设立预警终端，每当<@gd.key>据点等级提升</>后，预警终端将提示新的入侵威胁。
guide_desc_settlement_defense_sum_1.en: Some outposts will have an Early Warning Terminal. Whenever the <@gd.key>outpost levels up</>, the Early Warning Terminal will detect and indicate new threats of incursions.

guide_desc_settlement_defense_sum_2.cn: 当入侵威胁存在时，完成干员介入作战，据点将进入<@gd.key>短期安全</>，居民积累调度券的效率会获得暂时增益。
guide_desc_settlement_defense_sum_2.en: When there is a threat of incursion, completing an Operator Intervention battle will make the outpost <@gd.key>Partially Secure</> and give the residents a temporary bonus to stock bills earning.

guide_desc_settlement_defense_sum_3.cn: 完成同一风险度的自动防御作战，居民积累调度券的效率将会<@gd.key>永久增加</>。完成更高风险度的作战将会获得更高的增益。
guide_desc_settlement_defense_sum_3.en: Completing an Area Defense battle in Auto-Defense mode for any risk level <@gd.key>permanently increases</> the residents' stock bills earning efficiency. Completing higher risk level battles in Auto-Defense mode gives even higher bonuses.

guide_desc_subhub_1.cn:
<@gd.key>次级核心</>拥有与<#fac.hub>协议核心</>类似的功能：
不仅可作为协议传送点，也可为在其集成核心区域内的<@gd.key>供电桩</>自动供电。
guide_desc_subhub_1.en: The <@gd.key>Sub-PAC</> and <#fac.hub>PAC</> share similar functions. Both can be used as TP Points and automatically supply power to <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> within their Core AIC Areas.

guide_dumper_pic_2.cn: 给水器<@gd.key>接入电网</>后，可以将液体输出到对应的场景内。
guide_dumper_pic_2.en: The Fluid Supply Unit must be <@gd.key>connected to the power grid</> to supply fluids to the specified area.

guide_dumper_pic_4.cn: 储液罐与给水器通过管道连接后，液体从储液罐输入到给水器中，再通过给水器排入至场景中。
guide_dumper_pic_4.en: After connecting the Fluid Tank to the Fluid Supply Unit via a pipeline, the fluid will be transported from the Fluid Tank to the Fluid Supply Unit, and then dispensed by the latter into the scene.

guide_dumper_pic_6.cn: 如果水体内已有液体与给水器输入<@gd.key>液体类型不同</>，给水器将无法正常工作。
guide_dumper_pic_6.en: If the fluid to be supplied by the Fluid Supply Unit <@gd.key>differs from the existing fluid in the target pool</>, the Fluid Supply Unit will be unable to work.

guide_farm_formulaUnlock_1.cn: 请按下快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_farm_formulaUnlock_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_farm_formulaUnlock_1_mb.en: Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_farm_formulaUnlock_2.cn: 可以在<@gd.key>简易制作</>中制造各种田块。
guide_farm_formulaUnlock_2.en: Planting plots can now be crafted at the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen.

guide_farm_formulaUnlock_3.cn: 解锁了<@gd.key>种植调配</>类，请点击此处查看。
guide_farm_formulaUnlock_3.en: <@gd.key>Planting</> facilities have been unlocked. Click here for more details.

guide_farm_formulaUnlock_3_ct.cn: 解锁了<@gd.key>种植调配</>类，请按下<action=jump_manual_tab_prev>切换至此分类查看详情。
guide_farm_formulaUnlock_3_ct.en: <@gd.key>Planting</> facilities have been unlocked. Press <action=jump_manual_tab_prev> to switch to that category and view their details.

guide_farm_formulaUnlock_4.cn: 获得<@gd.key>植物</>后，自动解锁其<@gd.key>田块</>的制作工艺。
guide_farm_formulaUnlock_4.en: Acquiring a <@gd.key>plant</> also unlocks the crafting formula for the <@gd.key>plot</> to grow that plant.

guide_farm_formulaUnlock_5.cn: 请先制作一个<@gd.key>苦叶椒田块</>。

guide_farm_formulaUnlock_6.cn: 材料足够时，即可进行制作。
guide_farm_formulaUnlock_6.en: Craft the item once enough materials are acquired.

guide_farm_intro_1.cn: 请按下快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_farm_intro_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_farm_intro_1_mb.en: Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_farm_intro_4.cn: 请选择一个位置放置田块。
guide_farm_intro_4.en: Choose a location to place the plot.

guide_farm_intro_5.cn: 请在背包中找到<@gd.key>苦叶椒田块</>，并将其放置到<@gd.key>生态种植区</>中。
guide_farm_intro_5.en: Find the <@gd.key>Tartpepper Plot</> in the Backpack and place it in the <@gd.key>Eco-Farm</>.

guide_gorup_wiki_1.cn: <@gd.key>终末地百科</>中收纳了塔卫二各个模块的信息。
guide_gorup_wiki_1.en: The <@gd.key>Endfield Database</> is a collection of various information about Talos-II.

guide_gorup_wiki_2.cn: 在塔卫二中收集过的物品，都会被记载到<@gd.key>物品图鉴</>中，可在此查看各种物品的具体信息，包括展示合成路径的<@gd.key>制造链路</>。
guide_gorup_wiki_2.en: Any items collected in Talos-II will be recorded in the <@gd.key>Item Files</> section of the Database. Use this section to view details of various items as well as <@gd.key>production chains</> for making them.

guide_gorup_wiki_3.cn: 在首次击败敌人后，<@gd.key>终末地百科</>会收录敌人的信息并记载到<@gd.key>威胁图鉴</>中。
guide_gorup_wiki_3.en: Defeating an enemy for the first time adds their information to the <@gd.key>Threat Files</> of the <@gd.key>Endfield Database</>.

guide_gorup_wiki_4.cn: 已学习过的引导教程则会收录到<@gd.key>教学记录</>中。
guide_gorup_wiki_4.en: All tutorials and guides already learned will be added to the <@gd.key>Tutorials</> section.

guide_gorup_wiki_5.cn: 可随时回到这里，查询各项信息数据，为你的探索提供助力。
guide_gorup_wiki_5.en: Return here to peruse various data and support exploration efforts.

guide_limit_winder.cn: 装备原件机与装备原件

guide_liquidStorage_1.cn: 储液罐可用于存储<@gd.key>单一类型液体</>。
guide_liquidStorage_1.en: Fluid Tank can be used to store <@gd.key>a single type of fluid</>.

guide_liquidStorage_2.cn: 可将已盛装液体的容器<@gd.key>拖入</>储液罐完成液体倾倒。
guide_liquidStorage_2.en: <@gd.key>Drag</> a fluid-filled container into the Fluid Tank to pour the fluid into the tank.

guide_liquidStorage_2_ct.cn: 可在背包中选择<@gd.key>已盛装液体的容器</>，将其中的液体倾倒进<@gd.key>储液罐</>中。
guide_liquidStorage_2_ct.en: Select a <@gd.key>fluid-filled container</> in the Backpack to pour its contents into the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</>.

guide_liquidStorage_4.cn: 将清水倾倒入储液罐后，清水会通过管道运输至给水器，从而供水驱动齿轮放下吊桥。
guide_liquidStorage_4.en: After pouring Clean Water into the Fluid Tank, the pipeline will transport the Clean Water to the Fluid Supply Unit, which then dispenses the water to drive the gearwheel and lower the drawbridge.

guide_liquidTechTree_1.cn: 请按下快捷键<action=fac_open_tech_tree>，或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>界面。
guide_liquidTechTree_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_open_tech_tree> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>.

guide_liquidTechTree_1_1_ct.en: Press <action=quickMenu_left_left_select> to open the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>.

guide_liquidTechTree_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_liquidTechTree_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处打开<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>界面。
guide_liquidTechTree_1_mb.en: Tap here to open the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</> screen.

guide_liquidTechTree_2.cn: 在<@gd.key>武陵工业计划</>中，主要可研究<@gd.key>液体</>相关的工业计划。
guide_liquidTechTree_2.en: The <@gd.key>Wuling AIC Plan</> mainly offers <@gd.key>fluid</>-related AIC Factory technology for research.

guide_liquidTechTree_3.cn: 当前已经完成一部分<@gd.key>武陵工业技术</>的研究。请点击此处查看。
guide_liquidTechTree_3.en: Several <@gd.key>Wuling AIC Plan technologies</> have already been researched. Click here for details.

guide_liquidTechTree_3_ct.cn: 当前已经完成一部分<@gd.key>武陵工业技术</>的研究。请按下<action=common_confirm>查看。
guide_liquidTechTree_3_ct.en: Several <@gd.key>Wuling AIC Plan technologies</> have already been researched. Press <action=common_confirm> for details.

guide_liquidTechTree_4.cn: 水泵可在供电后进行稳定的液体获取。
guide_liquidTechTree_4.en: When powered, Fluid Pumps provide a stable source of fluids.

guide_liquidTechTree_5.cn: 可预览后续的目标，请点击<@gd.key>溶解与反应</>工业技术。
guide_liquidTechTree_5.en: To preview the subsequent goals, select the AIC Plan technology: <@gd.key>Liquid Reaction</>.

guide_liquidTechTree_5_ct.cn: 可预览后续的目标，请按下<action=common_confirm>查看<@gd.key>溶解与反应</>工业技术。
guide_liquidTechTree_5_ct.en: To preview the subsequent goals, press <action=common_confirm> to view the AIC Plan technology: <@gd.key>Liquid Reaction</>.

guide_liquidTechTree_6.cn: <@gd.key>反应池</>可以进行液体混合加工，制作<@gd.key>效果更好的药剂</>。
guide_liquidTechTree_6.en: The <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> can make fluid solutions that can be used for producing <@gd.key>more effective medicines</>.

guide_liquidTechTree_7.cn: 在武陵，仍然需要通过激活<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>获取<@gd.key>武陵工业点数</>。
guide_liquidTechTree_7.en: In Wuling, <@gd.key>Protocol Datalogger</> must still be activated to acquire <@gd.key>Wuling AIC Index</>.

guide_liquidTechTree_8.cn: 请点击此处，关闭<@gd.key>武陵工业计划</>。
guide_liquidTechTree_8.en: Click here to close the <@gd.key>Wuling AIC Plan</>.

guide_pumpDumper_pic_2.cn: 武陵区域分布的水体，若容量“有限”，则可以被<@gd.key>改变高度</>，比如池塘、蓄水池。
guide_pumpDumper_pic_2.en: "Limited" capacity water bodies in Wuling have <@gd.key>water levels that can change</>. These include ponds and reservoirs.

guide_pumpDumper_pic_3.cn: 水泵抽水 - 液面下降

guide_pumpDumper_pic_4.cn: 使用水泵将水抽出，可以使有限水体的液面高度<@gd.key>下降</>。
guide_pumpDumper_pic_4.en: Pumping out water from a limited-capacity water body with the Fluid Pump will <@gd.key>lower</> its water level.

guide_pumpDumper_pic_5.cn: 给水器输出水 - 液面上升
guide_pumpDumper_pic_5.en: Fluid Supply Unit: Raising Fluid Levels

guide_pumpDumper_pic_6.cn: 使用给水器输出液体，可以使有限水体的液面高度<@gd.key>上升</>。
guide_pumpDumper_pic_6.en: Supplying fluids into a limited-capacity water body with the Fluid Supply Unit will <@gd.key>raise</> its water level.

guide_pumpDumper_pic_8.cn: 多多留意类似的场景，也许这类方法有助于您探索塔卫二。
guide_pumpDumper_pic_8.en: Take note of similar map locations to better explore the world of Talos-II.

guide_pump_pic_2.cn: 水泵只能在湖泊等水体附近建造，且水泵的抽水口必须插入水体中。
guide_pump_pic_2.en: The Fluid Pump must be placed near lakes or other water bodies. The pump inlet must be within the water body itself.

guide_pump_pic_4.cn: 用供电桩为水泵供电后，可进行稳定的液体获取。
guide_pump_pic_4.en: Use Electric Pylons to power the Fluid Pump and acquire fluids at a stable rate.

guide_scan_vedio_1.cn: 使用扫描便捷工具识别附近液体
guide_scan_vedio_1.en: Use the Easy Tools action of Scan to identify nearby fluids.

guide_scan_vedio_2.cn: 将便捷工具切换至扫描，使用扫描便捷工具识别附近液体。
guide_scan_vedio_2.en: Switch the Easy Tools action to Scan, then use the Scan action to identify nearby fluids.

guide_text_01boss_combo_1_mb.cn: 可点击此处，施放<@gd.key>连携技</>。
guide_text_01boss_combo_1_mb.en: Tap here to cast <@gd.key>Perlica's combo skill</>.

guide_text_01boss_enhanced_skill_1.cn: 当前可短按数字键 <action=battle_use_char_skill_3>施放<@gd.key>强化战技</>。
guide_text_01boss_enhanced_skill_1.en: Press number key <action=battle_use_char_skill_3> to cast the <@gd.key>enhanced battle skill</>.

guide_text_01boss_enhanced_skill_1_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_3> to cast the <@gd.key>enhanced battle skill</>.

guide_text_01boss_enhanced_skill_1_mb.cn: 可点击此处，施放<@gd.key>强化战技</>。
guide_text_01boss_enhanced_skill_1_mb.en: Tap here to cast the <@gd.key>enhanced battle skill</>.

guide_text_01boss_skill_1.cn: 短按数字键 <action=battle_use_char_skill_2>施放<@gd.key>队友的战技</>。
guide_text_01boss_skill_1.en: Press number key <action=battle_use_char_skill_2> to cast the <@gd.key>teammate's battle skill</>.

guide_text_01boss_skill_1_ct.cn: 按住<action=common_indicator_start>并短按<action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_1>施放<@gd.key>队友的战技</>。
guide_text_01boss_skill_1_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_1> to cast the <@gd.key>teammate's battle skill</>.

guide_text_01boss_skill_1_mb.cn: 点击此处，施放<@gd.key>队友的战技</>。
guide_text_01boss_skill_1_mb.en: Tap here to cast the <@gd.key>teammate's battle skill</>.

guide_text_01boss_team_1.cn: 当主控干员进行战斗时，其他干员会<@gd.key>自动进行战斗</>。
guide_text_01boss_team_1.en: When the controlled operator starts fighting, other operators will also <@gd.key>fight automatically</>.

guide_text_01boss_ultimate_1_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press and hold <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_1> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>.

guide_text_01boss_ultimate_1_mb.cn: <@gd.key>长按</>此处，或将战技键<@gd.key>拖动至终结技区域</>，施放<@gd.key>终结技</>。
guide_text_01boss_ultimate_1_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap and hold</> this, or <@gd.key>drag the battle skill button to the ultimate zone</> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>.

guide_text_01boss_ultimate_2_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press and hold <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_2> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>.

guide_text_01boss_ultimate_3_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press and hold <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_3> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>.

guide_text_01boss_ultimate_4_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press and hold <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_4> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>.

guide_text_accelerate_mushroom_desc_1.cn: 触碰涡流团后，主控干员会加速一小段时间。
guide_text_accelerate_mushroom_desc_1.en: Touching a vortex gives a temporary speed boost to the controlled operator.

guide_text_achievement_1.cn: <@gd.key>光荣之路</>中收纳了塔卫二蚀刻章的各种信息。
guide_text_achievement_1.en: The <@gd.key>Path of Glory</> has information on various Talos-II engraved medals.

guide_text_achievement_2.cn: 管理员可以点击此处自由编辑、展示已获得的蚀刻章。
guide_text_achievement_2.en: Click here to edit and showcase the engraved medals acquired, Endministrator.

guide_text_achievement_2_ct.cn: 管理员可以按下<action=achievement_display_edit>自由编辑、展示已获得的蚀刻章。
guide_text_achievement_2_ct.en: Press <action=achievement_display_edit> to edit and showcase the engraved medals acquired, Endministrator.

guide_text_achievement_3.cn: 在<@gd.key>蚀刻章列表</>中，可查看蚀刻章的具体信息。
guide_text_achievement_3.en: The <@gd.key>Medal Album</> shows the details of various medals.

guide_text_achievement_4.cn: 点击蚀刻章条目，可以查看对应蚀刻章的具体信息，包括达成时间、获得条件等。
guide_text_achievement_4.en: Click on the engraved medal entry to view its details, the time by which it was acquired, and the criteria for acquiring it.

guide_text_achievement_4_ct.cn: 从蚀刻章条目处，可以查看对应蚀刻章的具体信息，包括达成时间、获得条件等。
guide_text_achievement_4_ct.en: Each engraved medal entry shows its details, the time by which it was acquired, and the criteria for acquiring it.

guide_text_achievement_5.cn: 点击此处，可以查看蚀刻章相关图标的详细说明。
guide_text_achievement_5.en: Click here to view details about various engraved medal icons.

guide_text_achievement_5_ct.cn: <@gd.key>长按</><action=achievement_list_help>，可以查看蚀刻章相关图标的详细说明。
guide_text_achievement_5_ct.en: <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=achievement_list_help> to view details about various engraved medal icons.

guide_text_achievement_6.cn: 点击此处可以添加想要展示的蚀刻章。
guide_text_achievement_6.en: Click here to add an engraved medal to the showcase.

guide_text_achievement_6_ct.cn: 按下<action=achievement_depot>，可以添加想要展示的蚀刻章。
guide_text_achievement_6_ct.en: Press <action=achievement_depot> to add an engraved medal to the showcase.

guide_text_achievement_7.cn: 添加完蚀刻章后，拖拽或点击编辑栏中的蚀刻章，放置到展示栏位上。
guide_text_achievement_7.en: After adding the engraved medals, drag or click the engraved medal in the editing bar to place it in the showcase slot.

guide_text_achievement_7_ct.cn: 添加完蚀刻章后，按下<action=common_confirm>拿起编辑栏中的蚀刻章，再次按下<action=common_confirm>放置到展示栏位上。
guide_text_achievement_7_ct.en: After adding the engraved medals, press <action=common_confirm> to pick up an engraved medal in the editing bar, then press <action=common_confirm> again to place it in the showcase slot.

guide_text_achievement_8.cn: 排布完毕后，点击此处保存，就能够在名片与帝江号展示蚀刻章了。
guide_text_achievement_8.en: After arranging the medals, click here to save the showcase and display the medals at the Profile screen and Dijiang.

guide_text_achievement_8_ct.cn: 排布完毕后，按下<action=achievement_edit_save>保存，就能够在名片与帝江号展示蚀刻章了。
guide_text_achievement_8_ct.en: After arranging the engraved medals, press <action=achievement_edit_save> to save the showcase and display them via the Profile screen and Dijiang.

guide_text_achievement_intro.cn: 光荣之路已开放，可点击此处进入。
guide_text_achievement_intro.en: The Path of Glory is now available. Click here to open it.

guide_text_achievement_intro_ct.cn: 光荣之路已开放，可在此处进入。
guide_text_achievement_intro_ct.en: The Path of Glory is now available. It can be accessed from here.

guide_text_achievement_picture1.cn: 编辑好的蚀刻章会在个人名片与帝江号展示，请继续推进主线任务进度，解锁更多展示方式。
guide_text_achievement_picture1.en: The edited medal showcase will be displayed at the personal Profile and Dijiang. Progress through the main mission to unlock more ways to display the medals.

guide_text_achievement_picture2.cn: 编辑好的蚀刻章会在个人名片与帝江号蚀刻章展示墙处展示，请继续探索、获得更多蚀刻章。
guide_text_achievement_picture2.en: Once edited and saved, the medal showcase will be displayed at the personal Profile and medal display wall aboard Dijiang. Keep exploring to earn more engraved medals.

guide_text_activity_gacha_1.cn: 推进主线任务即可获得<@gd.key>十连启程寻访凭证</>，可用于启程寻访。
guide_text_activity_gacha_1.en: Progress through the main mission to acquire <@gd.key>New Horizons HH-10×Permit</> that can be used in New Horizons Headhunting.

guide_text_activity_gacha_2.cn: 请点击此处，领取<@gd.key>十连启程寻访凭证</>。
guide_text_activity_gacha_2.en: Click here to claim the <@gd.key>New Horizons HH-10×Permit</>.

guide_text_activity_gacha_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>，领取<@gd.key>十连启程寻访凭证</>。
guide_text_activity_gacha_2_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to claim the <@gd.key>New Horizons HH-10×Permit</>.

guide_text_activity_gacha_4.cn:
请点击此处，前往寻访。
可通过<@gd.key>启程寻访</>获取强力干员。
guide_text_activity_gacha_4.en:
Click here to go to headhunting. 
Use <@gd.key>New Horizons Headhunting</> to acquire powerful operators.

guide_text_activity_gacha_4_ct.cn:
请按下<action=activity_gacha_beginner_jump_pool>，前往寻访。
可通过<@gd.key>启程寻访</>获取强力干员。
guide_text_activity_gacha_4_ct.en: Press <action=activity_gacha_beginner_jump_pool> to go to headhunting. Use <@gd.key>New Horizons Headhunting</> to acquire powerful operators.

guide_text_adventure_book_1.cn:
<@gd.key>行动手册</>系统的权限已解锁。
按下<action=common_open_adventure_book>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开<@gd.key>行动手册</>。
guide_text_adventure_book_1.en: <@gd.key>Operational Manual</> system authority level unlocked. Press <action=common_open_adventure_book> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>Operational Manual</>.

guide_text_adventure_book_1_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，打开<@gd.key>行动手册</>。
guide_text_adventure_book_1_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to select this and open the <@gd.key>Operational Manual</>.

guide_text_adventure_book_1_ct.cn:
<@gd.key>行动手册</>系统的权限已解锁。
请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_adventure_book_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>Operational Manual</> system authority level has been unlocked. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_adventure_book_1_mb.cn:
<@gd.key>行动手册</>系统的权限已解锁。
请点击此处打开<@gd.key>行动手册</>。
guide_text_adventure_book_1_mb.en: <@gd.key>Operational Manual</> system access authorized. Tap here to open the <@gd.key>Operational Manual</>.

guide_text_adventure_book_2.cn: <@gd.key>行动手册</>系统中集成了行动节点、日常任务、战术训练等功能，可帮助您更快熟悉塔卫二的各项事务。
guide_text_adventure_book_2.en: The <@gd.key>Operational Manual</> is a system that integrates various features, such as Activity Nodes, Daily Tasks, and Tactical Training. Use it to get familiar with various activities on Talos-II.

guide_text_adventure_book_3.cn: 在<@gd.key>行动节点</>中，可以完成这些任务来获取行动资历和其他奖励。
guide_text_adventure_book_3.en: <@gd.key>Activity Nodes</> include missions that can be completed to earn Operational EXP and other rewards.

guide_text_adventure_book_4.cn: 完成当前阶段后，即可解锁下一阶段。
guide_text_adventure_book_4.en: Complete the current phase to unlock the next phase.

guide_text_adventure_book_5.cn: 点击此处，查看<@gd.key>日常任务</>。

guide_text_adventure_book_6.cn:
这里显示了每日可完成的<@gd.key>活跃任务</>。
达成对应目标后即可完成任务。
guide_text_adventure_book_6.en: This is a list of <@gd.key>activity tasks</> that can be completed on a daily basis. Reach the goals to complete them.

guide_text_adventure_book_7.cn: 完成日常任务可获得<@gd.key>活跃度</>，达到一定进度可获得奖励。
guide_text_adventure_book_7.en: Complete these daily tasks to gain <@gd.key>Activity Points</> and earn rewards.

guide_text_adventure_book_8.cn: 点击此处，查看<@gd.key>战术训练</>。

guide_text_adventure_book_9.cn: <@gd.key>战术训练</>中收录了多个训练课程，比如可在此处查看<@gd.key>基础训练</>。
guide_text_adventure_book_9.en: <@gd.key>Tactical Training</> offers a series of training courses. This shows <@gd.key>Basic Training</>.

guide_text_adventure_book_9_ct.cn: <@gd.key>战术训练</>中收录了多个训练课程，比如可在此处查看<@gd.key>基础训练</>。
guide_text_adventure_book_9_ct.en: <@gd.key>Tactical Training</> offers a series of training courses. This shows <@gd.key>Basic Training</>.

guide_text_adventure_levelup_des_1.cn:
现在需要解锁更高的权限等阶，才可以继续推进<@gd.key>主线任务</>。
随着权限等阶的提升，可获得各种奖励，如<@gd.key>装备制造模板</>和<@gd.key>理智上限提升</>。
guide_text_adventure_levelup_des_1.en: A higher Authority Level is required to progress through the <@gd.key>main mission</>. Gaining Authority Levels also provides various rewards such as <@gd.key>gear templates</> and <@gd.key>higher Sanity limits</>.

guide_text_adventure_levelup_des_2.cn:
完成任务、冒险探索、探索协议空间、放置矿机等各项行动都能为管理员积累<@gd.key>行动资历</>。
每当<@gd.key>行动资历</>积累到一定程度，<@gd.key>权限等阶</>都会得到提升。
guide_text_adventure_levelup_des_2.en: The Endministrator can earn <@gd.key>Operational EXP</> via various activities, such as completing missions and Protocol Spaces, exploring the world, and placing mining rigs. Having enough <@gd.key>Operational EXP</> raises the <@gd.key>Authority Level</>.

guide_text_adventure_levelup_des_3.cn: 可以在协议同步器中打开等阶晋升，查看后续权限等阶的奖励。
guide_text_adventure_levelup_des_3.en: Open the Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync menu) to open the Authority Level screen and see rewards at various Authority Levels.

guide_text_aglina_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 洁尔佩塔的战技会持续吸引附近的敌人，最后对范围内的敌人施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>。
guide_text_aglina_chartrain01_02_1.en: Gilberta's battle skill continuously pulls in nearby enemies and then applies <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> to enemies within its area of effect.

guide_text_aglina_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 当有敌人被施加<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>时，可以触发洁尔佩塔的连携技。
guide_text_aglina_chartrain01_03_1.en: Gilberta's combo skill is triggered when an enemy suffers an <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reaction</>.

guide_text_aglina_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 洁尔佩塔的连携技可以对敌人强制造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
guide_text_aglina_chartrain01_03_2.en: Gilberta's combo skill forcibly applies <#ba.airborne>Lift</> on the enemy.

guide_text_aglina_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 洁尔佩塔的终结技会对范围内敌人施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>、<#ba.slow>缓速</>和<#ba.spellvul>法术脆弱</>，使敌人受到的法术伤害提高。
guide_text_aglina_chartrain01_04_1.en: Gilberta's ultimate applies <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>, <#ba.slow>Slow</>, and <#ba.spellvul>Arts Susceptibility</> to enemies in its area of effect. Arts Susceptible enemies take more Arts DMG.

guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_1.cn: 洁尔佩塔是兼具法术和物理能力的辅助干员。她可以在触发<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>后快速造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>，并且施放终结技后可以对大范围内的敌人施加<#ba.spellvul>法术脆弱</>效果。
guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_1.en: Gilberta is a supporter with both Arts and Physical abilities. She can quickly <#ba.airborne>Lift</> enemies after triggering <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reactions</>. Once cast, her ultimate also applies <#ba.spellvul>Arts Susceptibility</> to enemies within a large area.

guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_2.cn: 洁尔佩塔的战技会产生<@ba.key>重力奇点</>，持续牵引敌人，最后还会爆炸并施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>。
guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_2.en: Gilberta's battle skill creates a <@ba.key>gravity well</> that continuously pulls in nearby enemies before exploding and applying <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>.

guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_3.cn: 当有敌人被施加<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>时，可以发动洁尔佩塔的连携技：让范围内敌人受重力作用，受到<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>和强制<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_3.en: Gilberta's combo skill is triggered when an <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reaction</> is applied on the enemy. Her combo skill exerts gravitational effects that deal <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and forcibly apply <#ba.airborne>Lift</> to enemies within the area of effect.

guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_4.cn: 洁尔佩塔的终结技会创造一个<@ba.key>重力紊乱区域</>，对区域内的敌人造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>。处于<@ba.key>重力紊乱区域</>中的目标会受到<#ba.spellvul>法术脆弱</>。
guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_4.en: Gilberta's ultimate creates an <@ba.key>Anomalous Gravity Field</> that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and applies <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> to enemies in the area of effect. The <@ba.key>Anomalous Gravity Field</> also applies <#ba.spellvul>Arts Susceptibility</> to targets within it.

guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_5.cn: 终结技可以对敌人施加<#ba.spellvul>法术脆弱</>。此时配合<#ba.spelldmg>法术伤害</>输出型干员，可以造成大量<#ba.spelldmg>法术伤害</>。
guide_text_aglina_chartrial01_01_5.en: First cast Gilberta's ultimate to apply <#ba.spellvul>Arts Susceptibility</> to enemies and create an opportunity for <#ba.spelldmg>Arts DMG</> operators to deal massive <#ba.spelldmg>Arts DMG</>.

guide_text_anchor_wave_des_1.cn:
锚点会源源不断地产生危险的<@gd.key>震荡波</>。
如果被震荡波所波及，则会被强制传送离开。
guide_text_anchor_wave_des_1.en: Ankhors can constantly emit dangerous <@gd.key>shockwaves</>. If the controlled operator is hit by this shockwave, the entire team will be forced to retreat.

guide_text_anchor_wave_des_2.cn: 只有击破<@gd.key>锚点核心</>，才能阻止震荡波的产生。
guide_text_anchor_wave_des_2.en: Destroy the <@gd.key>Ankhor core</> to stop the shockwaves.

guide_text_anchor_wave_des_3.cn: <@gd.key>源石树枝</>能形成<@gd.key>保护罩</>，进入保护罩可免受震荡波的伤害。
guide_text_anchor_wave_des_3.en: <@gd.key>Originium branches</> can generate a <@gd.key>protective shield</>. Get behind the shield for protection against the shockwaves.

guide_text_anchor_wave_des_4.cn: 某些源石树枝的保护罩在经受一次震荡波的攻击后就会破碎并失去保护效果，经过一段时间后才会恢复。
guide_text_anchor_wave_des_4.en: The shield of some Originium branches will shatter and lose its protective effects after taking a shockwave hit. Such shields will take a while to recover.

guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 艾尔黛拉的战技会对目标造成自然伤害。
guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_02_1.en: Ardelia's battle skill deals Nature DMG to the target.

guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_02_2.cn: 解锁天赋<@ba.key>朋友的身影</>后，艾尔黛拉的战技命中敌人后生成<@ba.key>多利先生的影子</>。
guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_02_2.en: With the talent <@ba.key>Friendly Presence</> unlocked, Ardelia's battle skill also creates <@ba.key>Shadow of Mr. Dolly</> when it hits enemies.

guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_02_3.cn: 主控干员触碰<@ba.key>多利先生的影子</>后，艾尔黛拉为其回复生命值。
guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_02_3.en: When the controlled operator touches a <@ba.key>Shadow of Mr. Dolly</>, Ardelia grants HP restoration to the said operator.

guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 主控干员对不处于<#ba.noguard>破防</>或<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>的敌人造成重击后，可以发动艾尔黛拉的连携技。
guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_03_1.en: Ardelia's combo skill is triggered when the controlled operator performs a Final Strike on an enemy with no <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks or <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>.

guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 艾尔黛拉的连携技可以对敌人施加<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>。
guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_03_2.en: Ardelia's combo skill applies <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> on the enemy.

guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_03_3.cn: 艾尔黛拉的战技若命中处于<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态的敌人，会<#ba.consume>消耗</><#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态并对其施加<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>与<#ba.spellvul>法术脆弱</>。
guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_03_3.en: If Ardelia's battle skill hits an enemy with <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>, it <#ba.consume>consumes</> the said <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> and applies <#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</> and <#ba.spellvul>Arts Susceptibility</> to the said enemy.

guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 艾尔黛拉的终结技持续造成伤害并生成多个<@ba.key>多利先生的影子</>。
guide_text_ardelia_chartrain01_04_1.en: Ardelia's ultimate deals DMG over time and creates multiple <@ba.key>Shadows of Mr. Dolly</>.

guide_text_attacked_switch_desc_1.cn: 当<@gd.key>受击装置</>受到<@gd.key>攻击</>或<@gd.key>爆炸冲击</>会暂时改变运行状态。
guide_text_attacked_switch_desc_1.en: A <@gd.key>reactive device</> temporarily changes its operation mode when <@gd.key>attacked</> or <@gd.key>hit by an explosion</>.

guide_text_attribute_1.cn:
每位干员都具备力量、敏捷、智识、意志四种能力值。
四种能力会为干员提供<@gd.key>不同属性加成</>。
guide_text_attribute_1.en: Every operator has 4 attributes: Strength (STR), Agility (AGI), Intellect (INT), and Will (WILL). These attributes give operators <@gd.key>different stat bonuses</>.

guide_text_attribute_2.cn:
不同干员都有其擅长的<@gd.key>主能力</>和<@gd.key>副能力</>。
主能力提升时，会为干员额外提供<@gd.key>大量攻击力加成</>；副能力则会提供少量攻击力加成。
guide_text_attribute_2.en: Every operator has a <@gd.key>main attribute</> and a <@gd.key>secondary attribute</>. Increasing the main attribute gives the operator a <@gd.key>large bonus to Attack</>, while increasing the secondary attribute gives a smaller bonus to Attack.

guide_text_attribute_3.cn: 可在此处查看干员各项具体属性。
guide_text_attribute_3.en: This shows the operator's various stats.

guide_text_aurora_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 昼雪的战技会使周围干员获得<#ba.guard>庇护</>，如果期间受到攻击，会发动反击，并对敌人施加1层<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>。
guide_text_aurora_chartrain01_02_1.en: Snowshine's battle skill grants <#ba.guard>Protection</> to nearby operators. If Snowshine is attacked during her battle skill, she performs a retaliation bash that applies 1 stack of <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> on the enemy.

guide_text_aurora_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 当主控干员受到攻击后，如果生命值低于一定比例，可以发动昼雪的连携技。
guide_text_aurora_chartrain01_03_1.en: Snowshine's combo skill is triggered when the main controlled operator is attacked and the said operator is below a certain HP.

guide_text_aurora_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 昼雪的连携技会持续对主控干员附近的区域提供<@ba.heal>治疗</>。
guide_text_aurora_chartrain01_03_2.en: Snowshine's combo skill provides <@ba.heal>HP treatment</> in a small area around the controlled operator.

guide_text_aurora_chartrain01_04_1.cn:
昼雪的终结技会生成一个持续数秒的<@ba.key>冰雪地带</>。
处于<@ba.key>冰雪地带</>内的敌人一段时间后将被强制<#ba.frozen>冻结</>。
guide_text_aurora_chartrain01_04_1.en: Snowshine's ultimate creates a <@ba.key>Snow Zone</> that lasts for several seconds. The <@ba.key>Snow Zone</> forcibly applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> to enemies who remain within it for too long.

guide_text_avywen_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 主控干员对处于<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>或<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态的目标造成<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>后，可以发动艾维文娜的连携技。
guide_text_avywen_chartrain01_02_1.en: Avywenna's combo skill is triggered when the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on a target with <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> or <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>.

guide_text_avywen_chartrain01_02_2.cn: 艾维文娜的连携技会掷出3枚<@ba.key>雷枪</>。

guide_text_avywen_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 艾维文娜的战技会召回全部<@ba.key>雷枪</>。<@ba.key>雷枪</>被召回时，对路径上的敌人造成伤害。
guide_text_avywen_chartrain01_03_1.en: Avywenna's battle skill retrieves all thrown <@ba.key>Thunderlances</>. A returning <@ba.key>Thunderlance</> deals DMG to all enemies hit along its path.

guide_text_avywen_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 艾维文娜的终结技可以投下一支<@ba.key>强雷枪</>。

guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 余烬的战技可以对敌人造成<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>，战技施放过程若受到过来自敌人的伤害，命中时额外造成一定失衡。
guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_02_1.en: Ember's battle skill applies <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> on the enemy. If Ember takes DMG from the enemy while casting her battle skill, the skill also deals some additional Stagger when it hits.

guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_02_2.cn: <#ba.knockdown>倒地</>：对敌人造成<#ba.noguard>破防</>，如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会叠加1层<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数并累积<@ba.poise>失衡值</>。
guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_02_2.en: <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</>: Applies <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> on an enemy. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, then add 1 <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack and deal <@ba.poise>Stagger</>.

guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 主控干员受到攻击时，可以发动余烬的连携技。
guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_04_1.en: Ember's combo skill is triggered when the controlled operator is attacked.

guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_04_2.cn: 余烬的连携技会造成<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>并治疗主控干员。
guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_04_2.en: Ember's combo skill applies <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> to enemies, and also gives HP treatment to the controlled operator.

guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_05_1.cn: 余烬的终结技会对敌人造成伤害并使全队获得<#ba.shield>护盾</>。
guide_text_azrila_chartrain01_05_1.en: Ember's ultimate deals DMG to enemies and grants <#ba.shield>shields</> to the entire team.

guide_text_bag_full_1.cn: 背包已满时，将暂时无法获取新物品，您可以考虑在安全区将多余物品<@gd.key>存入仓库</>，或<@gd.key>销毁</>不需要的物品。
guide_text_bag_full_1.en: No new items can be acquired when the Backpack is full. Go to a safe zone and move extra items to the <@gd.key>Depot</> or <@gd.key>destroy</> items no longer required.

guide_text_bagfull_hint_1.cn: 背包已满，<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>已存至仓库，可前往附近<@gd.key>协议传送点</>取至<@gd.key>背包</>
guide_text_bagfull_hint_1.en: Backpack is full. <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottles</> have been stored at the Depot. Go to the nearby <@gd.key>TP Point</> to move them into the <@gd.key>Backpack</>.

guide_text_balloon_desc_1.cn: 塔卫二分布着很多个<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>。靠近并交互后，即可获得<@gd.key>工业点数</>。
guide_text_balloon_desc_1.en: Many <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</> can be found scattered across Talos-II. Approach and interact with them to acquire <@gd.key>AIC Index</>.

guide_text_balloon_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>协议采录桩</>已经被标记在了地图中，可以通过地图标记来定位<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>。
guide_text_balloon_desc_2.en: The locations of <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</> are already marked on the map. Use map markers to find these <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</>.

guide_text_bandwidth_des_1.cn:
每个地区设有独立的<@gd.key>协议容量</>上限。
在<@gd.key>集成核心区域外</>放置设备会消耗协议容量。
不同类型的设备，消耗的协议容量也会有所不同。
当某个地区的协议容量达到上限时，该地区将无法放置新的设备。
guide_text_bandwidth_des_1.en: Every region has its own <@gd.key>Protocol Capacity</>. Different facilities take up different amounts of Protocol Capacity and placing them <@gd.key>outside the Core AIC Area</> uses up the Capacity. If Protocol Capacity of a region has been used up, no more facilities can be placed in that region.

guide_text_battery_desc_1.cn:
已完成谷地电池制造，热能池可改为使用<@gd.key>电池</>发电。
使用<@gd.key>电池</>发电可<@gd.key>大幅提高</>发电效率，降低源矿消耗。
guide_text_battery_desc_1.en: Valley batteries have been produced. Thermal Banks can also use <@gd.key>batteries</> to generate power. <@gd.key>Batteries</> generate <@gd.key>more</> power and reduce overall consumption of Originium Ore.

guide_text_battery_hint_1.cn: 当前发电功率较高，推荐热能池使用<@gd.key>电池发电</>，提高发电效率降低源矿消耗
guide_text_battery_hint_1.en: Power output is currently very high. Recommend using <@gd.key>battery power generation</> at the Thermal Banks to raise power efficiency and reduce Originium Ore consumption.

guide_text_battle_airborne_desc_1.cn:
带有<@ba.airborne>击飞</>的技能会使敌人<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会真正触发<@ba.airborne>击飞</>的异常效果：叠加一层<#ba.noguard>破防</>（最多4层），造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，累积一定<@ba.poise>失衡值</>，并使弱小的敌人浮空。
guide_text_battle_airborne_desc_1.en: Skills with the <@ba.airborne>Lift</> effect first make the enemy <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, such skills then apply the actual Physical Status of <@ba.airborne>Lifted</>: Adds 1 more <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack (max: 4), deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and some <@ba.poise>Stagger</>, and lifts a weak enemy into mid-air.

guide_text_battle_airborne_desc_2.cn: 一些技能带有强制<@ba.airborne>击飞</>：无论敌人是否<#ba.noguard>破防</>，直接触发<@ba.airborne>击飞</>。
guide_text_battle_airborne_desc_2.en: Some skills can forcibly apply <@ba.airborne>Lift</>: Enemies are directly <@ba.airborne>Lifted</> into mid-air whether they are <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</> or not.

guide_text_battle_breakarmor_desc_1.cn:
带有碎甲的技能会使敌人<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会真正触发<@ba.fracture>碎甲</>的异常效果：<#ba.consume>消耗</>目标所有<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数，使其在一段时间内受到的<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>提高。
guide_text_battle_breakarmor_desc_1.en: Skills with the Breach effect first make the enemy <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, then apply the actual Physical Status of <@ba.fracture>Breached</>: <#ba.consume>Consumes</> all active <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks and makes the target take more <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> for a certain duration.

guide_text_battle_breakarmor_desc_2.cn: <#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数越多，<@ba.fracture>碎甲</>使敌人受到的<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>提高效果越强。
guide_text_battle_breakarmor_desc_2.en: By <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, <@ba.fracture>Breach</> makes the enemy take even more <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

guide_text_battle_cannon_2_desc_1.cn:
高爆榴弹塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
高爆榴弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@gd.key>灼热伤害</>，同时留下一片燃烧区域。
guide_text_battle_cannon_2_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, HE Grenade Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. The tower fires HE grenades that explode near enemies to deal <@gd.key>Heat DMG</> to the area of effect and leave a burning zone.

guide_text_battle_cannon_desc_1.cn:
榴弹塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
榴弹命中敌人后会爆炸，造成范围<@gd.key>灼热伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_cannon_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Grenade Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. The grenades explode upon hitting the enemy to deal <@gd.key>Heat DMG</> to the area of effect.

guide_text_battle_cold_desc_1.cn: 处于<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>时，会增加一层<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>，并受到<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_cold_desc_1.en: To an enemy with <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>, applying another <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> adds 1 more stack of <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> and deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>.

guide_text_battle_combust_desc_1.cn:
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人，再被施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>所有<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>，受到一次初始<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>，并进入<@ba.burning>燃烧</>状态。
<@ba.burning>燃烧</>状态下，敌人每秒受到<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。伤害量基于触发<@ba.burning>燃烧</>的干员的攻击力。
guide_text_battle_combust_desc_1.en: To an enemy with a non-Heat <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> all <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Inflictions</>, deals 1 initial hit of <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>, and triggers the Arts Reaction of <@ba.burning>Combustion</>. An enemy with <@ba.burning>Combustion</> suffers <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> every second. The amount of DMG dealt is based on the ATK of the operator who triggered the <@ba.burning>Combustion</>.

guide_text_battle_combust_desc_2.cn:
触发<@ba.burning>燃烧</>时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数越多，初始伤害和<@ba.burning>燃烧</>的伤害越高。
强制施加的<@ba.burning>燃烧</>不会有初始伤害。
guide_text_battle_combust_desc_2.en: When triggering <@ba.burning>Combustion</>, <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks deals higher DMG in the initial hit and higher <@ba.burning>Combustion</> DMG. Forcibly applied <@ba.burning>Combustion</> does not deal the initial hit of DMG.

guide_text_battle_conduct_desc_1.cn:
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人，再被施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>所有<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>，受到一次初始<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>，并进入<@ba.conduct>导电</>状态。
<@ba.conduct>导电</>状态下，敌人受到的<#ba.spelldmg>法术伤害</>会提高。
guide_text_battle_conduct_desc_1.en: To an enemy with non-Electric <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> all <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, deals 1 initial hit of <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>, and triggers the Arts Reaction of <@ba.conduct>Electrification</>. An enemy with <@ba.conduct>Electrification</> takes more <#ba.spelldmg>Arts DMG</>.

guide_text_battle_conduct_desc_2.cn:
触发导电时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数越多，初始伤害越高，敌人受到<#ba.spelldmg>法术伤害</>提高的效果越强。
强制施加的<@ba.conduct>导电</>不会有初始伤害。
guide_text_battle_conduct_desc_2.en:
When triggering Electrification, <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks deals higher DMG in the initial hit and makes the enemy take even more <#ba.spelldmg>Arts DMG</>.
Forcibly triggered <@ba.conduct>Electrification</> does not deal the initial hit of DMG.

guide_text_battle_corrode_desc_1.cn:
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人，再被施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>所有附着，受到一次初始<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>，并进入<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态：一段时间内全属性抗性逐渐下降，该效果存在上限。
如果刷新<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态，会维持之前的抗性下降。
guide_text_battle_corrode_desc_1.en:
To an enemy with non-Nature <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> all Arts Infliction, deals 1 initial hit of <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>, and triggers the Arts Reaction of <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>: Resistance to all elements decreases over time until it reaches a certain minimum.
Refreshing the <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> does not change the amount of resistance reduction.

guide_text_battle_corrode_desc_2.cn:
触发<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数越多，初始伤害越高，<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>每秒降低的全属性抗性越多，降低全属性抗性效果的上限越高。
强制造成的<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>不会有初始伤害。
guide_text_battle_corrode_desc_2.en:
