When triggering <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>, <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks deals higher DMG in the initial hit, makes <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> reduce more resistance against all elements per second, and reduce the resistance against all elements to an even lower minimum.
Forcibly applied <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> does not deal the initial hit of DMG.

guide_text_battle_fire_desc_1.cn: 处于<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>时，会增加一层<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>，并受到<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_fire_desc_1.en: To an enemy with <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>, applying another <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> adds 1 more stack of <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> and deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>.

guide_text_battle_fog_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>“毒沼”MK-Ⅰ</>通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
特制毒雾弹爆炸后造成范围<@gd.key>自然伤害</>，同时在地面留下毒雾区，对敌人造成伤害及<@gd.key>减速效果</>。
guide_text_battle_fog_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, <@gd.key>Marsh Gas Mk I</> towers can automatically attack enemies within range. The tower fires special gas bombs that deal <@gd.key>Nature DMG</> to the area of effect and leave a Mist Zone that deals DMG and <@gd.key>slows</> enemies within it.

guide_text_battle_freeze_desc_1.cn:
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>的敌人，再被施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>所有附着，受到一次初始<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>，并进入<@ba.frozen>冻结</>。
<@ba.frozen>冻结</>状态下，弱小的敌人无法行动。
guide_text_battle_freeze_desc_1.en: To an enemy with non-Cryo <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> all Arts Infliction, deals 1 initial hit of <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>, and triggers the Arts Reaction of <@ba.frozen>Solidification</>. A weak enemy with <@ba.frozen>Solidification</> cannot move.

guide_text_battle_freeze_desc_2.cn: 对处于<@ba.frozen>冻结</>状态的敌人施加<#ba.noguard>破防</>或<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>时会触发<@ba.crystbreak>碎冰</>：<#ba.consume>消耗</>敌人<@ba.frozen>冻结</>状态，并造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_freeze_desc_2.en: To an enemy with active <@ba.frozen>Solidification</>, applying <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> or <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Statuses</> triggers <@ba.crystbreak>Shatter</>: <#ba.consume>Consumes</> the enemy's <@ba.frozen>Solidification</> and deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

guide_text_battle_freeze_desc_3.cn:
触发<@ba.frozen>冻结</>时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数越多，初始伤害越高，<@ba.frozen>冻结</>持续时间越长，<@ba.crystbreak>碎冰</>的伤害越高。
强制施加的<@ba.frozen>冻结</>不会有初始伤害。
guide_text_battle_freeze_desc_3.en: When triggering <@ba.frozen>Solidification</>, <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks deals higher DMG in the initial hit, extends the duration of <@ba.frozen>Solidification</>, and deals more DMG upon <@ba.crystbreak>Shatter</>. Forcibly applied <@ba.frozen>Solidification</> does not deal the initial hit of DMG.

guide_text_battle_frost_desc_1.cn:
液氮塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
液氮晶体命中后会使敌人<@gd.key>减缓行动速度</>。
guide_text_battle_frost_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, LN Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. LN crystals can <@gd.key>slow the movement</> of enemies hit.

guide_text_battle_knockback_desc_1.cn:
带有<@ba.crush>猛击</>的技能会使敌人<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会真正触发<@ba.crush>猛击</>的异常效果：<#ba.consume>消耗</>目标所有<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_knockback_desc_1.en: Skills with the <@ba.crush>Crush</> effect first make the enemy <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, such skills then apply the actual Physical Status of <@ba.crush>Crushed</>: <#ba.consume>Consumes</> all active <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks of the target to deal massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

guide_text_battle_knockback_desc_2.cn:
<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数越多，<@ba.crush>猛击</>的伤害越高。
先用<#ba.airborne>击飞</>、<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>叠加<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数，最后触发<@ba.crush>猛击</>，可以打出大量伤害。
guide_text_battle_knockback_desc_2.en: By <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, <@ba.crush>Crush</> can deal more DMG. Use skills with <#ba.airborne>Lift</> or <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> effect to add <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, then apply <@ba.crush>Crush</> to deal massive DMG.

guide_text_battle_knockdown_desc_1.cn:
带有倒地的技能会使敌人<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会真正触发<@ba.knockdown>倒地</>的异常效果：叠加一层<#ba.noguard>破防</>（最多4层），造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，累积一定<@ba.poise>失衡值</>，并将弱小的敌人击倒。
guide_text_battle_knockdown_desc_1.en: Skills with the Knock Down effect first make the enemy <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, such skills then apply the actual Physical Status of <@ba.knockdown>Knocked Down</>: Adds 1 more <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack (max: 4), deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and some <@ba.poise>Stagger</>, and knocks down weak enemies.

guide_text_battle_knockdown_desc_2.cn: 一些技能带有强制<@ba.knockdown>倒地</>：无论敌人是否<#ba.noguard>破防</>，直接触发<@ba.knockdown>倒地</>。
guide_text_battle_knockdown_desc_2.en: Some skills can forcibly apply <@ba.knockdown>Knock Down</>: Enemies are directly <@ba.knockdown>Knocked Down</> to the ground whether they are <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</> or not.

guide_text_battle_laser_desc_1.cn:
射线塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
射线对<@gd.key>单个敌人</>杀伤性大，能够造成高额<@gd.key>电磁伤害</>但攻击间隔较长。
guide_text_battle_laser_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Beam Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. Beam Towers deal massive <@gd.key>Electric DMG</> against <@gd.key>a single enemy</> but have a slow rate of fire.

guide_text_battle_levelup_desc.cn:
击败敌人后，编队中的干员可以获得经验、提升等级。
提升等级后，干员的基础属性与能力值会得到提升。
guide_text_battle_levelup_desc.en: Defeating enemies gives team operators EXP. With enough EXP, operators can level up and improve their base stats and attributes.

guide_text_battle_lightning_desc_1.cn:
电涌塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
电流命中敌人后会进行至多2次弹射，对目标附近的敌人也造成<@gd.key>电磁伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_lightning_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Surge Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. After hitting an enemy, the arc surge can chain up to 2 times and deal <@gd.key>Electric DMG</> to enemies near the target.

guide_text_battle_nature_desc_1.cn: 处于<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>时，会增加一层<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>，并受到<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_nature_desc_1.en: To an enemy with <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>, applying another <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> adds 1 more stack of <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> and deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>.

guide_text_battle_ope_combust_desc_1.cn:
一些敌人的技能会给干员施加<@ba.fire>灼热附着</>。
达到4层时，干员会进入<@ba.fire>燃烧</>状态：一段时间内，持续受到无视防御力的<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_ope_combust_desc_1.en: Certain enemy skills can apply stacks of <@ba.fire>Heat Infliction</> to operators. At 4 stacks, the operator becomes <@ba.fire>Combusted</>: Temporarily suffer continuous <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> that ignores DEF.

guide_text_battle_ope_conduct_desc_1.cn:
一些敌人的技能会给干员施加<@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>。
达到4层时，干员会进入<@ba.pulse>导电</>状态：短暂眩晕，且一段时间内，受到的<#ba.spelldmg>法术伤害</>提高。
guide_text_battle_ope_conduct_desc_1.en: Certain enemy skills can apply stacks of <@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</> to operators. At 4 stacks, the operator becomes <@ba.pulse>Electrified</>: Temporarily stunned and take more <#ba.spelldmg>Arts DMG</> for a certain duration.

guide_text_battle_ope_corrode_desc_1.cn:
一些敌人的技能会给干员施加<@ba.natur>自然附着</>。
达到4层时，干员会进入<@ba.natur>腐蚀</>状态：一段时间内无法冲刺，且移动速度降低。
guide_text_battle_ope_corrode_desc_1.en: Certain enemy skills can apply stacks of <@ba.natur>Nature Infliction</> to operators. At 4 stacks, the operator becomes <@ba.natur>Corroded</>: Cannot dash and suffer movement speed reduction for a certain duration.

guide_text_battle_ope_freeze_desc_1.cn:
一些敌人的技能会给干员施加<@ba.cryst>寒冷附着</>。
达到4层时，干员会进入<@ba.cryst>冻结</>状态：一段时间内无法行动。
guide_text_battle_ope_freeze_desc_1.en: Certain enemy skills can apply stacks of <@ba.cryst>Cryo Infliction</> to operators. At 4 stacks, the operator becomes <@ba.cryst>Solidified</>: Cannot move for a certain duration.

guide_text_battle_pulse_desc_1.cn: 处于<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>时，会增加一层<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>，并受到<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_pulse_desc_1.en: To an enemy with <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</>, applying another <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> adds 1 more stack of <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> and deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>.

guide_text_battle_shockwave_desc_1.cn:
全向声波塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
全向声波不造成伤害，命中后会使敌人<@gd.key>眩晕</>。
guide_text_battle_shockwave_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, the Omnidirectional Sonic Tower can automatically attack enemies within the area. The tower emits non-damaging sonic waves that <@gd.key>stun</> enemies they hit.

guide_text_battle_sniper_desc_1.cn:
哨戒塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
哨戒塔面对多名敌人时，会<@gd.key>优先攻击威胁更高的目标</>，敌人造成高额<@gd.key>物理伤害</>。
哨戒塔的攻击范围较大。
guide_text_battle_sniper_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Sentry Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. When facing multiple enemies, Sentry Towers will <@gd.key>first attack high threat targets</> and deal massive <@gd.key>Physical DMG</> to enemies. Sentry Towers also have a long attack range.

guide_text_battle_turret_2_desc_1.cn:
扩装铳械塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
扩装铳械塔每3次攻击后第4次会发射一枚<@gd.key>强力能量弹</>，对敌人造成<@gd.key>物理伤害</>。
guide_text_battle_turret_2_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Heavy Gun Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. Every 4th round fired by the Heavy Gun Tower is an <@gd.key>empowered energy bolt</> that deals <@gd.key>Physical DMG</> to enemies.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_1.cn: 接下来将介绍如何使用<@gd.key>传送带</>进行自动化生产。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_1.en: Time to learn how to use <@gd.key>transport belts</> to automate production.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_10.cn: 传送带具有<@gd.key>方向性</>，起点必须是物品的<@gd.key>出发地：次级核心</>，而终点必须是物品的<@gd.key>目的地：精炼炉</>。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_10.en: The transport belt is <@gd.key>directional</>. It must start from the <@gd.key>item source: Sub-PAC</> and end at the <@gd.key>item destination: Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_10_1.cn: 现在，精炼炉的输入口处已转换为<@gd.key>白色向内箭头</>，代表可以将传送带连入精炼炉中。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_10_1.en: Now, the Refining Unit input ports have been replaced with <@gd.key>white inward arrows</>, indicating that the transport belt can be connected to them.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_10_2.cn: 如地面上的引导线所示，成功放置传送带后，可将物品从次级核心取货口输入到精炼炉内。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_10_2.en: Follow the guiding line on the ground to place the transport belt. This moves items from the Sub-PAC output port to the input of the Refining Unit.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_11.cn: 现在请通过<@gd.key>移动并<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到精炼炉输入口的指示位置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_11.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3></> to move the indicator cone to the specified Refining Unit input port.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_11_ct.cn: 现在请通过<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到精炼炉输入口的指示位置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_11_ct.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to move the indicator cone to the specified Refining Unit input port.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_11_mb.cn: 现在请通过<@gd.key>移动并转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到精炼炉输入口的指示位置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_11_mb.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view</> to move the indicator cone to the specified Refining Unit input port.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_12.cn:
指示器移动到了正确位置，精炼炉此时也进入<@gd.key>选中并高亮</>状态，代表它是传送带的<@gd.key>终点</>。
<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>确认终点</>，即可<@gd.key>完成</>传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_12.en:
The indicator cone has been moved to the proper place and the Refining Unit has been <@gd.key>selected and highlighted</> to indicate that it is the <@gd.key>final destination</> of the transport belt. 
<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>Confirm Ending Point</> to <@gd.key>complete</> placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_12_ct.cn:
指示器移动到了正确位置，精炼炉此时也进入<@gd.key>选中并高亮</>状态，代表它是传送带的<@gd.key>终点</>。
再次按下<action=fac_build_confirm_belt_end>，即可<@gd.key>完成</>传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_12_ct.en:
The indicator cone has been moved to the proper place and the Refining Unit has been <@gd.key>selected and highlighted</> to indicate that it is the <@gd.key>final destination</> of the transport belt. 
Press <action=fac_build_confirm_belt_end> again to <@gd.key>complete</> the placement of the transport belt.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_12_mb.cn:
指示器移动到了正确位置，精炼炉此时也进入<@gd.key>选中并高亮</>状态，代表它是传送带的<@gd.key>终点</>。
点击<@gd.key>确认终点</>，即可<@gd.key>完成</>传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_12_mb.en:
The indicator cone has been moved to the proper place and the Refining Unit has been <@gd.key>selected and highlighted</> to indicate that it is the <@gd.key>final destination</> of the transport belt. 
Tap <@gd.key>Confirm Ending Point</> to <@gd.key>complete</> placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_13.cn: 现在，传送带已连接成功，可以看到，源矿正在持续从次级核心取货口<@gd.key>自动运输</>至精炼炉。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_13.en: Transport belt connection success. Originium Ore is now being <@gd.key>automatically transported</> from the Sub-PAC output port to the Refining Unit.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_14.cn: 精炼炉会用输入的源矿生产晶体外壳。下一步，需要把晶体外壳<@gd.key>运回仓库</>。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_14.en: The Refining Unit will use the Originium Ore arriving at its input port to produce Origocrusts. The next step is to <@gd.key>move the Origocrusts back to the Depot</>.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_2.cn: 观察次级核心取货口，这里出现了<@gd.key>向外的箭头</>，代表这里是<@gd.key>物流输出口</>。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_2.en: Observe the Sub-PAC output port. Note it has an <@gd.key>outward arrow</> to indicate that it is an <@gd.key>output port</> for transport and logistics purposes.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_3.cn: 另一侧的精炼炉的底座出现了<@gd.key>向内的箭头</>，代表这里是设备的<@gd.key>输入口</>。箭头的朝向都是<@gd.key>固定</>的。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_3.en: The Refining Unit nearby has <@gd.key>inward arrows</> at this side of its base. These mark the <@gd.key>input ports</> of the facility. The directions of these arrows are <@gd.key>fixed</>.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_4.cn: 将传送带从次级核心的<@gd.key>输出口</>连到精炼炉的<@gd.key>输入口</>中，就可以将刚才的源矿从<@gd.key>仓库</>自动输送进<@gd.key>精炼炉</>了。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_4.en: Connecting a transport belt from the Sub-PAC <@gd.key>output port</> to the Refining Unit <@gd.key>input port</> will automatically move the Originium Ore from the <@gd.key>Depot</> to the said <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5.cn: 工业模式下，按下快捷键<action=fac_use_quick_item_conveyer_belt>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击<@gd.key>传送带</>按钮，进入<@gd.key>传送带建造模式</>。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5.en: In AIC Mode, press the hotkey <action=fac_use_quick_item_conveyer_belt> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the <@gd.key>transport belt</> button to enter <@gd.key>transport belt placement mode</>.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5_1.cn: 可以看到地面上出现了红色的<@gd.key>锥形指示器</>。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5_1.en: A red <@gd.key>indicator cone</> has appeared on the ground.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5_1_mb.cn: 可以看到地面上出现了红色的<@gd.key>锥形指示器</>。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5_1_mb.en: A red <@gd.key>indicator cone</> has appeared on the ground.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5_ct.cn: 请按下<action=fac_use_quick_item_conveyer_belt>，进入<@gd.key>传送带建造模式</>。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5_ct.en: Press <action=fac_use_quick_item_conveyer_belt> to enter <@gd.key>transport belt placement mode</>.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5_mb.cn: 工业模式下，可以点击<@gd.key>传送带</>按钮，进入<@gd.key>传送带建造模式</>。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_5_mb.en: In AIC Mode, tap the <@gd.key>transport belt</> button to enter <@gd.key>transport belt placement mode</>.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_6.cn: 传送带需要从<@gd.key>物流输出口</>开始连接，无法在空地上放置，也不能在地面上的<@gd.key>红色叉形标记</><image="TermIcon/icon_term_ba_cross" scale=1.3>上放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_6.en: Transport belts must be first connected to an <@gd.key>output port</>. They cannot be placed on empty ground or grids marked with <@gd.key>red crosses</><image="TermIcon/icon_term_ba_cross" scale=1.3>.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_6_1.cn: 可以看到，场景中所有可以作为传送带起点的输出口都以地面上的<@gd.key>白色向外箭头</><image="Factory/Build/image_ui_build_exit_belt" width=40 height=40>表示。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_6_1.en: All output ports that can serve as a starting point for transport belts are marked by <@gd.key>white outward arrows</> <image="Factory/Build/image_ui_build_exit_belt" width=40 height=40> on the ground.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_6_mb.cn: 在指示器对准取货口后，<@gd.key>点击"确认"按键</>开始放置传送带，通过<@gd.key>移动并转动视角</>将虚影路径连接至传送带的终点处，<@gd.key>再次点击"确认"按键</>完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_6_mb.en: After moving the indicator cone at the output port, <@gd.key>tap the [Confirm] button </> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view</> to follow the guiding lines and connect the belt to the destination. Finally, <@gd.key>tap [Confirm] again</> to complete transport belt placement.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_7.cn: 现在，可以<@gd.key>移动角色并<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到次级核心取货口的指示位置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_7.en: Now <@gd.key>move the character and adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3></> to move the indicator cone to the specified Sub-PAC output port.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_7_ct.cn: 现在，可以<@gd.key>移动角色并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到次级核心取货口的指示位置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_7_ct.en: Now <@gd.key>move the character and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to move the indicator cone to the specified Sub-PAC output port.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_7_mb.cn: 现在，可以<@gd.key>移动角色并转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到次级核心取货口的指示位置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_7_mb.en: Now <@gd.key>move the character and adjust the view</> to move the indicator cone to the specified Sub-PAC output port.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_8.cn: 使用<@gd.key><image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3>点击</>，即可<@gd.key>开始</>传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_8.en: <@gd.key>Click <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3></> to <@gd.key>begin</> placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_8_ct.cn: 按下<action=fac_build_confirm_belt_start>，即可<@gd.key>开始</>传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_8_ct.en: Press <action=fac_build_confirm_belt_start> to <@gd.key>start</> placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_8_mb.cn: 点击<@gd.key>确认起点</>，即可<@gd.key>开始</>传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_8_mb.en: Tap <@gd.key>Confirm Starting Point</> to <@gd.key>start</> placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_9.cn: 可以看到次级核心已<@gd.key>选中并高亮</>，代表我们已开始从次级核心<@gd.key>开始</>连接传送带了。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_9.en: The Sub-PAC is <@gd.key>selected and highlighted</>, indicating that the transport belt connection has <@gd.key>begun</> at the Sub-PAC.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_hint_1.cn: <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>点击次级核心取货口</>作为传送带的起始点，通过<@gd.key>移动并<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角</>按指示线将虚影连接到精炼炉底座内，<@gd.key>再次点击</>完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_hint_1.en: <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>Click the Sub-PAC output port</> to make it the starting point of the transport belt, then <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3></> to follow the holographic indicators and connect the belt to the base of the Refining Unit. Finally, <@gd.key>click again</> to place the transport belt.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_hint_1_ct.cn: 将指示器移动至<@gd.key>次级核心取货口</>，<@gd.key>按下<action=fac_build_confirm></>开始放置传送带，通过<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>按指示线将虚影连接到精炼炉底座内，<@gd.key>再次按下<action=fac_build_confirm></>完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_hint_1_ct.en: Move the indicator cone to the <@gd.key>Sub-PAC output port</>, then <@gd.key>press <action=fac_build_confirm></> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to follow the guiding lines and connect the belt to the base of the Refining Unit. Finally, <@gd.key>press <action=fac_build_confirm> again</> to complete transport belt placement.

guide_text_belt1_e1m6_hint_1_mb.cn: 将指示器移动至<@gd.key>次级核心取货口</>，<@gd.key>点击"确认"按键</>开始放置传送带，通过<@gd.key>移动并转动视角</>按指示线将虚影连接到精炼炉底座内，<@gd.key>再次点击"确认"按键</>完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt1_e1m6_hint_1_mb.en: Move the indicator cone to the <@gd.key>Sub-PAC output port</>, then <@gd.key>tap the [Confirm] button</> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view</> to follow the guiding lines and connect the belt to the base of the Refining Unit. Finally, <@gd.key>tap [Confirm] again</> to complete transport belt placement.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_0.cn: 从精炼炉的<@gd.key>输出口</>开始放置传送带，可以将生产出的晶体外壳向外输送。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_0.en: Start placing the transport belt at the Refining Unit <@gd.key>output port</> to move the Origocrusts produced from the facility.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_1.cn: 现在，请通过<@gd.key>移动并<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到精炼炉输出口的指定位置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_1.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3></> to move the indicator cone to the specified Refining Unit output port.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_1_ct.cn: 现在，请通过<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到精炼炉输出口的指定位置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_1_ct.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to move the indicator cone to the specified Refining Unit output port.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_1_mb.cn: 现在，请通过<@gd.key>移动并转动视角</>，将锥型指示器移动到精炼炉输出口的指定位置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_1_mb.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view</> to move the indicator cone to the specified Refining Unit output port.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_2.cn: 精炼炉也已进入<@gd.key>白色高亮</>状态，意味着精炼炉将作为传送带的<@gd.key>起点</>。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_2.en: The Refining Unit is now <@gd.key>white and highlighted</> to indicate that it is the <@gd.key>starting point</> of the transport belt.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_2_1.cn: 锥形指示器已对准精炼炉的<@gd.key>输出口</>，使用<@gd.key><image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3>点击</>，开始传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_2_1.en: The indicator cone is now at the Refining Unit <@gd.key>output port</>. <@gd.key>Click <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3></> to begin placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_2_1_ct.cn: 锥形指示器已对准精炼炉的<@gd.key>输出口</>，按下<action=fac_build_confirm>，开始传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_2_1_ct.en: The indicator cone is now at the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> output port. Press <action=fac_build_confirm> to begin placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_2_1_mb.cn: 锥形指示器已对准精炼炉的<@gd.key>输出口</>，点击<@gd.key>确认起点</>，开始传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_2_1_mb.en: The indicator cone is now at the Refining Unit <@gd.key>output port</>. Tap <@gd.key>Confirm Starting Point</> to start placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3.cn: 现在，请通过<@gd.key>移动并<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角</>，将锥形指示器移动到<@gd.key>次级核心的输入口</>。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3></> to move the indicator cone to the specified <@gd.key>Sub-PAC input port</>.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3_1.cn: 使用传送带将物品输送回次级核心，物品就会<@gd.key>存入仓库</>。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3_1.en: Use the transport belt to move the products back to the Sub-PAC and automatically <@gd.key>store them in the Depot</>.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3_2.cn: 我们需要从精炼炉的<@gd.key>输出口</>开始，将传送带连接回次级核心。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3_2.en: Starting from the Refining Unit <@gd.key>output port</>, we must connect the other end of the transport belt to the Sub-PAC.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3_ct.cn: 现在，请通过<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，将锥形指示器移动到<@gd.key>次级核心的输入口</>。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3_ct.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to move the indicator cone to the specified <@gd.key>Sub-PAC input port</>.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3_mb.cn: 现在，请通过<@gd.key>移动并转动视角</>，将锥形指示器移动到<@gd.key>次级核心的输入口</>。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_3_mb.en: Now <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with </> to move the indicator cone to the specified <@gd.key>Sub-PAC input port</>.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_4.cn: <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>确认终点</>，完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_4.en: <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>Confirm Ending Point</> to complete placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_4_ct.cn: <@gd.key>再次按下<action=fac_build_confirm></>，完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_4_ct.en: <@gd.key>Press <action=fac_build_confirm> again</> to complete placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_4_mb.cn: 点击<@gd.key>确认终点</>，完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_4_mb.en: Tap <@gd.key>Confirm Ending Point</> to complete placing the transport belt.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_5.cn: 晶体外壳将被输送回仓库。请使用<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_esc_and_right_mouse" scale=1.3>退出传送带的放置，并打开<@gd.key>精炼炉</>的面板。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_5.en: The Origocrusts are being moved back to the Depot. Use <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_esc_and_right_mouse" scale=1.3> to exit transport belt placement mode, then open the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> panel.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_5_ct.cn: 晶体外壳将被输送回仓库。请按下<action=fac_build_cancel_alter>退出传送带的放置，并打开<@gd.key>精炼炉</>的面板。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_5_ct.en: The Origocrusts are being moved back to the Depot. Press <action=fac_build_cancel_alter> to exit transport belt placement mode, and open the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> panel.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_5_mb.cn: 晶体外壳将被输送回仓库。请点击<@gd.key>取消</>，退出传送带的放置，并打开<@gd.key>精炼炉</>的面板。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_5_mb.en: The Origocrusts are being moved back to the Depot. Tap <@gd.key>Cancel</> to exit transport belt placement mode, and open the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> panel.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint2_1.cn: 通过<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>点击地面</>选择传送带的起始点，<@gd.key>移动并<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角</>可将虚影路径连接至传送带的终点处，<@gd.key>再次点击地面</>完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint2_1.en: <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse0" scale=1.3><@gd.key>Tap the ground</> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3></> to draw out the belt to a desired destination, then <@gd.key>tap the ground again</> to place it.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint2_1_ct.cn: 通过按下<action=fac_build_confirm>选择传送带的起始点，<@gd.key>移动并转动视角</>可将虚影路径连接至传送带的终点处，<@gd.key>再次按下<action=fac_build_confirm></>完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint2_1_ct.en: Press <action=fac_build_confirm> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view</> to draw out the belt to a desired destination, then <@gd.key>press <action=fac_build_confirm> again</> to place it.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint2_1_mb.cn: <@gd.key>点击"确认"按键</>开始放置传送带，通过<@gd.key>移动并转动视角</>可将虚影路径连接至传送带的终点处，<@gd.key>再次点击"确认"按键</>完成传送带的放置。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint2_1_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap the [Confirm] button </> to start placing the transport belt. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view</> to follow the guiding lines and connect the belt to the destination. Finally, <@gd.key>tap [Confirm] again</> to complete transport belt placement.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint_1.cn: 这样一条完整的产线就建设好了，请使用<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_esc_and_right_mouse" scale=1.3>退出传送带的放置，打开<@gd.key>精炼炉</>的面板。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint_1.en: The production line is now complete. Use <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_esc_and_right_mouse" scale=1.3> to exit transport belt placement mode, then open the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> panel.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint_1_ct.cn: 这样一条完整的产线就建设好了，请按下<action=fac_build_cancel_alter>退出传送带的放置，打开<@gd.key>精炼炉</>的面板。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint_1_ct.en: The production line is now complete. Press <action=fac_build_cancel_alter> to exit transport belt placement mode, then open the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> panel.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint_1_mb.cn: 这样一条完整的产线就建设好了。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint_1_mb.en: This creates a complete production line.

guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint_2_mb.cn: 请<@gd.key>点击“取消”按键</>退出传送带的放置，打开<@gd.key>精炼炉</>的面板。
guide_text_belt2_e1m6_hint_2_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap the [Cancel] button</> to exit transport belt placement mode, then open the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> panel.

guide_text_belt_delete_hint.cn: 如果需要调整传送带，可点击此处，<@gd.key>收纳整段产线</>。
guide_text_belt_delete_hint.en: To edit the transport belt, click here to <@gd.key>stash the entire length of the belt</>.

guide_text_belt_delete_hint_ct.cn: 如果需要调整传送带，可按下<action=common_controller_side_menu>打开快捷功能，<@gd.key>收纳整段产线</>。
guide_text_belt_delete_hint_ct.en: To edit the transport belt, press <action=common_controller_side_menu> to open Quick Action and <@gd.key>stash the entire length of the belt</>.

guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_1.cn: 传送带是一种基础物流设备，作用是在设备间运输各种材料，只限定在<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>中才可以建设传送带。
guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_1.en: Transport belts are basic logistics units. They are used to move materials and products between facilities. Transport belts can only be placed in the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</>.

guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_2.cn: 在集成核心区域点击传送带按钮开始放置传送带，点击地面或任意拥有输入输出口设备的输出输入口，可以规划出传送带的方向和路线。
guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_2.en: Click the transport belt button at the Core AIC Area to start placing transport belts. Click on the ground, facility outputs, or facility inputs to determine the directions of the transport belt and plan its route.

guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_3.cn: 放置传送带时，设备的输入口与取货口的物流方向会用明显的箭头标出。传送带的起点必须是设备或者已放置的传送带。
guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_3.en: When placing transport belts, the input and output ports of facilities will be marked with conspicuous arrows. Any transport belt must start from a facility or another transport belt already placed.

guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_4.cn:
工业设备的操作面板上也可查看传送带的物流信息。
左侧表示设备的<@gd.key>输入口</>以及传送带自动<@gd.key>输入</>的材料情况。
右侧表示设备的<@gd.key>取货口</>以及传送带自动<@gd.key>输出</>的产物情况。
guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_4.en: The control panels of AIC Factory facilities also show their logistics info. The LEFT side represents the facility's <@gd.key>input ports</> and auto-<@gd.key>loading</> of materials from incoming transport belts. The RIGHT side shows the facility's <@gd.key>output ports</> and auto-<@gd.key>unloading</> of products to outgoing transport belts.

guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_5.cn: 当出现阻塞情况时，物品将停止输入设备或从设备输出，操作面板下方会出现阻塞警示。
guide_text_belt_e1m6_limited_5.en: When a facility is clogged, the facility will stop loading materials or unloading products. The bottom part of control panel will also display warning signs that the facility is clogged.

guide_text_blackbox_1_complete_1.cn: 所有模拟目标达成后，此处会显示为完成状态。
guide_text_blackbox_1_complete_1.en: When all simulation goals are completed, the completed status will be shown here.

guide_text_blackbox_1_complete_2.cn: 按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击<@gd.key>完成模拟</>按钮，或使用快捷键<action=common_open_watch>都可以完成模拟。
guide_text_blackbox_1_complete_2.en: Hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the <@gd.key>End SIM</> button, or press the hotkey <action=common_open_watch> to complete the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_1_complete_2_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_open_watch>即可完成并退出模拟。
guide_text_blackbox_1_complete_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_watch> to complete and exit the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_1_complete_2_mb.cn: 点击<@gd.key>完成模拟</>按钮即可完成并退出模拟。
guide_text_blackbox_1_complete_2_mb.en: Tap the <@gd.key>End SIM</> button to complete and exit the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_1.cn: <@gd.key>工业设备</>可对不同原料进行加工，用以生产各类工业材料和成品。精炼炉对应<@gd.key>精炼</>这一加工方式。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_1.en: <@gd.key>AIC facilities</> can process different raw materials to produce various factory goods and products. The Refining Unit processes materials by <@gd.key>refining</> them.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_10.cn: 接下来请前往<@gd.key>粉碎机</>处，生产修复所需的<@gd.key>源石粉末</>材料。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_10.en: Next, go to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Originium Powder</> needed to repair our production line.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_1_1.cn: 这里显示了当前背包中可用的材料，可以看到我们现在有一批<@gd.key>源矿</>可用于加工。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_1_1.en: This shows the usable materials in the current Backpack. There is a batch of <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> that can be used for production.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_1_2.cn: 将合适的材料放入不同设备进行加工，便可生产出不同的产物。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_1_2.en: Place the right materials in the facility and it will process them into various products.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_2.cn: 我们需要生产<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>来修复中继器。本次模拟中该设备已设定只能使用这一<@gd.key>生产配方</>。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_2.en: We must produce some <@gd.key>Origocrusts</> to fix this Relay Tower. The facility of this simulation can only use this <@gd.key>production formula</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_3.cn: 可以看到，每1份<@gd.key>源矿</>原料，
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_3.en: This shows that each unit of the raw material, <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>,

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_4.en: can be processed for a certain time,

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_5.cn: 可精炼为1份<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>产物。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_5.en: and give the refined product: 1 unit of <@gd.key>Origocrust</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_6.cn: 现在将<@gd.key>源矿</>从背包拖入精炼炉中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_6.en: Let's drag the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> from the Backpack into the Refining Unit for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_6_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>将原料放入精炼炉中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_6_1_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to place the raw materials into the Refining Unit for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_6_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to perform actions on the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_7.cn: 精炼炉已经开始运转了，加工需要耗费一点时间，让我们等它生产3份晶体外壳。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_7.en: The Refining Unit is doing its job. Processing will take a while. Let's wait till 3 units of Origocrust are produced.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_8.cn: 加工的产物会已经自动存放在了缓存区中，点击按钮进行收取吧。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_8.en: The products will be automatically placed in the facility's cache. Click the button to take them.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_8_ct.cn: 加工的产物会已经自动存放在了缓存区中，按下<action=common_function_btn_1>进行收取吧。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_8_ct.en: The products will be automatically placed in the facility's cache. Press <action=common_function_btn_1> to gather them.

guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_9.cn: 点击关闭按钮退出界面。
guide_text_blackbox_1_furance_9.en: Click the close button to close the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_1.cn: 粉碎机对应<@gd.key>粉碎</>这一加工方式，本次模拟中该设备已设定只能使用<@gd.key>源石粉末</>配方。
guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_1.en: The Shredding Unit processes materials by <@gd.key>shredding</> them. The facility of this simulation can only use the <@gd.key>Originium Powder</> formula.

guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_2.cn: 在这里可以看到，每份<@gd.key>源矿</>可以粉碎为1份<@gd.key>源石粉末</>。
guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_2.en: Each unit of <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> can be shredded into 1 unit of <@gd.key>Originium Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_3.cn: 现在就参照刚刚的方式，将<@gd.key>源矿</>从背包拖入到<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中进行加工吧。
guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_3.en: Refer to what we did in the previous steps and drag the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> from the Backpack into the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_4.cn: 请等粉碎机进行生产，我们需要3份<@gd.key>源石粉末</>来进行修复。
guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_4.en: Let the Shredding Unit process the materials. We need 3 units of <@gd.key>Originium Powder</> for the repair job.

guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_5.cn: 生产完成了，点击按钮进行收取吧。
guide_text_blackbox_1_grinder_5.en: Production complete. Click the button to claim the products.

guide_text_blackbox_1_ore_1.cn: 很好，有了源矿作为原料，我们就可以使用工业设备来加工获取修复所需的材料了。
guide_text_blackbox_1_ore_1.en: Great. We can use AIC facilities to process Originium Ore into products we need for repairing things.

guide_text_blackbox_1_ore_2.cn: 接下来请前往<@gd.key>精炼炉</>处，生产修复所需的<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。
guide_text_blackbox_1_ore_2.en: Now let's go to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and produce the <@gd.key>Origocrust</> we need for the repair.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_1.cn: 中继器需要修复才能恢复电力传输功能。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_1.en: The Relay Tower must be repaired so that it can start transmitting power once more.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_2.cn: 在这里可以看到，修复中继器需要用到3份<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>和3份<@gd.key>源石粉末</>
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_2.en: This shows that repairing the Relay Tower requires 3 units of <@gd.key>Origocrust</> and 3 units of <@gd.key>Originium Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3.cn: 这些材料都可由<@gd.key>源矿</>经<@gd.key>工业设备</>加工获得。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3.en: These materials can be acquired by processing <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> with the right <@gd.key>AIC facilities</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3_1.cn: 请点击材料图标查看它的详细信息。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3_1.en: Click the icon of a material to view its details.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_focus_on_item_list>查看物品的详细信息。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_focus_on_item_list> to view details of the item.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3_2.cn: 晶体外壳是一种常用的工业材料。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3_2.en: Origocrust is a common type of factory goods.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3_3.cn: 它可以通过将<@gd.key>源矿</>放入<@gd.key>精炼炉</>来加工获取。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_3_3.en: It is a processed product made by placing <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> in a <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_4.cn: 请点击关闭按钮退出界面。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_4.en: Click the close button to close the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_5.cn: 看，这附近就分布了一些源矿，攻击这些晶体就可以进行采集。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_5.en: Look. There are some Originium Ore formations nearby. Attack and break them up into gatherable bits.

guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_6.cn: 现在就先来采集一些源矿作为原料吧。
guide_text_blackbox_1_powerpole_6.en: Now let's gather some Originium Ore for raw materials.

guide_text_blackbox_1_restart_1.cn: 如果不小心将耗尽了材料不知道如何继续的话。
guide_text_blackbox_1_restart_1.en: When running out of raw materials or feeling stuck,

guide_text_blackbox_1_restart_2.cn: 可以按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处的<@gd.key>重置</>按钮来重新开始模拟。
guide_text_blackbox_1_restart_2.en: Hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the <@gd.key>Reset</> button here to restart the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_1_restart_2_mb.cn: 可以点击此处的<@gd.key>重置</>按钮来重新开始模拟。
guide_text_blackbox_1_restart_2_mb.en: Tap the <@gd.key>Reset</> button here to restart the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_1_restart_3.cn: 这边的储存箱中也备有更多<@gd.key>源矿</>，可以前往取用。
guide_text_blackbox_1_restart_3.en: This Stash also contains plenty of <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> that can be used.

guide_text_blackbox_1_start_1.cn: 欢迎来到<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。塔卫二分布着很多这样的空间，在其中可以学习集成工业系统的基本操作。
guide_text_blackbox_1_start_1.en: Welcome to the <@gd.key>simulation</>. These VR spaces are scattered across Talos-II and teach the basics of using the AIC Factory.

guide_text_blackbox_1_start_2.cn: 在模拟空间中，背包、仓库以及设备与外部世界中的<@gd.key>不共通</>，但在这里学到的知识同样适用于外界。
guide_text_blackbox_1_start_2.en: Simulations have their own set of Backpack and Depot items as well as facilities <@gd.key>not shared</> with those in the real world. However, the lessons and tricks learned in simulations are also useful outside.

guide_text_blackbox_1_start_3.cn: 在这里可以查看当前模拟空间的<@gd.key>模拟目标</>。
guide_text_blackbox_1_start_3.en: This shows the <@gd.key>goals</> of the current simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_1_start_4.cn: 达成<@gd.key>主要模拟目标</>后可完成模拟并获得相应的奖励，详细信息可点击<action=common_open_watch>进行查看。
guide_text_blackbox_1_start_4.en: Finish the <@gd.key>main goals</> to complete the simulation and collect rewards. Click <action=common_open_watch> for more details.

guide_text_blackbox_1_start_5.cn: 在本次模拟中，此<@gd.key>中继器</>的故障导致矿场出现了断电问题，我们需要<@gd.key>修复</>它来恢复电力。
guide_text_blackbox_1_start_5.en: This simulation has experienced a mining site power outage as the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> is broken. We must <@gd.key>fix</> the Relay Tower to restore power to the place.

guide_text_blackbox_1_start_6.cn: 请前往此处与<@gd.key>中继器</>交互查看它的损坏情况。
guide_text_blackbox_1_start_6.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> and interact with it to view its damages.

guide_text_blackbox_1_step0_1.cn: 请与<@gd.key>中继器</>交互查看它的损坏情况。
guide_text_blackbox_1_step0_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> to view its damages.

guide_text_blackbox_1_step0_2.cn: 请通过攻击采集获取6个<@gd.key>源矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_1_step0_2.en: Attack and gather 6 units of <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_step1_1.cn: 请前往<@gd.key>精炼炉</>处，生产修复所需的<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>材料。
guide_text_blackbox_1_step1_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and produce the <@gd.key>Origocrust</> required for the repairs.

guide_text_blackbox_1_step2_1.cn: 请将<@gd.key>源矿</>放入<@gd.key>粉碎机</>加工，并收取3份<@gd.key>源石粉末</>。
guide_text_blackbox_1_step2_1.en: Place <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> in the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> for processing and take 3 units of <@gd.key>Originium Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_1_step3_1.cn: 请前往<@gd.key>粉碎机</>处，生产修复所需的<@gd.key>源石粉末</>材料。
guide_text_blackbox_1_step3_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> and produce the <@gd.key>Originium Powder</> required for the repairs.

guide_text_blackbox_1_step4_1.cn: 所需的材料已经备齐了，请前往<@gd.key>损坏的中继器</>处对其进行修复。
guide_text_blackbox_1_step4_1.en: We have all the materials needed for the repair. Go to the <@gd.key>damaged Relay Tower</> to fix it.

guide_text_blackbox_1_step5_1.cn: 模拟目标已达成，请点击<@gd.key>完成模拟</>按钮，或使用快捷键<action=common_open_watch>完成模拟。
guide_text_blackbox_1_step5_1.en: Simulation goals completed. Click the <@gd.key>End SIM</> button, or press the hotkey <action=common_open_watch> to complete the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_1.cn: <@gd.key>晶体外壳粉末</>可由晶体外壳在<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中加工得来。
guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_1.en: <@gd.key>Origocrust Powder</> can be made by processing Origocrust with the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_2.cn: 可以打开对应设备查看<@gd.key>生产配方</>。
guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_2.en: Interact with the facility to view the <@gd.key>production formula</>.

guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_3.cn: 可以先将源石运输到精炼炉中生成晶体外壳；再将晶体外壳运输至粉碎机中生成晶体外壳粉末。
guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_3.en: Transport Originium Ore to the Refining Unit to make Origocrust, then move the Origocrust to the Shredding Unit to make Origocrust Powder.

guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_4.cn: 最后将晶体外壳粉末运输至高亮的目标储存箱中。通电的储存箱可将产物无线传输回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_4.en: Finally, transport the Origocrust Powder to the highlighted target stash. The powered stash will use belt-free transfer to move its contents to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_5.cn: 记得使用供电桩给精炼炉、粉碎机、高亮的储存箱供电！使用尽量少的供电桩可以完成附加奖励目标！
guide_text_blackbox_3_grinder_5.en: Remember, the Refining Unit, Shredding Unit, and highlighted stash must be powered with the Electric Pylon! Use as few Electric Pylons as possible to complete the bonus goal and earn more rewards!

guide_text_blackbox_3_step1_1.cn: 请使用传送带连接各设备，形成荞花粉末产线。最后存入<@gd.key>高光的储物箱</>。
guide_text_blackbox_3_step1_1.en: Connect the facilities with transport belts to create a Buckflower Powder production line, and move the product to the <@gd.key>highlighted stash</>.

guide_text_blackbox_3_step2_1.cn: 请使用传送带连接各设备，形成晶体外壳粉末产线。最后存入<@gd.key>高光的储物箱</>。记得要放置供电桩给设备通电！
guide_text_blackbox_3_step2_1.en: Connect the facilities with transport belts to create an Origocrust Powder production line, then move the product to the <@gd.key>highlighted stash</>. Don't forget to place Electric Pylons for powering the facilities!

guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_0.cn: 主要目标达成了！本次模拟还有一个<@gd.key>附加目标</>，一起来看一下吧。
guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_0.en: Main goals completed! This simulation also has a <@gd.key>bonus goal</>. Let's take a look.

guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_1.cn: <@gd.key>附加目标</>不影响模拟的完成，但如果能够同时达成，还可获得额外的<@gd.key>附加目标奖励</>。
guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_1.en: The <@gd.key>bonus goal</> will not affect the completion of the simulation, but completing it gives <@gd.key>bonus goal rewards</>.

guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_2.cn: 想要运输更多源矿到仓库，需要先从附近的<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>中手动收取源矿到背包中。
guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_2.en: To move more Originium Ore to the Depot, Originium Ore must be manually moved from the <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</> to the Backpack.

guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_3.cn: 再与已通电的<@gd.key>协议储存箱</>交互，将源矿从背包拖入储存箱中进行无线传输。
guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_3.en: Next, interact with a powered <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> and move the Originium Ore from the Backpack into the Stash for belt-free transfer.

guide_text_blackbox_4_extra_4.cn: 有兴趣的话就来试一试吧。

guide_text_blackbox_4_hint_1.cn: 不小心将供电桩无线传输回了仓库，无法为其他储存箱供电怎么办？
guide_text_blackbox_4_hint_1.en: An Electric Pylon has been accidentally moved back to the Depot by belt-free transfer. These Stashes have no power. What should we do?

guide_text_blackbox_4_hint_2.cn: 别担心，将其他协议储存箱移动到现有<@gd.key>供电桩的供电范围</>内同样可以进行供电。
guide_text_blackbox_4_hint_2.en: Don't worry. Move the other Protocol Stash to the <@gd.key>power supply radius of the existing Electric Pylon</> to power it.

guide_text_blackbox_4_hint_3.cn: 此外还可以通过<@gd.key>重置</>按钮重新开始模拟。
guide_text_blackbox_4_hint_3.en: The <@gd.key>Reset</> button can also be used to restart the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_4_power_1.cn: 在非集成核心区域放置<@gd.key>供电桩</>时，供电桩不会自动连电。
guide_text_blackbox_4_power_1.en: <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> placed outside the Core AIC Area cannot supply power immediately.

guide_text_blackbox_4_power_2.cn: 请前往<@gd.key>中继器</>处，选择<@gd.key>开始电力运输</>，再返回供电桩处<@gd.key>完成电力运输</>，以将其接入电网。
guide_text_blackbox_4_power_2.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> and select <@gd.key>Start Transmission</> to start pulling a power transmission cable, then go to the Electric Pylon, then select the <@gd.key>Plug Transmission Cable</> to complete the power transmission and connect it into the power grid.

guide_text_blackbox_4_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议储存箱</>的<@gd.key>无线传输</>功能可以将物品远程送回协议核心仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_4_start_1.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> can use <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</> to teleport items to the PAC Depot directly.

guide_text_blackbox_4_start_2.cn: 请与此<@gd.key>已通电的协议储存箱</>交互，了解<@gd.key>无线传输功能</>的使用方法。
guide_text_blackbox_4_start_2.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>powered Protocol Stash</> to learn how to use <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</>.

guide_text_blackbox_4_step1_1.cn: 请与此<@gd.key>协议储存箱</>交互，查看<@gd.key>无线传输功能</>的使用方法。
guide_text_blackbox_4_step1_1.en: Interact with this <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> to see how to use <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</>.

guide_text_blackbox_4_step2_1.cn: 请在这批协议储存箱附近放置<@gd.key>供电桩</>进行供电。
guide_text_blackbox_4_step2_1.en: Place an <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> near these Protocol Stashes to power them.

guide_text_blackbox_4_step3_1.cn: 请通过中继器和供电桩为<@gd.key>协议储存箱</>供电，再启动<@gd.key>无线传输模式</>将源矿运回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_4_step3_1.en: Use the Relay Tower and the Electric Pylon to power the <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</>, then activate <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</> to move Originium Ore to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议储存箱</>可以用来存放物品，这里可以看到这个储物箱已经装满了源矿。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_1.en: <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> can be used for storing items. Here, we can see that this Stash is filled with Originium Ore.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_10.cn: 这里可以看到<@gd.key>源矿</>已经被无线传输到<@gd.key>本地仓储</>之中了。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_10.en: Here we can see that <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> is moved to the <@gd.key>local depot</> via belt-free transfer.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_12.cn: 接下来我们只要为各协议储存箱供电并启动<@gd.key>无线传输</>功能，就可以将所有源矿运回仓库了。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_12.en: Now we'll just have to power all the Protocol Stashes and activate their <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</> functions to move all the Originium Ore to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_13.cn: <@gd.key>供电桩</>在接入电网后可以为其附近的设备供电。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_13.en: An <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> connected to the power grid can supply power to nearby facilities.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_14.cn: 下面就使用<@gd.key>供电桩</>为协议储存箱供电，再启动<@gd.key>无线传输模式</>，将所有源矿运回仓库吧。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_14.en: Let's use the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to power the Protocol Stash, then activate <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</> to move the Originium Ore to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_2.cn: 这里显示了当前协议储存箱的运转模式，在<@gd.key>仓储模式</>下，物品会正常存储，不会进行传输。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_2.en: This shows the current operational status of the Protocol Stash. In <@gd.key>Storage Mode</>, the Protocol Stash will hold on to its contents instead of transferring them to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_3.cn: 请点击这里更改模式，将其切换到<@gd.key>无线传输模式</>以启用自动传输功能。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_3.en: Click here to change its mode to <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</> and activate this auto-transport feature.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_3_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>将其切换到<@gd.key>无线传输模式</>以启用自动传输功能。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_3_1_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to switch to <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</> and activate this auto-transport feature.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_3_ct.en: Press <action=common_controller_side_menu> to expand the facility's <@gd.key>Quick Action</>.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_4.cn: 在<@gd.key>无线传输模式</>下，<@gd.key>已通电</>的协议储存箱可以将其内部存放的物品远程传输到<@gd.key>协议核心仓库</>
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_4.en: In <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</> mode, the <@gd.key>powered</> Protocol Stash will teleport its contents to the <@gd.key>PAC Depot</>.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_5.cn: 无线传输每隔一段时间会自动进行一次，这里可以看到它下次传输的倒计时。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_5.en: Belt-free transfer is automatically performed at regular intervals. This shows the countdown to the next transfer.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_6.cn: 倒计时结束后，储存箱内部存放的物品会全部无线传输到仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_6.en: Once the countdown ends, all items in the Protocol Stash will be teleported directly to the Depot via belt-free transfer.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_8.cn: 请按下<action=fac_open_hub_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开协议核心面板查看仓库信息。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_8.en: Press <action=fac_open_hub_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) panel and view the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_8_1_ct.cn: 请请按下<action=common_toggle_group_down>打开协议核心面板查看仓库信息。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_8_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_toggle_group_down> to open the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) panel and view the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_8_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_8_mb.cn: 请点击此处打开协议核心面板查看仓库信息。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_8_mb.en: Tap here to open the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) panel and view the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_9.cn: 储物箱在开启无线传输后<@gd.key>每隔一段时间</>都会自动将内部的物品传输回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_4_storager_9.en: After belt-free transfer is switched on, the Stash will automatically move its contents to the Depot at a <@gd.key>fixed interval</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_1.cn: 很好，电驱矿机已经将开采的紫晶矿无线传输回仓库了。
guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_1.en: Great. The Electric Mining Rigs are moving the mined Amethyst Ore to the Depot via belt-free transfer.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_2.cn: 请按下<action=fac_open_hub_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开协议核心面板查看仓储信息。
guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_2.en: Press <action=fac_open_hub_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the PAC screen to view the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_2_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_toggle_group_down>打开协议核心面板查看仓储信息。
guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_2_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_toggle_group_down> to open PAC panel to view storage information.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_2_mb.cn: 请点击此处打开协议核心面板查看仓储信息。
guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_2_mb.en: Tap here to open the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) details panel to view storage management.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_3.cn: 电驱矿机在运转后<@gd.key>每隔一段时间</>都会自动将开采的矿物无线传输回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_3.en: The Electric Mining Rig will automatically move mined ores to the Depot via belt-free transfer on a <@gd.key>regular interval</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_4.cn: 这里可以看到我们刚刚开采的<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>已经被传输到了<@gd.key>本地仓储</>之中。
guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_4.en: Here, we can see the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> we mined being teleported to the <@gd.key>local depot</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_5.cn: 参照这一方式在更多矿点放置电驱矿机就可以实现矿物的自动开采和传输了。
guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_5.en: Use this method to place Electric Mining Rigs on additional mining spots to achieve automated ore mining and transport.

guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_7.cn: 接下来请使用<@gd.key>滑索</>返回集成核心区对这批开采到的紫晶矿进行加工吧。
guide_text_blackbox_5_bag_7.en: Next, let's use the <@gd.key>zipline</> to return to the Core AIC Area and process the Amethyst Ore we just mined.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extra_1.cn: 本次模拟还有一个<@gd.key>附加目标</>，一起来看一下吧。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extra_1.en: This simulation also has a <@gd.key>bonus goal</>. Let's take a look.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extra_2.cn: <@gd.key>附加目标</>不影响模拟的完成，但如果能够同时达成，还可获得额外的<@gd.key>附加目标奖励</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extra_2.en: The <@gd.key>bonus goal</> will not affect the completion of the simulation, but completing it gives <@gd.key>bonus goal rewards</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extra_3.cn: 本次模拟的附加目标需要我们开采源矿并将其运回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extra_3.en: The bonus goal of this simulation requires us to mine Originium Ore and transfer the mined ore back to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extra_4.cn: 请<@gd.key>返回矿区</>参照刚刚的方式使用<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>来进行<@gd.key>源矿</>的自动开采和传输吧。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extra_4.en: <@gd.key>Return to the mining area</> and use the same method to automatically mine and transfer <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> with <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extramine_1.cn: 电驱矿机同样可以用来开采源矿。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extramine_1.en: Electric Mining Rigs can also be used for mining Originium Ore.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extramine_2.cn: 将源矿点上的<@gd.key>便携便携源石矿机</>收纳，并在上面放置新的<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extramine_2.en: Stash the <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rigs</> from the Originium Ore mining spots, then place the new <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</> on them.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extramine_3.cn: 再使用<@gd.key>供电桩</>为电驱矿机供电即可实现源矿的<@gd.key>自动开采和传输</>，感兴趣的话就来试试吧。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extramine_3.en: Then place <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> to power the Electric Mining Rigs to achieve <@gd.key>auto-mining and transfer</> of the Originium Ore.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extrastep_0.cn: 请先使用<@gd.key>滑索</>返回矿区。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extrastep_0.en: Use the <@gd.key>zipline</> to return to the mining area.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extrastep_1.cn: 附加目标需要我们前往源矿点处放置电驱矿机。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extrastep_1.en: The bonus goal requires us to place Electric Mining Rigs on the Originium Ore mining spots.

guide_text_blackbox_5_extrastep_3.cn: 电驱矿机<@gd.key>每隔一段时间</>会自动将开采的矿物送回仓库。在源矿点上放置<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>并<@gd.key>供电</>后还请稍等一会。
guide_text_blackbox_5_extrastep_3.en: The Electric Mining Rig will, <@gd.key>on a regular basis</>, automatically move mined ores to the Depot via belt-free transfer. After placing an <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> on an Originium Ore mining spot and <@gd.key>powering</> it, wait a while before the mined ore arrives at the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_1.cn: 电驱矿机可以自动开采矿石并存入缓存区。
guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_1.en: The Electric Mining Rig will automatically mine ores and store them in its cache.

guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_2.cn: <@gd.key>通电后</>每隔一段时间，缓存区的矿石会自动<@gd.key>无线传输回仓库</>，为协议核心提供对应矿物的产能。
guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_2.en: When <@gd.key>powered</>, ores in the cache will be automatically <@gd.key>moved to the Depot via belt-free transfer</> on a regular interval, adding ore production to the PAC.

guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_3.cn: 要想让电驱矿机运转起来，就需要用<@gd.key>供电桩</>来为其供电。
guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_3.en: Use <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> to power Electric Mining Rigs and make them mine the ores.

guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the control panel.

guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_5.cn: 可以看到矿场内还分布了一些<@gd.key>紫晶矿点</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_5.en: This mining site has several <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore mining spots</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_6.cn: 接下来，请在各矿点上放置<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_6.en: The next step is to place <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</> on each mining spot.

guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_7.cn: 并在附近放置<@gd.key>供电桩</>，以为其提供电力。
guide_text_blackbox_5_miner_7.en: Place an <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> nearby to power the rigs.

guide_text_blackbox_5_oreminer_1.cn: 便携源石矿机只能通过手动的方式运输矿石，将其替换为电驱矿机可以大幅提升获取源矿的效率。
guide_text_blackbox_5_oreminer_1.en: Originium Ore mined by Portable Originium Rigs must be manually moved out of its cache. Replace them with Electric Mining Rigs to increase the efficiency of Originium Ore mining.

guide_text_blackbox_5_oreminer_2.cn: 点击收纳可以将设备收回到背包里，之后就可以在此矿点上放置电驱矿机了。
guide_text_blackbox_5_oreminer_2.en: Click the Stash button to stash the facility into the Backpack. An Electric Mining Rig can then be placed on the mining spot.

guide_text_blackbox_5_power_1.cn: 注意，在非集成核心区域的野外放置<@gd.key>供电桩</>时，供电桩不会自动连电。
guide_text_blackbox_5_power_1.en: Note, <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> placed outside the Core AIC Area cannot supply power to other facilities immediately.

guide_text_blackbox_5_power_2.cn: 请前往<@gd.key>中继器</>处，选择<@gd.key>开始电力运输</>，再返回供电桩处<@gd.key>完成电力运输</>，以将其接入电网。
guide_text_blackbox_5_power_2.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> and select <@gd.key>Start Transmission</> to start pulling a power transmission cable, then go to the Electric Pylon, then select the <@gd.key>Plug Transmission Cable</> to complete the power transmission and connect it into the power grid.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_1.cn: 刚刚我们通过电驱矿机开采到的紫晶矿已经被<@gd.key>无线传输回协议核心仓库</>了，现在就来看看吧。
guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_1.en: The Amethyst Ore mined by our Electric Mining Rigs has been moved to the <@gd.key>local PAC depot via belt-free transfer</>. Let's take a look.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_2.cn: 在集成核心区域中<@gd.key>背包和仓库是连通的</>，请按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开<@gd.key>背包和仓库</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_2.en: The <@gd.key>Backpack is connected to the Depot</> in the Core AIC Area. Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open both the <@gd.key>Backpack and Depot</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_2_1_ct.cn: 在集成核心区域中<@gd.key>背包和仓库是连通的</>，请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，打开<@gd.key>背包和仓库</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_2_1_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Backpack is connected to the Depot</> in the Core AIC Area. Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick and select this option to open the <@gd.key>Backpack and Depot</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_2_mb.cn: 在集成核心区域中<@gd.key>背包和仓库是连通的</>，请点击此处打开<@gd.key>背包和仓库</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_2_mb.en: The <@gd.key>Backpack is connected to the Depot</> in the Core AIC Area. Tap here to open the <@gd.key>Backpack and Depot</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_3.cn: <@gd.key>电驱矿机</>开采到的矿物会通过无线传输自动传回<@gd.key>协议核心仓库</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_3.en: Ores mined by the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> will be automatically moved to the <@gd.key>PAC Depot</> via belt-free transfer.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_4.cn: 在这里可以看到我们刚刚开采到的<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>已经被传输回仓库等待加工了。
guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_4.en: Here, we can see the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> we mined has been moved to the Depot. The ore can now be processed.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_6.cn: 紫晶矿可通过精炼炉中加工为<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>，可以看到场地中已经放置了所需的设备。
guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_6.en: Amethyst Ore can be processed by the Refining Unit to produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</>. Check the area. The required facility has already been placed.

guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_7.cn: 接下来请前往<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>进行设置，将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>从仓库输送到精炼炉中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_5_quartz_7.en: Next, let's go to a <@gd.key>PAC output port</> and set it up so that it moves <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> from the Depot to the Refining Unit for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_1.cn: 欢迎来到<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。塔卫二分布着很多这样的空间，在其中可以学习集成工业系统的基本操作。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_1.en: Welcome to the <@gd.key>simulation</>. These VR spaces are scattered across Talos-II and teach the basics of using the AIC Factory.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_2.cn: 在模拟空间中，背包、仓库以及设备与外部世界中的<@gd.key>不共通</>，但在这里学到的知识同样适用于外界。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_2.en: Simulations have their own set of Backpack and Depot items as well as facilities <@gd.key>not shared</> with those in the real world. However, the lessons and tricks learned in simulations are also useful outside.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_3.cn: 在这里可以查看当前模拟空间的<@gd.key>模拟目标</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_3.en: This shows the <@gd.key>goals</> of the current simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_4.cn: 达成<@gd.key>主要模拟目标</>后可完成模拟并获得相应的奖励，详细信息可按下<action=common_open_watch>进行查看。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_4.en: Finish the <@gd.key>main goals</> to complete the simulation and collect rewards. Press <action=common_open_watch> for more details.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_4_mb.cn: 达成<@gd.key>主要模拟目标</>后可完成模拟并获得相应的奖励，详细信息可点击此按钮进行查看。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_4_mb.en: Finish the <@gd.key>main goals</> to complete the simulation and collect rewards. Click this button for more details.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_5.cn: 在本次模拟中，我们需要使用工业设备来开采矿物。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_5.en: In this simulation, we must use AIC facilities to mine mineral ores.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_6.cn: <@gd.key>电驱矿机</>可以用来开采<@gd.key>源矿和紫晶矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_6.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> can be used for mining <@gd.key>Originium Ore and Amethyst Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_7.cn: 在<@gd.key>通电</>后，电驱矿机会自行运转，并每隔一段时间将开采到的矿石<@gd.key>无线传输回仓库</>。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_7.en: Once <@gd.key>powered</>, Electric Mining Rigs will automatically <@gd.key>move the mined minerals to the Depot via belt-free transfer</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_8.cn: 请先与此<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>交互，查看它的功能。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_8.en: First interact with the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> to view its functions.

guide_text_blackbox_5_start_9.cn: 请与<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>交互，查看它的功能。
guide_text_blackbox_5_start_9.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> to view its details.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_1_1.cn: 请与此<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>交互，查看它的使用方法。
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_1_1.en: Interact with this <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> to see how to use it.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_2_0_1.cn: 请放置<@gd.key>供电桩</>为3个<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>其提供电力。
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_2_0_1.en: Place an <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to power the 3 <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_2_1.cn: 请先在紫晶矿点上再放置2个<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_2_1.en: Place 2 more <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</> on Amethyst Ore mining spots.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_2_1_1.cn: 电驱矿机正在进行<@gd.key>无线传输</>，请维持3个电驱矿机正常转运并稍等片刻。
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_2_1_1.en: The Electric Mining Rigs are performing <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</>. Keep the 3 Electric Mining Rigs operational and wait for a while.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_3_1.cn: 请使用<@gd.key>滑索</>返回集成核心区域加工开采到的紫晶矿。
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_3_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>zipline</> to return to the Core AIC Area and process the Amethyst Ore we just mined.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_4_1.cn: 请前往<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>从仓库输出到精炼炉中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_4_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to move <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> from the Depot to the Refining Unit for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_4_2.cn: 请按下<action=common_interact>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>设定要从协议核心输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_4_2.en: Press <action=common_interact> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to set the item to move out from the PAC.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_4_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_interact>在<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>中设定要输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_4_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_interact> to set the item to move out from the <@gd.key>PAC output port</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_step_4_2_mb.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>设定要输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_5_step_4_2_mb.en: Tap the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to set the item to move out of it.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_1.cn: 协议核心取货口可以将物品从仓库输送到传送带上，每个取货口可设定一种物品进行输出。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_1.en: PAC output ports can move items from the Depot to a connected transport belt. Each output port can unload one selected item from the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_2.cn: 请点击这里选择希望从此取货口输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_2.en: Click here to select the item to unload from this output port.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择希望从此取货口输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select the item to unload from this output port.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_3.cn: 这里列出了当前协议核心仓库中的可用物品，可以看到刚刚电驱矿机开采到<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>已经被传输回仓库了。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_3.en: This is a list of items that can be unloaded from the PAC Depot. It also shows the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> just mined and delivered to the Depot by the Electric Mining Rigs.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_4.cn: 请先点击<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>进行选择。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_4.en: Click on the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> to select it.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_5.cn: 看，现在这个取货口可以持续输出紫晶矿了，请点击关闭按钮退出界面。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_5.en: Look. The output port is continuously unloading Amethyst Ore from the Depot. Click the close button to exit this panel.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_5_ct.cn: 看，现在这个取货口可以持续输出紫晶矿了，请按下<action=common_cancel>退出界面。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_5_ct.en: Look. The output port is continuously unloading Amethyst Ore from the Depot. Press <action=common_cancel> to exit this panel.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_6.cn: 现在精炼炉可以将电驱矿机开采到的紫晶矿自动加工为<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_6.en: The Refining Unit can now auto-process the Amethyst Ore mined by the Electric Mining Rigs into <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</>.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_7.cn: 电驱矿机同样可以用来开采源矿，今后就请参照这种方式进行更多矿物的自动开采和加工吧。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_7.en: Electric Mining Rigs can also be used for mining Originium Ore. Use this method to automatically mine and process more minerals.

guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_step.cn: 请等待<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>从取货口输送到<@gd.key>精炼炉</>中。
guide_text_blackbox_5_unloader_step.en: Wait for the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> to be transported from the output port to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_7_bag_1.cn: 注意，在本次模拟中，我们并没有仓库的<@gd.key>手动存取权限</>。因此<@gd.key>无法</>通过拖放对背包和仓库中的物品进行转移。
guide_text_blackbox_7_bag_1.en: NOTE: <@gd.key>Manual Depot unloading and loading</> have been disabled in this simulation. <@gd.key>No items can be manually transferred</> to or from the Backpack or Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_7_bag_2.cn: 请使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接工业设备到<@gd.key>协议核心输入口</>，以将产出的物品运输回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_7_bag_2.en: Connect the AIC facility to the <@gd.key>PAC input port</> with a <@gd.key>transport belt</> to move the products to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_7_block_2.cn: 加工设备产出的物品会存放在缓存区中，当<@gd.key>缓存区</>满后就会出现阻塞。
guide_text_blackbox_7_block_2.en: An AIC Factory processing facility will store its products in its <@gd.key>cache</>. The facility is clogged when its cache is full.

guide_text_blackbox_7_block_3.cn: 使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接设备取货口到协议核心的输入口，即可将产物运回仓库从而避免阻塞。
guide_text_blackbox_7_block_3.en: Connect the facility output port to the Automation-Core input port with a <@gd.key>transport belt</>. This will move products to the Depot and unclog the facility.

guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_1.cn: 干得好，现在粉碎机产出的<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>可以通过传送带<@gd.key>自动运输回仓库</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_1.en: Nice work. The <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> made by the Shredding Unit is now being <@gd.key>automatically transported</> to the PAC Depot via the transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_2.cn: 这样我们就成功搭建了一条<@gd.key>自动化的荞花粉末</>产线。
guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_2.en: We have successfully placed an <@gd.key>automated Buckflower Powder</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_3.cn: 接下来只要<@gd.key>等待产线运转</>就可以在协议核心仓库中<@gd.key>储备一批荞花粉末</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_3.en: Let the <@gd.key>production line work for a while</> and provide the PAC Depot with a <@gd.key>stock of Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_4.cn: 今后也可以参照这个方式来搭建更多自动化产线，储备不同类型的药品和材料。
guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_4.en: Reference this method to place more automated production lines for various medications and materials.

guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_5.cn: 接下来请<@gd.key>等待产线运转</>，让荞花粉末运输回协议核心仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_7_complete_5.en: Let the <@gd.key>production line work for a while</> for the Buckflower Powder to be transported back to the PAC Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_7_extra_1.cn: 想要完成<@gd.key>附加目标</>，还需要在现有晶体外壳的产线上进行一点调整。
guide_text_blackbox_7_extra_1.en: To complete the <@gd.key>bonus goal</>, the existing Origocrust production line must be adjusted.

guide_text_blackbox_7_extra_2.cn: 请先删除将晶体外壳送回仓库的这条<@gd.key>传送带</>。
guide_text_blackbox_7_extra_2.en: First, delete the <@gd.key>transport belt</> moving Origocrust to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_7_extra_3.cn: 再放置<@gd.key>粉碎机</>，并将精炼炉产出的晶体外壳输送到粉碎机中以生产<@gd.key>晶体外壳粉末</>。
guide_text_blackbox_7_extra_3.en: Then place a <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> and transport Origocrust made by the Refining Unit to the Shredding Unit to produce <@gd.key>Origocrust Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_7_extra_4.cn: 最后别忘了连接从粉碎机到协议核心输入口的<@gd.key>传送带</>，将产出的晶体外壳粉末送回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_7_extra_4.en: Don't forget to connect the Shredding Unit to the PAC input port with a <@gd.key>transport belt</> to transport the Origocrust Powder produced to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_7_start_1.cn: 让我们先来看一下集成核心区中原有的这条自动化生产线吧。
guide_text_blackbox_7_start_1.en: Let's look at the current automated production line in this Core AIC Area.

guide_text_blackbox_7_start_2.cn: 在协议核心两侧分布了多个<@gd.key>取货口</>。取货口可以将选定的物品<@gd.key>从仓库中取出</>，并不断输送到传送带上。
guide_text_blackbox_7_start_2.en: The PAC has multiple <@gd.key>output ports</> along two of its sides. Use an output port to continuously <@gd.key>move a selected item from the Depot</> to the connected transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_7_start_3.cn: 这里可以看到，仓库中的源矿正在通过<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>和<@gd.key>传送带</>输送到精炼炉中，为生产晶体外壳持续提供原料。
guide_text_blackbox_7_start_3.en: This shows that the Originium Ore in the Depot is being moved out of the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> onto the <@gd.key>transport belt</>, and then transported to the Refining Unit as raw materials for making Origocrusts.

guide_text_blackbox_7_start_4.cn: 而产出的晶体外壳，则会通过这条<@gd.key>传送带</>和<@gd.key>协议核心输入口</>运输回仓库，从而实现整个产线的自动化运转。
guide_text_blackbox_7_start_4.en: The Origocrust made by the facility is then moved by the <@gd.key>transport belt</> into the <@gd.key>PAC input port</> and stored in the Depot. This is essentially a completely automated production line.

guide_text_blackbox_7_start_5.cn: 下面我们就参照这个方式来搭建<@gd.key>荞花粉末带</>的自动产线吧。
guide_text_blackbox_7_start_5.en: Let's reference this to set up an automated <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_7_start_6.cn: 请先前往粉碎机旁的<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>，选择要输出的原料。
guide_text_blackbox_7_start_6.en: First, go to the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> next to the Shredding Unit, and select the raw material to move out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_7_step1_1.cn: 请与粉碎机旁的<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>交互，打开物品选择界面。
guide_text_blackbox_7_step1_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> near the Shredding Unit and open the item selection panel.

guide_text_blackbox_7_step2_1.cn: 请使用传送带连接<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>和<@gd.key>粉碎机的输入口</>。
guide_text_blackbox_7_step2_1.en: Connect the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit input port</> with a transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_7_step2_2.cn: 很好，现在粉碎机可以从协议核心仓库中获取荞花作为原料了。
guide_text_blackbox_7_step2_2.en: Great. The PAC Depot will now constantly supply the Shredding Unit with Buckflower.

guide_text_blackbox_7_step2_3.cn: 接下来，请使用传送带连接<@gd.key>粉碎机的取货口</>到<@gd.key>协议核心的输入口</>上，以将产物送回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_7_step2_3.en: Next, connect the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit output port</> to the <@gd.key>PAC input port</> with a transport belt to move products from the Shredding Unit to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_1.cn: 请点击此处选择希望从取货口输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_1.en: Click here to select the item to move from the output port.

guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择希望从此取货口输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select the item to unload from this output port.

guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_2.cn: 这里列出了当前协议核心仓库中的可用物品，我们要生产<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>就需要使用<@gd.key>荞花</>作为原料。
guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_2.en: This section lists the items we can move out of the PAC Depot. <@gd.key>Buckflower</> is the raw material we need to produce <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_4.cn: 现在这个取货口可以持续从仓库中输出荞花了。
guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_4.en: This output port can now continuously move Buckflower out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_5.cn: 接下来我们还需要使用<@gd.key>传送带</>，将输出的荞花运到<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中。
guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_5.en: We must use a <@gd.key>transport belt</> to move the Buckflower from the output port to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_6.cn: 请点击关闭按钮退出界面。
guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_6.en: Click the close button to close the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_7.cn: 接下来请参照指示线进行<@gd.key>传送带</>的连接，将荞花运输到<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_7_unloader_7.en: Reference the indicated line and connect the <@gd.key>transport belt</> for moving Buckflower to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_8_extrastep_1.cn: 想要达成<@gd.key>附加目标</>的话，就需要提高<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>的产能。
guide_text_blackbox_8_extrastep_1.en: To complete the <@gd.key>bonus goal</>, we must raise the production yield of <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_extrastep_2.cn: 参照刚刚的方式再搭建一条<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>的产线就可以完成附加目标了。
guide_text_blackbox_8_extrastep_2.en: Reference the steps we took and set up 1 more <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottle</> production line to achieve the bonus goal.

guide_text_blackbox_8_reward_pop_1.cn: 获得了一份紫晶质瓶产线的<@gd.key>蓝图</>，推进<@gd.key>主线任务</>以解锁<@gd.key>蓝图</>功能后可快速搭建紫晶质瓶产线。
guide_text_blackbox_8_reward_pop_1.en: A <@gd.key>blueprint</> for the Amethyst Bottle production line has been acquired. Progress through the <@gd.key>main mission</> to unlock the <@gd.key>Blueprint</> feature that allows quick setting up of an Amethyst Bottle production line.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_1.cn: 本次模拟需要为工团提供<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>，先来看一下它的简制配方。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_1.en: In this simulation, we must make <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</> for the UWST. Let's take a look at its crafting formula.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_2.cn: 使用快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击图标位置打开背包。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_2.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the icon to open the Backpack.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_2_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，打开<@gd.key>背包</>。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_2_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to select this option and open the <@gd.key>Backpack</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_2_mb.cn: 请点击此按钮打开背包。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_2_mb.en: Tap this button to open the Backpack.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_3.cn: 点击<@gd.key>简易制作</>按钮打开简制界面。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_3.en: Click the <@gd.key>Crafting</> button to open the Crafting screen.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_4.cn: 可以看到制作荞愈胶囊需要使用<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>和<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>这两种材料。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_4.en: We can see that crafting Buck Capsule [C] requires 2 materials: <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_5.en: Click the button to close the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_6.cn: 可以看到，集成核心区内已经搭建了一条生产<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>的自动产线。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_6.en: We can see that an automated <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> production line is already in the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_7.cn: 荞花正在通过<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>和<@gd.key>传送带</>的不断运输到粉碎机中进行加工，
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_7.en: Buckflower is constantly being moved by the <@gd.key>transport belt</> from the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to the Shredding Unit for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_8.cn: 而加工产出的荞花粉末则通过<@gd.key>传送带</>和<@gd.key>协议核心输入口</>运输回了仓库，从而实现了整个产线的自动化运转。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_8.en: The Buckflower Powder made by the facility is then moved by the <@gd.key>transport belt</> into the <@gd.key>PAC input port</> and stored in the Depot. This is essentially a completely automated production line.

guide_text_blackbox_8_start_9.cn: 接下来我们只需参照这个方式搭建一条生产<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>的产线就可以制造<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_8_start_9.en: Our next step is to reference this to create an <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottle</> production line. This line will help us produce <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step1_1.cn: 制造荞愈胶囊所需的<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>可以通过<@gd.key>塑形机</>来生产。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step1_1.en: The <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</> for making Buck Capsule [C] can be made by the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step1_2.cn: 将紫晶矿放入<@gd.key>精炼炉</>加工成紫晶纤维后，再放入<@gd.key>塑形机</>即可制成紫晶质瓶。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step1_2.en: Place Amethyst Ore into the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to process it into Amethyst Fiber, then place it into the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> to make Amethyst Bottles.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step1_3.cn: 请先与<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>交互，将要输出的物品设为<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step1_3.en: First interact with the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> and select <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> as the item to move out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_1.cn: 请先放置一台<@gd.key>精炼炉</>，用来将紫晶矿精炼为<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_1.en: First place a <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> for refining Amethyst Ore into <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_10.cn: 由于在本次模拟中各设备禁用了<@gd.key>手动存取权限</>，所以我们还需要将紫晶质瓶通过传送带输送回仓库才能使用。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_10.en: <@gd.key>Manual cache access has been disabled</> for every facility in this simulation. We must use transport belts to move Amethyst Bottles back to the Depot before we can use them.
