guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_11.cn: 请使用传送带连接<@gd.key>塑形机取货口</>到<@gd.key>协议核心输入口</>，以将紫晶质瓶送回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_11.en: Connect the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit output port</> to the <@gd.key>PAC input port</> with a transport belt to move Amethyst Bottles to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_12.cn: 非常好，最后请使用供电桩为设备供电并等待产线运转，让<@gd.key>塑形机生产5个紫晶质瓶</>并运回仓库吧。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_12.en: Excellent. Finally, place an Electric Pylon to power the facilities and let the production line run for a while. Wait for it to transport <@gd.key>5 Amethyst Bottles made by the Moulding Unit</> into the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_2.cn: 很好，有了精炼炉我们就可以生产<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_2.en: Good. The Refining Unit will let us produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_3.cn: 接下来请再放置一台<@gd.key>塑形机</>，用来将精炼炉生产的紫晶纤维加工为<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_3.en: Next, place a <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> to process Amethyst Fiber produced by the Refining Unit into <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_4.cn: 很好，生产紫晶质瓶的设备已经齐了，接下来就是物流<@gd.key>传送带</>的搭建了。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_4.en: Wonderful. We now have the facility for making Amethyst Bottles. The next step is to set up the <@gd.key>transport belt</> for logistics.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_5.cn: 我们需要将紫晶矿从<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>输送到<@gd.key>精炼炉</>，再将产出的紫晶纤维从精炼炉输送到<@gd.key>塑形机</>中以进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_5.en: We must move Amethyst Ore from the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>, then move the Amethyst Fibers from the Refining Unit to the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_6.cn: 请先使用传送带连接<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>到<@gd.key>精炼炉输入口</>。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_6.en: First, connect the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit input port</> via a transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_7.cn: 很好，现在紫晶矿可以从协议核心仓库运输到精炼炉中进行加工了。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_7.en: Great. Amethyst Ore is now being moved from the PAC Depot to the Refining Unit for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_8.cn: 请再使用传送带连接<@gd.key>精炼炉取货口</>到<@gd.key>塑形机输入口</>。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_8.en: Now, connect the <@gd.key>Refining Unit output port</> to the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit input port</> with a transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_9.cn: 非常好，这样精炼炉产出的紫晶纤维就可以输送到塑形机中加工为<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_9.en: Wonderful. The Amethyst Fibers produced by the Refining Unit are now being moved to the Moulding Unit to be made into <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_9_1.cn: 每生产1个<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>需要2份紫晶纤维。如果希望提升效率的话还可以再多放置一个<@gd.key>精炼炉</>来为塑形机提供紫晶纤维。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step2_9_1.en: It takes 2 units of Amethyst Fiber to produce 1 <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottle</>. To raise production, place 1 more <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to supply more Amethyst Fiber to the Moulding Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step3_1.cn: 很好，现在我们已经有了足够数量的<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step3_1.en: Good job. We now have enough <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_step3_2.cn: 接下来请打开<@gd.key>背包</>，使用<@gd.key>简易制作</>功能来制造<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>吧。
guide_text_blackbox_8_step3_2.en: Now, open the <@gd.key>Backpack</> and use <@gd.key>Crafting</> to craft <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</>.

guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>可以从仓库持续输出指定的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_1.en: The <@gd.key>PAC output port</> can continuously move a selected item out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_2.cn: 点击这里选择要取出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_2.en: Click here to select the item to move out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择希望从此取货口输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select the item to unload from this output port.

guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_3.cn: <@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>需要使用<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>作为原料，依次经过<@gd.key>精炼</>、<@gd.key>塑形</>后加工获得。
guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_3.en: <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottle</> must be made with the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</>. This raw material must be <@gd.key>refined</> and <@gd.key>moulded</> to produce the bottles.

guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_4.cn: 所以这里我们需要选择紫晶矿，请点击<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>完成选择。
guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_4.en: Hence, we must select Amethyst Ore. Click on the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> to complete the selection.

guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_4_ct.cn: 所以这里我们需要选择<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>，请按下<action=common_confirm>完成选择。
guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_4_ct.en: Hence, we must select <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</>. Press <action=common_confirm> to complete the selection.

guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_5.cn: 很好，现在这个取货口可以从仓库持续输出<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_5.en: Good. This output port is now moving <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_6.cn: 接下来我们还需要放置<@gd.key>精炼炉</>和<@gd.key>塑形机</>，并使用传送带将原料依次运输到这些设备中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_8_unloader_6.en: The next step is to place the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</>, then use transport belts to move materials into these facilities for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_9_assebling_1.cn: 此设备已经锁定了生产配方，在这里可以看到生产<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>需要使用<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>。
guide_text_blackbox_9_assebling_1.en: Production formula is locked for this facility. This shows that producing <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> needs <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</>.

guide_text_blackbox_9_assebling_2.cn: <@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>可以通过将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>放入<@gd.key>精炼炉</>中加工获取。
guide_text_blackbox_9_assebling_2.en: <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> can be made by processing <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> at the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_9_assebling_3.cn: 现在我们只需要搭建一条<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>的产线并将其接入配件机就可以生产<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>了，现在就来试试吧。
guide_text_blackbox_9_assebling_3.en: We now need to set up an <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> production line and connect it to a Fitting Unit to produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</>. Let's give it a go.

guide_text_blackbox_9_extrastep_1.cn: 本次模拟中，我们没有协议核心仓库的手动存取权限。
guide_text_blackbox_9_extrastep_1.en: We are not authorized to access the PAC Depot for this simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_9_extrastep_2.cn: 想要完成<@gd.key>附加目标</>可以使用<@gd.key>传送带</>将紫晶零件从配件机运输回协议核心仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_9_extrastep_2.en: To complete the <@gd.key>bonus goal</>, use a <@gd.key>transport belt</> to move Amethyst Parts from the Fitting Unit back to the PAC Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_9_extrastep_3.cn: 不妨试着增加产线数量，让几台<@gd.key>配件机</>一起进行<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>的生产以更快完成储备。
guide_text_blackbox_9_extrastep_3.en: Let's try expanding the production line. Use multiple <@gd.key>Fitting Units</> to produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> at the same time to meet the goals.

guide_text_blackbox_9_reward_pop_1.cn: 获得了一份紫晶零件产线的<@gd.key>蓝图</>，推进<@gd.key>主线任务</>以解锁<@gd.key>蓝图</>功能后可快速搭建紫晶零件产线。
guide_text_blackbox_9_reward_pop_1.en: A <@gd.key>blueprint</> for the Amethyst Part production line has been acquired. Progress through the <@gd.key>main mission</> to unlock the <@gd.key>Blueprint</> feature that allows quick setting up of an Amethyst Part production line.

guide_text_blackbox_9_start_1.cn: 滑索架出现故障，需要使用<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>来修复。
guide_text_blackbox_9_start_1.en: The Zipline Pylon is broken. Use the <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> to repair it.

guide_text_blackbox_9_start_2.cn: 集成核心区内已经预先安放了生产紫晶零件所需的<@gd.key>配件机</>。
guide_text_blackbox_9_start_2.en: The Core AIC Area already has the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> needed for producing Amethyst Parts.

guide_text_blackbox_9_start_3.cn: 请先与<@gd.key>配件机</>交互，查看<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_9_start_3.en: First interact with the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> and view the <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> production formula.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step0_1.cn: 请与<@gd.key>配件机</>交互，查看<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step0_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> and view the <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> production formula.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step1_1.cn: 生产<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>需要使用<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>作为原料。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step1_1.en: Producing <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> requires <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> as the raw material.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step1_2.cn: 请先与<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>交互，将要输出的物品设为<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step1_2.en: First interact with the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> and select <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> as the item to move out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_1.cn: 请先放置一台<@gd.key>精炼炉</>，用来将紫晶矿精炼为<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_1.en: First place a <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> for refining Amethyst Ore into <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</>.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_2.cn: 请使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>和<@gd.key>精炼炉输入口</>以将紫晶矿输送到精炼炉中。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_2.en: Connect the <@gd.key>transport belt</> to the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> and the <@gd.key>Refining Unit input port</> to move Amethyst Ore to the Refining Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_3.cn: 很好，现在精炼炉可以生产<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>了。接下来我们还需要把产出的紫晶纤维输送到<@gd.key>配件机</>中加工为<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_3.en: Great. The Refining Unit is now producing <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</>. Next, we must move the Amethyst Fibers to the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> to process them into <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</>.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_4.cn: 请使用传送带连接<@gd.key>精炼炉的取货口</>和<@gd.key>配件机的输入口</>，以将紫晶纤维输入到配件机中。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_4.en: Connect the transport belt to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit output port</> and the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit input port</> to move Amethyst Fibers to the Fitting Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_5.cn: 别忘了使用供电桩为各设备供电。然后请等待产线运转，<@gd.key>让配件机生产5份紫晶零件</>。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_5.en: And don't forget to use an Electric Pylon to power the facilities. Let the production line run for a while till the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit produces 5 Amethyst Parts</>.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_6.cn: <@gd.key>紫晶零件</>的生产已经完成了，请将其取出到背包中以备使用。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_6.en: <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> production completed. Manually place them in the Backpack for later.

guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_7.cn: 现在我们已经拥有了足够的<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>，请前往修复<@gd.key>滑索架</>吧。
guide_text_blackbox_9_step2_7.en: We now have enough <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</>. Let's go and repair the <@gd.key>zipline facility</>.

guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>可以从仓库持续输出指定的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_1.en: The <@gd.key>PAC output port</> can continuously move a selected item out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_2.cn: 请点击这里设定要输送到传送带上的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_2.en: Click here to select the item to move onto the transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择希望从此取货口输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select the item to unload from this output port.

guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_3.cn: 这里可以看到当前协议核心仓库中的所有可用材料，现在我们需要使用<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>来生产紫晶纤维。
guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_3.en: This shows all the materials available in the PAC Depot. For now, we need <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> to produce Amethyst Fiber.

guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_4.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>进行选择。
guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_4.en: Click on the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> to select it.

guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_5.cn: 很好，现在这个协议核心取货口可以<@gd.key>持续输出紫晶矿</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_5.en: Good. This PAC output port can now <@gd.key>continuously move Amethyst Ore</> out of the depot.

guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_6.cn: 接下来我们就需要使用<@gd.key>传送带</>将紫晶矿运输到对应的设备中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_9_unloader_6.en: The next step is to use a <@gd.key>transport belt</> and move Amethyst Ore to the right facility for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_1.cn: <@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>可通过<@gd.key>封装机</>进行生产。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_1.en: The <@gd.key>LC Valley Battery</> is produced at the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_2.cn: 场地内已经预先设置了生产<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>所需的两种前置原料产线。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_2.en: This area already has production lines for 2 materials needed for producing <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</>.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_3.cn: 在这里，<@gd.key>源矿</>会从协议核心仓库输送到<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中以加工为<@gd.key>源矿粉末</>。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_3.en: This production line moves <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> from the PAC Depot to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> where the ore is processed into <@gd.key>Originium Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_4.cn: 这里则是将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>输送到<@gd.key>精炼炉</>加工成紫晶纤维后，再输送到<@gd.key>配件机</>中以制成<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_4.en: This other production line moves <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> where the ore is processed into Amethyst Fiber. The fiber is then moved to the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</>.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_5.cn: 请先放置一台<@gd.key>封装机</>，再将这两种原料都输入封装机中即可加工获取<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_battery_5.en: Place a <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> and then move the two materials to the Packaging Unit to produce <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</>.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_cannon_1.cn: 所有作战设备都需要电力支持方可运转，在这里可以看到作战设备的充能情况。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_cannon_1.en: All combat facilities must be powered to become operational. This shows the charging status of the combat facility.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_cannon_2.cn: 除了接入电网外，一些设备还可通过电池来进行充能。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_cannon_2.en: To power certain facilities, either connect them to the power grid or give them batteries.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_cannon_3.cn: 当拥有电池时，<@gd.key>点击自动填充</>按钮或将电池<@gd.key>从背包拖入充能栏中</>都可对设备进行充能。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_cannon_3.en: If batteries are available in the Backpack, <@gd.key>click the Auto Place</> button or drag batteries <@gd.key>from the Backpack to the charging slot</> to charge a combat facility.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>榴弹塔</>是一种常用的作战设备，在有<@gd.key>电力充能</>的情况下可以自动对范围内的敌人发动攻击。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_start_1.en: The <@gd.key>Grenade Tower</> is a common combat facility. When <@gd.key>powered</>, it can automatically attack enemies within range.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_start_2.cn: 在野外未搭建电网的地区，我们还可以使用<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>来对作战设备进行单次充能。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_start_2.en: In the wilderness not yet covered by the power grid, we can also use single-use <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</> to add power charges to the combat facility.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_start_3.cn: 请先使用<@gd.key>滑索</>回到集成核心区域进行<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>的生产，之后再回到这里对榴弹塔进行充能。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_start_3.en: Use the <@gd.key>zipline</> to return to the Core AIC Area first and produce some <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</>. After acquiring the batteries, return to the Grenade Tower to charge it.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_step1_1.cn: 请先使用<@gd.key>滑索</>返回集成核心区域进行<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>的生产。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_step1_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>zipline</> to return to the Core AIC Area and produce some <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</>.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_step2_2.cn: 请将<@gd.key>源矿粉末</>和<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>输入到封装机中，并生产4块<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>。如果想更快完成电池的生产，不妨试着再搭建一条产线。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_step2_2.en: Move <@gd.key>Originium Powder</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> to the Packaging Unit, then wait for the facility to produce 4 <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</>. For faster battery production, try setting up an additional production line.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_step2_3.cn: 已经生产了足够的<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>，请将它们从封装机<@gd.key>收取到背包中</>吧。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_step2_3.en: There are now enough <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</>. Take them from the Packaging Unit and <@gd.key>place them in the Backpack</>.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_step2_4.cn: 现在请使用<@gd.key>滑索</>返回野外区处， 将电池放入<@gd.key>榴弹塔</>中以对其进行充能。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling1_step2_4.en: Now use the <@gd.key>zipline</> to head back into the wilderness and place the batteries into the <@gd.key>Grenade Tower</> to charge it.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_helper_1.cn: 请先去封装机查看<@gd.key>中容谷地电池</> 的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_helper_1.en: Go to the Packaging Unit and view the <@gd.key>SC Valley Battery</> production formula first.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_helper_2.cn: 野外开采蓝铁矿的<@gd.key>矿机</>坏了，请前往修复。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_helper_2.en: The Ferrium Ore <@gd.key>mining rig</> in the wilderness is damaged. Let's go and fix it.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_helper_3.cn: 封装机好像可以移动，或许可以使用<@gd.key>供电桩</>来为封装机供电。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_helper_3.en: The Packaging Unit can be moved. Try powering it with the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</>.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_start_1.cn: 请先去<@gd.key>封装机</>查看设备详情，以查看<@gd.key>中容谷地电池</>的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_start_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> to view its facility details and the <@gd.key>SC Valley Battery</> production formula.

guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_start_2.cn: 这就是<@gd.key>中容谷地电池</>的生产配方，请根据配方来搭建生产线吧。
guide_text_blackbox_assebling_2_start_2.en: This is the <@gd.key>SC Valley Battery</> production formula. Let's follow it to set up a production line.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_assem.cn: 在这里可以看到，制造<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>需要使用<@gd.key>酮化灌木粉末</>和<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>这两种材料。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_assem.en: We can see that producing <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</> needs 2 materials: <@gd.key>Aketine Powder</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_assem.cn: 我们需要将刚刚采集的<@gd.key>酮化灌木</>通过<@gd.key>粉碎机</>研磨为<@gd.key>粉末</>，之后再输送到封装机中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_assem.en: We have gathered some <@gd.key>Aketine</>. Use the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> to shred them into <@gd.key>Aketine Powder</>, then move the powder to the Packaging Unit for production.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_assem.cn: 而另一种材料<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>则可以通过将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>依次输送到<@gd.key>精炼炉</>和<@gd.key>配件机</>中加工获得。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_assem.en: The other material, <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</>, can be produced by first processing <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> at the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> into Amethyst Fiber, and then processing the fiber at the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> to get the product.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_assem.cn: 接下来请补齐<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>的产线，完成爆炸物的生产。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_assem.en: Now, let's complete the <@gd.key>Industrial Explosive</> production line and produce some Industrial Explosives.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 工业爆炸物可以从背包中直接使用。请先使用快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击图标位置<@gd.key>打开背包</>。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Industrial Explosives can be directly used at the Backpack panel. First press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the icon to <@gd.key>open the Backpack</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，打开<@gd.key>背包</>。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to select this option and open the <@gd.key>Backpack</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 工业爆炸物可以从背包中直接使用。请先按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Industrial Explosives can be directly used at the Backpack panel. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 工业爆炸物可以从背包中直接使用。请先点击此按钮<@gd.key>打开背包</>。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Industrial Explosives can be directly used at the Backpack panel. Tap this button to <@gd.key>open the Backpack</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>展开详情弹窗。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Click on the <@gd.key>Industrial Explosive</> to open its details panel.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>打开<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>的详情弹窗。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Press to <action=navigation_target_click> to open the details panel of <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 在投掷模式下可以通过移动和镜头控制来<@gd.key>瞄准</>要摧毁的目标。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: In throwing mode, move and adjust the view to <@gd.key>aim</> at the target to be demolished.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 接下来就请瞄准山体中间的<@gd.key>落石</>，之后再通过点击来投出爆炸物吧。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Now, aim at the <@gd.key>rubble</> in the hills then click to throw the explosive.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 接下来就请瞄准山体中间的<@gd.key>落石</>，之后再按下<action=battle_throw_mode_throw_show_only>投出爆炸物吧。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Now, aim at the <@gd.key>rubble</> in the hills then press <action=battle_throw_mode_throw_show_only> to throw the explosive.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.cn: 接下来就请瞄准山体中间的<@gd.key>落石</>，之后再点击<@gd.key>投掷</>按钮来投出爆炸物吧。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_bomb_.en: Now, aim at the <@gd.key>rubble</> in the hills and tap the <@gd.key>Throw</> button to throw the explosive.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_start.cn: 在本次模拟中，我们需要炸毁落石救出受困人员。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_start.en: In this simulation, we must blast apart rubble to rescue the trapped victims.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_start.cn: 这些非坚固结构的物体通常可使用<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>来进行破坏。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_start.en: Non-sturdy objects and structures can often be destroyed with <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_start.cn: 在矿场附近就分布了不少可以用来制造工业爆炸物的<@gd.key>酮化灌木</>。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_start.en: There are plenty of <@gd.key>Aketine</> plants near this mining site. They can be used to produce Industrial Explosives.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_start.cn: 请先采集一些<@gd.key>酮化灌木</>作为原料，再使用<@gd.key>滑索</>前往集成核心区制造工业爆炸物。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_start.en: Gather some <@gd.key>Aketine</> as raw materials then take the <@gd.key>zipline</> to the Core AIC Area to make Industrial Explosives.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step1.cn: 制造工业爆炸物需要使用<@gd.key>酮化灌木</>原料，请先采集一些。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step1.en: Making Industrial Explosives requires <@gd.key>Aketine</>. Gather some of the plant first.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step1.cn: 接下来请使用<@gd.key>滑索</>前往集成核心区，利用集成工业系统来制造工业爆炸物。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step1.en: Take the <@gd.key>zipline</> to the Core AIC Area and use AIC facilities to make Industrial Explosives.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step1.cn: <@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>可以使用封装机来制造，请与<@gd.key>封装机</>交互查看其生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step1.en: <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</> can be produced by the Packaging Unit. Interact with the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> to view the production formula.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.cn: 请将<@gd.key>酮化灌木</>输入到<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中加工为<@gd.key>酮化灌木粉末</>。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.en: Move <@gd.key>Aketine</> to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> to shred it into <@gd.key>Aketine Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.cn: 请放置<@gd.key>精炼炉</>和<@gd.key>配件机</>，别忘了使用供电桩进行供电。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.en: Place the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</>, and don't forget to power them with Electric Pylons.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.cn: 请将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>从协议核心取货口依次输送到精炼炉和配件机中以加工为<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.en: Move the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> from the PAC output port to the Refining Unit to make Amethyst Fiber, then move the fiber to the Fitting Unit to produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.cn: 请将<@gd.key>酮化灌木粉末</>和<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>输送到<@gd.key>封装机</>中以制造工业爆炸物。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.en: Move the <@gd.key>Aketine Powder</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> to the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> to produce Industrial Explosives.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.cn: 很好，我们已经成功生产出破坏落石所需的<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>，接下来请将其从封装机中<@gd.key>取出到背包里</>。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.en: Good. We now have the <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</> to blast away the rubble. Take them out of the Packaging Unit and <@gd.key>place them in the Backpack</>.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.cn: 现在可以使用滑索<@gd.key>返回矿场</>进行救援了。另外仓库中还有更多酮化灌木，如果对爆破瞄准没有把握的话也可以再<@gd.key>多制备几个工业爆炸物</>再前往。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step2.en: Use the zipline and <@gd.key>return to the mining site</> to rescue the victims. The Depot has extra Aketine for <@gd.key>making more Industrial Explosives</>. Having extra explosives will help make up for bad aiming and throwing.

guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step3.cn: 请在背包中使用<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>进行投掷，摧毁阻塞道路的落石。
guide_text_blackbox_asseblingbomb1_step3.en: Open the Backpack and use the <@gd.key>Industrial Explosive</> to throw it and demolish the rubble blocking the way.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_grinder_1.cn: 在这个<@gd.key>协议储存箱</>中存放了生产荞花粉末所需的<@gd.key>荞花</>原料，
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_grinder_1.en: This <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> contains <@gd.key>Buckflower</>, the raw material for making Buckflower Powder.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_grinder_2.cn: 使用<@gd.key>传送带</>将其输送到<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中即可加工获得荞花粉末。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_grinder_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>transport belt</> to move the plant to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> that processes it into Buckflower Powder.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_grinder_3.cn: 最后再使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接<@gd.key>粉碎机取货口</>到<@gd.key>协议核心输入口</>即可将荞花粉末运回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_grinder_3.en: Finally, connect one end of the <@gd.key>transport belt</> to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit output port</> and the other to the <@gd.key>PAC input port</> to transport the Buckflower Powder to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_grinder_4.cn: 接下来就使用传送带依次连接<@gd.key>协议储存箱、粉碎机、协议核心</>来完成物流连接吧。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_grinder_4.en: Next, connect transport belts to the facilities in this order: <@gd.key>Protocol Stash, Shredding Unit, and PAC</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_1.cn: 在操作面板中，也可以查看其传送带的连接情况。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_1.en: Open the control panel to view transport belt connection details.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_2.cn: 左侧显示了设备的所有输入口。在连接传送带后，可以在这里看到物品输入的信息。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_2.en: The left side shows all the input ports of the facility. When connected to a transport belt, it will also display information of the incoming items.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_3.cn: 右侧则显示了设备的所有取货口。在连接传送带后，可以看到产物从缓存区不断向外输出。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_3.en: The right side shows all the output ports of the facility. After connecting a transport belt, products will be slowly moved out from the facility cache.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_4.cn: 接下来我们需要参照这种方式，再为<@gd.key>粉碎机</>建立完整的<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>物流线。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_4.en: Reference the steps we took to set up another <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> production line for the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_5.cn: 请先点击关闭按钮退出界面。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_produce_5.en: Click the close button to close the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_reward_pop_1.cn: 获得了晶体外壳和紫晶纤维产线的<@gd.key>蓝图</>，推进<@gd.key>主线任务</>以解锁<@gd.key>蓝图</>功能后可快速搭建对应产线。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_reward_pop_1.en: Production line <@gd.key>blueprints</> for Origocrust and Amethyst Fiber acquired. Progress through the <@gd.key>main mission</> to unlock the <@gd.key>Blueprint</> feature to quickly set up various production lines.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议核心</>所在的<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>适合进行大面积的集成工业建设。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_1.en: The <@gd.key>PAC</> is located in the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</>, which is suitable for deploying a large AIC Factory.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_10.cn: 在<@gd.key>进行传送带放置时</>，可通过箭头在网格上的位置来选定<@gd.key>传送带的起始点</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_10.en: When <@gd.key>placing transport belts</>, use the position of the arrow on the grid to select the <@gd.key>starting point of the transport belt</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_10_ct.cn: 在放置<@gd.key>传送带时</>，可<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，通过调整锥型指示器在网格上的位置来选定<@gd.key>传送带的起始点</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_10_ct.en: When placing <@gd.key>transport belts</>, <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to change the grid location of the indicator cone and select the <@gd.key>starting point of the transport belt</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_11.cn: 确定起始点后<@gd.key>点击地面</>开始放置，之后可通过移动和更改朝向来拉出传送带，在选定结束位置后<@gd.key>再次点击地面</>即可完成一段传送带的放置。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_11.en: After confirming a starting point, <@gd.key>click on the ground</> to start placing the transport belt using the movement and rotation controls. After reaching the end point of the transport belt, <@gd.key>click the ground again</> to complete placing this transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_11_ct.cn: 确定起始点后<@gd.key>按下<action=fac_build_confirm_belt_start></>开始放置传送带，之后可<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>来拉出传送带。在选定结束位置后再次按下<action=fac_build_confirm_belt_start>即可完成一段传送带的放置。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_11_ct.en: After confirming a starting point, <@gd.key>press <action=fac_build_confirm_belt_start></> to start placing the transport belt, then <@gd.key>move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to place more belt sections. After reaching the desired end point of the belt, press <action=fac_build_confirm_belt_start> again to complete placing this transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_11_mb.cn: 确定起始点后点击<@gd.key>确认</>按钮开始放置，之后可通过移动和更改朝向来拉出传送带。在选定结束位置后再次点击<@gd.key>确认</>按钮即可完成一段传送带的放置。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_11_mb.en: After confirming a starting point, tap the <@gd.key>Confirm</> button to start placing the transport belt using the movement and rotation controls. After confirming the end point of the transport belt, tap <@gd.key>Confirm</> again to complete placing this section of transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_12.cn: 接下来请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>进行<@gd.key>传送带</>的连接。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_12.en: Now, refer to the <@gd.key>indicated line</> and connect the <@gd.key>transport belt</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_13.cn: 非常好，现在<@gd.key>传送带</>可以将源矿从<@gd.key>协议储存箱</>不断运输到<@gd.key>精炼炉</>中了。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_13.en: Excellent. Now the <@gd.key>transport belt</> can move Originium Ore from the <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_14.cn: 想要建立完整的物流线，我们还需要把将精炼炉产出<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>运输回协议核心<@gd.key>仓库</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_14.en: To create a complete automated transport loop, we must move the <@gd.key>Origocrust</> made by the Refining Unit to the PAC <@gd.key>Depot</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_15.cn: 这就需使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接<@gd.key>精炼炉的取货口</>和<@gd.key>协议核心的输入口</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_15.en: The <@gd.key>transport belt</> must be connected to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit output port</> and to the <@gd.key>PAC input port</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_16.cn: 下面请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>进行<@gd.key>传送带</>的连接。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_16.en: Now, reference the <@gd.key>indicated line</> and connect the <@gd.key>transport belt</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_17.cn: 干得好，现在<@gd.key>精炼炉</>产出的晶体外壳可以通过<@gd.key>传送带</>自动运输回<@gd.key>协议核心</>的仓库了。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_17.en: Nicely done. The Origocrust made by the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> is now being automatically transported to the <@gd.key>PAC</> Depot via the <@gd.key>transport belt</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_18.cn: 这样我们就建立了一条从储存箱提供原料到精炼炉中进行加工，再将设备的产物运回仓库的完整产线。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_18.en: We now have a complete production line that moves raw materials from the Protocol Stash to the Refining Unit for processing, and delivers products from the facility to the depot for storage.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_19.cn: 接下来请前往<@gd.key>精炼炉</>处，在操作面板中查看它的物流情况。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_19.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and view its logistics info shown in the control panel.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_2.cn: 在<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>中可以使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接各个工业设备， 从而实现自动化的物流运输。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_2.en: While in the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</>, <@gd.key>transport belts</> can be used to connect AIC Factory facilities together and automate the transportation of materials and products.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_3.cn: 带有物流底座的工业设备都可以进行传送带的连接。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_3.en: Transport belts can connect to logistics input and output ports along the base of some AIC facilities.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_4.cn: 注意看<@gd.key>箭头</>的朝向，指向内部的是设备的<@gd.key>输入口</>。在接入<@gd.key>传送带</>后，可以将加工所需的原料由此<@gd.key>输入到设备之中</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_4.en: Check the direction of the <@gd.key>arrows</>. Those pointing into the facility are the <@gd.key>input ports</>. Connect the input port to a <@gd.key>transport belt</> to move raw materials <@gd.key>into the facility</> for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_5.cn: 指向外部的则是设备的<@gd.key>取货口</>。在连接<@gd.key>传送带</>后，可以将加工产出的物品从设备的缓存区自动<@gd.key>输出到传送带上</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_5.en: Arrows pointing outwards from the facility are the <@gd.key>output ports</>. Connect the output port to a <@gd.key>transport belt</> to move processed products from the facility cache <@gd.key>onto the transport belt</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_6.cn: 在本次模拟中我们需要使用<@gd.key>传送带</>为工业设备搭建物流线。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_6.en: For this simulation, we must use <@gd.key>transport belts</> to create a logistics line for the AIC facilities.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_7.cn: 在这个<@gd.key>协议储存箱</>中存放了很多<@gd.key>源矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_7.en: This <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> contains a lot of <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_8.cn: 参照<@gd.key>指示线</>将传送带从协议<@gd.key>储存箱的取货口</>连接到<@gd.key>精炼炉的输入口</>中，就可以<@gd.key>将源矿输送到精炼炉中</>进行加工了。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_8.en: Refer to the <@gd.key>indicated line</> and connect the <@gd.key>Protocol Stash output port</> to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit input port</> via a transport belt. This <@gd.key>automatically moves Originium Ore to the Refining Unit</> for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_9.cn: 现在就来试试吧。请先使用快捷键<action=fac_use_quick_item_conveyer_belt>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击<@gd.key>传送带</>按钮开始放置传送带。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_9.en: Let's give this a try. Press the hotkey <action=fac_use_quick_item_conveyer_belt> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the <@gd.key>transport belt</> button to start placing the transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_9_ct.cn: 现在就来试试吧。请按住<action=fac_activate_quick_bar>并按下<action=fac_use_quick_item_conveyer_belt>进入<@gd.key>传送带建造模式</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_9_ct.en: Let's give this a try. Hold <action=fac_activate_quick_bar> and press <action=fac_use_quick_item_conveyer_belt> to enter the <@gd.key>transport belt placement mode</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_9_mb.cn: 现在就来试试吧。请先点击<@gd.key>传送带</>按钮开始放置传送带。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_start_9_mb.en: Let's give this a try. Tap the <@gd.key>transport belt</> button to start placing the transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step0_1.cn: 请与<@gd.key>精炼炉</>交互，在操作面板中查看它的物流情况。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step0_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and view its logistics info shown in the control panel.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step1_1.cn: 请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>，使用<@gd.key>传送带</>依次连接<@gd.key>协议储存箱、粉碎机、协议核心</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step1_1.en: Reference the <@gd.key>guiding line</> and connect <@gd.key>transport belts</> to the facilities in this order: <@gd.key>Protocol Stash, Shredding Unit, and PAC</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step1_2.cn: 非常好，看来你已经掌握了物流连接的方法。产线的运转需要一点时间，请<@gd.key>等待荞花粉末生产并运输回仓库</>。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step1_2.en: Congratulations for mastering the technique of laying down logistics connections. <@gd.key>Wait for the Buckflower Powder to be produced and delivered to the Depot</>.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step1_3.cn: 模拟目标达成了，请按下<action=common_open_watch>来完成模拟吧。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step1_3.en: Simulation goals achieved. Press <action=common_open_watch> to complete the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step1_3_mb.cn: 模拟目标达成了，请点击<@gd.key>完成模拟</>按钮来完成模拟吧 。
guide_text_blackbox_belt1_step1_3_mb.en: Simulation goals achieved. Tap the <@gd.key>End SIM</> button to complete the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_1.cn: 首先请打开<@gd.key>采种机</>，并将<@gd.key>砂叶</>放入。
guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_1.en: First, open the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> control panel and place <@gd.key>Sandleaf</> into it.

guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_2.cn: 将采种机同时连接至<@gd.key>两台种植机</>中，并且有一台种植机<@gd.key>连接回采种机</>，即可形成自循环！
guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_2.en: Connect a Seed-Picking Unit to <@gd.key>2 Planting Units</>, and connect 1 of these Planting Units <@gd.key>back to the Seed-Picking Unit</> to create a self-feeding loop!

guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_3.cn: 高容谷地电池需要<@gd.key>钢制零件</>和<@gd.key>致密源石粉末</>在封装机中生产。
guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_3.en: HC Valley Batteries must be made with <@gd.key>Steel Part</> and <@gd.key>Dense Originium Powder</> at the Packaging Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_4.cn: 完成第一个附加奖励目标，需要同时有<@gd.key>两条蓝铁粉末产线</>输入到研磨机中。
guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_4.en: To complete the first bonus goal, the <@gd.key>2 Ferrium Powder production lines</> must be connected to the Grinding Unit input ports.

guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_5.cn: 完成第二个附加奖励目标，需要同时有<@gd.key>两条致密源石粉末产线</>输入到封装机中。
guide_text_blackbox_belt2_helper_5.en: To complete the second bonus goal, the <@gd.key>2 Dense Originium Powder production lines</> must be connected to the Packaging Unit input ports.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_helper_1.cn: 使用场地内的现有设备，连接传送带搭建<@gd.key>低容谷地电池产线</>。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_helper_1.en: Connect existing facilities in the area with transport belts to set up an <@gd.key>LC Valley Battery production line</>.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_helper_2.cn:
使用仓库存取线与传送带搭建<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊产线</>。
搭建出产率稳定的产线还可以完成额外奖励目标！
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_helper_2.en: Use the Depot Bus and transport belts to set up a <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C] production line</>. Reaching a stable production yield will also complete the bonus goal for more rewards!

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_helper_3.cn:
灌装机的不间断生产受到紫晶质瓶的限制。
<@gd.key>提高紫晶质瓶的生产速率</>，可能是完成额外奖励目标的关键。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_helper_3.en: Production at the Filling Unit is intermittent due to Amethyst Bottle shortage. <@gd.key>Raising the production rate of Amethyst Bottles</> is key for completing the bonus goal.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_start_1.cn: 本次模拟中，需要使用场地中已有的设备来完成产线搭建。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_start_1.en: This simulation requires the setting up of a production line with existing facilities.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_start_2.cn: 现在需要生产低容谷地电池，配方的源材料是<@gd.key>源石粉末</>与<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_start_2.en: LC Valley Batteries must be produced. The formula shows that <@gd.key>Originium Powder</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</> are the materials required.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_start_3.cn: 生产出以上两种产物，并运输至<@gd.key>封装机</>中即可。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_start_3.en: Produce those raw materials and transport them to the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> for production.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_start_4.cn: 请使用传送带与现有的仓库存货口/取货口，完成<@gd.key>低容谷地电池产线</>的搭建。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_start_4.en: Use the transport belt and existing Depot Loaders/Unloaders to set up a complete <@gd.key>LC Valley Battery production line</>.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_step2_1.cn: 阶段一的目标已完成，现在需要搭建<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊产线</>。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_step2_1.en: Phase 1 goal completed. Time to set up a <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C] production line</>.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_step2_2.cn: <@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>需要使用荞花粉末与紫晶质瓶，在灌装机中生产得到。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_step2_2.en: <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</> must be made at the Filling Unit with Buckflower Powder and Amethyst Bottles.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_step2_3.cn: 一批新的设备已放入仓库中，可以通过快捷栏使用。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_step2_3.en: The Depot has received a new batch of facilities. Use them with the hotbar.

guide_text_blackbox_bus2_step2_4.cn: 请结合使用场地内现有设备，完成<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊产线</>的搭建。
guide_text_blackbox_bus2_step2_4.en: Use existing facilities in the area to set up a complete <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C] production line</>.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_hint_1.cn: 前往<@gd.key>仓库存取线高光处</>摆放仓库取货口。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_hint_1.en: Place the Depot Unloader at the <@gd.key>highlighted section of the Depot Bus</>.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_hint_2.cn: 打开<@gd.key>仓库取货口</>的操作面板。

guide_text_blackbox_bus_hint_3.cn: 连接传送带，并放置仓库存货口，完成产线。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_hint_3.en: Connect transport belts and place the Depot Loader to complete the production line.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_hint_4.cn: 可以在<@gd.key>灌装机</>处完成附加目标，使用<@gd.key>仓库取货口</>取出荞花粉末与紫晶质瓶，生产荞愈胶囊并通过<@gd.key>仓库存货口</>存入仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_hint_4.en: Use the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to complete the bonus goal. Use <@gd.key>Depot Unloaders</> to unload Buckflower Powder and Amethyst Bottle, then produce Buck Capsules [C] with them at the Filling Unit, and finally load them into the Depot via the <@gd.key>Depot Loader</>.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>仓库存取线</>是一种特殊的设备，在解锁后即会出现在集成核心区域内。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_1.en: The <@gd.key>Depot Bus</> is a special AIC Factory facility. Once unlocked, it will appear at the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_2.cn: <@gd.key>仓库取货口</>的作用类似协议核心取货口，可选择具体物品，并连接传送带从仓库中输出。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_2.en: The <@gd.key>Depot Unloader</> works like the PAC output port. Interact with it to select an item to unload from the Depot and onto a connected transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_3.cn: <@gd.key>仓库存货口</>的作用类似协议核心输入口，可以在连接传送带后，将物品输入仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_3.en: The <@gd.key>Depot Loader</> works like the PAC input port. Connect it to a transport belt to load items into the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_4.cn: 仓库取货口和存货口可以<@gd.key>贴靠仓库存取线自由摆放</>。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_4.en: Depot Loaders and Depot Unloaders can be placed <@gd.key>anywhere right next to the entire length of the Depot Bus</>.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_5.cn: 接下来，请参考荞花粉末产线，使用仓库取货口与存货口完成紫晶质瓶产线的搭建。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_start_5.en: Next, reference the Buckflower Powder production line and use the Depot Unloader and Depot Loader to set up a complete Amethyst Bottle production line.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_step1_1.cn: 仓库取货口需要<@gd.key>贴靠仓库存取线放置</>，才能从仓库中取出物品。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_step1_1.en: Depot Unloaders must be placed <@gd.key>right next to the Depot Bus</> to unload items from the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_step2_1.cn: 可以在仓库取货口选择仓库中的物品进行运输。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_step2_1.en: Interact with the Depot Unloader to select the Depot item to unload.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_step2_1_ct.cn: 可以在仓库取货口选择仓库中的物品进行运输，请按下<action=common_confirm>选择。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_step2_1_ct.en: Interact with the Depot Unloader to select the Depot item to unload. Press <action=common_confirm> to select.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_step2_2.cn: 当前需要搭建紫晶质瓶的产线，请选择<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_step2_2.en: We should select <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> since we must set up an Amethyst Bottle production line.

guide_text_blackbox_bus_step2_2_ct.cn: 当前需要搭建紫晶质瓶的产线，请按下<action=common_confirm>选择<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_bus_step2_2_ct.en: An Amethyst Bottle production line must be set up. Press <action=common_confirm> to select <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_extra_1.cn: 注意，随着物品准入口<@gd.key>限制数量</>功能的关闭，传送带运输的源矿可以<@gd.key>顺利通过</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_extra_1.en: NOTE: Once the Item Control Port <@gd.key>quantity limit</> function is switched off, the Originium Ore on the transport belt can <@gd.key>successfully pass through</> the Item Control Port.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.cn: 注意，这个<@gd.key>物品准入口</>上显示的图标为<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.en: Note. This<@gd.key>Item Control Port</> displays an icon for <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.cn: 而<@gd.key>传送带</>上运输的物品为<@gd.key>源矿</>，所以它被禁止通过。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.en: However, the <@gd.key>transport belt</> is moving <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>, which is not allowed to pass through the Item Control Port.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.cn: 请先打开这个<@gd.key>物品准入口</>操作面板。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.en: Open the control panel of this <@gd.key>Item Control Port</>.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.cn: <@gd.key>物品准入口</>可以设置一种物品，不符合设定的其他物品<@gd.key>无法通过</>。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.en: An item can be set at the <@gd.key>Item Control Port</>. Once set, all other items <@gd.key>cannot</> pass through it.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.cn: 这里显示了当前<@gd.key>允许通过</>的物品图标，目前是<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>，点击此处进行更换。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.en: This shows the icon of the item that is <@gd.key>allowed to pass</>. The current item is <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</>. Click here to change it to another item.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.cn: 这里显示了当前<@gd.key>允许通过</>的物品图标，目前是<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>，请按下<action=common_confirm>进行更换。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.en: This shows the icon of the item that is <@gd.key>allowed to pass</>. The current item is <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</>. Press <action=common_confirm> to change it to another item.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.cn: 这里展示当前可设置为<@gd.key>允许通过</>的所有物品图标。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_start_1_.en: This shows the icons of all items that can be allowed to <@gd.key>pass through</> the Item Control Port.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_1.en: Click here to set the item to <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_2.en: Click here to exit the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_3.cn: 注意，随着物品准入口<@gd.key>限制物品</>更换为<@gd.key>源矿</>，传送带运输的<@gd.key>源矿</>可以<@gd.key>顺利通过</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_3.en: NOTE: Once the Item Control Port <@gd.key>item limit</> is switched to <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>, the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> on the transport belt can <@gd.key>successfully pass through</> the Item Control Port.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_4.cn: 注意，这个<@gd.key>物品准入口</>上显示的图标为<@gd.key>源矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_4.en: NOTE: This <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> shows the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> icon.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_5.cn: <@gd.key>传送带</>上运输的物品也是<@gd.key>源矿</>，但还是阻塞了。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_5.en: The <@gd.key>transport belt</> is moving <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> but these items are being blocked.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_6.cn: 请先打开这个<@gd.key>物品准入口</>操作面板。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_1_6.en: Open the control panel of this <@gd.key>Item Control Port</>.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_1.cn: <@gd.key>物品准入口</>还具有<@gd.key>数量限制</>功能。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_1.en: <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> also has a <@gd.key>quantity limit</> function.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_2.cn: 这里<@gd.key>数量限制</>被设定为<@gd.key>1</>，所以在有<@gd.key>1个</>源矿通过后就会发生阻塞。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_2.en: The <@gd.key>quantity limit</> of this Item Control Port has been set to <@gd.key>1</>. Once <@gd.key>1</> unit of Originium Ore passes through, the rest will be blocked.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_3.cn: 点击此处<@gd.key>关闭数量限制</>功能。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_3.en: Click here to <@gd.key>switch off the quantity limit</> function.
Press and hold <action=fac_valve_switch_limit> to <@gd.key>switch off the quantity limit</> function.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_4.en: Click here to exit the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_5.cn: <@gd.key>物品准入口</>还可以<@gd.key>紧贴</>设备输出口起到<@gd.key>筛选输出物品</>的作用。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_5.en: The <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> can also be placed <@gd.key>right next</> to any facility's output port to <@gd.key>sort the outgoing products</>.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_6.cn: 这里的 2 个<@gd.key>物品准入口</>分别设置允许通过的物品为<@gd.key>荞花</>和<@gd.key>柑实</>。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_6.en: These 2 <@gd.key>Item Control Ports</> have their item limits set to <@gd.key>Buckflower</> and <@gd.key>Citrome</> respectively.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_7.cn: 那么储物箱中的物品就会按照<@gd.key>物品准入口</>所设定的物品进行对应的输出。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_7.en: The Stash will thus unload items according to the item limits set by the <@gd.key>Item Control Ports</>.

guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_8.cn: 请将 2 条<@gd.key>传送带</>分别连接至前方的<@gd.key>粉碎机</>。
guide_text_blackbox_conditioner_step_2_8.en: Connect the 2 <@gd.key>transport belts</> to the respective <@gd.key>Shredding Units</>.

guide_text_blackbox_connector_helper_1.cn: 使用物流桥，连接传送带，将源矿从协议核心取货口运输至粉碎机中。
guide_text_blackbox_connector_helper_1.en: Use the Belt Bridge to set up a transport belt for moving Originium Ore from the PAC output port to the Shredding Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_connector_helper_2.cn: 使用物流桥，将源矿从协议核心取货口分别运输至三台热能池中。
guide_text_blackbox_connector_helper_2.en: Use the Belt Bridge to move Originium Ore from the PAC output port to 3 Thermal Banks.

guide_text_blackbox_connector_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>物流桥</>是一种物流设备，放置后可使得<@gd.key>两条交叉传送带进行传输</>而互不影响。
guide_text_blackbox_connector_start_1.en: The <@gd.key>Belt Bridge</> is a logistics unit that lets <@gd.key>1 transport belt cross over another intersecting belt</> without interrupting the product flows of both.

guide_text_blackbox_connector_start_2.cn: 可以使用快捷栏来放置物流桥。
guide_text_blackbox_connector_start_2.en: The Belt Bridge can be placed in the hotbar.

guide_text_blackbox_connector_start_3.cn: 在物流桥解锁后，也支持在放置传送带时，与原有的传送带交叉，<@gd.key>交叉处会自动放置物流桥</>。
guide_text_blackbox_connector_start_3.en: Once the Belt Bridge is unlocked, placing a transport belt over another will <@gd.key>automatically place a Belt Bridge at the intersection</>.

guide_text_blackbox_connector_start_4.cn: 接下来，请参考传送带指示线，使用物流桥将源矿运输至粉碎机中。
guide_text_blackbox_connector_start_4.en: Now, refer to the indicated line of the transport belt and use the Belt Bridge to move Originium Ore to the Shredding Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_converger_helper_1.cn: 使用汇流器，连接传送带，将两个高光灌装机的产物汇流输入仓库存货口。
guide_text_blackbox_converger_helper_1.en: Use the Converger to connect the transport belts and move products from the 2 highlighted Filling Units to the Depot Loader.

guide_text_blackbox_converger_helper_2.cn: 使用汇流器，连接传送带，将所有灌装机和封装机同时汇流输入到仓库存货口。
guide_text_blackbox_converger_helper_2.en: Use the Converger to connect the transport belts and move products from all Filling Units and the Packaging Unit to the Depot Loader.

guide_text_blackbox_converger_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>汇流器</>是一种物流设备，可将最多3条传送带并入1条传送带进行传输。
guide_text_blackbox_converger_start_1.en: The <@gd.key>Converger</> is a logistics unit that can merge up to 3 belts into 1 belt to combine product flows.

guide_text_blackbox_converger_start_2.cn: 与分流器类似，<@gd.key>汇流器</>有三个输入口和一个取货口，可以将输入传送带的产物汇流至取货口。
guide_text_blackbox_converger_start_2.en: Like the Splitter, the <@gd.key>Converger</> has 3 input ports as well as 1 output port. It can combine product flows from up to 3 belts onto 1 belt and deliver them to the Depot Loader.

guide_text_blackbox_converger_start_3.cn: 接下来，请参考传送带指示线，使用汇流器将1份荞愈胶囊和1份柑实罐头汇流存入仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_converger_start_3.en: Now, refer to the transport belt guiding lines and use the Converger to move 1 Buck Capsule [C] and 1 Canned Citrome [C] onto a single belt and deliver them to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_converger_start_4.cn: <@gd.key>汇流器</>已放置于快捷栏中，可以直接使用。
guide_text_blackbox_converger_start_4.en: The <@gd.key>Converger</> has been placed in the hotbar and can be used directly.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.cn: <@gd.key>拆解机</>是一种可以对物品进行物理拆分的特殊设备。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.en: <@gd.key>Separating Units</> are special facilities that can physically separate certain items.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.cn: 请先点击这里查看它的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.en: Click here to check its production formula.
Press <action=fac_machine_show_formula> to view the production formulas available.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.cn: 在这里可以看到，拆解机可以将各种灌装了液体的容器重新拆分为<@gd.key>液体和容器</>。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.en: This shows that the Separating Unit can separate various bottled fluids into the <@gd.key>fluid and the container</>.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.cn: 我们可以利用这一点来重新使用已经被灌装过的瓶子或里面的液体来进行生产。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.en: We can use this function to separate a bottled fluid into the bottle and fluid contents for other production processes.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.cn: 在这个协议储存箱中存放了一批<@gd.key>装有液体的紫晶质瓶</>。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.en: This Protocol Stash has a batch of <@gd.key>Fluids in Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.cn: 请使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接协议储存箱和拆解机，将装有液体的紫晶质瓶重新拆分为<@gd.key>空瓶子和液体</>。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_dismantl.en: Connect the Protocol Stash and Separating Unit with a <@gd.key>transport belt</> and separate the Fluids in Amethyst Bottles into the <@gd.key>empty bottles and the fluid contents</>.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_extraste.cn: 想要完成附加目标，我们还需要将刚刚拆分出的<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>重新灌装到<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>中。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_extraste.en: To complete the bonus goal, we also need to refill the separated <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> into <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_extraste.cn: 这样也可以避免拆解机缓存区满后生产线出现<@gd.key>阻塞</>的情况。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_extraste.en: This can also prevent the Separating Unit's cache from being completely filled and <@gd.key>clogging</> the production line.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_extraste.cn: 请放置1台<@gd.key>灌装机</>，将刚刚拆解机拆分出的锦草溶液和紫晶质瓶运输到灌装机中重新灌装。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_extraste.en: Place 1 <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>, then move the separated Jincao Solution and empty Amethyst Bottles from the Separating Unit to the Filling Unit for refilling.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_extraste.cn: 接下来请补齐生产线，将装有锦草溶液的紫晶质瓶运输回仓库就可以完成附加目标了。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_extraste.en: Now complete the production line and move the Jincao Solution in Amethyst Bottle back to the Depot to complete the bonus goal.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>拆解机</>可以对物品进行物理拆分，比如将罐装液体的瓶子拆分为空瓶子与液体。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_start_1.en: <@gd.key>Separating Units</> can physically separate certain items. An example would be separating a filled container into an empty container and its fluid content.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_start_2.cn: 在本次模拟中我们需要利用拆解机将容器和里面的溶液进行拆分，使其可分别用于其他生产。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_start_2.en: For this simulation, we must use Separating Units to separate containers and their fluid contents so that they can be used in other production processes.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_start_3.cn: 请先前往<@gd.key>拆解机</>处查看相关生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_start_3.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Separating Unit</> to view its production formulas.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step1_1.cn: 请与<@gd.key>拆解机</>交互查看其生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step1_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Separating Unit</> to view its production formulas.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step2_1.cn: 请使用传送带连接协议储存箱和拆解机，让拆解机开始运转。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step2_1.en: Use a transport belt to connect the Protocol Stash to the Separating Unit and get the latter to work.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step3_1.cn: 请先在虚影处放置1台<@gd.key>拆解机</>，将紫晶质瓶中的<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>拆分出来。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step3_1.en: First, place 1 <@gd.key>Separating Unit</> at the hologram to separate <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> from Amethyst Bottles.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step3_2.cn: 接下来请前往虚影处再放置1台<@gd.key>拆解机</>，将蓝铁瓶中的锦草溶液拆分出来以获取<@gd.key>空的蓝铁瓶</>。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step3_2.en: Next, place 1 more <@gd.key>Separating Unit</> at the hologram to separate Jincao Solution from Ferrium Bottles to get <@gd.key>empty Ferrium Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step3_3.cn: 请补齐生产线，将2台拆解机拆分出的<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>和<@gd.key>空蓝铁瓶</>分别输送到<@gd.key>灌装机</>中以重新灌装芽针溶液。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step3_3.en: Complete the production line so that the <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> and <@gd.key>empty Ferrium Bottles</> from the 2 Separating Units are transported to a <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to fill up the Yazhen Solution again.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step3_4.cn: 非常好，现在清空后的蓝铁瓶可以重新灌装芽针溶液了。等待产线运转就可以完成本次模拟的目标了。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler1_step3_4.en: Excellent. The Yazhen Solution can now be filled into the empty Ferrium Bottles. Wait for production line to work for a while to complete the simulation goal.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.cn: 看，装有液体的紫晶质瓶已经被输送到<@gd.key>拆解机</>中进行自动拆分了。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.en: The Fluids in Amethyst Bottles are now being transported to the <@gd.key>Separating Unit</> for automatic separation.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.cn: 瓶中原有的液体在拆分后可以通过管道输出，再重新参与其他生产或通过储液罐进行存储。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.en: Fluids separated from the bottles can be moved out via pipelines to take part in other production processes or stored in a Fluid Tank.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.cn: 而清空后的紫晶质瓶也可以重新存入仓库以用于其他生产。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.en: The empty Amethyst Bottles can also be stored in the Depot for other production processes.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.cn: 我们可以参照这种形式，利用拆解机对原有生产线进行重构。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.en: We can use the function of the Separating Unit to restructure existing production lines.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.cn: 在本次模拟中，集成工业系统需要生产一批<@gd.key>芽针针剂</>，但仓库中只有瓶装的芽针溶液和已灌有锦草溶液的蓝铁瓶。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.en: The AIC Factory in this simulation must produce a batch of <@gd.key>Yazhen Syringes [C]</>, but the Depot only has bottled Yazhen Solution and Jincao Solution in Ferrium Bottles.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.cn: 这就需要我们使用拆解机将芽针溶液和蓝铁瓶重新拆分出来进行使用。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.en: We'll need to use Separating Units to separate out the Yazhen Solution and empty Ferrium Bottles, then use them to produce the desired item.

guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.cn: 接下来请使用拆解机重构生产线，将芽针溶液拆分后重新灌装到蓝铁瓶中以生产芽针针剂。
guide_text_blackbox_dismantler_dismview_.en: The next step is to use Separating Units to restructure the production line, separate out the Yazhen Solution, and fill it in empty Ferrium Bottles to produce Yazhen Syringes [C].

guide_text_blackbox_entry_hint_1.cn:
这里是所有模拟空间的列表，可在此查看。
完成模拟空间即可获得<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。
guide_text_blackbox_entry_hint_1.en: This shows a list of all simulations available. Complete simulations to acquire <@gd.key>system blueprints</>.

guide_text_blackbox_entry_hint_2.cn: 可通过完成该模拟空间，获取<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>的系统蓝图。
guide_text_blackbox_entry_hint_2.en: Complete this simulation to acquire the <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</> system blueprint.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_extrastep_1.cn: 在建立相同的多个产线时，可以考虑复用部分现有的结构。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_extrastep_1.en: When duplicating a production line, consider using some of the existing facilities.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_extrastep_2.cn: 在只有3个取货口的情况下，我们可以<@gd.key>用1台粉碎机同时为2台灌装机</>提供<@gd.key>柑实粉末</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_extrastep_2.en: Since the PAC only has 3 output ports on one side, try using <@gd.key>1 Shredding Unit to supply 2 Filling Units simultaneously</> with <@gd.key>Citrome Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_extrastep_3.cn: 接下来请再放置<@gd.key>1台精炼炉、1台塑形机和1台灌装机</>，从剩余的取货口输出<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_extrastep_3.en: Now place <@gd.key>1 Refining Unit, 1 Moulding Unit, and 1 Filling Unit</>, and use the output port available to move <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> out of the Depot for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_extrastep_4.cn: 最后请用传送带连接各设备，让生产柑实粉末的<@gd.key>粉碎机</>同时为<@gd.key>2台灌装机</>提供原料。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_extrastep_4.en: Finally, connect the facilities with transport belts and use the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> to produce Citrome Powder and supply <@gd.key>2 Filling Units</> at the same time.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_filling_1.cn: 灌装机不仅可以用来生产药品，还能对食品进行灌装。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_filling_1.en: Filling Units can produce medications as well as canned food.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_filling_2.cn: 想要生产<@gd.key>柑实罐头</>可以使用同样的产线布置，并将输送到<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中的原料替换为柑实。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_filling_2.en: To produce <@gd.key>Canned Citrome [C]</>, use the same production line layout and supply the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> with Citromes instead.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_filling_3.cn: 接下来就请参照这个形式，在协议核心另一侧搭建一条<@gd.key>新的柑实罐头产线</>吧。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_filling_3.en: Reference this layout and set up a <@gd.key>new Canned Citrome [C] production line</> on the other side of the PAC.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_1.cn: 我们在简易制作中已经试过使用<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>和<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>制造<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_1.en: We used Crafting to make <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</> with <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_2.cn: 而使用<@gd.key>灌装机</>则可以代替简易制作，建立自动化的<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊产线</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_2.en: We can use the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> in place of Crafting to set up an automated <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C] production line</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_3.cn: 场地内已经预先放置了生产荞愈胶囊所需的所有设备，使用<@gd.key>传送带</>正确连接各设备即可进行荞愈胶囊的生产。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_3.en: The area already has facilities for Buck Capsule [C] production. Connect them properly with <@gd.key>transport belts</> to produce Buck Capsule [C].

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_4.cn: 将<@gd.key>荞花</>从协议核心取货口中输送到粉碎机中可加工成<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_4.en: Move <@gd.key>Buckflower</> from the PAC output port to the Shredding Unit to produce <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_5.cn: 将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>依次经过<@gd.key>精炼炉</>和<@gd.key>塑形机</>可制成<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_5.en: Move <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and then move the refined product to the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_6.cn: 最后将这两者都输入到<@gd.key>灌装机</>中就可以生产<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>了，现在就来试试吧。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_6.en: Finally, move Buckflower Powder and Amethyst Bottles to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</>. Let's try this out right now.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_7.cn: 注意，本次模拟中设备<@gd.key>无法手动放入或取出物品</>。请使用<@gd.key>传送带</>进行物品的转移。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_start_7.en: NOTE: This simulation <@gd.key>forbids manual transfer of items</> to or from any facilities. <@gd.key>Transport belts</> are the only option for moving items.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step1_1.cn: 请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>进行<@gd.key>传送带</>的连接，建立使用灌装机生产荞花胶囊的自动化产线。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step1_1.en: Refer to the <@gd.key>indicated lines</> and connect the <@gd.key>transport belt</>. We recommend using the Filling Unit to set up an automated Buck Capsule [C] production line.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step1_2.cn: 很好，现在<@gd.key>灌装机</>可以自动获取原料并生产<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step1_2.en: Good. The <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> is now getting materials and making <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</> automatically.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_1.cn: 请先在协议核心另一侧新放置1台<@gd.key>粉碎机</>并用<@gd.key>供电桩</>供电。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_1.en: Place 1 new <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> on the other side of the PAC and power it with the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_2.cn: 请将<@gd.key>柑实</>从<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>处，输送到<@gd.key>粉碎机</>中以加工获取<@gd.key>柑实粉末</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_2.en: Move <@gd.key>Citromes</> from the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> to shred them into <@gd.key>Citrome Powder</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_3.cn: 请再放置1台<@gd.key>精炼炉</>和<@gd.key>塑形机</>，并从取货口输送<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>来生产紫晶质瓶。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_3.en: Then place 1 <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</>, then move <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> out of an output port to start producing Amethyst Bottles.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_4.cn: 接下来请放置1台新的<@gd.key>灌装机</>用于生产<@gd.key>柑实罐头</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_4.en: Now place 1 new <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Canned Citrome [C]</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_5.cn: 请完善产线，将<@gd.key>柑实粉末</>和<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>输送到<@gd.key>灌装机</>中以生产<@gd.key>柑实罐头</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_5.en: Complete the production line by moving <@gd.key>Citrome Powder</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottles</> to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Canned Citrome [C]</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_6.cn: 最后别忘了连接<@gd.key>传送带</>将产出的柑实罐头运输回协议核心<@gd.key>仓库</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_6.en: Don't forget to connect a <@gd.key>transport belt</> to move the Canned Citrome [C] produced to the PAC for storage in the <@gd.key>Depot</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_7.cn: 非常好，现在集成工业系统可以自动生产和储备柑实罐头了。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_7.en: Awesome. The AIC can now produce and store Canned Citrome [C] automatically.

guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_8.cn: 产线的运转需要一点时间，等待的时候不妨试着挑战一下<@gd.key>附加目标</>吧。
guide_text_blackbox_filling1_step2_8.en: Let the production line run for a while. Feel free to tackle the <@gd.key>bonus goal</> while waiting.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_1.cn: 封装机可以将某些瓶装液体进行封装以生产出特定的药剂或饮品。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_1.en: The Packaging Unit can package and bottle fluids to produce special medicines or beverages.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_2.cn: 此封装机已经锁定了<@gd.key>锦草软饮</>的配方。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_2.en: This Packaging Unit is locked to the formula: <@gd.key>Jincao Drink</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_3.cn: 可以看到，<@gd.key>锦草软饮</>可以通过将<@gd.key>铁制零件</>和<@gd.key>装有锦草溶液的蓝铁瓶</>进行封装来生产获得。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_3.en: This shows that <@gd.key>Jincao Drink</> can be produced by packaging <@gd.key>Jincao Solution in Ferrium Bottle</> with <@gd.key>Ferrium Parts</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_4.cn: 而<@gd.key>装有锦草溶液的蓝铁瓶</>则可以通过<@gd.key>灌装机的液体模式</>来进行批量生产。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_4.en: <@gd.key>Jincao Solution in Ferrium Bottle</> can be mass produced using <@gd.key>Filling Units set to the Fluid Mode</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_5.en: Click the button to close the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_6.cn: 液体模式的灌装机带有<@gd.key>管道接口</>，可以将液体输入到设备中参与生产。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_6.en: Fluid Mode Filling Units are furnished with <@gd.key>pipe fixtures</> so that fluids can be processed by the facility.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_7.cn: 使用管道将液体输入到灌装机中，再与各类容器组合就可以生产出装有特定溶液的瓶子了。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_7.en: Use pipelines to transport various fluid solutions into the Filling Unit. The Filling Unit can then fill various bottles to produce bottled solutions.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_8.cn: 接下来请前往<@gd.key>灌装机</>处查看<@gd.key>装有锦草溶液的蓝铁瓶</>的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_assebling_8.en: Next, go to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to view the production formula for <@gd.key>Jincao Solution in Ferrium Bottle</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_1.cn: 本次模拟还有一个<@gd.key>附加目标</>，需要使用封装机生产芽针针剂。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_1.en: This simulation has a <@gd.key>bonus goal</> of using the Packaging Unit to produce Yazhen Syringe [C].

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_2.cn: 与锦草软饮类似，封装机可以用<@gd.key>铁制零件</>将<@gd.key>装有芽针溶液的蓝铁瓶</>封装为芽针针剂。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_2.en: Like Jincao Drink, the Packaging Unit can use <@gd.key>Ferrium Part</> to package <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution in Ferrium Bottles</> into Yazhen Syringe [C].

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_3.cn: 而<@gd.key>装有芽针溶液的蓝铁瓶</>则可以通过将<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>输入到灌装机中生产获得。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_3.en: <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution in Ferrium Bottles</> can be mass produced by transporting <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> to a Filling Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_4.cn: 场地中已经预设了所需的芽针粉末产线，在这里<@gd.key>放置新的反应池</>并使用<@gd.key>水泵和管道</>连接水就可以生产芽针溶液了。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_4.en: Several facilities for the Yazhen Powder production line have been placed in the area. Just <@gd.key>place a new Reactor Crucible</> and supply it with Clean Water with the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump and pipelines</> to start producing Yazhen Solution.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_5.cn: 最后再将<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>和<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>输送到<@gd.key>灌装机</>中，为封装机提供生产芽针针剂所需的瓶装芽针溶液。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extra_5.en: Finally, move <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> and <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottles</> to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to produce bottled Yazhen Solution needed by the Packaging Unit to make Yazhen Syringe [C].

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extrastep_1.cn: 请放置<@gd.key>新的水泵和反应池</>并生产<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extrastep_1.en: Place the <@gd.key>new Fluid Pump and Reactor Crucible</> to produce <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extrastep_2.cn: 请将芽针溶液和蓝铁瓶输入到<@gd.key>灌装机</>，并等待封装机生产芽针针剂。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_extrastep_2.en: Move Yazhen Solution and Ferrium Bottles to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>, then wait for the Packaging Unit to produce Yazhen Syringe [C].

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_1.cn: 灌装机在武陵地区会自动启用<@gd.key>液体模式</>以支持管道的连接。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_1.en: In the region of Wuling, Filling Units will automatically activate <@gd.key>Fluid Mode</> to accommodate pipeline connections.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_2.cn: 将液体原料通过管道输入到灌装机中可与各类容器一起进行灌装生产。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_2.en: Use pipelines to move fluid materials into Filling Units to make products that require the filling process.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_3.cn: 此灌装机已经锁定了<@gd.key>装有锦草溶液的蓝铁瓶</>的配方。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_3.en: This Filling Unit is locked to the formula: <@gd.key>Jincao Solution in Ferrium Bottle</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_4.cn: 可以看到，使用<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>和<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>即可批量生产<@gd.key>装有锦草溶液的蓝铁瓶</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_4.en: As shown here, we can use <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottle</> and <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> to mass produce <@gd.key>Jincao Solution in Ferrium Bottle</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_5.en: Click the button to close the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_6.cn: 场地中已经预设了<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>的产线并连接到了灌装机中。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_6.en: The area already has a <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottle</> production line connected to the Filling Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_7.cn: <@gd.key>锦草溶液</>则可以通过粉碎机和反应池加工获得。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_7.en: <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> can be made by processing raw materials at the Shredding Unit and then the Reactor Crucible.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_8.cn: 接下来请使用水泵和物流设备完善锦草溶液的产线，再将其输送到<@gd.key>灌装机</>中。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_filling_8.en: Now, let's use the Fluid Pump and other logistics units to set up a Jincao Solution production line, then move the Jincao Solution produced to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_mix_1.cn: 反应池有<@gd.key>2个管道取货口</>，在<@gd.key>设定输出物</>时需要留意刚刚使用的是哪个端口。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_mix_1.en: The Reactor Crucible has <@gd.key>2 pipe outlets</>. Keep an eye on the pipe outlet being used when <@gd.key>selecting the outgoing products</> of the facility.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_mix_2.cn: 端口有<@gd.key>橙黄两种颜色</>，在反应池外部和操作面板中都有对应的<@gd.key>标识</>可进行区分。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_mix_2.en: There are 2 pipe outlet colors: <@gd.key>orange and yellow</>. They are <@gd.key>marked</> accordingly on the Reactor Crucible as well as the control panel.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_mix_3.cn: 且连接了管道后，操作面板中也会出现连通的效果提示。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_mix_3.en: Once pipelines have been connected, the control panel will show the connections as well.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_mix_4.cn: 接下来就点击刚刚连接了管道的端口，将<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>设定为输出物吧。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_mix_4.en: Next, click on the pipe outlet we just connected and select <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> as the outgoing fluid product.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_start_1.cn: 在本次模拟中我们需要使用<@gd.key>封装机</>和<@gd.key>灌装机的液体模式</>来搭建锦草软饮产线。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_start_1.en: In this simulation, we must use the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> and <@gd.key>Filling Unit Fluid Mode</> to set up a Jincao Drink production line.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_start_2.cn: 请先前往<@gd.key>封装机</>处查看锦草软饮的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_start_2.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> to view the Jincao Drink production formula.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step0_1.cn: 请与<@gd.key>封装机</>交互查看锦草软饮的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step0_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> to view the Jincao Drink production formula.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step1_1.cn: 请与<@gd.key>灌装机</>交互查看<@gd.key>装有锦草溶液的蓝铁瓶</>的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step1_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to view the production formula for <@gd.key>Jincao Solution in Ferrium Bottle</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_1.cn: 请使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接粉碎机和反应池，将锦草粉末输入到反应池中。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>transport belt</> to connect the Shredding Unit to the Reactor Crucible. This moves Jincao Powder to the Reactor Crucible.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_2.cn: 请前往水边放置一台<@gd.key>水泵</>用来抽水。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_2.en: Place a <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> next to the water body to pump water out of it.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_3.cn: 请使用管道连接<@gd.key>水泵和反应池</>，等待清水输送到反应池中并生产<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_3.en: Connect the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump and Reactor Crucible</> with a pipeline and wait for the Reactor Crucible to get Clean Water to produce <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_4.cn: 接下来请参照指示线，使用管道连接<@gd.key>反应池和灌装机</>，
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_4.en: Refer to the indicated line and connect the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible and Filling Unit</> with pipes.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_5.cn: 最后别忘了与<@gd.key>反应池</>交互，设定要输出的液体为<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step2_5.en: Don't forget to interact with the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> to set <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> as the outgoing fluid product.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step3_1.cn: 请在反应池中<@gd.key>设定锦草溶液为要输出的液体</>，使用灌装机将溶液装瓶。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step3_1.en: <@gd.key>Set Jincao Solution as the outgoing fluid product</> of the Reactor Crucible so that the Filling Unit can start filling bottles with the solution.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step3_2.cn: 非常好，现在灌装机可以使用锦草溶液和蓝铁瓶来生产<@gd.key>装有锦草溶液的蓝铁瓶</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step3_2.en: Excellent. Now the Filling Unit can use Jincao Solution and Ferrium Bottles to produce <@gd.key>Jincao Solution in Ferrium Bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step3_3.cn: 等待产线继续运转，就可以通过封装机生产获得<@gd.key>锦草软饮</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_filling4_step3_3.en: Let the production line run for a while so that the Packaging Unit produces <@gd.key>Jincao Drink</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_formula_1.cn: 点这里查看<@gd.key>灌装机</>的配方列表。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_formula_1.en: Click here to view <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> formulas.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_formula_1_.cn: 请按下<action=fac_machine_show_formula>查看<@gd.key>灌装机</>的配方列表。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_formula_1_.en: Press <action=fac_machine_show_formula> to view the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> formulas.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_formula_2.cn: 这就是<@gd.key>优质柑实罐头</>，它由<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>和<@gd.key>柑实粉末</>合成。试着搭建管线来生产它。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_formula_2.en: This is <@gd.key>Canned Citrome [B]</>. It is made using <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottle</> and <@gd.key>Citrome Powder</>. Try setting up a production line for this product.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_formula_3.cn: 不妨将配方标记，这样回到场景中可以在右侧查看。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_formula_3.en: Pin the formulas so they can be accessed from the right side of the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_helper_1.cn: 前往<@gd.key>灌装机</>看看<@gd.key>优质柑实罐头</>的配方吧！
guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_helper_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to view the <@gd.key>Canned Citrome [B]</> formula!

guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_helper_2.cn: 工人们似乎多摆了一些设备，请注意不要把<@gd.key>传送带</>连错了。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_helper_2.en: The Endfield crew seems to have placed too many facilities. Be careful and don't make the wrong <@gd.key>transport belt</> connections.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_helper_3.cn: 原材料不足的话，可以搭乘<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>前往野外采集。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_helper_3.en: When low on raw materials, latch on the <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</>, zipline to the wilderness, and gather the materials there.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_start_1.cn: 请先前往<@gd.key>灌装机</>查看设备详情。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_2_start_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to view its facility details.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_formula_1.cn: 这就是<@gd.key>精选荞愈胶囊</>的生产配方，其中<@gd.key>钢质瓶</>便是<@gd.key>蓝铁矿</>的系列产物之一。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_formula_1.en: This is the production formula for <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [A]</>. The <@gd.key>Steel Bottle</> in the formula is made from <@gd.key>Ferrium Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_helper_1.cn: 去<@gd.key>灌装机</>打开它的操作面板吧。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_helper_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> and open its control panel.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_helper_2.cn: 我们先搭建<@gd.key>精选荞愈胶囊</>的产线。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_helper_2.en: Let's first set up a <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [A]</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_helper_3.cn: 蓝铁矿不足的话，可以搭乘高级滑索前往野外进行开采。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_helper_3.en: When low on Ferrium Ore, latch on the Zipline Tower, zipline to the wilderness, and gather the materials there.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_helper_4.cn: 砂叶粉末似乎有两台<@gd.key>粉碎机</>在同时生产，或许可以减少一个。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_helper_4.en: There are 2 <@gd.key>Shredding Units</> producing Sandleaf Powder at the same time. Maybe one of the units can be switched off.

guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_start_1.cn: 前往<@gd.key>灌装机</>看看<@gd.key>精选荞愈胶囊</>的配方吧。
guide_text_blackbox_filling_3_start_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> and view the <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [A]</> formula.

guide_text_blackbox_miner_2_helper_1.cn: 场景里已经有 3 台<@gd.key>二型电驱矿机</>了，或许可以挪挪它们的位置……
guide_text_blackbox_miner_2_helper_1.en: The area has 3 <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs Mk II</>. Maybe we should try moving them.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extramix_1.cn: 反应池有2个管道输出接口，可以分别连接管道并设定要输出的液体。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extramix_1.en: The Reactor Crucible has 2 pipe outlets. Connect the outlets to pipelines and set the dispensed fluid.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extramix_2.cn: 我们可以通过这里的颜色来与设备外部的管道端口进行对应。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extramix_2.en: The color markers here correspond to the pipe fixtures outside the facility.
