guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extramix_3.cn: 接下来只要将黄色管道的输出物设为清水就可以将通过刚刚的管道输送到储液罐中了。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extramix_3.en: Next, set the yellow pipe outlet to Clean Water to dispense it to the Fluid Tank via the connected pipeline.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extrastep_1.cn: 请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>，使用管道连接<@gd.key>反应池黄色取货口</>到<@gd.key>储液罐</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extrastep_1.en: Refer to the <@gd.key>indicated line</> and connect the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible yellow outlet</> to the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</> with pipes.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extrastep_2.cn: 请与<@gd.key>反应池</>交互，设定黄色端口的管道输出物为<@gd.key>清水</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_extrastep_2.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> and set the yellow pipe outlet to <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: <@gd.key>储液罐</>是一种用来存储液体的设备，需要通过管道来进行液体的输送。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: <@gd.key>Fluid Tanks</> are facilities for storing fluids, while pipelines are used for transporting fluids.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 反应池有2个管道取货口，可以分别设定任意<@gd.key>池中存在的液体</>来进行输出。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: The Reactor Crucible has 2 pipe outlets. These pipe outlets can supply <@gd.key>any fluid in the crucible</> to pipelines connected to the outlet.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 因此使用<@gd.key>管道</>连接反应池的另一个取货口到储液罐，再在反应池中<@gd.key>设定</>此口的输出物为<@gd.key>清水</>就可以了。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: Hence, connect the other Reactor Crucible pipe outlet to the Fluid Tank with a <@gd.key>pipeline</>, then <@gd.key>set</> the said Reactor Crucible pipe outlet to <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 这里显示了<@gd.key>储液罐</>中的液体情况，可以看到<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>正在通过管道不断输入到储液罐中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: This is the fluid storage status of the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</> and it currently shows <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> being continuously supplied to the tank via the connected pipeline.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 储液罐中的液体使用<@gd.key>空的瓶子</>来进行盛装。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: Fluids in the Fluid Tank can be filled in <@gd.key>empty bottles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 请将<@gd.key>空的钢质瓶</>拖动到液体上以进行盛装。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: Drag an <@gd.key>empty Steel Bottle</> over the fluid to fill it up.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>盛装储液罐中的液体。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to fill it with the fluid from the Fluid Tank.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>选择使用<@gd.key>空的钢质瓶</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to select the <@gd.key>Empty Steel Bottle</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 现在我们就得到了<@gd.key>装有锦草溶液的瓶子</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: We now have a <@gd.key>bottle filled with Jincao Solution</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 之后也可以参照这种方式来存储和使用各类液体。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: We can also use this method to store and use various fluids.
Click the button to close the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 接下来我们还需要在另一个<@gd.key>储液罐</>中储存一些<@gd.key>清水</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: Next, we must fill the other <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</> with some <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.cn: 除了在水边放置新的水泵并一路连接管道过来之外，我们也可以通过<@gd.key>反应池</>来进行液体的输送。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_liquidstorager_.en: In addition to placing a new Fluid Pump next to the water body, we can use the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> to transport the fluid.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_1.cn: <@gd.key>反应池</>是一种可以将固体和液体混合为溶液的特殊设备。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_1.en: <@gd.key>Reactor Crucibles</> are special facilities that can mix solid and fluid materials to produce various solutions.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_10.en: Click Confirm to complete the selection.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_11.cn: 这样产出的锦草溶液就会通过管道输送出去了。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_11.en: The Jincao Solution produced can now be transported out of the facility via the connected pipeline.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_12.en: Click the button to close the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_13.cn: 在这里可以看到，<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>正在通过管道输送到<@gd.key>储液罐</>中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_13.en: Here we can see <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> being moved to the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</> via the pipeline.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_14.cn: 接下来请与<@gd.key>储液罐</>交互，将锦草溶液盛装到瓶子中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_14.en: Next, interact with the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</> and fill empty bottles with Jincao Solution.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_2.cn: 这里显示了固体的输入信息，锦草粉末会通过<@gd.key>传送带</>进入到反应池中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_2.en: This shows the solid material input information. Jincao Powder is being moved by the <@gd.key>transport belt</> into the Reactor Crucible.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_3.cn: 这里则显示了液体的输入信息，清水会通过<@gd.key>管道</>进入到反应池中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_3.en: This shows the fluid material input information. Clean Water is being moved by the <@gd.key>pipeline</> into the Reactor Crucible.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_4.cn: 锦草粉末和清水在进入<@gd.key>反应池</>后将会自动进行混合反应
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_4.en: After receiving Jincao Powder and Clean Water, the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> will automatically perform the mixing reaction.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_5.cn: 这里可以看到，两者混合后产出了一种新的液体——<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_5.en: Here we can see that the two inputs are mixed to produce a new fluid: <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_6.cn: 产出的锦草溶液需要通过管道输出后才能取用。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_6.en: The Jincao Solution produced must be moved out of the Reactor Crucible with a pipeline before it can be used.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_7.cn: 场地内已经预先设置了一条从反应池连通到<@gd.key>储液罐</>的管道。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_7.en: This area already has a pipeline connecting the Reactor Crucible to the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_8.cn: 请点击这里设定要从反应池<@gd.key>输出的液体</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_8.en: Click here to select the <@gd.key>fluid to be dispensed</> from the Reactor Crucible.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_8_ct.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>设定要从反应池<@gd.key>输出的液体</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_8_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to select the <@gd.key>fluid to be dispensed</> from the Reactor Crucible.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_9.cn: 请点击选择<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>，将此产出物通过管道输送到储液罐中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_9.en: Click to select <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> and dispense this product via the pipeline to the Fluid Tank.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_9_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_select>选择<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>，将此产出物通过管道输送到储液罐中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_mix_9_ct.en: Press <action=common_select> to select <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> and dispense this product via the pipeline to the Fluid Tank.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>反应池</>是一种可以将固体和液体混合为溶液的特殊设备。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_1.en: <@gd.key>Reactor Crucibles</> are special facilities that can mix solid and fluid materials to produce various solutions.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_2.cn: 在本次模拟中我们需要将<@gd.key>锦草粉末和清水</>混合到一起以生产出<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_2.en: In this simulation, we must mix <@gd.key>Jincao Powder and Clean Water</> to produce <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_3.cn: 场地内已经预设了一条锦草粉末的产线并将其输入到了<@gd.key>反应池</>中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_3.en: This area already has a Jincao Powder production line connected to the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_4.cn: 我们还需要使用管道将水输送到反应池中以进行<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>的生产。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_4.en: We must use pipelines to supply the Reactor Crucible with Clean Water for <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> production.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_5.cn: 接下来请前往河边放置<@gd.key>水泵</>抽取清水，
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_5.en: Now place a <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> on the riverbank to acquire Clean Water.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_6.cn: 再使用<@gd.key>管道</>连接<@gd.key>水泵和反应池</>以将水输送进反应池中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_start_6.en: Connect the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump to the Reactor Crucible</> with a <@gd.key>pipeline</> to move Clean Water into the Reactor Crucible.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_step1_1.cn: 请先前往水边，在供电桩附近放置一台<@gd.key>水泵</>用来抽水。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_step1_1.en: Place a <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> next to the water body and near an Electric Pylon to start pumping out water.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_step1_2.cn: 请使用<@gd.key>管道</>连接<@gd.key>水泵和反应池</>，将清水输送到反应池中以生产<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_step1_2.en: Connect the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump to the Reactor Crucible</> with a <@gd.key>pipeline</> to move Clean Water into the Reactor Crucible for making <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_step1_3.cn: 请与<@gd.key>反应池</>交互查看溶液的生产情况。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_step1_3.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> to view the status of solution production.

guide_text_blackbox_mix1_step2_1.cn: 请与<@gd.key>储液罐</>交互查看锦草溶液的存储情况。
guide_text_blackbox_mix1_step2_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</> to check the storage of the Jincao Solution.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extra_1.cn: 这样锦草软饮和芽针溶液就可以<@gd.key>共用1个反应池</>进行生产了。接下来只要等待产线运转就可以完成主要目标。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extra_1.en: This means <@gd.key>1 Reactor Crucible</> can be shared by the Jincao Drink and Yazhen Solution production lines. Wait for the production line to work and complete the main goals.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extra_2.cn: 在场地内这一侧还有4条旧的锦草软饮和芽针针剂产线。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extra_2.en: This side of the area has 4 old Jincao Drink and Yazhen Syringe [C] production lines.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extra_3.cn: 我们还可以利用刚刚学到的技巧改进这些生产线，减少反应池的使用数量从而完成<@gd.key>附加目标</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extra_3.en: Use the techniques we just learned to improve these production lines, reduce the number of Reactor Crucibles used, and complete the <@gd.key>bonus goal</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extra_4.cn: 接下来就试着<@gd.key>收纳</>多余的反应池并重新搭建物流，让这些产线也<@gd.key>恢复生产</>吧。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extra_4.en: Now, let's <@gd.key>stash</> the extra Reactor Crucibles, place new logistics lines, and <@gd.key>restore the operations</> of these production lines.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extrastep_1.cn: 想要完成附加目标请前往场地另一侧<@gd.key>收纳2个反应池</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extrastep_1.en: To complete the bonus goal, head over to the other side of this area and <@gd.key>stash 2 Reactor Crucibles</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extrastep_2.cn: 接下来请重新连接物流，让每个反应池可<@gd.key>同时生产2种溶液</>以供应全部4条产线的生产。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_extrastep_2.en: Time to reorganize the logistics. Each Reactor Crucible can <@gd.key>produce 2 different solutions at the same time</>, allowing 2 Reactor Crucibles to supply all 4 production lines.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_1.cn: <@gd.key>反应池</>在扩展后可以开启更多的缓存区以支持<@gd.key>多种配方同时进行生产</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_1.en: Expand the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> for a larger cache to use <@gd.key>different production formulas simultaneously</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_2.cn: 预设产线已经将<@gd.key>清水</>和<@gd.key>锦草粉末</>输送到了设备中并产出了<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>，这三种材料会分别存储在反应池上方的3个缓存区中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_2.en: The existing production line is moving <@gd.key>Clean Water</> and <@gd.key>Jincao Powder</> to the facility to produce <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</>. These 3 materials will be stored in the 3 upper cache slots of the Reactor Crucible.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_3.cn: 下面还有2个空的缓存区。如果将<@gd.key>芽针粉末</>也输入进来，反应池中的<@gd.key>清水</>就会同时与其进行反应，并将产出的<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>存储在最后一个缓存区中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_3.en: There are 2 empty cache slots below. When <@gd.key>Yazhen Powder</> is moved into the Reactor Crucible, the facility will use stored <@gd.key>Clean Water</> to produce <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> and store the product in the last cache slot.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_4.cn: 之后再将反应产出的这2种溶液<@gd.key>通过管道</>分别输送到<@gd.key>2台灌装机</>中，就可以同时供应2条产线的生产了。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_4.en: After producing these 2 solutions, use <@gd.key>separate pipelines</> to move each of the solutions to one of the <@gd.key>2 Filling Units</> respectively, thereby supplying 2 production lines at once.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_5.cn: 接下来就请参照此思路进行物流搭建，完善<@gd.key>锦草软饮</>和<@gd.key>芽针针剂</>的产线吧。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_mix_5.en: With this in mind, let's set up the logistics and complete the <@gd.key>Jincao Drink</> and <@gd.key>Yazhen Syringe [C]</> production lines.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>反应池</>在增扩<@gd.key>更多缓存区</>后，可以支持多种配方<@gd.key>同时</>进行生产。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_start_1.en: Expand the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> for a <@gd.key>larger cache</> so that different production formulas can be used <@gd.key>simultaneously</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_start_2.cn: 在本次模拟中，我们需要使用<@gd.key>1个反应池</>来同时生产<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>和<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_start_2.en: For this simulation, we must use <@gd.key>1 Reactor Crucible</> to simultaneously produce <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> and <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_start_3.cn: 场地内已经预设了生产<@gd.key>锦草软饮</>和<@gd.key>芽针针剂</>所需的设备。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_start_3.en: This area already has the facilities needed to produce <@gd.key>Jincao Drink</> and <@gd.key>Yazhen Syringe [C]</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_start_4.cn: 请在此基础上完成<@gd.key>物流搭建</>，让2条产线可以<@gd.key>共用一个反应池</>来进行生产。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_start_4.en: Place the proper <@gd.key>logistics units</> to set up 2 complete production lines that <@gd.key>share 1 Reactor Crucible</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step1_1.cn: 请先前往<@gd.key>反应池</>查看它的缓存区情况。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step1_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> to check the crucible caches.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step2_1.cn: 请参照指示线进行<@gd.key>传送带</>连接，将芽针粉末也输入到反应池中使其可<@gd.key>同时进行两种溶液的生产</>。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step2_1.en: Refer to the indicated line and connect the <@gd.key>transport belt</> to move Yazhen Powder into the Reactor Crucible. The facility can then <@gd.key>produce 2 solutions at once</>.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step2_2.cn: 接下来请参照指示线进行<@gd.key>管道</>连接，让反应产出的2种溶液可以分别输送到<@gd.key>2台灌装机</>中。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step2_2.en: Refer to the indicated lines to connect the <@gd.key>pipelines</> and move the 2 solutions from the Reactor Crucible to the <@gd.key>2 Filling Units</> respectively.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step2_3.cn: 别忘了在反应池中将<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>和<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>分别设定为两个管道的输出物，以对它们分别进行灌装。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step2_3.en: Don't forget to set <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> and <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> as the outgoing fluid products of the 2 Reactor Crucible outlets, and then have them filled at the Filling Units.

guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step2_4.cn: 非常好，现在2台灌装机开始分别对<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>和<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>两种溶液进行灌装了。
guide_text_blackbox_mix2_step2_4.en: Excellent. The 2 Filling Units are now filling <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</> and <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> respectively.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_extra_1.cn: 在<@gd.key>附加目标</>中，我们需要在不增设采种机的情况下放置更多种植机来同时进行荞花的生产。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_extra_1.en: To complete the <@gd.key>bonus goal</>, we must place an additional Planting Unit and produce more Buckflower without using additional Seed-Picking Units.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_extra_2.cn: 每台<@gd.key>采种机</>可以从1份荞花中提取2个荞花种子，正好可以<@gd.key>同时为2个种植机提供原料</>。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_extra_2.en: Each <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> can extract 2 Buckflower Seeds from 1 Buckflower. This means it can supply <@gd.key>2 Planting Units with seeds</> at the same time.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_extra_3.cn: 先在采种机旁边<@gd.key>再放置一台种植机</>，
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_extra_3.en: Let's <@gd.key>place 1 Planting Unit</> next to the Seed-Picking Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_extra_4.cn: 再从<@gd.key>采种机</>处再连接一条<@gd.key>传送带</>到新的<@gd.key>种植机</>上即可同时为2台种植机提供原料。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_extra_4.en: Then connect 1 more <@gd.key>transport belt</> from the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> to the new <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> to simultaneously supply the 2 Planting Units with seeds.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_1.cn: 在本次模拟中，我们需要生产一批<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>，这就需要用到<@gd.key>荞花</>作为原料。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_1.en: For this simulation, we must produce a batch of <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</>. This medication must use <@gd.key>Buckflowers</> as the raw material.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_2.cn: 请先使用快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击图标位置<@gd.key>打开背包</>，查看荞花的库存情况。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_2.en: First press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the icon to <@gd.key>open Backpack</> to check the Buckflower stockpile.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_2_1_c.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，打开<@gd.key>背包</>查看荞花的库存。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_2_1_c.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick, select this option and open the <@gd.key>Backpack</> to check how much Buckflower is available.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_2_mb.cn: 请先点击背包按钮<@gd.key>打开背包</>，查看荞花的库存情况。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_2_mb.en: Tap the Backpack button to <@gd.key>open the Backpack</> and see how much Buckflower is in stock.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_3.cn: 生产荞愈胶囊需要用到大量的荞花，在这里可以看到目前仓库中的<@gd.key>荞花</>库存已经很低了。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_3.en: Producing Buck Capsules [C] require plenty of Buckflower. The Depot does not have a lot of <@gd.key>Buckflower</> left.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_4.cn: 想要满足更大的药品需求就需要想办法循环生产更多的<@gd.key>荞花</>。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_4.en: To meet the demands for producing large batches of medication, we must create a production loop for <@gd.key>Buckflowers</>.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_5.en: Click the button to close the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_6.cn: 集成工业系统已经增设了两种新设备， 用来<@gd.key>循环产出更多荞花</>。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_6.en: The AIC has introduced 2 new types of facilities to create a <@gd.key>high-yield Buckflower production loop</>.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_7.cn: <@gd.key>采种机</>可以用来提取植物的种子，由<@gd.key>荞花</>输入其中可获得<@gd.key>荞花种子</>。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_7.en: The <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> can extract seeds from plants. Place <@gd.key>Buckflower</> into this facility to get <@gd.key>Buckflower Seeds</>.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_8.cn: <@gd.key>种植机</>则可以将植物的种子快速培育为成株，由<@gd.key>荞花种子</>输入其中就可以<@gd.key>收获荞花</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_8.en: The <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> can quickly raise plant seeds into mature plants. Place <@gd.key>Buckflower Seeds</> in this facility to <@gd.key>harvest Buckflowers</>.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_9.cn: 将这2台设备接入到原有产线中，不仅可以提供足够的荞花来生产荞愈胶囊，还可以循环储备更多荞花。现在就来试试吧
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_start_9.en: Connect these 2 facilities to the existing production line. This will make enough Buckflowers to produce Buck Capsule [C]. A Buckflower planting loop can also be created. Time to try things out.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_1.cn: 请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>连接协议核心<@gd.key>取货口</>和<@gd.key>采种机</>，将荞花输送到采种机中以提取荞花种子。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_1.en: Refer to the <@gd.key>indicated line</> and connect the PAC <@gd.key>output port</> to the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> with a transport belt. This will move Buckflower to the Seed-Picking Unit to pick and make Buckflower Seeds.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_2.cn: 请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>连接<@gd.key>采种机</>和<@gd.key>种植机</>，将荞花种子输送到种植机中再培育收获更多荞花。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_2.en: Refer to the <@gd.key>indicated line</> and connect the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> to the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</>. This will move Buckflower Seeds to the Planting Unit for growing more Buckflowers.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_3.cn: 请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>进行<@gd.key>传送带</>连接，将收获的荞花从种植机再补充回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_3.en: Refer to the <@gd.key>indicated line</> and connect the <@gd.key>transport belt</>. This will move Buckflowers grown by the Planting Unit to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_4.cn: 很好，现在我们就通过<@gd.key>采种机和种植机</>实现了<@gd.key>荞花的循环生产</>，可以不断补充荞花的库存了。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_4.en: Good. Now we can use the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit and Planting Unit</> to set up a <@gd.key>Buckflower production loop</> and raise our Buckflower stockpile.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_5.cn: 接下来请参照<@gd.key>指示线</>连接<@gd.key>种植机</>和<@gd.key>粉碎机</>，将产出的部分<@gd.key>荞花</>送到产线中加工为<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_5.en: Now refer to the <@gd.key>indicated line</> and connect the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> to the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> so part of the <@gd.key>Buckflower</> produced can be made into <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</>.

guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_6.cn: 非常好，下面只要<@gd.key>等待产线运转一段时间</>就可以完成荞愈胶囊的生产了。
guide_text_blackbox_planter1_step1_6.en: Excellent. Let the <@gd.key>production line work for a while</> to complete producing the Buck Capsules [C] required.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extra_1.cn: 非常好，现在我们就拥有了一条可以循环产出锦草的自动化锦草软饮产线。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extra_1.en: Excellent. Now we have an automated Jincao Drink production line with a Jincao production loop.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extra_2.cn: 想要完成<@gd.key>附加目标</>，我们还需要使用<@gd.key>粉碎机和反应池</>补齐<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>产线。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extra_2.en: To complete the <@gd.key>bonus goal</>, we must use the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit and Reactor Crucible</> to complete the <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extra_3.cn: 再参照刚刚的方式，放置一个新的<@gd.key>管道分流器</>以为这些设备同时供水。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extra_3.en: Refer to the steps we used. Place a new <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> and supply these facilities with Clean Water.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_1.cn: 请再放置1个<@gd.key>管道分流器</>，以支持更多分支管道的连接。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_1.en: Place 1 more <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> to provide more pipe outlets.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_2.cn: 请使用管道将水引入到新的<@gd.key>管道分流器</>，再输送到<@gd.key>种植机</>中以生产芽针。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_2.en: Use pipelines to move Clean Water to the <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> and then to the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> to plant and produce Yazhen.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_3.cn: 请将背包中的<@gd.key>芽针种子</>放入<@gd.key>种植机</>并生产芽针。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_3.en: Move <@gd.key>Yazhen Seed</> from the Backpack to the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> to produce Yazhen.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_4.cn: 接下来请使用<@gd.key>粉碎机和反应池</>补齐产线，生产芽针溶液。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_4.en: Now complete the production line with <@gd.key>Shredding Unit and Reactor Crucible</> to produce Yazhen Solution.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_5.cn: 最后请使用管道连接<@gd.key>种植机</>和<@gd.key>储液罐</>并设定<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>为输出物，将其储存到储液罐中。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_extrastep_5.en: Finally, connect the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> and <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</> with pipelines. Set <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> as the dispensed fluid of the pipe outlet to store the fluid in the Fluid Tank.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_1.cn: 武陵地区的植物需要足够的<@gd.key>水资源</>才能生长，这就需要用到种植机的液体模式。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_1.en: Plants of the Wuling region need plenty of <@gd.key>Clean Water</> to grow. This requires Fluid Mode of the Planting Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_2.cn: 在这里可以看到，生产锦草需要用到<@gd.key>锦草种子</>和<@gd.key>清水</>。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_2.en: This shows that we need <@gd.key>Jincao Seed</> and <@gd.key>Clean Water</> to produce Jincao.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_3.cn: <@gd.key>锦草种子</>已经通过场地预设的<@gd.key>传送带</>输送到了种植机中。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_3.en: <@gd.key>Jincao Seeds</> are already being delivered to the Planting Unit by the existing <@gd.key>transport belt</>.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_4.cn: 我们刚刚连接的<@gd.key>管道</>则可以将<@gd.key>清水</>也输送到设备中从而满足了生产锦草所需的所有条件。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_4.en: The <@gd.key>pipeline</> we just connected can deliver <@gd.key>Clean Water</> to the same facility to meet the requirements for growing Jincao.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_5.en: Click the button to close the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_6.cn: 目前场地内预设的<@gd.key>锦草软饮</>产线还缺少一部分管道的连接。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_6.en: The <@gd.key>Jincao Drink</> production line in this area is still missing a few pipeline connections between its facilities.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_7.cn: 接下来请使用管道连接<@gd.key>管道分流器</>到<@gd.key>反应池</>，让水输送到反应池中以生产锦草溶液。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_planter_7.en: The next step is to use a pipeline and connect the <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> to the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</>, deliver Clean Water to the Reactor Crucible, and produce Jincao Solution.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_1.cn: 在本次模拟中我们需要改进原有的<@gd.key>锦草软饮</>产线，将<@gd.key>种植机</>加入进来以循环生产锦草。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_1.en: For this simulation, we must improve upon the existing <@gd.key>Jincao Drink</> production line and add a <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> to create a Jincao production loop.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_2.cn: 锦草需要足够的<@gd.key>水资源</>才能生长，在新的产线中我们需要使用管道同时为<@gd.key>种植机和反应池</>供水。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_2.en: Jincao can only grow when it has enough <@gd.key>Clean Water</>. <@gd.key>Both the Planting Unit and the Reactor Crucible</> of the new production line must be supplied with Clean Water via pipelines.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_3.cn: 不过在本次模拟中，场地内只有<@gd.key>一台水泵</>可供使用。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_3.en: However, this simulation only has <@gd.key>1 Fluid Pump</>.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_4.cn: 此时就需要用到<@gd.key>管道分流器</>来为管道拓展更多的连接方向了。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_4.en: This requires the use of the <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> to provide more pipe outlets.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_5.cn: 它和传送带的分流器类似，将液体由一个方向输入后，可连接分支管道再向另外的最多三个方向均匀输出。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_5.en: Like the Splitter of transport belts, the Pipe Splitter can evenly split the fluid flow of 1 incoming pipe into 2 or 3 outgoing pipelines.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_6.cn: 请先将管道从<@gd.key>水泵</>连接到<@gd.key>管道分流器</>的输入端。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_6.en: First, connect the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to the <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> inlet with a pipeline.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_7.cn: 再从<@gd.key>管道分流器</>的任意输出端连接到<@gd.key>种植机</>，让水通过管道输送到设备中。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_start_7.en: Next, connect any <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> outlet to the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> with a pipeline to deliver Clean Water to the facility.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step0_1.cn: 请参照指示线，使用管道连接<@gd.key>水泵</>和<@gd.key>管道分流器</>。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step0_1.en: Refer to the indicated line and connect the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to the <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> via a pipeline.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step0_2.cn: 接下来请参照指示线，从<@gd.key>管道分流器</>连接管道到<@gd.key>种植机</>以为其供水。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step0_2.en: Refer to the indicated line and connect the <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> to the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> via a pipeline for delivering Clean Water.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step0_3.cn: 很好，现在请与<@gd.key>种植机</>交互查看锦草的生产情况。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step0_3.en: Excellent. Now interact with the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> to view Jincao production status.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step1_1.cn: 请从<@gd.key>管道分流器</>再拉一条管道到<@gd.key>反应池</>上，让水泵同时为两个设备供水。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step1_1.en: Now connect the <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> to the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> with another pipeline. This lets the Fluid Pump supply Clean Water to 2 facilities at once.

guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step1_2.cn: 接下来请使用<@gd.key>管道</>连接反应池和灌装机，并设定锦草溶液为输出物以将其装入蓝铁瓶中。
guide_text_blackbox_planter2_step1_2.en: Now connect the Reactor Crucible to the Filling Unit with a <@gd.key>pipeline</> and set Jincao Solution as outgoing fluid product and fill up Ferrium Bottles with it.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_extra_.cn: 在附加目标中，我们需要继续提升集成工业系统的<@gd.key>总发电功率</>以为后续的扩建做准备。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_extra_.en: For the bonus goal, we must continue to raise the <@gd.key>total power output</> of our AIC to prepare for future expansions.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_extra_.cn: <@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>同样可以用来为热能池供能，与源矿相比它消耗得更慢且可以提供更高的发电功率。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_extra_.en: <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</> can also supply power via Thermal Bank. Batteries are consumed way slower than Originium Ore and offer a higher power output at the Thermal Bank.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_extra_.cn: 接下来请放置更多<@gd.key>热能池</>，并将<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>从协议核心取货口输入到热能池中以获取发电功率。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_extra_.en: Now, place more <@gd.key>Thermal Banks</> and deliver <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</> from the PAC output port to the Thermal Bank to raise power output.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_extras.cn: 请将<@gd.key>低容谷地电池</>从协议核心取货口输入到<@gd.key>热能池</>中以获取更高的发电功率。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_extras.en: Move <@gd.key>LC Valley Batteries</> from the PAC output port to the <@gd.key>Thermal Bank</> to raise the power output.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 在本次模拟中，我们需要关注设备的<@gd.key>用电功率</>与集成工业系统可提供的<@gd.key>发电功率</>之间的关系。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: In this simulation, we must monitor facility <@gd.key>power consumption</> and its relationship with the <@gd.key>power output</> of the AIC.
Click close to close the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: <@gd.key>热能池</>是一种常用的发电设备，它可以将<@gd.key>源矿</>转化为电能从而提供一定的<@gd.key>发电功率</>。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: The <@gd.key>Thermal Bank</> is an electrical power generation facility that uses <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>. It can raise <@gd.key>power output</> of the AIC.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 请先<@gd.key>从协议核心取货口中输送源矿到热能池</>，使其开始运转并发电。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: First, move <@gd.key>Originium Ore from the PAC output port to the Thermal Bank</> to start generating power.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 再用同样的方法放置更多<@gd.key>热能池</>，继续提升集成工业系统的总发电功率。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: Refer to this method and place more <@gd.key>Thermal Banks</>. This will raise the total power output of the AIC Factory.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 在这里可以看到，当前场地的所有设备的<@gd.key>总用电功率</>较高，而集成工业系统可提供的<@gd.key>总发电功率</>低于当前总用电功率。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: This shows that <@gd.key>total power consumed</> by every facility in this area is quite high, while <@gd.key>total power output</> of the AIC Factory is lower than the power consumed.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 此时就会出现<@gd.key>电力不足</>的情况。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: This will lead to a <@gd.key>power shortage</>.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 请按下<action=fac_open_hub_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击打开协议核心面板查看电力详情。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: Press <action=fac_open_hub_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click to open the PAC screen to view power details.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 请按下<action=common_toggle_group_down>打开协议核心面板查看电力详情。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: Press <action=common_toggle_group_down> to open the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) panel and view the electrical power details.
Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 请点击此按钮打开协议核心面板查看电力详情。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: Tap this button to open the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) panel and view the electrical power details.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 这里显示了集成工业系统电网的整体情况。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: This shows the overall situation of the AIC power grid.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 可以看到当前用电功率已经超过了发电功率。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: This shows that power consumption has exceeded power output.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 此时设备会优先消耗协议核心的<@gd.key>电能储备</>来维持运转。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: Currently, the facility will consume the PAC <@gd.key>power reserves</> to keep working.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 当储备的电能<@gd.key>全部耗尽</>后，集成工业系统中的设备就会由于电力不足而自动<@gd.key>停止运转</>。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: However, when the power reserves <@gd.key>run out</>, AIC facilities will automatically <@gd.key>switch off</> due to insufficient power.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.cn: 要想让设备恢复生产，就需要放置更多<@gd.key>发电设备</>来提升集成工业系统的发电功率。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_start_.en: To make the facilities work again, we must place more <@gd.key>power generating facilities</> to raise AIC power output.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_step1_.cn: 请从协议核心取货口中输送<@gd.key>源矿</>到热能池中以为其提供发电所需的原料。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_step1_.en: Move <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> from the PAC output port to the Thermal Banks for power generation.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_step1_.cn: 很好，集成工业系统的总发电功率已经提升了。接下来请再放置1台<@gd.key>热能池</>。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_step1_.en: Good. Total power output of the AIC has increased. Let's place 1 more <@gd.key>Thermal Bank</>.

guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_step1_.cn: 从其他取货口为新放置的热能池输送<@gd.key>源矿</>以继续提升电网的发电功率。
guide_text_blackbox_powerstation1_step1_.en: Set another output port to <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> to supply the newly placed Thermal Banks. This will raise the output of the power grid.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_helper_1.cn: 在传送带指示线分叉处放置分流器。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_helper_1.en: Place a Splitter at the intersection of the transport belt hologram.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_helper_2.cn: 将紫晶纤维取货口连接至输入口，再从取货口连接至各设备即可。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_helper_2.en: Connect the Amethyst Fiber output port to the Splitter input port, then connect the Splitter output ports to various facilities.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_hint_1.cn: 点击此处，即可使用<@gd.key>分流器</>。

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_hint_2.cn: 请注意，<@gd.key>分流器</>有一个输入口和三个取货口，可以通过箭头的朝向来分辨。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_hint_2.en: Note that each <@gd.key>Splitter</> has 1 input port and 3 output ports. These can be differentiated with the direction of their arrows.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_hint_3.cn: 可以按下<action=fac_rotate_device>来旋转<@gd.key>分流器</>，调整输入口和取货口的朝向。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_hint_3.en: Press <action=fac_rotate_device> to rotate the <@gd.key>Splitter</> to change the orientation of the input and output ports.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_hint_3_mb.cn: 可点击“旋转”按键来旋转<@gd.key>分流器</>，调整输入口和取货口的朝向。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_hint_3_mb.en: Tap the "rotate" button to rotate the <@gd.key>Splitter</> and change the orientation of the input and output ports.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>分流器</>是一种物流设备，可将单一传送带分流出最多三条传送带进行运输。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_start_1.en: The <@gd.key>Splitter</> is a logistics unit that can split product flow of 1 transport belt to up to 3 belts.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_start_2.cn: <@gd.key>分流器</>有一个输入口和三个取货口，将输出产物的传送带连接至分流器的输入口，再从取货口连出传送带，即可实现分流。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_start_2.en: Each <@gd.key>Splitter</> has 1 input port and 3 output ports. Connect a transport belt to the Splitter input and its product flow will be evenly split to all transport belts connected to the output ports.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_start_3.cn: 接下来，请参考荞花产线与传送带指示线，使用分流器将紫晶纤维运输至粉碎机、配件机和塑形机中。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_start_3.en: Now, refer to the Buckflower production line and transport belt holograms. Then use the Splitter to move Amethyst Fiber to the Shredding Unit, Fitting Unit and Moulding Unit.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_start_4.cn: <@gd.key>分流器</>已放置于快捷栏中，可以直接使用。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_start_4.en: The <@gd.key>Splitter</> is now in the hotbar. Use them directly by pressing the hotkeys.

guide_text_blackbox_splitter_step2_1.cn: 放置分流器，将源矿运输至多个热能池中。
guide_text_blackbox_splitter_step2_1.en: Place the Splitter and deliver Originium Ore to multiple Thermal Banks.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_helper_0.cn: 请参考一旁的生产线布置，利用<@gd.key>研磨机</>搭建<@gd.key>高晶纤维</>生产线。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_helper_0.en: Refer to the production line on the other side and use <@gd.key>Grinding Unit</> to set up a <@gd.key>Cryston Fiber</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_helper_1.cn: 想要完成附加目标的话，或许可以调整场景中<@gd.key>供电桩</>的摆放位置。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_helper_1.en: To complete the bonus goal, try moving the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to another position.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_helper_2.cn: 让我们去看看<@gd.key>装备原件机</>的操作面板。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_helper_2.en: Let's view the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</> control panel.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_1.cn: 请先点击此处，然后在空地上放置一台<@gd.key>研磨机</>，投影仅作参考。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_1.en: Click here, then place a <@gd.key>Grinding Unit</> on empty ground. The hologram can be used as a reference.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_10.cn: 点击此处关闭界面，回到场景中去搭建<@gd.key>高晶纤维</>的生产线吧。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_10.en: Click here to close the screen, then return to the scene and build a <@gd.key>Cryston Fiber</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_10.cn: 请按下<action=common_cancel>关闭界面，回到场景中去搭建<@gd.key>高晶纤维</>的生产线吧。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_10.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the screen, then return to the scene and build a <@gd.key>Cryston Fiber</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_1_.cn: 请按下<action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build>，然后在空地上放置一台<@gd.key>研磨机</>，投影仅作参考。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_1_.en: Press <action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build>, then place a <@gd.key>Grinding Unit</> on empty ground. The hologram can be used as a reference.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_2.cn: 完美的摆放，请前往<@gd.key>研磨机</>并查看详情。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_2.en: Perfectly placed. Now go to the <@gd.key>Grinding Unit</> and view its details.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_3.cn: 请点击此处查看<@gd.key>配方一览</>。

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_4.cn: 这就是<@gd.key>高晶粉末</>，精炼炉可以将其熔炼为<@gd.key>高晶纤维</>。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_4.en: This is <@gd.key>Cryston Powder</>. The Refining Unit can refine it to <@gd.key>Cryston Fiber</>.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_5.cn: 看看它的合成路径，并不复杂，想必你已经胸有成竹了。动手试试吧。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_5.en: The production chain isn't very complex. I believe you have what it takes to set this up. Let's do it.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_6.cn: 不妨将配方标记，这样回到场景中可以在右侧查看。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_6.en: Pin the formulas so they can be accessed from the right side of the screen.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_7.cn: 这就是<@gd.key>高晶装备原件</>的合成路径。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_7.en: This is the production chain for the <@gd.key>Cryston Component</>.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_8.cn: 其中<@gd.key>密制晶体</>已经在持续生产中。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_8.en: The <@gd.key>Packed Origocrust</> is already being produced.

guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_9.cn: 缺少的<@gd.key>高晶纤维</>需要我们搭建生产线来提供。
guide_text_blackbox_thickener_1_start_9.en: We must set up another production line for <@gd.key>Cryston Fiber</>, the other material we need.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_0.cn: 很好，<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>已开始生产。

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_1.cn: 这是一份本模拟空间专用的<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件蓝图</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_1.en: This is a special <@gd.key>Amethyst Component Blueprint</> usable only in the simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处<@gd.key>查看更多功能</>。

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_2.cn: <@gd.key>装备原件</>是制造装备的原材料，因此我们需要<@gd.key>再建造一条装备原件产线</>，加快生产。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_2.en: <@gd.key>Gear components</> are raw materials for gear assembly. We must <@gd.key>set up another gear component production line</> to speed things up.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_2_mb.cn: 接下来我们可以用<@gd.key>蓝图</>加快生产，点击此处打开<@gd.key>蓝图</>界面。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_2_mb.en: Next, let's use the <@gd.key>blueprint</> to speed up our production. Tap here to open the <@gd.key>Blueprints</> screen.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_3.cn: 可拖动蓝图以改变蓝图位置，使其与场景中的设备虚影<@gd.key>完全重叠</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_3.en: Drag the blueprint to change its position and make sure it <@gd.key>perfectly overlaps</> with the facilities hologram shown in the scene.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_3_ct.cn: 推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6>以改变蓝图位置，使其与场景中的设备虚影<@gd.key>完全重叠</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_3_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6> stick to change the blueprint's position and make sure it <@gd.key>perfectly overlaps</> with the facilities hologram shown in the scene.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_3_mb.cn: 点击此处完成<@gd.key>蓝图</>的放置。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_3_mb.en: Tap here to complete placing the <@gd.key>Blueprint</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_4.cn: 接下来我们可以用<@gd.key>蓝图</>加快生产，按下快捷键<action=fac_open_blueprint>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开<@gd.key>蓝图</>界面。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_4.en: Next, let's use the <@gd.key>blueprint</> to speed up our production. Press the hotkey <action=fac_open_blueprint> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>Blueprints</> screen.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_4_mb.cn: 点击此处退出<@gd.key>蓝图放置状态</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_4_mb.en: Tap here to exit <@gd.key>Blueprint Placement Mode</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_5_mb.cn: 点击此处退出俯瞰模式。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_1_5_mb.en: Tap here to exit Top View Mode

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_2_1.cn: 注意，<@gd.key>物品准入口</>上显示的物品图标，是提示我们应该往这条传送带上输入的<@gd.key>物品</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_2_1.en: Note, the item icon shown above the <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> is the <@gd.key>item</> that can freely pass along this transport belt.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_2_2.cn: 根据两处物品准入口的提示，在<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>选择对应的物品进行输出吧。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_2_2.en: Reference the two Item Control Port icons and select the proper items to unload from the <@gd.key>PAC output ports</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_2_3.cn: 很好，成功地放置了<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件蓝图</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_2_3.en: Good. The <@gd.key>Amethyst Component Blueprint</> has been successfully deployed.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_2_5.cn: 系统蓝图放置后，根据<@gd.key>物品准入口</>显示的提示，在<@gd.key>取货口</>选择对应的物品输出至传送带上，即可使产线自动运转。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_2_5.en: After placing a system blueprint, reference the icon indicated on the <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> and interact with the <@gd.key>output port</> to select the item to unload onto the transport belt, and get the automated production line to work.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_confirm.cn: 点击鼠标左键<action=fac_build_confirm>完成<@gd.key>蓝图</>的放置。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_confirm.en: Click the left mouse button <action=fac_build_confirm> to complete placing the <@gd.key>blueprint</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_1.cn: 点击<@gd.key>鼠标右键</><image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse1" scale=1.3>或按下<action=fac_build_cancel>退出蓝图放置状态。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_1.en: Click the <@gd.key>right mouse button</> <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse1" scale=1.3> or click <action=fac_build_cancel> to exit Blueprint Placement mode.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_3.cn: 按下快捷键<action=fac_switch_view_mode>或点击此处退出<@gd.key>俯瞰模式</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_3.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_switch_view_mode> or click here to exit <@gd.key>Top View Mode</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_4.cn: 接下来，需要前往<@gd.key>4、5号协议取货口</>分别设置<@gd.key>源矿</>和<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>为输出物。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_4.en: Next, go to <@gd.key>PAC output ports 4 and 5</> and set <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> as the items to unload from the output ports respectively.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_5.cn: 如此一来，我们就借助<@gd.key>蓝图</>快速搭建了一条<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件产线</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_5.en: We now have successfully used a <@gd.key>blueprint</> to quickly set up an <@gd.key>Amethyst Component production line</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_6.cn: 请<@gd.key>等待紫晶装备原件</>的生产。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_extra_6.en: <@gd.key>Wait for the Amethyst Components</> to be produced.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_intro_ct.cn: 接下来我们可以用<@gd.key>蓝图</>加快生产，请按下<action=common_confirm>打开<@gd.key>蓝图</>界面。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_intro_ct.en: Next, let's use the <@gd.key>blueprint</> to speed up our production. Press <action=common_confirm> to open the <@gd.key>Blueprints</> screen.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_usebtn.cn: 点击此处开始<@gd.key>放置蓝图</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_bp_usebtn.en: Click here to start <@gd.key>placing the blueprint</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_build_exit_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to exit the <@gd.key>blueprint placement mode</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_1.cn: 要想达成<@gd.key>附加目标</>，我们还需要再搭建一条<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>的产线。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_1.en: To complete the <@gd.key>bonus goal</>, we must set up another <@gd.key>Amethyst Component</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_2.cn: 不妨试着参照已有的形式，在协议核心另一侧放置新的<@gd.key>精炼炉</>和<@gd.key>装备原件机</>来增设一条产线吧。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_2.en: Let's reference the existing line and set up a new production line. Start by placing a new <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</> next to the PAC.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_3.cn: 注意，<@gd.key>传送带控量阀</>可以对当前允许通过传送带的物品进行限制，避免将错误的原料输送到设备中。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_3.en: <@gd.key>Belt Control Limiters</> only allow certain items to pass through the belt. They can thus prevent wrong items from entering the facility input.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_4.cn: 场地中的这2个传送带控量阀分别设定了可通过的物品为<@gd.key>源矿</>和<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_4.en: The 2 Belt Control Limiters in the area only allow the passage of <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> respectively.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_5.cn: 接下来请根据此设定补齐产线，并从临近协议核心取货口选定合适的原料来进行输送吧。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_extra_5.en: Use this design feature to complete the production line. Interact with the nearby PAC output port and unload a suitable material from the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_reward_pop_1.cn: 获得了一份<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件蓝图</>，<@gd.key>蓝图</>系统解锁后，可以在集成核心区域使用此蓝图，快速布置紫晶装备原件产线。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_reward_pop_1.en: An <@gd.key>Amethyst Component Blueprint</> has been acquired. Unlocking the <@gd.key>Blueprint</> system allows the use of this blueprint to quickly set up an Amethyst Component production line in the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_start_1.cn: 装备原件是制造各类装备所需的必要材料，可以通用<@gd.key>装备原件机</>来进行生产。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_start_1.en: Gear components are essential for gear assembly. They are produced by the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_start_2.cn: 集成核心区中已经放置了一台<@gd.key>装备原件机</>，先与它交互来查看<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>的生产配方吧。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_start_2.en: There is already a <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</> placed in the Core AIC Area. Interact with it to check the <@gd.key>Amethyst Component</> production formula.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_step0_1.cn: 请前往<@gd.key>装备原件机</>处查看紫晶装备原件的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_step0_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</> to view the Amethyst Component production formula.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_step1_1.cn: 请前往<@gd.key>协议核心取货口</>进行设置，将矿物从仓库输送到精炼炉中进行加工。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_step1_1.en: Go and set up the <@gd.key>PAC output port</> to unload the mineral ores from the Depot to the Refining Unit for processing.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_0.cn: 请前往<@gd.key>3号协议取货口</>将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>设定为输出物。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_0.en: Interact with <@gd.key>PAC output port 3</> and select <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> as the item to unload from the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_1.cn: 接下来，请使用传送带连接<@gd.key>两台精炼炉</>的取货口到<@gd.key>装备原件机</>的输入口上。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_1.en: Next, use the transport belt to connect the output ports of the <@gd.key>two Refining Units</> to the input ports of the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_2.cn: 请<@gd.key>等待</>2种原料运输到装备原件机中，并<@gd.key>开始生产紫晶装备原件</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_2.en: <@gd.key>Wait</> for the 2 types of materials to be transported to the Gearing Unit so <@gd.key>Amethyst Component production can begin</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_3.cn: 最后，请使用<@gd.key>传送带</>连接<@gd.key>装备原件机</>到<@gd.key>协议核心输入口</>，将产出的紫晶装备原件运回仓库。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_3.en: Finally, use the <@gd.key>transport belt</> to connect the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</> to the <@gd.key>PAC input port</> and move the Amethyst Components produced to the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_4.cn: 非常好，现在我们就有了一条生产紫晶装备原件的自动产线了。等待产线运转就可以完成本次模拟的主要目标。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_step2_4.en: Great. Now we have an automated Amethyst Component production line. Wait for the production line to work and complete the main goal of this simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_topview_cance.en: Press and hold <action=common_cancel> to exit <@gd.key>Top View Mode</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_1.cn: 协议核心取货口可以将物品从仓库输送到传送带上，每个取货口可设定一种物品进行输出。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_1.en: PAC output ports can move items from the Depot to a connected transport belt. Each output port can unload one selected item from the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_1_1.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>进行选择。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_1_1.en: Click on the <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> to select it.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_1_2.cn: 现在这个取货口可以持续输出<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_1_2.en: This output port is now unloading <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> out of the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_2.cn: 请点击这里选择希望从此取货口输出的物品。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_2.en: Click here to select the item to unload from this output port.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_3.cn: 这里列出了当前协议核心仓库中的可用物品，现在需要将<@gd.key>源矿</>和<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>这2种原料分别从仓库输出。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_3.en: This is a list of items that can be unloaded from the PAC Depot. The current requirement is to unload these 2 raw materials from the Depot: <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</>.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_4.cn: 请先点击<@gd.key>源矿</>进行选择。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_4.en: First, click on the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> to select it.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_5.cn: 现在这个取货口可以持续输出源矿了，接下来我们还需将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>也从仓库中进行输出。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_5.en: This output port is now unloading Originium Ore from the Depot. The next step is to unload <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> from the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_6.cn: 请点击关闭按钮退出界面。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_6.en: Click the close button to close the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_7.cn: 协议核心共有六个取货口，每个取货口可分别设定1种物品进行输出。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_7.en: The PAC has a total of 6 output ports. Each output port can unload 1 selected item from the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_8.cn: 接下来请前往3号协议核心取货口将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>设定为输出物，让2个精炼炉可以分别生产<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>和<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_unloader_8.en: Next, set <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> as the item to unload from PAC output port 3 so that the 2 Refining Units can produce <@gd.key>Origocrust</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> respectively.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_1.cn: 在这里可以看到，紫晶装备原件需要用到<@gd.key>两种生产原料</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_1.en: This shows we need <@gd.key>2 materials</> for producing Amethyst Components.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_4.cn: 我们需要将这<@gd.key>两种原料</>都输送到装备原件机中以生产紫晶装备原件。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_4.en: We must move these <@gd.key>2 types of materials</> to the Gearing Unit so that the facility can produce Amethyst Components.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_5.cn: 请先点击按钮关闭界面。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_5.en: First click the button to close the panel.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_6.cn: <@gd.key>源矿</>和<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>在分别经过精炼炉加工后可以产出<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>和<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_6.en: <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> can be processed by Refining Units to make <@gd.key>Origocrust</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> respectively.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_7.cn: 集成核心区中已经预先放置了生产这2种材料的所需<@gd.key>精炼炉</>。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_7.en: The <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> for producing the 2 types of products is already placed in the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_8.cn: 接下来请先前往<@gd.key>1号协议取货口</>进行设置，将<@gd.key>源矿</>选为输出物。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_8.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>PAC output port 1</> and select <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> as the item to unload from the Depot.

guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_9.cn: 再参照指示线进行<@gd.key>传送带</>的连接，将精炼炉的产物运输到<@gd.key>装备原件机</>中。
guide_text_blackbox_winder_winder_9.en: Then reference the guiding line to connect the <@gd.key>transport belt</> and move the Refining Unit products to the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_extr.cn: 为了完成<@gd.key>附加目标</> ，可以使用<@gd.key>蓝图</>快速搭建<@gd.key>低容武陵电池</>产线。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_extr.en: To complete the <@gd.key>bonus goal</>, use <@gd.key>blueprints</> to quickly set up an <@gd.key>LC Wuling Battery</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_extr.cn: 根据<@gd.key>物品准入口</>的提示，在协议核心取货口选择对应的物品进行输出吧。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_extr.en: Reference the <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> icons and select the proper items to unload from the PAC output ports.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_star.cn: 请先与<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>交互以查看<@gd.key>息壤</>的生产配方。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_star.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> to check the production formula for <@gd.key>Xiranite</>.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 可以看到，<@gd.key>息壤</>由<@gd.key>清水</>和<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>生成。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: This shows that <@gd.key>Xiranite</> is produced with <@gd.key>Clean Water</> and <@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</>.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: <@gd.key>稳定碳块</>已经正常输入，接下来需要输入<@gd.key>清水</>。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: There is now a steady input of <@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</>. The next input to prepare is <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 接下来请将断掉的<@gd.key>管道</>连至<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>，输送<@gd.key>清水</>。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: Complete the disconnected <@gd.key>pipeline</> and connect to the <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> to supply it with <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 非常好，现在<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>开始生产<@gd.key>息壤</>了。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: Excellent. The <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> can now produce <@gd.key>Xiranite</>.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 请<@gd.key>组合</> 2 份蓝图，完成<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>产线的搭建，并输入至<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: <@gd.key>Combine</> the 2 blueprints to complete the <@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</> production line and input the products into the <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</>.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: <@gd.key>息壤</>是非常有用的物品，因此我们需要多布置一条<@gd.key>息壤</>产线来加快生产。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: <@gd.key>Xiranite</> is extremely useful. Hence, we should set up 1 more <@gd.key>Xiranite</> production line to make more.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 想要快速布置<@gd.key>息壤</>产线，请按下快捷键<action=fac_open_blueprint>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处使用<@gd.key>蓝图</>功能。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: To quickly set up a <@gd.key>Xiranite</> production line, press the hotkey <action=fac_open_blueprint> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to use the <@gd.key>Blueprint</> function.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 在本次<@gd.key>模拟空间</>中，有 2 份<@gd.key>蓝图</>可供使用。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: This <@gd.key>simulation</> has 2 <@gd.key>blueprints</> that can be used.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 这是本模拟空间专用的<@gd.key>息壤</>的产线蓝图。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: This is a special <@gd.key>Xiranite production line blueprint</> usable only in this simulation.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 很好，已成功放置<@gd.key>息壤</>产线蓝图。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: Excellent. The <@gd.key>Xiranite</> production line blueprint has been placed.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 请根据<@gd.key>物品准入口</>和<@gd.key>管道准入口</>的提示，输入对应的<@gd.key>碳块</>、<@gd.key>砂叶</>和<@gd.key>清水</>。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: Refer to the icons of the <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> and <@gd.key>Pipe Control Port</> to input <@gd.key>Carbon</>, <@gd.key>Sandleaf</>, and <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.
Click to return to the main screen of the Blueprint function.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 正好，另外一份就是<@gd.key>碳块</>蓝图。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: The other blueprint happens to be a <@gd.key>Carbon</> production line.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 可以利用<@gd.key>管道分流器</>，将清水引至第二个<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>内。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: Use the <@gd.key>Pipe Splitter</> to move Clean Water into the second <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</>.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 请根据<@gd.key>物品准入口</>和<@gd.key>管道准入口</>的提示，输入对应的<@gd.key>碳块</>、<@gd.key>砂叶</>和<@gd.key>清水</>。管道运输清水需要<@gd.key>较长时间</>，请耐心等待清水输送至天有洪炉。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: Refer to the icons of the <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> and <@gd.key>Pipe Control Port</> to input <@gd.key>Carbon</>, <@gd.key>Sandleaf</>, and <@gd.key>Clean Water</>. The pipeline will <@gd.key>take a while</> to transport Clean Water. Please wait patiently for the Clean Water to be delivered to the Forge of the Sky.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 已成功搭建第二条<@gd.key>息壤</>产线，<@gd.key>主要目标</>已全部完成。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: Second <@gd.key>Xiranite</> production line is now complete. All <@gd.key>main goals</> have been completed.

guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.cn: 接下来需要向设备内输入原料。
guide_text_blackbox_xiranite_oven_1_step.en: The next step is to input raw materials to the facilities.

guide_text_blue_print_1.cn:
我们现在可以进入<@gd.key>俯瞰模式</>来进行建设。
请按下<action=fac_switch_view_mode>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入。
guide_text_blue_print_1.en:
We can now use <@gd.key>Top View Mode</> to build our AIC Factory. 
Press <action=fac_switch_view_mode> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to enter this mode.

guide_text_blue_print_10.cn: 点击此处，即可进行蓝图放置。
guide_text_blue_print_10.en: Click here to place the blueprint.

guide_text_blue_print_10_ct.cn:
可拖动蓝图以改变蓝图位置，按下<action=fac_build_confirm_in_top_view>确认放置此蓝图所有设备。
即使当前设备数量不足，以<@gd.key>待建造模式</>放置所有设备，后续提交设备以完成建造。
guide_text_blue_print_10_ct.en: Drag the blueprint to change its position. Press <action=fac_build_confirm_in_top_view> to confirm placing all the facilities of the blueprint. If there are not enough facilities, the missing ones will be placed as <@gd.key>Unconstructed</> holograms.

guide_text_blue_print_11.cn:
可拖动蓝图以改变蓝图位置，点击左键确认放置此蓝图所有设备。
即使当前设备数量不足，也可以<@gd.key>待建造模式</>放置所有设备，后续提交设备以完成建造。
guide_text_blue_print_11.en: Drag the blueprint to change its position. Click the left mouse button to confirm placing all the facilities of the blueprint. If there are not enough facilities, the missing ones will be placed as <@gd.key>Unconstructed</> holograms.

guide_text_blue_print_11_mb.cn:
可拖动蓝图以改变蓝图位置，点击确认按键放置此蓝图所有设备。
即使当前设备数量不足，也可以<@gd.key>待建造模式</>放置所有设备，后续提交设备以完成建造。
guide_text_blue_print_11_mb.en: Drag the blueprint to change its position. Tap confirm to place all the facilities of the blueprint. If there are not enough facilities, the missing ones will be placed as <@gd.key>Unconstructed</> holograms.

guide_text_blue_print_1_ct.cn:
我们现在可以进入<@gd.key>俯瞰模式</>来进行建设。
请按下<action=fac_switch_view_mode>进入。
guide_text_blue_print_1_ct.en: We can now use <@gd.key>Top View Mode</> to build our AIC Factory. Press <action=fac_switch_view_mode> to use it.

guide_text_blue_print_1_mb.cn:
现在可以进入<@gd.key>俯瞰模式</>来进行建设。
请点击此处进入。
guide_text_blue_print_1_mb.en: The <@gd.key>Top View Mode</> is now available. Use it to build the AIC Factory. Tap here to enter Top View Mode.

guide_text_blue_print_2.cn: 在俯瞰模式下，干员会保持原位置不动，视角被固定为俯瞰视角。
guide_text_blue_print_2.en: Top View Mode uses a fixed, top-down perspective. Team operators will stay put.

guide_text_blue_print_3.cn: 可以使用下方罗列的设备进行<@gd.key>设备的制造与放置</>。
guide_text_blue_print_3.en: Use the list of facilities below to <@gd.key>construct and place</> them.

guide_text_blue_print_3_ct.cn: <@gd.key>开始设备建造</>可以在下方展开罗列各种设备，可以进行<@gd.key>设备的制造与放置</>。
guide_text_blue_print_3_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Start Construction</> button opens up a list of various facilities below to <@gd.key>construct and place</>.

guide_text_blue_print_4_mb.cn: 请点击此处，展开<@gd.key>工具箱</>。

guide_text_blue_print_5.cn: 在俯瞰模式下，可对多个设备、物流设施进行批量框选操作，包含复制、批量移动、批量收纳、保存蓝图等操作。
guide_text_blue_print_5.en: In Top View Mode, box selection can select multiple facilities and logistics units to perform group actions that include: copying, moving, stashing, and saving to a blueprint.

guide_text_blue_print_5_ct.cn: 蓝图功能可以帮助快速布置设备产线，请按下<action=common_confirm>查看。
guide_text_blue_print_5_ct.en: The blueprint function can be used to quickly place an AIC Factory production line. Press <action=common_confirm> to open the screen.

guide_text_blue_print_6.cn: <@gd.key>蓝图</>功能可以帮助快速布置设备产线，请点击此处或按下<action=fac_open_blueprint>查看。
guide_text_blue_print_6.en: The <@gd.key>blueprint</> function can be used to quickly place an AIC Factory production line. Click here or press <action=fac_open_blueprint> to view it.

guide_text_blue_print_6_ct.cn: 若后续创建了自己的蓝图，则会存放于此。
guide_text_blue_print_6_ct.en: Any blueprints created will be saved here.

guide_text_blue_print_6_mb.cn: <@gd.key>蓝图</>功能可以帮助快速布置设备产线，请点击此处查看。
guide_text_blue_print_6_mb.en: The <@gd.key>blueprint</> function can be used to quickly place an AIC Factory production line. Tap here to open the screen.

guide_text_blue_print_7.cn: 完成模拟空间获取的<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>将存放在此处。
guide_text_blue_print_7.en: <@gd.key>System blueprints</> acquired by completing simulations are placed here.

guide_text_blue_print_8.cn: 点击此处，查看<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。

guide_text_blue_print_8_ct.cn: 这是刚才在模拟空间中获取的<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件蓝图</>，请按下<action=common_confirm>查看。
guide_text_blue_print_8_ct.en: This <@gd.key>Amethyst Component Blueprint</> is just acquired from the simulation. Press <action=common_confirm> to view it.

guide_text_blue_print_9.cn: 这是刚才在模拟空间中获取的<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件蓝图</>，请点击查看。
guide_text_blue_print_9.en: This <@gd.key>Amethyst Component Blueprint</> is just acquired from the simulation. Click to view it.

guide_text_blue_print_9_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，即可进行蓝图放置。

guide_text_blue_print_step_1.cn: <@gd.key>俯瞰模式</>与<@gd.key>蓝图</>功能已解锁。
guide_text_blue_print_step_1.en: <@gd.key>Top View Mode</> and <@gd.key>blueprints</> have been unlocked.

guide_text_blue_print_step_2.cn: 回到<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>后可使用<@gd.key>蓝图</>功能快速放置<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>产线。
guide_text_blue_print_step_2.en: Head back to the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</> and use the <@gd.key>Blueprint</> feature to quickly place an <@gd.key>Amethyst Component</> production line.

guide_text_blueprint_ghost_1_1.cn: 由于当前拥有的设备不足，你刚刚放下了一组<@gd.key>待建造组</>设备。
guide_text_blueprint_ghost_1_1.en: Due to the lack of facilities, a set of <@gd.key>Unconstructed</> facilities have been placed.

guide_text_blueprint_ghost_2_1_desc.cn: 在放置蓝图时，如果当前拥有设备不足，允许先以<@gd.key>待建造组</>形式放置，后续提交欠缺设备<@gd.key>全部补足</>后，可一次性转化为<@gd.key>正式设备</>。
guide_text_blueprint_ghost_2_1_desc.en: When placing blueprints without all of the facilities required, the missing facilities can be placed as an <@gd.key>Unconstructed Set</>. Submitting <@gd.key>all</> of the missing facilities converts the Unconstructed Set into <@gd.key>actual facilities</> with a single action.

guide_text_blueprint_ghost_3_1.cn: 请点击场景中黄颜色的<@gd.key>待建造组</>设备以查看详情。
guide_text_blueprint_ghost_3_1.en: Click on the yellowed facilities in the <@gd.key>Unconstructed Set</> to view their details.

guide_text_blueprint_ghost_4_1.cn: 这里展示了当前<@gd.key>待建造组</>还需要提交的设备列表以及进度。
guide_text_blueprint_ghost_4_1.en: This shows the list of facilities to be submitted for the <@gd.key>Unconstructed Set</> and progress of facility submission.

guide_text_blueprint_ghost_4_2.cn: <@gd.key>一键提交</>可以将当前拥有的设备提交，当<@gd.key>所有设备</>的提交进度都完成后，即可转化为<@gd.key>正式设备</>。
guide_text_blueprint_ghost_4_2.en: Use <@gd.key>Submit All</> to submit all facilities currently owned. Once the <@gd.key>entire facilities submission progress</> is complete, all missing facilities will be converted to <@gd.key>actual facilities</>.

guide_text_blueprint_ghost_4_3.cn: <@gd.key>设备制造</>可以快捷地制造<@gd.key>待提交</>的设备。
guide_text_blueprint_ghost_4_3.en: Use the <@gd.key>Construction</> panel to quickly construct the <@gd.key>missing</> facilities.

guide_text_blueprint_ghost_4_4.cn: <@gd.key>终止建造</>将拆除<@gd.key>待建造组</>所有设备，并且将已提交的设备返还。
guide_text_blueprint_ghost_4_4.en: Use <@gd.key>End Construction</> to stash all facilities in the <@gd.key>Unconstructed Set</> and return all submitted facilities.

guide_text_bomb_hint_1.cn: 靠近并按下<action=common_interact>即可使用爆炸物。
guide_text_bomb_hint_1.en: Approach and press <action=common_interact> to use the explosives.

guide_text_bomb_hint_1_mb.cn: 靠近并点击"制作爆炸物"即可使用。
guide_text_bomb_hint_1_mb.en: Approach and tap [Make explosives] to use it.

guide_text_bomb_produce_desc_1.cn: 随着集成工业系统的发展，可以在<@gd.key>封装机</>中生产<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>。
guide_text_bomb_produce_desc_1.en: Expand the AIC Factory and research AIC technologies to produce <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</> at the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</>.

guide_text_bomb_produce_desc_2.cn: 使用工业爆炸物，可以破坏<@gd.key>脆弱墙体</>，打开通路。
guide_text_bomb_produce_desc_2.en: Industrial Explosives can blast apart <@gd.key>fragile walls</> to make new passages.

guide_text_bomb_wall_desc_1.cn:
探索中可能遇到一些可以使用<@gd.key>爆炸物</>爆破的墙体或者石块等物体。
这些可爆破物的表面会有红色的纹路或者可爆破的标记。
guide_text_bomb_wall_desc_1.en: Certain walls or rocks found during exploration can be destroyed with <@gd.key>explosives</>. These destructible objects exhibit red-colored cracks and are marked with icons to indicate their destructibility.

guide_text_book_dungeon_1.cn: 在发现<@gd.key>协议空间</>之后，可以在行动手册中查看。
guide_text_book_dungeon_1.en: After finding a <@gd.key>Protocol Space</>, it can be viewed from the Operational Manual.

guide_text_book_dungeon_2.cn: 请点击此处，查看<@gd.key>索引</>分页。
guide_text_book_dungeon_2.en: Click here to open the <@gd.key>Index</> tab.

guide_text_book_dungeon_2_ct.cn: 当前已为您选中<@gd.key>索引</>分页。

guide_text_book_dungeon_3.cn: 这里收录了当前发现的所有<@gd.key>协议空间</>，以及对应可以收获的素材。
guide_text_book_dungeon_3.en: This has the records of all the <@gd.key>Protocol Spaces</> discovered so far, as well as the materials that might drop from them.

guide_text_book_dungeon_4.cn: 可在此处，查看对应的<@gd.key>协议空间</>并直接进入。
guide_text_book_dungeon_4.en: This shows a list of <@gd.key>Protocol Spaces</>. They can also be directly accessed here.

guide_text_bossrush_1.cn: <@gd.key>危境再现</>解锁了，点击此处，查看<@gd.key>索引</>分页。
guide_text_bossrush_1.en: <@gd.key>RE-Crisis</> unlocked. Click here to view the <@gd.key>Index</> tab.

guide_text_bossrush_1_ct.cn: <@gd.key>危境再现</>解锁了，当前已为您选中<@gd.key>索引</>分页。
guide_text_bossrush_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>RE-Crisis</> unlocked. The <@gd.key>Index</> tab has been selected.

guide_text_bossrush_2.cn: 在战胜强敌之后，可以再次挑战。点击此处，选择<@gd.key>危境再现</>。
guide_text_bossrush_2.en: After defeating powerful enemies, they can be challenged again. Click here and select <@gd.key>RE-Crisis</>.

guide_text_bossrush_2_ct.cn: 在战胜强敌之后，可以再次挑战。请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>危境再现</>。
guide_text_bossrush_2_ct.en: After defeating powerful enemies, they can be challenged again. Press <action=common_confirm> to select <@gd.key>RE-Crisis</>.

guide_text_bossrush_desc_1.cn: 可在<@gd.key>危境再现</>中重新挑战之前击败过的领袖敌人。
guide_text_bossrush_desc_1.en: At the <@gd.key>RE-Crisis</>, defeated enemy bosses can be challenged again.

guide_text_bossrush_desc_2.cn: 危境再现有不同的<@gd.key>深度等级</>，通关当前深度后可以挑战更深的深度
guide_text_bossrush_desc_2.en: RE-Crisis features different <@gd.key>Depth Levels</>. Clear the current Depth Level to unlock more challenging Depth Levels.

guide_text_build_furnance_1.cn:
<@gd.key>精炼炉</>已存放于背包中。
请按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_build_furnance_1.en: The <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> has been placed in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_build_furnance_1_1.cn: 由于背包已满，<@gd.key>精炼炉</>被存入了仓库，请进入集成核心区域，放置精炼炉。
guide_text_build_furnance_1_1.en: Since the Backpack is full, the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> has been stored in the Depot. Go to the Core AIC Area to place the Refining Unit.

guide_text_build_furnance_1_ct.cn:
<@gd.key>精炼炉</>已存放于背包中。
请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_1_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> has been placed in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_1_mb.cn:
<@gd.key>精炼炉</>已存放于背包中。
请点击此处打开背包。
guide_text_build_furnance_1_mb.en: The <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> has been placed in the Backpack. Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_build_furnance_2.cn: 按照提示，请将<@gd.key>精炼炉</>拖入下方快捷栏中。
guide_text_build_furnance_2.en: Follow the instructions. Drag the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to the hotbar below.

guide_text_build_furnance_2_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，将<@gd.key>精炼炉</>登录到快捷栏中。
guide_text_build_furnance_2_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to add <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> into the hotbar.

guide_text_build_furnance_2_mb.cn: 请<@gd.key>长按精炼炉</>将其拿起，再拖动到快捷栏中。
guide_text_build_furnance_2_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap and hold the Refining Unit</> to pick it up and drag it into the hotbar.

guide_text_build_furnance_3.cn: 请将精炼炉放置于<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_3.en: Refer to the <@gd.key>hologram</> for placing the Refining Unit.

guide_text_build_furnance_3_1.cn: 请先进入集成核心区域，将仓库中的精炼炉放置于<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_3_1.en: Go to the Core AIC Area first and place the Refining Unit from the Depot in the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_4.cn: 按下<@gd.key>精炼炉</>所对应的数字键或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，开始放置<@gd.key>精炼炉</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_4.en: Press the number key associated with the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to place the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_4_ct.en: Press <action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build> to start placing the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_4_mb.cn: 点击此处，开始放置<@gd.key>精炼炉</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_4_mb.en: Tap here to place the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_5.cn: 按照提示，请移动并使用鼠标<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角，将<@gd.key>精炼炉</>移动至<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_5.en: Follow the instructions. Move and adjust the view with the mouse <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3> to move the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_5_ct.cn: 按照提示，请<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，将<@gd.key>精炼炉</>移动至<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_5_ct.en: Follow the instructions. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to move the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_5_mb.cn: 按照提示，请移动并转动视角，将<@gd.key>精炼炉</>移动至<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_5_mb.en: Follow the instructions to move and adjust the view, then move the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_6.cn: 点击鼠标左键<action=fac_build_confirm>，确认放置<@gd.key>精炼炉</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_6.en: Click the left mouse button <action=fac_build_confirm> to confirm the placement of the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_build_furnance_6_mb.cn: 点击此处，确认放置<@gd.key>精炼炉</>。
guide_text_build_furnance_6_mb.en: Tap here to place the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_build_xiranite_oven.cn: 请在<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>放置<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>。
guide_text_build_xiranite_oven.en: Place the <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> in the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</>.

guide_text_bus_wuling_desc_1.cn: 在<@gd.key>集成管家</>处可<@gd.key>解锁</>对应集成核心区域仓库存取线<@gd.key>建造权限</>。
guide_text_bus_wuling_desc_1.en: Talk to the <@gd.key>AIC Steward</> to <@gd.key>unlock</> Depot Bus <@gd.key>construction options</> in the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_bus_wuling_desc_2.cn: 可以在集成核心区域放置<@gd.key>仓库存取线基段</>。
guide_text_bus_wuling_desc_2.en: <@gd.key>Depot Bus Sections</> can be placed in the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_bus_wuling_desc_3.cn: <@gd.key>仓库存取线基段</>和<@gd.key>仓库存取线源桩</>或其他生效的仓库存取线基段相连后，其上可贴靠放置仓库存货口和仓库取货口。
guide_text_bus_wuling_desc_3.en: The <@gd.key>Depot Bus Section</> must be connected to a <@gd.key>Depot Bus Port</> or other active Depot Bus Sections. Once active, Depot Loaders and Depot Unloaders can be attached to the Depot Bus.

guide_text_bus_wuling_title_1.cn: 武陵仓库存取线 - 一

guide_text_bus_wuling_title_2.cn: 武陵仓库存取线 - 二

guide_text_bus_wuling_title_3.cn: 武陵仓库存取线 - 三

guide_text_camp_1.cn: 成功激活<@gd.key>协议传送点</>后，即可使用该节点的各项功能。
guide_text_camp_1.en: Activating a <@gd.key>Tele-Protocol Point</> (TP Point) makes its various features accessible.

guide_text_camp_2.cn: 可使用<@gd.key>休整</>功能，使断开连接的干员恢复连接，并<@gd.key>回满编队中所有干员的生命值</>。
guide_text_camp_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>Rest</> function to resuscitate disconnected operators and <@gd.key>restore the entire team to max HP</>.

guide_text_camp_3.cn: 在<@gd.key>协议传送点</>附近，可使用<@gd.key>仓储管理</>功能，按下<action=common_interact>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处。
guide_text_camp_3.en: When near a <@gd.key>TP Point</>, the <@gd.key>storage management</> function becomes available. Press <action=common_interact> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to use it.

guide_text_camp_3_ct.cn: 在<@gd.key>协议传送点</>附近，可使用<@gd.key>仓储管理</>功能，请按下<action=common_interact>打开。
guide_text_camp_3_ct.en: When near a <@gd.key>TP Point</>, the <@gd.key>storage management</> function becomes available. Press <action=common_interact> to open it.

guide_text_camp_3_mb.cn: 在<@gd.key>协议传送点</>附近，可使用<@gd.key>仓储管理</>功能，请点击此处打开。
guide_text_camp_3_mb.en: When near a <@gd.key>TP Point</>, the <@gd.key>storage management</> function becomes available. Tap here to use it.

guide_text_carrier_0.cn: 使用<@gd.key>便捷存取站</>可以在野外便捷地通过<@gd.key>仓库</>存取物品
guide_text_carrier_0.en: <@gd.key>Easy Stashes</> provide convenient access to the <@gd.key>Depot</> in the wilderness.

guide_text_carrier_2_1.cn: <@gd.key>便捷存取站</>可以直接连接当地的<@gd.key>仓库</>
guide_text_carrier_2_1.en: <@gd.key>Easy Stashes</> can directly access the local <@gd.key>depot</>.

guide_text_carrier_2_3.cn: 管理员可以将当地仓库的物品取到背包
guide_text_carrier_2_3.en: The Endministrator can take items from the Depot and place them in the Backpack.

guide_text_carrier_2_4.cn: 同样的，管理员也可以将背包的物品存放到仓库
guide_text_carrier_2_4.en: The Endministrator can also take items from the Backpack and place them in the Depot.

guide_text_carrier_desc_1.cn: 便捷存取站可以直接连接当地的仓库，快捷存取物品
guide_text_carrier_desc_1.en: Easy Stashes can directly access a local depot to quickly load and unload various items.

guide_text_carrier_desc_2.cn: 接入电网的便捷存取站会出现在他人的游玩环境中，也许能帮助到他人。
guide_text_carrier_desc_2.en: Easy Stashes connected to the power grid will also appear in the scenes of other players. Their contents may help them greatly.

guide_text_char_equip_1.cn:
现在可为干员穿戴和更换装备了。
请按下快捷键<action=common_open_char_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开干员信息总览。
guide_text_char_equip_1.en: Operators can now be equipped with gear. Press the hotkey <action=common_open_char_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_char_equip_1_ct.cn:
现在可为干员穿戴和更换装备了。
请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_char_equip_1_ct.en: Operators can now be equipped with various pieces of gear. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_char_equip_1_mb.cn:
现在可为干员穿戴和更换装备了。
请点击此处进入干员详情。
guide_text_char_equip_1_mb.en: Operators can now equip and switch their gear. Tap here to open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_char_equip_2.cn: 点击装备页签，查看干员当前装备的详细数据并进行装备更换。
guide_text_char_equip_2.en: Click on the Gear tab. This opens the Gear screen that shows detailed stats of currently equipped gear. It also allows the switching of operator gear.

guide_text_char_equip_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，进入装备页签，查看干员当前装备的详细数据并进行装备更换。
guide_text_char_equip_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to open the Gear tab. This opens the Gear screen that shows detailed stats of currently equipped gear. It also allows the switching of operator gear.

guide_text_char_equip_3.cn:
根据部位分类，装备共分为<@gd.key>护甲</>、<@gd.key>护手</>、<@gd.key>配件</>三种类型。
每位干员都可穿戴一件护甲、一件护手、两件配件，总共四件装备。
干员当前已穿戴的装备都会在装备栏中展示。
guide_text_char_equip_3.en: There are 3 types of gear based on the equipping part: (1) <@gd.key>Armor</>, (2) <@gd.key>Gloves</>, and (3) <@gd.key>Kit</>. Every operator can equip 4 pieces of gear: 1 suit of armor, 1 pair of gloves, and 2 kits. Gear already equipped by the operator will be displayed in the gear slots.

guide_text_char_equip_4.cn: 界面右侧展示了当前干员已穿戴的全部装备所提供的属性加成。
guide_text_char_equip_4.en: The right side of the screen shows bonuses to various stats offered by the gear equipped by the operator.

guide_text_char_equip_5.cn: 点击选择装备栏，可为干员穿戴或更换当前装备。
guide_text_char_equip_5.en: Click the gear slot to either equip a piece of gear or swap what is currently equipped on the operator.

guide_text_char_equip_5_ct.cn: 按下<action=navigation_target_click>选择装备栏，可为干员穿戴或更换当前装备。
guide_text_char_equip_5_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to select the gear slot, then either equip a piece of gear or swap what is currently equipped.

guide_text_char_equip_6.en: Click here to select this piece of gear.

guide_text_char_equip_6_ct.cn: 目前选择的装备是<@gd.key>简易护甲</>。
guide_text_char_equip_6_ct.en: <@gd.key>Basic Armor</> is the gear currently selected.

guide_text_char_equip_7.cn: 可以在此处预览穿戴该件装备后，干员各项属性的变化。
guide_text_char_equip_7.en: This shows a preview of the changes to various operator stats by equipping this gear.

guide_text_char_equip_8.cn: 装备能够提供不同的能力值，有些装备还会有一些额外的技能。
guide_text_char_equip_8.en: Gear can offer all sorts of stats. Some may even offer additional skills.

guide_text_char_equip_9.cn: 点击此处穿戴该件装备。
guide_text_char_equip_9.en: Click here to equip this piece of gear.

guide_text_char_equip_9_ct.en: Press <action=char_info_equip_put_on> to equip this piece of gear.

guide_text_char_equip_desc_1.cn:
在装备页面中，可以为干员穿戴与更换各个部件的装备。
每位干员都可穿戴一件护甲、一件护手、两件配件，总共四件装备。
不同部位的装备相互配合能够激活<@gd.key>套装效果</>。
