guide_text_char_equip_desc_1.en: Use the Gear screen to equip operators with various gear. Every operator can equip 4 pieces of gear: 1 suit of armor, 1 pair of gloves, and 2 kits. Equipping multiple pieces of gear from the same set also activates <@gd.key>set effects</>.

guide_text_char_levelup_1.cn: 请记得对干员们进行培养，以增加作战能力。
guide_text_char_levelup_1.en: Remember to train the operators in order to improve their combat abilities.

guide_text_char_levelup_2.cn: 按下<action=common_open_char_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入干员详情。
guide_text_char_levelup_2.en: Press <action=common_open_char_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_char_levelup_2_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，进入<@gd.key>干员总览</>。
guide_text_char_levelup_2_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to select this option and open the <@gd.key>Operator Overview</> screen.

guide_text_char_levelup_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_char_levelup_2_mb.cn: 点击此处进入干员详情。
guide_text_char_levelup_2_mb.en: Tap here to open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_char_levelup_3.cn: 在干员详情页面中，可以培养干员各个方面的能力，进而更好地应对各种复杂情况。
guide_text_char_levelup_3.en: Use the Operator Overview screen to upgrade various operator abilities and improve their performance in various situations.

guide_text_char_levelup_4.cn: 点击此处，可对干员进行<@gd.key>等级提升</>。
guide_text_char_levelup_4.en: Click here to <@gd.key>level up</> the operator.

guide_text_char_levelup_4_1.cn: 当前该干员已达到当前等级上限，暂时无法继续提升等级。
guide_text_char_levelup_4_1.en: This operator has reached a level cap and cannot be upgraded further.

guide_text_char_levelup_4_2.cn: 除了击败敌人外，还可以<@gd.key>手动使用素材</>为干员提升等级。
guide_text_char_levelup_4_2.en: In addition to defeating enemies, <@gd.key>EXP materials can be manually spent</> to level up operators.

guide_text_char_levelup_4_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，对干员进行<@gd.key>等级提升</>。

guide_text_char_levelup_5.cn:
消耗<@gd.key>干员经验培养素材</>，可为干员提供大量升级经验。
可在此处批量选择多种素材。
guide_text_char_levelup_5.en: Spend <@gd.key>operator EXP materials</> to give the operator plenty of EXP for leveling up. Batch select multiple EXP materials here.

guide_text_char_levelup_6.cn: 干员升级后，<@gd.key>能力值、基础攻击力与生命值</>会得到提升。
guide_text_char_levelup_6.en: Leveled up operators will gain increased <@gd.key>attributes, Base Attack, and HP</>.

guide_text_char_levelup_7.cn: 达到等级上限后，则需要<@gd.key>激活精英化节点</>，才能继续提升等级。
guide_text_char_levelup_7.en: If an operator hits a level cap, they must be <@gd.key>promoted</> to raise their level cap and continue leveling.

guide_text_char_levelup_8.cn: 干员提升到一定等级后，<@gd.key>将会需求其他的培养素材来提升等级</>。
guide_text_char_levelup_8.en: When operators reach a certain level, <@gd.key>they must use other progression materials to level up</>.

guide_text_char_summary_desc_1.cn:
强敌当前，有多种方法增强小队的作战能力。
例如<@gd.key>提升干员等级</>和<@gd.key>激活精英化节点</>，可提升干员的综合作战能力。
guide_text_char_summary_desc_1.en: There are many ways to improve a team's combat performance to defeat powerful enemies. These include <@gd.key>leveling up</> and <@gd.key>promoting</> operators to improve their overall combat abilities.

guide_text_char_summary_desc_2.cn: 在干员的<@gd.key>天赋阵列</>中，可对干员的各个<@gd.key>技能</>进行升级，可激活干员的各种<@gd.key>技能节点</>，增强干员各项战斗能力。
guide_text_char_summary_desc_2.en: The operator's <@gd.key>Ability Matrix</> includes various <@gd.key>skills</> that can be leveled up as well as <@gd.key>talent nodes</> that can be activated to enhance the operator's combat abilities.

guide_text_char_summary_desc_3.cn: 干员的武器在<@gd.key>升级</>或<@gd.key>突破</>后，性能会显著提升。请记得培养小队中干员的武器。
guide_text_char_summary_desc_3.en: <@gd.key>Leveling up</> and <@gd.key>tuning</> weapons also significantly improve their performance. Do not forget to invest in the operators' weapons as well.

guide_text_char_summary_desc_4.cn:
可使用集成工业系统制造<@gd.key>装备</>。
为干员穿戴<@gd.key>合适属性的装备</>，可增强干员的作战能力。
guide_text_char_summary_desc_4.en: Use AIC Factory to assemble pieces of <@gd.key>gear</> and equip operators with <@gd.key>gear with matching stats</> to enhance their combat performance.

guide_text_chasingrabbit_desc_1.cn:
长耳兽是生活在塔卫二上的一种生物。
跟随背负花朵的长耳兽，可以找到一些它藏匿起来的资源。
guide_text_chasingrabbit_desc_1.en: Long-ears are one of the many beasts living in the world of Talos-II. Follow long-ears carrying flowers on their backs to find their hidden resource stash.

guide_text_chasingrabbit_desc_2.cn: 在跟随长耳兽的过程中，如果与它间隔太远，它会重新回到一开始的位置。
guide_text_chasingrabbit_desc_2.en: When tracking a long-ear, the critter will escape and return to the starting position if it manages to get far away enough from its pursuers.

guide_text_chen_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 陈千语的战技能对敌人造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
guide_text_chen_chartrain01_02_1.en: Chen Qianyu's battle skill applies <#ba.airborne>Lift</> on the enemy.

guide_text_chen_chartrain01_02_2.cn: <#ba.airborne>击飞</>：对敌人造成<#ba.noguard>破防</>，如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会叠加1层<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数并累积<@ba.poise>失衡值</>。
guide_text_chen_chartrain01_02_2.en: <#ba.airborne>Lift</>: Applies <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> on an enemy. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, then add 1 <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack and deal <@ba.poise>Stagger</>.

guide_text_chen_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 当有敌人进入<#ba.noguard>破防</>时，可以触发陈千语的连携技。
guide_text_chen_chartrain01_03_1.en: Chen Qianyu's combo skill is triggered when an enemy becomes <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>.

guide_text_chen_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 陈千语的连携技会造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。

guide_text_chen_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 陈千语的终结技会对目标敌人进行多段斩击，造成大量伤害并累积大量失衡值。
guide_text_chen_chartrain01_04_1.en: Chen Qianyu's ultimate slashes an enemy target multiple times, dealing massive DMG and Stagger.

guide_text_cmpt_hint_1.cn: 通过完成<@gd.key>模拟空间-配件机</>，可获得紫晶零件的<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。
guide_text_cmpt_hint_1.en: Complete the <@gd.key>simulation: Fitting Unit</> to acquire the <@gd.key>system blueprint</> for Amethyst Part.

guide_text_cmpt_hint_2.cn: 可靠近并打开配件机的操作面板，查看<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>的生产配方。
guide_text_cmpt_hint_2.en: Approach the Fitting Unit and open its control panel to view the <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</> production formula.

guide_text_cmpt_hint_3.cn: 通过完成<@gd.key>模拟空间-配件机</>，可获得紫晶零件的<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。可选择此项。
guide_text_cmpt_hint_3.en: <@gd.key>Simulation: Fitting Unit</> can now be selected. Complete it to acquire the Amethyst Part <@gd.key>system blueprint</>.

guide_text_cmpt_mc_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>配件机</>可以将含有配件标签的材料进行加工生产，产物可用于多种设备加工与成品构装。
典型产物为<#item.glassCmpt>紫晶零件</>，由<#item.quartzGlass>紫晶纤维</>放入<@gd.key>配件机</>后生产获得。
guide_text_cmpt_mc_intro_desc_1.en:
The <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> can process materials with the [Fit] tag to produce facility construction materials or other things.
Typical product: <#item.glassCmpt>Amethyst Part</>, made by placing <#item.quartzGlass>Amethyst Fiber</> in the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</>.

guide_text_collection_piece_desc_1.cn:
平平无奇的区域，但似乎能帮助管理员回忆起一些“维修技巧”。
不妨四处看看，或许那些仍能运作的设备，又或者岩石与草木，都能为你提供维修灵感。
guide_text_collection_piece_desc_1.en: An ordinary-looking place, but it seems capable of helping the Endministrator remember certain "repair techniques". Look around, Endministrator. The machinery, rocks, grasses, and trees might provide the Repair Logic required.

guide_text_conditioner_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>物品准入口</>可限制传送带上允许通过的物品。
guide_text_conditioner_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> can limit items allowed to pass through transport belts.

guide_text_conditioner_desc_2.cn: 可通过<@gd.key>物品准入口</>限制通过物品的数量，并在蓝图中标记此段传送带运送的物品。
guide_text_conditioner_desc_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> to limit the quantity of items passing through the belt. It can also be used in blueprints to mark the type of items to be used on a blueprint.

guide_text_connector_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>物流桥</>可以使得两条相交的传送带各自独立地运输物品而互不影响。
guide_text_connector_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Belt Bridge</> allows a transport belt to go over another without disrupting the flow of items on both belts.

guide_text_connector_intro_desc_2.cn: 可在<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面中选择<@gd.key>物流桥</>，直接进行放置或放入快捷栏来使用。
guide_text_connector_intro_desc_2.en: Select the <@gd.key>Belt Bridge</> from the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel, drag it directly into the hotbar, and place it with hotkeys.

guide_text_control_move.cn: 使用<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_w" scale=1.45> <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_a" scale=1.45> <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_s" scale=1.45> <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_d" scale=1.45>进行移动。
guide_text_control_move.en: Use <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_w" scale=1.45> <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_a" scale=1.45> <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_s" scale=1.45> <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_d" scale=1.45> to move.

guide_text_control_move_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6> stick to move.

guide_text_control_move_mb.cn: 拖动此处虚拟摇杆，进行移动。
guide_text_control_move_mb.en: Drag the virtual joystick here to move.

guide_text_control_observe.en: Move the mouse <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3> to look around.

guide_text_control_observe_ct.cn: 推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆，以转动视角、观察四周。
guide_text_control_observe_ct.en: Adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to look at the surroundings.

guide_text_control_observe_mb.cn: 拖动屏幕空白区域，以转动视角、观察四周。
guide_text_control_observe_mb.en: Drag and slide empty areas of the screen to adjust the view and look at the surroundings.

guide_text_converger_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>汇流器</>可以将多条传送带上的物品合并到一条传送带上，最多可支持三条传送带汇流。
guide_text_converger_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Converger</> can converge product flows of 3 transport belts into a single belt.

guide_text_converger_intro_desc_2.cn: 可在<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面中选择<@gd.key>汇流器</>，直接进行放置或放入快捷栏来使用。
guide_text_converger_intro_desc_2.en: Select the <@gd.key>Converger</> from the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel, drag it directly into the hotbar, and place it with hotkeys.

guide_text_conveyorbeltGroup_desc_1.cn: 进入旧式传送带范围，可随<@gd.key>旧式传送带一起移动</>，但<@gd.key>无法随货物箱一起进入检货口</>。
guide_text_conveyorbeltGroup_desc_1.en: Step on an old conveyor belt to <@gd.key>move with it</>. However, people <@gd.key>cannot enter the incoming cargo crate inspection port</>.

guide_text_crane_controller_desc_1.cn: 可使用吊运装置终端，控制指定的货物按照面板上<@gd.key>指示的方式</>移动。
guide_text_crane_controller_desc_1.en: Use the crane lifter terminal and follow the <@gd.key>instructions provided</> on the control panel to move the target cargo.

guide_text_crane_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>塔吊</>是能够吊运集装箱等重物的设备。
可以沿着<@gd.key>控制线路</>找到塔吊对应的<@gd.key>操作台</>，对塔吊进行控制。
guide_text_crane_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Tower cranes</> are big machines for lifting and moving cargo containers. Follow the <@gd.key>control cables</> to find a tower crane <@gd.key>control panel</>, then interact with the control panel to control the tower crane.

guide_text_crane_desc_2.cn: 一个塔吊能够同时拥有多个操作台。不同的操作台支持的操作有所不同（包括<@gd.key>放下货物</>、<@gd.key>转动吊臂</>等）。
guide_text_crane_desc_2.en: A tower crane may be linked to multiple control panels that control it differently. These controls include: <@gd.key>lowering the cargo container</> or <@gd.key>rotating the lifting arm</>.

guide_text_crane_desc_3.cn: 某些塔吊的操作台可能会处于损坏状态，需要<@gd.key>修复</>后才能使用。
guide_text_crane_desc_3.en: Some tower crane control panels may be damaged. They must be <@gd.key>repaired</> before they can be used.

guide_text_crystal_tree_des_1.cn:
有些源石虫背上有着源石树枝。
当<@gd.key>震荡波</>到来时，这些源石树枝会自动展开<@gd.key>保护罩</>，进入即可免受<@gd.key>震荡波</>的伤害。
guide_text_crystal_tree_des_1.en: Some Originium Slugs have Originium branches growing out of them. These Originium branches will automatically generate <@gd.key>shielded areas</> when the <@gd.key>shockwaves</> hit. Enter them to get protection against the <@gd.key>shockwaves</>.

guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 大潘的战技能对敌人造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_02_1.en: Da Pan's battle skill applies <#ba.airborne>Lift</> on the enemy.

guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_02_2.cn: <#ba.airborne>击飞</>：对敌人造成<#ba.noguard>破防</>，如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会叠加1层<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数并累积<@ba.poise>失衡值</>。
guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_02_2.en: <#ba.airborne>Lift</>: Applies <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> on an enemy. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, then add 1 <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack and deal <@ba.poise>Stagger</>.

guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 当有敌人达到4层<#ba.noguard>破防</>时可以发动大潘的连携技。
guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_03_1.en: Da Pan's combo skill is triggered when an enemy reaches 4 stacks of <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>.

guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 大潘的连携技对敌人造成<#ba.crush>猛击</>，且本次<#ba.crush>猛击</>的伤害获得额外提升。
guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_03_2.en: Da Pan's combo skill applies <#ba.crush>Crush</> on the enemy. This <#ba.crush>Crush</> also deals more DMG.

guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 大潘的终结技会对敌人强制造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>和<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>。
guide_text_dapan_chartrain01_04_1.en: Da Pan's ultimate forcibly applies <#ba.airborne>Lift</> and <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> on the enemy.

guide_text_deepfin_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 阿列什的战技命中处于<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>状态的目标时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>掉目标身上所有<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>，对其强制施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>并恢复一定技力。
guide_text_deepfin_chartrain01_02_1.en: When Alesh's battle skill hits a target with <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>, it <#ba.consume>consumes</> every <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> stack, forcibly applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> on the target, and recovers some SP.

guide_text_deepfin_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 当敌人的<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>被<#ba.consume>消耗</>时可以发动阿列什的连携技。
guide_text_deepfin_chartrain01_03_1.en: Alesh's combo skill is triggered when an enemy's <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reaction</> is <#ba.consume>consumed</>.

guide_text_deepfin_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 阿列什的连携技有一定概率钓出珍鳞，额外获得终结技能量。
guide_text_deepfin_chartrain01_03_2.en: Alesh's combo skill has a chance to catch a Rare Fin and grants bonus Ultimate Energy.

guide_text_deepfin_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 阿列什的终结技可以施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>，且每击败一个目标都可以恢复一定技力。
guide_text_deepfin_chartrain01_04_1.en: Alesh's ultimate applies <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> and recovers some SP with every target defeated.

guide_text_defence_laser_desc_1.cn: 被激光命中后会被<@gd.key>击退</>或<@gd.key>击飞</>，虽然不会受伤，但仍需注意躲避。
guide_text_defence_laser_desc_1.en: A person gets <@gd.key>knocked back</> or <@gd.key>knocked away</> when hit by defensive lasers. No DMG will be taken, but be careful.

guide_text_delta_robot_desc_1.cn:
因各种状况而陷入故障的Delta型多功能机器人。
还请管理员使用能力多多<@gd.key>修复</>它们吧！
guide_text_delta_robot_desc_1.en: Many Delta general-purpose robots have been damaged due to various causes. Use the Endministrator's special abilities to <@gd.key>repair</> them!

guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_1.cn: 按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，以查看四号谷地仓库的物品。
guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_1.en: Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to check the items stored in the Valley IV Depot.

guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_1_mb.cn: 点击此处查看四号谷地仓库的物品。
guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_1_mb.en: Tap here to view the items in the Valley IV Depot.

guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_2.cn: 左侧打开的是四号谷地仓库，可看到已存入仓库的<@gd.key>源矿</>。
guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_2.en: The left panel shows the contents of the Valley IV Depot. It now has some stored <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>.

guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_3.cn: 关闭界面，接下来尝试如何借助<@gd.key>自动化物流</>来用这批源矿制造晶体外壳。
guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_3.en: Close the panel and learn how to <@gd.key>automate logistics</> to mass produce Origocrusts with the Originium Ore.

guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_3_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_cancel>关闭界面，接下来尝试如何借助<@gd.key>自动化物流</>来用这批源矿制造晶体外壳。
guide_text_depot_unloader_e1m6_3_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the panel and learn how to <@gd.key>automate logistics</> and mass produce Origocrusts with the Originium Ore.

guide_text_diffuser_connectable_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>供电桩</>现在也能够进行电力运输，从而更方便的完成供电设备之间的电路连接。
guide_text_diffuser_connectable_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> now have the ability to transmit power. This is especially useful to establish power transmission connections between power facilities.

guide_text_diffuser_connectable_desc_2.cn: 在高度不足、无法放置中继器的位置，可以尝试使用供电桩继续进行电力运输。
guide_text_diffuser_connectable_desc_2.en: In certain cramped places where the Relay Tower cannot fit, the smaller Electric Pylon might be useful for power transmission.

guide_text_dismantle_1.cn: 请按下<action=common_switch_mode>切换为工业模式。
guide_text_dismantle_1.en: Press <action=common_switch_mode> to switch to AIC Mode.

guide_text_dismantle_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处，切换为工业模式。
guide_text_dismantle_1_mb.en: Tap here to switch to AIC Mode.

guide_text_dismantle_2.cn: 可使用<@gd.key>收纳模式</>进行矿机的快速收纳，并放置电驱矿机。
guide_text_dismantle_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>Stash Mode</> to quickly stash the mining rigs and free up mining spots for placing Electric Mining Rigs.

guide_text_dismantle_2_ct.cn: 可按下<action=fac_main_right_active>并选中此项，使用<@gd.key>收纳模式</>进行矿机的快速收纳，并放置电驱矿机。
guide_text_dismantle_2_ct.en: Press <action=fac_main_right_active> and select this option, then use <@gd.key>Stash Mode</> to quickly stash the mining rigs and free up mining spots for placing Electric Mining Rigs.

guide_text_dismantle_2_mb.cn:
可使用<@gd.key>收纳模式</>进行矿机的快速收纳，并放置电驱矿机。
可点击此处，展开工具箱并找到<@gd.key>收纳模式</>。
guide_text_dismantle_2_mb.en: Use the <@gd.key>Stash Mode</> to quickly stash the mining rigs and free up mining spots for placing Electric Mining Rigs. Tap here to expand the Toolkit and find <@gd.key>Stash Mode</>.

guide_text_dismantle_3.cn:
可以点击此处，将放置的设备进行收纳。
设备收纳后会重新存放在背包仓库中。
guide_text_dismantle_3.en: Click here to stash placed facilities. Stashed facilities will be placed in the Backpack or Depot.

guide_text_dismantle_3_ct.cn:
可按下<action=common_controller_side_menu>查看快捷功能，其中可对放置的设备进行收纳。
设备收纳后会重新存放在背包仓库中。
guide_text_dismantle_3_ct.en: Press <action=common_controller_side_menu> to open Quick Action. One of the options is the stashing of a placed facility. Stashed facilities will be placed in the Backpack or Depot.

guide_text_dismantler_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>拆解机</>可以对物品进行物理拆分，例如将装有液体的瓶子拆分为空瓶子与液体。
guide_text_dismantler_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Separating Units</> can physically separate certain items. An example would be separating a filled bottle into an empty bottle and its fluid content.

guide_text_domain_depot_hint.cn: 可在此处接取他人委托的运送任务来赚取调度券，每日有接取上限。
guide_text_domain_depot_hint.en: Accept and complete Pack and Deliver missions here to earn stock bills. There is a daily limit to the number of missions that can be accepted.

guide_text_domain_depot_send_desc_1.cn:
货物装箱并接取运送委托后，可在<@gd.key>任务</>系统中，将该送货任务委托给他人派送。
其他玩家可在<@gd.key>运送委托列表</>中接取并完成该委托。
guide_text_domain_depot_send_desc_1.en: After accepting a delivery job in the Pack Goods feature, go to the <@gd.key>Mission</> screen to transfer the job to other players. Other players can then use the <@gd.key>List of Delivery Jobs</> to accept these jobs.

guide_text_domain_depot_send_desc_2.cn:
将委托转交出去后，若被其他玩家完成，则双方均可获得等额的调度券尾款。
若时限内未被完成，仍可获得一半的调度券尾款。
guide_text_domain_depot_send_desc_2.en: Once a transferred job is completed by another player, both the transferrer and the one performing the job will receive a final fee of the same amount. Even if the job cannot be completed within the time limit, both parties will still receive half of the stock bills in the final fee.

guide_text_domain_depot_send_title_2.cn: 转交运送委托的奖励结算

guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_2.cn: <@gd.key>仓储节点</>已解锁，请点击此处进入。
guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_2.en: <@gd.key>Depot node</> unlocked. Click here for details.

guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_2_ct.cn: <@gd.key>仓储节点</>已解锁，请按下<action=common_confirm>进入。
guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_2_ct.en: <@gd.key>Depot node</> unlocked. Press <action=common_confirm> to access it.

guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_3.cn: 当前已解锁了源石研究园的<@gd.key>仓储节点</>，增加了本地库存上限。
guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_3.en: The <@gd.key>depot node</> of the Originium Science Park is now unlocked. Local depot capacity has been increased.

guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_4.cn: 可在此处看到，当前仓库中每种物品的仓储上限为11000。
guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_4.en: This shows that the current depot capacity for each item is 11000.

guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_5.cn: 使用调度券为<@gd.key>仓储节点</>提升操作等级之后，可增加更多的本地物品仓储上限。
guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_5.en: Spend stock bills to upgrade <@gd.key>depot node</> operations level and expand the capacity of the local depot.

guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_6.cn: 提升操作等级后，并可解锁更多玩法。
guide_text_domain_depot_unlock_6.en: Leveling up also unlocks more game modes.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_10.cn:
此处存放了本地仓库中，所有<@gd.key>当前货物类型</>的物品。
可将这些物品放入进行装箱。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_10.en: This shows all the items for the <@gd.key>current types of goods</> stored in the local depot. These items can be packed for delivery.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_11.cn: 请点击此处，快速填充物品至<@gd.key>最大值</>。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_11.en: Click here to quickly fill the items to <@gd.key>maximum quantity</>.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_11_1.cn: 可在此处查看一键填充自动选择的货物，也可以手动更改放入的货物。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_11_1.en: This shows the goods auto-selected with the auto-fill feature. Goods can also be manually selected and swapped.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_11_ct.cn: 请<@gd.key>长按</><action=domain_depot_pack_fill_max>，快速填充物品直至<@gd.key>最大值</>。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_11_ct.en: <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=domain_depot_pack_fill_max> to quickly fill the items to <@gd.key>maximum</> quantity.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_12.cn: 当前已填充完毕，请点击此处开始装箱。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_12.en: Items filled. Click here to start packing.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_12_ct.cn: 当前已填充完毕，请按下<action=common_confirm>开始装箱。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_12_ct.en: Items filled. Press <action=common_confirm> to start packing.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_13.cn: 当前已完成装箱与调度申请，有一些需求方愿意给予<@gd.key>调度券</>来换取对应的资源。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_13.en: Packing and Redistribution Bid completed. Some clients are willing to pay <@gd.key>stock bills</> in exchange for resources.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_14.cn: 请点击此处，查看本次装箱运送的具体位置。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_14.en: Click here to check the location of this Pack and Deliver job.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_14_ct.cn: 请按下<action=domain_depot_sell_pos>，查看本次装箱运送的具体位置。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_14_ct.en: Press <action=domain_depot_sell_pos> to check the destination of this Pack and Deliver job.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_15.cn:
可在地图中看到本次装箱运送的<@gd.key>取货点</>和<@gd.key>送货点</>位置。
<@gd.key>装箱运送</>的目标是：在<@gd.key>取货点</>取得货物，再运输至目标<@gd.key>送货点</>。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_15.en:
The map shows the locations of the <@gd.key>Pick-Up Point</> and the <@gd.key>Delivery Point</> for this Pack and Deliver job.
The goal of <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</> is to get the goods from a <@gd.key>Pick-Up Point</> then deliver them to the <@gd.key>Delivery Point</>.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_17.cn: <@gd.key>货物完整度</>会影响该订单最终收获调度券的数量，请避免货物受损。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_17.en: <@gd.key>Goods integrity</> will affect the final sum of stock bills received from the delivery order.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_18.cn: 比如当前这项订单，<@gd.key>使用协议传送</>就会影响货物完整度，请尽量避免。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_18.en: Take this order for example: <@gd.key>using the teleport feature</> will affect goods integrity. Try to avoid doing that.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_19.cn: 当接受订单、开始运送后，就会立即获得部分定金。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_19.en: Accepting the order and starting the delivery also grants a sum of bills as the deposit.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_2.cn: <@gd.key>仓储节点</>的操作等级已提升，解锁了更多功能，请点击此处进入。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_2.en: <@gd.key>Depot node</> operations level has been increased. More functions have been unlocked. Click here to access.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_20.cn:
可点击此处，直接开始<@gd.key>装箱运送</>。
也可返回先前<@gd.key>货物装箱</>处，<@gd.key>重新进行装箱</>。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_20.en:
Click here to start <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</>.
Alternatively, return to the <@gd.key>Pack Goods</> stage to <@gd.key>repackage the goods</>.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_20_ct.cn:
可按下<action=common_confirm>，直接开始<@gd.key>装箱运送</>。
也可返回先前<@gd.key>货物装箱</>处，<@gd.key>重新进行装箱</>。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_20_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to start <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</>. Alternatively, return to the <@gd.key>Pack Goods</> stage to <@gd.key>repackage the goods</>.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_2_ct.cn: <@gd.key>仓储节点</>的操作等级已提升，解锁了更多功能，请按下<action=common_confirm>进入。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_2_ct.en: <@gd.key>Depot node</> operations level has been increased. More functions have been unlocked. Press <action=common_confirm> to access.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_3.cn: 当前解锁了<@gd.key>装箱运送</>玩法，可通过该玩法获得大量调度券。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_3.en: The <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</> game mode has been unlocked. Engage in this feature to earn generous sums of stock bills.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_4.cn: 请点击此处，尝试进行<@gd.key>货物装箱</>，这是<@gd.key>装箱运送</>的第一步。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_4.en: Click here to <@gd.key>Pack Goods</>. This is the first step of <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</>.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_4_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，尝试进行<@gd.key>货物装箱</>，这是<@gd.key>装箱运送</>的第一步。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to <@gd.key>Pack Goods</>. This is the first step of <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</>.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_5.cn:
目前可运送<@gd.key>轻量杂物</>类型的货箱。
比如敌人掉落的材料、集成工业产物等。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_5.en: Currently, <@gd.key>Light Miscellany</> crates can be delivered. These include materials dropped by enemies and AIC Factory products.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_6.cn: 当前<@gd.key>轻量杂物</>类型的小型货箱，装满货物后预估收益为60000谷地调度券。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_6.en: Currently, successful delivery of a Crate [S] of <@gd.key>Light Miscellany</>-type goods offers a revenue of about 60000 Valley Stock Bills.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_7.cn: 后续升级仓储节点后，可解锁新的可运输类型，获取更多调度券。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_7.en: Keep upgrading depot nodes to unlock new deliverables and earn more stock bills.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_8.cn: 并且升级后，可解锁容量更大的货箱，目前只能选用小型货箱。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_8.en: Upgrading also unlocks bigger crates. As of now, Crate [S] is the only option available.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>装箱运送</>需要使用指定类型的物品进行装箱。
通过升级<@gd.key>仓储节点</>可解锁新的可运输类型、容量更大的货箱。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</> requires the packing of special types of items. Upgrade the <@gd.key>depot node</> to unlock more types of deliverables and crates with larger capacities.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>装箱运送</>的目标是：在<@gd.key>取货点</>取得货物，再运输至目标<@gd.key>送货点</>。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_desc_2.en: The goal of <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</> is to get the goods from a <@gd.key>Pick-Up Point</> then deliver them to the <@gd.key>Delivery Point</>.

guide_text_domain_depot_up_desc_3.cn:
在运送过程中，需要避免影响<@gd.key>货物完整度</>的因素。
可使用<@gd.key>滑索架</>来实现高效且安全的装箱运送。
guide_text_domain_depot_up_desc_3.en: A good delivery will always try to keep the <@gd.key>goods intact</>. Try using <@gd.key>zipline facilities</> to Pack and Deliver faster and safer.

guide_text_domain_development_1.cn: 在世界中的各种探索行为都会获得<@gd.key>地区建设值</>，之前已经累计了一些<@gd.key>地区建设值</>。
guide_text_domain_development_1.en: <@gd.key>Regional Development Metrics</> (RDM) can be earned by performing various exploration activities. Some <@gd.key>RDM</> have already been earned.

guide_text_domain_development_2.cn: 当地区建设值累计到一定程度后，<@gd.key>地区建设等级</>将获得提升。
guide_text_domain_development_2.en: Earn enough RDM to raise <@gd.key>Regional Development Level</>.

guide_text_domain_development_3.cn: 点击地区建设里程碑，查看地区建设等级带来的具体影响。
guide_text_domain_development_3.en: Click on the Regional Development Milestones to check the effects of the Regional Development Level.

guide_text_domain_development_3_ct.cn: 请按下<action=domain_main_open_grade>地区建设里程碑，查看地区建设等级带来的具体影响。
guide_text_domain_development_3_ct.en: Press <action=domain_main_open_grade> Regional Development Milestones and check the effects of Regional Development Levels.

guide_text_domain_development_4.cn: 随地区建设等级提升，将开放各种功能，<@gd.key>提升世界中的矿物产率，增加各区域中可放置的工业设备</>等。
guide_text_domain_development_4.en: Raising Regional Development Level makes various functions available. It also <@gd.key>increases mineral ore yields and AIC Factory facility placement limits in various areas</>.

guide_text_domain_development_5.cn: 当地区建设等级提升后，可以领取对应的<@gd.key>里程碑奖励</>。
guide_text_domain_development_5.en: Raising Regional Development Level also offers various <@gd.key>milestone rewards</>.

guide_text_domain_development_6.cn: 点击此处返回上级界面。
guide_text_domain_development_6.en: Click here to return to the previous screen.

guide_text_domain_development_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to return to the previous screen.

guide_text_domain_development_7.cn: 点击这里可以查看<@gd.key>调度券的收支情况</>记录。
guide_text_domain_development_7.en: Click here to view records of <@gd.key>stock bills earning and spending</>.

guide_text_domain_development_7_ct.cn: 按下<action=domain_main_open_bulletin>可以查看<@gd.key>调度券的收支情况</>记录。
guide_text_domain_development_7_ct.en: Press <action=domain_main_open_bulletin> to view records of <@gd.key>stock bills earning and spending</>.

guide_text_domain_development_8.cn: 除了向据点供给货品，还有其他方式可获得地区建设值，管理员可以自行探索。
guide_text_domain_development_8.en: Regional Development Metrics can be earned by supplying outposts with goods. Other ways for raising regional development await discovery, Endministrator.

guide_text_domain_shop_soldout_1.cn: 已售罄的物品统一收纳在<@gd.key>已售罄</>分类里
guide_text_domain_shop_soldout_1.en: Sold out items will be moved to the <@gd.key>Sold Out</> category

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_1.cn: 请按下<action=mainhud_open_domain>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_1.en: Press <action=mainhud_open_domain> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and press here to open the <@gd.key>Regional Development</> screen.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_1_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_1_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to open <@gd.key>Regional Development</>.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_2.cn: 物资调度系统已解锁，请点击此处进入。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_2.en: Stock Redistribution system is unlocked. Click here to check it out.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_2_ct.cn: 物资调度系统已解锁，请按下<action=common_confirm>进入。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_2_ct.en: Stock Redistribution system is unlocked. Press <action=common_confirm> to check it out.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_3.cn: 可在<@gd.key>物资调度</>中，购买<@gd.key>稳定需求物资</>。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_3.en: <@gd.key>Stock Redistribution</> allows the purchasing of <@gd.key>staple goods</>.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_4.cn: 在物资调度中，可使用<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>以较多的折扣购买商品。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_4.en: Stock Redistribution allows the purchasing of various goods with <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> at various discounts.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_5.cn: 后续，可通过将其他的物资调度员纳入系统、或升级现有物资调度员，解锁更多货品的购买权限。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_5.en: The system can eventually add more Stock Redistributors or upgrade existing Stock Redistributors. These actions will unlock more goods purchasing privileges.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_6.cn: 这是物资调度员送给你的礼物，请点击此处查看。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_6.en: The Stock Redistributor has a present for you. Click here to take a look.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_6_ct.cn: 这是物资调度员送给你的礼物，请按下<action=common_confirm>查看。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_6_ct.en: The Stock Redistributor has a present for you. Press <action=common_confirm> to take a look.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_7.en: Click here to make the purchase.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_desc_1.cn: 陈列品可以在帝江号上进行展示，继续推进<@gd.key>主线任务</>可在后续正式开启<@gd.key>帝江号</>相关功能。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_desc_1.en: Various display items can be displayed aboard Dijiang. Progress through the <@gd.key>main mission</> to formally activate various functions of <@gd.key>Dijiang</>.

guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_desc_2.cn: 陈列品可以在帝江号上进行展示，可前往<@gd.key>帝江号</>进行陈列品的布置。
guide_text_domain_shop_unlock_desc_2.en: Various display items can be displayed aboard Dijiang. Go to <@gd.key>Dijiang</> to set up the display item showcase.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_1.cn: 请按下<action=mainhud_open_domain>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_1.en: Press <action=mainhud_open_domain> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and press here to open the <@gd.key>Regional Development</> screen.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_10.cn: 弹性需求物资的价格会每天<@gd.key>发生波动</>，可在价格较高时出售以获取更多调度券。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_10.en: The prices of elastic goods <@gd.key>fluctuate</> on a daily basis. Sell them at higher prices to earn more stock bills.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_11.cn: 请点击此处，查看好友价格。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_11.en: Click here to view the price at the friend's system.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_11_ct.en: Press <action=common_interact> to view the price at the friend's system.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_12.cn:
可在此处查看好友飞船上的价格，这些价格与当地价格存在差异。
可通过<@gd.key>好友头像</>前往拜访<@gd.key>好友的飞船</>，进行弹性需求物资的出售以获取利润。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_12.en: Use this to check the prices aboard a friend's ship. Their prices may differ from local prices. Use a <@gd.key>friend's portrait</> to <@gd.key>visit their ship</>, then sell your elastic goods to earn a profit.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_2.cn: 物资调度系统已升级，解锁了更多功能，请点击此处进入。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_2.en: Stock Redistribution system upgraded. More functions have been unlocked. Click here to access it.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_2_ct.cn: 物资调度系统已升级，解锁了更多功能，请按下<action=common_confirm>进入。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_2_ct.en: Stock Redistribution system upgraded. More functions have been unlocked. Press <action=common_confirm> to access it.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_3.cn: 在<@gd.key>物资调度</>中，新解锁了<@gd.key>弹性需求物资</>。请点击此处查看。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_3.en: <@gd.key>Elastic goods</> have been unlocked for <@gd.key>Stock Redistribution</>. Click here for details.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_3_ct.cn: 在<@gd.key>物资调度</>中，新解锁了<@gd.key>弹性需求物资</>。请按下<action=common_toggle_group_next_include_pc>查看。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_3_ct.en: <@gd.key>Elastic goods</> have been unlocked for <@gd.key>Stock Redistribution</>. Press <action=common_toggle_group_next_include_pc> for details.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_4.cn: 市场中展示了当期可进行交易的货组种类。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_4.en: The market shows various packages (pkg) that can be traded during this time.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_5.cn: 请点击此处，选择该货组。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_5.en: Click here to select this package.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_6.cn: 这里显示了该货组的今日价格。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_6.en: This shows the price of this package for today.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_7.cn: 若<@gd.key>相比建议价格更低，则建议买入</>；若相比建议价格更高，则不建议买入。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_7.en: If the <@gd.key>price is lower than the recommended price, purchase it</>. Do not purchase if the price is higher than the recommended price.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_8.cn: 还可将弹性需求物资，以<@gd.key>当前的价格出售</>获得调度券。点击此处即可切换。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_8.en: Elastic goods can also be <@gd.key>sold at the current price</> to get stock bills. Click here to switch.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_8_ct.cn: 还可将弹性需求物资，以<@gd.key>当前的价格出售</>获得调度券。按下<action=common_toggle_group_next_include_pc>即可切换。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_8_ct.en: Elastic goods can also be <@gd.key>sold at the current price</> to get stock bills. Press <action=common_toggle_group_next_include_pc> to switch.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_9.cn: 这里显示了当前剩余可购买弹性需求物资的数量，该数量<@gd.key>每日均会增加</>，直至到达上限。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_9.en: This shows the number of elastic goods that can be purchased. This number <@gd.key>increases every day</> until it hits a maximum.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_desc_1.cn: 弹性需求物资的价格会每天发生波动。可在价格较低时买入，在价格较高时出售以获取利润。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_desc_1.en: The prices of elastic goods fluctuate on a daily basis. Buy low and sell high to earn profits.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_desc_2.cn:
好友飞船上的弹性需求物资价格与当地价格存在差异。
可通过<@gd.key>好友头像</>前往拜访<@gd.key>好友的飞船</>，进行弹性需求物资的出售以获取利润。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_desc_2.en: Prices of elastic goods aboard a friend's ship may differ from local prices. Use a <@gd.key>friend's portrait</> to <@gd.key>visit their ship</>, then sell your stock of elastic goods to earn a profit.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_exit_1.cn: 请点击此处回到上一级界面。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_exit_1.en: Click here to return to the previous screen.

guide_text_domain_shop_up_exit_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_cancel>回到上一级界面。
guide_text_domain_shop_up_exit_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to return to the previous screen.

guide_text_domain_transport_button_hint_.cn: 若要使用<@gd.key>跨地区传输物品</>功能，可打开<@gd.key>协议管理</>界面。
guide_text_domain_transport_button_hint_.en: To use the <@gd.key>Regional Transfer</> feature to transfer items, open the <@gd.key>Protocol Management</> screen.

guide_text_doodad_intro_des_1.cn: 塔卫二分布着众多可被采集的资源，有些可以直接采集，有些则需要<@gd.key>攻击</>后才能够采集。
guide_text_doodad_intro_des_1.en: Talos-II has all sorts of gatherables. Some can be gathered immediately, while others must be <@gd.key>attacked</> and smashed into smaller pieces before they can be gathered.

guide_text_doodad_intro_des_3.cn:
打开背包后，可进行简易制作，将原材料制作为有用的物品。
例如可通过简易制作，将<#item.plantMoss1>荞花</>制作成能够回复生命值的<#item.plantMossPowder1>荞花粉末</>。
guide_text_doodad_intro_des_3.en: Open the Backpack panel to access the Crafting screen. Various raw materials can be crafted into useful items. For example, <#item.plantMoss1>Buckflower</> can be crafted into <#item.plantMossPowder1>Buckflower Powder</> for restoring HP.

guide_text_doormarker_desc_1.cn: 武陵地区一些大门会受到<@gd.key>多个机关控制</>。大门上的<@gd.key>投影数量</>通常代表着<@gd.key>机关数量</>。要将机关<@gd.key>全部激活</>，大门才会打开。
guide_text_doormarker_desc_1.en: Certain gates in the region of Wuling are controlled by <@gd.key>multiple mechanisms</>. The <@gd.key>number of projections</> on a gate indicates the <@gd.key>number of mechanisms</> controlling it. <@gd.key>All mechanisms must be activated</> to open the gate.

guide_text_doormarker_desc_2.cn: 使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>激活附近对应数量的<@gd.key>转轮机关</>，即可解锁大门。
guide_text_doormarker_desc_2.en: Use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> to activate nearby <@gd.key>rotating mechanisms</> to unlock certain gates.

guide_text_drain_valves_desc_1.cn: 使用<@gd.key>排水闸</>后，可将一处水体内的液体排放至另一处水体内，直至原水体内排空，或排放至的水体已满。
guide_text_drain_valves_desc_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>sluice gate</> to discharge water from one water body to another until the source water body is empty, or the destination water body is full.

guide_text_drain_valves_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>液体类型不同</>的两处水体间，不可通过排水闸相互排放液体。
guide_text_drain_valves_desc_2.en: A sluice gate cannot be used if the two water bodies connected by it contain <@gd.key>different fluids</>.

guide_text_drain_valves_title_2.cn: 不可使用排水闸的情况

guide_text_dumper_put_1.cn: 可从背包中找到给水器，移动并改变朝向，将其放置在虚影位置。
guide_text_dumper_put_1.en: Find the Fluid Supply Unit in the Backpack, move and rotate it, then place it at the hologram.

guide_text_dung01_rdg004_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>特殊场地效果</>：当前场地每隔一段时间对随机敌人造成<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>，使其短暂无法行动。
guide_text_dung01_rdg004_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Environment effect</>: Periodically, <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</> is applied to a random enemy and temporarily immobilizes them.

guide_text_dungeon_1.cn: 您发现了一处<@gd.key>协议空间</>，可前往该协议空间进行探索。
guide_text_dungeon_1.en: <@gd.key>Protocol Space</> discovered. Feel free to explore it.

guide_text_dungeon_2.cn: 此处介绍了该<@gd.key>协议空间</>的各项信息，如初步探查的信息和危险程度。
guide_text_dungeon_2.en: This section has various details about the <@gd.key>Protocol Space</>, such as initial exploration data and threat levels.

guide_text_dungeon_3.cn: 可在此处查看该<@gd.key>协议空间</>中可能分布的敌方情报。
guide_text_dungeon_3.en: This section shows intel on enemies that may be found in this <@gd.key>Protocol Space</>.

guide_text_dungeon_4.cn: 此外，每个<@gd.key>协议空间</>可回收的资源也已记录在了此处，可根据当前资源情况自行选择所需探索的协议空间。
guide_text_dungeon_4.en: Resources that can be salvaged from every <@gd.key>Protocol Space</> are also listed here. Choose the Protocol Space to explore and acquire the desired resources.

guide_text_dungeon_5.cn:
探索可以回收资源的<@gd.key>协议空间</>时，会消耗<@gd.key>理智</>。
<@gd.key>理智</>消耗后，会随自然时间恢复，达到上限后停止。
guide_text_dungeon_5.en: Exploring resource-yielding <@gd.key>Protocol Spaces</> will cost <@gd.key>Sanity</>. <@gd.key>Sanity</> naturally recovers with time until it reaches a max limit.

guide_text_dungeon_6.cn: 点击此处，即可进入协议空间。
guide_text_dungeon_6.en: Click here to enter the Protocol Space.

guide_text_dungeon_hard_mode_desc_1.cn:
在<@gd.key>探索等级</>达到5后，部分协议空间的<@gd.key>深潜模式</>开放。
挑战<@gd.key>危境再现</>系列最高难度与<@gd.key>协议空间·高阶培养</>时，可以消耗理智，在通关后获得<@gd.key>深潜模式</>奖励。
guide_text_dungeon_hard_mode_desc_1.en: After reaching <@gd.key>Exploration Level 5</>, <@gd.key>Deep Dive Mode</> will become available for some Protocol Spaces. Challenge <@gd.key>RE-Crisis</> and <@gd.key>Protocol Space: Advanced Progression</> at the highest difficulty, then spend Sanity upon completion to acquire the <@gd.key>Deep Dive Mode</> rewards.

guide_text_dungeon_material_1.cn: 请点击此处，选择该难度等级的<@gd.key>协议空间</>。
guide_text_dungeon_material_1.en: Click here to select a <@gd.key>Protocol Space</> of this difficulty level.

guide_text_dungeon_material_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择该难度等级的<@gd.key>协议空间</>。
guide_text_dungeon_material_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select a <@gd.key>Protocol Space</> of this difficulty level.

guide_text_dungeon_material_2.cn: 从当前难度等级起，部分<@gd.key>协议空间</>获得的奖励可以选择不同的奖励组。
guide_text_dungeon_material_2.en: Starting from this difficulty level, certain <@gd.key>Protocol Spaces</> will offer different sets of rewards to choose from.

guide_text_dungeon_material_3.cn: 请点击此处，查看<@gd.key>奖励预览</>。

guide_text_dungeon_material_4.cn: 奖励组分为两种，可以根据当前的养成需求，自行选择奖励内容。
guide_text_dungeon_material_4.en: There are two sets of rewards. Choose the one that best suits the current needs of progression.

guide_text_dungeon_puzzle_desc_1.cn: 部分<@gd.key>密境初显</>协议空间中会分布着<@gd.key>储藏箱</>，也有部分协议空间设置了<@gd.key>附加目标</>，完成后可获得额外奖励。
guide_text_dungeon_puzzle_desc_1.en: Some <@gd.key>Cryptic First Revealed</> Protocol Spaces have <@gd.key>storage crates</> within them. Some also have <@gd.key>bonus goals</> that offer additional rewards when completed.

guide_text_dungeon_puzzle_desc_2.cn: 在<@gd.key>密境初显</>协议空间中，开启全部<@gd.key>储藏箱</>，并完成<@gd.key>附加目标</>，即可达成<@gd.key>完美通关</>。
guide_text_dungeon_puzzle_desc_2.en: Open all <@gd.key>storage crates</> and/or fulfill all <@gd.key>bonus goals</> in <@gd.key>Cryptic First Revealed</> Protocol Spaces to achieve <@gd.key>perfect completion</>.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_0.cn:
<@gd.key>塔塔接入协议通讯信号塔</>后可以解析当前区域内的动态侵蚀。
只有通过<@gd.key>塔塔</>，才能使当前区域的动态侵蚀的侵蚀核心暴露出来。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_0.en: <@gd.key>Connect Tata to the Protocom Signal Tower</> to decrypt Active Blight masses in the current area. Only <@gd.key>Tata</> can decrypt and expose the Blight Cores of local Active Blight masses.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_0_1.cn:
当前区域的侵蚀核心已暴露，可直接破坏。
也可使用扫描功能暴露<@gd.key>侵蚀脉络</>，协助定位侵蚀核心。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_0_1.en: The Blight Cores of local Active Blight masses are exposed and can be destroyed directly. The Scan action can also reveal <@gd.key>Blight Veins</> and help locate the Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆，切换至<@gd.key>扫描</>。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to move here and switch to the <@gd.key>scan</> action.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_1_mb.cn: 请拖动轮盘至此处，切换至<@gd.key>扫描</>。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_1_mb.en: Drag the wheel here and switch to <@gd.key>Scan</>.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_2.cn: 按下<action=general_ability_press>使用扫描功能，可以顺着侵蚀脉络找到侵蚀核心
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_2.en: Press <action=general_ability_press> to scan, then follow the Blight Vein to locate the Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_2_ct.cn: 按下<action=general_ability_press_alter>使用扫描功能，可以顺着侵蚀脉络找到侵蚀核心
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_2_ct.en: Press <action=general_ability_press_alter> to scan, then follow the Blight Vein to locate the Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_2_mb.cn: 点击此处进行扫描，顺着侵蚀脉络就可以找到侵蚀核心。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_2_mb.en: Tap here to scan, then follow the Blight Vein to locate the Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>塔塔接入协议通讯信号塔</>后可以解析当前区域内的动态侵蚀。
只有通过<@gd.key>塔塔</>，才能使当前区域的动态侵蚀的侵蚀核心暴露出来。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Connect Tata to the Protocom Signal Tower</> to decrypt Active Blight masses in the current area. Only <@gd.key>Tata</> can decrypt and expose the Blight Cores of local Active Blight masses.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_desc_2.cn:
当前区域的侵蚀核心已暴露，可直接破坏。
也可使用扫描功能暴露<@gd.key>侵蚀脉络</>，协助定位侵蚀核心。
每次被扫描的侵蚀脉络<@gd.key>仅能暴露一段时间</>。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_desc_2.en: The Blight Cores of local Active Blight masses are exposed and can be destroyed directly. The Scan action can also reveal <@gd.key>Blight Veins</> and help locate the Blight Core. Note that each Scan action only <@gd.key>temporarily reveals</> the Blight Veins.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_desc_3.cn:
<@gd.key>侵蚀脉络</>分布在动态侵蚀表面，最后汇聚到侵蚀核心；
注意观察脉络的<@gd.key>走势与分布</>，便可定位侵蚀核心的位置所在。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion2_desc_3.en: <@gd.key>Blight Veins</> run across the surface of Active Blight and converge at the Blight Core. Study the <@gd.key>distribution and patterns</> of Blight Veins to locate the Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_desc_1.cn: 从现在开始，可以直接使用扫描来解析动态侵蚀。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_desc_1.en: We can now directly perform scanning to decrypt Active Blight.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_desc_2.cn: 靠近动态侵蚀后，可使用扫描对范围内的侵蚀进行解析，展示其侵蚀核心和侵蚀脉络。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_desc_2.en: Approach the Active Blight and perform a scan to decrypt the Blight nearby to expose the Blight Veins and Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_desc_3.cn: 动态侵蚀被解析后，其侵蚀核心会永久暴露，而侵蚀脉络只会展示一段时间。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_desc_3.en: When Active Blight has been decrypted, its Blight Core will be exposed permanently. However, its Blight Veins will only be revealed temporarily.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_title_1.cn: 使用扫描功能解析动态侵蚀 - 一

guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_title_2.cn: 使用扫描功能解析动态侵蚀 - 二

guide_text_dynamic_erosion3_title_3.cn: 使用扫描功能解析动态侵蚀 - 三

guide_text_dynamic_erosion4_0.cn: 可使用扫描功能解析动态侵蚀，暴露侵蚀核心。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion4_0.en: Perform a scan to decrypt a mass of Active Blight and expose its Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion4_2.cn: 按下<action=general_ability_press>使用扫描，可以解析一定范围内的侵蚀，暴露侵蚀核心与侵蚀脉络。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion4_2.en: Press <action=general_ability_press> to perform a scan. This will decrypt the nearby Blight and expose the Blight Veins and Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion4_2_mb.cn: 点击此处进行扫描，顺着侵蚀脉络就可以找到侵蚀核心。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion4_2_mb.en: Tap here to scan, then follow the Blight Vein to locate the Blight Core.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>动态侵蚀</>遍布于塔卫二，会阻塞通路，对探索造成影响。
消除动态侵蚀，才可进行更深入的探索。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Active Blight</> can be found in various places of Talos-II. They can block roads and impede exploration efforts. Active Blight masses must be eliminated for exploration to continue.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion_desc_2.cn:
接触到动态侵蚀的干员会持续受到其负面影响，并在很短时间内达到<@gd.key>承受极限</>。
脱离动态侵蚀的范围，就可以消除这种负面影响。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion_desc_2.en: Operators who touch Active Blight will suffer various negative effects, quickly reach their <@gd.key>tolerance limit</>, and disconnect. Removing the operators from Active Blight will undo the negative effects.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion_desc_3.cn:
在侵蚀核心被暴露之前，动态侵蚀将无法被消除。
通过<@gd.key>攻击</>或使用<@gd.key>爆炸物</>破坏暴露的侵蚀核心，即可消除该侵蚀核心所引发的动态侵蚀。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion_desc_3.en: Active Blight cannot be eliminated unless its Blight Core is exposed. An exposed Blight Core can be destroyed by <@gd.key>attacks</> or <@gd.key>explosives</> to eliminate the Active Blight created by it.

guide_text_dynamic_erosion_desc_4.cn: 当前，<@gd.key>塔塔</>扫描侵蚀核心的功能尚不完备，部分动态侵蚀暂时无法清除，请小心躲避。
guide_text_dynamic_erosion_desc_4.en: <@gd.key>Tata</>'s ability to scan Blight Cores is incomplete. Some Active Blight cannot be eliminated right now. Be cautious and avoid them.

guide_text_electric_battery_desc_1.cn:
四号谷地中散布着一些损坏的电力装备，需要使用某些材料才能修复。
修复完成后，可以获得一定的奖励。
guide_text_electric_battery_desc_1.en: Many damaged power facilities are scattered across Valley IV. Certain materials are required to repair them. Successful repair work also offers certain rewards.

guide_text_electric_fence_desc_1.cn:
高压阻拦网激活时，无法通过。
沿着<@gd.key>电力运输线路</>找到其对应的开关，即可关闭高压阻拦网，通过原本被其封锁的路段。
guide_text_electric_fence_desc_1.en: Certain paths and areas are blocked by active high voltage fences. Follow the fences' <@gd.key>power cables</>, find the switch, and use it to shut down the fences for safe passage.

guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 管理员的战技会造成<#ba.crush>猛击</>。

guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_02_2.cn: <#ba.crush>猛击</>：对敌人造成<#ba.noguard>破防</>，如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会消耗所有<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数并造成大量物理伤害。
guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_02_2.en: <#ba.crush>Crush</>: Applies <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> on an enemy. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, then consume all <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks and deal massive Physical DMG.

guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 其他干员的连携技造成伤害时，可以发动管理员的连携技。
guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_03_1.en: The Endministrator's combo skill is triggered when another operator's combo skill deals DMG.

guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 管理员的连携技会对敌人附着<@ba.key>源石结晶</>，让其无法行动。
guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_03_2.en: The Endministrator's combo skill inflicts <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</> upon enemies and immobilizes them.

guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 管理员的终结技会造成物理伤害。如果目标被附着<@ba.key>源石结晶</>，还能打碎<@ba.key>源石结晶</>并造成额外伤害。
guide_text_endmin_chartrain01_04_1.en: The Endministrator's ultimate deals Physical DMG. If the target has <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</> inflicted upon them, the ultimate will shatter these <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</> to deal additional DMG.

guide_text_enemy_interrupt_0.cn: 敌人正在施放<@gd.key>蓄力技能</>。
guide_text_enemy_interrupt_0.en: The enemy is casting a <@gd.key>charged skill</>.

guide_text_enemy_interrupt_1.cn: 有些敌人会施放<@gd.key>蓄力技能</>，这些蓄力技能会有<@gd.key>红圈</>提示。
guide_text_enemy_interrupt_1.en: Some enemies will cast <@gd.key>charged skills</>. A <@gd.key>red circle</> will appear around them as they charge up their skills.

guide_text_enemy_interrupt_2.cn:
在敌人施放<@gd.key>蓄力技能</>期间，使用干员的<@gd.key>伤害性技能</>可以将其打断。
如果能够成功将敌人打断，敌人会<@gd.key>停止</>施放该技能并增加大量失衡值。
guide_text_enemy_interrupt_2.en: When an enemy is casting a <@gd.key>charged skill</>, it can be interrupted with any operator's <@gd.key>damage-dealing skill</>. Successful interruption <@gd.key>stops</> the enemy's skill casting and deals large amounts of Stagger.

guide_text_enemy_interrupt_3.cn: 短按数字键<action=battle_use_char_skill_2>施放<@gd.key>战技</>打断敌人。
guide_text_enemy_interrupt_3.en: Press number key <action=battle_use_char_skill_2> to cast the <@gd.key>battle skill</> and interrupt the enemy.

guide_text_enemy_interrupt_3_ct.cn: 按住<action=common_indicator_start>并短按<action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_1>，施放<@gd.key>战技</>打断敌人。
guide_text_enemy_interrupt_3_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_1> to cast a <@gd.key>battle skill</> and interrupt the enemy.

guide_text_enemy_interrupt_3_mb.cn: 点击此处，施放<@gd.key>战技</>打断敌人。
guide_text_enemy_interrupt_3_mb.en: Tap here to cast a <@gd.key>battle skill</> and interrupt the enemy.

guide_text_enemy_interrupt_n.cn: <@gd.key>成功打断</>，战斗中多注意观察敌人施放的<@gd.key>蓄力技能</>。
guide_text_enemy_interrupt_n.en: <@gd.key>The enemy is successfully interrupted</>. During battle, keep an eye out for enemies casting their <@gd.key>charged skills</>.

guide_text_enemy_poise_intro_1.cn: 技能命中后，可以累积敌人的失衡值、进而使其进入失衡状态。
guide_text_enemy_poise_intro_1.en: Skills that hit enemies can deal Stagger and cause Staggered.

guide_text_enemy_poise_window_1.cn: <@gd.key>失衡值</>达到上限后，敌人会进入<@gd.key>失衡</>状态。
guide_text_enemy_poise_window_1.en: When the <@gd.key>Stagger meter</> is full, the enemy becomes <@gd.key>Staggered</>.

guide_text_enemy_poise_window_2.cn:
失衡期间，敌人<@gd.key>无法行动</>，且<@gd.key>受到的伤害</>会提升。
失衡状态持续数秒后会自动解除。
guide_text_enemy_poise_window_2.en: Staggered enemies <@gd.key>cannot move</> and take <@gd.key>more damage</>. The Staggered status will automatically end after a few seconds.

guide_text_enemy_poise_window_3.cn: 敌人进入失衡状态后，可按下攻击键<action=battle_attack_start>对其进行一次<@gd.key>处决</>，造成大量伤害并恢复一定技力。
guide_text_enemy_poise_window_3.en: When an enemy becomes Staggered, press the attack button <action=battle_attack_start> to perform a <@gd.key>Finisher</> that deals massive DMG and recovers some Skill Points (SP).

guide_text_enemy_poise_window_3_ct.cn: 敌人进入失衡状态后，可按下<action=battle_attack_start>对其进行一次<@gd.key>处决</>，造成大量伤害并恢复一定技力。
guide_text_enemy_poise_window_3_ct.en: When an enemy becomes Staggered, press <action=battle_attack_start> to perform a <@gd.key>Finisher</> that deals massive DMG and recovers some Skill Points (SP).

guide_text_enemy_poise_window_3_mb.cn: 敌人进入失衡状态后，可按下攻击键对其进行一次<@gd.key>处决</>，造成大量伤害并恢复一定技力。
guide_text_enemy_poise_window_3_mb.en: When an enemy becomes Staggered, tap the attack button to perform a <@gd.key>Finisher</> that deals massive DMG and recovers some Skill Points (SP).

guide_text_enemy_poise_zero.cn: 已成功通过<@gd.key>重击</>使敌人进入<@gd.key>失衡</>状态。
guide_text_enemy_poise_zero.en: The <@gd.key>Final Strike</> has successfully <@gd.key>Staggered</> the enemy.

guide_text_enemy_poise_zero0.cn:
普通攻击的<@gd.key>最后一击</>被称为<@gd.key>重击</>。
<@gd.key>重击</>效果强大，可以累积敌人的<@gd.key>失衡值</>，进而使其进入<@gd.key>失衡状态</>。
guide_text_enemy_poise_zero0.en: The <@gd.key>last sequence</> of basic attack is the <@gd.key>Final Strike</>. It is a powerful hit that also deals <@gd.key>Stagger</>, and thus can apply the <@gd.key>Staggered</> effect to the enemy.

guide_text_enemy_poise_zero0_n.cn: 使用普通攻击的<@gd.key>最后一击</>触发<@gd.key>重击</>，累积敌人的<@gd.key>失衡值</>，使其进入<@gd.key>失衡状态</>。
guide_text_enemy_poise_zero0_n.en: The <@gd.key>last sequence</> of basic attack is the <@gd.key>Final Strike</>. It can deal <@gd.key>Stagger</> to the enemy. An enemy whose Stagger meter is full becomes <@gd.key>Staggered</>.

guide_text_enemy_poisenext.cn: 敌人已进入失衡状态，按下鼠标左键 <action=battle_attack_start> 对其进行处决。
guide_text_enemy_poisenext.en: The enemy is Staggered. Click the left mouse button <action=battle_attack_start> to perform a finisher on them.

guide_text_enemy_poisenext_ct.cn: 敌人已进入失衡状态，按下<action=battle_attack_start>对其进行处决。
guide_text_enemy_poisenext_ct.en: The enemy is Staggered. Press <action=battle_attack_start> to perform a finisher on them.

guide_text_enemy_poisenext_mb.cn: 敌人已进入失衡状态，点击攻击键对其进行处决。
guide_text_enemy_poisenext_mb.en: The enemy is Staggered. Tap the attack button to perform a finisher on them.

guide_text_energy_point_2_1.cn: 随着探索等级提升，能量淤积点已转变为<@gd.key>重度能量淤积点</>，完成挑战后<@gd.key>消耗理智</>可更加集中地<@gd.key>获取基质</>。
guide_text_energy_point_2_1.en: Your higher Exploration Level has converted Energy Alluvium sites into <@gd.key>Severe Energy Alluvium</> sites. Challenge them and <@gd.key>spend Sanity</> to earn more <@gd.key>essences</>.

guide_text_energy_point_2_10.cn: 同时必须选择<@gd.key>1条附加属性或技能属性</>，该条属性<@gd.key>一定</>会出现在获得的基质之中。
guide_text_energy_point_2_10.en: The process also requires the selection of <@gd.key>1 secondary stat or 1 skill stat</>. The selected stat <@gd.key>will definitely</> appear in the essence acquired.

guide_text_energy_point_2_11.cn: 预刻写选择完毕后，即可在此处确认。
guide_text_energy_point_2_11.en: After selecting the pre-engraving stats, use this to confirm.

guide_text_energy_point_2_12.cn: 需要消耗<@gd.key>所在地区对应的刻写券</>，才可以让预刻写结果在领取基质奖励时<@gd.key>实际生效</>。
guide_text_energy_point_2_12.en: <@gd.key>Local engraving permits</> must be spent so that the pre-engraving results will <@gd.key>actually be applied</> to the essence rewarded.

guide_text_energy_point_2_13.cn: 可在此处查看<@gd.key>刻写券</>的详细信息和获取方式。
guide_text_energy_point_2_13.en: This shows details about <@gd.key>engraving permits</> and how to acquire them.

guide_text_energy_point_2_2.cn: 点击此处查看当前重度能量淤积点可获取的<@gd.key>基质属性总览</>。
guide_text_energy_point_2_2.en: Click here for the <@gd.key>Stats Overview</> of essences that can be acquired from this Severe Energy Alluvium.

guide_text_energy_point_2_2_ct.cn: 按下<action=energy_point_open_gem_overview>查看当前重度能量淤积点可获取的<@gd.key>基质属性总览</>。
guide_text_energy_point_2_2_ct.en: Press <action=energy_point_open_gem_overview> to view the <@gd.key>essence attribute overview</> available at the current Severe Energy Alluvium.

guide_text_energy_point_2_3.cn: 这里展示了当前淤积点消耗理智获取的基质将带有的属性范围。
guide_text_energy_point_2_3.en: This shows a range of stats that may appear on essences acquired by successfully challenging this alluvium site and spending Sanity afterwards.

guide_text_energy_point_2_4.cn: 可获取的基质属性范围，若有机会完美适配某个武器的<@gd.key>每项属性</>，该武器会展示在<@gd.key>适配武器</>处。
guide_text_energy_point_2_4.en: If the range of essence stats includes a combination that perfectly matches <@gd.key>every stat</> of a weapon, that weapon will be listed in the <@gd.key>Compatible Weapons</> section.

guide_text_energy_point_2_6.cn: 可以直接开启挑战，也可以通过<@gd.key>预刻写</>进一步<@gd.key>缩小</>可获得基质的属性范围。
guide_text_energy_point_2_6.en: Either challenge the alluvium site immediately, or use the <@gd.key>pre-engraving</> feature to <@gd.key>narrow down</> the range of essence stats that may appear.

guide_text_energy_point_2_7.en: Click here to open the pre-engraving screen.

guide_text_energy_point_2_7_ct.en: Press <action=energy_point_start_gem_custom> to open the pre-engraving screen.

guide_text_energy_point_2_8.cn: 通过预刻写，可以根据需求<@gd.key>更细致地限定</>从当前淤积点<@gd.key>消耗理智</>获取的基质可出现的属性。
guide_text_energy_point_2_8.en: Use pre-engraving to <@gd.key>customize and narrow down</> the range of stats that may appear on essences acquired by successfully challenging this alluvium site and <@gd.key>spending Sanity</> afterwards.

guide_text_energy_point_2_9.cn: 必须选择<@gd.key>3条基础属性</>，获得的基质中只会带有<@gd.key>3条基础属性中的1条</>。
guide_text_energy_point_2_9.en: Pre-engraving involves selecting <@gd.key>3 attribute stats</>. The essence acquired will only have <@gd.key>1 of the 3 attribute stats selected</>.

guide_text_energy_point_2_desc_1.cn: 击败重度能量淤积点的敌人后，可以<@gd.key>消耗理智</>，获取更多<@gd.key>基质</>。每个淤积点获取的基质会拥有<@gd.key>一定范围内</>的基质属性。
guide_text_energy_point_2_desc_1.en: After defeating enemies of a Severe Energy Alluvium, <@gd.key>spend Sanity</> to acquire more <@gd.key>essences</>. Every alluvium site provides essences with <@gd.key>a specific range of stats</>.

guide_text_energy_point_2_desc_2.cn: 可以通过在重度能量淤积点处<@gd.key>预刻写基质属性</>，来限定获取的武器基质拥有的属性。预刻写生效需要在领取奖励时消耗所在地区的<@gd.key>刻写券</>。
guide_text_energy_point_2_desc_2.en: When challenging a Severe Energy Alluvium, use the <@gd.key>Pre-Engrave Stats</> option to narrow down the range of weapon essence stats. Pre-Engrave costs local <@gd.key>engraving permits</>, which must be spent when claiming the energy alluvium rewards.

guide_text_energy_point_2_guidebook_1.cn: 随着探索等级提升，能量淤积点已转变为<@gd.key>重度能量淤积点</>，请切换到<@gd.key>索引</>页签。
guide_text_energy_point_2_guidebook_1.en: Your higher Exploration Level has converted Energy Alluvium sites into <@gd.key>Severe Energy Alluvium</> sites. Open the <@gd.key>Index</> tab.

guide_text_energy_point_2_guidebook_3.cn: 现在完成挑战后可以<@gd.key>消耗理智</>领取奖励，更加集中地<@gd.key>获取基质</>。
guide_text_energy_point_2_guidebook_3.en: Now, complete the challenge and <@gd.key>spend Sanity</> afterwards. This is the primary means of acquiring <@gd.key>essences</>.

guide_text_energy_point_2_guidebook_4.cn: 这里可以查看对应重度能量淤积点可获得基质的属性范围与适配的武器。
guide_text_energy_point_2_guidebook_4.en: This shows the range of essence stats and applicable weapons offered at this Severe Energy Alluvium.

guide_text_energy_point_2_guidebook_5.cn: 前往重度能量淤积点进行挑战，获取更多基质。
guide_text_energy_point_2_guidebook_5.en: Go and challenge the Severe Energy Alluvium to acquire more essences.

guide_text_energy_point_2_title_1.cn: 重度能量淤积点 - 一

guide_text_energy_point_2_title_2.cn: 重度能量淤积点 - 二

guide_text_energy_point_desc_1.cn:
塔卫二中的某些地方会出现<@gd.key>能量淤积点</>。
靠近能量淤积点并<@gd.key>激发</>，可以查看能量淤积点的详细信息。
guide_text_energy_point_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Energy Alluvium</> may appear at certain locations of Talos-II. Approach an Energy Alluvium to <@gd.key>activate</> it and view its details.

guide_text_energy_point_desc_2.cn:
开启挑战后，淤积点处将会出现大量敌人。
首次击败某个能量淤积点出现的全部敌人后会获得<@gd.key>首通奖励</>。
guide_text_energy_point_desc_2.en: After activating a challenge, a large number of enemies will appear at the Alluvium. Defeating all enemies of an Energy Alluvium for the first time provides a <@gd.key>1st clear reward</>.

guide_text_equip_chest_desc_1.cn:
装备模板箱中存放着机器人们收集来的装备生产数据。
打开模板箱可以解锁新的装备制造模板。不同模板需要用不同地区的主要装备原件才能生产。
guide_text_equip_chest_desc_1.en: Gear template crates include gear assembly data that the robots have gathered. Open these crates to unlock new gear templates for assembling new types of gear. Different templates may also need components specific to the region.

guide_text_equip_cmpt_desc_1.cn:
制作紫色品质的装备，需要使用<@gd.key>高晶装备原件</>。
<@gd.key>高晶装备原件</>则需要使用<@gd.key>砂叶</>并研究<@gd.key>研磨工艺</>技术。
<@gd.key>砂叶</>可在<@gd.key>供能高地</>采集。
guide_text_equip_cmpt_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Cryston Components</> are required to assemble purple quality gear. Production of <@gd.key>Cryston Components</> requires <@gd.key>Sandleaves</> and the AIC Factory Plan technology <@gd.key>Grinding</>. <@gd.key>Sandleaves</> can be gathered at the <@gd.key>Power Plateau</>.

guide_text_equip_cmpt_desc_2.cn:
可查看<@gd.key>高晶装备原件</>的百科页面，并查看其<@gd.key>制造链路</>，查看其制作方法。
并可在<@gd.key>制造链路</>中查看其<@gd.key>相关教学</>以及对应的<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。
guide_text_equip_cmpt_desc_2.en: Visit the Database page of <@gd.key>Cryston Component</> to view its <@gd.key>production chain</> and how to produce this item. The <@gd.key>production chain</> also provides various <@gd.key>guides</> and specific <@gd.key>system blueprints</>.

guide_text_equip_cmpt_title_2.cn: 高晶装备原件的制作方法

guide_text_equip_enhance_1.cn: <@gd.key>装备精锻</>可通过消耗材料来提升<@gd.key>金色品质装备</>的属性。
guide_text_equip_enhance_1.en: <@gd.key>Gear artificing</> consumes materials to improve the stats of <@gd.key>gold quality gear</>.

guide_text_equip_enhance_2.cn: 请点击此处，选择该件装备进行精锻。
guide_text_equip_enhance_2.en: Click here to select this piece of gear for artificing.

guide_text_equip_enhance_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择该件装备进行精锻。
guide_text_equip_enhance_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select this piece of gear for artificing.

guide_text_equip_enhance_3.cn:
可对该件装备的三个属性进行<@gd.key>精锻</>操作。
精锻成功后，属性将<@gd.key>固定提升属性数值</>。
guide_text_equip_enhance_3.en:
<@gd.key>Artificing</> can improve the 3 stats of this piece of gear.
A successful artificing attempt provides a <@gd.key>fixed numerical increase</> to the stats.

guide_text_equip_enhance_4.cn: 每项属性都有可精锻次数的上限，可在此处查看。
guide_text_equip_enhance_4.en: Each stat has a limit to the number of artificing that can be performed. This limit is shown here.

guide_text_equip_enhance_5.cn: 请点击此处，对该条属性进行精锻。
guide_text_equip_enhance_5.en: Click here to artifice this stats.

guide_text_equip_enhance_5_1.cn: 可在此处预览当前可用作<@gd.key>精锻耗费</>的装备。
guide_text_equip_enhance_5_1.en: This shows a preview of various pieces of gear that can be used as <@gd.key>artificing materials</>.

guide_text_equip_enhance_5_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，对该条属性进行精锻。

guide_text_equip_enhance_6.cn:
每次进行精锻操作，需消耗与待精锻装备<@gd.key>同部位</>的金色品质装备。
请点击此处选择。
guide_text_equip_enhance_6.en: Every artificing attempt costs gold quality gear of the <@gd.key>same equipping part</>. Click here to select the piece of gear.

guide_text_equip_enhance_6_ct.cn:
每次进行精锻操作，需消耗与待精锻装备<@gd.key>同部位</>的金色品质装备。
请按下<action=common_confirm>选择。
guide_text_equip_enhance_6_ct.en: Every artificing attempt costs gold quality gear of the <@gd.key>same equipping part</>. Press <action=common_confirm> to select the piece of gear.

guide_text_equip_enhance_7.cn: 并且每次还需要与待精锻装备所属地区相同的<@gd.key>精锻助剂</>。
guide_text_equip_enhance_7.en: Artificing also requires <@gd.key>artificing catalyst</> of the same region as the gear to be artificed.

guide_text_equip_enhance_8.cn: 每次对装备属性进行精锻时，将<@gd.key>积累精锻进度</>。
guide_text_equip_enhance_8.en: Performing gear artificing of a particular gear stat <@gd.key>builds up artificing progress</>.

guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>装备精锻</>可通过消耗材料来提升<@gd.key>金色品质装备</>的属性。
可对金色品质装备的各初始属性进行精锻，成功后将<@gd.key>固定提升属性数值</>，每项属性都有可精锻次数的上限。
guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Gear Artificing</> consumes materials to improve the stats of <@gd.key>gold quality gear</>. Various base stats of gold quality gear can be artificed, and every successful artificing provides a <@gd.key>fixed increase to the stats</>. Every stat has an artificing limit.

guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_2.cn: 每次进行精锻操作，需消耗与待精锻装备<@gd.key>相同部位</>的金色品质装备，以及与待精锻装备所属地区相同的<@gd.key>精锻助剂</>。
guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_2.en: Every artificing attempt costs gold quality gear of the <@gd.key>same equipping part</> and <@gd.key>artificing catalyst</> of the same region as the piece of gear to be artificed.

guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_3.cn: 作为精锻耗费的装备需<@gd.key>含有待精锻属性</>，且该属性未强化前的初始值不小于待精锻装备对应属性初始值。
guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_3.en: The gear to be spent for artificing must have <@gd.key>artifice-able stats</>. The base value of such stats must be at least as high as the base value of the matching stats of the gear to be artificed.

guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_4.cn: 每次对装备属性进行精锻时，将积累精锻进度，积累达到上限时，下一次该装备属性精锻强化将<@gd.key>必定成功</>。 不同装备和属性的精锻积累上限略有不同。
guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_4.en: Performing gear artificing of a particular gear stat builds up artificing progress. After reaching max progress, <@gd.key>success is guaranteed</> for the next artificing attempt of this gear stat. Different gear and gear stats have different artificing progress limits.

guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_5.cn: 装备精锻有较小可能直接强化成功，且清空当前精锻积累。 耗费装备的属性初始值<@gd.key>高于</>待精锻装备初始值时，直接完成精锻强化的可能性略有<@gd.key>提升</>。
guide_text_equip_enhance_desc_5.en: Gear artificing attempts have a small chance of direct success. A successful attempt also resets the current artificing progress. Chance of direct success is slightly <@gd.key>improved</> when the gear used as the artificing material has a <@gd.key>higher</> base stat than that of the gear to be artificed.

guide_text_erosion_intro_desc_1.cn: 武陵地区也存在动态侵蚀，同样会阻塞道路，并对接触到的干员造成负面影响。在无法消除武陵地区的动态侵蚀时，请小心躲避。
guide_text_erosion_intro_desc_1.en: There are also masses of Active Blight in Wuling that block paths and exert negative effects on the operators. Avoid these Blight masses if they cannot be eliminated.

guide_text_erosion_mechanism_desc_1.cn: 被动态侵蚀影响的各类装置，需要<@gd.key>消除侵蚀</>后才能正常使用。
guide_text_erosion_mechanism_desc_1.en: Certain devices, machines, and mechanisms might be affected by Active Blight. The <@gd.key>Blight must be eliminated</> to use them properly.

guide_text_eswitch_attacked_1.cn: 受击装置在受到攻击或是爆炸冲击后，会改变运行状态，一般用来关闭<#adv.electricFence>高压阻拦网</>或启用<#adv.jumpMachine>弹射装置</>。
guide_text_eswitch_attacked_1.en: A reactive device changes its operation mode when attacked or hit by an explosion. It is often used as a switch for <#adv.electricFence>High Voltage Fences</> or <#adv.jumpMachine>Bounce Devices</>.

guide_text_ether1.cn: 在野外探索时，有时会发现闪烁着奇异光芒的物体——<@gd.key>醚质</>。
guide_text_ether1.en: <@gd.key>Aurylenes</> are mysterious entities that emit strange sparkling lights. They may be found during exploration.

guide_text_ether2.cn:
活性醚质是一种特殊醚质，具备不同的活性化特征。
有的会自主移动；有的则“善于隐蔽”——需要通过<@gd.key>扫描</>才能确认他们的位置。
guide_text_ether2.en: Active Aurylenes are forms of unstable Aurylene that exhibit a range of special properties. Some can move on their own, while others are good at "hiding" and can only be revealed by <@gd.key>scanning</>.

guide_text_ether3.cn: 将<@gd.key>醚质</>提交到<@gd.key>协议传送点</>处，可获得探索有帮助的道具，<@gd.key>增加体力上限</>。
guide_text_ether3.en: Submit <@gd.key>Aurylenes</> at any <@gd.key>TP Point</> to receive items that can support exploration and <@gd.key>increase Stamina limit</>.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_1.cn: 这里正在预览当前集成核心区域的状态。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_1.en: This is a preview of the current status of the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_2.cn: 右侧列表是所有可供购买的<@gd.key>升级项</>，选择任意升级项查看其功能。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_2.en: The list on the right shows all the <@gd.key>upgrades</> that can be purchased. Select an upgrade to check its effects.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_2_1.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>区域扩大·一</>，预览它的效果。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_2_1.en: Click on <@gd.key>Area Expansion I</> to preview its effects.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_2_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>区域扩大·一</>，预览它的效果。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_2_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select <@gd.key>Area Expansion I</> and preview its effects.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_3.cn: 这里列举了购买升级后对集成核心区域的影响以及相关说明。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_3.en: This lists the effects on the Core AIC Area and other details of the upgrade once purchased.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_4.cn: 如果拥有足够的当前地区<@gd.key>调度券</>，则可以购买对应升级项，使得集成核心区域获得相应升级。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_4.en: Having enough regional <@gd.key>stock bills</> allows the purchasing of various upgrades to improve the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_5.cn: 调度券可以通过<@gd.key>向据点供给货物、探索地区等</>多种方式获得，当有足够调度券时记得前往升级集成核心区域，以便利集成工业系统的建设。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_5.en: Stock bills can be earned in a number of ways, including <@gd.key>supplying outposts with goods and regional exploration</>. Do not forget to upgrade the Core AIC Area after earning enough stock bills to expedite the establishment of a proper AIC Factory.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_6.cn: 集成管家可以升级<@gd.key>仓库存取线</>，对后续的工业建设有非常大的帮助，点击预览本段仓库存取线。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_6.en: The AIC Steward can upgrade the <@gd.key>Depot Bus</> and offer plenty of help for subsequent AIC Factory expansions. Click to preview the Depot Bus technology.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_6_ct.cn:
集成管家可以升级<@gd.key>仓库存取线</>，对后续的工业建设有非常大的帮助。
请按下<action=fac_region_upgrade_goto_tech_tree>，查看工业发展规划。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_6_ct.en: The AIC Steward can upgrade the <@gd.key>Depot Bus</> and offers plenty of help for subsequent AIC Factory expansions. Press <action=fac_region_upgrade_goto_tech_tree> to view the AIC Factory Plan.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_7.cn: 获取足够的基础工业点数并解锁前置项目，即可解锁<@gd.key>仓库存取线</>的升级权限。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_7.en: Earn enough Basic AIC Indices and unlock various prerequisites to gain the authorization to upgrade the <@gd.key>Depot Bus</>.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_8.cn: 点击这里前往<@gd.key>相关教学</>，学习仓库存取线的使用知识，对合理使用仓库存取线大有裨益。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_8.en: Click here to experience <@gd.key>relevant tutorials</> and master the uses of the Depot Bus. Clever use of the Depot Bus will greatly benefit the AIC Factory.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_8_ct.cn: 可按下<action=tech_tree_detail_related_blackbox>前往<@gd.key>相关教学</>，学习仓库存取线的使用知识，对合理使用仓库存取线大有裨益。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_8_ct.en: Press <action=tech_tree_detail_related_blackbox> to experience <@gd.key>relevant tutorials</> and master the uses of the Depot Bus. Clever use of the Depot Bus will greatly benefit the AIC Factory.

guide_text_fac_region_levelup_hint_1.cn: 集成核心区域附近出现了集成管家，与其交互，了解如何<@gd.key>升级集成核心区域</>。
guide_text_fac_region_levelup_hint_1.en: An AIC Steward has appeared near the Core AIC Area. Interact with the AIC Steward to learn how to <@gd.key>upgrade the Core AIC Area</>.

guide_text_filling_pd_mc_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>灌装机</>可以将含有灌装标签的材料进行合成生产，可制造多种制剂或食品产品。
典型产物为<#item.bottledRecHp1>荞愈胶囊</>，由<#item.glassBottle>紫晶质瓶</>和<#item.plantMossPowder1>荞花粉末</>放入<@gd.key>灌装机</>后合成获得。
guide_text_filling_pd_mc_intro_desc_1.en:
The <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> can process materials with the [Fill] tag to produce various medications or processed foods.
Typical product: <#item.bottledRecHp1>Buck Capsule [C]</>, made by placing <#item.glassBottle>Amethyst Bottle</> and <#item.plantMossPowder1>Buckflower Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>.

guide_text_fireflyfrogs_desc_1.cn: 拍一拍<@gd.key>周身萦绕光点</>的吐虫长股兽，它会吐出萤火虫，将其传递至<@gd.key>终点位置的长股兽</>吧！
guide_text_fireflyfrogs_desc_1.en: Pat a <@gd.key>glowing bugspitting lankybeast</> and it will spit out a glowbug, then pass that glowbug to the <@gd.key>lankybeast at the finishing position</>.

guide_text_fireflyfrogs_desc_2.cn: 有些长股兽不在传递位置上，可以适当地<@gd.key>驱赶</>它们，这些长股兽会在有人靠近后跳开，利用这种特性，可以让它前往<@gd.key>适合传递萤火虫的位置</>。
guide_text_fireflyfrogs_desc_2.en: Some lankybeasts are not at bug passing positions, but will jump away when people get close. Use this property and <@gd.key>chase</> them around to force the lankybeasts to a <@gd.key>proper bug passing position</>.

guide_text_fireflyfrogs_desc_3.cn: 也有些不在传递位置的长股兽会<@gd.key>跟随荷叶移动或升降</>，利用荷叶的移动规则，也可以让它们帮助传递萤火虫。
guide_text_fireflyfrogs_desc_3.en: Some lankybeasts not in the passing positions <@gd.key>move around or up and down with their lotus leaves</>. Study how the lotus leaves move and use the lankies on the leaves to pass the bugs.

guide_text_flame_desctruct_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>易燃凝胶</>是一种易燃、易爆物质，在被<#item.procBomb>工业爆炸物</>引爆后，会引发周边其他的<@gd.key>易燃凝胶</>爆炸。
guide_text_flame_desctruct_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Flammable Gel</> is a flammable and explosive substance. It can be detonated by <#item.procBomb>Industrial Explosives</> and the resulting explosion can also detonate nearby patches of <@gd.key>Flammable Gel</> as well.

guide_text_fog_nest_desc.cn:
使用普通的攻击手段无法摧毁小型巢雕。
只能通过<@gd.key>爆炸物</>摧毁小型巢雕。
guide_text_fog_nest_desc.en: Small denstacks cannot be damaged by operator attacks or skills. They can only be destroyed with <@gd.key>explosives</>.

guide_text_forklift_desc_1.cn: 交互后，叉车会将所持货物抬高。
guide_text_forklift_desc_1.en: Interact with forklifts to raise or lower their lifting forks.

guide_text_friend_1.cn: <@gd.key>好友</>系统中集成了个人名片、好友列表、添加好友等功能，可在此查看社交相关信息。
guide_text_friend_1.en: The <@gd.key>Friends</> feature includes these functions: Profile, Friends List, and Add Friend. Use it to view details related to socialization.

guide_text_friend_2.cn: 请点击此处，查看<@gd.key>个人名片</>。

guide_text_friend_3.cn: 在<@gd.key>个人名片</>中，可查看管理员的各项信息，如任务进度、干员与武器持有数量、光荣之路等。
guide_text_friend_3.en: The <@gd.key>Profile</> displays various information of the Endministrator, including mission progress, number of operators and weapons acquired, and Path of Glory (achievement medals).

guide_text_friend_4.cn:
个人名片同样可用于对其他玩家显示。
可在此处更换展示的干员。
guide_text_friend_4.en:
The Profile is also displayed to other players.
Showcased operators can be edited here.

guide_text_friend_5.cn: 可点击此处，展开更多功能，并进行个性化设置，如更改名片主题、头像、头像框等。
guide_text_friend_5.en: Click here to show more personalization options. These include changing profile themes, portraits, and portrait frames.

guide_text_friend_5_ct.cn: 可按下<action=friend_move_info>，展开更多功能，并进行个性化设置，如更改名片主题、头像、头像框等。
guide_text_friend_5_ct.en: Press <action=friend_move_info> to show more personalization options that include profile themes, portraits, and portrait frames.

guide_text_friend_6.cn: 点击此处，前往<@gd.key>添加好友</>。

guide_text_friend_7.cn: 可搜索玩家名称或UID以添加好友。
guide_text_friend_7.en: Search player name or UID to find and add friends.

guide_text_friend_8.cn: 除此之外，终末地工业还提供了一批<@gd.key>可联络者</>，可供添加好友。
guide_text_friend_8.en: Endfield Industries has also provided a list of <@gd.key>contacts</> who can be added as friends.

guide_text_furnance_hint1.cn:
<@gd.key>供电桩</>已存放于背包中。
请按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_furnance_hint1.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> has been placed in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_furnance_hint1_ct.cn:
<@gd.key>供电桩</>已存放于背包中。
请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_furnance_hint1_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> has been placed in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_furnance_hint1_mb.cn:
<@gd.key>供电桩</>已存放于背包中。
请点击此处打开背包。
guide_text_furnance_hint1_mb.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> has been placed in the Backpack. Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_furnance_hint2.cn: 按照提示，请将<@gd.key>供电桩</>拖入下方快捷栏中。
guide_text_furnance_hint2.en: Follow the instructions and drag the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to the hotbar below.

guide_text_furnance_hint2_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，将<@gd.key>供电桩</>登录到快捷栏中。
guide_text_furnance_hint2_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to add <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> into the hotbar.

guide_text_furnance_hint2_2_ct.cn: 请将<@gd.key>供电桩</>放入快捷栏。
guide_text_furnance_hint2_2_ct.en: Place the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> into the hotbar.

guide_text_furnance_hint3.cn: 靠近精炼炉并按下<action=common_interact>打开操作面板。
guide_text_furnance_hint3.en: Get close to the Refining Unit, then press <action=common_interact> to open its control panel.

guide_text_furnance_hint3_mb.cn: 靠近精炼炉并打开其操作面板。
guide_text_furnance_hint3_mb.en: Get close to the Refining Unit and open its control panel.

guide_text_furnance_hint4.cn: 将源矿拖入精炼炉，可以生产得到晶体外壳。
guide_text_furnance_hint4.en: Drag Originium Ore into the Refining Unit to process it into Origocrusts.

guide_text_furnance_hint4_ct.cn: 将源矿放入精炼炉，可以生产得到晶体外壳。
guide_text_furnance_hint4_ct.en: Place the Originium Ore in the Refining Unit to process it into Origocrusts.

guide_text_gacha_1.cn:
可通过<@gd.key>寻访</>来获得更多的干员支援。
请按下<action=common_open_gacha>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进行干员寻访。
guide_text_gacha_1.en: Use <@gd.key>headhunting</> to acquire more operators for support. Press <action=common_open_gacha> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to perform headhunting.

guide_text_gacha_1_1.cn: 可通过<@gd.key>寻访</>来获得更多的干员支援。
guide_text_gacha_1_1.en: Use <@gd.key>headhunting</> to acquire more operators for support.

guide_text_gacha_1_ct.cn:
可通过<@gd.key>寻访</>来获得更多的干员支援。
请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_gacha_1_ct.en: Use <@gd.key>headhunting</> to acquire more operators for support. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_gacha_1_mb.cn:
可通过<@gd.key>寻访</>来获得更多的干员支援。
请点击此处进行干员寻访。
guide_text_gacha_1_mb.en: Use <@gd.key>headhunting</> to acquire more operators for support. Tap here to start headhunting.

guide_text_gacha_2.cn:
<@gd.key>启程寻访</>现已开启。
可在此处查看。
guide_text_gacha_2.en: <@gd.key>New Horizons Headhunting</> is now available. View it here.

guide_text_gacha_2_ct.cn:
<@gd.key>启程寻访</>现已开启。
请按下<action=common_confirm>查看。
guide_text_gacha_2_ct.en:
<@gd.key>New Horizons Headhunting</> is now available. 
Press <action=common_confirm> to view it.

guide_text_gacha_3.cn:
推进主线任务即可获得<@gd.key>十连启程寻访凭证</>，可用于启程寻访。
请点击此处，前往领取。
guide_text_gacha_3.en: Progress through the main mission to acquire <@gd.key>New Horizons HH-10×Permit</> that can be used in New Horizons Headhunting. Click here to go and claim it.

guide_text_gacha_3_ct.cn:
推进主线任务即可获得<@gd.key>十连启程寻访凭证</>，可用于启程寻访。
请按下<action=gacha_starter_focus_mission_node>，前往领取。
