guide_text_gacha_3_ct.en: Progress through the main mission to acquire <@gd.key>New Horizons HH-10×Permit</> that can be used in New Horizons Headhunting. Press <action=gacha_starter_focus_mission_node> to go and claim it.

guide_text_gacha_5.cn: 当前已持有<@gd.key>十连启程寻访凭证</>，可在此处进行寻访。
guide_text_gacha_5.en: <@gd.key>New Horizons HH-10×Permit</> acquired. Start headhunting here.

guide_text_gacha_5_ct.cn: 当前已持有<@gd.key>十连启程寻访凭证</>，可在此处进行寻访。
guide_text_gacha_5_ct.en: <@gd.key>New Horizons HH-10×Permit</> acquired. Start headhunting here.

guide_text_gacha_8.cn: 可在此处查看并切换多种寻访，以获得不同的干员支援，可以多多尝试。
guide_text_gacha_8.en: This screen shows various headhunting banners for recruiting various operators. Switch between the banners and try them out.

guide_text_gem_1.cn: 可在此处进行<@gd.key>基质</>的注入。
guide_text_gem_1.en: This screen allows the infusing of <@gd.key>essences</>.

guide_text_gem_2.cn: 点击此处，选择该枚<@gd.key>基质</>。

guide_text_gem_2_ct.cn: 在这里可以查看当前所拥有的<@gd.key>基质</>。
guide_text_gem_2_ct.en: This shows all the <@gd.key>essences</> currently owned.

guide_text_gem_3.cn:
每个<@gd.key>基质</>都有若干种能够对应提升的<@gd.key>武器技能</>。
当武器注入符合的<@gd.key>基质</>后，便能够提升<@gd.key>武器技能等级</>。
guide_text_gem_3.en: Every <@gd.key>essence</> has stats that may offer <@gd.key>weapon skill</> upgrades. Infusing a weapon with the right <@gd.key>essence</> will upgrade the <@gd.key>weapon skill level</>.

guide_text_gem_4.cn: 基质与能够提升的武器技能，有着名称上的对应关系。
guide_text_gem_4.en: Essence names are associated with the weapon skills they enhance.

guide_text_gem_5.cn: 可以在此处预览注入后的武器技能效果。
guide_text_gem_5.en: This is a preview of weapon skill effects after infusing the essence.

guide_text_gem_enhance_1.cn: <@gd.key>基质蚀刻</>功能已解锁，可通过消耗不需要的基质，强化现有的基质。
guide_text_gem_enhance_1.en: <@gd.key>Essence etching</> is now unlocked. It allows an essence to be enhanced by consuming other unwanted essences.

guide_text_gem_enhance_2.cn: 可在此处选择需要蚀刻的<@gd.key>无瑕基质</>，蚀刻成功后，将会强化该基质的附加技能。
guide_text_gem_enhance_2.en: Select a <@gd.key>flawless essence</> to etch from this section. Successful etching strengthens the stats of the essence.

guide_text_gem_enhance_2_ct.cn: 可按下<action=common_confirm>选择需要蚀刻的<@gd.key>无瑕基质</>，蚀刻成功后，将会强化该基质的附加技能。
guide_text_gem_enhance_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select <@gd.key>flawless essence</> to etch from this section. Successful etching strengthens the stats of the essence.

guide_text_gem_enhance_3.cn: 每次可对基质的三个附加技能中，选择一个进行蚀刻。
guide_text_gem_enhance_3.en: Select 1 of the 3 stats of the essence to perform the etching.

guide_text_gem_enhance_4.cn: 请点击此处，开始进行蚀刻。
guide_text_gem_enhance_4.en: Click here to begin the etching.

guide_text_gem_enhance_5.cn: 可在此处预览该基质附加技能升级后的效果。
guide_text_gem_enhance_5.en: This gives a preview of the effects after leveling up the essence stats.

guide_text_gem_enhance_6.cn: 可在此处选择一个<@gd.key>不需要</>的无瑕基质作为蚀刻耗费。
guide_text_gem_enhance_6.en: Select an <@gd.key>unwanted</> flawless essence from this section to consume for the etching process.

guide_text_gem_enhance_7.cn:
可在此处查看当前的蚀刻成功率。
该成功率与当前<@gd.key>蚀刻技能的等级</>有关。
guide_text_gem_enhance_7.en: This shows the current etching success rate. The success rate is based on the <@gd.key>level of the skill to be etched</>.

guide_text_gem_enhance_8.cn: 点击确认蚀刻，就会<@gd.key>消耗蚀刻耗费基质</>，以强化现有的基质。
guide_text_gem_enhance_8.en: Click the Etch button to <@gd.key>consume the unwanted essence</> and enhance the target essence.

guide_text_gem_enhance_8_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_confirm>确认蚀刻，就会<@gd.key>消耗蚀刻耗费基质</>，以强化现有的基质。
guide_text_gem_enhance_8_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to Etch. This <@gd.key>consumes the unwanted essence</> and enhances the target essence.

guide_text_gem_enhance_9.cn:
如果蚀刻成功，则基质的技能等级会获得提升；
如果蚀刻失败，则会产生一定数量的<@gd.key>冷却脂</>。
guide_text_gem_enhance_9.en: Successful etching raises the essence stats level. Failed etching attempts, on the other hand, produce a number of <@gd.key>Coolant Gel</>.

guide_text_gem_enhance_desc_1.cn:
可通过消耗不需要的基质，强化现有的基质。
每次需要消耗一个无瑕基质，对另一个无瑕基质的一个附加技能进行蚀刻。
guide_text_gem_enhance_desc_1.en: Essences can be enhanced by consuming other unwanted essences. Etching 1 stat of a flawless essence costs 1 flawless essence.

guide_text_gem_enhance_desc_2.cn:
如果蚀刻成功，则基质的附加技能等级会获得提升；
如果蚀刻失败，则会产生一定数量的<@gd.key>冷却脂</>。
guide_text_gem_enhance_desc_2.en: Successful etching levels up the essence stats. Failed etching attempts produce a number of <@gd.key>Coolant Gel</>.

guide_text_gem_enhance_desc_3.cn: 可使用一定数量的<@gd.key>冷却脂</>，进行<@gd.key>必定成功</>的基质蚀刻。
guide_text_gem_enhance_desc_3.en: Use enough <@gd.key>Coolant Gel</> to <@gd.key>guarantee the success</> of essence etching.

guide_text_gem_enhance_desc_4.cn: 可在<@gd.key>重度能量淤积点</>中，通过<@gd.key>消耗理智</>的方式，获取金色基质。
guide_text_gem_enhance_desc_4.en: Challenge <@gd.key>Severe Energy Alluvium</> and <@gd.key>spend Sanity</> to acquire gold quality essences.

guide_text_gem_enhance_hint_1.cn: <@gd.key>基质蚀刻</>功能已解锁，可在此处进入。
guide_text_gem_enhance_hint_1.en: <@gd.key>Essence etching</> is now unlocked. Access this feature here.

guide_text_gem_enhance_hint_2.cn: <@gd.key>基质蚀刻</>功能已解锁，可向下滑动列表，并从该入口进入。
guide_text_gem_enhance_hint_2.en: <@gd.key>Essence etching</> is now unlocked. Scroll down this list and access it via this portal.

guide_text_general_bomb_1.cn: 可<@gd.key>长按</><action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>后<@gd.key>长按</>此处切换便捷工具。
guide_text_general_bomb_1.en: <@gd.key>Long-press</> <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and <@gd.key>long-press</> here to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_text_general_bomb_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=general_ability_press> to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_text_general_bomb_1_ct_1.en: <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=general_ability_press_alter> to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_text_general_bomb_1_mb.cn: 可<@gd.key>长按</>此处切换便捷工具。
guide_text_general_bomb_1_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap and hold</> this to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_text_general_bomb_2.cn: 请点击此处，切换至<@gd.key>爆炸物</>便捷工具。
guide_text_general_bomb_2.en: Click here to switch to the Easy Tools action of <@gd.key>Bomb</>.

guide_text_general_bomb_2_1.cn: 已切换至<@gd.key>爆炸物</>便捷工具。
guide_text_general_bomb_2_1.en: Easy Tools action is now switched to <@gd.key>Bomb</>.

guide_text_general_bomb_2_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆，切换至<@gd.key>爆炸物</>便捷工具。
guide_text_general_bomb_2_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to switch to the Easy Tools action of <@gd.key>Bomb</>.

guide_text_general_bomb_2_mb.cn: 请拖动轮盘至此处，切换至<@gd.key>爆炸物</>便捷工具。
guide_text_general_bomb_2_mb.en: Drag the wheel here to switch to the <@gd.key>Bomb</> action of Easy Tools.

guide_text_general_bomb_3.cn: 按下<action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，即可快捷使用<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>。
guide_text_general_bomb_3.en: Press <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to quickly use <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</>.

guide_text_general_bomb_3_ct.cn: 按下<action=general_ability_press>即可快捷使用<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>。

guide_text_general_bomb_3_mb.cn: 点击此处，即可快捷使用<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>。
guide_text_general_bomb_3_mb.en: Tap here to quickly use <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</>.

guide_text_general_bomb_desc_1.cn:
获得工业爆炸物后，可以将便捷工具键切换为<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>选项。
切换后，按下便捷工具键即可快捷使用。
guide_text_general_bomb_desc_1.en: After getting Industrial Explosives, the Easy Tools button can be switched to the <@gd.key>Bomb</> action. Switching to this action allows quick and easy use of Industrial Explosives by simply pressing the Easy Tools button.

guide_text_general_bomb_title_1.cn: 便捷工具 - 使用工业爆炸物

guide_text_grinder_hint1.cn: 粉碎机已存放于背包中，请按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开背包仓库。
guide_text_grinder_hint1.en: The Shredding Unit has been placed in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack and Depot.

guide_text_grinder_hint1_ct.cn: 粉碎机已存放于背包中，可通过按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>，打开背包仓库。
guide_text_grinder_hint1_ct.en: The Shredding Unit has been placed in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</> and open the Backpack and Depot.

guide_text_grinder_hint1_mb.cn: 粉碎机已存放于背包中，请点击此处打开背包仓库。
guide_text_grinder_hint1_mb.en: The Shredding Unit has been placed in the Backpack. Tap here to open the Backpack and Depot panels.

guide_text_grinder_hint2.cn: 可以将粉碎机拖入下方快捷栏进行放置，也可以从背包中直接放置。
guide_text_grinder_hint2.en: Drag the Shredding Unit to the hotbar below to place the facility with hotkeys, or pick it up from the Backpack and place it directly.

guide_text_grinder_hint2_ct.cn: 可以将粉碎机登录到快捷栏进行放置，也可以从背包中直接放置。
guide_text_grinder_hint2_ct.en: The Shredding Unit can be added to the hotbar for facility placement, or placed directly from the Backpack.

guide_text_grinder_hint_1.cn: 将源矿拖入粉碎机进行加工，可产出源石粉末。
guide_text_grinder_hint_1.en: Drag Originium Ore to the Shredding Unit and process it into Originium Powder.

guide_text_grinder_hint_1_ct.cn: 将源矿移动到粉碎机进行加工，可产出源石粉末。
guide_text_grinder_hint_1_ct.en: Move Originium Ore to the Shredding Unit and process it into Originium Powder.

guide_text_grinder_moss_des_1.cn:
以粉碎机为代表的工业设备，可有多种生产配方。
可在粉碎机的<@gd.key>配方一览</>中查看。
guide_text_grinder_moss_des_1.en: AIC facilities like the Shredding Unit can have multiple production formulas. Use the <@gd.key>Formulas</> button of the Shredding Unit to view them.

guide_text_grinder_moss_des_2.cn: 将荞花放入粉碎机，即可快速、大批量生产荞花粉末。
guide_text_grinder_moss_des_2.en: Place Buckflower into the Shredding Unit to mass produce Buckflower Powder quickly.

guide_text_grinder_moss_des_3.cn:
可以在干员详情-装备页面中，为干员装备<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>充当战术物品。
装备后，干员会在战斗中自动使用<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>。
guide_text_grinder_moss_des_3.en: Go to Operator Overview, then open the Gear screen to equip operators with <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> as their tacticals. Once equipped, they will automatically use <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> during combat.

guide_text_grinder_moss_title_2.cn: 粉碎机 - 荞花粉末生产

guide_text_hdowork_book_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>简制手册</>会记录您在塔卫二中采集过的各种资源的数量。
guide_text_hdowork_book_desc_1.en: When gathering an item, the <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</> will make an entry of it and keep track of the total amount gathered from Talos-II so far.

guide_text_hdowork_book_desc_2.cn: 根据不同资源的<@gd.key>累计采集数量</>进度，可以在简制手册中领取不同的奖励，包括新的<@gd.key>简制配方</>和<@gd.key>产物升级</>。
guide_text_hdowork_book_desc_2.en: <@gd.key>Collect enough resources</> to claim various Crafting Manual rewards that include new <@gd.key>crafting formulas</> and <@gd.key>product upgrades</>.

guide_text_hdwork_book_1.cn: 您已获得<@gd.key>简制手册</>，可按下快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_hdwork_book_1.en: <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</> acquired. Press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_hdwork_book_1_ct.cn: 您已获得<@gd.key>简制手册</>，可按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>，并打开<@gd.key>背包</>。
guide_text_hdwork_book_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</> acquired. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</> and open the <@gd.key>Backpack</>.

guide_text_hdwork_book_1_mb.cn: 您已获得<@gd.key>简制手册</>，请点击此处打开背包。
guide_text_hdwork_book_1_mb.en: <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</> acquired. Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_hdwork_book_2.cn: 可点击此处，进入简易制作系统并查看<@gd.key>简制手册</>。
guide_text_hdwork_book_2.en: Click here to open the Crafting screen and view the <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</>.

guide_text_hdwork_book_2_ct.cn: 可按下<action=inv_enter_craft>，进入简易制作系统并查看<@gd.key>简制手册</>。
guide_text_hdwork_book_2_ct.en: Press <action=inv_enter_craft> to open the Crafting screen and view the <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</>.

guide_text_hdwork_book_3.cn: 请点击此处，进入<@gd.key>简制手册</>。
guide_text_hdwork_book_3.en: Click here to open the <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</>.

guide_text_hdwork_book_3_ct.en: Press <action=open_production_manual> to open the Crafting Manual.

guide_text_hdwork_book_4.cn:
<@gd.key>简制手册</>会记录您采集过的各种物品的数量。
点击此处，查看<@gd.key>荞花</>的累计采集数量进度。
guide_text_hdwork_book_4.en: When gathering an item, the <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</> will make an entry of it and keep track of the total amount gathered so far. Click here to view the total amount of <@gd.key>Buckflowers</> gathered.

guide_text_hdwork_book_4_ct.cn:
<@gd.key>简制手册</>会记录您采集过的各种物品的数量。
请按下<action=navigation_target_click>，查看<@gd.key>荞花</>的累计采集数量进度。
guide_text_hdwork_book_4_ct.en: When gathering an item, the <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</> will make an entry of it and keep track of the total amount gathered so far. Press <action=navigation_target_click> to view the total amount of <@gd.key>Buckflowers</> gathered.

guide_text_hdwork_book_5.cn: 根据该植物的<@gd.key>累计采集数量</>进度，可在简制手册中获得<@gd.key>简制配方</>等奖励。
guide_text_hdwork_book_5.en: Reach milestones for <@gd.key>total amount of this plant gathered</> to earn rewards such as <@gd.key>crafting formulas</> from the Crafting Manual.

guide_text_hdwork_book_6.cn: 比如累计采集一定数量的<@gd.key>荞花</>后，可在此领取<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊配方</>。
guide_text_hdwork_book_6.en: After gathering enough <@gd.key>Buckflowers</>, the <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C] formula</> can be claimed here.

guide_text_hdwork_book_hint_1.cn: 按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开背包，可以查看简制手册里<@gd.key>映火荞花</>的累计收集数量进度
guide_text_hdwork_book_hint_1.en: Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack. Then open the Crafting Manual to view the total amount of <@gd.key>Firebuckle</> gathered.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_0.cn: <@gd.key>简易制作系统</>已解锁，请按下快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_0.en: <@gd.key>Crafting</> system unlocked. Press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or long-press <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_0_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，进入<@gd.key>背包</>界面。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_0_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to select this option and open the <@gd.key>Backpack</>.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_0_ct.cn: <@gd.key>简易制作系统</>已解锁，请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_0_ct.en: <@gd.key>Crafting</> system unlocked. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_0_mb.cn: <@gd.key>简易制作系统</>已解锁，请点击此处打开背包。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_0_mb.en: <@gd.key>Crafting</> system unlocked. Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_1.cn: 在塔卫二中采集到的物品会放置在背包中。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_1.en: Items gathered during exploration of Talos-II will be placed in the Backpack.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_2.cn: 点击此处，可从背包界面中进入<@gd.key>简易制作系统</>。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_2.en: Click here to access the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen from the Backpack panel.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_2_ct.cn: 按下<action=inv_enter_craft>，可从背包界面中进入<@gd.key>简易制作系统</>。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_2_ct.en: Press <action=inv_enter_craft> to access the <@gd.key>Crafting</> system from the Backpack panel.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_3.cn:
点击此处，选择<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>。
<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>可通过<@gd.key>荞花</>简易制作获得。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_3.en:
Click here to select <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>. 
<@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> can be crafted from <@gd.key>Buckflower</>.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_3_ct.cn: <@gd.key>荞花粉末</>可通过<@gd.key>荞花</>简易制作获得。

guide_text_hdwork_medic_4.cn: 点击<@gd.key>制作</>按钮，开始制作<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_4.en: Click the <@gd.key>Craft</> button to start crafting <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_4_1.cn: 请在背包未满时，通过该<@gd.key>制作</>按钮进行制作<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_4_1.en: Make sure there is space in the Backpack, then use the <@gd.key>Craft</> button to start crafting <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_5.en: Crafting complete. Click here to confirm.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_5_1.cn: 点击此处或按下<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse1" scale=1.3>，关闭<@gd.key>简易制作系统</>。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_5_1.en: Click here or <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse1" scale=1.3> to close the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_5_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_back> to close the <@gd.key>Crafting</> system screen.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_5_1_mb.cn: 点击此处，关闭<@gd.key>简易制作系统</>。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_5_1_mb.en: Tap here to close the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_5_ct.en: Crafting complete. Press <action=common_confirm> or <action=common_cancel> to confirm.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_6.cn: 点击此处，选择<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>。

guide_text_hdwork_medic_6_ct.cn: 请按下<action=show_item_tips>，查看<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>的物品详情。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_6_ct.en: Press <action=show_item_tips> to view the item details of <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_7.cn:
这里是<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>的物品详情页，
可在此查看该物品的使用效果等信息。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_7.en: This is the item details panel for <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>. It displays the usage effects and other info of this item.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_8.cn: 点击此处，进入<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>使用界面。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_8.en: Click here to open the <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> usage screen.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_8_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，进入<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>使用界面。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_8_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to enter the <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> usage screen.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_9.cn: 请点击选择需要恢复生命值的干员，并使用<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>进行恢复。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_9.en: Click to select the injured operators and restore their HP with <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_9_ct.cn: 请选择需要恢复生命值的干员，并使用<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>进行恢复。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_9_ct.en: Select the operator who needs HP restoration, then use <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> to restore their HP.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_1.cn: 靠近植物后，按下<action=common_interact>即可进行采集。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_1.en: Approach the plant then press <action=common_interact> to gather it.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_1_mb.cn: 靠近荞花后，可点击交互键进行采集。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_1_mb.en: Approach the Buckflower then tap the interact button to gather it.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_2.cn:
记得在战斗前进行<@gd.key>简易制作</>，并且<@gd.key>使用物品恢复生命值</>。
可以按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开背包。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_2.en: Perform some <@gd.key>Crafting</> before battle and <@gd.key>use the items to restore HP</>. Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_2_ct.cn:
记得在战斗前进行<@gd.key>简易制作</>，并且<@gd.key>使用物品恢复生命值</>。
可以按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>，打开背包。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_2_ct.en: Perform some <@gd.key>Crafting</> before battle and <@gd.key>use the items to restore HP</>. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>, then open the Backpack.

guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_2_mb.cn:
记得在战斗前进行<@gd.key>简易制作</>，并且<@gd.key>使用物品恢复生命值</>。
可以点击此处打开背包。
guide_text_hdwork_medic_hint_2_mb.en: Perform some <@gd.key>Crafting</> before battle and <@gd.key>use the items to restore HP</>. Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_high_difficulty.cn:
在完成<@gd.key>影拓丰碑</>的挑战后，可解锁新挑战与已完成挑战的<@gd.key>苦难模式</>。
可在此处，切换至<@gd.key>苦难模式</>。
guide_text_high_difficulty.en:
Completing <@gd.key>Umbral Monument</> challenges unlocks its <@gd.key>Agony Mode</> as well as new challenges. 
Use this to switch to <@gd.key>Agony Mode</>.

guide_text_hint_camp_teleport.cn: 可按下<action=common_open_map>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开地图，<@gd.key>快速传送</>至目标地点。
guide_text_hint_camp_teleport.en: Press <action=common_open_map> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the map and <@gd.key>quickly teleport</> to the target location.

guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_2.cn: 点击此处，选择<@gd.key>协议传送点</>。

guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_2_1_ct.cn: 已为您选中<@gd.key>协议传送点</>的地图标记。
guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_2_1_ct.en: The <@gd.key>TP Point</> map marker is already selected.

guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_2_ct.cn: 可推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6>操作杆选择<@gd.key>协议传送点</>，按下<action=common_confirm>查看详情，通过<@gd.key>传送</>快速前往。
guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_2_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6> stick to select the <@gd.key>TP Point</>, press <action=common_confirm> to view its details, and use <@gd.key>teleport</> to go there quickly.

guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_ct.cn: 可按下<action=common_open_map>打开地图，<@gd.key>快速传送</>至目标地点。
guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_map> to open the map and <@gd.key>quickly teleport</> to the target location.

guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_mb.cn: 可点击此处打开地图，并找到协议传送点，<@gd.key>快速传送</>至目标地点。
guide_text_hint_camp_teleport_mb.en: Tap here to open the map, find the TP Point, then <@gd.key>quickly teleport</> to the target location.

guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport.cn: 可按下<action=common_open_map>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开地图，<@gd.key>快速传送</>至集成核心区域。
guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport.en: Press <action=common_open_map> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Map screen, then <@gd.key>quickly teleport</> to the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport_2.cn: 可点击<@gd.key>协议核心</>，快速前往。
guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport_2.en: Click on the <@gd.key>PAC</> to teleport there at once.

guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport_2_ct.cn: 可推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6>操作杆选择<@gd.key>协议核心</>，按下<action=common_confirm>查看详情，通过<@gd.key>传送</>快速前往。
guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport_2_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6> stick to select the <@gd.key>Protocol Automation-Core (PAC)</>, press <action=common_confirm> to view its details, and use <@gd.key>teleport</> to go there quickly.

guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport_ct.cn: 可按下<action=common_open_map>打开地图，<@gd.key>快速传送</>至集成核心区域。
guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_map> to open the map, then <@gd.key>quickly teleport</> to the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport_mb.cn: 可点击此处打开地图，并找到协议核心，<@gd.key>快速传送</>至集成核心区域。
guide_text_hint_facarea_teleport_mb.en: Tap here to open the map, find the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC), then <@gd.key>quickly teleport</> to the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_hint_mail_lost_item.cn:
注意，您的背包已经没有多余储存格了，有物品无法获取。
请在主界面点击<@gd.key>邮箱</>按钮，在邮箱中查看刚刚遗失的物品。
guide_text_hint_mail_lost_item.en: Alert! The Backpack is out of empty storage slots and some items have been left behind. Go to the main screen and click the <@gd.key>Mail</> button (upper left row) to recover the missed items.

guide_text_hint_opminer.cn: 靠近<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>并按下<action=common_interact>，可以打开其操作面板。
guide_text_hint_opminer.en: Get close to the <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</> and press <action=common_interact> to open its control panel.

guide_text_hint_opminer_mb.cn: 请靠近<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>并打开其操作面板。
guide_text_hint_opminer_mb.en: Get close to the <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</> and open its control panel.

guide_text_hint_power_line.cn:
当电力运输距离<@gd.key>超过80m</>时，将无法完成电力运输。
可以通过<@gd.key>放置更多的中继器</>来完成电力运输。
guide_text_hint_power_line.en: Power transmission cables have a <@gd.key>max length of 80 meters</> and cannot form a connection if this distance is exceeded. Try <@gd.key>placing more Relay Towers</> to complete long-range power transmissions.

guide_text_hit_iron_desc_1.cn:
通过击打装置，可以让其转动起来。
需要持续击打此类装置，并将转速维持在一定区间内。转速过快或过慢都会损失进度。
guide_text_hit_iron_desc_1.en: Hit a Percussive Device to make it rotate. Continue hitting it to keep its rotation rate within a certain range. Operational progress will be lost if the rotation rate gets too high or low.

guide_text_hongs_depot_hint_1.cn: 武陵地区属于和四号谷地不同的全新地区，这里拥有独立的武陵仓库，只能对本地仓库中的物品进行管理。
guide_text_hongs_depot_hint_1.en: Wuling is a region (like Valley IV) and has its own Wuling Depot. When exploring a region, you can only manage its local depot.

guide_text_hub_des_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议核心</>是集成工业系统的中枢设备，承担了诸多功能，是进行工业建设的核心。
guide_text_hub_des_1.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Automation-Core</> (PAC) is the heart of the Automated Industry Complex (AIC) and provides all sorts of functions. The AIC factory is built around it.

guide_text_hub_des_2.cn:
在集成核心区域内，可打开背包与仓库，进行仓储管理。
按下<@gd.key>一键存放</>按钮，可以将背包中的物品一键存入仓库。
guide_text_hub_des_2.en: While in the Core AIC Area, open the Backpack and Depot for storage management. Press the <@gd.key>Quick Stash</> button to move every Backpack item into the Depot with a single button.

guide_text_hub_des_3.cn: <@gd.key>协议核心</>是集成工业系统唯一的电力来源，请通过协议核心构建当前地区的电力网络。
guide_text_hub_des_3.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Automation-Core (PAC)</> is the ultimate source of power of the Core AIC Area. It is the origin of power transmission in the regional power grid.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_1.cn: 武陵地区的协议核心已建立，可以进行<@gd.key>跨地区传输物品</>，请点击此处。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_1.en: The Wuling Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) has been built. <@gd.key>Regional transfer</> can now be used to move goods from one region to another. Start by clicking here.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_1_ct.cn: 武陵地区的协议核心已建立，可以进行<@gd.key>跨地区传输物品</>，请按下<action=fac_hub_open_transfer>查看。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_1_ct.en: The Wuling Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) has been built. <@gd.key>Regional transfer</> can now be used to move goods from one region to another. Start by pressing <action=fac_hub_open_transfer>.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2.cn: 这里可以看到不同地区之间正在进行的跨地区传输。当前我们还没有指定过跨地区传输路线。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2.en: This shows item transfer statuses between different regions. No regional transfer routes have been set up so far.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2_1.cn: 四号谷地的<@gd.key>地区建设等级</>足够时，可以进行跨地区传输。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2_1.en: Regional transfer becomes available once the <@gd.key>Regional Development Level</> of Valley IV is high enough.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2_2.cn: 跨地区传输有两种模式：<@gd.key>库存传输</>和<@gd.key>超库存传输</>，分别在传输起点地区<@gd.key>对应建设等级</>时解锁。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2_2.en: There are 2 modes of Regional Transfer: <@gd.key>Stockpile Transfer</> and <@gd.key>Metastorage Transfer</>, respectively unlocked by reaching <@gd.key>specific Regional Development Levels</> in the source region.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2_3.cn: <@gd.key>库存传输</>指在传输起点地区的仓库中<@gd.key>扣除物品</>，<@gd.key>等量传输</>到终点地区。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2_3.en: <@gd.key>Stockpile Transfer</> <@gd.key>deducts goods</> from the source depot and transfers the <@gd.key>same amount of goods</> to the depot of the destination region.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2_4.cn: <@gd.key>超库存传输</>指<@gd.key>不扣除起点地区的仓储物品</>，终点地区可以<@gd.key>直接获得</>对应物品的传输方式，会在传输起点地区升到较高建设等级时解锁。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2_4.en: <@gd.key>Metastorage Transfer</> is the <@gd.key>direct transfer</> of goods to the destination region <@gd.key>without deducting any goods from the source region storage</>. This mode of transfer is unlocked when the source region reaches a higher Regional Development Level.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2d5.cn: 请点击此处的编辑按钮，尝试从<@gd.key>四号谷地</>向外传输。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2d5.en: Click the Edit button here to set up a regional transfer route to move items from <@gd.key>Valley IV</>.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2d5_ct.cn: 请按下<action=domain_trans_main_cell_edit>，尝试从<@gd.key>四号谷地</>向外传输。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_2d5_ct.en: Press <action=domain_trans_main_cell_edit> to set up a regional transfer route to export goods from <@gd.key>Valley IV</>.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_3.cn: 以库存传输为例，点击该地区作为传输终点。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_3.en: Refer to the Stockpile Transfer as an example and select this region as the destination region.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_3_ct.cn: 以库存传输为例，请按下<action=domain_trans_select_confirm_target>选择该地区作为传输终点。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_3_ct.en: Refer to the Stockpile Transfer as an example and press <action=domain_trans_select_confirm_target> to select this region as the destination region.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_4.cn: 这里可选择希望从四号谷地仓库送往武陵仓库的物品，我们先选择一个物品。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_4.en: Here, we can select the item to be moved from the Valley IV Depot to the Wuling Depot. Let's choose something first.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_4_1.cn: 这里标出了该物品的<@gd.key>物品价值</>。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_4_1.en: This marks the <@gd.key>unit value</> of this item.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_4_2.cn: 这里是每批传输的<@gd.key>传输总值</>，传输的物品数量乘单位物品价值无法超过当前的传输总值。传输总值取决于传输起点地区的<@gd.key>建设等级</>。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_4_2.en: This shows the <@gd.key>Total Transfer Value</> (TTV) allowed for each batch of regional transfer. The number of items to be moved multiplied by the unit value of the item cannot exceed the TTV. Regional transfer TTV also increases with the <@gd.key>regional development level</> of the source region.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_4_ct.cn: 这里可选择希望从四号谷地仓库送往武陵仓库的物品，我们先按下<action=common_confirm>选择一个物品。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_4_ct.en: Here, we can select the item to be moved from the Valley IV Depot to the Wuling Depot. Let's press <action=common_confirm> to choose an item.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_5.cn: 这里设定传输的数量，请注意，跨地区传输开启后会持续不断从出发地取货送往目的地，这里选择的是<@gd.key>单批数量</>。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_5.en: This sets the <@gd.key>amount to be moved in each transfer</>. Once the regional transfer route is activated, it will continuously transfer items to the destination.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_5d5.cn: 库存传输模式下，设定传输数量<@gd.key>可以大于</>当前仓库中储存的数量，每次传输都会<@gd.key>尽可能取走</>设定数量的物品，物品会从出发地仓库扣除，直至扣除所有仓储。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_5d5.en: In Stockpile Transfer, the amount set per transfer <@gd.key>can exceed</> the current size of the Depot stockpile. The transfer will <@gd.key>attempt to reach the set amount</> and deduct the items (or deplete the entire stockpile) in the source depot.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_5d6.cn: 如果在<@gd.key>超库存传输</>模式下，物品不会从任何仓库中被扣除，只有<@gd.key>传输总值</>会限制每批传输数量。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_5d6.en: In <@gd.key>Metastorage Transfer</>, no items will be deducted from any Depot. The amount of transfer is only limited by the <@gd.key>Total Transfer Value</> (TTV).

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_6.cn: 这里是每批传输<@gd.key>所需时间</>，每隔这么久，这批物品就会到达目的地仓库，同时会从出发地仓库<@gd.key>再进行一次取货</>。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_6.en: This shows the <@gd.key>time needed</> for the items to be transferred to the destination depot. Upon arrival, another batch of <@gd.key>items will be taken out</> from the source depot to start the next regional transfer.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_6_1.cn: 若条件满足，可在此处开始传输。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_6_1.en: Once the criteria are met, use this to start the transfer.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_7.cn: 请在此处自由选择希望传输的物品。传输开启后，也可以再次进入编辑<@gd.key>手动修改或中止传输</>。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_7.en: At this section, select the items to transfer. After the transfer begins, the edit function can be used to <@gd.key>manually edit or cancel the transfer</>.

guide_text_hub_domain_transport_hint.cn: 已可以进行<@gd.key>跨地区传输物品</>，请前往协议核心，使用<@gd.key>协议管理</>进行操作。
guide_text_hub_domain_transport_hint.en: <@gd.key>Regional transfer</> is now available. Go to the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) and use <@gd.key>Protocol Management</> to use the new feature.

guide_text_hub_equip_1_1.cn: 请点击此处，切换至<@gd.key>独立装备制造</>。
guide_text_hub_equip_1_1.en: Click here to switch to <@gd.key>non-set gear assembly</>.

guide_text_hub_equip_1_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=equip_tech_tab_next>，切换至<@gd.key>独立装备制造</>。
guide_text_hub_equip_1_1_ct.en: Press <action=equip_tech_tab_next> to switch to <@gd.key>non-set gear assembly</>.

guide_text_hub_equip_2.cn: 制作当前装备需要两种材料——<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>和<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>。
guide_text_hub_equip_2.en: Assembling this piece of gear requires 2 materials: <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Components</>.

guide_text_hub_equip_2_0_ct.cn: 请按下<action=equip_tech_produce_focus_item>，查看制作当前装备需要消耗的材料。
guide_text_hub_equip_2_0_ct.en: Press <action=equip_tech_produce_focus_item> to view the materials required to assemble this piece of gear.

guide_text_hub_equip_3.cn: <@gd.key>谷地调度券</>可通过击败敌人、完成<@gd.key>据点</>等玩法获取。
guide_text_hub_equip_3.en: Earn <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> by defeating enemies or performing various <@gd.key>Regional Development and Outpost</> activities.

guide_text_hub_equip_4.cn: 点击查看<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>。

guide_text_hub_equip_5.cn: <@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>可在<@gd.key>装备原件机</>中制造。
guide_text_hub_equip_5.en: <@gd.key>Amethyst Components</> are produced by the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

guide_text_hub_equip_6.cn: 装备原件机需在工业发展规划中完成对应工业技术研究，并在集成核心区域内完成建造。
guide_text_hub_equip_6.en: Specific AIC technologies of the AIC Factory Plan must be researched to construct and place the Gearing Unit in the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_hub_equip_desc_1.cn:
获取<@gd.key>装备制造模板</>后，即可制造对应的装备。
装备制造模板可通过提升<@gd.key>权限等阶</>获取，部分需要通过世界探索发现。
guide_text_hub_equip_desc_1.en: Acquire <@gd.key>gear template</> to assemble the specified gear. Some gear templates can be acquired by gaining <@gd.key>Authority Levels</>. Others can be found by exploring the world.

guide_text_hub_equip_desc_2.cn:
制造装备需要调度券与装备原件。
<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>可通过击败敌人、完成据点等玩法获取。
<@gd.key>装备原件</>可以通过<@gd.key>装备原件机</>制造。
装备原件机需在工业发展规划中完成对应工业技术的研究，并在集成核心区域内完成建造。
guide_text_hub_equip_desc_2.en: Gear assembly requires stock bills and gear components. <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> can be earned by defeating enemies or performing Regional Development and Outpost activities. <@gd.key>Gear components</> can be produced using the AIC Factory facility: <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>. Unlock this facility by researching specific AIC technologies in the AIC Factory Plan. The Gearing Unit must then be constructed and placed in the Core AIC Area.

guide_text_hub_equip_hint_2.cn: 按下快捷键<action=fac_open_equip_producer>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入<@gd.key>装备制造</>界面。
guide_text_hub_equip_hint_2.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_open_equip_producer> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>Gear Assembly</> screen.

guide_text_hub_equip_hint_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=fac_main_right_active>并选中此项，进入<@gd.key>装备制造</>界面。
guide_text_hub_equip_hint_2_ct.en: Press <action=fac_main_right_active> and select this to open the <@gd.key>gear assembly</> screen.

guide_text_hub_equip_hint_2_mb.cn: 点击此处进入<@gd.key>装备制造</>界面。
guide_text_hub_equip_hint_2_mb.en: Tap here to open the <@gd.key>Gear Assembly</> screen.

guide_text_hub_equip_hint_3.cn: 可选择此项，制造<@gd.key>矿场防护服</>。
guide_text_hub_equip_hint_3.en: Choose this option to assemble the gear <@gd.key>Miner Overalls</>.

guide_text_hub_link_hint_1.cn: 请从协议核心，将电力运输至<@gd.key>高光的中继器</>。
guide_text_hub_link_hint_1.en: Transmit power from the PAC to the <@gd.key>highlighted Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_hub_link_hint_2.cn: 请从<@gd.key>协议核心</>处，<@gd.key>重新开始电力运输</>，并连接至中继器。
guide_text_hub_link_hint_2.en: Go to the <@gd.key>PAC</>, <@gd.key>restart power transmission</> again, and plug in the transmission cable to the Relay Tower.

guide_text_hub_link_hint_3.cn: 请从<@gd.key>已通电的中继器</>开始电力运输，并前往目标处放置下一个中继器。
guide_text_hub_link_hint_3.en: Start power transmission from the <@gd.key>powered Relay Tower</>, then place the next Relay Tower at the target location.

guide_text_hub_link_hint_4.cn: 请在<@gd.key>虚影位置</>附近，放置中继器，并完成电力运输。
guide_text_hub_link_hint_4.en: Go close to the <@gd.key>hologram</> to place the Relay Tower, then complete power transmission.

guide_text_hub_move_hint_1.cn: 和其他设备相同，协议核心和次级核心在有需要时可以进行<@gd.key>移动</>，方便规划集成工业系统的生产。
guide_text_hub_move_hint_1.en: Just like other AIC facilities, both the PAC and Sub-PAC can be <@gd.key>moved</> to help with placing AIC production lines.

guide_text_hub_move_hint_1_ct.cn:
和其他设备相同，协议核心和次级核心在有需要时可以进行<@gd.key>移动</>，方便规划集成工业系统的生产。
可按下<action=common_controller_side_menu>打开快捷功能，选择<@gd.key>移动</>。
guide_text_hub_move_hint_1_ct.en: Just like other AIC facilities, both the PAC and Sub-PAC can be <@gd.key>moved</> to help with placing AIC production lines. Press <action=common_controller_side_menu> to open Quick Action and select <@gd.key>Move</>.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_1.cn: 请按下快捷键<action=common_interact>，或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处开始进行电力运输。
guide_text_hub_power_hint_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_interact> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to start power transmission.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_interact>，开始进行电力运输。

guide_text_hub_power_hint_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处开始进行电力运输。
guide_text_hub_power_hint_1_mb.en: Tap here to start power transmission.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_2.cn: 按下快捷键<action=common_interact>即可完成电力运输。
guide_text_hub_power_hint_2.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_interact> to complete power transmission.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_interact> to complete the power transmission.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_2_mb.cn: 点击此处即可完成电力运输。
guide_text_hub_power_hint_2_mb.en: Tap here to complete the power transmission.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_3.cn: 放置中继器需要在工业模式下进行，请按下<action=common_switch_mode>切换为工业模式。
guide_text_hub_power_hint_3.en: Enter AIC Mode to place Relay Towers. Press <action=common_switch_mode> to switch to AIC Mode.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_3_mb.cn: 放置中继器需要在工业模式下进行，请点击此处切换为工业模式。
guide_text_hub_power_hint_3_mb.en: Enter the AIC Mode to place Relay Towers. Tap here to switch to AIC Mode.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_4.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_use_quick_item_1> to place the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_4_ct.cn: 请按住<action=fac_activate_quick_bar>展开快捷栏，选择<@gd.key>中继器</>，并按下<action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build>开始放置。
guide_text_hub_power_hint_4_ct.en: Press and hold <action=fac_activate_quick_bar> to expand the hotbar, select <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>, then press <action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build> to start placing the facility.

guide_text_hub_power_hint_4_mb.en: Tap here to place the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_hydrant_desc_1.cn: 连接<@gd.key>控流节点</>后，在控流节点的范围内，可使用其中的清水为<@gd.key>射流无人机</>提供液体。
guide_text_hydrant_desc_1.en: After connecting to a <@gd.key>flow control node</>, a <@gd.key>jet drone</> within range of the flow control node can be refilled with Clean Water from it.

guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 弧光的战技会造成物理伤害。
guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_02_1.en: Arclight's battle skill deals Physical DMG.

guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_02_2.cn: 目标处于<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态时，弧光的战技获得强化，会消耗<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态并进行追加攻击，同时恢复一定技力。
guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_02_2.en: Arclight's battle skill is enhanced against targets with <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>. It consumes the <#ba.conduct>Electrification</> to perform an additional attack and recovers some SP.

guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 当有敌人进入<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态或<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态被消耗时可以发动弧光的连携技。
guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_03_1.en: Arclight's combo skill can be cast when an enemy suffers <#ba.conduct>Electrification</> or when an enemy's <#ba.conduct>Electrification</> is consumed.

guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 弧光的连携技能造成多次伤害，并恢复一定技力。
guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_03_2.en: Arclight's combo skill deals multiple hits of DMG and recovers some SP.

guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 弧光的终结技会对敌人施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>，一段时间后再次引爆。如果引爆命中处于<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>状态的敌人，会消耗其<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>并施加<#ba.conduct>导电</>。
guide_text_ikut_chartrain01_04_1.en: Arclight's ultimate applies <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> on the enemy and detonates them after a short delay. If the explosion hits an enemy with <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</>, it consumes the said <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> and applies <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>.

guide_text_interlevel_power.cn: 如果需要开采此处的<@gd.key>矿点</>，可以从枢纽区的<@gd.key>协议核心</>，使用<@gd.key>中继器</>运输电力至此处，并使用矿机。
guide_text_interlevel_power.en: To mine this <@gd.key>mining spot</>, go to the <@gd.key>Protocol Automation-Core (PAC)</> at The Hub area, then transmit power to this place via <@gd.key>Relay Towers</> and Electric Pylons, and place an Electric Mining Rig on the mining spot.

guide_text_jump_machine_desc_1.cn:
可使用<@gd.key>弹射装置</>进行一次长距离的跳跃，抵达普通跳跃无法到达的高处。
弹射装置处于激活状态时，站立在其上并按下<@gd.key>跳跃键</>即可使用。
guide_text_jump_machine_desc_1.en: Use <@gd.key>Bounce Devices</> to make a long-distance jump or reach high places unreachable with normal jumping. Simply stand on a functioning Bounce Device and press the <@gd.key>jump button</> to use it.

guide_text_jump_machine_desc_2.cn:
某些弹射装置，需要激活对应的<#adv.eswitch>受击装置</>后能够使用；
还有一些弹射装置，需要传输电力至对应的<#adv.powerTerminal>供电终端</>后，才能够使用。
guide_text_jump_machine_desc_2.en: Some Bounce Devices must be first activated by striking the linked <#adv.eswitch>Reactive Device</> to become usable. Some Bounce Devices can only be activated after powering the <#adv.powerTerminal>Electric Nexus</> linked to it.

guide_text_jumpmachine_vertical_desc_1.cn: 站上去会自动触发喷气，可以抵达普通跳跃无法到达的高处。
guide_text_jumpmachine_vertical_desc_1.en: Stand on this device to automatically unleash a powerful jet that propels one to high places unreachable with normal jumping.

guide_text_kite_station_1.cn: 在环境监测终端中，可以通过接取并完成<@gd.key>监测委托</>，获得调度券等报酬。
guide_text_kite_station_1.en: Use the Environment Monitoring Terminal to accept and complete <@gd.key>monitoring jobs</> to earn stock bills and other rewards.

guide_text_kite_station_2.cn: 每一个<@gd.key>监测委托</>，都需要拍摄特定的图像进行记录。
guide_text_kite_station_2.en: Every <@gd.key>monitoring job</> requires photographing a special target.

guide_text_kite_station_2_1.cn: 请按下<action=mainhud_open_domain>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_kite_station_2_1.en: Press <action=mainhud_open_domain> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and press here to open the <@gd.key>Regional Development</> screen.

guide_text_kite_station_2_2.cn: 请点击此处，打开环境监测终端。
guide_text_kite_station_2_2.en: Click here to open the Environment Monitoring Terminal.

guide_text_kite_station_2_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，打开环境监测终端。
guide_text_kite_station_2_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to open the Environment Monitoring Terminal.

guide_text_kite_station_2_3.cn: 完成监测委托后，还可以获得<@gd.key>生态总录</>中的奖励，点击查看生态总录。
guide_text_kite_station_2_3.en: Completing the monitoring job also provides <@gd.key>Ecology Overview</> rewards. Click to view the Ecology Overview.

guide_text_kite_station_2_3_ct.cn: 完成监测委托后，还可以获得<@gd.key>生态总录</>中的奖励，请按下<action=kiteStation_process>查看生态总录。
guide_text_kite_station_2_3_ct.en: Completing the monitoring job also provides <@gd.key>Ecology Overview</> rewards. Press <action=kiteStation_process> to view the Ecology Overview.

guide_text_kite_station_2_4.cn: 生态总录中，可以根据累计完成的<@gd.key>不重复委托</>数量获取奖励，包含新的<@gd.key>拍照滤镜与拍照贴纸</>。
guide_text_kite_station_2_4.en: The Ecology Overview offers rewards based on the number of <@gd.key>non-repeated monitoring jobs</> completed. Rewards include <@gd.key>filters and stickers for the Camera feature</>.

guide_text_kite_station_3.cn: 例如该项委托，需要对<@gd.key>侵蚀潮中损坏的信标</>进行拍照。
guide_text_kite_station_3.en: Take this job for example. It requires the use of a camera to photograph a <@gd.key>beacon damaged in the Blight Tide</>.

guide_text_kite_station_4.cn: 点击此处，接取该<@gd.key>监测委托</>。
guide_text_kite_station_4.en: Click here to accept this <@gd.key>monitoring job</>.

guide_text_kite_station_5.cn: 点击<@gd.key>前往任务</>，可以在任务列表中看到已接取的环境监测委托。
guide_text_kite_station_5.en: Click <@gd.key>Go to Mission</>. The mission list now shows the environment monitoring job accepted.

guide_text_kite_station_5_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，<@gd.key>前往任务</>，可以在任务列表中看到已接取的环境监测委托。
guide_text_kite_station_5_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to <@gd.key>go to the Mission screen</>. The mission list now shows the environment monitoring job accepted.

guide_text_kite_station_desc_1.cn:
在环境监测终端中，可以通过接取并完成<@gd.key>监测委托</>，获得报酬。
每个<@gd.key>监测委托</>都需要拍摄特定的图像进行记录。
guide_text_kite_station_desc_1.en: Environment Monitoring Terminals provide <@gd.key>monitoring jobs</>. Complete them to earn rewards. Every <@gd.key>monitoring job</> involves the photographing of special targets.

guide_text_kite_station_desc_2.cn:
武陵地区的环境监测终端，需要解锁后才能使用。
环境监测终端可以通过花费调度券进行升级。
guide_text_kite_station_desc_2.en: Environment Monitoring Terminals in Wuling must be unlocked before they can be used. The terminals can be upgraded by spending stock bills.

guide_text_kite_station_point_desc_1.cn:
看到光点时，进行交互可进入<@gd.key>拍照模式</>。
进入拍照模式后，当相机中出现<@gd.key>拍摄目标</>时拍下照片，即可完成委托。
guide_text_kite_station_point_desc_1.en: When a glowing light is found, interact with it to enter <@gd.key>Camera Mode</>, then take a photo when the <@gd.key>photography target</> enters the view of the camera to complete the monitoring job.

guide_text_kite_station_title_2.cn: 环境监测终端的解锁与升级
guide_text_kite_station_title_2.en: Environment Monitoring Terminal: Unlock and Upgrade

guide_text_laevat_buff_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>终结技</>能量获得了些许恢复。

guide_text_laevat_buff_desc_2.cn: 此处散落的红色能量能恢复莱万汀的状态，并灼烧周围敌人。
guide_text_laevat_buff_desc_2.en: The red energy scattered here can restore Laevatain's status and burn nearby enemies.

guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 莱万汀的战技会对敌人持续造成伤害，并获得1层<@ba.key>熔火</>。<@ba.key>熔火</>最多叠加4层。
guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_02_1.en: Laevatain's battle skill deals DMG over time to enemies and grants her 1 stack of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</>. She can reach up to 4 stacks of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</>.

guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_02_2.cn: 如果莱万汀施放战技时已拥有4层<@ba.key>熔火</>，则最后会消耗所有层数，对大范围内敌人追加1次攻击并施加<#ba.burning>燃烧</>。
guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_02_2.en: If Laevatain already has 4 <@ba.key>Melting Flame</> stacks when casting her battle skill, then consume all the stacks, perform 1 additional attack, and apply <#ba.burning>Combustion</> to enemies within a large area of effect.

guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 主控干员<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>命中时，莱万汀会吸收周围敌人的<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>，每吸收一层<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>，自身获得1层<@ba.key>熔火</>。
guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_03_1.en: When the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> that hits an enemy, Laevatain absorbs <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> from nearby enemies. Every stack of <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> absorbed is converted to 1 stack of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</> for Laevatain.

guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 当有敌人进入<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态时可以发动莱万汀的连携技。
guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_04_1.en: Laevatain's combo skill is triggered when an enemy suffers <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>.

guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_04_2.cn: 莱万汀的连携技会对所有处于<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态的敌人造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>，并获得1层<@ba.key>熔火</>。
guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_04_2.en: Laevatain's combo skill deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> to all enemies with <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>, and grants 1 stack of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</>.

guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_05_1.cn: 莱万汀的终结技会在一段时间内强化普通攻击和战技。普通攻击的第3段会施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>。
guide_text_laevat_chartrain01_05_1.en: Laevatain's ultimate temporarily enhances her basic attacks (BATK) and battle skill. Laevatain's BATK sequence 3 also applies <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>.

guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_1.cn: 莱万汀是一名拥有强大群体输出能力的突击干员。她可以通过重击吸收附近敌人的<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>，触发强力战技和连携技，并使用终结技横扫大量敌人。
guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_1.en: Laevatain is a striker with outstanding mass DMG skills. Her Final Strikes can absorb <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Inflictions</> from nearby enemies to trigger powerful battle skills and combo skills. She can also use her ultimate to carve and burn her way through mobs of enemies.

guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_2.cn: 莱万汀在场时，主控角色的<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会吸收目标附近的<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>，每吸收一层获得一层<@ba.key>熔火</>。当莱万汀拥有满层<@ba.key>熔火</>时，战技会获得强化，让大范围内敌人进入<#ba.burning>燃烧</>。能施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>的干员可以和莱万汀形成配合。
guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_2.en: When Laevatain is in battle, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strikes</> performed by the controlled operator will absorb <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> stacks near the target and grant Laevatain 1 stack of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</> per stack absorbed. At maximum stacks of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</>, Laevatain's battle skill is enhanced and applies <#ba.burning>Combustion</> to enemies in a large area. Team up Laevatain with operators who can apply <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> to maximize her effectiveness.

guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_3.cn: 当有敌人进入<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态时，可以发动莱万汀的连携技：对所有<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>的敌人造成大量伤害。
guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_3.en: Laevatain's combo skill is triggered when an enemy suffers <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>. Her combo skill deals massive DMG to all enemies with <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>.

guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_4.cn: 莱万汀召唤烈焰魔剑，普通攻击获得强化，可以对大范围内敌人造成伤害。普通攻击第3段还会造成<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>。
guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_4.en: Laevatain summons the greatsword, Sviga Lævi, and her basic attacks become enhanced and deal DMG to enemies in a large area. Basic attack sequence 3 also applies <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>.

guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_5.cn: 能施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>的干员可以和莱万汀形成配合。施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>后，用主控干员的<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>吸收，让莱万汀获得<@ba.key>熔火</>。莱万汀获得满层<@ba.key>熔火</>后，施放强化战技造成<#ba.burning>燃烧</>，就可以直接发动连携技。
guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_01_5.en: Team up Laevatain with operators who can apply <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>. After applying <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>, use the controlled operator's <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strikes</> to absorb it and grant Laevatain stacks of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</>. Once Laevatain is at maximum stacks of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</>, cast her enhanced battle skill to apply <#ba.burning>Combustion</>, which then directly triggers her combo skill.

guide_text_laevat_chartrial01_title2.en: Laevatain: Battle Skill and Melting Flame

guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 主控干员为别礼时，施放别礼的战技不会中断普通攻击。
guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_02_1.en: When Last Rite is the controlled operator, casting her battle skill does not reset her basic attack sequence.

guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_02_2.cn: 进行<@ba.key>低温灌注</>后，主控干员接下来的1次<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会对目标进行追击，造成伤害并施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>。
guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_02_2.en: After performing <@ba.key>Hypothermic Perfusion</>, the next <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> performed by the controlled operator also unleashes an additional attack on the target, dealing DMG and applying <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>.

guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 别礼战技的追击可以对敌人施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>。
guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_03_1.en: Last Rite's battle skill includes an additional attack that can apply <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> to enemies.

guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 当有敌人进入3层及以上<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>状态时，可以发动别礼的连携技。
guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_04_1.en: Last Rite's combo skill is triggered when an enemy reaches 3 or more stacks of <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>.

guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_04_2.cn: 别礼的连携技<#ba.consume>消耗</>敌人身上的所有<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>，对其造成基于其<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>层数的<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_04_2.en: Last Rite's combo skill <#ba.consume>consumes</> all the enemy's <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> stacks, and deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> based on the number of <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> stacks consumed.

guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_05_1.cn: 别礼的终结技会造成大量寒冷伤害。
guide_text_lastrite_chartrain01_05_1.en: Last Rite's ultimate deals massive Cryo DMG.

guide_text_leader_butterfly_desc_1.cn: 蝴蝶会将人们<@gd.key>引向附近的储藏箱</>。即使追不上也没关系，它们有时也会等待步速慢的旅人。
guide_text_leader_butterfly_desc_1.en: Butterflies can <@gd.key>lead travelers to nearby storage crates</>. Don't worry about them flying too fast. Some of them will slow down and wait for ponderous travelers.

guide_text_leader_butterfly_desc_2.cn: 贪玩的蝴蝶们有时会在<@gd.key>半路散开</>，等找回<@gd.key>所有蝴蝶</>后，它们就会继续引路。
guide_text_leader_butterfly_desc_2.en: The playful butterflies will sometimes <@gd.key>scatter halfway through</> their flight. Regroup <@gd.key>all the scattered butterflies</> and they will continue to lead the way again.

guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 黎风的战技可以对敌人造成<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>，并对之前不处于<#ba.noguard>破防</>状态的敌人施加<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>。
guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_02_1.en: Lifeng's battle skill applies <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> on the enemy. If the enemy is not <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, the skill also applies <#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</> to the enemy.

guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_02_2.cn:
<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>：对敌人造成<#ba.noguard>破防</>，如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会叠加1层<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数并累积<@ba.poise>失衡值</>。
<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>：使目标受到的物理伤害提高。
guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_02_2.en:
<#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</>: Applies <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> on an enemy. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, then add 1 <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack and deal <@ba.poise>Stagger</>.
<#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</>: A target with this debuff takes more Physical DMG.

guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 处于<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>状态或<#ba.fracture>碎甲</>的敌人受到主控干员的<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>时可以发动黎风的连携技。
guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_03_1.en: Lifeng's combo skill is triggered when the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on an enemy with <#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</> or <#ba.fracture>Breach</>.

guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 黎风的连携技会造成物理伤害，并获得<#ba.combo>连击</>，使全队下一次战技或终结技的伤害提高。
guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_03_2.en: Lifeng's combo skill deals Physical DMG and grants a <#ba.combo>Link</> buff to the entire team that increases the DMG dealt by the next battle skill or ultimate cast.

guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 黎风的终结技能对敌人造成2次<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>，如果消耗了<#ba.combo>连击</>，则会再追加1次伤害。
guide_text_lifeng_chartrain01_04_1.en: Lifeng's ultimate applies 2 <#ba.knockdown>Knock Downs</> to enemies. If the ultimate consumes the <#ba.combo>Link</> buff, it deals 1 additional hit of DMG.

guide_text_lifter_for_boxgame_desc_1.cn: 可以运输悬浮箱子的电梯。
guide_text_lifter_for_boxgame_desc_1.en: An elevator that can transport floating crates.

guide_text_limit_marker_e1m4_desc_1.cn: 在探索进行到一定阶段后，会出现他人留下的<@gd.key>留言信标</>。
guide_text_limit_marker_e1m4_desc_1.en: After reaching certain phases of exploration, <@gd.key>Memo Beacons</> left by other explorers may start to appear.

guide_text_limit_marker_e1m4_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>留言信标</>会留下一些图标和文字内容，记录了他人在这里想传达的信息。
guide_text_limit_marker_e1m4_desc_2.en: <@gd.key>Memo Beacons</> may include icons and messages that other explorers wish to convey about the location.

guide_text_limit_usb_loader_unloader_int.cn: 仓库取货口与仓库存货口

guide_text_liquid_cleaner_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>污水处理机</>可以以较慢的速度对产生的<@gd.key>污水</>进行分解处理，不对环境造成污染。
guide_text_liquid_cleaner_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Water Treatment Unit</> can slowly remediate and purify <@gd.key>Sewage</> and generates no pollution.

guide_text_liquid_cleaner_intro_desc_2.cn: 如果不处理<@gd.key>污水</>，可能会导致设备的阻塞。
guide_text_liquid_cleaner_intro_desc_2.en: <@gd.key>Sewage</> must be treated or it will clog the facility.

guide_text_liquid_connector_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>管道桥</>可以使得两条相交的管道各自独立得运输液体而互不影响。
guide_text_liquid_connector_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Pipe Bridge</> allows a pipeline to go over another without disrupting the flow of fluids in both pipelines.

guide_text_liquid_connector_intro_desc_2.cn: 在<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面中选择<@gd.key>管道桥</>，直接进行放置或拖入快捷栏使用。
guide_text_liquid_connector_intro_desc_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel to select and place the <@gd.key>Pipe Bridge</> directly, or drag it into the hotbar and place it with hotkeys.

guide_text_liquid_converger_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>管道汇流器</>可以使得多条管道上的液体汇流到单一管道上，最多支持三条管道汇流。
guide_text_liquid_converger_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Pipe Converger</> can converge up to 3 pipelines into a single pipeline.

guide_text_liquid_converger_intro_desc_2.cn: 在<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面中选择<@gd.key>管道汇流器</>，直接进行放置或拖入快捷栏使用。
guide_text_liquid_converger_intro_desc_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel to select and place the <@gd.key>Pipe Converger</> directly, or drag it into the hotbar and place it with hotkeys.

guide_text_liquid_filling_pd_mc_intro_de.cn:
<@gd.key>灌装机</>解锁液体模式后，可进行与液体相关的不同配方生产。
典型产物为<@gd.key>装有芽针溶液的蓝铁瓶</>，由<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>和<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>放入<@gd.key>灌装机</>合成获得。
guide_text_liquid_filling_pd_mc_intro_de.en:
After unlocking Fluid Mode for the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>, the facility can produce with fluid-related formulas. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution in Ferrium Bottles</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> and <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottles</> in the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>.

guide_text_liquid_furnance_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>精炼炉</>解锁液体模式，可进行与液体相关的不同配方生产。
典型产物为<@gd.key>赤铜块</>，由<@gd.key>清水</>和<@gd.key>赤铜矿</>放入<@gd.key>精炼炉</>合成获得。
guide_text_liquid_furnance_intro_desc_1.en:
After unlocking Fluid Mode for the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>, the facility can produce with fluid-related formulas. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Cuprium</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Clean Water</> and <@gd.key>Cuprium Ore</> in the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_liquid_planter_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>种植机</>解锁液体模式后，可产出依赖液体的新植物成株。
典型产物为<@gd.key>锦草</>，由<@gd.key>清水</>和<@gd.key>锦草种子</>在<@gd.key>种植机</>中种植获得。
guide_text_liquid_planter_intro_desc_1.en:
After unlocking Fluid Mode for the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</>, the facility can grow crops that require fluids. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Jincao</>, grown by placing <@gd.key>Clean Water</> and <@gd.key>Jincao Seed</> in the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</>.

guide_text_liquid_storager_desc_1.cn: 储液罐可储存管道输入的<@gd.key>单一类型液体</>。
guide_text_liquid_storager_desc_1.en: A Fluid Tank can store <@gd.key>a single type of fluid</> delivered to it via pipelines.

guide_text_liquid_transport_intro_desc_1.cn: 管道分流器可将单一管道<@gd.key>分流出最多三条管道</>进行传输。
guide_text_liquid_transport_intro_desc_1.en: Pipe Splitters can <@gd.key>split 1 pipeline into 2 or 3 pipelines</> to divide fluid flow.

guide_text_liquid_transport_intro_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>管道汇流器</>可以使得多条管道上的液体汇流到单一管道上，最多支持三条管道汇流。
guide_text_liquid_transport_intro_desc_2.en: The <@gd.key>Pipe Converger</> can converge up to 3 pipelines into a single pipeline.

guide_text_liquid_transport_intro_desc_3.cn: <@gd.key>管道桥</>可以使得两条相交的管道各自独立得运输液体而互不影响。
guide_text_liquid_transport_intro_desc_3.en: The <@gd.key>Pipe Bridge</> allows a pipeline to go over another without disrupting the flow of fluids in both pipelines.

guide_text_liquid_transport_intro_desc_4.cn: 在<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面中选择<@gd.key>管道物流设备</>，直接进行放置或拖入快捷栏使用。
guide_text_liquid_transport_intro_desc_4.en: Use the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel to select and place a <@gd.key>pipeline logistics unit</> directly, or drag it into the hotbar and place it with hotkeys.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_1.cn: <@gd.key>反应池</>可用于制造<@gd.key>液化息壤</>。请点击此处查看。
guide_text_liquid_xiranite_1.en: The <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> can produce <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</>. Click here for details.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_1_ct.cn: <@gd.key>反应池</>可用于制造<@gd.key>液化息壤</>。请按下<action=fac_machine_show_formula>查看。
guide_text_liquid_xiranite_1_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> can produce <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</>. Press <action=fac_machine_show_formula> for details.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_2.cn: <@gd.key>液化息壤</>可由<@gd.key>息壤</>和<@gd.key>清水</>在<@gd.key>反应池</>中批量制造。
guide_text_liquid_xiranite_2.en: <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> is mass produced using <@gd.key>Xiranite</> and <@gd.key>Clean Water</> at the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</>.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_3.cn: 使用<@gd.key>液化息壤</>，即可方便地武陵地区进行<@gd.key>动态侵蚀</>的消除。
guide_text_liquid_xiranite_3.en: Use <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> to easily eliminate <@gd.key>Active Blight</> in the region of Wuling.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_4.cn: 请点击此处，关闭配方一览。
guide_text_liquid_xiranite_4.en: Click here to close the Formulas panel.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the Formulas panel.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_5.cn: 在反应池中，需要在此处<@gd.key>手动选择</>输出产物。选择后，产物会从对应的<@gd.key>液体输出口</>中输出。
guide_text_liquid_xiranite_5.en: At the Reactor Crucible panel, products must be <@gd.key>manually selected</> here. After selecting a product, it will be released through the matching <@gd.key>fluid outlet</>.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_desc.cn: 可使用<@gd.key>息壤</>和<@gd.key>清水</>在<@gd.key>反应池</>中批量制造<@gd.key>液化息壤</>，方便在武陵地区进行动态侵蚀的消除。
guide_text_liquid_xiranite_desc.en: Use <@gd.key>Xiranite</> and <@gd.key>Clean Water</> at the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> to mass produce <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</>. This product can easily clean up Active Blight in the region of Wuling.

guide_text_liquid_xiranite_title.cn: 使用液化息壤消除侵蚀

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_1.cn: 点击此处可以将精炼炉切换回固体模式。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_1.en: Click here to switch the Refining Unit back to Solid Mode.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_2.cn: 精炼炉已变为<@gd.key>固体模式</>，可以生产固体模式下的配方产物了。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_2.en: This Refining Unit is switched to <@gd.key>Solid Mode</> and can use Solid Mode production formulas.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_3.cn: 将取货口处的传送带连接至刚放好的精炼炉。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_3.en: Connect the transport belt from the output port to the newly placed Refining Unit.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_4.cn: 等待固体模式的精炼炉完成一次生产即可。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_4.en: Wait for the Solid Mode Refining Unit to complete its production.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_5.cn: 可以看到，<@gd.key>赤铜块</>已经成功生产。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_5.en: This shows that <@gd.key>Cuprium</> has been successfully produced.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_6.cn: 但同时产生了<@gd.key>污水</>，如果不处理，此处的液体缓存区满了之后会<@gd.key>阻塞</>工作。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_furnance_6.en: However, the process also produced <@gd.key>Sewage</>. If left untreated, it will fill up the fluid cache, <@gd.key>clog</> the facility, and stop it from working.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_1.cn: 将岸边的水泵，通过管道连向<@gd.key>液体模式</>的精炼炉吧。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_1.en: Connect the Fluid Pump near the water body to the <@gd.key>Fluid Mode</> Refining Unit via a pipeline.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_2.cn: 接下来，让我们打开精炼炉的操作面板
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_2.en: Now, let's open the Refining Unit control panel.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_3.cn: 我们成功使用<@gd.key>液体模式</>的精炼炉生产了<@gd.key>赤铜块</>。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_3.en: We have successfully used <@gd.key>Fluid Mode</> Refining Unit to produce <@gd.key>Cuprium</>.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_3_1.cn: 我们还可以将精炼炉<@gd.key>切换回固体模式</>，用来生产其他基础材料。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_3_1.en: The Refining Unit can also be <@gd.key>switched back to Solid Mode</> for producing other basic materials.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_4.cn: 请在对应位置放置<@gd.key>精炼炉</>以便开展后续生产。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_4.en: Place the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> at the specified location for subsequent production.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_5.cn: 接下来请打开<@gd.key>精炼炉</>的操作面板。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_helper_5.en: Next, open the control panel of the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_liquidcleaner.cn: 接下来，请打开<@gd.key>污水处理机</>的操作面板。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_liquidcleaner.en: Now open the <@gd.key>Water Treatment Unit</> control panel.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_liquidcleaner.cn: 污水处理机会规律性地将污水<@gd.key>处理消失</>。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_liquidcleaner.en: The Water Treatment Unit will regularly <@gd.key>clean up</> Sewage.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_start_1.cn: 赤铜块已经开始生产，但如果不处理污水，精炼炉缓存区满了之后会阻塞。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_start_1.en: Cuprium production has begun. However, if the Sewage is not treated, the Refining Unit cache will be clogged by it.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_start_2.cn: 管道连接后，<@gd.key>精炼炉</>的污水就可以流向<@gd.key>污水处理机</>
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_start_2.en: Connecting a pipeline moves the Sewage from the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to the <@gd.key>Water Treatment Unit</>.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_start_3.cn: <@gd.key>污水处理机</>可以将污水清理干净，不生成其他产物。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_start_3.en: The <@gd.key>Water Treatment Unit</> can treat and clean the sewage. No other products will be produced.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_start_4.cn: 请使用<@gd.key>管道</>将<@gd.key>精炼炉</>连向<@gd.key>污水处理机</>。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_start_4.en: Place a <@gd.key>pipeline</> to connect the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to the <@gd.key>Water Treatment Unit</>.

guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_wait_1.cn: 请等待几秒，清水将会输送至<@gd.key>液体模式</>的<@gd.key>精炼炉</>中。
guide_text_liquidcleaner_1_wait_1.en: Wait for a few seconds for the Clean Water to be delivered to the <@gd.key>Fluid Mode</> <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_loader_e1m6_1.cn: 界面上展示了<@gd.key>仓库中存放的物品</>，请点击仓库中的<@gd.key>源矿</>。
guide_text_loader_e1m6_1.en: The panel displays <@gd.key>items stored in the Depot</>. Click on the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> in the Depot.

guide_text_loader_e1m6_1_1.cn: 协议核心/次级核心的每个取货口都可以选定一个物品作为输出的目标，<@gd.key>点击空白的物品栏</>。
guide_text_loader_e1m6_1_1.en: Each output port of the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) / Sub-PAC can choose to unload 1 item. <@gd.key>Click on the now empty item slot.</>

guide_text_loader_e1m6_1_1_ct.cn: 协议核心/次级核心的每个取货口都可以选定一个物品作为输出的目标，请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>空白的物品栏</>。
guide_text_loader_e1m6_1_1_ct.en: Each output port of the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) / Sub-PAC can choose to unload 1 item. Press <action=common_confirm> and select the <@gd.key>empty item slot</>.

guide_text_loader_e1m6_1_ct.cn: 界面上展示了<@gd.key>仓库中存放的物品</>，请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择仓库中的<@gd.key>源矿</>。
guide_text_loader_e1m6_1_ct.en: The panel displays <@gd.key>items stored in the Depot</>. Press <action=common_confirm> and select <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> in the Depot.

guide_text_loader_e1m6_2.cn: 这样<@gd.key>源矿</>就被设为这个取货口的<@gd.key>输出物品</>了。
guide_text_loader_e1m6_2.en: This sets the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> as the <@gd.key>item to be moved out</> of this output port.

guide_text_loader_e1m6_3.cn: 关闭界面，接下来我们尝试如何利用传送带配合取货口自动取出物品。
guide_text_loader_e1m6_3.en: Close the panel. Time to learn how to use a transport belt with an output port to automatically unload items from the Depot.

guide_text_loader_e1m6_3_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_cancel>关闭界面，接下来我们尝试如何利用传送带配合取货口自动取出物品。
guide_text_loader_e1m6_3_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the panel. Time to learn how to use a transport belt with an output port to automatically unload items from the Depot.

guide_text_locked_box_desc_1.cn: 塔卫二上分布着一些<@gd.key>锁闭储藏箱</>，只有找到分散在周围的三个<@gd.key>锁闭醚质</>后，才能将其解锁。
guide_text_locked_box_desc_1.en: Many <@gd.key>Sealed Crates</> can be found in the world of Talos-II. To unlock a Sealed Crate, gather 3 <@gd.key>Sealing Aurylenes</> scattered nearby.

guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_1.cn: 晶体外壳数量已充足。请按照提示，点击<@gd.key>设备制造</>来制造设备。
guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_1.en: There are now enough Origocrusts. Click the <@gd.key>Construct</> button to construct the facility.

guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_2.cn: 晶体外壳数量已充足。请按照提示，点击<@gd.key>设备制造</>来制造设备。
guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_2.en: There are now enough Origocrusts. Click the <@gd.key>Construct</> button to construct the facility.

guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_3.cn: 请选择<@gd.key>4号取货口</>，按下<action=common_interact>打开取货口界面。
guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_3.en: Select <@gd.key>output port 4</>, then press <action=common_interact> to open the output port panel.

guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_3_mb.cn: 请选择<@gd.key>4号取货口</>，并打开取货口界面。
guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_3_mb.en: Select <@gd.key>output port 4</>, then open the output port panel.

guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_4.cn: 请靠近并按下<action=common_interact>，打开精炼炉的操作面板。
guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_4.en: Get close to the Refining Unit, then press <action=common_interact> to open its control panel.

guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_4_ct.cn: 请打开精炼炉的操作面板。
guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_4_ct.en: Open the control panel of the Refining Unit.

guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_4_mb.cn: 请打开精炼炉的操作面板。
guide_text_logistic_e1m6_hint_4_mb.en: Open the control panel of the Refining Unit.

guide_text_logistic_furnance_1.cn: 在操作面板中可以直观查看物流的运转情况。
guide_text_logistic_furnance_1.en: The control panel shows the current logistics data of the facility.

guide_text_logistic_furnance_2.cn: 左侧显示了设备的<@gd.key>传送带输入口</>，展示了输入材料的信息。
guide_text_logistic_furnance_2.en: The LEFT side shows the <@gd.key>transport belt input port</> and data of the facility's input materials.

guide_text_logistic_furnance_2_1.cn:
左侧是由传送带输入的待精炼的源矿。
右侧是由设备加工完成的晶体外壳。
从左到右，设备正在自动精炼已输入的源矿，并输出已加工完成的晶体外壳。
guide_text_logistic_furnance_2_1.en: The LEFT side shows Originium Ore transport belt moving materials into the facility for refining. The RIGHT side shows the Origocrusts produced by the facility. The CENTER shows the Refining Unit auto-processing the incoming Originium Ore into Origocrust.

guide_text_logistic_furnance_3.cn: 右侧显示了设备的各<@gd.key>传送带取货口</>，可查看输出产物的信息。
guide_text_logistic_furnance_3.en: The RIGHT side shows the <@gd.key>transport belt output ports</> and data of the products leaving the facility.

guide_text_logistic_furnance_4.cn:
这就是由传送带和设备组成的自动化产线。
请关闭精炼炉的操作面板，等待晶体外壳方便地自动化生产吧！
guide_text_logistic_furnance_4.en: This is an automated production line comprising transport belts and processing facilities. Close the Refining Unit control panel, then wait for the production line to auto-produce Origocrusts!

guide_text_logistic_furnance_4_ct.cn:
这就是由传送带和设备组成的自动化产线。
请按下<action=common_cancel>关闭精炼炉的操作面板，等待晶体外壳方便地自动化生产吧！
guide_text_logistic_furnance_4_ct.en: This is an automated production line comprising transport belts and processing facilities. Press <action=common_cancel> to close the Refining Unit control panel, then wait for the production line to auto-produce Origocrusts!

guide_text_lsm_controlled_switch_desc_1.cn: 若要激活它，需要打开平衡总控开关，按照<@gd.key>演示顺序</>激活周围的<@gd.key>压力板</>。
guide_text_lsm_controlled_switch_desc_1.en: To turn the main balance switch on, activate the nearby <@gd.key>pressure plates</> according to the <@gd.key>demonstrated sequence</>.

guide_text_lsm_controlled_sword_desc_1.cn: 选剑局内特殊的平衡总控开关，如果要激活它，需要按照<@gd.key>演示顺序</>激活周围的<@gd.key>压力板</>，升起小剑桩。
guide_text_lsm_controlled_sword_desc_1.en: Sword pells are special main balance switches in the Bureau of Swordmancers. To switch one on, activate the nearby <@gd.key>pressure plates</> according to the <@gd.key>demonstrated sequence</>.

guide_text_lumber_intro_1.cn: 尝试攻击源矿石，可以获得源矿。
guide_text_lumber_intro_1.en: Attack and smash the Originium Ore formation to gather Originium Ore.

guide_text_lumber_intro_2.cn: 进行攻击，即可破坏障碍物。

guide_text_mail_lost_item_1.cn: 因物品储存空间已满未能获取到的物品，回收小组已帮您回收并发送至<@gd.key>邮箱缓存区</>，请点击主界面的<@gd.key>邮箱</>按钮查看。
guide_text_mail_lost_item_1.en: Items that could not be collected due to full storage will be recovered by the field recovery team and sent to the <@gd.key>Mail Cache</>. Click the <@gd.key>Mail</> button in the main screen (upper left row) to view the Mail Cache.

guide_text_mail_lost_item_cbt2_1.cn: 您刚才收到了因各种原因遗失的物品，请进入邮箱查看。
guide_text_mail_lost_item_cbt2_1.en: The Mail Cache has received items lost and/or missed due to various reasons. Open the Mail screen for a look.

guide_text_mail_lost_item_cbt2_2.cn: 可在此处打开遗失物品的暂存区。
guide_text_mail_lost_item_cbt2_2.en: This opens the cache for the missed items.

guide_text_mail_lost_item_cbt2_3.cn: 可在此处尽快领取遗失的物品。
guide_text_mail_lost_item_cbt2_3.en: This quickly claims the missed items.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_0_mb.cn: 请点击此处，展开<@gd.key>工具箱</>。

guide_text_make_battle_turret_1.cn: 晶体外壳数量已充足，接下来可以制造作战设备了。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_1.en: There are now enough Origocrusts. The next step is to construct combat facilities.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_1_ct.cn: 晶体外壳数量已充足，接下来可以制造作战设备了。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_1_ct.en: There are now enough Origocrusts. The next step is to construct combat facilities.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_1_mb.cn: 点击此处进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_1_mb.en: Tap here to enter the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_2.cn: 请按下<action=fac_open_devices_list>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_2.en: Press <action=fac_open_devices_list> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_3.cn: 点击此处，选择<@gd.key>战斗辅助</>分页。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_3.en: Click here to select the <@gd.key>COMBAT</> tab.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_3_mb.en: Tap here to select the <@gd.key>Gun Tower</>.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_4.cn: <@gd.key>铳械塔</>是一种简单有效的作战设备，可以自动攻击附近的敌人。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_4.en: The <@gd.key>Gun Tower</> is a simple yet effective combat facility that can automatically attack enemies within range.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_5.cn: 点击此处，可以切换到设备制造模式。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_5.en: Click here to switch to facility construction mode.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_5_ct.cn: 按下<action=fac_build_list_switch_mode>，可以切换到设备制造模式。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_5_ct.en: Press <action=fac_build_list_switch_mode> to switch to facility construction mode.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_6.cn:
这里显示了制造铳械塔所消耗的材料类型与数量。
刚才加工的<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>就是制造铳械塔的所需材料。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_6.en: This shows the types and quantities of materials needed to construct the Gun Tower. The <@gd.key>Origocrust</> we just made is required for construction.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_7.cn: 当材料充足时，可在这里自定义选择数量对设备进行批量制造。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_7.en: As long as there are enough materials, use this to select the number of facilities to construct at one go.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_8.cn: 请<@gd.key>长按</>此处，制造<@gd.key>3座</>铳械塔，以准备开始抵御敌人。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_8.en: <@gd.key>Long-press</> this to construct <@gd.key>3</> Gun Towers and defend the area against the enemy.

guide_text_make_battle_turret_8_ct.cn: 请<@gd.key>长按</><action=common_num_add>，制造<@gd.key>3座</>铳械塔，以准备开始抵御敌人。
guide_text_make_battle_turret_8_ct.en: <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=common_num_add> to construct <@gd.key>3</> Gun Towers and defend the area against the enemy.

guide_text_make_dumper_2.en: Click here to select <@gd.key>Fluid Supply Unit</>.

guide_text_make_dumper_2_ct.cn: 还需要制造<@gd.key>给水器</>，已为您选中。
guide_text_make_dumper_2_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Fluid Supply Unit</> is next. It has already been selected.

guide_text_make_dumper_3.cn: 点击即可制造一个给水器。
guide_text_make_dumper_3.en: Click to construct a Fluid Supply Unit.

guide_text_make_dumper_3_1.cn: 材料充足后，可在此处制造给水器。
guide_text_make_dumper_3_1.en: Once there are enough materials, construct the Fluid Supply Unit here.

guide_text_make_dumper_3_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_confirm>即可制造一个给水器。
guide_text_make_dumper_3_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to construct a Fluid Supply Unit.

guide_text_make_dumper_4.cn: 请点击此处，关闭<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_dumper_4.en: Click here to close the <@gd.key>Facility List</> screen.

guide_text_make_dumper_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_dumper_5.cn: 请前往此处，放置<@gd.key>水泵</>与<@gd.key>给水器</>，进行液体运输。
guide_text_make_dumper_5.en: Go here to place the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> and <@gd.key>Fluid Supply Unit</> and start transporting the fluid.

guide_text_make_grinder_0_ct.en: Press <action=fac_main_right_active> to view <@gd.key>other AIC Factory actions</>.

guide_text_make_grinder_1.cn: 工业设备可通过协议核心进行制造。
guide_text_make_grinder_1.en: AIC Factory facilities can be constructed at the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC).

guide_text_make_grinder_10.cn: 点击此处，即可进入设备放置状态。
guide_text_make_grinder_10.en: Click here to enter facility placement mode.

guide_text_make_grinder_10_ct.cn: 按下<action=fac_build_list_place_confirm>，即可进入设备放置状态。
guide_text_make_grinder_10_ct.en: Press <action=fac_build_list_place_confirm> to enter facility placement mode.

guide_text_make_grinder_2.cn: 在<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>内，即可按下<action=fac_open_devices_list>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面，进行工业设备制造。
guide_text_make_grinder_2.en: While in the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</>, press <action=fac_open_devices_list> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to enter the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel to construct AIC Factory facilities.

guide_text_make_grinder_2_ct.cn:
在<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>内，可以进行工业设备制造。
请按下<action=common_confirm>进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_grinder_2_ct.en: AIC Factory facilities can be constructed in the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</>. Press <action=common_confirm> to open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_grinder_2_mb.cn: 请点击此处，展开<@gd.key>工具箱</>。

guide_text_make_grinder_3.cn: 在左侧列表中，可以看到当前已解锁的设备模板。
guide_text_make_grinder_3.en: The list on the left side shows facility templates already unlocked.

guide_text_make_grinder_3_mb.cn: 在<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>内，即可点击此处进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面，进行工业设备制造。
guide_text_make_grinder_3_mb.en: While in the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</>, tap here to open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel to construct AIC Factory facilities.

guide_text_make_grinder_4.en: Click here to select the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</>.

guide_text_make_grinder_5.cn: 当前设备数量不足，点击此处即可切换至<@gd.key>设备制造</>。
guide_text_make_grinder_5.en: If more facilities are needed, click here to switch to the <@gd.key>Construction</> panel.

guide_text_make_grinder_5_1_ct.cn:
已为您选中<@gd.key>粉碎机</>。
请按下<action=fac_build_list_switch_mode>，切换至<@gd.key>设备制造</>。
guide_text_make_grinder_5_1_ct.en:
<@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> is already selected.
Press <action=fac_build_list_switch_mode> to switch to the <@gd.key>Construction</> panel.

guide_text_make_grinder_5_ct.cn:
已为您选中<@gd.key>粉碎机</>。
当前设备数量不足，请按下<action=common_confirm>，切换至<@gd.key>设备制造</>。
guide_text_make_grinder_5_ct.en:
<@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> is already selected.
However, more facilities are needed. Press <action=common_confirm> to switch to the <@gd.key>Construction</> panel.

guide_text_make_grinder_6.cn: 可在此处查看制造该设备所需要的原材料。
guide_text_make_grinder_6.en: This shows the materials required to construct this facility.

guide_text_make_grinder_7.cn: 当前原材料充足，点击即可制造设备。
guide_text_make_grinder_7.en: There are enough materials. Click here to construct the facility.

guide_text_make_grinder_7_ct.cn: 当前原材料充足，按下<action=common_confirm>即可制造设备。
guide_text_make_grinder_7_ct.en: There are enough materials. Press <action=common_confirm> to construct the facility.

guide_text_make_grinder_8_ct.en: Press <action=common_continue> to return to the Facility List.

guide_text_make_grinder_9.cn: 已完成设备制造，点击此处，切换至<@gd.key>设备放置</>。
guide_text_make_grinder_9.en: Facility construction complete. Click here to switch to <@gd.key>facility placement</>.

guide_text_make_grinder_9_ct.cn: 已完成设备制造，请按下<action=fac_build_list_switch_mode>，切换至<@gd.key>设备放置</>。
guide_text_make_grinder_9_ct.en: Facility construction complete. Press <action=fac_build_list_switch_mode> to switch to <@gd.key>facility placement</>.
