guide_text_make_pump_1.cn: 请按下<action=fac_open_devices_list>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_pump_1.en: Press <action=fac_open_devices_list> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_pump_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_pump_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_pump_1_mb.en: Tap here to open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_pump_4.cn: 点击此处，切换至<@gd.key>设备制造</>。
guide_text_make_pump_4.en: Click here to switch to the <@gd.key>Construction</> panel.

guide_text_make_pump_4_ct.en: Press <action=fac_build_list_switch_mode> to switch to the <@gd.key>Construction</> panel.

guide_text_make_pump_5.cn: 当前材料已充足，点击即可制造水泵。
guide_text_make_pump_5.en: There are enough materials. Click to construct the Fluid Pump.

guide_text_make_pump_5_1.cn: 材料充足后，可在此处制造水泵。
guide_text_make_pump_5_1.en: Once there are enough materials, construct the Fluid Pump here.

guide_text_make_pump_5_ct.cn: 当前材料已充足，按下<action=common_confirm>即可制造水泵。
guide_text_make_pump_5_ct.en: There are enough materials. Press <action=common_confirm> to construct the Fluid Pump.

guide_text_make_xiranite_hint_1.cn: 可通过<@gd.key>水泵</>获取稳定的清水，并使用<@gd.key>管道</>输送至天有洪炉中。
guide_text_make_xiranite_hint_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to acquire a steady supply of Clean Water, then use <@gd.key>pipelines</> to transport it to the Forge of the Sky.

guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_1.cn: 请按下<action=fac_open_devices_list>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_1.en: Press <action=fac_open_devices_list> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=fac_main_right_active>并按<action=common_confirm>选择此项，进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_1_ct.en: Press <action=fac_main_right_active> and press <action=common_confirm> to select this option and open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处，展开工具箱，并进入<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面。
guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_1_mb.en: Tap here to expand the Toolkit and open the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel.

guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_3.cn: 点击此处，选择<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>进行制造。
guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_3.en: Click here to select <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> for construction.

guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_3_ct.cn: 当前已选择<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>，请进行制造。
guide_text_make_xiranite_oven_3_ct.en: <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> is already selected. Construct it.

guide_text_map_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议同步器权限已开放</>，请按下<action=common_open_watch>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开协议同步器。
guide_text_map_1.en: <@gd.key>Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) authority level unlocked</>. Press <action=common_open_watch> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Protosync.

guide_text_map_1_ct.cn: <@gd.key>协议同步器权限已开放</>，请按下<action=common_open_watch>打开协议同步器。
guide_text_map_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) authority level unlocked</>. Press <action=common_open_watch> to open the Protosync.

guide_text_map_1_mb.cn: <@gd.key>协议同步器权限已开放</>，请点击此处，打开协议同步器。
guide_text_map_1_mb.en: <@gd.key>Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) authority level unlocked</>. Tap here to open the Protosync.

guide_text_map_2.cn: 协议同步器上集成了探索中会用到的各项功能。
guide_text_map_2.en: The Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) has integrated various functions useful for exploration.

guide_text_map_3.cn: 比如可以在<@gd.key>百科</>中查看各项物品、敌人与教学信息。
guide_text_map_3.en: The <@gd.key>Database</> can be used to view details of various items, enemies, and tutorials.

guide_text_map_4.cn: 此处则会展示当期的寻访、武库交易所等热点信息。
guide_text_map_4.en: This section highlights Headhunting and Arsenal Exchange events currently available.

guide_text_map_5.en: Click here to open the map.

guide_text_map_5_1.cn: 这里展示了<@gd.key>四号谷地</>的地区总览，点击此处，进入<@gd.key>枢纽区</>的地图。
guide_text_map_5_1.en: This area shows the <@gd.key>Valley IV</> Region Overview. Click here to open the map of <@gd.key>The Hub</>.

guide_text_map_5_1_ct.cn: 这里展示了<@gd.key>四号谷地</>的地区总览，请按下<action=common_confirm>，进入<@gd.key>枢纽区</>的地图。
guide_text_map_5_1_ct.en: This area shows the <@gd.key>Valley IV</> Region Overview. Press <action=common_confirm> to open the map of <@gd.key>The Hub</>.

guide_text_map_6.cn: 可在<@gd.key>枢纽区</>地图中查看该区域的地形与各项信息。
guide_text_map_6.en: The map of <@gd.key>The Hub</> shows the terrain and various information of this area.

guide_text_map_7.cn: 可以点击地图上的各种图标来查看具体内容，比如点击任务追踪点，即可查看当前任务详情。
guide_text_map_7.en: Click various map markers to get more details about them. For example, clicking a mission tracking point opens up the mission details.

guide_text_map_7_1_ct.cn: 比如，您可以在<@gd.key>任务追踪点</>处查看当前任务详情。
guide_text_map_7_1_ct.en: For example, <@gd.key>mission tracking points</> can give more details on the mission.

guide_text_map_7_ct.cn: 可以推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6>操作杆选择地图上的各种图标，并按下<action=common_confirm>来查看具体内容。
guide_text_map_7_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6> stick to select various markers on the map, then press <action=common_confirm> to view the details.

guide_text_map_8.cn: 已为您选中<@gd.key>协议核心</>的地图标记。
guide_text_map_8.en: The <@gd.key>PAC</> map marker is already selected.

guide_text_map_8_ct.cn: 已为您选中<@gd.key>协议核心</>的地图标记。
guide_text_map_8_ct.en: The <@gd.key>PAC</> map marker is already selected.

guide_text_map_9.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>传送</>按钮，快速返回<@gd.key>协议核心</>。
guide_text_map_9.en: Click the <@gd.key>Teleport</> button to quickly return to the <@gd.key>PAC</>.

guide_text_map_9_ct.cn: 请按下<action=map_detail_common_right_btn_click>进行<@gd.key>传送</>，可以快速返回<@gd.key>协议核心</>。
guide_text_map_9_ct.en: Press <action=map_detail_common_right_btn_click> to <@gd.key>teleport</> and quickly return to the <@gd.key>PAC</>.

guide_text_map_filter_1.cn: 可点击此处，进行<@gd.key>标记显示管理</>，以快捷定位<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>。
guide_text_map_filter_1.en: Click here to manage <@gd.key>Marker Tags display</>, and use the hotkey to locate <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</>.

guide_text_map_filter_2.cn:
这里是<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>的地图标记，可在地图中找到对应的标记点。
或者在下方点击<@gd.key>清空选中</>后，再选中该<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>的标记。
guide_text_map_filter_2.en: This is the map marker for the <@gd.key>Protocol Datalogger</>. These markers can also be found on the map. Alternatively, click on the <@gd.key>Clear All</> button at the bottom, then select the marker for the <@gd.key>Protocol Datalogger</>.

guide_text_marker_desc_1.cn: 放置<@gd.key>留言信标</>后，首先需要选择标记内容。可以根据想要表达的内容拼接短语，点击确认即可确认标记内容进入建造状态
guide_text_marker_desc_1.en: After placing a <@gd.key>Memo Beacon</>, the memo contents must be provided. Create a short phrase based on the intended message, then click confirm to finalize the message and start constructing the beacon.

guide_text_marker_desc_3.cn: 放置下的留言信标会出现在他人的游玩环境中，向他人传达你特别的信息吧
guide_text_marker_desc_3.en: Once placed, the Memo Beacon will appear in other players' maps to convey your message.

guide_text_mazemarker_desc_1.cn: 武陵城外的迷踪林中，乱动的竹子会给本地居民带来困扰。当人们<@gd.key>被困迷踪林</>时，可通过附近的引导灯<@gd.key>寻找前路</>。
guide_text_mazemarker_desc_1.en: The randomly moving bamboo thickets of the Stragglers Grove have caused quite a bit of trouble for locals of Wuling outskirts. Those who find themselves <@gd.key>lost in the grove</> are advised to use guiding lights nearby to <@gd.key>find the proper path</>.

guide_text_mazemarker_desc_2.cn: 引导灯可以暂时驱散附近的少数竹林虫。<@gd.key>部分特定的区域引导灯会成组设置，需要按一定顺序点亮</>。这些成组的引导灯附近通常存在<@gd.key>提示点亮顺序的石柱</>。
guide_text_mazemarker_desc_2.en: Guiding lights can temporarily dispel a number of grovenymphs nearby. <@gd.key>Certain areas have sets of guiding lights that must be activated in the right sequence</>. <@gd.key>Stone pillars with clues to the correct sequence</> are often found near these sets of guiding lights.

guide_text_medic_hint_1.cn:
记得在战斗前进行<@gd.key>装备</>和<@gd.key>战术物品</>的更换。
按下<action=common_open_char_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入干员详情。
guide_text_medic_hint_1.en:
Don't forget to equip and change <@gd.key>gear</> and <@gd.key>tacticals</> before battle. 
Press <action=common_open_char_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_medic_hint_1_ct.cn:
记得在战斗前进行<@gd.key>装备</>和<@gd.key>战术物品</>的更换。
请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>并进入干员总览。
guide_text_medic_hint_1_ct.en: Don't forget to equip and change <@gd.key>gear</> and <@gd.key>tacticals</> before battle. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to expand the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</> and open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_medic_hint_1_mb.cn:
记得在战斗前进行<@gd.key>装备</>和<@gd.key>战术物品</>的更换。
点击此处进入干员详情。
guide_text_medic_hint_1_mb.en: Don't forget to equip and change <@gd.key>gear</> and <@gd.key>tacticals</> before battle. Tap here to open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_medic_hint_2.cn: 可在此处，更换干员的<@gd.key>装备</>与<@gd.key>战术物品</>，以更好地应对敌人。
guide_text_medic_hint_2.en: Use this screen to change the operator's <@gd.key>gear</> and <@gd.key>tacticals</> to better deal with the enemy.

guide_text_medic_sta_intro_desc_1.cn: 医疗塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，可将充能转换为治疗量，为范围内当前小队干员回复<@gd.key>生命值</>。
guide_text_medic_sta_intro_desc_1.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Medical Towers can convert their charges into treatment for restoring the <@gd.key>HP</> of team operators nearby.

guide_text_medic_use_3.cn: 可在这里为每名干员分别装备一种战术物品。
guide_text_medic_use_3.en: Here, each operator can be equipped with 1 tactical.

guide_text_medic_use_4.cn: 装备战术物品之后，干员会在战斗中符合生效条件的情况下，<@gd.key>自动使用物品</>。
guide_text_medic_use_4.en: Once equipped, tacticals are <@gd.key>automatically used</> by the operator when the criteria are met during battle.

guide_text_medic_use_desc_1.cn:
可以在装备页面为每名干员装备一种战术物品。
每种战术物品都有<@gd.key>不同的生效条件</>及<@gd.key>使用次数上限</>。
guide_text_medic_use_desc_1.en: Equip tacticals on the Gear screen. Each operator can be equipped with 1 tactical. Every tactical has <@gd.key>different activation criteria</> and <@gd.key>usage limits</>.

guide_text_medic_use_desc_2.cn:
装备战术物品之后，干员会在战斗中符合生效条件的情况下，<@gd.key>自动使用物品</>。
战术物品拥有多种功能，能够帮助您适应多种战斗环境。
guide_text_medic_use_desc_2.en: Once equipped, tacticals are <@gd.key>automatically used</> by the operator when the criteria are met during battle. Tacticals offer plenty of properties useful in various combat scenarios.

guide_text_mine_hint_desc_1.cn: 塔卫二分布着诸多矿点，可以通过探索发现更多的矿点，从而开采更多矿物，提高生产效率。
guide_text_mine_hint_desc_1.en: Mining spots are scattered throughout Talos-II. Explore the world to discover them, rig them up, and mine more minerals to boost production.

guide_text_miner2_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>电驱矿机</>能采集更高级的矿物，不过需要通电才能工作。
guide_text_miner2_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> can mine higher tier minerals but must be powered in order to work.

guide_text_miner2_intro_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>电驱矿机</>拥有无线传输模式，可以将缓存区的矿物自动传输回仓库。
guide_text_miner2_intro_desc_2.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> has belt-free transfer features that automatically deliver mined ores from its cache to the Depot.

guide_text_miner2_place_desc_1.cn: 电驱矿机可以放置在<@gd.key>源矿</>和<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>上，需要在<@gd.key>已接入电网的供电桩</>范围内才能正常工作。
guide_text_miner2_place_desc_1.en: Electric Mining Rigs can be placed on <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> mining spots. They must be placed within range of a <@gd.key>powered Electric Pylon</> in order to work.

guide_text_miner2_place_hint_1.cn: 放置电驱矿机需要在工业模式下进行，请按下<action=common_switch_mode>切换为工业模式。
guide_text_miner2_place_hint_1.en: Enter AIC Mode to place Electric Mining Rigs. Press <action=common_switch_mode> to switch to AIC Mode.

guide_text_miner2_place_hint_1_mb.cn: 放置电驱矿机需要在工业模式下进行，请点击此处切换为工业模式。
guide_text_miner2_place_hint_1_mb.en: Enter AIC Mode to place Electric Mining Rigs. Tap here to switch to AIC Mode.

guide_text_miner2_place_hint_2.cn: 按下快捷栏中<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>所对应的数字键或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，开始放置<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>。
guide_text_miner2_place_hint_2.en: Press the number key that corresponds to the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> in the facilities hotbar, or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to start placing the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</>.

guide_text_miner2_place_hint_2_ct.cn: 请按住<action=fac_activate_quick_bar>展开快捷栏，选择<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>，并按下<action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build>开始放置。
guide_text_miner2_place_hint_2_ct.en: Press and hold <action=fac_activate_quick_bar> to expand the hotbar, select <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</>, then press <action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build> to start placing the facility.

guide_text_miner2_place_hint_2_mb.cn: 请点击此处，开始放置<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>。
guide_text_miner2_place_hint_2_mb.en: Tap here to start placing the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_1.cn: 请使用快捷键<action=fac_open_tech_tree>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击打开<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_open_tech_tree> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_10.cn:
点击<@gd.key>开始模拟</>按钮即可进入模拟空间。
请尝试一下。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_10.en: Click the <@gd.key>Start SIM</> button to begin the simulation. Try it out.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_10_ct.cn:
按下<action=common_confirm>即可进入模拟空间。
请尝试一下。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_10_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to enter the simulation. Try it out.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_1_ct.cn: 可通过按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>，打开<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>, then open the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处，打开<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_1_mb.en: Tap here to open the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_2.cn: 点击此处，选择<@gd.key>中级矿物采掘</>工业技术。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_2.en: Click here to select the AIC technology: <@gd.key>Mining II</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>中级矿物采掘</>工业技术。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select the AIC Plan technology <@gd.key>Mining II</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_3.cn: 我们已经获得了足够的<@gd.key>工业点数</>。

guide_text_miner2_techtree_4.cn: 点击此处研究该工业技术。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_4.en: Click here to research this AIC technology.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_4_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>研究该工业技术。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to research the AIC Plan technology.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_5.cn: 研发后，我们就可以在协议核心制造<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>了。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_5.en: Once researched, we can build the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> at the PAC.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_6.cn: 请再次选择<@gd.key>中级矿物采掘</>工业技术。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_6.en: Now re-select the AIC technology: <@gd.key>Mining II</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_6_ct.cn: 请再次按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>中级矿物采掘</>工业技术。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> again to select the AIC Plan technology <@gd.key>Mining II</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_7.cn: 可点击此处查看和<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>相关的<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_7.en: Click here to view <@gd.key>simulations</> for the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_7_ct.cn: 可按下<action=tech_tree_detail_related_blackbox>查看和<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>相关的<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_7_ct.en: Press <action=tech_tree_detail_related_blackbox> to view <@gd.key>simulations</> for the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</>.

guide_text_miner2_techtree_8.cn: 点击此处，即可打开对应<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。

guide_text_miner2_techtree_8_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_confirm>，即可打开对应<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。

guide_text_miner2_techtree_9.cn: 进入此模拟空间并完成目标可以对<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>有进一步了解。
guide_text_miner2_techtree_9.en: Entering the simulation and completing its goals provides a better understanding of using the <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</>.

guide_text_miner3_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>二型电驱矿机</>是一种改良后的电驱矿机，可以开采更坚硬的<#item.ironOre>蓝铁矿</>。
guide_text_miner3_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig Mk II</> is an improved version of the Electric Mining Rig. It is capable of mining harder minerals such as <#item.ironOre>Ferrium Ore</>.

guide_text_miner4_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>水驱矿机</>可采集更高级的矿藏，典型矿物为<@gd.key>赤铜矿</>。
guide_text_miner4_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Hydro Mining Rig</> can mine high tier minerals such as <@gd.key>Cuprium Ore</>.

guide_text_miner4_intro_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>水驱矿机</>在使用管道通入<@gd.key>清水</>后无需接入电网即可工作。
guide_text_miner4_intro_desc_2.en: The <@gd.key>Hydro Mining Rig</> does not need to be connected to the power grid to work, but requires a pipeline connection that supplies it with <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.

guide_text_miner_doodad_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>矿石</>是塔卫二广泛分布的重要资源，需要攻击才能够采集。
guide_text_miner_doodad_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Mineral ores</> are key resources found throughout Talos-II. Mineral formations must be attacked and broken into smaller pieces for gathering.

guide_text_miner_doodad_desc_2.cn: 矿石具备多种用途，可以为集成工业的发展提供支持，也可以在加工后为探索提供助力。
guide_text_miner_doodad_desc_2.en: Mineral ores can be used to support production and growth of the AIC Factory. They can also be used for crafting special facilities to support exploration.

guide_text_miner_hint_1.cn: 便携源石矿机已存入背包中，按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_miner_hint_1.en: The Portable Originium Rig is now stored in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_miner_hint_1_ct.cn: 便携源石矿机已存入背包中，可通过按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>，打开背包。
guide_text_miner_hint_1_ct.en: The Portable Originium Rig has been placed in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</> and open the Backpack.

guide_text_miner_hint_1_mb.cn: 便携源石矿机已存入背包中，请点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_miner_hint_1_mb.en: The Portable Originium Rig is now stored in the Backpack. Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_miner_hint_2.cn: 点击此处，选择便携源石矿机。
guide_text_miner_hint_2.en: Click here to select Portable Originium Rig.

guide_text_miner_hint_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=show_item_tips>，查看<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>的物品详情。
guide_text_miner_hint_2_ct.en: Press <action=show_item_tips> to view the item details of <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</>.

guide_text_miner_hint_3.cn: 请<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>移动视角将矿机放置在矿点上方。
guide_text_miner_hint_3.en: Adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3> to place the mining rig on the mining spot.

guide_text_miner_hint_3_ct.cn: 请<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，将矿机放置在矿点上方。
guide_text_miner_hint_3_ct.en: <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to place the mining rig on the mining spot.

guide_text_miner_hint_3_mb.cn: 请移动并转动视角，将矿机放置在矿点上方。
guide_text_miner_hint_3_mb.en: Move and adjust the view to place the mining rig on the mining spot.

guide_text_miner_hint_4.cn: 点击此处，即可放置设备。
guide_text_miner_hint_4.en: Click here to place the facility.

guide_text_miner_intro_des_1.cn: 矿机是用来开采矿物的设备，只能放置在<@gd.key>矿点</>上。
guide_text_miner_intro_des_1.en: Mining Rigs are facilities specialized for mining. They can only be placed on <@gd.key>mining spots</>.

guide_text_miner_intro_des_2.cn:
不同矿机能够开采的矿物种类也不同。
低级矿机无法开采高级矿物。
guide_text_miner_intro_des_2.en: Different mining rigs can mine different minerals. Lower tier mining rigs are incapable of mining higher tier minerals.

guide_text_miner_intro_des_3.cn:
<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>可以使用采集的源石能源自行运作。
<@gd.key>不需要接入电网</>即可持续采集源矿。
guide_text_miner_intro_des_3.en: The <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</> mines Originium Ore and uses a fraction of it to power itself. It does <@gd.key>not need to be connected to the power grid</> to keep mining Originium Ore.

guide_text_miner_storage_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>协议核心</>是集成工业系统的中枢设备，承担了诸多功能，是进行工业建设的核心。
协议核心直通仓库，可以进行货物的输入与输出。
guide_text_miner_storage_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Automation-Core</> (PAC) is the heart of the Automated Industry Complex (AIC) and provides all sorts of functions. The AIC factory is built around it. The PAC is directly connected to the Depot and can load and unload products into and out of the Depot.

guide_text_miner_storage_desc_2.cn:
在集成核心区域内和协议传送点附近，仓库与背包是连通的。
可同时打开背包与仓库，进行仓储管理。
guide_text_miner_storage_desc_2.en: The Backpack is connected to the Depot in the Core AIC Area or near TP Points. Both the Backpack and Depot panels are opened at once for easy storage management.

guide_text_miner_storage_desc_3.cn: 接入仓库后，可将物品在仓库与背包间进行移动。
guide_text_miner_storage_desc_3.en: After connecting to the Depot and opening its panel, items can be moved back and forth between the Depot and the Backpack.

guide_text_miner_storage_hint_1.cn:
电驱矿机开采的矿物会直接运送至仓库。
可前往集成核心区域，打开背包与仓库查看。
guide_text_miner_storage_hint_1.en: Mineral ore extracted by the Electric Mining Rig will be directly transferred to the Depot. Go to the Core AIC Area, then open the Backpack and Depot to see them.

guide_text_miner_storage_hint_2.cn:
电驱矿机开采的矿物会直接运送至仓库。
可按下快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包与仓库查看。
guide_text_miner_storage_hint_2.en: Mineral ore extracted by the Electric Mining Rig will be directly transferred to the Depot. Press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack and Depot to see them.

guide_text_miner_storage_hint_2_ct.cn:
电驱矿机开采的矿物会直接运送至仓库。
可以按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>，打开背包与仓库查看。
guide_text_miner_storage_hint_2_ct.en: Mineral ore extracted by the Electric Mining Rig will be directly transferred to the Depot. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>, then open the Backpack and Depot to see them.

guide_text_miner_storage_hint_2_mb.cn:
电驱矿机开采的矿物会直接运送至仓库。
可点击此处，打开背包与仓库查看。
guide_text_miner_storage_hint_2_mb.en: Mineral ore extracted by the Electric Mining Rig will be directly transferred to the Depot. Tap here to open the Backpack and Depot to see them.

guide_text_miner_storage_hint_3.cn:
在集成核心区域内，仓库与背包是连通的。
可将存放在仓库的矿物取出，放入至背包中。
guide_text_miner_storage_hint_3.en: The Backpack is connected to the Depot in the Core AIC Area. Ore can be taken out of the Depot and placed in the Backpack.

guide_text_mix_pool_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>反应池</>可将材料进行<@gd.key>反应</>或将固体溶解在液体中。
典型产物为<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>。由<@gd.key>清水</>和<@gd.key>锦草粉末</>放入<@gd.key>反应池</>后合成获得。
guide_text_mix_pool_intro_desc_1.en:
The <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> can perform <@gd.key>reactions</> or dissolve solids to make solutions. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Clean Water</> and <@gd.key>Jincao Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</>.

guide_text_mix_pool_intro_desc_2.cn: 在使用<@gd.key>反应池</>时，需要手动配置产物的出口，液体和固体会从配置的对应出口流出。
guide_text_mix_pool_intro_desc_2.en: When using the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</>, the product outlets must be manually set to move fluid and solid materials out of the facility.

guide_text_mix_pool_intro_desc_3.cn: 可通过<@gd.key>反应池</>的指示颜色判断液体会从哪个管道流出。
guide_text_mix_pool_intro_desc_3.en: Use the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible's</> indicator colors to differentiate between the fluid output pipelines.

guide_text_mix_unlock_intro_desc_1.cn: 扩增反应池的缓存后，单一反应池同一时间可<@gd.key>进行更多配方反应</>。
guide_text_mix_unlock_intro_desc_1.en: Expanding the cache of the Reactor Crucible lets it perform <@gd.key>more reaction formulas</> at once.

guide_text_moss_3_desc_1.cn: 可以用研磨机将各种粉末与砂叶粉末合成新的物质，制造更高级的物品。
guide_text_moss_3_desc_1.en: Grinding Units can use Sandleaf Powder with other powdered materials to make more advanced products.

guide_text_move_delete.cn:
在设备的操作面板中，可通过<@gd.key>移动</>重新摆放设备的位置。
也可通过<@gd.key>收纳</>功能，将设备收纳回背包或仓库。
guide_text_move_delete.en: A facility's control panel includes a <@gd.key>Move</> function for moving and placing the facility at another location. It also includes a <@gd.key>Stash</> function to stash the facility into the Backpack or Depot.

guide_text_move_delete_ct.cn:
在设备的操作面板中，可通过<@gd.key>移动</>重新摆放设备的位置。
也可通过<@gd.key>收纳</>功能，将设备收纳回背包或仓库。
可按下<action=common_controller_side_menu>，在快捷功能中查看。
guide_text_move_delete_ct.en: A facility's control panel includes a <@gd.key>Move</> function for moving and placing the facility at another location. It also includes a <@gd.key>Stash</> function to stash the facility into the Backpack or Depot. Press <action=common_controller_side_menu> to expand the Quick Action list.

guide_text_mud_erosion_2_desc_1.cn: 武陵地区内规模较小的动态侵蚀没有侵蚀核心，不会在短时间内恢复原状，直接对其喷射<@gd.key>液化息壤</>就能清理干净。
guide_text_mud_erosion_2_desc_1.en: Smaller masses of Active Blight in Wuling have no Blight Cores and are incapable of regrowing themselves. Simply spray <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> to clean them out.

guide_text_mud_erosion_2_title_1.cn: 武陵地区的动态侵蚀 - 小规模

guide_text_mud_erosion_desc_1.cn: 武陵地区内规模较大的动态侵蚀，其核心所在位置附近具有<@gd.key>异常的高亮活跃表现</>。对侵蚀核心喷洒<@gd.key>液化息壤</>才能根除此处侵蚀。
guide_text_mud_erosion_desc_1.en: Large masses of Active Blight can be found in Wuling. Such masses often exhibit <@gd.key>abnormally high levels of light emissions</> near the Blight Cores. Spray <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> at the cores to completely eliminate these Blight masses.

guide_text_mud_erosion_desc_2.cn: 若大规模动态侵蚀的侵蚀核心未被消除，侵蚀会很快恢复成原状。
guide_text_mud_erosion_desc_2.en: If the Blight Core of a large Active Blight mass is not eliminated, the Blight will grow again and reach its former size.

guide_text_mud_erosion_desc_3.cn: 除了可使用<@gd.key>息壤控流节点</>，为<@gd.key>射流无人机</>提供<@gd.key>液化息壤</>，还可以使用<@gd.key>集成工业系统</>大批量地制造<@gd.key>液化息壤</>，方便在武陵地区进行动态侵蚀的消除。
guide_text_mud_erosion_desc_3.en: In addition to using <@gd.key>Xiranite flow control nodes</> to supply <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> to the <@gd.key>jet drone</>, the <@gd.key>AIC Factory</> can also mass produce <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> and make Active Blight elimination easier in Wuling.

guide_text_mud_erosion_title_1.cn: 武陵地区的动态侵蚀 - 大规模

guide_text_mud_erosion_title_2.cn: 大规模动态侵蚀的恢复现象

guide_text_mud_erosion_title_3.cn: 使用液化息壤消除侵蚀

guide_text_new_system_unlock.cn: 随着游戏进程，会有一些新系统解锁，可以关注此处。
guide_text_new_system_unlock.en: New systems and features will be unlocked while progressing through the game. For more information, check this screen.

guide_text_open_cmpt_1.cn:
配件机可用于制造<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>等产物。
请点击此处，查看其生产配方。
guide_text_open_cmpt_1.en: The Fitting Unit can produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> and other similar products. Click here to view its formula.

guide_text_open_cmpt_1_ct.cn:
配件机可用于制造<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>等产物。
请按下<action=fac_machine_show_formula>，查看其生产配方。
guide_text_open_cmpt_1_ct.en: The Fitting Unit can produce <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> and other similar products. Press <action=fac_machine_show_formula> to view its formula.

guide_text_open_cmpt_2.cn: 请点击此处，查看<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>的物品详情页。
guide_text_open_cmpt_2.en: Click here to view item details of <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</>.

guide_text_open_cmpt_2_1_ct.cn: 请向右推动<action=common_navigation_4_dir_right>，查看<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>的物品详情页。
guide_text_open_cmpt_2_1_ct.en: Push <action=common_navigation_4_dir_right> right to view item details of <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</>.

guide_text_open_cmpt_3.cn:
<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>可由<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>在<@gd.key>配件机</>中生产获得。
请点击此处，查看其<@gd.key>制造链路</>。
guide_text_open_cmpt_3.en: <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> can be produced by processing <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> with the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</>. Click here to view its <@gd.key>production chain</>.

guide_text_open_cmpt_3_1_ct.cn:
<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>可由<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>在<@gd.key>配件机</>中生产获得。
请按下<action=navigation_target_click>，查看其<@gd.key>制造链路</>。
guide_text_open_cmpt_3_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> can be produced by processing <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> with the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</>. Press <action=navigation_target_click> to view its <@gd.key>production chain</>.

guide_text_open_cmpt_4.cn: 在<@gd.key>制造链路</>中，可以查看产物的制造方式，包括前置产物及生产设备。
guide_text_open_cmpt_4.en: The <@gd.key>production chain</> shows the required upstream materials and processing facilities for making a product.

guide_text_open_cmpt_5.cn: 请点击此处，查看<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>。

guide_text_open_cmpt_6.cn: 可按下<@gd.key>相关教学</>按键，前往学习制造该产物的方法。并可获取对应的<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。
guide_text_open_cmpt_6.en: Press the <@gd.key>Guides</> button to learn how to produce this product and earn a corresponding <@gd.key>system blueprint</>.

guide_text_open_cmpt_7.cn: 可按下<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>按键，快捷使用可制造该产物的<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。
guide_text_open_cmpt_7.en: Press the <@gd.key>System Blueprint</> button to quickly use the <@gd.key>system blueprint</> for producing this product.

guide_text_open_cmpt_8.cn: 使用<@gd.key>制造链路</>，可助您更加方便地熟悉集成工业系统，更快更好地进行生产、建设四号谷地。
guide_text_open_cmpt_8.en: Use the information provided by <@gd.key>production chains</> to get familiar with the AIC Factory and quickly ramp up production and development in Valley IV.

guide_text_open_furnance_1.cn:
工业设备可对不同原料进行加工，用以生产各类工业材料和成品。
精炼炉的加工方式为<@gd.key>精炼</>。
guide_text_open_furnance_1.en: AIC facilities can process different raw materials to produce various factory goods and products. The Refining Unit processes materials by <@gd.key>refining</> them.

guide_text_open_furnance_2.cn: 我们打开了精炼炉的操作面板，左侧是当前仓储界面。这里展示了当前背包中持有的物品。
guide_text_open_furnance_2.en: We have opened the Refining Unit control panel. The left panel shows the items in storage. The panel currently shows the items in the Backpack.

guide_text_open_furnance_3.cn: 右侧是精炼炉的生产界面。
guide_text_open_furnance_3.en: The right panel shows the production info of the Refining Unit.

guide_text_open_furnance_4.cn: 将<@gd.key>源矿</>从背包拖入<@gd.key>精炼炉</>中，即可生产<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。
guide_text_open_furnance_4.en: Drag <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> from the Backpack into the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Origocrusts</>.

guide_text_open_furnance_4_1.cn: 当前暂无<@gd.key>源矿</>，当持有后，可将<@gd.key>源矿</>从背包放入<@gd.key>精炼炉</>中，以生产<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。
guide_text_open_furnance_4_1.en: No <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> in stock right now. After acquiring some, take the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> from the Backpack and place it in the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Origocrusts</>.

guide_text_open_furnance_4_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>，将<@gd.key>源矿</>移动到设备中。
guide_text_open_furnance_4_1_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to move <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> into the facility.

guide_text_open_furnance_4_2.cn: 请点击此处，切换至仓库。
guide_text_open_furnance_4_2.en: Click here to switch to the Depot.

guide_text_open_furnance_4_2_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_quick_drop>将<@gd.key>源矿</>移动到设备中，即可生产<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。
guide_text_open_furnance_4_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_quick_drop> to move <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> into the facility and produce <@gd.key>Origocrusts</>.

guide_text_open_furnance_4_3.cn: 在背包容量满之后，物品会存放进仓库中。
guide_text_open_furnance_4_3.en: Once the Backpack is full, the items will be stored in the Depot.

guide_text_open_furnance_4_3_ct.en: Press <action=fac_inventory_area_switch> to switch to the Depot.

guide_text_open_furnance_4_4.cn: 将<@gd.key>源矿</>拖入<@gd.key>精炼炉</>中，即可生产<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。
guide_text_open_furnance_4_4.en: Drag <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> into the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to produce <@gd.key>Origocrusts</>.

guide_text_open_furnance_4_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to perform actions on the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>.

guide_text_open_furnance_5.cn: 可以看到精炼炉已经开始运转了。
guide_text_open_furnance_5.en: We can see that the Refining Unit has begun to work.

guide_text_open_furnance_5_1.cn: 每一份<@gd.key>源矿</>，经过一段时间的加工后，都会被精炼为一份<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。
guide_text_open_furnance_5_1.en: Each unit of <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> can be refined into 1 unit of <@gd.key>Origocrust</> after a while.

guide_text_open_furnance_6.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>全部收取</>按钮，将完成加工的<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>收纳至背包中。
guide_text_open_furnance_6.en: Click the <@gd.key>Claim All</> button to take all of the <@gd.key>Origocrusts</> and place them in the Backpack.

guide_text_open_furnance_6_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_function_btn_1>，将完成加工的<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>收纳至背包中。
guide_text_open_furnance_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_function_btn_1> to stash the completed <@gd.key>Origocrusts</> into the Backpack.

guide_text_open_furnance_des_1.cn:
可将背包或仓库中的物品拖入设备，<@gd.key>如果该设备存在对应配方</>，就会正常工作。
每台设备只能同时进行一种配方的生产。
guide_text_open_furnance_des_1.en: Items can be dragged from the Backpack or Depot into a facility. If the facility has the <@gd.key>formula for processing the items</>, it will do so accordingly. Each facility can only use 1 production formula at any given time.

guide_text_open_furnance_des_2.cn: 设备完成加工后，可以将产物收取回背包或仓库中。
guide_text_open_furnance_des_2.en: Once facilities finish processing, the products can be retrieved and placed in the Backpack or Depot.

guide_text_open_furnance_toggl_hint_1.cn: 按下<action=fac_switch_device_icon_display>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处可以切换设备的产物显示情况
guide_text_open_furnance_toggl_hint_1.en: Press <action=fac_switch_device_icon_display> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to hide/show facility products.

guide_text_open_grinder2_1.cn: 以粉碎机为代表的工业设备，可有多种生产配方。
guide_text_open_grinder2_1.en: AIC facilities like the Shredding Unit can have multiple production formulas.

guide_text_open_grinder2_2.cn: 点击此处，查看粉碎机可加工的生产配方。
guide_text_open_grinder2_2.en: Click here to view the production formulas available for the Shredding Unit.

guide_text_open_grinder2_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=fac_machine_show_formula>，查看粉碎机可加工的生产配方。
guide_text_open_grinder2_2_ct.en: Press <action=fac_machine_show_formula> to view the production formulas available for the Shredding Unit.

guide_text_open_grinder2_3.cn: 除了源石粉末外，粉碎机还可以将荞花粉碎为<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>。
guide_text_open_grinder2_3.en: In addition to Originium Powder, the Shredding Unit can also shred Buckflower into <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_open_grinder2_4.en: Click here to close the formula details.

guide_text_open_grinder2_5.cn: 点击此处或者将物品拖入此处，以打开仓库界面。
guide_text_open_grinder2_5.en: Click here or drag items here to open the Depot panel.

guide_text_open_grinder2_5_1_ct.cn: 可在此处打开仓库界面。
guide_text_open_grinder2_5_1_ct.en: Open the Depot panel with this.

guide_text_open_grinder2_5_ct.en: Press <action=fac_inventory_area_switch> to open the Depot panel.

guide_text_open_grinder2_6.cn: 可将荞花拖入粉碎机内，进行<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>的生产。
guide_text_open_grinder2_6.en: Drag Buckflower into the Shredding Unit to produce <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_open_grinder2_6_ct.cn: 可将荞花移动到粉碎机内，进行<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>的生产。
guide_text_open_grinder2_6_ct.en: Move Buckflower into the Shredding Unit to produce <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</>.

guide_text_open_grinder_1.cn: 粉碎机是另一种工业设备，加工方式为<@gd.key>粉碎</>。
guide_text_open_grinder_1.en: Shredding Unit is an AIC Factory facility that processes materials by <@gd.key>shredding</> them.

guide_text_open_grinder_2.cn: 点击此处，可以查看粉碎机当前生效的配方。
guide_text_open_grinder_2.en: Click here to view the available formulas of the Shredding Unit.

guide_text_open_grinder_2_ct.cn: 按下<action=fac_machine_show_formula>，可以查看粉碎机当前生效的配方。
guide_text_open_grinder_2_ct.en: Press <action=fac_machine_show_formula> to view the available formulas of the Shredding Unit.

guide_text_open_grinder_3.cn: 可以看到，粉碎机能够对<@gd.key>源矿</>进行加工，生产出<@gd.key>源石粉末</>。
guide_text_open_grinder_3.en: We can see the Shredding Unit processes <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> to produce <@gd.key>Originium Powder</>.

guide_text_open_grinder_4.en: Click here to close the formula details.

guide_text_open_grinder_5.cn: 当前已拥有足够数量的<@gd.key>源矿</>，将其拖入粉碎机，即可进行生产。
guide_text_open_grinder_5.en: There is now enough <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>. Drag it into the Shredding Unit for production.

guide_text_open_grinder_5_ct.cn:
当前已拥有足够数量的<@gd.key>源矿</>。
按下<action=common_quick_drop>将<@gd.key>源矿</>移动到粉碎机，即可进行生产。
guide_text_open_grinder_5_ct.en: There is now enough <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>. Press <action=common_quick_drop> to move the <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> into the Shredding Unit for processing.

guide_text_open_grinder_6.cn: 当持有<@gd.key>源矿</>后，可将其放入粉碎机以进行生产。
guide_text_open_grinder_6.en: After acquiring <@gd.key>Originium Ore</>, put it into the Shredding Unit for production.

guide_text_open_miner2_1.cn: <@gd.key>电驱矿机</>拥有无线传输功能。在无线传输模式下，电驱矿机会将采集到的矿物自动存放至仓库，无需手动收集。
guide_text_open_miner2_1.en: <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</> can use belt-free transfer to deliver mined ore straight to the Depot. No manual work is required.

guide_text_open_miner2_2.cn: <@gd.key>电驱矿机</>建设后默认采用无线传输模式，也可以切换为仓储模式。
guide_text_open_miner2_2.en: Once placed, <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</> are set to belt-free transfer mode by default. These rigs can also be switched to storage mode.

guide_text_open_miner2_3.cn: 切换到仓储模式后，会和源石矿机一样不会将矿物送回仓库，必须从缓存区手动取出。
guide_text_open_miner2_3.en: After switching to storage mode, it will behave like an Originium Rig and simply store the mined ore in the cache instead of delivering it to the Depot. The ore must then be manually gathered from the cache.

guide_text_open_miner2_4.cn: 如果想要体验自动化的便利，建议继续使用无线传输模式。
guide_text_open_miner2_4.en: However, it is best to stick to belt-free transfer mode to take advantage of automation.

guide_text_open_miner_1.cn:
<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>可以使用采集的源石能源自行运作。
<@gd.key>不需要接入电网</>即可自行运转，持续采集源矿。
guide_text_open_miner_1.en: The <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</> mines Originium Ore and uses a fraction of it to power itself. It does <@gd.key>not need to be connected to the power grid</> and can automatically mine Originium Ore on its own.

guide_text_open_miner_2.cn:
便携源石矿机开采得到的源矿会存放在<@gd.key>缓存区</>中。
当缓存区达到存储上限时，便携源石矿机会停止工作。
guide_text_open_miner_2.en: Originium Ore mined by the Portable Originium Rig will be stored at its <@gd.key>cache</>. If the cache is full, the Portable Originium Rig will stop working.

guide_text_open_miner_3.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>全部收取</>按钮，将源矿收入背包中。
guide_text_open_miner_3.en: Click the <@gd.key>Claim All</> button to move the Originium Ore into the Backpack.

guide_text_open_miner_3_ct.cn: 请按下<action=fac_quick_take>，将源矿收入背包中。
guide_text_open_miner_3_ct.en: Press <action=fac_quick_take> to move the Originium Ore into the Backpack.

guide_text_open_miner_desc_1.cn:
请记得定期返回便携源石矿机处，手动收取已采集的源矿。
当源矿的采集数量达到矿机的储存上限时，<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>将停止采集工作。
guide_text_open_miner_desc_1.en: Remember to return to Portable Originium Rigs regularly to manually gather the mined Originium Ore. The <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</> will stop mining when its Originium Ore storage cache is full.

guide_text_open_miner_title_1.cn: 手动收取便携源石矿机
guide_text_open_miner_title_1.en: Portable Originium Rig: Manual Ore Collection

guide_text_open_shared_building2_1.cn: 可点击此处，查看该设备的<@gd.key>来源详情</>。
guide_text_open_shared_building2_1.en: Click here to view the <@gd.key>details and source</> of this facility.

guide_text_open_shared_building2_2.cn: 可在此处查看该设备的创建者
guide_text_open_shared_building2_2.en: This shows the player who constructed this facility.

guide_text_open_shared_building2_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>，查看该设备的<@gd.key>来源详情</>。
guide_text_open_shared_building2_2_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to view the <@gd.key>details and source</> of this facility.

guide_text_open_shared_building2_3.cn: 如果你欣赏设备的创建者，不妨添加为好友进行更多社交互动
guide_text_open_shared_building2_3.en: If you appreciate the player sharing the facility, why not add them as a friend?

guide_text_open_shared_building_1.cn: 这是来自他人的共享设备，<@gd.key>无需通电</>就可以直接使用。
guide_text_open_shared_building_1.en: This is a shared facility from another player. It can be directly used <@gd.key>without power</>.

guide_text_open_shared_building_2.cn: 探索进行到一定阶段后，会遇到更多<@gd.key>共享设备</>。
guide_text_open_shared_building_2.en: More <@gd.key>shared facilities</> might appear after reaching certain phases of exploration.

guide_text_open_shared_building_3.cn: 共享设备的<@gd.key>稳定度</>会不断降低，归零后设备会<@gd.key>消失</>，新的共享设备会<@gd.key>定期出现</>。
guide_text_open_shared_building_3.en: A shared facility loses <@gd.key>stability</> with time and will completely <@gd.key>disappear</> at zero stability. New shared facilities will <@gd.key>regularly appear with time</>.

guide_text_open_shared_building_4.cn: 点击此处，<@gd.key>维护</>该设备，可以提升其稳定度从而延长存在时间。
guide_text_open_shared_building_4.en: Click here to <@gd.key>repair</> this facility. Repairing raises its stability and extends its presence.

guide_text_open_shared_building_4_ct.cn: 按下<action=fac_social_like>，<@gd.key>维护</>该设备，可以提升其稳定度从而延长存在时间。
guide_text_open_shared_building_4_ct.en: Press <action=fac_social_like> to <@gd.key>repair</> this facility. Repairing raises its stability and extends its presence.

guide_text_open_shared_building_6.cn: 请按下<action=general_ability_press>或点击此处，可以<@gd.key>维护</>该共享设备提升稳定度。
guide_text_open_shared_building_6.en: Press <action=general_ability_press> or click here to <@gd.key>repair</> this shared facility and raise its stability.

guide_text_open_shared_building_6_ct.en: Press <action=general_ability_press> to repair this shared facility.

guide_text_open_shared_building_6_mb.cn: 请点击此处，维护该共享设备。
guide_text_open_shared_building_6_mb.en: Click here to repair this shared facility.

guide_text_open_shared_building_7.cn: <@gd.key>维护</>后共享设备的稳定度会完全回复，这能延长共享设备的<@gd.key>存在时间</>。
guide_text_open_shared_building_7.en: A <@gd.key>repaired</> shared facility will have its stability completely restored. This extends the <@gd.key>presence</> of the shared facility.

guide_text_open_shared_hint.cn: 请按下<action=common_interact>或点击此处，尝试一下共享设备吧。
guide_text_open_shared_hint.en: Press <action=common_interact> or click here to try out the shared facility.

guide_text_open_shared_hint_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_interact>，尝试一下共享设备吧。
guide_text_open_shared_hint_ct.en: Press <action=common_interact> to try out the shared facility.

guide_text_open_shared_hint_mb.cn: 请点击此处，尝试一下共享设备吧。
guide_text_open_shared_hint_mb.en: Tap here to try out the shared facility.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_1.cn: 天有洪炉可用于制造<@gd.key>息壤</>。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_1.en: The Forge of the Sky can produce <@gd.key>Xiranite</>.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_2.cn: 请点击此处，查看天有洪炉的配方。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_2.en: Click here to view the formulas of the Forge of the Sky.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=fac_machine_show_formula>，查看天有洪炉的配方。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_2_ct.en: Press <action=fac_machine_show_formula> to view the formulas of the Forge of the Sky.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_3.cn: 制作<@gd.key>息壤</>，需要使用<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>和<@gd.key>清水</>这两种材料。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_3.en: Producing <@gd.key>Xiranite</> needs 2 materials: <@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</> and <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_4.cn: 请点击此处，关闭配方一览。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_4.en: Click here to close the Formulas panel.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the Formulas panel.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_5.cn:
请将<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>放入天有洪炉。
之后可量产<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>，并通过传送带输送至设备中。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_5.en:
Move <@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</> to the Forge of the Sky.
<@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</> can also be mass produced and transported to the facility with transport belts.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_5_1.cn:
<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>已存放至仓库中，请将其放入天有洪炉。
之后可量产<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>，并通过传送带输送至设备中。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_5_1.en:
The Depot now has some <@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</>. Move this material to the Forge of the Sky.
<@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</> can also be mass produced and transported to the facility with transport belts.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_5_ct.cn:
按下<action=common_quick_drop>将<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>移动到设备中。
之后可量产<@gd.key>稳定碳块</>，并通过传送带输送至设备中。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_5_ct.en: Press <action=common_quick_drop> to move <@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</> to the facility. <@gd.key>Stabilized Carbon</> can also be mass produced and transported to the facility with transport belts.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_6.cn: 还需要将<@gd.key>清水</>通过管道输入到天有洪炉中。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_6.en: Now supply the Forge of the Sky with <@gd.key>Clean Water</> via pipelines.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_7.cn: 请点击此处，关闭设备操作面板。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_7.en: Click here to close the facility control panel.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_7_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_cancel>，关闭设备操作面板。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_7_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the facility control panel.

guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_8.cn: 可到此处水源，通过<@gd.key>水泵</>获取稳定的清水，并使用<@gd.key>管道</>输送至天有洪炉中。
guide_text_open_xiranite_oven_8.en: Use this as the water source. Place a <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to acquire a steady supply of Clean Water, then use <@gd.key>pipelines</> to transport it to the Forge of the Sky.

guide_text_outside_power_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>供电终端</>通常为大门、开关等设备供电。
使用<@gd.key>中继器</>为供电终端运输电力后，即可控制大门或开关。
guide_text_outside_power_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Electric Nexuses</> are usually used to power gates and switches. Supply power to Electric Nexuses with <@gd.key>Relay Towers</>. This then grants control access to gates or switches linked to them.

guide_text_pelica_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 佩丽卡的战技会施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>。

guide_text_pelica_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 主控干员对敌人造成<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>时，可以发动佩丽卡的连携技。
guide_text_pelica_chartrain01_03_1.en: Perlica's combo skill is triggered when the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on the enemy.

guide_text_pelica_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 佩丽卡的连携技可以对敌人施加<#ba.conduct>导电</>。处于<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态的敌人受到的<@ba.key>法术伤害</>提高。
guide_text_pelica_chartrain01_03_2.en: Perlica's combo skill applies <#ba.conduct>Electrification</> on the enemy. An enemy with <#ba.conduct>Electrification</> suffers more <@ba.key>Arts DMG</>.

guide_text_pelica_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 佩丽卡的终结技会造成电磁伤害。

guide_text_pin_desc_1.cn:
通过<@gd.key>配方标记</>功能将配方标记在主界面，在工厂区域内即可在主界面查看已标记的配方。
点击标记配方中的道具，可以查看道具详情和进行<@gd.key>配方跳转</>，跳转后通过返回按钮可以返回跳转前的配方。
guide_text_pin_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Pin formulas</> to show them at the main screen in the Core AIC Area. Click on the items of the pinned formula to view details of the item and open its <@gd.key>formula</>. After opening the formula, use the Back button to return to the original pinned formula.

guide_text_pin_hint.cn: 按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击<@gd.key>配方原材料</>可查看道具详情和进行<@gd.key>配方跳转</>。
guide_text_pin_hint.en: Press and hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click on the <@gd.key>formula's raw materials</> to view details of the material and open its <@gd.key>formula</>.

guide_text_pin_hint_ct.cn: 按住<action=fac_main_right_active>展开标记配方操作，再按下<action=item_tips_navi_to_obtain_ways>可查看道具详情和进行<@gd.key>配方跳转</>。
guide_text_pin_hint_ct.en: Press <action=fac_main_right_active> expand the pinned formula, then press <action=item_tips_navi_to_obtain_ways> to view details of the material and open its <@gd.key>formula</>.

guide_text_pin_hint_mb.cn: 点击<@gd.key>配方原材料</>可查看道具详情和进行<@gd.key>配方跳转</>。
guide_text_pin_hint_mb.en: Tap the <@gd.key>formula's raw materials</> to view details of the material and open its <@gd.key>formula</>.

guide_text_pipe_1.cn:
在武陵地区，可使用<@gd.key>管道</>来进行液体的运输。
请按下快捷键<action=fac_use_quick_item_pipe>，或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处使用管道。
guide_text_pipe_1.en: In Wuling, <@gd.key>pipelines</> can be used to transport fluids. Press the hotkey <action=fac_use_quick_item_pipe> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to start placing pipelines.

guide_text_pipe_1_ct.cn:
在武陵地区，可使用<@gd.key>管道</>来进行液体的运输。
请按下快捷键<action=fac_use_quick_item_pipe>使用管道。
guide_text_pipe_1_ct.en: In Wuling, <@gd.key>pipelines</> can be used to transport fluids. Press <action=fac_use_quick_item_pipe> to start placing pipelines.

guide_text_pipe_1_helper_1.cn: 与<@gd.key>传送带</>的操作相同，试着用<@gd.key>管道</>将<@gd.key>水泵</>连向<@gd.key>给水器</>。
guide_text_pipe_1_helper_1.en: Pipes work like <@gd.key>transport belts</>. Try connecting the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to the <@gd.key>Fluid Supply Unit</> via a <@gd.key>pipeline</>.

guide_text_pipe_1_helper_2.cn: 池子的水位降低了，等降到更低的时候进去，将里面所有的垃圾清理掉吧。
guide_text_pipe_1_helper_2.en: The water level is dropping in this pool. Wait for it to drop further, then enter the pool and clean out the trash.

guide_text_pipe_1_helper_3.cn: 清水池打扫完毕！帮忙将<@gd.key>大水池</>里的<@gd.key>小型垃圾</>也清理掉吧。
guide_text_pipe_1_helper_3.en: Clean Water pool cleaned up! Let's also clear out the <@gd.key>trash</> in the <@gd.key>large pool</>.

guide_text_pipe_1_helper_4.cn: 可参考虚影位置，放置<@gd.key>水泵</>和<@gd.key>给水器</>。
guide_text_pipe_1_helper_4.en: Refer to the holograms to place the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> and <@gd.key>Fluid Supply Unit</>.

guide_text_pipe_1_helper_5.cn: 别忘了用供电桩给<@gd.key>水泵</>和<@gd.key>给水器</>供电。
guide_text_pipe_1_helper_5.en: Don't forget to power the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> and <@gd.key>Fluid Supply Unit</> with an Electric Pylon.

guide_text_pipe_1_helper_6.cn: 这个大水池的<@gd.key>小型垃圾</>已经清理干净了。
guide_text_pipe_1_helper_6.en: All the <@gd.key>trash</> in this large pool has been cleaned.

guide_text_pipe_1_mb.cn:
在武陵地区，可使用<@gd.key>管道</>来进行液体的运输。
请点击此处使用管道。
guide_text_pipe_1_mb.en: In Wuling, <@gd.key>pipelines</> can be used to transport fluids. Tap here to start placing pipelines.

guide_text_pipe_1_mention_1.cn: 大水池里我们只需要清理<@gd.key>矿石等小型垃圾</>即可。
guide_text_pipe_1_mention_1.en: For the large pool, we just need to clear out <@gd.key>small pieces of trash such as bits of ore</>.

guide_text_pipe_1_mention_2.cn: 荷叶可以<@gd.key>浮在水面</>，并且可以<@gd.key>踩在上面行走</>。
guide_text_pipe_1_mention_2.en: Lotus leaves <@gd.key>float</> on water. One can <@gd.key>step</> on them to travel across water bodies.

guide_text_pipe_1_start_1.cn: <@gd.key>水泵</>可以将水池里的水<@gd.key>抽出</>。
guide_text_pipe_1_start_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to <@gd.key>pump</> water out of the pool.

guide_text_pipe_1_start_2.en: <@gd.key>Fluid Supply Units</> can <@gd.key>dispense water</> into the pool.

guide_text_pipe_1_start_3.cn: <@gd.key>管道</>可以在设备之间<@gd.key>连接</>，完成液体的<@gd.key>输送</>。
guide_text_pipe_1_start_3.en: <@gd.key>Connect</> different facilities with <@gd.key>pipelines</> to <@gd.key>move</> fluids between them.

guide_text_pipe_1_trush_1.cn: 水池里堆积了不少垃圾，我们动动手将它们清理掉吧。
guide_text_pipe_1_trush_1.en: The pool has plenty of trash. Let's clean it up.

guide_text_pipe_1_trush_2.cn: <@gd.key>水位太深</>无法入内，得想想办法。
guide_text_pipe_1_trush_2.en: The <@gd.key>water is too deep</>. We should think of something.

guide_text_pipe_2.cn: 可以通过将管道与水泵的<@gd.key>输出口</>连接，将液体从水泵输出到管道中。
guide_text_pipe_2.en: Connect the pipeline to the Fluid Pump <@gd.key>outlet</> to move fluids out of the Fluid Pump into the pipeline.

guide_text_pipe_2_start_1.cn: 我们先用管道将汇总的液体连向<@gd.key>储液罐</>。
guide_text_pipe_2_start_1.en: Let's use pipelines to deliver the fluid to the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</>.

guide_text_pipe_2_start_2.cn: 接下来请参考指示线，用<@gd.key>管道汇流器</>将两处池子的清水统一输入<@gd.key>储液罐</>。
guide_text_pipe_2_start_2.en: Refer to the indicated lines and use the <@gd.key>Pipe Converger</> to deliver Clean Water from the 2 pools to the <@gd.key>Fluid Tank</>.

guide_text_pipe_2_start_3.cn: 干得漂亮。最后，让我们参考指示线，将清水进行转移吧。
guide_text_pipe_2_start_3.en: Nicely done. For the final step, refer to the indicated line to move the Clean Water.

guide_text_pipe_3.cn: 再将管道连至给水器，即可使水泵里的液体流向给水器。
guide_text_pipe_3.en: Next, connect the pipeline to the Fluid Supply Unit to start moving fluids from the Fluid Pump to the Fluid Supply Unit.

guide_text_pipe_hint_1.cn: 请使用管道将水泵与给水器连接。
guide_text_pipe_hint_1.en: Use a pipeline to connect the Fluid Pump to the Fluid Supply Unit.

guide_text_place_e1m6_ppole_qkbar_hint_1.cn: 可将快捷栏中的<@gd.key>供电桩</>放置在指定位置附近，用于给铳械塔供电。
guide_text_place_e1m6_ppole_qkbar_hint_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> icon in the hotbar to place an Electric Pylon near the specified location and power the Gun Towers.

guide_text_place_turret_hint_1.cn: 刚刚通过次级核心制造的铳械塔已存放至背包。
guide_text_place_turret_hint_1.en: The Gun Towers we just constructed at the Sub-PAC have been placed in the Backpack.

guide_text_place_turret_hint_2.cn: 与其他工业设备一样，您可从背包中直接点击铳械塔或将其放入快捷栏进行设备放置。
guide_text_place_turret_hint_2.en: Like other AIC Factory facilities, the Gun Tower can be placed by clicking on it in the Backpack panel, or dragging it to the hotbar first and using hotkeys instead.

guide_text_place_turret_mode_hint_1.cn: 按下快捷键<action=common_switch_mode>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，切换为<@gd.key>工业模式</>，以便放置<@gd.key>铳械塔</>。
guide_text_place_turret_mode_hint_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_switch_mode> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to switch to <@gd.key>AIC Mode</> in order to place <@gd.key>Gun Towers</>.

guide_text_place_turret_mode_hint_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_switch_mode>，切换为<@gd.key>工业模式</>，以便放置<@gd.key>铳械塔</>。
guide_text_place_turret_mode_hint_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_switch_mode> to switch to <@gd.key>AIC Mode</> in order to place <@gd.key>Gun Towers</>.

guide_text_place_turret_mode_hint_1_mb.cn: 点击此处，切换为<@gd.key>工业模式</>，以便放置<@gd.key>铳械塔</>。
guide_text_place_turret_mode_hint_1_mb.en: Tap here to switch to <@gd.key>AIC Mode</> in order to place <@gd.key>Gun Towers</>.

guide_text_place_turret_qkbar_hint_1.cn: 可将快捷栏中的<@gd.key>铳械塔</>放置在指定位置附近。
guide_text_place_turret_qkbar_hint_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Gun Tower</> icon in the hotbar to place Gun Towers near the specified location.

guide_text_planter_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>种植机</>可以种植非稀有植物的种子，产出对应的植物成株。
典型产物为<#item.plantMoss1>荞花</>，由<#item.plantMossSeed1>荞花种子</>放入<@gd.key>种植机</>后生产获得。
guide_text_planter_intro_desc_1.en:
The <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> can grow seeds of common plants and raise them to maturity. 
Typical product: <#item.plantMoss1>Buckflower</>, grown from <#item.plantMossSeed1>Buckflower Seeds</> placed in the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</>.

guide_text_planter_liquid_desc.cn:
<@gd.key>武陵</>地区的部分植物，如<@gd.key>锦草</>和<@gd.key>芽针</>，<@gd.key>无法</>使用普通种植机生产。
可在后续解锁<@gd.key>武陵工业计划</>后，使用<@gd.key>切换至液体模式</>的种植机生产。
guide_text_planter_liquid_desc.en:
Standard Planting Units <@gd.key>cannot</> grow certain <@gd.key>Wuling</> plants such as <@gd.key>Jincao</> and <@gd.key>Yazhen</>. 
Unlock the <@gd.key>Wuling AIC Plan</> and use Planting Units <@gd.key>switched to Fluid Mode</> to grow the said plants.

guide_text_planter_liquid_switch_1.cn: <@gd.key>种植机</>切换为<@gd.key>液体模式</>可种植<@gd.key>芽针</>等植物，也可以切换为<@gd.key>固体模式</>种植<@gd.key>砂叶</>等植物。
guide_text_planter_liquid_switch_1.en: Switch the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> to its <@gd.key>Fluid Mode</> to plant crops such as <@gd.key>Yazhen</>. Switch it back to <@gd.key>Solid Mode</> to plant crops such as <@gd.key>Sandleaves</>.

guide_text_platform_rdtplotus_desc_1.cn: 武陵地区的荷叶宽大而结实。或许是受到了水中微生物的影响，当主控干员<@gd.key>站在其上</>时，荷叶能<@gd.key>发出光芒</>，并在<@gd.key>水中移动</>。
guide_text_platform_rdtplotus_desc_1.en: The lotuses of Wuling are known for their wide and sturdy leaves. When the controlled operator <@gd.key>stands on such a lotus leaf</>, it can <@gd.key>glow</> and <@gd.key>move across water</>. Aquatic microorganisms have been cited as the cause of such phenomena.

guide_text_platform_rdtplotus_desc_2.cn: 荷叶会按照固定路线移动，在<@gd.key>特定位置停留</>后会<@gd.key>返回初始位置</>。野外探索时，可以利用这种荷叶抵达平时无法抵达的地方。
guide_text_platform_rdtplotus_desc_2.en: A lotus leaf moves along a fixed path. <@gd.key>After reaching a specific place, it will pause for a while</> before <@gd.key>returning to its original position</>. Explorers can use these lotus leaves to reach places they could not otherwise reach.

guide_text_player_atb.cn:
使用战技会消耗一格<@gd.key>技力</>。
技力会随时间<@gd.key>自动恢复</>，重击命中敌人和<@gd.key>极限闪避</>时也可以恢复一定技力。
guide_text_player_atb.en: Casting a battle skill consumes 1 bar of <@gd.key>Skill Points</> (SP). SP <@gd.key>naturally regenerates over time</>. Hitting enemies with Final Strike and performing <@gd.key>Perfect Dodges</> also recover some SP.

guide_text_player_attack_0.cn:
连续按下，或者按住<@gd.key>鼠标左键</><action=battle_attack_start>，可以进行<@gd.key>普通攻击连段</>。
连续攻击至最后一段可以发动<@gd.key>重击</>。
guide_text_player_attack_0.en: Keep clicking or click and hold the <@gd.key>left mouse button</><action=battle_attack_start> to perform <@gd.key>basic attack sequences</>. Keep attacking to perform the last basic attack sequence: <@gd.key>Final Strike</>.

guide_text_player_attack_0_ct.cn:
连续按下，或者按住<action=battle_attack_start>，可以进行<@gd.key>普通攻击连段</>。
连续攻击至最后一段可以发动<@gd.key>重击</>。
guide_text_player_attack_0_ct.en: Keep pressing or press and hold <action=battle_attack_start> to perform <@gd.key>basic attack sequences</>. Keep attacking to perform the last basic attack sequence: <@gd.key>Final Strike</>.

guide_text_player_attack_0_mb.cn:
连续按下，或者按住<@gd.key>攻击键</>，可以进行<@gd.key>普通攻击连段</>。
连续攻击至最后一段可以发动<@gd.key>重击</>。
guide_text_player_attack_0_mb.en: Keep tapping or tap and hold the <@gd.key>attack button</> to perform <@gd.key>basic attack sequences</>. Keep attacking to perform the last basic attack sequence: <@gd.key>Final Strike</>.

guide_text_player_attack_1.cn:
连续按下，或者按住<@gd.key>鼠标左键</><action=battle_attack_start>，可以进行<@gd.key>普通攻击连段</>。
连续攻击至最后一段可以发动<@gd.key>重击</>。
guide_text_player_attack_1.en: <@gd.key>Keep clicking or click and hold the left mouse button</><action=battle_attack_start> to perform <@gd.key>basic attack sequences</>. Keep attacking to perform the last basic attack sequence: <@gd.key>Final Strike</>.

guide_text_player_attack_1_ct.cn:
连续按下，或者按住<action=battle_attack_start>，可以进行<@gd.key>普通攻击连段</>。
连续攻击至最后一段可以发动<@gd.key>重击</>。
guide_text_player_attack_1_ct.en: Keep pressing or press and hold <action=battle_attack_start> to perform <@gd.key>basic attack sequences</>. Keep attacking to perform the last basic attack sequence: <@gd.key>Final Strike</>.

guide_text_player_attack_1_mb.cn:
连续按下，或者按住此处，可以进行<@gd.key>普通攻击连段</>。
连续攻击至最后一段可以发动<@gd.key>重击</>。
guide_text_player_attack_1_mb.en: Keep tapping or tap and hold this area to perform <@gd.key>basic attack sequences</>. Keep attacking to perform the last basic attack sequence: <@gd.key>Final Strike</>.

guide_text_player_attack_2.cn: 靠近敌人可以自动切换目标。
guide_text_player_attack_2.en: Approach the enemy to automatically switch the target.

guide_text_player_flash_2.cn: 灵活使用普通攻击和闪避能使战斗更有利。
guide_text_player_flash_2.en: Use both basic attacks and dodges to improve combat performance.

guide_text_player_flash_ct.cn:
短按<action=common_sprint_start>，可以闪避敌人的攻击。
闪避<@gd.key>不会打断普通攻击连段</>，但会消耗体力。
guide_text_player_flash_ct.en: Press <action=common_sprint_start> to dodge enemy attacks. Dodging <@gd.key>does not interrupt basic attack sequences</> but costs Stamina.

guide_text_player_flash_desc.cn:
短按<action=common_sprint_start>或<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse1" scale=1>，可以闪避敌人的攻击。
闪避<@gd.key>不会打断普通攻击连段</>，但会消耗体力。
guide_text_player_flash_desc.en: Press <action=common_sprint_start> or <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse1" scale=1> to dodge enemy attacks. Dodging <@gd.key>does not interrupt basic attack sequences</> but costs Stamina.

guide_text_player_flash_desc_2.cn: 在敌人攻击瞬间按下闪避，会触发<@gd.key>极限闪避</>并返还一半消耗的体力。
guide_text_player_flash_desc_2.en: Pressing the dodge button at the precise moment of enemy attack triggers a <@gd.key>Perfect Dodge</> that returns half of the Stamina spent.

guide_text_player_flash_desc_ct.cn:
战斗中，短按<action=common_sprint_start>，可以闪避敌人的攻击。
闪避<@gd.key>不会打断普通攻击连段</>，但会消耗体力。
guide_text_player_flash_desc_ct.en: During combat, press <action=common_sprint_start> to dodge enemy attacks. Dodging <@gd.key>does not interrupt basic attack sequences</> but costs Stamina.

guide_text_player_flash_desc_mb.cn:
战斗中，点击冲刺键，可以闪避敌人的攻击。
闪避<@gd.key>不会打断普通攻击连段</>，但会消耗体力。
guide_text_player_flash_desc_mb.en: During combat, tap the dash button to dodge enemy attacks. Dodging <@gd.key>does not interrupt basic attack sequences</> but costs Stamina.

guide_text_player_flash_mb.cn:
点击此处，可以闪避敌人的攻击。
闪避<@gd.key>不会打断普通攻击连段</>，但会消耗体力。
guide_text_player_flash_mb.en: Tap this to dodge enemy attacks. Dodging <@gd.key>does not interrupt basic attack sequences</> but costs Stamina.

guide_text_player_lockon_desc_1.cn:
按下鼠标中键<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_pc_hint_mouse2" scale=1.3>可以锁定目标。
已锁定目标后，滑动鼠标滚轮<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse2" scale=1.3>可以<@gd.key>切换</>锁定的目标。
guide_text_player_lockon_desc_1.en: Click the middle mouse button <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_pc_hint_mouse2" scale=1.3> to lock on to a target. After locking on to a target, roll the mouse wheel <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_mouse2" scale=1.3> to <@gd.key>switch</> lock-on to other targets.

guide_text_player_lockon_desc_1_ct.cn:
按下<action=battle_camera_lock>，可以锁定目标。
已锁定目标后，推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆可以切换锁定目标。
guide_text_player_lockon_desc_1_ct.en: Press <action=battle_camera_lock> to lock on to a target. After locking on to a target, use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to lock on to another target.

guide_text_player_lockon_desc_1_mb.cn:
点击锁定键，可以锁定目标。
已锁定目标后，<@gd.key>再次点击</>锁定键可以<@gd.key>切换</>锁定的目标。
guide_text_player_lockon_desc_1_mb.en: Tap the lock-on button to lock on to the target. After locking on to a target, <@gd.key>tap the lock-on button again</> to <@gd.key>switch</> the lock-on to other targets.

guide_text_player_lockon_desc_2.cn: 已锁定目标后，<@gd.key>再次按下</><image="KeyIcon/icon_key_pc_hint_mouse2" scale=1.3>可以<@gd.key>取消</>锁定目标。
guide_text_player_lockon_desc_2.en: After locking on to a target, <@gd.key>click</> <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_pc_hint_mouse2" scale=1.3> again to <@gd.key>cancel</> target lock.

guide_text_player_lockon_desc_2_ct.cn: 已锁定目标后，再次按下<action=battle_camera_lock>，会取消锁定。
guide_text_player_lockon_desc_2_ct.en: After locking on to a target, press <action=battle_camera_lock> again to cancel target lock.

guide_text_player_lockon_desc_2_mb.cn: 已锁定目标后，<@gd.key>长按</>锁定键可以<@gd.key>取消</>锁定目标。
guide_text_player_lockon_desc_2_mb.en: After locking on to a target, <@gd.key>tap and hold</> the lock-on button to <@gd.key>cancel</> target lock.

guide_text_player_lockon_desc_3.cn: 在<@gd.key>设置-操控</>界面中，可以依据游玩习惯，切换<@gd.key>战斗相机修正：自动锁定</>设置。
guide_text_player_lockon_desc_3.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Settings - Controls</> screen and switch <@gd.key>Combat Camera Correction: Auto-lock</> on or off based on your play style.

guide_text_player_lockon_next_1.cn: 按下鼠标中键<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_pc_hint_mouse2" scale=1.3>可以锁定敌人。
guide_text_player_lockon_next_1.en: Click the middle mouse button <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_pc_hint_mouse2" scale=1.3> to lock on to the enemy.

guide_text_player_lockon_next_1_ct.en: Press <action=battle_camera_lock> to lock on to the enemy.

guide_text_player_lockon_next_1_mb.cn: 点击此处，可以锁定敌人。
guide_text_player_lockon_next_1_mb.en: Tap here to lock on to the enemy.

guide_text_player_skillS_1.en: <@gd.key>Hit the target</> with the battle skill.

guide_text_player_skillS_2_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press and hold <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_2> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>.

guide_text_player_skillS_2_mb.cn: <@gd.key>长按</>此处，或将战技键<@gd.key>拖动至终结技区域</>，施放<@gd.key>终结技</>。
guide_text_player_skillS_2_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap and hold</> this, or <@gd.key>drag the battle skill button to the ultimate zone</> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>.

guide_text_player_skillS_desc.cn:
当<@gd.key>终结技能量</>充满后，可以<@gd.key>长按</>战技键<action=battle_use_char_skill_1>施放<@gd.key>终结技</>。
使用技能命中敌人会积攒<@gd.key>终结技能量</>。
guide_text_player_skillS_desc.en: When <@gd.key>Ultimate Energy</> is full, <@gd.key>long-press</> the battle skill key <action=battle_use_char_skill_1> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>. Hit enemies with skills to gain <@gd.key>Ultimate Energy</>.

guide_text_player_skillS_desc_ct.cn:
当<@gd.key>终结技能量</>充满后，可按住<action=common_indicator_start>并长按<action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_2>施放<@gd.key>终结技</>。
使用技能命中敌人会积攒<@gd.key>终结技能量</>。
guide_text_player_skillS_desc_ct.en: When <@gd.key>Ultimate Energy</> is full, while holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press and hold <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_2> to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>. Hit enemies with skills to gain <@gd.key>Ultimate Energy</>.

guide_text_player_skillS_desc_mb.cn:
当<@gd.key>终结技能量</>充满后，可以<@gd.key>长按</>战技键，或将战技键拖动至终结技区域施放<@gd.key>终结技</>。
使用技能命中敌人会积攒<@gd.key>终结技能量</>。
guide_text_player_skillS_desc_mb.en: When <@gd.key>Ultimate Energy</> is full, <@gd.key>tap and hold</> the battle skill button or drag the battle skill button into the ultimate zone to cast the <@gd.key>ultimate</>. Hit enemies with skills to gain <@gd.key>Ultimate Energy</>.

guide_text_player_skill_1.en: Press number key <action=battle_use_char_skill_1> to cast the <@gd.key>battle skill</>.

guide_text_player_skill_1_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_2> to cast a <@gd.key>battle skill</>.

guide_text_player_skill_1_mb.cn: 点击战技键，可以使用<@gd.key>战技</>。
guide_text_player_skill_1_mb.en: Tap the battle skill button to cast a <@gd.key>battle skill</>.

guide_text_player_skill_2.cn:
使用战技会消耗一格<@gd.key>技力</>。
技力会随时间<@gd.key>自动恢复</>，重击命中敌人可以恢复一定技力。
guide_text_player_skill_2.en: Casting a battle skill consumes 1 bar of <@gd.key>Skill Points</> (SP). SP <@gd.key>naturally regenerates over time</>. Hitting enemies with Final Strike also recovers some SP.

guide_text_player_skill_n.en: Press number key <action=battle_use_char_skill_1> to cast the <@gd.key>battle skill</>.

guide_text_player_skill_n3.cn: 合理施放技能可以更快消灭敌人。
guide_text_player_skill_n3.en: Cast skills at the right timing to take down enemies more quickly.

guide_text_player_skill_n_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_2> to cast a <@gd.key>battle skill</>.

guide_text_player_skill_n_mb.en: Tap here to cast a <@gd.key>battle skill</>.

guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 骏卫的战技能对敌人造成<#ba.fracture>碎甲</>。
guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_02_1.en: Pogranichnik's battle skill applies <#ba.fracture>Breach</> on the enemy.

guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_02_2.cn: <#ba.fracture>碎甲</>：对敌人造成<#ba.noguard>破防</>，如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会消耗所有<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数并造成物理伤害和增加敌人受到的物理伤害。
guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_02_2.en: <#ba.fracture>Breach</>: Applies <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> on an enemy. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, then consume all the enemy's <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, deal massive Physical DMG, and increase the Physical DMG taken by the enemy.

guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 当有敌人被<#ba.crush>猛击</>或<#ba.fracture>碎甲</>消耗<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数后，可以发动骏卫的连携技。
guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_03_1.en: Pogranichnik's combo skill is triggered when <#ba.crush>Crush</> or <#ba.fracture>Breach</> consumes <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack(s) from an enemy.

guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 骏卫的连携技会根据<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数，造成物理伤害并恢复技力。
guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_03_2.en: Pogranichnik's combo skill deals Physical DMG and recovers SP based on the number of <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks <#ba.consume>consumed</>.

guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 骏卫的终结技会造成物理伤害并生成5点<@ba.key>铁誓</>。
guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_04_1.en: Pogranichnik's ultimate deals Physical DMG and grants 5 points of <@ba.key>Steel Oath</>.

guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_04_2.cn: 当有敌人受到<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>或骏卫的连携技伤害后，消耗1点<@ba.key>铁誓</>，召唤一名盾卫对其发动袭扰，造成物理伤害并恢复技力。
guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_04_2.en: When an enemy suffers a <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> or takes DMG from Pogranichnik's <@ba.key>combo skill</>, spend 1 point of Steel Oath to summon a Shieldguard to harass the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and recovering SP.

guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_04_3.cn: 消耗最后一点<@ba.key>铁誓</>时，会恢复大量技力。
guide_text_pograni_chartrain01_04_3.en: Spending the last point of <@ba.key>Steel Oath</> also recovers plenty of SP.

guide_text_pole_supply_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>中继器</>现在也能够进行小范围供电，在野外能够更方便地为设备提供电力。
guide_text_pole_supply_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Relay Towers</> now have the ability to supply power to nearby facilities. This is especially useful for powering facilities in the wilderness.

guide_text_potential_1.cn: 管理员，这里是干员的<@gd.key>潜能界面</>，可以在这里使用干员信物，提升干员潜能阶段，获得更多加成。
guide_text_potential_1.en: Endministrator, this is the operator's <@gd.key>Potential screen</>. Use operator tokens at this screen to raise their potential and grant them various bonuses.

guide_text_potential_2.cn: 点击此处，查看潜能解锁的详细信息。
guide_text_potential_2.en: Click here to view details for unlocking a potential.

guide_text_potential_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=char_potential_current>，查看潜能解锁的详细信息。
guide_text_potential_2_ct.en: Press <action=char_potential_current> to view details for unlocking operator potential.

guide_text_potential_3.cn: 重复招募干员时，可获取该干员的<@gd.key>潜能信物</>。
guide_text_potential_3.en: Recruiting the same operator again grants the operator's <@gd.key>potential token</>.

guide_text_potential_4.cn: 持有对应干员信物时，点击此处可以消耗信物解锁潜能。
guide_text_potential_4.en: If the operator's token is available, click here to spend the token and unlock the operator's potential.

guide_text_potential_5.cn:
解锁干员的潜能阶段01、03、05时，能够获取<@gd.key>干员留影</>，并在帝江号上自定义展示。
部分干员的留影会在名片处展示。
guide_text_potential_5.en: Reaching an operator's Potential 01, Potential 03, and Potential 05 also unlocks the <@gd.key>operator's snapshot</>. These snapshots can be displayed aboard Dijiang. Some operator snapshots can also be displayed at the Profile panel.

guide_text_potential_6.cn: 可以随时在此处查看已获得的留影。
guide_text_potential_6.en: Visit this screen to view all snapshots already acquired.

guide_text_potential_7.cn: 获得的干员留影会在个人名片与帝江号展示，请继续推进主线任务进度，解锁更多展示方式。
guide_text_potential_7.en: Operator snapshots acquired can be displayed at the Profile screen or Dijiang. Keep progressing through the main mission to unlock more ways to showcase the snapshots.

guide_text_potential_8.cn: 获得的干员留影会在个人名片与帝江号EF02循流图像仪处展示，请解锁干员潜能、获得更多留影。
guide_text_potential_8.en: Operator snapshots acquired can be displayed at the Profile screen or EF02 Slide Projector aboard Dijiang. Keep unlocking operator potentials to acquire more snapshots.

guide_text_power_des_1.cn:
大部分设备都需要使用<@gd.key>供电桩</>供电，才能开始工作。
只要将设备放置在<@gd.key>已接入电网的供电桩</>的供电范围内，即可完成供电。
guide_text_power_des_1.en: Most facilities must be powered by <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> to work. Power a facility by placing it within the power supply radius of an <@gd.key>Electric Pylon connected to the power grid</>.

guide_text_power_des_2.cn: <@gd.key>供电桩</>只要放置在<#fac.hub>协议核心</>的集成核心区域内，就会自动接入电网，为其供电范围内的设备供电。
guide_text_power_des_2.en: Place <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> in the Core AIC Area of the <#fac.hub>PAC</> to automatically connect them to the grid. Connected Electric Pylons can supply power to facilities within their power supply radius.

guide_text_power_link_des_1.cn:
<@gd.key>中继器</>是运输电力的重要连接设备。
电力可通过中继器运输至其他的中继器、供电桩以及供电终端，使其接入电网。
guide_text_power_link_des_1.en: The <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> is a key power transmission facility. Relay Towers can be used to transmit power to other Relay Towers, Electric Pylons, and Electric Nexuses to connect them to the power grid.

guide_text_power_link_des_2.cn: 协议核心是电力的来源。只有从协议核心运输电力至<@gd.key>中继器</>后，该中继器和与其连接的设备才能接入电网。
guide_text_power_link_des_2.en: The Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) is the origin and source of the power grid. Transmit power from the PAC to a <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> to add it and all connected facilities into the power grid.

guide_text_power_link_des_3.cn:
在集成核心区域外，中继器<@gd.key>无法为设备直接供电</>，需要通过供电桩来为设备供电。
从<@gd.key>已通电的中继器</>传输电力至供电桩，使其接入电网后，供电桩即可为其范围内的设备供电。
guide_text_power_link_des_3.en: Relay Towers outside the Core AIC Area <@gd.key>do not supply power to facilities</>. This can only be done with a powered Electric Pylon. Transmit power from a <@gd.key>powered Relay Tower</> to an Electric Pylon to connect the latter into the power grid. The Electric Pylon can then power facilities within its power supply radius.

guide_text_power_link_hint_1.cn: 从<@gd.key>已通电的中继器</>将电力运输至<@gd.key>供电终端</>，即可启动开关。
guide_text_power_link_hint_1.en: Transmit power from a <@gd.key>powered Relay Tower</> to the <@gd.key>Electric Nexus</> to activate the switch.

guide_text_power_link_title_1.cn: 中继器与电力运输 - 一

guide_text_power_link_title_2.cn: 中继器与电力运输 - 二

guide_text_power_sta_hint.cn:
热能池可使用<@gd.key>电池</>发电。
使用<@gd.key>电池</>发电可<@gd.key>大幅提高</>发电效率，降低源矿消耗。
guide_text_power_sta_hint.en: Thermal Banks can use <@gd.key>batteries</> to generate power. <@gd.key>Batteries</> also generate <@gd.key>more</> power and reduce overall consumption of Originium Ore.

guide_text_power_sta_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>热能池</>是用于生产电能的设备，可提高当前区域的发电功率，从而支持更多设备同时工作。
所需要消耗的原材料是<#item.originium>源矿</>和<@gd.key>电池</>。
guide_text_power_sta_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Thermal Bank</> is a facility that generates electrical power. It raises the power output of the regional power grid to supply power to more facilities. Thermal Banks consume <#item.originium>Originium Ore</> and <@gd.key>batteries</>.

guide_text_power_supply_0.cn: 精炼炉需要通电才能正常工作，可使用<@gd.key>供电桩</>为精炼炉供电。
guide_text_power_supply_0.en: The Refining Unit must be powered to work. Use an <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to power the Refining Unit.

guide_text_power_supply_1.cn: 按下<@gd.key>供电桩</>所对应的数字键或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，开始放置<@gd.key>供电桩</>。
guide_text_power_supply_1.en: Press the number key associated with the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to place the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</>.

guide_text_power_supply_1_ct.en: Press <action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build> to start placing the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</>.

guide_text_power_supply_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处，开始放置<@gd.key>供电桩</>。
guide_text_power_supply_1_mb.en: Tap here to place the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</>.

guide_text_power_supply_2.cn: 供电桩可为供电范围内所有设备供电，<@gd.key>蓝色框体</>即为其供电范围。
guide_text_power_supply_2.en: An Electric Pylon can power facilities within its power supply radius indicated by the <@gd.key>blue grid</>.

guide_text_power_supply_3.cn: 按照提示，请移动并使用鼠标<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角，将<@gd.key>供电桩</>移动至<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_power_supply_3.en: Follow the instructions. Move and adjust the view with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3> to move the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_power_supply_3_ct.cn: 按照提示，请<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，将<@gd.key>供电桩</>移动至<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_power_supply_3_ct.en: Follow the instructions. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to move the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_power_supply_3_mb.cn: 按照提示，请移动并划动屏幕转动视角，将<@gd.key>供电桩</>移动至<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_power_supply_3_mb.en: Follow the instructions. Move and slide the screen to adjust the view and move the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_power_supply_4.cn: 精炼炉已进入了供电桩的供电范围，此时放置供电桩，即可为该设备供电。
guide_text_power_supply_4.en: The Refining Unit is now in the power supply radius of the Electric Pylon. Place the Electric Pylon to power the facility.

guide_text_power_wuling_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>息壤中继器</>在集成核心区域外时，可<@gd.key>自动连接</>80m范围内的协议核心与全部息壤电力设备，但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。
在集成核心区域内时，仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行电力传输与小范围供电。
guide_text_power_wuling_desc_1.en: A <@gd.key>Xiranite Relay</> placed outside the Core AIC Area <@gd.key>auto-connects</> to the PAC and any Xiranite power facilities within an 80-meter radius, but cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When placed inside the Core AIC Area, it only auto-connects to the PAC. The Xiranite Relay can be used for power transmission and powering facilities within a short range.

guide_text_power_wuling_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>在集成核心区域外时，可<@gd.key>自动连接</>80m范围内的协议核心与息壤中继器。
guide_text_power_wuling_desc_2.en: A <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</> placed outside the Core AIC Area <@gd.key>auto-connects</> to the PAC and Xiranite Relay within an 80-meter radius.

guide_text_power_wuling_desc_3.cn:
<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>在集成核心区域外时，也可<@gd.key>自动连接</>30m范围内的息壤供电桩以及其他电力设备，但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。
在集成核心区域内时，仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行范围供电与短距离电力传输。
guide_text_power_wuling_desc_3.en: A <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</> placed outside the Core AIC Area also <@gd.key>auto-connects</> to other Xiranite Pylons within a 30-meter radius. However, it cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When placed inside the Core AIC Area, it only auto-connects to the PAC. The Xiranite Pylon can be used for powering facilities within range and power transmission across short distances.

guide_text_ppole_place_0.cn: 请将中继器放置于<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_0.en: Refer to the <@gd.key>hologram</> for placing the Relay Tower.

guide_text_ppole_place_1.cn: 按下快捷栏中<@gd.key>中继器</>所对应的数字键或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，开始放置<@gd.key>中继器</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_1.en: Press the number key that corresponds to the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> in the facilities hotbar, or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to start placing the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_ppole_place_1_1_ct.cn:
已为您选中<@gd.key>中继器</>。
请按下<action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build>，开始放置<@gd.key>中继器</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_1_1_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> is already selected. Press <action=fac_quick_bar_controller_build> to start placing the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_ppole_place_1_mb.cn: 点击此处，开始放置<@gd.key>中继器</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_1_mb.en: Tap here to place the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_ppole_place_2.cn: 请按照提示，移动并使用鼠标<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角将<@gd.key>中继器</>移动到<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_2.en: Follow the instructions. Move and adjust the view with the mouse <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3> to move the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_ppole_place_2_ct.cn: 请按照指示，<@gd.key>移动并推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆转动视角</>，将<@gd.key>中继器</>移动到<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_2_ct.en: Follow the instructions. <@gd.key>Move and adjust the view with the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick</> to move the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_ppole_place_2_mb.cn: 请按照提示，移动并划动屏幕转动视角将<@gd.key>中继器</>移动到<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_2_mb.en: Follow the instructions. Move and slide the screen to adjust the view and move the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>.

guide_text_ppole_place_3.cn: 点击鼠标左键<action=fac_build_confirm>，确认放置<@gd.key>中继器</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_3.en: Click the left mouse button <action=fac_build_confirm> to place the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_ppole_place_3_ct.en: Press <action=fac_build_confirm> to confirm the placement of the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_ppole_place_3_mb.cn: 点击此处，确认放置<@gd.key>中继器</>。
guide_text_ppole_place_3_mb.en: Tap here to place the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</>.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_1.cn: 建设工作是终末地工业的强项。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_1.en: Construction is the strength of Endfield Industries made manifest.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_2.cn: 请按下快捷键<action=common_switch_mode>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，切换为<@gd.key>工业模式</>。
