guide_text_ppole_qkbar_2.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_switch_mode> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to switch to <@gd.key>AIC Mode</>.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_2_mb.cn: 请点击此处，切换为<@gd.key>工业模式</>。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_2_mb.en: Tap here to switch to <@gd.key>AIC Mode</>.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_3.cn: 按下快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_3.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_3_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_3_mb.en: Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_4.cn: 在<@gd.key>工业模式</>中，会启用专用于设备放置的快捷栏。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_4.en: <@gd.key>AIC Mode</> provides a special hotbar for the placement of facilities.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_5.cn: 请按照提示，将<@gd.key>中继器</>拖动到快捷栏中。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_5.en: Follow the instructions. Drag the <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> into the hotbar.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_5_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，将<@gd.key>中继器</>登录到快捷栏中。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_5_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to add <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> into the hotbar.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_5_2_ct.cn: 请在快捷栏中<action=common_navigation_left><@gd.key>选择合适的位置</>，并按下<action=common_confirm>进行确认。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_5_2_ct.en: <action=common_navigation_left><@gd.key>Choose</> a suitable hotbar slot and press <action=common_confirm> to confirm.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_5_mb.cn: 请<@gd.key>长按中继器</>将其拿起，再拖动到快捷栏中。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_5_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap and hold the Relay Tower</> to pick it up and drag it into the hotbar.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_6.cn: 点击此处关闭背包，然后开展建设工作。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_6.en: Click here to close the Backpack and start constructing.

guide_text_ppole_qkbar_6_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_back>，关闭背包，然后开展建设工作。
guide_text_ppole_qkbar_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_back> to close the Backpack and start construction.

guide_text_pressure_switch_desc_1.cn: 利用感应开关，可以控制对应<@gd.key>浮块</>进行移动。
guide_text_pressure_switch_desc_1.en: Use pressure switches to control the movement of <@gd.key>floating blocks</>.

guide_text_pressure_switch_desc_2.cn: 主控干员踏上感应开关或将<@gd.key>悬浮箱子</>放置其上后，可以将其激活。主控干员离开或悬浮箱子移除则将其关闭。
guide_text_pressure_switch_desc_2.en: Activate pressure switches by having the controlled operator step on it, or by placing a <@gd.key>floating crate</> on top of it. Move the controlled operator or floating crate away to deactivate it.

guide_text_produce_equip1_1.cn: 您可以进行装备制造了。按下快捷键<action=common_switch_mode>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处切换到工业模式。
guide_text_produce_equip1_1.en: The gear assembly feature is now available. Press the hotkey <action=common_switch_mode> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to switch to AIC Mode.

guide_text_produce_equip1_1_ct.cn: 您可以进行装备制造了。请按下<action=common_switch_mode>，切换为<@gd.key>工业模式</>。
guide_text_produce_equip1_1_ct.en: The gear assembly feature is now available. Press <action=common_switch_mode> to switch to <@gd.key>AIC Mode</>.

guide_text_produce_equip1_1_mb.cn: 您可以进行装备制造了。请点击此处切换到工业模式。
guide_text_produce_equip1_1_mb.en: The gear assembly feature is now available. Tap here to switch to AIC Mode.

guide_text_produce_equip1_2.cn: 按下快捷键<action=fac_open_equip_producer>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，即可进行<@gd.key>装备制造</>。
guide_text_produce_equip1_2.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_open_equip_producer> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to start <@gd.key>gear assembly</>.

guide_text_produce_equip1_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=fac_main_right_active>并选中此项，进入<@gd.key>装备制造</>界面。
guide_text_produce_equip1_2_ct.en: Press <action=fac_main_right_active> and select this to open the <@gd.key>gear assembly</> screen.

guide_text_produce_equip1_2_mb.cn: 请点击此处，即可进行<@gd.key>装备制造</>。

guide_text_produce_equip1_3_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to open the <@gd.key>gear assembly</> screen.

guide_text_produce_equip2_1.cn: 可通过集成工业系统来制造各种装备，以提高干员的战斗力。
guide_text_produce_equip2_1.en: Use the AIC to assemble various kinds of gear to improve the operators' combat performance.

guide_text_produce_equip2_2_1.cn: 可在此处预览到该件装备的属性。
guide_text_produce_equip2_2_1.en: This shows the stats of this piece of gear.

guide_text_produce_equip2_3.cn: 制造<@gd.key>简易护甲</>需要<@gd.key>原木</>和<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。

guide_text_produce_equip2_4.cn:
<@gd.key>原木</>可以在世界中采集获取。
可使用<@gd.key>扫描</>标记出能够获取<@gd.key>原木</>的树木。
guide_text_produce_equip2_4.en: <@gd.key>Wood</> can be gathered from the wilderness. Perform <@gd.key>scans</> to mark the trees that can provide <@gd.key>Wood</>.

guide_text_produce_equip2_6.cn: 晶体外壳可由<@gd.key>源矿</>在<@gd.key>精炼炉</>中生产获取。
guide_text_produce_equip2_6.en: Origocrust can be produced by placing <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> in the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_produce_equip2_7.cn: 当前材料充足，点击此处，即可制造该件装备。
guide_text_produce_equip2_7.en: There are enough materials. Click here to assemble this piece of gear.

guide_text_produce_equip2_7_ct.cn: 当前材料充足，按下<action=common_confirm>，即可制造该件装备。
guide_text_produce_equip2_7_ct.en: There are enough materials. Press <action=common_confirm> to assemble this piece of gear.

guide_text_produce_equip2_8.cn: 当材料充足后，即可制造该件装备。
guide_text_produce_equip2_8.en: There are enough materials to assemble this piece of gear.

guide_text_prts_1.cn: 情报档案库已开放，可在此处进入。
guide_text_prts_1.en: The Intel Archive is now unlocked. Access it from here.

guide_text_prts_2.cn: 情报档案库是由终末地情报办公室S.O.W.维护的信息系统。
guide_text_prts_2.en: The Intel Archive is a data system maintained by the Endfield Intel Office SOW.

guide_text_prts_3.cn: 您在塔卫二收集到的各类信息，会上传至<@gd.key>见闻辑录</>。
guide_text_prts_3.en: Various intel gathered in Talos-II will be uploaded to the <@gd.key>Findings</> section.

guide_text_prts_3_1.cn: 其中待分析的重要情报，会整理至<@gd.key>情报采集</>。
guide_text_prts_3_1.en: Key intel to be analyzed will be compiled in the <@gd.key>Intel Gathering</> section.

guide_text_prts_4.cn: <@gd.key>中枢档案</>归档了终末地的部分官方档案。
guide_text_prts_4.en: The <@gd.key>Nexus Files</> is a library of a number of Endfield official documents.

guide_text_prts_4_ct.cn: <@gd.key>中枢档案</>归档了终末地的部分官方档案。请按下<action=common_confirm>查看。
guide_text_prts_4_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Nexus Files</> is a library of a number of Endfield official documents. Press <action=common_confirm> to view it.

guide_text_prts_5.cn: 除了您收到的集成工业系统介绍，您还可以查阅其他文档。
guide_text_prts_5.en: In addition to the introduction of the AIC Factory recently gathered, this feature also allows the user to peruse other documents.

guide_text_prts_comment_1.cn: 请点击此处，进入情报采集。
guide_text_prts_comment_1.en: Click here to enter Intel Gathering.

guide_text_prts_comment_2.cn: 比如在<@gd.key>基建前站搜救信息</>背后，还有很多信息值得我们去调查。
guide_text_prts_comment_2.en: For example, the <@gd.key>Infra-Station Search and Rescue Brief</> has a lot of information we can look into.

guide_text_prts_comment_2_ct.cn:
比如在<@gd.key>基建前站搜救信息</>背后，还有很多信息值得我们去调查。
请按下<action=common_confirm>查看。
guide_text_prts_comment_2_ct.en: For example, the <@gd.key>Infra-Station Search and Rescue Brief</> has a lot of information we can look into. Press <action=common_confirm> to view it.

guide_text_prts_comment_3.cn: 点击此处，进入事件调查界面
guide_text_prts_comment_3.en: Click here to enter the Incident Investigation screen.

guide_text_prts_comment_3_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_confirm>，进入事件调查界面
guide_text_prts_comment_3_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to enter the Incident Investigation screen.

guide_text_prts_comment_4.cn: 点击此处，还可查看事件调查的<@gd.key>批注更新</>，了解更多事件细节。
guide_text_prts_comment_4.en: Click here to view the <@gd.key>updated comments</> of the incident investigation and learn more about the incident.

guide_text_prts_comment_4_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_touchpanel>，还可查看事件调查的<@gd.key>批注更新</>，了解更多事件细节。
guide_text_prts_comment_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_touchpanel> to view the <@gd.key>updated comments</> of the incident investigation and learn more about the incident.

guide_text_prts_ducument_1.cn: 塔卫二上的许多信息有着千丝万缕的关联。
guide_text_prts_ducument_1.en: Many pieces of information found on Talos-II might be connected with each other.

guide_text_prts_ducument_2.cn: 每一个事件背后，还有很多信息值得我们去调查
guide_text_prts_ducument_2.en: Every incident has plenty of underlying information for us to investigate.

guide_text_prts_ducument_3.cn: 您可以收集并上传该事件的相关线索。
guide_text_prts_ducument_3.en: Various clues of this incident can be gathered and uploaded.

guide_text_prts_ducument_4.cn: S.O.W.的情报人员会在分析后，给到您该事件的详细调查报告。
guide_text_prts_ducument_4.en: SOW intel officers will analyze the gathered intel and provide a detailed investigation report afterwards.

guide_text_prts_submit_1.cn: 请按下<action=common_open_watch>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开协议同步器。
guide_text_prts_submit_1.en: Press <action=common_open_watch> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Protosync.

guide_text_prts_submit_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_open_watch>，打开协议同步器。

guide_text_prts_submit_2.cn: 请点击此处，进入档案库。

guide_text_prts_submit_3.cn: 请点击此处，进入情报采集。
guide_text_prts_submit_3.en: Click here to enter Intel Gathering.

guide_text_prts_submit_4.cn: 请点击此处，进入事件调查界面。
guide_text_prts_submit_4.en: Click here to enter the Incident Investigation screen.

guide_text_prts_submit_4_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，进入事件调查界面。
guide_text_prts_submit_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to enter the Incident Investigation screen.

guide_text_prts_submit_5.cn: 点击此处，可将调查结果进行<@gd.key>提交</>，获得详细调查报告。
guide_text_prts_submit_5.en: Click here to <@gd.key>submit</> the investigation results and get a detailed investigation report (IR).

guide_text_prts_submit_5_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_function_btn_1>，可将调查结果进行<@gd.key>提交</>，获得详细调查报告。
guide_text_prts_submit_5_ct.en: Press <action=common_function_btn_1> to <@gd.key>submit</> the investigation results and get a detailed investigation report (IR).

guide_text_pump_power_hint.cn: 请将<@gd.key>息壤中继器</>或<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>放置在水泵和给水器旁边，电力设备会<@gd.key>自动接入电网</>，为设备供电。
guide_text_pump_power_hint.en: Place the <@gd.key>Xiranite Relay</> or <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</> next to the Fluid Pump and Fluid Supply Unit. The Xiranite Relay and Pylon will <@gd.key>auto-connect to the power grid</> and supply power to the facilities.

guide_text_pump_put_1.cn: 水泵已经存放在背包中。可按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_pump_put_1.en: The Fluid Pump is now in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_pump_put_1_ct.cn: 水泵已经存放在背包中。可通过按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>，打开背包。
guide_text_pump_put_1_ct.en: The Fluid Pump is now in the Backpack. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</> and open the Backpack.

guide_text_pump_put_1_full.cn: 背包已满，<@gd.key>水泵</>等设备已放入<@gd.key>武陵仓库</>，请前往集成核心区域从仓库中取出。
guide_text_pump_put_1_full.en: Backpack is full. The <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> has been placed in the <@gd.key>Wuling Depot</>. Go to the Core AIC Area to retrieve it from the Depot.

guide_text_pump_put_1_mb.cn: 水泵已经存放在背包中。可点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_pump_put_1_mb.en: The Fluid Pump is now in the Backpack. Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_pump_put_2.cn: 可在背包中找到水泵，并将其放入下方快捷栏中或者直接进行放置。
guide_text_pump_put_2.en: Find the Fluid Pump in the Backpack, then drag it into the hotbar below, or simply place it directly from the Backpack.

guide_text_pump_put_3.cn:
按照提示，移动并使用鼠标<image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>转动视角将<@gd.key>水泵</>移动到<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
并且可按下<action=fac_rotate_device>旋转设备，使水泵的抽水口插入水体中。
guide_text_pump_put_3.en: Follow the instructions. Move and adjust the view with the mouse <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3> to move the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>. Press <action=fac_rotate_device> to rotate the facility so that the water inlet of the Fluid Pump is in the body of water.

guide_text_pump_put_3_ct.cn:
按照提示，移动并转动视角，将<@gd.key>水泵</>移动到<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
并且可按下<action=fac_rotate_device>旋转设备，使水泵的抽水口插入水体中。
guide_text_pump_put_3_ct.en: Follow the instructions. Move and adjust the view to move the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>. Press <action=fac_rotate_device> to rotate the facility so that the water inlet of the Fluid Pump is in the body of water.

guide_text_pump_put_3_mb.cn:
按照提示，请移动并划动屏幕转动视角，将<@gd.key>水泵</>移动到<@gd.key>虚影位置</>。
并且可旋转设备，使水泵的抽水口插入水体中。
guide_text_pump_put_3_mb.en: Follow the instructions. Move and adjust the view by sliding the screen to move the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to the <@gd.key>hologram</>. Rotate the facility so that the water inlet of the Fluid Pump is in the body of water.

guide_text_purification_device_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>触碰</>后能为全队<@gd.key>恢复生命值</>，<@gd.key>已断联的干员能够直接归队</>。
guide_text_purification_device_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Touch</> healing nodules to <@gd.key>restore HP</> for the entire team and <@gd.key>revive disconnected teammates</>.

guide_text_pushedbox_desc_1.cn: 当悬浮箱子被移动至感应开关上方，并停止激活后，感应开关便会启动。
guide_text_pushedbox_desc_1.en: Move the floating crate above the pressure switch, then drop the crate onto the switch to activate it.

guide_text_recycle_station_desc_1.cn: 资源回收站在解锁后会定期回收资源。当资源装满后靠近，货箱会升起，与其交互可以收取全部资源。
guide_text_recycle_station_desc_1.en: Unlocked Recycling Stations will regularly recycle resources. Approach a full Recycling Station to raise its material cache. Interact with it to gather all recycled resources.

guide_text_recycle_station_desc_2.cn: 消耗对应地区的调度券可解锁、升级资源回收站，从而激活其功能，提升所收取资源的价值。
guide_text_recycle_station_desc_2.en: Spend regional stock bills to unlock and upgrade Recycling Stations. This activates its recycling functions and improves the quality of the resources that can be gathered.

guide_text_repair_des_1.cn:
在探索中，可能会碰到已经损坏的设备需要<@gd.key>修复</>。
消耗对应材料完成<@gd.key>修复</>后，设备就可以正常使用了。
guide_text_repair_des_1.en: Damaged facilities in need of <@gd.key>repairs</> might be found during exploration. Spend the required materials to <@gd.key>repair</> them and restore their proper operations.

guide_text_restoration_desc_1.cn:
您可以利用自己的源石权限重构已损坏的源石电路。
将右侧源石电路组件通过移动与旋转，放置到源石电路上，满足对应行列的格数需求。
guide_text_restoration_desc_1.en: Use the Endministrator's Originium authority to repair and reconstruct damaged Originium circuits. Move and rotate Originium components from the right, then place them on the circuit board to match the number of tiles needed by each column and row.

guide_text_restoration_desc_2.cn: 在某些特定的地点，您会回忆起一些特殊电路组件的修复方式。
guide_text_restoration_desc_2.en: Certain locations or pickups help the Endministrator recall special circuitry components and how to repair them.

guide_text_rope_desc_1.cn: 靠近并进行<@gd.key>交互</>后，即可搭乘绳索，<@gd.key>前往高处</>。
guide_text_rope_desc_1.en: Approach and <@gd.key>interact</> with a rope to use it to <@gd.key>reach higher places</>.

guide_text_rope_desc_2.cn: 部分绳索初始处于<@gd.key>不可用状态</>，需要先从<@gd.key>上方装置放下绳索后</>才可使用。
guide_text_rope_desc_2.en: Some ropes are initially <@gd.key>unusable</>. Find the <@gd.key>rope device at the top and lower the rope</> to use it.

guide_text_scan_des_1.cn: 在探索中，可按下<action=general_ability_release><@gd.key>扫描</>按键进行扫描，获得周围事物的信息。
guide_text_scan_des_1.en: During exploration, press <action=general_ability_release><@gd.key>Scan</> button to perform scanning and acquire information about nearby objects.

guide_text_scan_des_1_mb.cn: 在探索中，可按下<@gd.key>便捷工具</>键进行<@gd.key>扫描</>，获得周围事物的信息。
guide_text_scan_des_1_mb.en: During exploration, tap the <@gd.key>Easy Tools</> button to perform a <@gd.key>Scan</> and acquire information about nearby objects.

guide_text_scan_des_2.cn: 普通可交互物会被标记为<@fac.blue>蓝色</>，任务相关的物品或信息会被标记为<@gd.key>黄色</>。
guide_text_scan_des_2.en: Common interactables will be marked <@fac.blue>blue</> while mission-related items or information will be marked <@gd.key>yellow</>.

guide_text_scan_des_3.cn: 扫描采集物或矿点时，可发现被扫描的采集物或矿点的<@gd.key>规模等级</>。
guide_text_scan_des_3.en: Scan gatherables and mining spots to reveal their <@gd.key>resource richness</>.

guide_text_scan_des_4.cn: <@gd.key>便捷工具</>键有多种能力可供选择，如<@gd.key>拍照</>，可<@gd.key>长按</>便捷工具键进行切换。
guide_text_scan_des_4.en: The <@gd.key>Easy Tools</> button opens up many in-game actions to choose from, including <@gd.key>Camera</>. <@gd.key>Press and hold</> the Easy Tools button to switch its action.

guide_text_scan_find_desc_1.cn:
协议同步器可以提供待寻找的特定目标物的大致位置，使用<@gd.key>扫描</>功能，可以探测其具体方位。
距离目标越近，扫描得到的反馈信号越强。
guide_text_scan_find_desc_1.en: The Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) can detect the presence of special target objects. Perform <@gd.key>scans</> to detect their approximate locations. Protosync responses get stronger as one approaches the objective.

guide_text_scan_hint.cn:
可以按下<action=general_ability_release>使用扫描，标记周围的<@gd.key>可交互物</>。
如果当前便捷工具不是扫描，可<@gd.key>长按</>快捷键<action=general_ability_release>切换至扫描。
guide_text_scan_hint.en: Press <action=general_ability_release> to scan the area and mark nearby <@gd.key>interactables</>. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Scan, <@gd.key>long-press</> the hotkey <action=general_ability_release> to switch to it.

guide_text_scan_hint_2.cn:
可以按下<action=general_ability_release>使用扫描，暴露周围的<@gd.key>侵蚀核心</>。
如果当前便捷工具不是扫描，可<@gd.key>长按</>快捷键<action=general_ability_release>切换至扫描。
guide_text_scan_hint_2.en: Press <action=general_ability_release> to scan the area and expose nearby <@gd.key>Blight Cores</>. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Scan, <@gd.key>long-press</> the hotkey <action=general_ability_release> to switch to it.

guide_text_scan_hint_2_mb.cn:
可以点击此处使用扫描，暴露周围的<@gd.key>侵蚀核心</>。
如果当前便捷工具不是扫描，可<@gd.key>长按</>该便捷工具键切换至扫描。
guide_text_scan_hint_2_mb.en: Tap here to scan the area and expose nearby <@gd.key>Blight Cores</>. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Scan, <@gd.key>tap and hold</> the Easy Tools button to switch to it.

guide_text_scan_hint_3.cn:
可以按下<action=general_ability_release>使用扫描，标记周围的<@gd.key>线索</>。
如果当前便捷工具不是扫描，可<@gd.key>长按</>快捷键<action=general_ability_release>切换至扫描。
guide_text_scan_hint_3.en: Press <action=general_ability_release> to scan the area and mark nearby <@gd.key>clues</>. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Scan, <@gd.key>long-press</> the hotkey <action=general_ability_release> to switch to it.

guide_text_scan_hint_3_mb.cn:
可以点击此处使用扫描，暴露周围的<@gd.key>线索</>。
如果当前便捷工具不是扫描，可<@gd.key>长按</>该便捷工具键切换至扫描。
guide_text_scan_hint_3_mb.en: Tap here to scan the area and expose nearby <@gd.key>clues</>. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Scan, <@gd.key>tap and hold</> the Easy Tools button to switch to it.

guide_text_scan_hint_mb.cn:
可以点击此处使用扫描，标记周围的<@fac.blue>可交互物</>。
如果当前便捷工具不是扫描，可<@gd.key>长按</>该便捷工具键切换至扫描。
guide_text_scan_hint_mb.en: Tap here to scan the area and mark nearby <@fac.blue>interactables</>. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Scan, <@gd.key>tap and hold</> the Easy Tools button to switch to it.

guide_text_scan_intro_1.cn: 现已可使用<@gd.key>便捷工具</>键。
guide_text_scan_intro_1.en: The <@gd.key>Easy Tools</> button is now available.

guide_text_scan_intro_2.cn: <@gd.key>便捷工具</>键有多种能力可供选择，如<@gd.key>拍照</>，可<@gd.key>长按</><action=general_ability_press>进行切换。
guide_text_scan_intro_2.en: The <@gd.key>Easy Tools</> button opens up many in-game actions to choose from, including <@gd.key>Camera</>. <@gd.key>Long-press</> <action=general_ability_press> to switch the action.

guide_text_scan_intro_2_ct.cn: <@gd.key>便捷工具</>键有多种能力可供选择，如<@gd.key>拍照</>，可<@gd.key>长按</>便捷工具键进行切换。
guide_text_scan_intro_2_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Easy Tools</> button opens up many in-game actions to choose from, including <@gd.key>Camera</>. <@gd.key>Press and hold</> the Easy Tools button to switch its action.

guide_text_scan_intro_2_mb.cn: <@gd.key>便捷工具</>键有多种能力可供选择，如<@gd.key>拍照</>，可<@gd.key>长按</>此处进行切换。
guide_text_scan_intro_2_mb.en: The <@gd.key>Easy Tools</> button opens up many in-game actions to choose from, including <@gd.key>Camera</>. <@gd.key>Tap and hold</> here to switch its action.

guide_text_scan_intro_3.cn: 目前默认选择的是<@gd.key>扫描</>功能，请按下快捷键<action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进行扫描。
guide_text_scan_intro_3.en: The current default action is <@gd.key>Scan</>. Press the hotkey <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to scan.

guide_text_scan_intro_3_ct.cn: 目前默认选择的是<@gd.key>扫描</>功能，请<@gd.key>短按</><action=general_ability_release>进行扫描。
guide_text_scan_intro_3_ct.en: The current default action is <@gd.key>Scan</>. <@gd.key>Press</> <action=general_ability_release> to perform a scan.

guide_text_scan_intro_3_mb.cn: 目前默认选择的是<@gd.key>扫描</>功能，请点击此处进行扫描。
guide_text_scan_intro_3_mb.en: The current default action is <@gd.key>Scan</>. Tap here to perform a scan.

guide_text_second_energy_point_desc_1.cn:
超域能量聚集产生的奇异光团。
与其交互后，击败<@gd.key>被超域能量吸引的敌人</>，可获取奖励。
guide_text_second_energy_point_desc_1.en: Strange masses of light emitted by a localized concentration of Æther. Interact with it and defeat the <@gd.key>enemies attracted by the Æther</> to earn rewards.

guide_text_second_energy_point_desc_2.cn:
超域能量聚集产生的奇异光团。
扫描暂存能量淤积点可以<@gd.key>查看敌人的数量和强度</>。
guide_text_second_energy_point_desc_2.en: Strange masses of light emitted by a localized concentration of Æther. Temporary Energy Alluvium can be scanned to <@gd.key>view the number and strengths of the enemies</>.

guide_text_seedcol_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>采种机</>可对非稀有植物进行采种，产出相应的植物种子。
典型产物为<#item.plantMossSeed1>荞花种子</>，由<#item.plantMoss1>荞花</>放入<@gd.key>采种机</>后生产获得。
guide_text_seedcol_intro_desc_1.en:
The <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> can pick seeds from common plants. 
Typical product: <#item.plantMossSeed1>Buckflower Seed</>, picked from <#item.plantMoss1>Buckflowers</> placed in the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</>.

guide_text_seedcol_intro_desc_2.cn:
部分无法快速种植的稀有作物也可通过<@gd.key>采种机</>进行采种。
典型产物为<#item.plantSpSeed1>灰芦麦种子</>，由<#item.plantSp1>灰芦麦</>放入<@gd.key>采种机</>生产获得。
guide_text_seedcol_intro_desc_2.en:
Use <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Units</> to pick seeds from rare plants that cannot be grown quickly. 
Typical product: <#item.plantSpSeed1>Reed Rye Seed</>, picked from <#item.plantSp1>Reed Rye</> placed in the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</>.

guide_text_seesaw_desc.cn: 踩上活动翘板的一边时，另一边会升高。可以在倾斜时快速通过，前往更高处。
guide_text_seesaw_desc.en: Stand on one side of the Seesaw Ramp to make the opposite end rise, then quickly run to the opposite end to reach a higher place.

guide_text_seraph_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 赛希的战技会召唤<@ba.key>支援晶体</>，在主控干员对敌人造成<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>时为其回复生命值。
guide_text_seraph_chartrain01_02_1.en: Xaihi's battle skill summons an <@ba.key>Auxiliary Crystal</>. When the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on the enemy, the crystal restores the said operator's HP.

guide_text_seraph_chartrain01_02_2.cn: <@ba.key>支援晶体</>在生命回复次数耗尽后消失。
guide_text_seraph_chartrain01_02_2.en: The <@ba.key>Auxiliary Crystal</> disappears after using up its HP restoration charges.

guide_text_seraph_chartrain01_03_1.cn: <@ba.key>支援晶体</>在次数耗尽时，可以触发赛希的连携技，对敌人造成伤害并施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>。
guide_text_seraph_chartrain01_03_1.en: Xaihi's combo skill is triggered when the <@ba.key>Auxiliary Crystal</> uses up its HP restoration charges. The skill deals DMG and applies <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> to enemies.

guide_text_seraph_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 赛希的终结技会对全队施加一段时间的<#ba.crystenhance>寒冷增幅</>和<#ba.naturalenhance>自然增幅</>。让全队造成的寒冷伤害和自然伤害提高。
guide_text_seraph_chartrain01_04_1.en: Xaihi's ultimate grants temporary <#ba.crystenhance>Cryo Amp</> and <#ba.naturalenhance>Nature Amp</> to the entire team. The team thus deals more Cryo DMG and Nature DMG.

guide_text_settlement2_level2_hint.cn:
据点基建前站的发展值已达当前<@gd.key>据点上限</>。
可以前往查看据点相关任务，完成后可提升据点到<@gd.key>更高发展阶段</>。
guide_text_settlement2_level2_hint.en: The Infra-Station outpost has reached its current <@gd.key>prosperity limit</>. Go and view the outpost mission, then complete the mission to raise the outpost to a <@gd.key>higher prosperity level</>.

guide_text_settlement3_level2_hint.cn:
据点重建指挥部的发展值已达当前<@gd.key>据点上限</>。
可以前往查看据点相关任务，完成后可提升据点到<@gd.key>更高发展阶段</>。
guide_text_settlement3_level2_hint.en: The Reconstruction HQ outpost has reached its current <@gd.key>prosperity limit</>. Go and view the outpost mission, then complete the mission to raise the outpost to a <@gd.key>higher prosperity level</>.

guide_text_settlement4_level2_hint.cn:
据点天王坪援建点的发展值已达当前<@gd.key>据点上限</>。
可以前往查看据点相关任务，完成后可提升据点到<@gd.key>更高发展阶段</>。
guide_text_settlement4_level2_hint.en: The Sky King Flats Construction Site outpost has reached its current <@gd.key>prosperity limit</>. Go and view the outpost mission, then complete the mission to raise the outpost to a <@gd.key>higher prosperity level</>.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_1.cn:
据点居民会进行生产活动，<@gd.key>逐渐积累调度券</>，存储于此。
我们提供据点所需的货物，以换取<@gd.key>调度券</>。
guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_1.en: Outpost residents will work, <@gd.key>slowly earn stock bills</>, and deposit them here as reserves. Supply the outpost with the goods it needs to earn these <@gd.key>stock bills</>.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_2.cn: 当<@gd.key>调度券</>存量被消耗完毕时，无法再和据点交易货物，需要等待调度券积累后再次交易。
guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_2.en: An outpost with zero <@gd.key>stock bill</> reserves can no longer trade. Wait for the outpost to earn and deposit more stock bills to trade with it again.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_3.cn: 这里可以查看当前据点和终末地的联络信息。
guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_3.en: This shows the liaison information between the current outpost and Endfield.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_3_ct.cn: 这里可以查看当前据点和终末地的联络信息，请按下<action=settlement_main_change_officer>前往。
guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_3_ct.en: This shows the liaison information between the current outpost and Endfield. Press <action=settlement_main_change_officer> to go.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_4.cn: 可以为每个据点选择一位联络干员，符合据点特质的联络干员可以<@gd.key>提高据点订单报酬的获取效率</>。
guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_4.en: An operator can be selected to serve as a liaison to the outpost. A liaison who matches the properties of an outpost can <@gd.key>boost outpost order acquisition and order payments</>.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_5.cn: 点击安排选中的干员派驻据点。
guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_5.en: Click to assign the selected operator to the outpost.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_5_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_confirm>安排选中的干员派驻据点。
guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_5_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to assign an operator as the outpost liaison.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_6.en: Click here to close the screen.

guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_7.cn: 可以在此处查看<@gd.key>干员派驻</>带来的加成。
guide_text_settlement_char_garrison_7.en: This shows the bonuses provided by the <@gd.key>assigned operator</>.

guide_text_settlement_defense_end_1.cn: 完成干员介入作战后，据点内可以布置的<@gd.key>作战设备数量上限</>增加了，这将对未来的防御有很大帮助。
guide_text_settlement_defense_end_1.en: Completing the Operator Intervention battle increases the <@gd.key>combat facilities placement limit</> of this outpost. This will greatly benefit future defense battles.

guide_text_settlement_defense_end_2.cn: 据点进入<@gd.key>短期安全</>，一段时间内不会遭受威胁了，安全的据点环境会使得据点<@gd.key>积累调度券的效率</>增加。
guide_text_settlement_defense_end_2.en: The outpost is now <@gd.key>Partially Secure</> and will not be threatened for a while. A secure outpost will <@gd.key>earn stock bills at greater efficiency</>.

guide_text_settlement_defense_minimap_1.cn: 这里是据点区域的实时动态地图，按下<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_m" scale=1.3>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处可打开详细地图。
guide_text_settlement_defense_minimap_1.en: This is the dynamic map of this outpost. Press <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_m" scale=1.3> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the detailed map.

guide_text_settlement_defense_minimap_1_.cn: 这里是据点区域的实时动态地图，按下<action=common_open_map>可打开详细地图。
guide_text_settlement_defense_minimap_1_.en: This is the dynamic map of this outpost. Press <action=common_open_map> to open the detailed map.

guide_text_settlement_defense_minimap_1_.cn: 这里是据点区域的实时动态地图，点击此处可打开详细地图。
guide_text_settlement_defense_minimap_1_.en: This is the dynamic map of this outpost. Tap here to open the detailed map.

guide_text_settlement_defense_opening_1.cn: 入侵者已经逼近据点了，务必在敌人抵达终点前消灭他们。
guide_text_settlement_defense_opening_1.en: The invaders are approaching the outpost. Defeat them before they reach their objectives.

guide_text_settlement_defense_prepare2_1.cn: 本次作战计划<@gd.key>干员无法参战</>，但据点内可放的作战设备数量增加了，请使用作战设备完成作战。
guide_text_settlement_defense_prepare2_1.en: <@gd.key>Operators cannot intervene</> in this defense battle but more combat facilities can be placed in this outpost. Complete this battle with just combat facilities.

guide_text_settlement_defense_prepare_1.cn: 参考敌人的入侵路线，活用作战设备，做好防守准备后，按下<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_enter" scale=1.3>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击<@gd.key>开始作战</>。
guide_text_settlement_defense_prepare_1.en: Study the enemy's attack route, prepare outpost defenses with combat facilities, then press <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_enter" scale=1.3> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click <@gd.key>Start Battle</>.

guide_text_settlement_defense_prepare_1_.cn: 参考敌人的入侵路线，活用作战设备，做好防守准备后，按下<action=settlement_defense_start_battle><@gd.key>开始作战</>。
guide_text_settlement_defense_prepare_1_.en: Study the enemy's attack route, prepare outpost defenses with combat facilities, then press <action=settlement_defense_start_battle> to <@gd.key>Start Battle</>.

guide_text_settlement_defense_prepare_1_.cn: 参考敌人的入侵路线，活用作战设备，做好防守准备后，请点击<@gd.key>开始作战</>。
guide_text_settlement_defense_prepare_1_.en: Study the enemy's attack route, prepare the defenses with combat facilities, and then tap <@gd.key>Start Battle</>.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_1.cn: 完成干员介入作战后，据点会进入<@gd.key>短期安全</>，持续时间结束后会回到<@gd.key>面临入侵威胁</>。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_1.en: Completing the Operator Intervention battle grants a temporary <@gd.key>Partially Secure</> status to the outpost. Once the status ends, the outpost will return to the <@gd.key>Imminent Incursion</> status once more.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_2.cn: 在短期安全状态期间，<@gd.key>据点积累调度券的效率</>会增加。在这里可以查看加成数值。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_2.en: During the Partially Secure safe time, the outpost will <@gd.key>earn stock bills at greater efficiency</>. This shows the degree of the bonus.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_2_0.cn: 短期安全及其加成的持续时间可以在此处查看。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_2_0.en: Check here for details on the Partially Secure bonuses and duration.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_2_1.cn: 在短期安全<@gd.key>倒计时结束</>后，据点又会回到<@gd.key>面临入侵威胁</>状态，调度券积累效率会下降回面临威胁的水平。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_2_1.en: Once the Partially Secure <@gd.key>countdown</> ends, the outpost will return to the <@gd.key>Imminent Incursion</> status once more, and stock bill earning efficiency will drop to pre-secure levels.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_3.cn: 相同风险度的入侵，完成干员介入作战后，会开启<@gd.key>自动防御</>模式。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_3.en: After completing an Operator Intervention battle at a certain risk level, the <@gd.key>Auto-Defense</> mode will be unlocked for that risk level.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_4.cn: 在终末地干员不干预的情况下，靠设备自动完成防护战斗，同样的入侵者就不会再对据点造成威胁了。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_4.en: Auto-Defense mode only allows the use of combat facilities, and no Endfield operators may intervene. Complete an incursion in Auto-Defense mode to completely neutralize the threat to the outpost for that risk level.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_5.cn: <@gd.key>自动防御</>完成后，积累调度券的增益将从限时变为<@gd.key>永久</>增加。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_5.en: Completing <@gd.key>Auto-Defense</> turns the temporary stock bill earning bonus into a <@gd.key>permanent</> bonus.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_6.cn: 尝试进行自动防御作战吧。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar2_6.en: Try and complete the defense battles in Auto-Defense mode.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_1.cn: 我们设立的各个据点中，有一部分会<@gd.key>面临敌人入侵威胁</>，这会使得该据点居民的生活遭受影响，请帮助他们解除威胁。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_1.en: A number of our outposts may <@gd.key>face enemy incursions</> and this would affect the livelihood of the outpost residents. Help them neutralize the threat.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_2.cn: <@gd.key>预警终端</>的作用是分析据点受威胁状态，并给出<@gd.key>区域防护作战</>指示。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_2.en: The function of the <@gd.key>Early Warning Terminal</> is to analyze potential threats to the outpost and issue orders for <@gd.key>Area Defense</> battles.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_3.cn: <@gd.key>对应据点的等级提升</>后，会产生威胁并列在此处，<@gd.key>风险度</>代表预计入侵敌人的实力，风险度越高，防护作战越难。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_3.en: <@gd.key>Leveling up the outpost</> also attracts risk of incursions which is indicated here. <@gd.key>Risk level</> represents the strength of the enemy force. Area Defense battles will be more difficult at higher risk levels.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_4.cn: 观察地图，<@gd.key>蓝色点</>代表入侵者意图掠夺或摧毁的目标，<@gd.key>红色点与红色路线</>是预警终端预测的入侵路线。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_4.en: Study the map. The <@gd.key>blue spot</> marks the target the invaders would try to raid or destroy, while the <@gd.key>red spot and red line</> indicate the incursion path predicted by the Early Warning Terminal.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_5.cn: 一旦敌人进攻，入侵者数量会很多，有效使用工业<@gd.key>作战设备</>才能防护据点，推荐使用这些设备应对。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_5.en: The invading enemies will come in large numbers. Make effective use of <@gd.key>combat facilities</> to defend the outpost. Try to use them to beat back the invaders.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_6.cn: 这里可以查看入侵者的情报。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_6.en: This is the intel about the invaders.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_6_ct.cn: 按下<action=settlement_defense_open_enemy_info>可以查看入侵者的情报。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_6_ct.en: Press <action=settlement_defense_open_enemy_info> to view the intel about the invaders.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_7.cn: 这里有一些入侵者能力的说明，<@gd.key>有些入侵者具有危险的能力</>，请务必在作战前查看。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_7.en: This shows details on the invaders. <@gd.key>Some invaders have dangerous skills</> so reviewing such details before battle is a must.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_8_ct.en: Press <action=common_back> to close the intel screen.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_9.cn: 按下<@gd.key>开始准备</>，回到据点中做好作战准备。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_9.en: Press <@gd.key>Place Defenses</> to return to the outpost and prepare for battle.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_9_ct.cn: 按下<action=settlement_defense_start><@gd.key>开始准备</>，回到据点中做好作战准备。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_9_ct.en: Press <action=settlement_defense_start><@gd.key>Place Defenses</> to return to the outpost and prepare for battle.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_hint.cn:
<@gd.key>预警终端</>处已出现新的入侵预警，请前往据点内的<@gd.key>预警终端</>查看。
完成作战，据点进入安全状态后，<@gd.key>积累调度券的效率</>会进一步增加。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_hint.en: A new invasion alert has been detected by the <@gd.key>Early Warning Terminal</> (EWT). Go to the outpost and interact with this <@gd.key>EWT</> to view the details. Once the Area Defense battle is completed, the outpost will become Secure and enjoy a boost to its <@gd.key>stock bills earning efficiency</>.

guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_hint.cn:
此据点中已设立了<@gd.key>预警终端</>，已出现新的入侵预警，请前往查看。
完成作战，据点进入安全状态后，<@gd.key>积累调度券的效率</>会增加。
guide_text_settlement_defense_radar_hint.en: This outpost has an <@gd.key>Early Warning Terminal</> (EWT) and it has picked up a new invasion alert. Go to the outpost and interact with the EWT to view the details. Once the Area Defense battle is completed, the outpost will become Secure and enjoy a boost to its <@gd.key>stock bills earning efficiency</>.

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_1.cn: 这里可查看据点调度券生产增益详情。
guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_1.en: This shows details on the outpost's stock bill earning bonus.

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_1_ct.cn: 按下<action=settlement_defense_open_buff_details>可查看据点调度券生产增益详情。
guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_1_ct.en: Press <action=settlement_defense_open_buff_details> to show details on the outpost's stock bill earning bonus.

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_2.cn: 可在此处查看完成区域防护作战后带来的增益详情。完成<@gd.key>更高风险度的自动防御</>，会获得更高的永久增益。
guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_2.en: This shows details on the bonuses that can be provided after completing the Area Defense battle. Completing the <@gd.key>more challenging Auto-Defense mode</> will provide a permanent bonus that is much better as well.

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_4.cn: 请按下<action=mainhud_open_domain>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_4.en: Press <action=mainhud_open_domain> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and press here to open the <@gd.key>Regional Development</> screen.

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_4_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_4_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to open <@gd.key>Regional Development</>.

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_4_mb.cn: 请点击此处，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_6.cn: 这里可以查看据点积累调度券增益详情。
guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_6.en: This shows details on the outpost's stock bill earning bonuses.

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_6_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_touch_panel_menu_no_hint>可以查看据点积累调度券增益详情。
guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_touch_panel_menu_no_hint> to view details on the outpost's stock bill earning bonuses.

guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_7.cn: 这里罗列了当前所有增益，刚刚完成<@gd.key>区域防护作战</>后带来的调度券效率增益也列于此处。当更高风险度入侵预警发生时，及时完成<@gd.key>区域防护作战</>将获得更高增益。
guide_text_settlement_defense_sum_7.en: This lists all currently effective bonuses. The stock bill earning efficiency bonus from completing the <@gd.key>Area Defense</> just now is also included here. When an incursion of higher risk level occurs, complete the <@gd.key>Area Defense</> battle to acquire better bonuses.

guide_text_settlement_desc_1.cn: 为<@gd.key>难民暂居处</>持续提供订单所需的产物，才能使其产出资源并获得发展。
guide_text_settlement_desc_1.en: Keep supplying products listed in the orders of the <@gd.key>Refugee Camp</> outpost to make it generate resources and become more prosperous.

guide_text_settlement_desc_2.cn: 研究工业发展规划，并建设集成工业系统，才能持续为据点供货，提升地区建设等级。
guide_text_settlement_desc_2.en: Research AIC Factory Plan technologies to expand the AIC Factory. Only then can the AIC Factory supply the outposts with goods and raise Regional Development Levels.

guide_text_settlement_desc_3.cn: 当据点供货不足、发展停滞时，据点会出现<@gd.key>异常状态标识</>提示，提醒您及时关注据点发展状态。
guide_text_settlement_desc_3.en: An outpost will display an <@gd.key>abnormal status icon</> when low on supplies or experiencing slow or no development. It is a reminder for checking the outpost prosperity.

guide_text_settlement_intro_1.cn: 可通过与索斯交流进行<@gd.key>据点管理</>。
guide_text_settlement_intro_1.en: Talk to Soth to <@gd.key>manage the outpost</>.

guide_text_settlement_leader_1.cn: 除了通过地区建设系统管理据点外，同样也可从据点负责人索斯处进入<@gd.key>据点管理</>。
guide_text_settlement_leader_1.en: Besides using the Regional Development System to manage the outpost, you can also talk to outpost manager Soth to open the <@gd.key>Outpost Management</> screen.

guide_text_settlement_level2_1.cn: 在我们的共同建设下，<@gd.key>难民暂居处</>已经成功升级。
guide_text_settlement_level2_1.en: Together, we have successfully raised the <@gd.key>Refugee Camp</> outpost to a new level of prosperity.

guide_text_settlement_level2_2.cn: 请点击此处，进入据点管理。
guide_text_settlement_level2_2.en: Click here to manage the outpost.

guide_text_settlement_level2_3.cn:
<@gd.key>难民暂居处</>在升级后，得到了进一步的发展。
基本的物资需求得到了保障，目前需求的货物种类也增加了。
guide_text_settlement_level2_3.en: The leveled up <@gd.key>Refugee Camp</> has grown and developed. The outpost has a secure source of basic supplies. It now requires a greater range of goods.

guide_text_settlement_level2_4.cn: 请点击此处，查看当前可供给的货物。
guide_text_settlement_level2_4.en: Click here to view the goods that can be supplied.

guide_text_settlement_level2_4_ct.cn: 请按下<action=settlement_main_change_item>，查看当前可供给的货物。
guide_text_settlement_level2_4_ct.en: Press <action=settlement_main_change_item> to view the goods that can be supplied.

guide_text_settlement_level2_5.cn:
当前已解锁更多可供给的货物。
供给<@gd.key>品质更高</>的货物，收获的单价也会更高。
guide_text_settlement_level2_5.en: More goods have been unlocked for outpost supplies. Supplying <@gd.key>higher quality</> goods also fetches a better price per unit.

guide_text_settlement_level2_6.cn:
如<@gd.key>优质荞愈胶囊</>，就是当前据点急需的货物。
可通过<@gd.key>推荐标记</>来判断当前推荐供给的货物。
guide_text_settlement_level2_6.en: <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [B]</> is an example of such goods now urgently needed by the outpost. Refer to the <@gd.key>recommendation tag</> to determine the best goods to supply currently.

guide_text_settlement_level2_7.cn: 请点击此处，查看<@gd.key>优质荞愈胶囊</>。

guide_text_settlement_level2_8.cn: 可在此处，查看<@gd.key>优质荞愈胶囊</>的制造方法。
guide_text_settlement_level2_8.en: This shows how to produce <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [B]</>.

guide_text_settlement_level2_hint.cn:
据点难民暂居处的发展值已达当前<@gd.key>据点上限</>。
可以前往查看据点相关任务，完成后可提升据点到<@gd.key>更高发展阶段</>。
guide_text_settlement_level2_hint.en: The Refugee Camp outpost has reached its current <@gd.key>prosperity limit</>. Go and view the outpost mission, then complete the mission to raise the outpost to a <@gd.key>higher prosperity level</>.

guide_text_settlement_levelup_1.cn: 通过与据点的持续货物交易，据点的发展值已经达到当前的<@gd.key>据点上限</>
guide_text_settlement_levelup_1.en: Continuous exchange of goods with the outpost has raised its prosperity to its current <@gd.key>limit</>.

guide_text_settlement_levelup_2.cn: 此时会有新的据点相关任务出现，当完成此类任务后，可提升据点到<@gd.key>更高发展阶段</>
guide_text_settlement_levelup_2.en: When that happens, a new outpost mission will appear. Complete the mission so that the outpost can be raised to <@gd.key>higher levels of prosperity</>.

guide_text_settlement_levelup_3.cn: 提升到更高发展阶段后，可以与据点交易<@gd.key>更高级的货物</>，也可获得<@gd.key>更多的调度券</>
guide_text_settlement_levelup_3.en: After attaining higher prosperity, the outpost can trade <@gd.key>more advanced goods</> and earn <@gd.key>more stock bills</>.

guide_text_settlement_levelup_4.cn: 点击此处可以前往据点相关任务
guide_text_settlement_levelup_4.en: Click here to check the outpost mission

guide_text_settlement_levelup_4_ct.cn: 按下<action=settlement_main_jump_mission>可以前往据点相关任务
guide_text_settlement_levelup_4_ct.en: Press <action=settlement_main_jump_mission> to check the outpost mission.

guide_text_settlement_levelup_5.cn: 完成此任务后，可提升据点到<@gd.key>更高发展阶段</>
guide_text_settlement_levelup_5.en: Complete this mission to raise the outpost to a <@gd.key>higher prosperity level</>

guide_text_settlement_open_hint_1.cn: 新据点<@gd.key>基建前站</>已开启，可在此处查看。
guide_text_settlement_open_hint_1.en: <@gd.key>Infra-Station</>, a new outpost, is now operational. View it here.

guide_text_settlement_supply_1.cn: <@gd.key>地区建设系统</>现已解锁，按下快捷键<action=mainhud_open_domain>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，进入地区建设系统界面。
guide_text_settlement_supply_1.en: The <@gd.key>Regional Development System</> has been unlocked. Press the hotkey <action=mainhud_open_domain> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Regional Development System screen.

guide_text_settlement_supply_10.cn: 每次供给货物，会换取本据点积累的<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>报酬。
guide_text_settlement_supply_10.en: Each supply of goods will be compensated with <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> accumulated at this outpost.

guide_text_settlement_supply_10_1.cn: 通过交易从据点换取的谷地调度券，无法超过据点当前<@gd.key>积累的上限</>。
guide_text_settlement_supply_10_1.en: The amount of Valley Stock Bills exchangeable from this outpost cannot exceed its current <@gd.key>stock bill savings</>.

guide_text_settlement_supply_11.cn: 获得的<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>会显示在这里。
guide_text_settlement_supply_11.en: This shows the amount of <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> acquired.

guide_text_settlement_supply_12.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>交易</>，完成一次货物交易。
guide_text_settlement_supply_12.en: Click <@gd.key>Trade</> to complete the trade of goods.

guide_text_settlement_supply_12_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，完成一次货物交易。
guide_text_settlement_supply_12_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to complete a transaction of goods.

guide_text_settlement_supply_13.cn: 成功获得了据点的<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>和<@gd.key>据点发展值</>，点击完成。
guide_text_settlement_supply_13.en: We successfully earned this outpost's <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> and the outpost gained <@gd.key>Outpost Prosperity</>. Click to complete.

guide_text_settlement_supply_13_1.cn: 当<@gd.key>仓库</>中拥有足够<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>时，可以在这里进行一次交易。
guide_text_settlement_supply_13_1.en: If the <@gd.key>Depot</> has enough <@gd.key>Origocrusts</>, use this screen to perform the trade.

guide_text_settlement_supply_13_ct.cn: 成功获得了据点的<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>和<@gd.key>据点发展值</>，按下<action=common_confirm>完成。
guide_text_settlement_supply_13_ct.en: We successfully earned this outpost's <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> and the outpost gained <@gd.key>Outpost Prosperity</>. Press <action=common_confirm> to complete.

guide_text_settlement_supply_14.cn: 顺利交易物资后，据点会得到进一步发展。每次成功交易货物，都可以增加<@gd.key>据点发展值</>。
guide_text_settlement_supply_14.en: The outpost gets a little more prosperous when the goods are successfully delivered. <@gd.key>Outpost Prosperity</> is earned with every trade.

guide_text_settlement_supply_15.cn: 据点获得足量<@gd.key>发展值</>后，会提升<@gd.key>发展阶段、扩大规模、并提供更多的交易报酬</>。
guide_text_settlement_supply_15.en: Once the outpost earns enough <@gd.key>Outpost Prosperity</>, its <@gd.key>Prosperity Level can be raised to expand its size and increase its trade payments</>.

guide_text_settlement_supply_16.cn: 点击这里回到地区建设系统界面。
guide_text_settlement_supply_16.en: Click here to return to the Regional Development System screen.

guide_text_settlement_supply_16_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_cancel>回到地区建设系统界面。
guide_text_settlement_supply_16_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to return to the Regional Development System screen.

guide_text_settlement_supply_17.cn: 关闭地区建设系统界面。
guide_text_settlement_supply_17.en: Close the Regional Development System screen.

guide_text_settlement_supply_17_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_cancel>关闭地区建设系统界面。
guide_text_settlement_supply_17_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the Regional Development System screen.

guide_text_settlement_supply_1_mb.cn:
<@gd.key>地区建设系统</>现已解锁。
点击此处进入地区建设系统界面。
guide_text_settlement_supply_1_mb.en: The <@gd.key>Regional Development System</> has been unlocked. Tap here to open the Regional Development System screen.

guide_text_settlement_supply_2.cn: 终末地的目标是建设发展塔卫二的各个地区，居民的<@gd.key>据点建设</>将是重要的一环。
guide_text_settlement_supply_2.en: The objective of Endfield is to develop various regions across Talos-II. The <@gd.key>Outpost Development Project</> is an essential part of this endeavor.

guide_text_settlement_supply_3.cn: 这里可以查看所有地区建设相关事宜，刚刚建立联系的<@gd.key>据点管理系统</>可以从这里打开。
guide_text_settlement_supply_3.en: This shows all matters associated with Regional Development. The newly established <@gd.key>Outpost Management System</> can be accessed here.

guide_text_settlement_supply_4.cn: 我们已经与<@gd.key>难民暂居处据点</>成功建立了联系，现在可以开始为据点供给货物，以促进据点的发展。
guide_text_settlement_supply_4.en: We have successfully established contact with the <@gd.key>Refugee Camp</> outpost. Goods can now be supplied to this outpost to support its development.

guide_text_settlement_supply_5.cn: 点击这里更换供给据点的物资。
guide_text_settlement_supply_5.en: Click here to switch the goods supplied to this outpost.

guide_text_settlement_supply_5_ct.en: Press <action=settlement_main_change_item> to switch the goods supplied to this outpost.

guide_text_settlement_supply_6.cn: 这里列出了索斯整理的据点需要的物资清单，我们选择<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。
guide_text_settlement_supply_6.en: Soth has put together this list of supplies required by the outpost. Let's choose <@gd.key>Origocrusts</>.

guide_text_settlement_supply_8.cn: 每次供给，都需要从<@gd.key>本地仓储</>中提交选定数量的<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>。
guide_text_settlement_supply_8.en: Every supply takes a specified quantity of <@gd.key>Origocrusts</> from the <@gd.key>local depot</>, and then delivers them to the outpost.

guide_text_settlement_supply_9.cn: 这里可以调整供给的数量。
guide_text_settlement_supply_9.en: The amount of goods can be adjusted here.

guide_text_settlement_supply_desc_1.cn:
与据点建立联系后，即可开启据点供货。
据点会随时间生产<@gd.key>调度券</>，可以通过交易据点需要的货物获取据点存量的凭证。
guide_text_settlement_supply_desc_1.en: Establishing contact with an outpost activates the Outpost Supplies feature. Outposts generate <@gd.key>stock bills</> over time. These stock bills can be earned by trading goods needed by the outposts.

guide_text_settlement_supply_desc_2.cn: 使用<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>，可在四号谷地的<@gd.key>物资调度</>处购买各种珍贵的货品。
guide_text_settlement_supply_desc_2.en: <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> can be spent at Valley IV <@gd.key>Stock Redistribution</> sites to purchase various valuable goods.

guide_text_settlement_supply_desc_3.cn: 当获得足量<@gd.key>据点发展值</>后，可进一步提升<@gd.key>据点发展阶段</>，进而会丰富据点需要的货物，交易后获得更多的据点报酬。
guide_text_settlement_supply_desc_3.en: Earning enough <@gd.key>Outpost Prosperity</> raises the <@gd.key>Outpost Prosperity Level</>. A prosperous outpost will need more and better goods, but a successful trade will also provide better payments from the outpost.

guide_text_shaper_2_clean_1.cn: <@gd.key>赤铜罐</>即将恢复生产，<@gd.key>优质锦草软饮</>的产线也就完成<@gd.key>一半</>了。
guide_text_shaper_2_clean_1.en: <@gd.key>Cuprium Jar</> production is being restored. This means <@gd.key>half</> of the <@gd.key>Jincao Tea</> production line is completed.

guide_text_shaper_2_clean_2.cn: 为了产线的顺利进行和环境保护，我们需要处理<@gd.key>塑形机</>和<@gd.key>精炼炉</>产生的污水。
guide_text_shaper_2_clean_2.en: To keep the production line operational and protect the environment, we must process the Sewage byproducts of the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> and <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

guide_text_shaper_2_clean_3.cn: 此时就需要用上<@gd.key>污水处理机</>了，不妨试试吧。
guide_text_shaper_2_clean_3.en: This calls for the <@gd.key>Water Treatment Unit</>. Let's take a look at this facility.

guide_text_shaper_2_filling_1.cn: 这就是<@gd.key>优质锦草软饮</>的合成路径。
guide_text_shaper_2_filling_1.en: This is the production chain for <@gd.key>Jincao Tea</>.

guide_text_shaper_2_filling_2.cn: <@gd.key>赤铜罐</>因为其他设备错误的模式而停止了生产，需要想办法将它恢复。
guide_text_shaper_2_filling_2.en: <@gd.key>Cuprium Jar</> production has been halted as some facilities have been switched to the wrong operation mode. Figure out a way to restore production.

guide_text_shaper_2_furnance_2.cn: 液体模式下的精炼炉，可以将<@gd.key>赤铜矿</>和清水转化为<@gd.key>赤铜块</>和污水。
guide_text_shaper_2_furnance_2.en: Fluid Mode Refining Units can convert <@gd.key>Cuprium Ore</> and Clean Water into <@gd.key>Cuprium</> and Sewage.

guide_text_shaper_2_helper_filling_1.cn: 先打开<@gd.key>灌装机</>的操作面板，查看<@gd.key>优质锦草软饮</>的配方吧
guide_text_shaper_2_helper_filling_1.en: Open the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> control panel to check the production formula of <@gd.key>Jincao Tea</>.

guide_text_shaper_2_helper_furnance_1.cn: 然后把<@gd.key>精炼炉</>调整为<@gd.key>液体模式</>。
guide_text_shaper_2_helper_furnance_1.en: The next step is to switch <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to <@gd.key>Fluid Mode</>.

guide_text_shaper_2_helper_shaper_1.cn: 我们先把<@gd.key>塑形机</>调整为<@gd.key>液体模式</>。
guide_text_shaper_2_helper_shaper_1.en: First, switch the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> to <@gd.key>Fluid Mode</>.

guide_text_shaper_2_pipe_1.cn: 接下来用<@gd.key>管道</>将水泵连向<@gd.key>精炼炉</>和<@gd.key>塑形机</>。
guide_text_shaper_2_pipe_1.en: Next, connect the Fluid Pump to the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> and the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> with <@gd.key>pipelines</>.

guide_text_shaper_2_shaper_2.cn: 液体模式下的塑形机，可以将<@gd.key>赤铜块</>和清水转化为<@gd.key>赤铜罐</>和污水。
guide_text_shaper_2_shaper_2.en: Fluid Mode Moulding Units can convert <@gd.key>Cuprium</> and Clean Water into <@gd.key>Cuprium Jars</> and Sewage.

guide_text_shaper_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>塑形机</>可以将含有塑形标签的材料进行加工生产，产物可用于多种制剂和食品生产。
典型产物为<#item.glassBottle>紫晶质瓶</>，由<#item.quartzGlass>紫晶纤维</>放入<@gd.key>塑形机</>后生产获得。
guide_text_shaper_intro_desc_1.en:
The <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> can process materials with the [Mould] tag to make materials for making medication and food production.
Typical product: <#item.glassBottle>Amethyst Bottle</>, made by placing <#item.quartzGlass>Amethyst Fiber</> in the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</>.

guide_text_shared_building_desc_1.cn:
在探索进行到一定阶段后，塔卫二中会出现来自他人的共享设备。
可便携地使用这些设备。
guide_text_shared_building_desc_1.en: After reaching a certain Exploration Level, shared facilities may begin to appear in Talos-II. These facilities are available thanks to other players and can be used.

guide_text_shared_building_desc_2.cn:
共享设备的稳定度会随时间降低，稳定度归零后即会消失。
维护共享设备可以提升其稳定度，延长存在时间。
guide_text_shared_building_desc_2.en: A shared facility loses stability with time and will completely disappear at zero stability. Repair shared facilities to reset their stability and extend their presence.

guide_text_shared_building_desc_3.cn:
可以在共享设备的来源详情处添加其他玩家为好友。
好友间还可以分享共享设备。
guide_text_shared_building_desc_3.en: View the source details of a shared facility to add the sharing player as a friend. Friends can also share shared facilities.

guide_text_shared_building_desc_4.cn: 塔卫二中存在一些由终末地工业为验证协议技术投送的实验设备，可作为共享设备使用，但无法添加好友。
guide_text_shared_building_desc_4.en: There are a number of experimental facilities in Talos-II used by Endfield Industries to verify Techno-Protocol deployment. They can be treated as shared facilities, but offer no source players to add as a friend.

guide_text_shared_building_desc_5.cn: 共享设备获得一定维护数后，会展现出不同的样式。努力帮助其他玩家，获得更多维护数吧。
guide_text_shared_building_desc_5.en: Shared facilities that receive enough repairs will look different. Try to share useful facilities to help other players and earn repairs.

guide_text_show_electric_out_1.cn: 目前集成工业系统的发电功率严重不足！
guide_text_show_electric_out_1.en: The AIC power output is too low!

guide_text_show_electric_out_2.cn:
请尽快放置<@gd.key>热能池</>并接入电网，提升集成工业系统的发电功率。
也可以临时关闭部分设备，降低耗电功率。
guide_text_show_electric_out_2.en: Please place <@gd.key>Thermal Banks</> and connect them to the power grid to raise AIC power output. Certain facilities can be switched off to reduce power consumption.

guide_text_signal_tower_desc.cn:
当<@gd.key>塔塔</>接入源石研究园的<@gd.key>协议通讯信号塔</>后，该区域的<@gd.key>所有侵蚀核心</>都会暴露出来。
若在后续区域遇到动态侵蚀，则也需要<@gd.key>塔塔再次接入协议通讯信号塔</>进行解析。
请破坏暴露出的侵蚀核心，消除侵蚀。
guide_text_signal_tower_desc.en:
Connecting <@gd.key>Tata</> to the <@gd.key>Protocom Signal Tower</> of the Originium Science Park has exposed <@gd.key>all Blight Cores</> in this area.
<@gd.key>Connecting Tata to the local Protocom Signal Tower</> will be necessary to decrypt other Active Blight masses in subsequent areas.
Destroy the exposed Blight Cores and eliminate the Blight.

guide_text_snapshot_formation_1.cn: 在拍照模式中，可在此处查看并编辑<@gd.key>合影站位</>。
guide_text_snapshot_formation_1.en: Camera mode has various <@gd.key>group poses</> that can be used and edited.

guide_text_snapshot_formation_1_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=snapshot_tab_next>，在此处查看并编辑<@gd.key>合影站位</>。
guide_text_snapshot_formation_1_1_ct.en: Press <action=snapshot_tab_next> to view and edit various <@gd.key>group poses</>.

guide_text_snapshot_formation_1_ct.cn: 在拍照模式中，可以按下<action=snapshot_confirm_focus_menu>展开列表，查看更多功能。
guide_text_snapshot_formation_1_ct.en: In Camera mode, press <action=snapshot_confirm_focus_menu> to expand a list of various photography options.

guide_text_snapshot_formation_2.cn: 可在此处切换<@gd.key>站位类型</>。

guide_text_sns_1.cn: Baker是塔卫二常用的聊天软件，许多人使用Baker进行日常通讯。
guide_text_sns_1.en: Baker is a popular chat application of Talos-II. Many people use Baker to send (toast) messages to each other.

guide_text_sns_2.cn: 点击联系人列表，可以查看特定联系人或群组的消息。
guide_text_sns_2.en: Click on the contact list to view the Baker contacts or chat groups (Bakeries).

guide_text_sns_3.cn: 您可以多多注意各类通讯。
guide_text_sns_3.en: Keep an eye out for incoming toasts and Bakery invitations.

guide_text_soil_liquid_plant_desc_1.cn: 部分田块只能在<@gd.key>武陵地区</>种植，比如<@gd.key>金石稻田块</>。
guide_text_soil_liquid_plant_desc_1.en: Some planting plots can only be grown in <@gd.key>Wuling</>. An example will be the <@gd.key>Amber Rice Plot</>.

guide_text_soil_liquid_plant_desc_2.cn: 部分田块需要进行<@gd.key>多次浇水</>，利用<@gd.key>洒水机</>可实现自动化浇水。
guide_text_soil_liquid_plant_desc_2.en: Some plots require <@gd.key>multiple rounds of watering</> to make the plant grow. Use <@gd.key>Sprinklers</> to automate the watering step.

guide_text_spaceship_build_1.cn: 在帝江号中，我们可以建造各类<@gd.key>功能舱室</>来辅助塔卫二的探索。
guide_text_spaceship_build_1.en: We can construct various <@gd.key>functional cabins</> aboard Dijiang to support our exploration of Talos-II.

guide_text_spaceship_build_2.cn: <@gd.key>制造舱</>可以生产培养干员的重要材料，为干员提供稳定的经验成长。
guide_text_spaceship_build_2.en: The <@gd.key>Manufacturing Cabin</> can produce important operator progression materials to give operators a steady source of EXP.

guide_text_spaceship_build_3.cn: 这里显示了建造制造舱的所需材料，这些<@gd.key>航天建材</>可以在塔卫二的<@gd.key>资源回收站</>中获得。
guide_text_spaceship_build_3.en: These are the materials needed to construct the Manufacturing Cabin. <@gd.key>Aerospace Materials</> can be acquired from <@gd.key>Recycling Stations</> of Talos-II.

guide_text_spaceship_build_4.cn: 拥有足够的建设材料后，点击<@gd.key>建造</>按钮就可以建造舱室了。
guide_text_spaceship_build_4.en: After acquiring enough construction materials, click the <@gd.key>Construct</> button to build the cabin.

guide_text_spaceship_build_4_ct.cn: 拥有足够的建设材料后，按下<action=common_confirm>就可以建造舱室了。
guide_text_spaceship_build_4_ct.en: After acquiring enough construction materials, press <action=common_confirm> to build the cabin.

guide_text_spaceship_build_des_1.cn: 在探索时，可以从<@gd.key>资源回收站</>获得航天建材。
guide_text_spaceship_build_des_1.en: During exploration, we might find <@gd.key>Recycling Stations</> that provide us with Aerospace Materials.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_1.cn: 您可以在总控中枢的<@gd.key>中控台</>查看帝江号的整体信息，并进行所有舱室的进驻管理。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Central Dashboard</> of the Control Nexus to get an overview of Dijiang and manage operator assignments of various cabins.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_2.cn: 将来，您还可以通过提升总控中枢的等级来解锁帝江号更多的功能舱室。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_2.en: The Control Nexus can be upgraded in the future to unlock more functional cabins aboard Dijiang.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_3.cn: 总控中枢承担着帝江号的管理职能，进驻在这里的干员会随时间持续提升与干员之间的<@gd.key>信赖度</>。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_3.en: The Control Nexus is responsible for managing the entirety of Dijiang. Assign operators here to build their <@gd.key>trust</> in the Endministrator.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_4.cn: 当您不在帝江号时，<@gd.key>信赖度</>也会持续累积，并在您下次返回帝江号时获取。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_4.en: Even if the Endministrator is not aboard Dijiang, <@gd.key>trust</> will continue to build up. Accumulated trust will be added when the Endministrator visits Dijiang again.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_5.cn: 离开前，请别忘了将空闲的干员进驻到此处来提升信赖。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_5.en: Before leaving the ship, don't forget to assign idle operators to the Control Nexus to build up their trust.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_6.cn: 在总控中枢进驻的干员同样会随时间消耗<@gd.key>心情</>。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_6.en: Operators assigned to the Control Nexus will also slowly lose <@gd.key>mood</> over time.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_7.cn: 当心情<@gd.key>耗尽</>后干员会自行前往中心大厅进行<@gd.key>休息</>，且期间不会获得进驻效果。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_7.en: An operator with <@gd.key>zero</> mood will automatically head to the Central Ring to <@gd.key>rest</>, and will not receive any assignment effects during rest.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_8.cn: 休息中的干员会随时间恢复心情，干员在心情<@gd.key>完全恢复</>后会<@gd.key>自动返回工作</>。与干员交互也可以让其提前返回。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_8.en: Operators will slowly regain their mood when resting. Once <@gd.key>mood is fully restored</>, the operator will <@gd.key>automatically return to work</>. The Endministrator may interact with operators and ask them to get back to work earlier.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_9.cn: 请点击此处，为总控中枢进驻干员。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_9.en: Click here to assign operators to the Control Nexus.

guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_9_ct.cn: 请按下<action=navigation_target_click>为总控中枢进驻干员。
guide_text_spaceship_controlcenter_9_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to assign operators to the Control Nexus.

guide_text_spaceship_depot_switch_1.cn: 已解锁了多个地区仓库，在帝江号上可以在此处手动切换当前连接的地区仓库进行管理。
guide_text_spaceship_depot_switch_1.en: Multiple regional depots have been unlocked. When aboard Dijiang, use this to manually switch between these depots and manage them accordingly.

guide_text_spaceship_depot_switch_1_1_ct.cn: 长按<action=inv_open_depot_switch>进行仓库切换，手动切换当前连接的地区仓库进行管理。
guide_text_spaceship_depot_switch_1_1_ct.en: Press and hold <action=inv_open_depot_switch> to switch between depots. Manually switch and connect to a regional depot to manage it.

guide_text_spaceship_depot_switch_1_ct.cn: 已解锁了多个地区仓库，请按下<action=common_switch_area_prev ignoreOverrideIcon=true>切换到仓库。
guide_text_spaceship_depot_switch_1_ct.en: Multiple regional depots have been unlocked. Press <action=common_switch_area_prev ignoreOverrideIcon=true> to switch to Depot.

guide_text_spaceship_depot_switch_2.cn: 选择希望与帝江号相连的仓库，按下确定按钮即可切换。
guide_text_spaceship_depot_switch_2.en: Select the depot to connect to Dijiang and use the Confirm button to switch.

guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_1.cn: 旅途中收集到的各类<@gd.key>陈列品</>可以放置在行迹高塔中进行展示。
guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_1.en: Various <@gd.key>display items</> may be collected during exploration. These can be showcased at the Tower of Trails.

guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_2.cn: 点击展位按钮或两侧的箭头可以切换查看不同的展位，每个展位可放置一个陈列品。
guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_2.en: Click the display slot button or the arrows on two sides to switch between display slots. A display item can be placed in each display slot.

guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_2_ct.cn: 使用<action=common_toggle_group_previous_include_pc>和<action=common_toggle_group_next_include_pc>可以切换查看不同的展位，每个展位可放置一个陈列品。
guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_2_ct.en: Use <action=common_toggle_group_previous_include_pc> and <action=common_toggle_group_next_include_pc> to switch between display slots. A display item can be placed in each display slot.

guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_3.cn: 请点击按钮来为当前展位设定要展示的陈列品。
guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_3.en: Click the button to select a display item for this slot.

guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_3_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>为当前展位设定要展示的陈列品。
guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_3_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select a display item for this slot.

guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_4.cn: 这里可以看到当前拥有的所有陈列品，点击陈列品可查看其详细说明并预览放置的效果。
guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_4.en: This shows all display items currently owned. Click on a display item for details and preview the display effects when placed in a display slot.

guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_5.cn: 陈列品没有实际的加成效果，标签只影响不同爱好的干员在查看此陈列品时可能的差异表现。
guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_5.en: Display items offer no tangible bonuses. Their tags would only affect operator reactions when operators of different hobbies look at the display items.

guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_6.cn: 选择陈列品后点击确认按钮即可进行保存。收集到新的陈列品后别忘了来此放置展示，来访的好友也可以看到哦。
guide_text_spaceship_exhibition_6.en: Select the display item and click the Confirm button to save the selection. Do not forget to edit the showcase when new display items are collected. Display items being showcased can also be admired by friends.

guide_text_spaceship_gender_change1_desc.cn: 前往帝江号<@gd.key>静滞核心</>，触摸协议奇点，可以切换管理员的身份。
guide_text_spaceship_gender_change1_desc.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Stasis Core</> aboard Dijiang and touch the Protocol Singularity to switch the Endministrator's identity.

guide_text_spaceship_gender_change2_desc.cn: 触摸<@gd.key>协议奇点，可以切换管理员的身份</>。
guide_text_spaceship_gender_change2_desc.en: Touch the <@gd.key>Protocol Singularity to switch the Endministrator's identity</>.

guide_text_spaceship_gender_change2_desc.cn: 进行一次身份切换后，协议奇点的这一功能需要一段时间后才能再次使用。
guide_text_spaceship_gender_change2_desc.en: After using the identity switching function of the Protocol Singularity, the function cannot be used again until its cooldown ends.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_1.cn: <@gd.key>培养舱</>可以生产干员突破、技能提升、武器进阶等培养素材。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_1.en: The <@gd.key>Growth Chamber</> can be used to grow progression materials for operator promotions, skill upgrades, and weapon tuning.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_10.cn: 您刚刚已获得了一些<@gd.key>基核</>，请点击栏位开始进行培养吧。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_10.en: <@gd.key>Seeds</> acquired. Click on a slot to start growing them.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_10_ct.cn: 您刚刚已获得了一些<@gd.key>基核</>，请按下<action=ss_open_detail_navi>开始进行培养吧。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_10_ct.en: <@gd.key>Seeds</> acquired. Press <action=ss_open_detail_navi> to start growing them.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_2.cn: 与制造舱相同，培养舱也需要进驻干员才可以运转，在界面左侧可安排<@gd.key>干员进驻</>。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_2.en: Like the Manufacturing Cabin, assign operators to the Growth Chamber to start work. Use the left side of the screen to <@gd.key>assign operators</>.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_3.cn: 进驻的干员可以为培养带来额外的效能提升，但会随时间消耗<@gd.key>心情</>。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_3.en: Assign operators to improve growth performance. However, these operators will slowly lose <@gd.key>mood</> over time.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_4.cn: 当心情<@gd.key>耗尽</>后干员会自行前往中央环厅进行<@gd.key>休息</>，且期间将无法提供进驻效果。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_4.en: An operator with <@gd.key>zero</> mood will automatically head to the Central Ring to <@gd.key>rest</>, and will not provide any assignment effects during resting.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_5.cn: 休息中的干员会随时间恢复心情，当干员心情<@gd.key>回满</>后也会<@gd.key>自动返回舱室进行工作</>。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_5.en: Operators will slowly regain their mood when resting. Once <@gd.key>mood is maxed</>, the operator will <@gd.key>automatically return to the cabin to work</>.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_6.cn: 界面右侧显示了当前的培养情况，点击各栏位可进行方案选择。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_6.en: The right side of the screen shows the current Growth Chamber status. Click on each slot to select the growing options.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_6_ct.cn: 界面右侧显示了当前的培养情况，按下<action=ss_open_detail_navi>可选择各栏位并设定培养方案。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_6_ct.en: The right side of the screen shows the current Growth Chamber status. Press <action=ss_open_detail_navi> to choose each slot and select the growing options.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_7.cn: 请注意，在培养舱进行培养还需用到一种特殊材料——<@gd.key>基核</>。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_7.en: Note that growing materials at the Growth Chamber also requires special <@gd.key>seed</> materials.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_8.cn: <@gd.key>基核</>可以从原有材料中提取获得，但同时也会消耗掉原有材料。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_8.en: <@gd.key>Seeds</> can be extracted from existing materials, but this also consumes the original material.

guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_9.cn: 在材料耗尽前，请别忘了多提取一些基核用于持续培养。
guide_text_spaceship_growcabin_9.en: Don't forget to extract more seeds before the materials run out so that more materials can be grown.

guide_text_spaceship_interaction_des_1.cn: 与正在帝江号上活动的干员互动，可以与干员对话或送礼给干员。
guide_text_spaceship_interaction_des_1.en: Interact with operators aboard Dijiang to talk to them or offer them gifts.

guide_text_spaceship_interaction_des_2.cn: 赠送礼物可以提升干员对管理员的<@gd.key>信赖度</>。注意干员只会接受符合其爱好的礼物。
guide_text_spaceship_interaction_des_2.en: Gifts will build the operators' <@gd.key>trust</> in the Endministrator. Operators will only accept gifts that match their hobbies.

guide_text_spaceship_interaction_des_3.cn: 礼物可在<@gd.key>物资调度</>中购买获得，赠送符合干员产地偏好的礼物能提升更多信赖度。
guide_text_spaceship_interaction_des_3.en: Gifts can be purchased from <@gd.key>Stock Redistribution</>. Offer gifts that operators prefer to build trust with them.

guide_text_spaceship_interaction_des_4.cn: 想要快速找到某位干员，还可在中央环厅的<@gd.key>干员联络台</>处将其直接召集到身边。
guide_text_spaceship_interaction_des_4.en: To find an operator quickly, use the <@gd.key>Operator Contact Panel</> at the Central Ring to contact and summon them to the Endministrator's side.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_1.cn: 与制造舱内的<@gd.key>控制台</>交互可以使用该舱室的功能或对舱室进行升级。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_1.en: Interact with the <@gd.key>control panel</> of the Manufacturing Cabin to upgrade it or use its functions.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_10.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>确定</>按钮完成进驻。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_10.en: Click the <@gd.key>Confirm</> button to complete the assignment.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_11.cn: 现在制造舱的进驻人员已就绪，可以安排生产了。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_11.en: The Manufacturing Cabin now has an assigned operator. Manufacturing can now be arranged.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_12.cn: 接下来，请点击<@gd.key>选择方案</>按钮来设定生产内容。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_12.en: Next, click the <@gd.key>Select Plan</> button to set up manufacturing.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_12_ct.cn: 接下来，请按下<action=common_confirm>设定生产内容。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_12_ct.en: Next, press <action=common_confirm> to set up manufacturing.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_13.cn: 我们可以在制造舱中生产<@gd.key>干员培养素材</>和<@gd.key>武器培养素材</>来提供额外的<@gd.key>经验</>成长。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_13.en: We can manufacture <@gd.key>operator progression materials</> and <@gd.key>weapon progression materials</> at the Manufacturing Cabin. These items can give operators and weapons <@gd.key>EXP</>.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_14.cn: 这里显示了生产所需的时间，在舱室中进驻更多干员可缩短此时间。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_14.en: This shows the time needed for manufacturing. Assign more operators to the cabin to shorten this time.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_15.cn: 在这里可以选择要本次要制造的数量。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_15.en: Use this section to select the amount to manufacture.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_16.cn: 注意单次可设定的最大数量与制造舱的总<@gd.key>生产载荷</>以及当前方案每个物品的占用载荷有关。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_16.en: Note the <@gd.key>MFG Load</> of the cabin. This determines the maximum amount of items that can be made at once. Different items also use up different amounts of the MFG Load.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_17.cn: 请点击此处将数量设为<@gd.key>最大</>。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_17.en: Click here to set the amount to <@gd.key>max</>.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_17_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_num_add>可以增加生产的数量。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_17_ct.en: Press <action=common_num_add> to increase the amount to manufacture.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_18.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>确认</>按钮完成设定。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_18.en: Click the <@gd.key>Confirm</> button to complete the setup.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_19.cn: 现在制造舱已经开始生产了。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_19.en: The Manufacturing Cabin is now manufacturing.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_2.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>查看制造</>按钮打开制造舱界面。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_2.en: Click the <@gd.key>view manufacturing</> button to open the Manufacturing Cabin panel.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_20.cn: 在这里可以看到，进驻在制造舱中的干员可以为生产带来额外的效能提升，但会随时间消耗<@gd.key>心情</>。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_20.en: Here we can see that operators assigned to the Manufacturing Cabin will improve its performance. However, these operators will slowly lose <@gd.key>mood</> over time.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_21.cn: 当心情<@gd.key>耗尽</>后干员会自行前往中央环厅进行<@gd.key>休息</>并恢复心情，且期间将无法提供进驻效果。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_21.en: An operator with <@gd.key>zero</> mood will automatically head to the Central Ring to <@gd.key>rest</> and restore their mood. A resting operator will not provide any assignment effects.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_22.cn: 不过别担心，在干员心情<@gd.key>完全恢复</>后也会<@gd.key>自动返回舱室进行工作</>。与干员交互也可让其提前返回。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_22.en: Don't worry. When mood is <@gd.key>fully restored</>, the operator will <@gd.key>automatically return to the cabin and continue their work</>. The Endministrator may also choose to interact with resting operators and tell them to head back to work early.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_23.cn: 制造还需要花费一点时间，我们稍后再回到这里进行收取吧。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_23.en: Manufacturing will take a while. Let's come back here after a while to collect the items.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_3.cn: <@gd.key>制造舱</>可以随时间生产干员培养素材，为干员提供经验。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_3.en: The <@gd.key>Manufacturing Cabin</> can produce operator progression materials when given enough time.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_4.cn: 界面左侧显示了制造舱当前的进驻信息，注意功能舱室<@gd.key>至少要进驻1名干员才能正常运转</>。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_4.en: The left side of the screen shows the current operator assignment of the Manufacturing Cabin. Note that functional cabins must have <@gd.key>at least 1 operator assigned to start working</>.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_5.cn: 界面右侧显示了制造舱当前的生产情况，干员进驻后将自动按照<@gd.key>选定的方案和数量</>开始生产。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_5.en: The right side of the screen shows the manufacturing status of the Manufacturing Cabin. Once at least an operator has been assigned, work will start on the <@gd.key>specified manufacturing plan</>.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_6.cn: 请点击此处选择要<@gd.key>进驻</>的干员。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_6.en: Click here to select the operators to <@gd.key>assign</>.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_6_ct.en: Press <action=ss_occupancy_manage> to select the operators to <@gd.key>assign</>.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_7.cn: 我们可以安排已获得的干员进驻到帝江号中以获取对应的效果。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_7.en: We can assign operators available to Dijiang to acquire various bonuses and effects.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_8.cn: 在<@gd.key>制造舱</>进驻的每个干员都可以提升舱室的<@gd.key>生产效能</>，从而<@gd.key>缩短</>生产培养素材所需的时间。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_8.en: Every operator assigned to the <@gd.key>Manufacturing Cabin</> will raise its <@gd.key>productivity</> and <@gd.key>shorten</> the time needed to manufacture the progression materials.

guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_9.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>干员头像</>进行选择。
guide_text_spaceship_manufacturing_9.en: Click on the <@gd.key>operator's portrait</> to select the operator.

guide_text_spaceship_present_1.cn: 给干员赠送礼物可以提升干员对管理员的<@gd.key>信赖度</>。
guide_text_spaceship_present_1.en: Gifts will raise the operators' <@gd.key>trust</> in their Endministrator.

guide_text_spaceship_present_2.cn: 在这里可以查看干员的<@gd.key>爱好</>。礼物也会有带有此类标签。注意干员<@gd.key>只会接受符合其爱好的礼物</>。
guide_text_spaceship_present_2.en: These tags indicate what the operator <@gd.key>likes</>. Gifts will also carry these tags. Note that operators will <@gd.key>only accept gifts that match their hobbies</>.

guide_text_spaceship_present_3.cn: 这里显示了干员的礼物<@gd.key>偏好类型</>，赠送符合干员偏好的礼物可提供<@gd.key>更多信赖度</>。
guide_text_spaceship_present_3.en: This shows the operator's <@gd.key>preferences</> for gifts. Offering gifts that match the operator's preferences will earn <@gd.key>more trust</> with them.

guide_text_spaceship_present_4.cn: 每天给同一位干员赠送礼物可提升的信赖度有上限。
guide_text_spaceship_present_4.en: There is a limit to the amount of trust that can be earned to an operator by gifting.

guide_text_spaceship_present_5.cn: 且当天提升的信赖度每达到一档，继续送礼的收益也会逐渐减少，请注意合理分配。
guide_text_spaceship_present_5.en: Once the daily trust increase reaches a certain tier, the amount of trust earned by additional gifts will decrease. Given these diminishing returns, try to spread the gifts to maximize trust building.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_1.cn: 会客室的<@gd.key>传送台</>已经开启了，有空不妨去好友的飞船转转。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_1.en: The <@gd.key>TP Platform</> in the Reception Room is now active. Try using it to visit a friend's ship.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_2.cn: 为好友的舱室提供<@gd.key>生产助力</>还可以获得<@gd.key>信用</>奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_2.en: Provide <@gd.key>Production Assists</> to a friend's cabins to get rewarded with <@gd.key>credits</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_3.cn: 在<@gd.key>信用交易所</>中，可使用<@gd.key>信用</>兑换干员养成材料、武器养成材料、<@gd.key>武库配额</>等重要资源。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_3.en: <@gd.key>Credits</> can be spent at the <@gd.key>Credit Store</> to buy key resources that include operator progression materials, weapon progression materials, and <@gd.key>Arsenal Tickets</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_4.cn: 请按下<action=common_open_watch>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开协议同步器。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_4.en: Press <action=common_open_watch> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Protosync.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_4_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_open_watch>打开协议同步器。

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_4_mb.cn: 请点击此处打开协议同步器。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_4_mb.en: Tap here to open the Protosync.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_5_ct.en: Press <action=navigation_target_click> to go to the <@gd.key>Acquisition Center</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_6.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>信用交易所</>页签。

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_6_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_toggle_group_previous>前往<@gd.key>信用交易所</>页签。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_toggle_group_previous> to go to the <@gd.key>Credit Store</> tab.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 在会客室情报区可进行<@gd.key>线索收集</>并获取<@gd.key>信用奖励</>。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: Use the Reception Room Intel Section to <@gd.key>collect clues</> and earn <@gd.key>credits</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 线索共有<@gd.key>7种类型</>，在<@gd.key>集齐所有类型线索</>并放入对应的栏位后可开展<@gd.key>情报交流</>并立刻获得大量信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: There are <@gd.key>7 types</> of clues. <@gd.key>Collect clues of every type</> and place them in the proper slots to start <@gd.key>Clue Exchange</> and immediately get a large sum of credits.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 情报交流本身也会<@gd.key>持续一段时间</>，期间有<@gd.key>好友参与</>还可提供更多额外的信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: Clue Exchange will <@gd.key>last for a while</>. Having <@gd.key>friends participate</> in the Clue Exchange will provide additional credits.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 好友之间可通过线索的传递来互取所需，更快完成所有线索的收集。<@gd.key>接收和赠予线索</>也都可以获得信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: Friends can also send and receive clues from each other to complete their clue collections quickly. Credits can also be earned by <@gd.key>sending or receiving clues</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 好友赠予的线索会存入<@gd.key>接收线索库</>，不占用自有线索库的容量，但有<@gd.key>生效期限</>。获取后可在线索库中进行查看。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: Clues received from friends will be placed in the <@gd.key>incoming clue library</> and will not take up space of the local clue library. However, received clues will <@gd.key>expire</>. Check the clue library for more details.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 与其他舱室相同，会客室也需要<@gd.key>进驻干员</>才可以运转。在界面左侧可安排进驻。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: Like other cabins, operators must be <@gd.key>assigned</> to the Reception Room to start work. Use the left side of the screen to assign operators.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 进驻的干员会为线索收集提供效能或概率加成，并随时间消耗心情。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: Operators assigned to the Reception Room will grant clue collecting efficiency or rate ups for certain clues, but they will also slowly lose mood over time.
Press <action=ss_confirm> to view the clues collected.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 干员进驻并开始工作后会随时间自动进行线索的收集。每次进度满后即可随机获得一张<@gd.key>线索</>。
