guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: Once assigned, operators will start working and automatically collect clues with time. Every time the collection progress is full, 1 random <@gd.key>clue</> is acquired.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 干员收集到的线索会自动放入<@gd.key>自有线索库</>中，无需手动收取，当容量到达上限后收集将暂停。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: Clues collected by operators are automatically placed in the <@gd.key>local clue library</>. No manual claiming is required. Collection will pause when this library is at full capacity.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 我们可以将<@gd.key>重复的线索</>回收掉或赠送给好友来给自有线索库留出更多的空间，<@gd.key>回收和赠予</>线索也可获取少量信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: <@gd.key>Duplicate clues</> can be recycled or gifted to friends to make space in the local clue library. <@gd.key>Recycling and gifting</> of clues also provide small sums of credits.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 在有干员进驻的情况下，会客室每天<@gd.key>固定时间</>也会产出一张线索，需要在此处<@gd.key>手动领取</>。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: With operators assigned, the Reception Room will also collect <@gd.key>1 clue</> at a fixed time everyday. This auto-collected clue must be <@gd.key>manually claimed</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.cn: 此外<@gd.key>每获取一张新线索</>，无论是干员收集的还是会客室产出的，都可获得一定的<@gd.key>信用奖励</>。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clue_.en: <@gd.key>Credits</> are earned whenever <@gd.key>1 new clue is collected</>, whether by assigned operators or the Reception Room itself.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clueu.cn: 通过会客室情报区的线索板或总控中枢可打开会客室线索收集界面。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clueu.en: Use the Reception Room Intel Section clue board or Control Nexus to open the Reception Room clue collection screen.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clueu.cn: 将干员进驻在会客室中即可随时间收集线索并获取信用奖励，集齐所有类型线索可开展情报交流。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clueu.en: Operators assigned to the Reception Room will collect clues and earn credits as time passes. Collect clues of every type to initiate Clue Exchange.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clueu.cn: 赠予和接收好友线索，前往好友飞船参与情报交流，还可获得更多信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_clueu.en: Clues can be sent to friends, or received from them. Visit a friend's ship to take part in Clue Exchange to earn more credits.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.cn: 在<@gd.key>信用交易所</>中，可使用<@gd.key>信用</>兑换干员养成材料、武器养成材料、<@gd.key>武库配额</>等重要资源。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.en: <@gd.key>Credits</> can be spent at the <@gd.key>Credit Store</> to buy key resources that include operator progression materials, weapon progression materials, and <@gd.key>Arsenal Tickets</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.cn: 这里列出了当前可兑换的所有商品，选择商品即可查看详情并选择兑换数量。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.en: This is a list of items that can be exchanged currently. Selecting an item opens up its details and options for choosing the amount to exchange.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.cn: 信用交易所的商品每天固定时间会自动刷新。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.en: Items sold at the Credit Store refresh daily at a fixed schedule.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.cn: 此外也可以通过<@gd.key>立即刷新</>按钮手动对商品进行刷新，但手动刷新每天有次数上限且花费的信用递增。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.en: Use the <@gd.key>Refresh Now</> button to manually refresh the items. However, there is a limit to manual refreshes and every refresh costs increasingly more credits.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.cn: 另外需要注意信用有缓存上限，<@gd.key>溢出的部分每日会被清空</>，请及时使用。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.en: There is a storage limit for the credits cache. <@gd.key>Credits that exceed this limit will be cleared on the following day</>, so try to spend them on time.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.cn: 每天可在信用交易所中领取一次基础信用奖励，当有好友在飞船出售地区货品时还可提供额外的信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.en: A basic credits reward can be claimed everyday at the Credit Store. Earn additional credits when a friend sells regional goods at the ship.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.cn: 拜访好友飞船时，对其舱室进行<@gd.key>生产助力</>可获取信用。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.en: Earn credits by visiting a friend's ship and providing <@gd.key>Production Assists</> to their cabins.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.cn: 后续还可通过线索收集、情报交流以及帮好友完成运送委托等更多方式获得信用。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_credi.en: Other means to earn credits will become available, such as clue collection, clue exchange, and helping friends complete delivery jobs.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_desc_.cn: 进驻干员到会客室可开展线索收集和情报交流，并获得信用等奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_desc_.en: Operators assigned to the Reception Room can start collecting clues and engage in Clue Exchange to earn credits and other rewards.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_desc_.cn: 收集到的蚀刻章、干员履历和武器可在会客室中进行展示，供来访的好友参观。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_desc_.en: All engraved medals, operator CVs, and weapons acquired can be showcased at the Display Section of the Reception Room. They can be viewed by visiting friends.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_desc_.cn: 在访客终端可查看最近来访的好友信息及其参与的行动（如生产助力等）。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_desc_.en: Use the Guest Terminal to view records of friends who visited recently and the activities they took part in (such as production assists).

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_desc_.cn: 可通过传送台前往好友飞船进行参观、生产助力等行动，并获得信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_desc_.en: Use the TP Platform to visit a friend's ship and engage in various activities such as production assists and acquire credits by doing so.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 管理员编辑好的蚀刻章排布在会客室的蚀刻章展示墙中会同步展出。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: Engraved medal showcase edited and saved by the Endministrator will be displayed at the Medal Display Wall in the Reception Room.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 您也可以通过蚀刻章展示墙对蚀刻章排布再次进行编辑。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: The Medal Display Wall can also be used for arranging and editing engraved medal displays.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 管理员可自由选择希望展示在<@gd.key>干员履历墙</>上的干员。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: Endministrator, the <@gd.key>Operator CV Wall</> can be used to showcase various operators in our employment.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 保存编辑后，<@gd.key>干员履历墙</>上会显示对应干员的展示信息。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: Once the operator showcase is edited and saved, the <@gd.key>Operator CV Wall</> will display the information of the specified operators.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 管理员可自由选择希望展示在<@gd.key>武器展示墙</>上的武器。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: Endministrator, the <@gd.key>Weapon Display Wall</> can be used to showcase various weapons we have.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 点击切换分区按钮，可以快速前往编辑下一类型的武器展示分区。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: Click the Switch Area button to quickly go and edit the display area of the next weapon type.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 按下<action=ss_previous_toggle>和<action=ss_next_toggle>可切换分区，快速前往编辑下一类型的武器展示分区。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: Press <action=ss_previous_toggle> and <action=ss_next_toggle> to switch between weapon type display areas and edit them accordingly.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 保存编辑后，<@gd.key>武器展示墙</>上会显示对应武器的展示信息。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: Once the weapon showcase is edited and saved, the <@gd.key>Weapon Display Wall</> will display the information of the specified weapons.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.cn: 打开不同类型的武器展示分区，能够快速编辑对应类型的武器展示信息。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_displ.en: The Weapon Display Wall is divided into areas for different weapon types. Each area can be opened to quickly edit the showcase for that weapon type.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 在帝江号会客室的物资调度终端处也可打开物资调度界面。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: You can also access the Stock Redistribution screen through the Stock Redistribution Terminal in the Reception Room of Dijiang.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 在'物资调度终端中可快速查看各地区的弹性需求物资价格并出售库存货品。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: Use the Stock Redistribution Terminal to quickly view the prices of elastic goods at various regions and sell goods in the storage to earn profits.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 升级并扩大物资调度的调度范围到等级2即可解锁<@gd.key>弹性需求物资</>。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: Raise stock coverage of Stock Redistribution to level 2 to unlock <@gd.key>elastic goods</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 解锁<@gd.key>弹性需求物资</>后还可前往好友飞船，使用物资调度终端并以对方的价格出售自身的库存货品。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: After unlocking <@gd.key>elastic goods</>, you can visit a friend's ship and use their Stock Redistribution Terminal to sell goods from your storage at their prices.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 弹性需求物资的价格每天会发生波动，好友飞船上的价格与本地也会存在差异。可通过低买高卖以获取利润。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: The prices of elastic goods fluctuate on a daily basis. Prices aboard a friend's ship may also differ from local prices. Buy low and sell high to earn profits.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 当有其他好友前来拜访并使用此终端出售货品时，也将根据货品总价值为您提供信用奖励。可通过好友售卖记录进行查看。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: Earn credit rewards when a visiting friend sells goods at this terminal. The amount of credits earned is based on the total value of the goods. View the details in the Visitor Sales Log.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 拜访好友，使用好友飞船上的物资调度终端，还可查看<@gd.key>对方的弹性需求物资价格</>，并以该价格出售自身的库存货品。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: When visiting a friend's ship, use their Stock Redistribution Terminal to view the <@gd.key>prices of elastic goods in their areas</> and even sell goods at their prices.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 在好友飞船上出售货品时，对方还可获得一定的信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: Selling goods at a friend's ship also rewards them with credits.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 请点击<@gd.key>好友售卖记录</>按钮。

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: Press <action=open_friend_record_panel> to open the <@gd.key>Visitor Sales Log</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 当有其他好友前来拜访并使用此终端出售货品时，也将根据货品总价值为您提供信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: Earn credit rewards when a visiting friend sells goods at this terminal. The amount of credits earned is based on the total value of the goods.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 好友出售货品提供的信用奖励每天有上限且最多保留2天，可前往采购中心-信用交易处进行收取。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: There is a daily limit on the amount of credits earned from friendly sales of goods. Unclaimed credits will only be kept for only 2 days. These rewards can be claimed at Acquisition Center - Credit Store.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.cn: 当弹性需求物资价格高涨的时候，不妨多多邀请好友提醒他们前来出售货品。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_shops.en: When elastic goods reach high prices, try inviting friends to visit and sell their goods.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 会客室开启后，我们可以通过传送台或好友界面前往<@gd.key>拜访好友飞船</>了。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Once the Reception Room is available, the TP Platform or the Friends screen can be used to <@gd.key>visit a friend's ship</>.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 除了参观外，还可以向好友进行生产助力、出售地区货品等行动来获得<@gd.key>信用</>奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: In addition to touring a friend's ship, a visitor can also provide Production Assists, sell regional goods, and engage in other activities to earn <@gd.key>credit</> rewards.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 每日可进行助力的次数有上限，可在此处查看。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: There is a daily limit to Production Assists. It is shown here.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 当好友飞船有舱室可进行助力时，拜访按钮旁也会有相应的标注。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: When Production Assist can be provided to a cabin of a friend's ship, the Visit button will also be marked accordingly.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 多多添加好友，通过拜访按钮前往对方飞船进行参观和助力吧。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Add some friends, then use the Visit button to visit their ships and offer them assistance.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 在好友的飞船中，可进行游览参观、生产助力、出售货品等活动。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Visit a friend's ship for a tour, provide Production Assists, sell various goods, or engage in various activities.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 点击<@gd.key>打开访客终端</>按钮可查看好友飞船各舱室的情况并进行生产助力。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Click the <@gd.key>Guest Terminal</> button to view the statuses of various cabins on the friend's ship and offer Production Assist.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 按下<action=ss_open_visitor_center>可以<@gd.key>打开访客终端</>查看好友飞船各舱室的情况并进行生产助力。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Press <action=ss_open_visitor_center> to <@gd.key>open the Guest Terminal</> and view the statuses of various cabins on the friend's ship and offer Production Assist.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 参与生产助力、情报交流等社交玩法还可获得<@gd.key>信用</>奖励，并为好友提供特定增益。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Social actions such as Production Assists and Clue Exchanges also give <@gd.key>credit</> rewards while giving the recipient friend special buffs.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 在好友飞船上可参观查看对方展示的干员留影、蚀刻章、干员履历、武器以及陈列品等内容。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Visit a friend's ship to see the friend's snapshots, engraved medals, operator CVs, weapons, and other display items that they have decided to showcase.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 使用好友飞船上的物资调度终端，可查看对方的弹性需求物资价格并以该价格出售自身的库存货品。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Use the Stock Redistribution Terminal aboard a friend's ship to check their prices of elastic goods and sell stockpiled goods at their prices.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 在访客终端界面中查看好友的舱室情况并进行生产助力、情报交流等活动可获得信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: The Guest Terminal screen shows the statuses of various cabins aboard a friend's ship. Use it to engage in Production Assist, Clue Exchange, and other social activities to earn credit rewards.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 参观游览
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Ship Visits: Touring

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 物资调度终端
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Stock Redistribution Terminal

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 访客终端
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Guest Terminal

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 在访客终端界面中可查看好友的舱室情况，进行<@gd.key>生产助力</>、情报交流等活动并获得<@gd.key>信用</>奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: The Guest Terminal screen shows the statuses of various cabins aboard a friend's ship. Use it to engage in <@gd.key>Production Assist</>, Clue Exchange, and other social activities to earn <@gd.key>credit</> rewards.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 这里显示了当前好友飞船中各舱室的情况，当舱室可被助力时会出现<@gd.key>生产助力</>按钮，点击即可进行助力。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: This shows the statuses of various cabins aboard a friend's ship. When a cabin can receive Production Assist, the <@gd.key>Production Assist</> button will appear. Click on it to provide assistance.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 这里显示了当前好友飞船中各舱室的情况，当舱室可被助力时会出现<@gd.key>生产助力</>按钮，按下<action=ss_help_friend_room>即可进行助力。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: This shows the statuses of various cabins aboard a friend's ship. When a cabin can receive Production Assist, the <@gd.key>Production Assist</> button will appear. Press <action=ss_help_friend_room> to provide assistance.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 为好友舱室助力可获得<@gd.key>信用</>奖励，同时使好友获得特定加成效果。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Providing assistance to a friend's cabin offers <@gd.key>credit</> rewards and grants the friend special bonuses.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 每日可进行生产助力的次数有限。在这里可以查看刷新的剩余时间。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: There is a daily limit to Production Assists. This shows the timer for the daily refresh.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 在好友飞船的物资调度终端处，可查看<@gd.key>对方的弹性需求物资价格</>，并以该价格出售自身的库存货品。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Use the Stock Redistribution Terminal aboard a friend's ship to <@gd.key>check their prices of elastic goods</> and sell stockpiled goods at their prices.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 在好友飞船出售货品还可为对方提供一定的信用奖励。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Selling goods aboard a friend's ship also provides them with credit rewards.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 通过传送台或访客主界面都可以打开此界面来离开当前好友飞船。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: Use the TP Platform or main screen of the visitor system to open this screen and leave the friend's ship.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 如果希望<@gd.key>继续拜访其他好友</>，可在此列表中进行选择。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: To <@gd.key>visit other friends</>, simply select them from this list.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 如果希望<@gd.key>继续拜访其他好友</>，可在此列表中选择好友再按下<action=friend_cell_select>前往好友飞船。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: To <@gd.key>visit other friends</>, simply select them from this list, then press <action=friend_cell_select> to visit their ship.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 如果希望返回自己的飞船，则可以直接点击<@gd.key>结束拜访</>按钮。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: To return to your own ship, simply click the <@gd.key>End Visit</> button.

guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.cn: 如果希望返回自己的飞船，则可以按下<action=friend_new_friend_request>来<@gd.key>结束拜访</>。
guide_text_spaceship_receptionroom_visit.en: To return to your own ship, press <action=friend_new_friend_request> to <@gd.key>end the visit</>.

guide_text_spaceship_recyclestation_desc.cn: 建造和升级“帝江号”中的功能舱室都需要使用<@gd.key>航天建材</>。
guide_text_spaceship_recyclestation_desc.en: <@gd.key>Aerospace Materials</> are needed to construct or upgrade functional cabins aboard Dijiang.

guide_text_spaceship_recyclestation_desc.cn: 航天建材可在各地的<@gd.key>资源回收站</>中定期收取获得。
guide_text_spaceship_recyclestation_desc.en: Periodically visit <@gd.key>Recycling Stations</> throughout Talos-II to gather Aerospace Materials.

guide_text_spaceship_unlockarea_desc_1.cn: 随着总控中枢等级的提升，帝江号中的预留区会逐步开放，为建造舱室提供更多可用的空间。
guide_text_spaceship_unlockarea_desc_1.en: Leveling up the Control Nexus also gradually opens up the under maintenance area aboard Dijiang. This frees up more space for constructing more cabins.

guide_text_spaceship_unlockarea_desc_2.cn: 预留区中会有更多可用的<@gd.key>待建舱室</>，拥有足够的航天材料后前往舱门位置即可进行建造。
guide_text_spaceship_unlockarea_desc_2.en: The under maintenance area includes spaces for <@gd.key>unconstructed cabins</>. When there are enough Aerospace Materials, interact with the cabin door and initiate construction.

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_1.cn: 请与中控台交互，提升<@gd.key>总控中枢等级</>。
guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_1.en: Interact with the Central Dashboard to level up the <@gd.key>Control Nexus</>.

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_2.cn: 请按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>并点击此处的<@gd.key>升级</>按钮。
guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_2.en: Hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click the <@gd.key>Upgrade</> button here.

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_interact>对总控中枢进行<@gd.key>升级</>。

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_3.cn: 提升<@gd.key>总控中枢等级</>可以解锁帝江号<@gd.key>更多的功能舱室</>并提升现有舱室<@gd.key>等级上限</>。
guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_3.en: Level up the <@gd.key>Control Nexus</> to unlock <@gd.key>more functional cabins</> aboard Dijiang and raise the <@gd.key>level cap</> of existing ones.

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_4.cn: 在升级预览中可以看到，将总控中枢升到2级可以解锁<@gd.key>培养舱</>，并提升制造舱的<@gd.key>等级上限</>。
guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_4.en: The upgrade preview shows that leveling the Control Nexus to level 2 unlocks the <@gd.key>Growth Chamber</> and raises the <@gd.key>level cap</> of the existing Manufacturing Cabin.

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_5.cn: 您已获得了升级总控中枢所需的特殊材料——<@gd.key>扩容演算芯片</>。
guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_5.en: <@gd.key>Algorithm Expansion Chip</> acquired. It is a special material needed to upgrade the Control Nexus.

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_6.cn: 当其他升级材料满足所需时，可点击“升级”按钮提升<@gd.key>总控中枢等级</>。
guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_6.en: When all upgrade materials have been acquired, click the [Upgrade] button to level up the <@gd.key>Control Nexus</>.

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_6_ct.cn: 当其他升级材料满足所需时，可按下<action=common_confirm>提升<@gd.key>总控中枢等级</>。
guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenter_6_ct.en: When all upgrade materials have been acquired, press <action=common_confirm> to level up the <@gd.key>Control Nexus</>.

guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenterhint_1.cn: 与中控台交互，选择<@gd.key>升级</>可提升总控中枢等级。
guide_text_spaceship_upgradecenterhint_1.en: Interact with the Central Dashboard to <@gd.key>level up</> the Control Nexus.

guide_text_spaceship_upgraderoom_desc_1.cn: 总控中枢等级升级后可提升特定舱室的等级上限，升级这些舱室可提升<@gd.key>进驻干员数量</>并解锁更多<@gd.key>生产内容</>。
guide_text_spaceship_upgraderoom_desc_1.en: Upgrading the Control Nexus also makes some cabin upgrades available. An upgraded cabin can have more <@gd.key>operators assigned</> and more <@gd.key>production options</> unlocked.

guide_text_spaceship_upgraderoom_desc_2.cn: 升级舱室所需的航天建材可在各地的<@gd.key>资源回收站</>中定期收取获得。
guide_text_spaceship_upgraderoom_desc_2.en: Cabin upgrades require Aerospace Materials. These can be regularly gathered from <@gd.key>Recycling Stations</> scattered throughout Talos-II.

guide_text_splitter_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>分流器</>可以将一条传送带上的物品平均分拣到多条传送带上，最多可支持分流成三条传送带。
guide_text_splitter_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Splitter</> can split the product flow of 1 transport belt to up to 3 transport belts.

guide_text_splitter_intro_desc_2.cn: 可在<@gd.key>设备列表</>界面中选择<@gd.key>分流器</>，直接进行放置或放入快捷栏来使用。
guide_text_splitter_intro_desc_2.en: Select the <@gd.key>Splitter</> from the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel, drag it directly into the hotbar, and place it with hotkeys.

guide_text_squirter_connect_1.cn: 洒水机是需要同时<@gd.key>通电</>和<@gd.key>供水</>的设备。
guide_text_squirter_connect_1.en: The Sprinkler is a facility that must be supplied with both <@gd.key>power</> and <@gd.key>Clean Water</>.

guide_text_squirter_connect_2.cn: 所以请先用<@gd.key>管道</>将<@gd.key>水泵</>连向<@gd.key>洒水机</>。
guide_text_squirter_connect_2.en: Place a <@gd.key>pipeline</> to connect the <@gd.key>Fluid Pump</> to the <@gd.key>Sprinkler</>.

guide_text_squirter_final_1.cn: <@gd.key>锦素炒饭</>的材料已齐全，可以在<@gd.key>简易制作</>中制作了。
guide_text_squirter_final_1.en: All <@gd.key>Garden Fried Rice</> ingredients have been acquired. The dish can now be made by accessing the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen.

guide_text_squirter_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>洒水机</>在接入水源后可为需要浇灌的目标进行液体喷洒。
guide_text_squirter_intro_desc_1.en: Connect the <@gd.key>Sprinkler</> to a source of water to sprinkle water on the target.

guide_text_squirter_intro_desc_2.cn: 如果对应目标没有浇灌需求，<@gd.key>洒水机</>会智能停止喷洒。
guide_text_squirter_intro_desc_2.en: The <@gd.key>Sprinkler</> is smart and will automatically stop sprinkling the target if it no longer needs watering.

guide_text_squirter_manual_1.cn: 材料已齐，请打开背包并前往<@gd.key>简易制作</>界面，制作一份<@gd.key>正本补元汤剂</>。
guide_text_squirter_manual_1.en: We now have all the materials required. Go to the Backpack and open the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen to make 1 serving of <@gd.key>Fortifying Infusion</>.

guide_text_squirter_manual_2.cn: 首先，需要打开<@gd.key>简易制作</>界面。
guide_text_squirter_manual_2.en: First, we need to open the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen.

guide_text_squirter_manual_3.cn: 然后，选中<@gd.key>精制食药</>类别。
guide_text_squirter_manual_3.en: Then select the <@gd.key>Fine Food and Medicine (Fine F&M)</> category.

guide_text_squirter_manual_4.cn: 接着，选中<@gd.key>正本补元汤剂</>配方。
guide_text_squirter_manual_4.en: Next, select the formula for <@gd.key>Fortifying Infusion</>.

guide_text_squirter_mention_1.cn: 可以建造更多<@gd.key>水泵</>或利用<@gd.key>管道分流器</>，来为多个<@gd.key>洒水机</>供水。
guide_text_squirter_mention_1.en: Build more <@gd.key>Fluid Pumps</> or use <@gd.key>Pipe Splitters</> to supply multiple <@gd.key>Sprinklers</> with Clean Water.

guide_text_squirter_mention_2.cn: 材料已齐，还记得如何用<@gd.key>简易制作</>制作食物吗？动手试试吧！
guide_text_squirter_mention_2.en: Materials acquired. Remember how to use the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen to make food? Go ahead and give it a try!

guide_text_squirter_pic_1.cn: 在模拟空间中，存在<@gd.key>模拟琼叶参田块</>等<@gd.key>模拟田块</>。它们的<@gd.key>成长速度</>等属性与正常田块有所差异。
guide_text_squirter_pic_1.en: This simulation has <@gd.key>simulation plots</> for growing <@gd.key>Redjade Ginseng</>. The <@gd.key>growth rates</> and other properties of these plots differ from the actual farming plots in the real world.

guide_text_squirter_pic_2.cn: 有些田块在成长中需要<@gd.key>多次浇水</>，利用<@gd.key>洒水机</>可以提高效率。
guide_text_squirter_pic_2.en: Some plots require <@gd.key>multiple rounds of watering</> to cultivate the plant. Use <@gd.key>Sprinklers</> to improve farming efficiency.

guide_text_squirter_soil_1.cn: 洒水机已就绪，我们可以先去对田块进行<@gd.key>育苗</>。
guide_text_squirter_soil_1.en: The Sprinkler is now ready. Let's go to the plot and <@gd.key>germinate</> the plants first.

guide_text_squirter_soil_3.cn: 当田块需要<@gd.key>浇水</>时，洒水机开始自动工作了。
guide_text_squirter_soil_3.en: When the plot needs water, the Sprinkler will automatically <@gd.key>sprinkle</> it with water.

guide_text_squirter_soil_4.cn: 让我们稍作等待，当田块上的琼叶参成熟时，就可以将其采集。
guide_text_squirter_soil_4.en: Let's wait for a while for the Redjade Ginseng in the plot to grow to maturity for harvesting.

guide_text_squirter_soil_5.cn: 琼叶参已成熟，可以进行采集了。
guide_text_squirter_soil_5.en: The Redjade Ginseng is now mature and ready for harvest.

guide_text_squirter_soil_6.cn: 去<@gd.key>简易制作</>查看缺少的材料，找到对应的田块重复刚才学会的步骤吧。
guide_text_squirter_soil_6.en: Open the <@gd.key>Crafting</> screen to check the materials required, then repeat what we just did at the respective plots.

guide_text_start_bomb1_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>爆炸物</>可在<@gd.key>源石材料桶</>处制作。
可参照瞄准线提示，并转动视角进行瞄准，按下攻击键即可扔出。
爆炸物在接触任何物体后，即会发生爆炸，能够爆破某些石块与墙体，并对敌方造成伤害，但<@gd.key>不会</>对友方单位造成伤害。
guide_text_start_bomb1_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Explosives</> can be made by interacting with the <@gd.key>Barrel of Originium</>. Use the aiming guide and adjust the view to aim, then press the attack key to throw the bomb. Thrown explosives detonate upon impact and can demolish certain rocks or walls. They can also deal DMG to enemies but will <@gd.key>not damage</> friendly units.

guide_text_start_bomb1_desc_2.cn:
由于<@gd.key>源石材料桶</>制作的爆炸物稳定性有限，需要在一定范围内才可使用。
当爆炸物远离源石材料桶一定距离，则会挥发消失。
消失之后可等待片刻，则可以在源石材料桶处重新制作。
guide_text_start_bomb1_desc_2.en: The <@gd.key>Barrel of Originium</> only gives unstable explosives. Such explosives must be used within a short range of the barrel and will disappear if taken too far away. If that happens, just wait for a while and make another explosive by interacting with the Barrel of Originium again.

guide_text_start_bomb1_desc_3.cn: 随着集成工业系统的发展和工业技术的研究，可通过协议设备进行批量制造便携的<@gd.key>爆炸物</>。
guide_text_start_bomb1_desc_3.en: As the AIC Factory expands and more AIC technologies are researched, AIC Factory facilities can be used to mass produce portable <@gd.key>explosives</>.

guide_text_start_bomb2.cn: 接近源石材料桶制作爆炸物，按下<action=common_interact>制作。
guide_text_start_bomb2.en: Approach the Barrel of Originium and press <action=common_interact> to make an explosive.

guide_text_start_bomb2_mb.cn: 靠近源石材料桶并点击"制作爆炸物"即可使用。
guide_text_start_bomb2_mb.en: Approach the Barrel of Originium and tap [Make Explosives] to use it.

guide_text_start_bomb3.cn: <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>移动视角进行瞄准，按下<action=battle_attack_start>扔出爆炸物。
guide_text_start_bomb3.en: Move the view and aim with <image="KeyIcon/icon_pc_rotate_mouse2" scale=1.3>. Press <action=battle_attack_start> to throw the explosive.

guide_text_start_bomb3_mb.cn: 转动视角进行瞄准，按下攻击键扔出爆炸物。
guide_text_start_bomb3_mb.en: Adjust the view to aim, then tap the attack button to throw the explosive.

guide_text_start_techtree_1.cn: 请按下快捷键<action=fac_open_tech_tree>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>。
guide_text_start_techtree_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_open_tech_tree> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>.

guide_text_start_techtree_13.cn: 点击此处关闭工业发展规划。
guide_text_start_techtree_13.en: Click here to close the AIC Factory Plan.

guide_text_start_techtree_13_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_cancel>关闭工业发展规划。
guide_text_start_techtree_13_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the AIC Factory Plan.

guide_text_start_techtree_1_mb.cn: 请点击此处进入<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>。
guide_text_start_techtree_1_mb.en: Tap here to enter the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>.

guide_text_start_techtree_2.cn:
<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>详细地展示了工业技术的发展路线。
从上到下，每个节点代表一项<@gd.key>工业技术</>。
guide_text_start_techtree_2.en: The <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</> gives a detailed display of AIC technology and development tree. The tree goes from top to bottom, with every node representing an <@gd.key>AIC technology</>.

guide_text_start_techtree_3.cn:
<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>共分为三期计划。
只有推进主线任务获得<@gd.key>拓展核心</>后，才可开启下一期计划。
guide_text_start_techtree_3.en: <@gd.key>The AIC Factory Plan</> is divided into 3 phases. Progress through the main mission and acquire <@gd.key>Expansion Cores</> to unlock the next phase.

guide_text_start_techtree_4.cn: 根据工业技术功能的不同，<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>还分为多个系列工业技术。
guide_text_start_techtree_4.en: The <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</> is also divided into different AIC technology series based on their functions.

guide_text_start_techtree_5.cn:
目前工业发展规划已经完成一部分<@gd.key>基础工业技术</>的研究。
您可以结合工厂的发展需要，决定后续的工业技术研究方向。
guide_text_start_techtree_5.en: We have currently researched some <@gd.key>Basic AIC</> technologies in the AIC Factory Plan. Check what the AIC Factory needs to choose the AIC technology to research next.

guide_text_start_techtree_6.cn: 先预览一下之后的目标，研究<@gd.key>中级矿物采掘</>工业技术后，可以制造<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>。
guide_text_start_techtree_6.en: Let's take a look at our next goals. Researching the <@gd.key>Mining II</> AIC technology can let us construct <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</>.

guide_text_start_techtree_6_ct.cn:
先预览一下之后的目标，研究<@gd.key>中级矿物采掘</>工业技术后，可以制造<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>。
请按下<action=common_confirm>选中。
guide_text_start_techtree_6_ct.en: Let's take a look at our next goals. Researching the <@gd.key>Mining II</> AIC technology lets us construct <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rigs</>. Press <action=common_confirm> to select it.

guide_text_start_techtree_7.cn: <@gd.key>电驱矿机</>可以采集更高级的矿物，并在野外将矿物<@gd.key>无线传输</>至仓库。
guide_text_start_techtree_7.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> can mine higher tier minerals. In the wilderness, the rig can use <@gd.key>belt-free transfer</> to move the mined minerals from its cache to the Depot directly.

guide_text_start_techtree_8.cn: 研究<@gd.key>中级矿物采掘</>工业技术需要<@gd.key>基础工业点数</>，可通过激活<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>获得。
guide_text_start_techtree_8.en: Researching the AIC technology <@gd.key>Mining II</> needs <@gd.key>Basic AIC Index</>. Activate <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</> to get more Indices.

guide_text_steam_blocker_desc_1.cn: 蒸汽以高压能形成<@gd.key>无法肉身逾越的阻挡</>。被蒸汽冲刷时不会受到伤害，但会被<@gd.key>击退</>。
guide_text_steam_blocker_desc_1.en: Pressurized steam can create <@gd.key>impassable barriers</>. Though the steam inflicts no damage, it can <@gd.key>knock people back</>.

guide_text_steam_blocker_desc_2.cn: 借助旧式传送带上的货物箱，能避免蒸汽的冲刷，安全到达终点。
guide_text_steam_blocker_desc_2.en: Use cargo crates on the old conveyor belts to block the venting steam and acquire safe passage to the destination.

guide_text_steam_blocker_title_2.en: Hot Steam: Cargo Crate and Cover

guide_text_storage_filter_hint_1.cn: 使用<@gd.key>筛选</>功能，可自定义选择需要一键存放的物品类别
guide_text_storage_filter_hint_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>filter</> function to customize the types of items to move via the Quick Stash button.

guide_text_storage_hint_1.cn: 在详情页中，可以直接将物品存放入仓库，或者将仓库中物品直接放入缓存区。
guide_text_storage_hint_1.en: When the panel is open, items in the facility can be directly placed in the Depot. Items in the Depot can also be placed in the facility cache.

guide_text_storage_mode_1.cn: 在仓储管理模式下，可使用<@gd.key>一键存放</>功能将背包中的所有物品一键存入仓库，以获得更大的背包容量。
guide_text_storage_mode_1.en: Storage management includes a <@gd.key>Quick Stash</> feature that moves Backpack items to the Depot, freeing up Backpack space.

guide_text_storage_mode_2.cn:
一键存放配备了<@gd.key>筛选</>功能，可自定义选择需要一键存放的物品类别。
请点击此处查看。
guide_text_storage_mode_2.en: Quick Stash also includes a <@gd.key>filter</> function to customize the type of items to be moved via Quick Stash. Click here to view the filter options.

guide_text_storage_mode_2_ct.cn:
一键存放配备了<@gd.key>筛选</>功能，可自定义选择需要一键存放的物品类别。
请<@gd.key>长按</><action=inv_quick_stash>查看。
guide_text_storage_mode_2_ct.en: Quick Stash also includes a <@gd.key>filter</> function to customize the type of items to be moved via Quick Stash. <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=inv_quick_stash> to view it.

guide_text_storage_mode_hint_1.cn: 在<@gd.key>协议传送点</>的安全区范围内，可以按下<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处同时打开背包与仓库。
guide_text_storage_mode_hint_1.en: While in the <@gd.key>TP Point</> safe zone, press <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open both the Backpack and Depot.

guide_text_storager_intro_desc_1.cn: <@gd.key>协议储存箱</>可存放物品，并在通电后可以将储存物品以一定间隔传输回仓库。
guide_text_storager_intro_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> can store items. When powered, the Protocol Stash can also deliver stored items to the Depot on a regular basis.

guide_text_storager_intro_desc_2.cn: <@gd.key>协议储存箱</>也可以通过连接<@gd.key>传送带</>来运输储存的物品。
guide_text_storager_intro_desc_2.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> can also be connected to <@gd.key>transport belts</> to move stored items into the AIC.

guide_text_subhub_hint2_1.cn: 请按照指示标记，靠近<@gd.key>协议核心取货口4</>，打开取货口界面。
guide_text_subhub_hint2_1.en: Follow the indication marker and approach <@gd.key>PAC output port 4</>, then open the output port panel.

guide_text_subhub_hint_1.cn:
<@gd.key>次级核心</>需要<@gd.key>接入电网</>后才可正常运转。
请从其他<@gd.key>中继器</>开始向次级核心完成电力运输。
guide_text_subhub_hint_1.en: The <@gd.key>Sub-PAC</> must be <@gd.key>connected to the power grid</> to work properly. Hence, power must be transmitted from a <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> to a Sub-PAC for it to work.

guide_text_super_pressure_board_desc_1.cn: 使用<@gd.key>下落攻击</>击打压力板凸起部分时，可将其激活。
guide_text_super_pressure_board_desc_1.en: Perform a <@gd.key>dive attack</> to hit the protruding part of a pressure plate and activate it.

guide_text_super_pressure_board_desc_2.cn: 有些环境中，压力板的周围会存在控制它们的<@gd.key>平衡总控开关</>，需要先触摸平衡总控开关<@gd.key>观察压力板的点亮顺序</>，再依次<@gd.key>按顺序激活</>全部压力板。
guide_text_super_pressure_board_desc_2.en: Certain areas have <@gd.key>main balance switches</> near pressure plates. Interact with the switch first. The pressure plates will light up in a particular sequence. <@gd.key>Memorize this sequence</> and <@gd.key>hit the plates accordingly</> to activate the switch.

guide_text_switch_general_ability.cn: <@gd.key>长按</><action=general_ability_press>，可进行便捷工具的切换，比如切换为<@gd.key>拍照</>拍摄管理员喜欢的景色。
guide_text_switch_general_ability.en: <@gd.key>Long-press</> <action=general_ability_press> to switch the Easy Tools action. An example would be <@gd.key>Camera</> for taking photos of various beautiful scenes, Endministrator.

guide_text_switch_general_ability_mb.cn: <@gd.key>长按</>此处，可进行便捷工具的切换，比如切换为<@gd.key>拍照</>拍摄管理员喜欢的景色。
guide_text_switch_general_ability_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap and hold</> here to switch the Easy Tools action. An example would be <@gd.key>Camera</> for taking photos of various beautiful scenes, Endministrator.

guide_text_switch_hint.en: Press <action=battle_switch_char_next> or <action=battle_switch_char_1>-<action=battle_switch_char_4> to switch the controlled operator.

guide_text_switch_hint_ct.cn: 可按下<action=battle_switch_char_next>或者按住<action=common_indicator_start>并按下<action=common_navigation_4_dir_up>切换主控干员。
guide_text_switch_hint_ct.en: Press <action=battle_switch_char_next> or hold <action=common_indicator_start> and press <action=common_navigation_4_dir_up> to switch the controlled operator.

guide_text_switch_hint_mb.cn: 可通过点击干员头像，切换主控干员。
guide_text_switch_hint_mb.en: Tap the operator's portrait to switch the controlled operator.

guide_text_switch_mode_1.cn: 可以按下快捷键<action=common_switch_mode>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，切换回<@gd.key>探索模式</>，便于进行探索与战斗。
guide_text_switch_mode_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=common_switch_mode> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to switch to <@gd.key>Explore Mode</> that is more conducive for world exploration or fighting enemies.

guide_text_switch_mode_1_mb.cn: 可以点击此处，切换回<@gd.key>探索模式</>，便于进行探索与战斗。
guide_text_switch_mode_1_mb.en: Tap here to switch to <@gd.key>Explore Mode</> that is more conducive for world exploration or fighting enemies.

guide_text_switch_storage_1.cn: 请点击此处，切换至<@gd.key>四号谷地仓库</>。
guide_text_switch_storage_1.en: Click here to switch to the <@gd.key>Valley IV Depot</>.

guide_text_switch_techtree.cn: 如果需要查看其他工业发展规划，可点击此处进行切换。
guide_text_switch_techtree.en: To view another AIC Factory Plan, click here to switch.

guide_text_switch_techtree_ct.cn: 如果需要查看其他工业发展规划，可<@gd.key>长按</><action=tech_tree_open_package>进行切换。
guide_text_switch_techtree_ct.en: To view another AIC Factory Plan, <@gd.key>press and hold</> <action=tech_tree_open_package> to switch.

guide_text_take_photo_hint.cn: 拍照视野中出现<@gd.key>拍摄目标</>时，<@gd.key>快门键</>会亮起，此时按下快门键即可完成监测委托。
guide_text_take_photo_hint.en: When the <@gd.key>photography target</> appears in the view of the camera, the <@gd.key>shutter button</> will be highlighted. Press the shutter to complete the monitoring job.

guide_text_take_picture_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Camera</> action to take photos.

guide_text_take_picture_2.cn: 直接按下<@gd.key>快门</>，即可拍下照片。
guide_text_take_picture_2.en: Press the <@gd.key>shutter</> to take the photo.

guide_text_take_picture_3.cn: 可以使用<@gd.key>焦距滑条</>，以调整相机的焦距。
guide_text_take_picture_3.en: Use the <@gd.key>focus</> slider to adjust the camera's focus.

guide_text_take_picture_4.cn: 若想尝试更多功能，可在此处展开列表。
guide_text_take_picture_4.en: Expand this list to try more functions.

guide_text_talent_tree_1.cn: 这里是干员的<@gd.key>天赋阵列</>，可以在这里查看干员所有的战斗技能、能力与天赋、精英化进程。
guide_text_talent_tree_1.en: This is the <@gd.key>Ability Matrix</>. It shows the operator's battle skills, talents, and promotion progress.

guide_text_talent_tree_2.cn: 在战斗技能区域，可以对干员的各个技能进行升级，增强干员各项战斗能力。
guide_text_talent_tree_2.en: Use the Combat section to upgrade the operator's combat skills and improve the operator's combat performance.

guide_text_talent_tree_3.cn: 在能力与天赋区域，可以激活干员的各种<@gd.key>技能节点</>，增强干员各方面的能力。
guide_text_talent_tree_3.en: Use this section to activate various <@gd.key>Talent Nodes</> and improve operator performance in various areas.

guide_text_talent_tree_4.cn: 在精英化节点区域，可以激活干员的<@gd.key>精英化</>以及<@gd.key>装备适配能力</>。
guide_text_talent_tree_4.en: The Elite section has a series of promotion nodes. <@gd.key>Promote</> the operator or give the operator <@gd.key>outfitting skills</>.

guide_text_talent_tree_5.cn: 只有达到相应等级后，才可以对干员进行<@gd.key>精英化</>。
guide_text_talent_tree_5.en: Reach the required level first to <@gd.key>promote</> the operator.

guide_text_talent_tree_6.cn: 可以点击此处，进行干员升级。
guide_text_talent_tree_6.en: Click here to level up the operator.

guide_text_talent_tree_6_ct.en: Press <action=char_info_talent_go_to_level_up> to level up the operator.

guide_text_talent_tree_7.cn: 成功激活精英化后，可将干员的<@gd.key>战斗技能</>提升至更高等级，并为干员激活更多的<@gd.key>能力与天赋节点</>。
guide_text_talent_tree_7.en: Promote operators to level up their <@gd.key>battle skills</>. Promotions also unlock more <@gd.key>skill and talent nodes</>.

guide_text_team_0.cn: 请按下<action=common_main_hud_toggle_expand>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，展开使用更多功能。
guide_text_team_0.en: Press <action=common_main_hud_toggle_expand> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to display additional functions.

guide_text_team_0_ct.cn: 有新干员加入了，请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_team_0_ct.en: A new operator has joined us. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_team_0_mb.cn: 请点击此处，展开使用更多功能。
guide_text_team_0_mb.en: Tap here to display additional functions.

guide_text_team_1.cn:
有新干员加入了，
请按下<action=common_open_team_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入<@gd.key>编队</>界面。
guide_text_team_1.en: A new operator has joined us. Press <action=common_open_team_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to enter the <@gd.key>Team</> screen.

guide_text_team_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，进入<@gd.key>编队</>界面。
guide_text_team_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to select this option and open the <@gd.key>Team</> screen.

guide_text_team_1_mb.cn:
有新干员加入了，
请点击此处进入<@gd.key>编队</>界面。
guide_text_team_1_mb.en: A new operator has joined us. Tap here to enter the <@gd.key>Team</> screen.

guide_text_team_2.cn:
在编队界面中，您可以查看并调整当前探索小队的编队情况。
请合理安排干员编队，以应对不同的挑战。
guide_text_team_2.en: Use the Team screen to view and adjust the lineup of the exploration team. Try to deploy operators who can better deal with the current challenges and threats.

guide_text_team_3.cn: 一支小队最多可编入<@gd.key>四名干员</>，请点击当前的小队空位。
guide_text_team_3.en: Up to <@gd.key>4 operators</> can be deployed in a team. Click on an empty team position.

guide_text_team_3_1_ct.cn: 请再次按下<action=char_formation_slot_next>或向右推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6>操作杆，切换至当前的小队空位。
guide_text_team_3_1_ct.en: Press <action=char_formation_slot_next> again or push <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6> stick to the right again to move to the empty team slot.

guide_text_team_3_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=char_formation_slot_confirm>，选择当前的小队空位。
guide_text_team_3_2_ct.en: Press <action=char_formation_slot_confirm> to select the empty team slot.

guide_text_team_3_ct.cn:
一支小队最多可编入<@gd.key>四名干员</>，
请按下<action=char_formation_slot_next>或向右推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6>操作杆，切换至右侧的小队位置。
guide_text_team_3_ct.en: Up to <@gd.key>4 operators</> can be deployed in a team. Press <action=char_formation_slot_next> or push <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_leftstick" scale=1.6> stick to the right to switch to the team positions on the right side.

guide_text_team_4.cn: 请选择刚才加入的新干员。
guide_text_team_4.en: Select the operator who just joined us.

guide_text_team_5.cn: 点击<@gd.key>编入队伍</>按钮，将她编入小队。
guide_text_team_5.en: Click the <@gd.key>Add to Team</> button to add the operator to the team.

guide_text_team_5_ct.cn: 已为您选中刚才加入的新干员，请按下<action=common_confirm>，将她编入小队。
guide_text_team_5_ct.en: The operator who just joined us has already been selected. Press <action=common_confirm> to add her to the team.

guide_text_team_6.cn: 按下<action=common_cancel>或点击此处关闭编队界面。
guide_text_team_6.en: Press <action=common_cancel> or click here to close the Team screen.

guide_text_team_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_cancel> to close the Team screen.

guide_text_team_6_mb.cn: 点击此处关闭编队界面。
guide_text_team_6_mb.en: Tap here to close the Team screen.

guide_text_team_combo_1.cn: 成功通过<@gd.key>重击</>触发了<@gd.key>佩丽卡的连携技</>。
guide_text_team_combo_1.en: <@gd.key>Final Strike</> has successfully triggered <@gd.key>Perlica's combo skill</>.

guide_text_team_combo_2.cn: 按下 <action=battle_skill_combo_cast> 施放<@gd.key>佩丽卡的连携技</>。

guide_text_team_combo_2_mb.cn: 点击此处，施放<@gd.key>佩丽卡的连携技</>。
guide_text_team_combo_2_mb.en: Tap here to cast <@gd.key>Perlica's combo skill</>.

guide_text_team_combo_intro_1.cn: 接下来这个敌人更具威胁，我们可以使用<@gd.key>连携技</>来对付它。
guide_text_team_combo_intro_1.en: This enemy is more dangerous. We can try using <@gd.key>combo skills</> to defeat it.

guide_text_team_combo_intro_2.cn: 每位干员都有<@gd.key>连携技</>。连携技不消耗技力，但需要<@gd.key>满足一定条件</>才能使用，且发动后进入冷却。
guide_text_team_combo_intro_2.en: Every operator has a <@gd.key>combo skill</>. Casting combo skills does not consume Skill Points (SP) but the <@gd.key>casting criteria</> must be met. Combo skills will enter a cooldown period after casting.

guide_text_team_combo_intro_2_2.cn: 当干员普通攻击的<@gd.key>最后一击</>造成<@gd.key>重击</>时，就可以触发<@gd.key>佩丽卡的连携技</>。
guide_text_team_combo_intro_2_2.en: <@gd.key>Final Strike</> is the <@gd.key>last basic attack sequence</>. Hit enemies with Final Strike to trigger <@gd.key>Perlica's combo skill</>.

guide_text_team_combo_intro_n.cn: 使用普通攻击的<@gd.key>最后一击</>触发<@gd.key>重击</>，然后施放<@gd.key>佩丽卡的连携技</>。
guide_text_team_combo_intro_n.en: The <@gd.key>last sequence</> of basic attack is the <@gd.key>Final Strike</>. Hitting enemies with Final Strike allows the casting of <@gd.key>Perlica's combo skill</>.

guide_text_team_combo_n.cn: 使用连携技<@gd.key>有冷却时间</>但<@gd.key>不会消耗技力</>，可以多多尝试。
guide_text_team_combo_n.en: Combo skills have <@gd.key>casting cooldowns</> but cost no <@gd.key>Skill Points (SP)</> to cast. Try casting combo skills as often as possible.

guide_text_team_desc_1.cn:
随着更多的干员加入，可以灵活调整编队以应对不同的环境。
可在主界面上通过快捷键和编队入口快捷进入，也可从表盘的入口进入编队，进行干员的调整。
guide_text_team_desc_1.en: Having more operators allows the creation of different teams for handling various situations. Use the hotkey or the portal button at the main screen, or the Team button at the Protosync to create and edit teams.

guide_text_team_intro_1.cn: 可以有多名干员参与战斗。
guide_text_team_intro_1.en: Operators can fight together as a team.

guide_text_team_intro_2.cn: 接下来，佩丽卡也会参与到战斗中。当主控干员进行战斗时，其他干员会<@gd.key>自动进行战斗</>。
guide_text_team_intro_2.en: Perlica will be joining the battle. When the controlled operator starts fighting, other operators will also <@gd.key>fight automatically</>.

guide_text_team_skill_1.cn: 小队作战中，可以使用队友的技能。
guide_text_team_skill_1.en: Fighting as a team allows the casting of the teammates' skills.

guide_text_team_skill_2.cn: 短按数字键 <action=battle_use_char_skill_2> 使用<@gd.key>佩丽卡的战技</>。
guide_text_team_skill_2.en: Press the number key <action=battle_use_char_skill_2> to cast <@gd.key>Perlica's battle skill</>.

guide_text_team_skill_2_ct.cn: 按住<action=common_indicator_start>并短按<action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_1>，使用<@gd.key>佩丽卡的战技</>。
guide_text_team_skill_2_ct.en: While holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_1> to cast <@gd.key>Perlica's battle skill</>.

guide_text_team_skill_2_mb.cn: 点击此处，使用<@gd.key>佩丽卡的战技</>。
guide_text_team_skill_2_mb.en: Tap here to cast <@gd.key>Perlica's battle skill</>.

guide_text_team_skill_n.cn: 所有小队成员<@gd.key>共用技力</>，可以根据情景灵活使用。
guide_text_team_skill_n.en: The team shares a <@gd.key>single Skill Points (SP) pool</>. Use the SP and cast skills accordingly.

guide_text_tech2_hint_1.cn:
当前已拥有<@gd.key>基础拓展核心</>，
可解锁<@gd.key>基础工业二期</>。
guide_text_tech2_hint_1.en: <@gd.key>Basic Expansion Core</> acquired. <@gd.key>Basic AIC II</> can now be unlocked.

guide_text_thickener_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>研磨机</>可以将含有研磨标签的材料进行合成生产，制造出更细密的材料粉末，同时需要研磨辅材。
典型产物为<#item.ironEnrPowder>致密蓝铁粉末</>，由<#item.ironPowder>蓝铁粉末</>和<#item.plantMossPowder3>砂叶粉末</>放入<@gd.key>研磨机</>后合成获得。
guide_text_thickener_intro_desc_1.en:
The <@gd.key>Grinding Unit</> can process materials with the [Grind] tag to make dense and finer powders with the help of grinding materials. 
Typical product: <#item.ironEnrPowder>Dense Ferrium Powder</>, made by placing <#item.ironPowder>Ferrium Powder</> and <#item.plantMossPowder3>Sandleaf Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Grinding Unit</>.

guide_text_timid_insect_desc_1.cn:
当进入<@gd.key>胆小源石虫</>附近一定半径范围内时，它便会开始逃窜。
胆小源石虫的逃窜速度非常快，且会用滚动的姿态保护自己。
guide_text_timid_insect_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Timid Originium Slug</> will start escaping when someone enters their alert radius. It is extremely fast and can even roll around to protect itself.

guide_text_timid_insect_desc_2.cn: 胆小源石虫沿着固定的轨迹在场景中逃窜，并会在<@gd.key>晕头转向的时候</>停下来休息。注意观察它停留的位置。
guide_text_timid_insect_desc_2.en: The Timid Originium Slug only runs along fixed paths and will stop to rest at nearby locations with Originium formations when it is <@gd.key>dazed</>. Take a note of its resting spots.

guide_text_timid_insect_desc_3.cn: 当胆小源石虫休息的时候，可以<@gd.key>靠近它并按下交互键</>进行捕捉。
guide_text_timid_insect_desc_3.en: <@gd.key>Approach</> a resting Timid Originium Slug and <@gd.key>press the interact key</> to capture it.

guide_text_timid_insect_desc_4.cn: 胆小源石虫滚动时无法进行捕捉，需要判断胆小源石虫休息的位置，先于它抵达，以完成捕捉。
guide_text_timid_insect_desc_4.en: A rolling Timid Originium Slug cannot be captured. Study where the slug is resting, then get there before the slug arrives to complete the capture.

guide_text_timid_insect_title_2.cn: 胆小源石虫的逃窜轨迹

guide_text_timid_insect_title_4.cn: 预判胆小源石虫的位置
guide_text_timid_insect_title_4.en: Timid Originium Slug: Predict the Resting Place

guide_text_tools_asm_mc_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>封装机</>可以将含有封装标签的材料进行合成生产，可制造爆破装置或电池产品。
典型产物为<#item.procBattery1>低容谷地电池</>，由<#item.glassCmpt>紫晶零件</>和<#item.originiumPowder>源石粉末</>放入<@gd.key>封装机</>后合成获得。
guide_text_tools_asm_mc_intro_desc_1.en:
The <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> can process materials with the [Package] tag to make explosives or batteries.
Typical product 1: <#item.procBattery1>LC Valley Battery</>, made by placing <#item.glassCmpt>Amethyst Part</> and <#item.originiumPowder>Originium Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</>.

guide_text_tools_asm_mc_intro_desc_2.cn:
<@gd.key>封装机</>可以将含有封装标签的材料进行合成生产，可制造爆破装置或电池产品。
典型产物之二为<#item.procBomb>工业爆炸物</>，由<#item.glassCmpt>紫晶零件</>和<#item.bbflowerPowder>酮化灌木粉末</>放入<@gd.key>封装机</>合成获得。
guide_text_tools_asm_mc_intro_desc_2.en:
The <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> can process materials with the [Package] tag to make explosives or batteries.
Typical product 2: <#item.procBomb>Industrial Explosive</>, made by placing <#item.glassCmpt>Amethyst Part</> and <#item.bbflowerPowder>Aketine Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_0.cn: 点击此处，选择<@gd.key>封装工艺</>工业技术。
guide_text_tools_bomb_0.en: Click here to select the AIC technology: <@gd.key>Packaging</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_0_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>封装工艺</>工业技术。
guide_text_tools_bomb_0_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select the AIC technology: <@gd.key>Packaging</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_1.cn: 点击此处，查看<@gd.key>封装机</>的配方。
guide_text_tools_bomb_1.en: Click here to view the formulas of the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_10.cn: 再次点击物品或点击<@gd.key>配方跳转</>可以跳转至紫晶零件的配方显示。
guide_text_tools_bomb_10.en: Click on the item again or click <@gd.key>Formula</> to open the formula for producing Amethyst Parts.

guide_text_tools_bomb_10_ct.cn: 按下<action=fac_main_hud_pin_apply_craft>可以跳转至紫晶零件的配方显示。
guide_text_tools_bomb_10_ct.en: Press <action=fac_main_hud_pin_apply_craft> to open the formula for producing Amethyst Parts.

guide_text_tools_bomb_11.cn: 可以看到<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>需要使用<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>通过<@gd.key>配件机</>进行生产。
guide_text_tools_bomb_11.en: This shows that <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</> are produced by processing <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> with the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_12.cn: 按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，可以<@gd.key>返回</>之前标记的工业爆炸物配方。
guide_text_tools_bomb_12.en: Hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to <@gd.key>return</> to Industrial Explosives formula pinned earlier.

guide_text_tools_bomb_12_ct.cn: 按下<action=fac_main_hud_pin_previous>可以<@gd.key>返回</>之前标记的工业爆炸物配方。
guide_text_tools_bomb_12_ct.en: Press <action=fac_main_hud_pin_previous> to <@gd.key>return</> to the Industrial Explosive formula pinned earlier.

guide_text_tools_bomb_12_mb.cn: 点击此处，可以<@gd.key>返回</>之前标记的工业爆炸物配方。
guide_text_tools_bomb_12_mb.en: Tap here to <@gd.key>return</> to the Industrial Explosive formula pinned earlier.

guide_text_tools_bomb_13.cn: 现在通过主界面上标记的配方提示完成<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>的生产吧。
guide_text_tools_bomb_13.en: Now refer to the pinned formula shown at the main screen and produce <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_13_ct.cn: 现在按下<action=fac_main_hud_pin_unfocus>退出配方操作，通过主界面上标记的配方提示完成<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>的生产吧。
guide_text_tools_bomb_13_ct.en: Now press <action=fac_main_hud_pin_unfocus> to close the Formula screen, then refer to the pinned formula shown at the main screen and produce <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_1_ct.en: Press <action=fac_machine_show_formula> to view the formulas of the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_2.cn: 在这里可以看到，制造<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>需要使用<@gd.key>酮化灌木粉末</>和<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>这两种材料。
guide_text_tools_bomb_2.en: We can see that producing <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</> needs 2 materials: <@gd.key>Aketine Powder</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Parts</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_3.cn: 我们需要将之前采集的<@gd.key>酮化灌木</>通过<@gd.key>粉碎机</>研磨为<@gd.key>粉末</>，之后再输送到封装机中进行加工。
guide_text_tools_bomb_3.en: We need to shred the <@gd.key>Aketine</> we have gathered with the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> to get <@gd.key>Aketine Powder</>, then move the powder to the Packaging Unit for production.

guide_text_tools_bomb_4.cn: 而另一种材料<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>可以通过将<@gd.key>紫晶矿</>依次输送到<@gd.key>精炼炉</>和<@gd.key>配件机</>中加工获得。
guide_text_tools_bomb_4.en: The other material, <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</>, can be produced by first processing <@gd.key>Amethyst Ore</> at the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> into Amethyst Fiber, and then processing the fiber at the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> to get the product.

guide_text_tools_bomb_5.cn: 点击此处，可以将工业爆炸物的<@gd.key>配方标记</>在主界面上。
guide_text_tools_bomb_5.en: Click here to <@gd.key>pin the formula</> of Industrial Explosives so it can be seen at the main screen.

guide_text_tools_bomb_5_ct.cn: 按下<action=fac_machine_toggle_formula>，可以将工业爆炸物的<@gd.key>配方标记</>在主界面上。
guide_text_tools_bomb_5_ct.en: Press <action=fac_machine_toggle_formula> to <@gd.key>pin the formula</> of Industrial Explosives so it can be seen at the main screen.

guide_text_tools_bomb_6.cn: 点击此处，关闭配方界面。
guide_text_tools_bomb_6.en: Click here to close the formula screen.

guide_text_tools_bomb_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_back> to close the formula screen.

guide_text_tools_bomb_7.en: Close the Packaging Unit control panel.

guide_text_tools_bomb_7_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_back>关闭封装机操作面板。
guide_text_tools_bomb_7_ct.en: Press <action=common_back> to close the Packaging Unit control panel.

guide_text_tools_bomb_8.cn: 标记的<@gd.key>配方</>会在这里显示。

guide_text_tools_bomb_9.cn: 按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>可查看道具详情和进行<@gd.key>配方跳转</>。
guide_text_tools_bomb_9.en: Press and hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</> to view item details and its <@gd.key>Formula</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_9_1_ct.cn: 按下<action=item_tips_navi_to_obtain_ways>可查看道具详情和进行<@gd.key>配方跳转</>。
guide_text_tools_bomb_9_1_ct.en: Press <action=item_tips_navi_to_obtain_ways> to view item details and its <@gd.key>Formula</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_9_ct.cn: 按住<action=fac_main_right_active>可以展开<@gd.key>标记配方操作</>。
guide_text_tools_bomb_9_ct.en: Hold down <action=fac_main_right_active> to expand the <@gd.key>pinned formula</>.

guide_text_tools_bomb_9_mb.cn: 点击<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>可查看道具详情和进行<@gd.key>配方跳转</>。
guide_text_tools_bomb_9_mb.en: Tap <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</> to view item details and its <@gd.key>Formula</>.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_1.cn: 我们现在可以前往<@gd.key>帝江号</>了，请按下<action=common_open_map>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开地图。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_1.en: We can now board <@gd.key>Dijiang</>. Press <action=common_open_map> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the map.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_1_ct.cn: 我们现在可以前往<@gd.key>帝江号</>了，请按下<action=common_open_map>打开地图。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_1_ct.en: We can now board <@gd.key>Dijiang</>. Press <action=common_open_map> to open the map.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_1_mb.cn: 我们现在可以前往<@gd.key>帝江号</>，请点击此处打开地图。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_1_mb.en: We can now board <@gd.key>Dijiang</>. Tap here to open the map.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_3.cn: <@gd.key>帝江号</>已被标记在了地图上，点击此处，即可前往。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_3.en: <@gd.key>Dijiang</> has been marked on the map. Click here to board the ship.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_3_ct.cn: <@gd.key>帝江号</>已被标记在了地图上，按下<action=map_jump_to_spaceship>即可前往。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_3_ct.en: <@gd.key>Dijiang</> has been marked on the map. Press <action=map_jump_to_spaceship> to board the ship.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_4.cn: 终末地工业的工作人员已经帮我们激活了<@gd.key>协议传送点</>，点击此处选中。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_4.en: Fellow Endfielders have activated the <@gd.key>TP Point</> for us. Click here to select it.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_4_ct.cn: 终末地工业的工作人员已经帮我们激活了<@gd.key>协议传送点</>，请按下<action=navigation_target_click>进行选中。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_4_ct.en: Fellow Endfielders have activated the <@gd.key>TP Point</> for us. Press <action=navigation_target_click> to select it.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_5.cn: 请点击此处，选择<@gd.key>协议传送点</>。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_5.en: Click here to select the <@gd.key>TP Point</>.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_6.cn: 点击此处，即可直接传送至<@gd.key>帝江号</>。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_6.en: Click here to immediately teleport to <@gd.key>Dijiang</>.

guide_text_tp_spaceship_6_ct.cn: 按下<action=map_detail_common_right_btn_click>即可直接传送至<@gd.key>帝江号</>。

guide_text_tp_spaceship_hint_1.cn: 请按下<action=common_open_map>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开地图前往<@gd.key>帝江号</>。
guide_text_tp_spaceship_hint_1.en: Press <action=common_open_map> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the map and board <@gd.key>Dijiang</>.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_1.cn: 敌人施放部分技能时会进入<@gd.key>蓄力</>状态，期间身上会有<@gd.key>红色的警示光圈</>。
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_1.en: Enemies may enter the <@gd.key>charging status</> when casting certain skills, during which they would display <@gd.key>a red circle as a visual cue</>.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_10.cn: 就是这样！警示光圈为白色时做好准备，变为<@gd.key>红色</>后用技能<@gd.key>打断</>敌人！
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_10.en: That's it! Get prepared when the white circle appears. Once it <@gd.key>turns red</>, cast a skill to <@gd.key>interrupt</> the enemy!

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_2.cn: 此时，用技能命中敌人可以<@gd.key>打断</>蓄力。
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_2.en: When this happens, hit the enemy with a skill to <@gd.key>interrupt</> the charge up.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_3.cn: 试试用自己的技能<@gd.key>打断</>那个大个子！
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_3.en: Try casting skills to <@gd.key>interrupt</> the big one!

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_4.cn: 就是现在！<@gd.key>打断</>敌人的攻击！

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_5.cn: 做得好！成功<@gd.key>打断</>会停止敌人动作，并累积失衡值。
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_5.en: Excellent! Successful <@gd.key>interruption</> will stop the enemy's action and deal Stagger.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_6.cn: 接下来，多多利用<@gd.key>打断</>解决敌人！
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_6.en: Now, make use of <@gd.key>interrupt</> to defeat the enemy!

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_7.cn: 面前的敌人身上将出现<@gd.key>白色</>警示光圈，提示敌人<@gd.key>即将开始蓄力</>。
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_7.en: A <@gd.key>white circle</> has appeared on this enemy. This shows that the enemy is <@gd.key>about to charge up a skill</>.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_7_1.en: Try <@gd.key>interrupting</> the enemy at this time.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_7_2.cn: 警示光圈为<@gd.key>白色</>期间，敌人还<@gd.key>无法被打断</>。
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_7_2.en: An enemy <@gd.key>cannot be interrupted</> while the <@gd.key>white circle</> is present.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_7_3.cn: 稍加等待，警示光圈将从白色<@gd.key>变为红色</>。
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_7_3.en: Wait for the white circle to <@gd.key>turn red</>.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_8.cn: 出现<@gd.key>红色</>警示光圈，才表示敌人可以被<@gd.key>打断</>。现在，<@gd.key>打断</>目标！
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_8.en: The <@gd.key>red</> circle indicates that the enemy can be <@gd.key>interrupted</>. Now is the time to <@gd.key>interrupt</> the target!

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_8_1.cn: 注意：警示光圈由白色变为<@gd.key>红色</>时，才可以<@gd.key>打断</>。
guide_text_training_01_interrupt_8_1.en: NOTE: Enemies can only be <@gd.key>interrupted</> when the white circle turns into a <@gd.key>red circle</>.

guide_text_training_01_interrupt_skillHi.en: Hold down <action=common_indicator_start> and press <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_1> to cast a battle skill.

guide_text_training_01_mediaGuide_1.cn:
敌人施放一些技能时会进入<@ba.key>蓄力</>状态，期间身上会有<@ba.key>警示光圈</>。
此时使用<@ba.key>技能</>对其造成伤害可以将其<@ba.key>打断</>，敌人会停止行动并累积<@ba.poise>失衡值</>。
guide_text_training_01_mediaGuide_1.en: Enemies may enter a <@ba.key>charging</> state when casting certain skills. This is indicated by a <@ba.key>red circle</> around them. Dealing DMG to an enemy in charging state with <@ba.key>skills</> will <@ba.key>interrupt</> them. Successful interruption stops the enemy's action and deals <@ba.poise>Stagger</> to it.

guide_text_training_01_mediaGuide_2.cn:
部分敌人在刚进入蓄力状态时，警示光圈为<@ba.key>白色</>，此时无法打断。
需要等到警示光圈<@ba.key>变为红色后</>，才可以打断。
guide_text_training_01_mediaGuide_2.en: For some enemies, a white circle appears first when they first enter a <@ba.key>charging state</>. The enemy cannot be interrupted during this time. Wait for the white circle to <@ba.key>turn red</>, then interrupt them.

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_1.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>是一种物理异常，成功触发可以额外造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_1.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> is a Physical Status. Triggering it deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_2.cn: 管理员，您的技能就带有<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>。
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_2.en: Endministrator, your skill has the <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> effect.

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_3.cn: 用您的技能尝试<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>目标！
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_3.en: Try using your skill to <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> the target!

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_4.cn: 做得好！第一次受到<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>的敌人，不会直接触发<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>，而是先进入<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>。
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_4.en: Excellent! Hitting an enemy with a <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> effect skill for the first time does not <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> the enemy directly but applies <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> instead.

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_5.cn: 对<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>的敌人继续施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>，将<@gd.key>消耗</>敌人身上所有<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>层数（最多4层），并基于消耗的层数额外造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_5.en: Hitting a <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> enemy with another <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> skill <@gd.key>consumes</> all <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> stacks (up to 4) on the enemy and deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> based on the number of stacks consumed.

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_6.cn: 抓住这个机会——<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>已经<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>的敌人！
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_6.en: This is the chance! Hit the <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> enemy with another <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> skill!

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_7.cn: 做得好！<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>效果消耗了敌人所有<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>层数，并造成大量伤害。
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_7.en: Excellent! <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> has consumed all the enemy's <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> stacks and deals massive DMG.

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_8.cn: 接下来，多多利用<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>并解决敌人！
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_8.en: Now, make use of <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</> to defeat the enemy!

guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_9.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>猛击</>触发时，消耗的<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>层数越多，伤害越高。
guide_text_training_02_physicInflict_9.en: When applying <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_crush" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Crush</>, consuming more <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> stacks lets it deal more DMG.

guide_text_training_02to04_retryArmorBre.cn: 敌人已不再处于<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>状态！需要再次使用技能使敌人<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>。
guide_text_training_02to04_retryArmorBre.en: The enemy is no longer <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</>! Cast a skill on them to make them <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> again.

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_1.cn: 使敌人陷入<@ba.phy>物理异常</>可以快速累积其<@gd.key>失衡值</>，并短暂控制弱小的敌人。
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_1.en: Dealing <@ba.phy>Physical Status</> to enemies also deals a lot of <@gd.key>Stagger</> and applies temporary crowd control effects to weak enemies.

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_10.cn: 注意：<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>等<@gd.key>物理异常</>效果无法控制<@ba.phy>大型敌人</>，但仍能对其累积失衡值。
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_10.en: NOTE: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lift</> and other <@gd.key>Physical Status</> effects cannot apply crowd control to <@ba.phy>stronger enemies</> but can still deal Stagger to them.

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_2.cn: 然而，只有处于<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>状态中的敌人能被<@ba.phy>物理异常</>效果所影响。
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_2.en: Only <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> enemies can be affected by crowd control effects of <@ba.phy>Physical Statuses</>.

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_3.cn: 陈千语的技能就带有<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>这一物理异常。
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_3.en: Chen Qianyu's skill has the Physical Status effect of <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lift</>.

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_4.cn: 试试使用陈千语的技能对敌人施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>！
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_4.en: Try using Chen Qianyu's skill to apply <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lift</> on the enemy!

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_5.cn: 做得好！第一次受到<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>的敌人，不会直接触发<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>，而是先进入<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>。
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_5.en: Excellent! Hitting an enemy with a <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lift</> effect skill for the first time does not <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lift</> the enemy directly but applies <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> instead.

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_6.cn: 继续对<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>的敌人使用<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>，将额外叠加一层<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>（最多4层），使敌人累积失衡值并浮空。
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_6.en: Hitting a <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> enemy with another <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lift</> effect skill applies 1 more stack of <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> (max: 4), deals Stagger, and lifts the enemy into mid-air.

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_7.cn: 抓住这个机会——将<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>中的敌人<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>！
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_7.en: This is our chance! Cast another <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lift</> effect skill on the <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> enemy!

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_8.cn: 就是这样！敌人被成功<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>，累积了更多失衡值，并额外增加了一层<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>。
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_8.en: That's it! The enemy is successfully <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lifted</>, has taken some Stagger, and now has 1 more stack of <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</>.

guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_9.cn: 接下来，多多利用<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>击飞</>并解决敌人！
guide_text_training_03_physicInflict_9.en: Now, make use of <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_airborne" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Lift</> to defeat the enemy!

guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_1.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>是一种<@gd.key>物理异常</>，成功触发可以大幅累积<@gd.key>失衡值</>，并击倒弱小的敌人。
guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_1.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</> is a <@gd.key>Physical Status</> effect. Successfully knocking down the enemy deals large amounts of <@gd.key>Stagger</>. Weak enemies are also knocked to the ground for a while.

guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_2.cn: 余烬的技能就能使敌人<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>。
guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_2.en: Ember's skill applies the <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</> effect on enemies.

guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_3.cn: 试试使用余烬的技能使敌人<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>！
guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_3.en: Try using Ember's skill to <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</> the enemy!

guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_5.cn: 做得好！第一次受到<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>的敌人，不会直接触发<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>，而是先进入<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>。
guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_5.en: Excellent! Hitting an enemy with a <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</> effect skill for the first time does not <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</> the enemy directly but applies <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> instead.

guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_6.cn: 继续对敌人使用<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>，将真正触发<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>：叠加一层破防（最多4层），击倒敌人并累积其失衡值。
guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_6.en: Keep casting skills with <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</> effect to trigger the actual <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</>: Adds 1 stack of Vulnerability (max: 4), knocks down the enemy, and deals Stagger to them.

guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_7.cn: 抓住这个机会——使<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>中的敌人<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>！
guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_7.en: This is our chance! Apply another <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</> effect to the <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> enemy!

guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_8.cn: 就是这样！敌人受<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>效果，累积了更多失衡值，并额外增加了一层<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>。
guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_8.en: That's it! The enemy is successfully <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knocked Down</>, has taken some Stagger, and now has 1 more stack of <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</>.

guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_9.cn: 接下来，多多利用<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>倒地</>并解决敌人！
guide_text_training_04_physicInflict_9.en: Now, make use of <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_knockdown" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Knock Down</> to defeat the enemy!

guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_1.cn: 部分技能会让敌人获得<@gd.key>法术附着</>。
guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_1.en: Some skills apply <@gd.key>Arts Inflictions</> on the enemy.

guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_2.cn: <@gd.key>重复</>对同一目标施加<@gd.key>同类型的法术附着</>时，将额外叠加一层附着（最多4层）并产生<@gd.key>法术爆发</>，造成该类型的法术伤害。
guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_2.en: <@gd.key>Repeatedly</> applying <@gd.key>Arts Infliction of the same element</> on the target adds 1 Arts Infliction stack (max: 4) and triggers an <@gd.key>Arts Burst</> that deals Arts DMG of the said element.

guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_3.cn: 尝试用佩丽卡的技能对敌人施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>。
guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_3.en: Cast Perlica's skill on the enemy to apply an <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</>.

guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_4.cn: 就是这样！敌人身上有了一层<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>。
guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_4.en: That's it! The enemy now has 1 stack of <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</>.

guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_5.cn: 现在，再次施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>将触发<@ba.pulse>电磁爆发</>使敌人承受<@gd.key>大量</>电磁伤害，并额外叠加一层<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>。
guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_5.en: Now apply another <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</> to trigger an <@ba.pulse>Electric Burst</> that deals <@gd.key>massive</> Electric DMG to the enemy and adds 1 stack of <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</>.

guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_6.cn: 尝试对目标再次施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>！
guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_6.en: Try to apply another stack of <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</> on the target!

guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_7.cn: 做得好！成功触发了<@gd.key>法术爆发</>，并额外叠加了一层<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>。
guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_7.en: Good job on triggering the <@gd.key>Arts Burst</> and applying 1 more stack of <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</>.

guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_8.cn: 接下来，多多利用<@gd.key>法术爆发</>的技巧解决目标吧！
guide_text_training_05_magicInflict_8.en: Now, make use of <@gd.key>Arts Bursts</> to defeat the target!

guide_text_training_05to09_magicInflict_.cn: 请留意！因为两次附着属于同一法术类型，刚刚在敌人身上触发的是<@gd.key>法术爆发</>，并非<@gd.key>法术异常</>。
guide_text_training_05to09_magicInflict_.en: Keep this in mind! Applying 2 Arts Inflictions of the same element triggers an <@gd.key>Arts Burst</> on the enemy instead of an <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</>.

guide_text_training_05to09_retryInflictR.cn: 随时间流逝，敌人身上的附着消失了！需要再次使用技能对敌人施加<@gd.key>法术附着</>。
guide_text_training_05to09_retryInflictR.en: The enemy's Arts Infliction will disappear with time! Cast another skill to apply <@gd.key>Arts Infliction</> to the enemy again.

guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_1.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>燃烧</>是一种<@gd.key>法术异常</>，能让敌人<@gd.key>持续受到伤害</>。
guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_1.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Combustion</> is a type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> that deals <@gd.key>DMG over time</> to enemies.

guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_2.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>燃烧</> = 任意一种其他类型的法术附着（<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3>）+ <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>灼热附着</>。
guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_2.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Combustion</> = Any non-Heat Arts Infliction (<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3>) + <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Heat Infliction</>.

guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_3.cn: 先使用佩丽卡的技能对目标施加法术附着吧！
guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_3.en: Cast Perlica's skill to apply an Arts Infliction on the target!

guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_4.cn: 附着成功。<@gd.key>接下来</>施加的法术附着类型将决定<@gd.key>法术异常</>类型。
guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_4.en: Arts Infliction applied. The <@gd.key>next</> Arts Infliction applied on the target will determine the type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> triggered.

guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_5.cn: 现在，使用秋栗的技能对目标施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>灼热附着</>。
guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_5.en: Now use Akekuri's skill to apply <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Heat Infliction</> on the target.

guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_6.cn: 做得好！后施加的<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>灼热附着</>消耗了敌人身上所有的附着，并使敌人进入<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>燃烧</>。
guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_6.en: Excellent! The <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Heat Infliction</> applied has consumed all the enemy's Arts Infliction stacks and triggered <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Combustion</>.

guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_7.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>燃烧</>能使敌人<@gd.key>持续受到伤害</>。触发<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>燃烧</>时，消耗的法术附着层数越多，效果越强。
guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_7.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Combustion</> deals <@gd.key>DMG Over Time</> to enemies. Consuming more Arts Infliction stacks when triggering <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Combustion</> makes its effects stronger.

guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_8.cn: 接下来，多多利用<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>燃烧</>的技巧解决目标吧！
guide_text_training_06_magicInflict_8.en: Now, make use of <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_burning" scale=1.3><@ba.fire>Combustion</> to defeat the target!

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_1.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>是一种<@gd.key>法术异常</>，能使敌人<@gd.key>无法行动</>。
