guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_1.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</> is a type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> that temporarily <@gd.key>immobilizes</> an enemy.

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_10.cn: 对<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>目标施加<@ba.phy>破防或任意物理异常</>将触发<image="BuffIcon/icon_term_ba_crystbreak" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>碎冰</>：消耗敌人的<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>并造成大量<@ba.phy>物理伤害</>。<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>触发时，消耗的法术附着层数越多，<image="BuffIcon/icon_term_ba_crystbreak" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>碎冰</>时伤害越高。
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_10.en: To a target with <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</>, applying <@ba.phy>Vulnerability or any Physical Status</> triggers <image="BuffIcon/icon_term_ba_crystbreak" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Shatter</>: Consumes the enemy's <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</> and deals massive <@ba.phy>Physical DMG</>. Consuming more Arts Infliction stacks when triggering <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</> increases the DMG dealt by <image="BuffIcon/icon_term_ba_crystbreak" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Shatter</>.

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_11.cn: 管理员，试试使用您的技能使<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>的敌人<image="BuffIcon/icon_term_ba_crystbreak" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>碎冰</>！
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_11.en: Endministrator, cast your skill on the <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidified</> enemy to trigger <image="BuffIcon/icon_term_ba_crystbreak" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Shatter</>!

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_12.cn: 就是这样！敌人的<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>被打破，并且受到了大量<@ba.phy>物理伤害</>。
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_12.en: That's it! The <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidified</> enemy is shattered and has taken massive <@ba.phy>Physical DMG</>.

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_13.cn: 接下来，多多利用<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>的技巧解决目标吧！
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_13.en: Now, make use of <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</> to defeat the target!

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_2.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</> = 任意一种其他类型的法术附着（<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3>） + <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>寒冷附着</>。
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_2.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</> = Any non-Cryo Arts Infliction (<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3>) + <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Cryo Infliction</>.

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_3.cn: 先使用佩丽卡的技能对目标施加法术附着吧！
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_3.en: Cast Perlica's skill to apply an Arts Infliction on the target!

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_4.cn: 附着成功。<@gd.key>接下来</>施加的法术附着类型将决定<@gd.key>法术异常</>类型。
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_4.en: Arts Infliction applied. The <@gd.key>next</> Arts Infliction applied on the target will determine the type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> triggered.

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_5.cn: 现在，使用埃特拉的技能对目标施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>寒冷附着</>。
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_5.en: Now use Estella's skill to apply <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Cryo Infliction</> on the target.

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_8.cn: 做得好！后施加的<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>寒冷附着</>消耗了敌人身上所有的附着，使敌人进入<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>。
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_8.en: Excellent! The <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Cryo Infliction</> applied has consumed all the enemy's Arts Infliction stacks and triggered <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</>.

guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_9.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>的敌人将在一段时间内无法行动。<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>冻结</>触发时，消耗的法术附着层数越多，冻结持续时间越长。
guide_text_training_07_magicInflict_9.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</> temporarily immobilizes the enemy. Consuming more Arts Infliction stacks when triggering <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_frozen" scale=1.3><@ba.cryst>Solidification</> extends the duration of the Solidification.

guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_1.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>导电</>是一种<@gd.key>法术异常</>，能使敌人一段时间内受到的<@gd.key>法术伤害</>增加。
guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_1.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electrification</> is a type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> that temporarily increases the <@gd.key>Arts DMG</> taken by the enemy.

guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_2.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>导电</> = 任意一种其他类型的法术附着（<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3>）+ <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>。
guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_2.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electrification</> = Any non-Electric Arts Infliction (<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3>) + <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</>.

guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_3.cn: 先使用秋栗的技能对目标施加法术附着吧！
guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_3.en: Cast Akekuri's skill to apply an Arts Infliction on the target!

guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_4.cn: 附着成功。<@gd.key>接下来</>施加的法术附着类型将决定<@gd.key>法术异常</>类型。
guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_4.en: Arts Infliction applied. The <@gd.key>next</> Arts Infliction applied on the target will determine the type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> triggered.

guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_5.cn: 现在，使用佩丽卡的技能对目标施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>。
guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_5.en: Now use Perlica's skill to apply <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</> to the target.

guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_6.cn: 做得好！后施加的<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>消耗了敌人身上所有的附着，并使敌人进入<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>导电</>。
guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_6.en: Excellent! The <image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</> applied has consumed all the enemy's Arts Infliction stacks and triggered <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electrification</>.

guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_7.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>导电</>下的敌人一段时间内受到的<@gd.key>法术伤害</>增加。<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>导电</>触发时，消耗的法术附着层数越多，效果越强、持续时间越长。
guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_7.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electrification</> temporarily makes the enemy take more <@gd.key>Arts DMG</>. Consuming more Arts Infliction stacks when triggering <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electrification</> makes its effects stronger and last longer.

guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_8.cn: 接下来，多多利用<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>导电</>的技巧解决目标吧！
guide_text_training_08_magicInflict_8.en: Now, make use of <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_conduct" scale=1.3><@ba.pulse>Electrification</> to defeat the target!

guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_1.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>腐蚀</>是一种<@gd.key>法术异常</>，能使敌人全属性抗性逐渐下降。
guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_1.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Corrosion</> is a type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> that gradually reduces the enemy's resistance against all elements.

guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_2.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>腐蚀</> = 任意一种其他类型的法术附着（<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3>）+ <image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>自然附着</>。
guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_2.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Corrosion</> = Any non-Nature Arts Infliction (<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_fire" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_cryst" scale=1.3>/<image="BuffIcon/icon_energy_fusion_pulse" scale=1.3>) + <image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Nature Infliction</>.

guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_3.cn: 先使用佩丽卡的技能对目标施加法术附着吧！
guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_3.en: Cast Perlica's skill to apply an Arts Infliction on the target!

guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_4.cn: 附着成功。<@gd.key>接下来</>施加的法术附着类型将决定<@gd.key>法术异常</>类型。
guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_4.en: Arts Infliction applied. The <@gd.key>next</> Arts Infliction applied on the target will determine the type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> triggered.

guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_5.cn: 现在，使用萤石的技能对目标施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>自然附着</>。
guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_5.en: Now use Fluorite's skill to apply <image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Nature Infliction</> on the target.

guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_6.cn: 做得好！后施加的<image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>自然附着</>消耗了敌人身上所有的附着，并使敌人进入<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>腐蚀</>。
guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_6.en: Excellent! The <image="BuffIcon/icon_infliction_nature" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Nature Infliction</> applied has consumed all the enemy's Arts Infliction stacks and triggered <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Corrosion</>.

guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_7.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>腐蚀</>的敌人全属性抗性将逐渐下降。触发<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>腐蚀</>时，消耗的法术附着层数越多，效果越强。
guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_7.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Corrosion</> gradually decreases the enemy's resistance to all elements. Consuming more Arts Infliction stacks when triggering <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Corrosion</> makes its effects stronger.

guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_8.cn: 接下来，多多利用<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>腐蚀</>的技巧解决目标吧！
guide_text_training_09_magicInflict_8.en: Now, make use of <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_corrupt" scale=1.3><@ba.natur>Corrosion</> to defeat the target!

guide_text_training_10_dodge_1.cn: 适时将<@gd.key>闪避</>穿插在普通攻击中，能有效地与敌人周旋。
guide_text_training_10_dodge_1.en: While performing a basic attack sequence on the enemy, use <@gd.key>dodges</> to effectively evade the enemy's attack moves.

guide_text_training_10_dodge_2.cn: 在任意一段普通攻击中使用<@gd.key>闪避</>后，下一次紧跟的普通攻击将延续先前的段数。
guide_text_training_10_dodge_2.en: After performing a <@gd.key>dodge</> during a basic attack sequence, the next basic attack performed quickly afterwards will continue the sequence.

guide_text_training_10_dodge_3.cn: 尝试在敌人的攻击下，利用<@gd.key>闪避</>保持攻击段数，并最终打出重击。
guide_text_training_10_dodge_3.en: Use <@gd.key>dodge</> when the enemy fights back to maintain the basic attack sequence and perform the Final Strike.

guide_text_training_10_dodge_desc_1.cn:
可以通过<@ba.key>冲刺</>，来躲避敌人的攻击。
冲刺不会打断普通攻击连段。
在敌人攻击瞬间冲刺，会触发<@ba.key>极限闪避</>，恢复少量技力。
guide_text_training_10_dodge_desc_1.en: Use <@ba.key>dash</> to dodge enemy attacks. Dodging does not interrupt the basic attack sequence. A dodge performed at the moment of enemy attack triggers a <@ba.key>Perfect Dodge</> that recovers some SP.

guide_text_training_10_perfect_dodge_1.cn: <@gd.key>极限闪避</>是指发动时机恰到好处的闪避。除了不会中断普通攻击段数外，成功的<@gd.key>极限闪避</>还将恢复少量技力。
guide_text_training_10_perfect_dodge_1.en: <@gd.key>Perfect Dodge</> is a very well-timed dodge. Successfully performing the <@gd.key>Perfect Dodge</> does not interrupt the basic attack sequence, and also recovers some SP.

guide_text_training_10_perfect_dodge_2.cn: 面对敌人，尝试完成<@gd.key>3</>次<@gd.key>极限闪避</>！
guide_text_training_10_perfect_dodge_2.en: Face the enemy and try to perform <@gd.key>Perfect Dodge</> <@gd.key>3</> times!

guide_text_training_11_mediaGuide_desc_1.cn:
大部分技能以及主控干员的重击命中敌人时，会积累敌人的<@gd.key>失衡值</>。
<@gd.key>失衡值</>满后，敌人进入<@gd.key>失衡状态</>，持续一段时间。期间敌人无法行动，受到的伤害增加。
guide_text_training_11_mediaGuide_desc_1.en: Hitting an enemy with most skills and the controlled operator's Final Strike deals <@gd.key>Stagger</>. When the <@gd.key>Stagger meter</> is full, the enemy will be <@gd.key>Staggered</> for a while, during which the enemy cannot move and takes more DMG.

guide_text_training_11_mediaGuide_desc_2.cn: 部分强大的敌人存在<@gd.key>失衡节点</>。<@gd.key>失衡值</>累积到<@gd.key>失衡节点</>时，会打断敌人行动并让其短暂踉跄。
guide_text_training_11_mediaGuide_desc_2.en: Some powerful enemies have <@gd.key>Stagger Nodes</>. Deal enough <@gd.key>Stagger</> to reach the <@gd.key>Stagger Node</> to interrupt such enemies and make them stumble.

guide_text_training_11_stance_break_1.cn: 部分精英敌人存在<@gd.key>失衡节点</>，当失衡值累积到<@gd.key>失衡节点</>时，敌人的动作将被打断并短时间内无法行动。
guide_text_training_11_stance_break_1.en: Some elite enemies have <@gd.key>Stagger Nodes</>. When such enemies build up enough Stagger and reach a <@gd.key>Stagger Node</>, their actions will be interrupted and they cannot move for a short while.

guide_text_training_11_stance_break_1_1.cn: 陈千语与管理员的技能可以形成配合，使敌人陷入<@ba.phy>物理异常</>从而快速累积敌人的失衡值。
guide_text_training_11_stance_break_1_1.en: Chen Qianyu and the Endministrator's skills can be used together. Both apply <@ba.phy>Physical Status</> effects and quickly deal Stagger to the enemy.

guide_text_training_11_stance_break_1_2.cn: 技力不足时，连续普通攻击以打出<@gd.key>重击</>也能有效累积敌人的失衡值。
guide_text_training_11_stance_break_1_2.en: When Skill Points (SP) get too low, use basic attack sequences to perform <@gd.key>Final Strike</> that can also effectively deal Stagger to the enemy.

guide_text_training_11_stance_break_2.cn: 尝试累积敌人的失衡值！
guide_text_training_11_stance_break_2.en: Keep dealing Stagger to the enemy!

guide_text_training_11_stance_break_3.cn: 做得好！由于失衡值累积到达了一个<@gd.key>失衡节点</>，敌人短时间内不能行动。
guide_text_training_11_stance_break_3.en: Nicely done! Once enough Stagger is dealt to reach a <@gd.key>Stagger Node</>, the enemy will be immobilized for a short while.

guide_text_training_11_stance_break_4.cn: 继续累积敌人的失衡值以击破更多的<@gd.key>失衡节点</>。
guide_text_training_11_stance_break_4.en: Keep dealing Stagger to the enemy to hit more <@gd.key>Stagger Nodes</>.

guide_text_training_11_stance_break_5.cn: 接下来，击破更多的<@gd.key>失衡节点</>，利用其无法行动的间隙战胜敌人！
guide_text_training_11_stance_break_5.en: Next, hit more <@gd.key>Stagger Nodes</> and use the enemy's moments of immobility to earn final victory!

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_1.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>是一种物理异常，成功触发能使敌人一段时间内受到的<@ba.phy>物理伤害</>增加。
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_1.en: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> is a type of Physical Status that temporarily increases the <@ba.phy>Physical DMG</> taken by the enemy.

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_2.cn: 骏卫的技能就带有<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>。
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_2.en: Pogranichnik's skill has the <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> effect.

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_3.cn: 试试使用骏卫的技能使敌人<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>！
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_3.en: Try using Pogranichnik's skill to <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> the enemy!

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_4.cn: 做得好！第一次受到<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>的敌人，不会直接触发<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>，而是先进入<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>状态。
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_4.en: Excellent! Hitting an enemy with a <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> effect skill for the first time does not <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> the enemy directly but applies <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> instead.

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_5.cn: 对<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>的敌人继续施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>，将<@gd.key>消耗</>敌人身上所有<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>层数（最多4层），并基于消耗的层数使敌人一段时间内受到的<@ba.phy>物理伤害</>提高。
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_5.en: Hitting a <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> enemy with another <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> skill <@gd.key>consumes</> all the enemy's <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> stacks (up to 4) and makes the enemy suffer more <@ba.phy>Physical DMG</> based on the number of stacks consumed.

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_6.cn: 抓住这个机会——对<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>的敌人施加<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>！
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_6.en: This is our chance! Apply another <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> effect to the <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerable</> enemy!

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_7.cn: 做得好！<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>效果消耗了敌人所有<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>层数，并使其一段时间内受到的<@ba.phy>物理伤害</>提高。
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_7.en: Excellent! <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> has consumed all the enemy's <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> stacks and makes the enemy take more <@ba.phy>Physical DMG</> temporarily.

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_8.cn: <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>触发时，消耗的<image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>破防</>层数越多，效果越强、持续时间越长。
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_8.en: When applying <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</>, consuming more <image="BuffIcon/icon_battle_no_guard" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Vulnerability</> stacks makes its effects stronger and last longer.

guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_9.cn: 接下来，多多利用<image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>碎甲</>并解决敌人！
guide_text_training_12_physicInflict_9.en: Now, make use of <image="BuffIcon/icon_guide_battle_fracture" scale=1.3><@ba.phy>Breach</> to defeat the enemy!

guide_text_training_resetReminder.cn: 请不要忘记本次的训练目标。
guide_text_training_resetReminder.en: Don't forget the goals of training course.

guide_text_travelpole_hint0_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>滑索架</>用于在两地之间快速移动，靠近即可使用。
可以选定其他滑索架作为目标，快速前往该处地点。
guide_text_travelpole_hint0_desc_1.en: Set up zipline routes with <@gd.key>Zipline Pylons</> to quickly zip from one Pylon to another. Other Zipline Pylons can be selected as destinations to quickly zip to it.

guide_text_travelpole_hint_1.en: Press <action=common_interact> to latch on to the zipline.

guide_text_travelpole_hint_1_mb.en: Tap here to latch to the zipline.

guide_text_travelpole_hint_3.en: Press <action=fac_fast_travel_cancel> to unlatch from the zipline.

guide_text_travelpole_hint_3_mb.en: Tap here to unlatch from the zipline.

guide_text_travelpole_intro2_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>是一种改良后的滑索架。
长距滑索架不仅可以增加传输距离，而且可支持一次性通过多个<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>。
guide_text_travelpole_intro2_desc_1.en: The <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</> is an improved version of the Zipline Pylon. It has a longer zipline range and allows the creation of zipline routes that pass through multiple <@gd.key>Zipline Towers</> in a single trip.

guide_text_travelpole_intro2_desc_2.cn:
在<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>上，可以指定另一个可到达的<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>作为下一个“连接点”。
每个<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>只可指定一个连接点。
连续多次指定连接点后，即可组成一条单向的中途不停止移动的<@gd.key>连接路径</>。
guide_text_travelpole_intro2_desc_2.en: After latching onto a <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</>, another <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</> within zipping range can be selected as the next "node". Any <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</> can only be selected as the "node" once. Do this a few times to create a <@gd.key>linked one-way route</> and zip from the first to the last Zipline Tower without stopping.

guide_text_travelpole_intro2_desc_3.cn: 若在已指定的连接路径上移动，每次将经过<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>前都会出现向下一个连接点移动的<@gd.key>按键提示</>，若在限制时间内完成按键操作，可自动前往已指定的下一个<@gd.key>连接点</>。
guide_text_travelpole_intro2_desc_3.en: When ziplining along a linked route and approaching a <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</>, a <@gd.key>button prompt</> indicating the next node to move to will appear on screen. Press the button within the time limit to continue ziplining to the next <@gd.key>node</> in the link without stopping.

guide_text_travelpole_intro_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>滑索架</>用于在两地之间快速移动，靠近即可使用。
可以选择其他滑索架作为目标，只要路线中<@gd.key>没有障碍物</>即可滑行到目的地。
guide_text_travelpole_intro_desc_1.en: Set up zipline routes with <@gd.key>Zipline Pylons</> to quickly zip from one Pylon to another. Approach a Zipline Pylon to latch on to it to start ziplining. Other Zipline Pylons can be selected as the destination to quickly zip to it, as long as there are <@gd.key>no obstacles</> along the way.

guide_text_travelpole_intro_desc_2.cn: 因为<@gd.key>滑索架</>的运营需要极高的维护成本，因此每个地区可放置的滑索架数量极为有限，需要细心规划。
guide_text_travelpole_intro_desc_2.en: Only a limited number of <@gd.key>zipline facilities</> can be placed in an area due to their expensive maintenance. Hence, zipline routes must be planned carefully.

guide_text_trchest_supplybox_desc_1.cn: 在物资补给箱中，可获得<@gd.key>瓶装</>的<@gd.key>清水</>或<@gd.key>息壤</>。
guide_text_trchest_supplybox_desc_1.en: Supply crates may contain <@gd.key>Clean Water</> or <@gd.key>Xiranite</> <@gd.key>filled in bottles</>.

guide_text_trchest_wrdg001_Area1_2_desc_.cn: 开启百叶箱后，能获得各类<@gd.key>雕像</>。
guide_text_trchest_wrdg001_Area1_2_desc_.en: Open instrument safes to acquire various <@gd.key>statuettes</>.

guide_text_trchest_wrdg_desc_1.cn: 开启包裹后，能获得各类<@gd.key>密档</>。
guide_text_trchest_wrdg_desc_1.en: Open packages to acquire various <@gd.key>classified documents</>.

guide_text_turret_in_power_1.cn: 可以在铳械塔附近放置<@gd.key>供电桩</>，并从次级核心或已通电的中继器向供电桩完成<@gd.key>电力运输</>，为铳械塔供电。
guide_text_turret_in_power_1.en: Power the <@gd.key>Gun Tower</> by placing an Electric Pylon near it. Just make sure the pylon has a <@gd.key>working power transmission</> to a powered Relay Tower or the Sub-PAC.

guide_text_turret_in_power_diffuser_hint.cn: 在<@gd.key>集成核心区外</>放置的供电桩，需要从协议核心、次级核心或中继器向其<@gd.key>电力运输</>后才可为其他设备供电。
guide_text_turret_in_power_diffuser_hint.en: <@gd.key>Transmit power</> from the PAC, Sub-PAC, or Relay Tower to an Electric Pylon placed <@gd.key>outside the Core AIC Area</> so that the Electric Pylon can power other facilities.

guide_text_unrealwall_desc_1.cn: 若在灯柱中发现了感光火苗，则顺着火苗的方向就能发现光学雾影
guide_text_unrealwall_desc_1.en: If a light column contains photosensitive sparks, follow the direction of the sparks to find the optical fog.

guide_text_unrealwall_desc_2.cn: 光学雾影常与周围环境融为一体，受到攻击后即会消散
guide_text_unrealwall_desc_2.en: Optical fogs are often very well-blended into the environment. Attack one to dissipate it.

guide_text_unstable_platform_desc_1.cn: 枯萎荷叶的承托能力会降低，其上<@gd.key>稍有重物便会下沉</>，如果不及时离开，就会失去落脚之处。<@gd.key>短暂时间</>后，下沉的荷叶会<@gd.key>重新浮出水面</>。
guide_text_unstable_platform_desc_1.en: A wilted lotus leaf cannot carry as much load and will <@gd.key>slowly sink when something heavy is placed on it</>. The leaf can no longer be stepped upon after it completely sinks. <@gd.key>After a while</>, however, the lotus leaf will <@gd.key>slowly re-surface</>.

guide_text_usb_loader_unloader_intro_des.cn: 仓库存取线可通过<@gd.key>仓库存货口</>与<@gd.key>仓库取货口</>实现物品在仓库中的自由存取。
guide_text_usb_loader_unloader_intro_des.en: The Depot Bus uses <@gd.key>Depot Loaders</> and <@gd.key>Depot Unloaders</> to move items into and out of the Depot respectively.

guide_text_usb_loader_unloader_intro_des.cn:
可使用<@gd.key>仓库取货口</>选择仓库中的物品，连接传送带后，就会从仓库中自动输出。
将物品通过传送带输入进<@gd.key>仓库存货口</>后，物品就会存放进仓库。
guide_text_usb_loader_unloader_intro_des.en: Interact with a <@gd.key>Depot Unloader</> to select a Depot item, then connect the Depot Unloader to a transport belt to automatically unload the selected item from the Depot. Moving items to a <@gd.key>Depot Loader</> via a connected transport belt will automatically store them in the Depot.

guide_text_usb_loader_unloader_intro_des.cn: <@gd.key>仓库取货口</>和<@gd.key>仓库存货口</>可贴靠仓库存取线进行自由摆放。
guide_text_usb_loader_unloader_intro_des.en: The <@gd.key>Depot Unloader</> and <@gd.key>Depot Loader</> can be placed anywhere right next to the entire length of the Depot Bus.

guide_text_usb_loader_unloader_intro_tit.cn: 仓库取货口和存货口的位置

guide_text_use_item_des_1.cn:
获得<@gd.key>可使用物品</>后，可以在背包中选中该物品并使用。
使用后通常可以带来<@gd.key>回复或增益</>的效果，能够帮助您更好地应对复杂环境。
guide_text_use_item_des_1.en: Open the Backpack to select and use any <@gd.key>usable items</> acquired. Item usage effects usually include <@gd.key>HP restoration or buffs</> that can improve the Endministrator's survivability in various environments.

guide_text_valuable_depot_1.cn: 探索获得的重要道具收纳在<@gd.key>贵重品库</>中，按下<action=common_open_valuable_depot>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处查看
guide_text_valuable_depot_1.en: Special, unique, or valuable items found during exploration will be kept in the <@gd.key>Valuables Stash</>. Press <action=common_open_valuable_depot> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to view the Valuables Stash.

guide_text_valuable_equip_1.cn: 装备会存储于贵重品库中，请按下快捷键<action=common_open_valuable_depot>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处查看。
guide_text_valuable_equip_1.en: Pieces of gear will be stored at the Valuables Stash. Press the hotkey <action=common_open_valuable_depot> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to view the Valuables Stash.

guide_text_valuable_weapon_1.cn: 武器和基质会存储于贵重品库中，请按下快捷键<action=common_open_valuable_depot>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处查看。
guide_text_valuable_weapon_1.en: Weapons and essences will be stored at the Valuables Stash. Press the hotkey <action=common_open_valuable_depot> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to view the Valuables Stash.

guide_text_vending_machine_desc_1.cn: 开启贩售机后，能获得各类<@gd.key>罐装物</>。
guide_text_vending_machine_desc_1.en: Open auto-vendors to acquire various <@gd.key>jarred specimens</>.

guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_1.cn: 这里是所有集成工业产物的生产、消耗随时间变化的数据详情。
guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_1.en: This displays detailed data on AIC Factory production and consumption across specific periods of time.

guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_2.cn: 可以收藏某项物品统计数据，该物品在列表中将会置于顶端。
guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_2.en: Data on specific items can be starred. This will pin that item to the top of the list.

guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_3.cn: 这里可以切换到协议核心电能相关的统计数据。
guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_3.en: Use this to switch to power-related data of the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC).

guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_hint_1.cn: 请按下<action=common_open_watch>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开协议同步器，查看集成工业系统的生产和消耗统计数据。
guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_hint_1.en: Press <action=common_open_watch> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Protosync. There is a button for accessing production and consumption data of the AIC Factory.

guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_hint_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_open_watch>打开协议同步器，查看集成工业系统的生产和消耗统计数据。
guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_hint_1_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_watch> to open the Protosync. There is a button for accessing production and consumption data of the AIC Factory.

guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_hint_1_mb.cn: 请按下此处打开协议同步器，查看集成工业系统的生产和消耗统计数据。
guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_hint_1_mb.en: Tap here to open the Protosync. There is a button for accessing production and consumption data of the AIC Factory.

guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_hint_2.cn: 可在此处进入简报界面，查看集成工业系统的生产和消耗统计数据。
guide_text_watch_fac_statistic_hint_2.en: Use this to enter the Reports screen and view production and consumption data of the AIC Factory.

guide_text_waterdepth_switch_desc_1.cn: 利用此类型开关，可以控制附近水体的水位高低
guide_text_waterdepth_switch_desc_1.en: These valves are switches that can control water levels of a nearby water body.

guide_text_waterdrone_cooler_unit_desc_1.cn: 通过射流无人机喷射阵列稳定桩，帮助稳定部分息壤设备；维持<@gd.key>合适的喷射频率</>，确保稳定桩温度在<@gd.key>需要的温度区间</>内，从而<@gd.key>累积进度</>
guide_text_waterdrone_cooler_unit_desc_1.en: Use the jet drone to spray array stabilizing rods to stabilize various Xiranite facilities. Maintain a <@gd.key>certain spraying rate</> to keep the stabilizing rod <@gd.key>within the required temperature range</> and build up <@gd.key>stabilization progress</>.

guide_text_waterdrone_cooler_unit_desc_2.cn: 需要的温度区间会随时发生变化，请灵活地调整喷射频率来与之匹配。
guide_text_waterdrone_cooler_unit_desc_2.en: The required temperature range may keep changing. Adjust the jet drone spraying rate to match the range.

guide_text_waterdrone_floating_target_de.cn: 需水方块是一种供能装置，当需水方块过载损坏时，其配套装置会无法正常运作。可以通过<@gd.key>射流无人机</>将其修复。
guide_text_waterdrone_floating_target_de.en: Hydrocubes are a type of power generators. A device linked to an overloaded or damaged hydrocube will fail to function. Use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> to fix such hydrocubes.

guide_text_waterdrone_floating_target_de.cn: 需水方块在过载时会悬浮在半空，您可以使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>对准其<@gd.key>橙黄色指示灯部位</>喷射<@gd.key>清水</>，直至<@gd.key>指示灯转绿</>
guide_text_waterdrone_floating_target_de.en: Overloaded hydrocubes will float in mid-air. Use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> to spray <@gd.key>Clean Water</> at the <@gd.key>orange-yellow indicator lights</> until the <@gd.key>lights glow green</>.

guide_text_waterdrone_floating_target_de.cn: 一些需水方块可能会在过载悬浮时<@gd.key>胡乱移动或旋转</>。需要寻找<@gd.key>正确的角度或时机</>进行修复。
guide_text_waterdrone_floating_target_de.en: Some overloaded and floating hydrocubes may also <@gd.key>move or rotate randomly</>. Repair sprays must be made at the <@gd.key>correct timing or proper angles</> of jet drone spraying.

guide_text_watergun_1.cn: 请<@gd.key>长按</><action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3><@gd.key>长按</>此处切换便捷工具。
guide_text_watergun_1.en: <@gd.key>Long-press</> <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and <@gd.key>long-press</> here to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_text_watergun_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=general_ability_press> to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_text_watergun_1_mb.cn: 请<@gd.key>长按</>此处切换便捷工具。
guide_text_watergun_1_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap and hold</> here to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_text_watergun_2.cn: 请点击此处，切换至<@gd.key>射流无人机</>便捷工具。
guide_text_watergun_2.en: Click here to switch the Easy Tools action to <@gd.key>Spray</> (jet drone).

guide_text_watergun_2_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆至此处，切换至<@gd.key>射流无人机</>便捷工具。
guide_text_watergun_2_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to move here and switch the Easy Tools action to <@gd.key>Spray</> (jet drone).

guide_text_watergun_2_mb.cn: 请拖动轮盘至此处，切换至<@gd.key>射流无人机</>便捷工具。
guide_text_watergun_2_mb.en: Drag the wheel here to switch the Easy Tools action to <@gd.key>Spray</> (jet drone).

guide_text_watergun_3.cn: 请按下<action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>。
guide_text_watergun_3.en: Press <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to spray with the <@gd.key>jet drone</>.

guide_text_watergun_3_mb.cn: 请点击此处，使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>。
guide_text_watergun_3_mb.en: Tap here to spray with the <@gd.key>jet drone</>.

guide_text_watergun_4.cn: 射流无人机在喷洒时需要消耗液体，可在此处选择背包中可供消耗的液体。
guide_text_watergun_4.en: Jet drone must consume a supply of fluids to perform spraying. Select a fluid from the Backpack that can be used for this purpose.

guide_text_watergun_4_1.cn: 当前背包中没有可供消耗的液体，可在获取盛有清水的蓝铁瓶后进行喷洒。
guide_text_watergun_4_1.en: The Backpack has no fluids that can be used. Fill some Ferrium Bottles with Clean Water to start spraying.

guide_text_watergun_5.cn: 点击此处，选择盛装该种液体的容器。
guide_text_watergun_5.en: Click here to select a container filled with the fluid.

guide_text_watergun_5_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择盛装该种液体的容器。
guide_text_watergun_5_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select a container filled with the fluid.

guide_text_watergun_6.cn: 可在此处查看当前背包中剩余的该种液体容量。
guide_text_watergun_6.en: This shows the amount of fluid currently remaining in the Backpack.

guide_text_watergun_7.cn: 在射流无人机模式下，点击<@gd.key>鼠标左键</><action=battle_attack_start>即可向准心处喷射出对应的液体。
guide_text_watergun_7.en: In jet drone mode, click the <@gd.key>left mouse button</> <action=battle_attack_start> to start spraying fluids at the crosshair.

guide_text_watergun_7_ct.cn: 在射流无人机模式下，按下<action=general_ability_press>即可向准心处喷射出对应的液体。
guide_text_watergun_7_ct.en: In jet drone mode, press <action=general_ability_press> to start spraying fluids at the crosshair.

guide_text_watergun_7_mb.cn: 在射流无人机模式下，点击此处即可向准心处喷射出对应的液体。
guide_text_watergun_7_mb.en: In jet drone mode, tap here to start spraying fluids at the crosshair.

guide_text_waterstate_desc_1.cn: 铁叶转轮通常控制着其他机关。使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>向其喷射液体后，铁叶转轮能够<@gd.key>控制对应机关的运转</>。部分机关需要<@gd.key>持续向铁叶转轮喷射液体</>才能维持运转。
guide_text_waterstate_desc_1.en: Ferrium turbines are usually used to control other mechanisms. Use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> to spray ferrium turbines so they start turning and <@gd.key>control the operations of other linked mechanisms</>. Certain mechanisms can only be activated by <@gd.key>continuously spraying the ferrium turbine for a while</>.

guide_text_waterstate_wltech_desc_1.cn: 转轮机关的指示灯为<@gd.key>红色</>时，代表着它正处于<@gd.key>关闭状态</>。指示灯为<@gd.key>绿光</>时，代表着它在<@gd.key>正常运转</>。
guide_text_waterstate_wltech_desc_1.en: When the indicator light of a rotating mechanism glows <@gd.key>red</>, it is <@gd.key>not working at all</>. If the light glows <@gd.key>green</>, the mechanism is <@gd.key>working properly</>.

guide_text_waterstate_wltech_desc_2.cn: 如需使转轮机关恢复正常运转，可以通过<@gd.key>射流无人机</>向其持续喷射液体。
guide_text_waterstate_wltech_desc_2.en: To get a rotating mechanism to work properly, use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> and keep spraying fluids at it.

guide_text_waterwheel_desc_1.cn:
<@gd.key>敲打机关</>，使其旋转。机关的旋转会<@gd.key>带动水渠的旋转</>。
水渠旋转至<@gd.key>正确角度</>后，对应的机关会自动收起。
guide_text_waterwheel_desc_1.en: <@gd.key>Attack and hit the canal mechanism</> to rotate it. This will also <@gd.key>rotate the canal</> linked to it. Once the canal is rotated to the <@gd.key>correct angle</>, the canal mechanism will automatically retract.

guide_text_waterwheel_desc_2.cn: 依次使水渠正确旋转、<@gd.key>引导水流浇到水车上</>，可开启机关，发现新的通路。
guide_text_waterwheel_desc_2.en: Rotate the canals to the correct angles in the correct sequence to <@gd.key>direct the flow of water</> to the waterwheel, activate a mechanism, and open up a new path.

guide_text_weapon_1.cn: 您获得了一把新武器，请按下快捷键<action=common_open_char_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处进入干员详情。
guide_text_weapon_1.en: New weapon acquired. Press <action=common_open_char_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_weapon_10.cn:
武器等级到达一定阶段后，需要<@gd.key>突破</>才能继续提升等级。
突破后，武器技能等级会提升。
guide_text_weapon_10.en: When a weapon reaches a certain level, it must be <@gd.key>tuned</> before it can be leveled up further. Tuning a weapon also levels up the weapon skills.

guide_text_weapon_11.cn: 如果想要获取更多武器，可以前往<@gd.key>采购中心</>购买。
guide_text_weapon_11.en: Visit the <@gd.key>Acquisition Center</> to purchase additional weapons.

guide_text_weapon_12.cn: 点击此处，可进行武器的更换。

guide_text_weapon_12_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_interact>，进行武器的更换。

guide_text_weapon_13.cn: 点击此处，选择该件武器。
guide_text_weapon_13.en: Click here to select this weapon.

guide_text_weapon_14.cn: 点击此处，即可完成更换。
guide_text_weapon_14.en: Click here to complete the switch.

guide_text_weapon_14_ct.cn: 已为您选中新武器，按下<action=common_confirm>即可完成更换。
guide_text_weapon_14_ct.en: New weapon already selected. Press <action=common_confirm> to switch to it.

guide_text_weapon_15_ct.cn: 武器更换完毕，请按下<action=char_info_weapon_focus_mastery>，切换至<@gd.key>武器养成</>。
guide_text_weapon_15_ct.en: Weapon switched. Press <action=char_info_weapon_focus_mastery> to switch to the <@gd.key>weapon progression</> screen.

guide_text_weapon_1_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，进入<@gd.key>干员总览</>。
guide_text_weapon_1_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to select this option and open the <@gd.key>Operator Overview</> screen.

guide_text_weapon_1_ct.cn: 您获得了一把新武器，请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_weapon_1_ct.en: New weapon acquired. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_weapon_1_mb.cn: 您获得了一把新武器，请点击此处进入干员详情。
guide_text_weapon_1_mb.en: New weapon acquired. Tap here to open the Operator Overview screen.

guide_text_weapon_2.cn: 点击武器页签，可以查看干员装备的武器详情。
guide_text_weapon_2.en: Click on the Weapons tab to view details of the operator's equipped weapon.

guide_text_weapon_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，进入武器页签，查看干员装备的武器详情。
guide_text_weapon_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to enter the Weapons tab and view details of the operator's equipped weapon.

guide_text_weapon_3.cn: 武器会为干员提供<@gd.key>攻击力</>加成，可在此处查看。
guide_text_weapon_3.en: Weapons give operators a <@gd.key>Base ATK</> bonus.

guide_text_weapon_4.cn: 每件武器都拥有若干个<@gd.key>武器技能</>，会提供多种属性加成与技能效果。
guide_text_weapon_4.en: Every weapon comes with a number of <@gd.key>weapon skills</> that offer various attribute bonuses or skill effects.

guide_text_weapon_5.cn: 武器等级提升后，其提供的<@gd.key>攻击力加成</>也会提高。
guide_text_weapon_5.en: Leveling up a weapon will also increase its <@gd.key>Attack bonus</>.

guide_text_weapon_6.cn:
在击败敌人后，有一定几率掉落活性化物质——<@gd.key>基质</>。
基质被附加在武器上后，能够提高武器技能等级。
guide_text_weapon_6.en: Defeated enemies may drop reactive substances known as <@gd.key>essences</>. They can be attached to weapons to raise weapon skill levels.

guide_text_weapon_7.cn: 点击此处进行<@gd.key>武器等级提升</>。
guide_text_weapon_7.en: Click here to <@gd.key>level up</> the weapon.

guide_text_weapon_8.cn: 在此处填充<@gd.key>武器升级素材</>或者其他武器后，即可获取武器经验、提升武器等级。
guide_text_weapon_8.en: Add <@gd.key>weapon EXP materials</> or other weapons here to give EXP points and level up the weapon.

guide_text_weapon_9.cn: 武器升级后，其攻击力加成会提升，可在此处查看。
guide_text_weapon_9.en: An upgraded weapon will give more Attack. Click here to view the details.

guide_text_weapon_pic_01.cn:
可将<@gd.key>武器经验素材</>和<@gd.key>其他武器</>作为经验素材进行武器<@gd.key>升级</>。
当武器达到一定等级时，需要使用<@gd.key>武器突破素材</>来进行<@gd.key>突破</>，从而提升等级上限。
武器升级或突破后，性能会显著提升。
guide_text_weapon_pic_01.en: <@gd.key>Weapon EXP materials</> and/or <@gd.key>other weapons</> can be used to give a weapon EXP and <@gd.key>level it up</>. When a weapon reaches a level cap, <@gd.key>weapon tuning materials</> must be used to <@gd.key>tune</> it and raise its level cap. Leveling up and tuning weapons can significantly improve their performance.

guide_text_weapon_pic_02.cn:
使用<@gd.key>已升级过的武器</>作为<@gd.key>经验素材</>时，不会亏损武器经验。
溢出的武器经验会以<@gd.key>武器经验素材</>的形式返还。
guide_text_weapon_pic_02.en: No weapon EXP will be lost when using <@gd.key>an upgraded weapon</> to provide <@gd.key>EXP</> to another. Weapon EXP that exceeds the limit will be returned as <@gd.key>weapon EXP materials</>.

guide_text_weapon_pic_03.cn:
有时在战斗后，可获得活性化物质——<@gd.key>基质</>。
基质被附加在武器上后，能够提高武器技能等级。
guide_text_weapon_pic_03.en: Defeated enemies may drop reactive substances known as <@gd.key>essences</>. Infusing a weapon with an essence can raise weapon skill levels.

guide_text_weapon_potential_1.cn: 可通过消耗同名武器来提升武器潜能。
guide_text_weapon_potential_1.en: A weapon's potential can be raised by spending weapons of the same name.

guide_text_weapon_potential_2.cn: 武器潜能提升后，<@gd.key>武器技能</>的等级和等级上限会获得提升。
guide_text_weapon_potential_2.en: Raising a weapon's potential increases <@gd.key>weapon skill</> levels and level caps.

guide_text_weapon_shop_desc_1.cn: 获取谷地调度券后，可在各处商店进行商品的购买。可购买武器、简制食药、养成素材等物品。
guide_text_weapon_shop_desc_1.en: After earning Valley Stock Bills, they can be spent at shops to purchase various items that include weapons, crafted food and medications, and progression materials.

guide_text_weapon_shop_desc_2.cn: 谷地调度券可通过击败敌人获得。后续有更多渠道获得大量调度券。
guide_text_weapon_shop_desc_2.en: Defeated enemies might drop Valley Stock Bills (VSB). More ways of earning VSB will become available afterwards.

guide_text_weapon_shop_hint_1.cn: 武器商店售卖的武器可点击此处查看。
guide_text_weapon_shop_hint_1.en: Click here to view the weapons being sold at the Weapon Store.

guide_text_weapon_shop_hint_1_ct.cn:
武器商店售卖的武器可在此处查看。
请按下<action=navigation_target_click>，选中当前的武器。
guide_text_weapon_shop_hint_1_ct.en: This will show weapons being sold at the Weapon Store. Press <action=navigation_target_click> to select the current weapon.

guide_text_weapon_shop_hint_2.cn: 购买武器需要使用<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>，绝大部分商店也使用<@gd.key>调度券</>进行交易。
guide_text_weapon_shop_hint_2.en: <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> must be spent to purchase weapons. <@gd.key>Stock bills</> are accepted by most stores as currency.

guide_text_weapon_shop_hint_3.cn: 调度券可以通过击败敌人掉落，后续也存在多种获取大量调度券的渠道等待管理员探索。
guide_text_weapon_shop_hint_3.en: Defeated enemies might drop stock bills. Additional channels for earning large sums of stock bills will become available afterwards, Endministrator.

guide_text_weapon_shop_title_1.cn: 使用谷地调度券购买商品

guide_text_weapon_shop_title_2.cn: 获取谷地调度券的方法

guide_text_weaponshop_1.cn: <@gd.key>武库交易所</>可以进行武器的换取。可通过<@gd.key>武库申领</>获得武器，也可以直接使用<@gd.key>武库配额</>购买。
guide_text_weaponshop_1.en: Get weapons from the <@gd.key>Arsenal Exchange</> by either using <@gd.key>Arsenal Issue</> or direct purchases with <@gd.key>Arsenal Tickets</>.

guide_text_weaponshop_2.cn: 可在此处，查看当期特供的<@gd.key>武库申领</>并进行申领。
guide_text_weaponshop_2.en: This shows the <@gd.key>Arsenal Issue</> banners currently available.

guide_text_weaponshop_3.cn:
当前已获得<@gd.key>星声申领凭证</>，可进行一次<@gd.key>武库申领</>。
请点击此处查看。
guide_text_weaponshop_3.en: <@gd.key>Cosmic Voice Issue Cert</> acquired. Use this to perform 1 attempt of <@gd.key>Arsenal Issue</>. Click here for more details.

guide_text_weaponshop_3_ct.cn:
当前已获得<@gd.key>星声申领凭证</>，可进行一次<@gd.key>武库申领</>。
请按下<action=navigation_target_click>查看。
guide_text_weaponshop_3_ct.en: <@gd.key>Cosmic Voice Issue Cert</> acquired. Use this to perform 1 attempt of <@gd.key>Arsenal Issue</>. Press <action=navigation_target_click> for more details.

guide_text_weaponshop_desc_1.cn: 武库交易所可以进行武器的换取，所需的武库配额可通过<@gd.key>寻访</>、<@gd.key>采购中心-组合包</>、<@gd.key>协议通行证-协议定制</>、信用交易所及衍质源石兑换等渠道获取。
guide_text_weaponshop_desc_1.en: Getting weapons from the Arsenal Exchange costs Arsenal Tickets, which can be acquired from sources that include: <@gd.key>headhunting</>, <@gd.key>Acquisition Center - Bundles</>, <@gd.key>Protocol Pass: Protocol Customized</>, Credit Store, and by exchanging Origeometries.

guide_text_weaponshop_hint_1.cn: 通过寻访可获得<@gd.key>武库配额</>，可使用<@gd.key>武库配额</>进行武库申领，获得武器，可在此处前往。
guide_text_weaponshop_hint_1.en: Headhunting gives <@gd.key>Arsenal Tickets</> that can be spent to acquire weapons via <@gd.key>Arsenal Issue</>. Click here to check it out.

guide_text_weaponshop_hint_2.cn: 可使用<@gd.key>武库配额</>进行武库申领，获得武器，可在此处前往。
guide_text_weaponshop_hint_2.en: <@gd.key>Arsenal Tickets</> can be spent at Arsenal Issue to acquire weapons. Click here to check it out.

guide_text_weaponshop_hint_3.cn:
可使用<@gd.key>星声申领凭证</>进行武库申领，获得武器。
可按下<action=common_open_cash_shop>或点击此处展开并前往采购中心。
guide_text_weaponshop_hint_3.en: <@gd.key>Cosmic Voice Issue Cert</> can be spent for Arsenal Issue to acquire weapons. Press <action=common_open_cash_shop> or click here to expand the list and go to the Acquisition Center.

guide_text_weaponshop_hint_3_ct.cn:
可使用<@gd.key>星声申领凭证</>进行武库申领，获得武器。
可按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开快捷轮盘，前往采购中心。
guide_text_weaponshop_hint_3_ct.en: The <@gd.key>Cosmic Voice Issue Cert</> can be spent at the Arsenal Issue to acquire weapons. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to bring up the Quick Menu Wheel and go to the Acquisition Center.

guide_text_weaponshop_hint_3_mb.cn:
可使用<@gd.key>星声申领凭证</>进行武库申领，获得武器。
可点击此处展开列表，并前往采购中心。
guide_text_weaponshop_hint_3_mb.en: The <@gd.key>Cosmic Voice Issue Cert</> can be spent at the Arsenal Issue to acquire weapons. Tap here to expand the list and go to the Acquisition Center.

guide_text_weaponshop_hint_4.cn: 可在<@gd.key>武库交易所</>中进行武库申领，获得武器。
guide_text_weaponshop_hint_4.en: Go to <@gd.key>Arsenal Exchange</> and acquire weapons via Arsenal Issue.

guide_text_weekly_mission_1.cn: 通过完成<@gd.key>每周事务</>，可获得大量奖励。
guide_text_weekly_mission_1.en: Complete the <@gd.key>Weekly Routine</> to earn rich rewards.

guide_text_weekly_mission_2.cn: 通过完成每周指定事务，即可提升事务进度。
guide_text_weekly_mission_2.en: Complete weekly routine tasks to earn routine progress.

guide_text_weekly_mission_3.cn: 各个指定事务会提供不同的事务进度，可在此处查看。
guide_text_weekly_mission_3.en: Different routine tasks give different routine progresses, shown here.

guide_text_weekly_mission_4.cn: 达到相应事务完成进度节点后，可在此处领取对应事务奖励。
guide_text_weekly_mission_4.en: Reach weekly routine progress milestones to claim routine rewards here.

guide_text_weekly_raid_adventure.cn: 在行动手册中，可在此处快捷进入<@gd.key>蚀像寻遗</>玩法。
guide_text_weekly_raid_adventure.en: This section of the Operational Manual is a quick way to access the <@gd.key>Etchspace Salvage</> game mode.

guide_text_weekly_raid_area_desc_1.cn:
在谷地像差的正式探索中，紊乱值会随时间自然增长。
当紊乱值达到上限时，会强制进入结算并退出谷地像差。
guide_text_weekly_raid_area_desc_1.en: Derangement naturally increases with time while exploring actual Valley's Aberrants. When the Derangement limit is reached, the team will be forcibly extracted from the Valley's Aberrants and the exploration attempt will be immediately tallied.

guide_text_weekly_raid_area_desc_2.cn:
在谷地像差中，存在一些<@gd.key>安全区</>，可通过<@gd.key>黄色光效</>的区域判断。
当处于安全区范围内时，紊乱值不会随时间自然增加。
guide_text_weekly_raid_area_desc_2.en: <@gd.key>Safe zones</> can be found in Valley's Aberrants. They can be identified with their <@gd.key>yellow lighting effects</>. Derangement will stop increasing when staying in a safe zone.

guide_text_weekly_raid_area_desc_3.cn:
谷地像差由多个区域构成，不同区域的紊乱值自然增长速度不同。
通常在越后期的区域探索，紊乱值增长得越快。
guide_text_weekly_raid_area_desc_3.en: Valley's Aberrants comprise multiple areas. Derangement increases at different rates in different areas. Derangement tends to increase faster when exploring latter areas.

guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_1.cn:
从现在起，干员可以携带工业爆炸物进行探索，但是每次可携带的数量有上限。
可以通过<@gd.key>集成工业系统</>制造工业爆炸物。
guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_1.en: Operators can now equip Industrial Explosives for exploration. However, there is a limit to the number of Industrial Explosives carried. The <@gd.key>AIC Factory</> can be used to produce Industrial Explosives.

guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_mission_1.cn: 当前已接取<@gd.key>爆炸物携行研发1</>委托，请点击此处选择。
guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_mission_1.en: <@gd.key>Portable Explosives R&D 1</> research commission is currently accepted. Click here to select it.

guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_mission_1_ct.cn: 当前已接取<@gd.key>爆炸物携行研发1</>委托，请按下<action=common_confirm>选择。
guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_mission_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>Portable Explosives R&D 1</> research commission is currently accepted. Press <action=common_confirm> to select it.

guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_mission_2.en: Click here to complete the commission.

guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_mission_3.cn:
完成委托后，我们解锁了<@gd.key>爆炸物携行</>这一辅助探测技术。
可以携带<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>进入谷地像差探索。
guide_text_weekly_raid_bomb_mission_3.en: Completing the commission has unlocked the Exploration Support Tech: <@gd.key>Portable Explosives</>. This allows an exploration team to bring <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</> into the Valley's Aberrants.

guide_text_weekly_raid_enemy_desc_1.cn: 在谷地像差中，存在许多敌人，在进入作战状态后，紊乱值会<@gd.key>持续增长</>。
guide_text_weekly_raid_enemy_desc_1.en: There are many enemies in the Valley's Aberrants. Derangement will <@gd.key>continuously increase</> during battle.

guide_text_weekly_raid_finish.cn:
探索中获得的<@gd.key>沉积结核</>和<@gd.key>沉积具象物</>会在此显示。
探索获得的<@gd.key>沉积结核</>会自动转化为对应数量的<@gd.key>醚质晶块</>，<@gd.key>沉积具象物</>则会存入贵重品库。
guide_text_weekly_raid_finish.en: <@gd.key>Precipitation nodules</> and <@gd.key>precipitation manifests</> acquired during exploration are shown here. <@gd.key>Precipitation nodules</> will be auto-converted to a certain amount of <@gd.key>Aurylene Crystals</>, while <@gd.key>precipitation manifests</> will be stored in the Valuables Stash.

guide_text_weekly_raid_hint_1.cn: 在谷地像差中，可按下<action=common_open_map>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开地图。
guide_text_weekly_raid_hint_1.en: In Valley's Aberrants, press <action=common_open_map> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the map.

guide_text_weekly_raid_hint_1_ct.cn: 在谷地像差中，可按下<action=common_open_map>打开地图。
guide_text_weekly_raid_hint_1_ct.en: In Valley's Aberrants, press <action=common_open_map> to open the map.

guide_text_weekly_raid_hint_1_mb.cn: 在谷地像差中，可点击此处打开地图。
guide_text_weekly_raid_hint_1_mb.en: In Valley's Aberrants, tap here to open the map.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mine_desc_1.cn: 在谷地像差中，存在大量<@gd.key>沉积晶石</>，将其破坏后会暴露其<@gd.key>核心</>，与之交互可获得<@gd.key>沉积结核</>。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mine_desc_1.en: Many <@gd.key>Precipitation Crystals</> exist in Valley's Aberrants. Smash the crystal to expose its <@gd.key>core</> and interact with it to get <@gd.key>precipitation nodules</>.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mine_desc_2.cn:
与沉积晶石的核心交互后，会增长<@gd.key>紊乱值</>。
紊乱值增加至上限后，会强制进入结算并退出谷地像差，探索中请留意<@gd.key>紊乱值</>的状态。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mine_desc_2.en: Interacting with the Precipitation Crystal core raises <@gd.key>Derangement</>. When Derangement hits the limit, the team will be forcibly extracted from the Valley's Aberrants and the exploration attempt will be immediately tallied. Monitor <@gd.key>Derangement</> levels during exploration.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mine_desc_3.cn:
探索中获得的<@gd.key>沉积结核</>会保存在<@gd.key>隔绝封装器</>中。
隔绝封装器具有一定的<@gd.key>容量上限</>，达到上限时，便无法获得更多<@gd.key>沉积结核</>。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mine_desc_3.en: <@gd.key>Precipitation nodules</> found during exploration are stored in the <@gd.key>Isolation Container</>. The Isolation Container has a <@gd.key>limited capacity</> and cannot hold more <@gd.key>precipitation nodules</> when full.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_1.cn: 在<@gd.key>委托与辅助探测技术</>中，查看当前在<@gd.key>蚀像寻遗</>中可接取及完成的委托。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_1.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Commissions and Exploration Support Tech</> to accept and complete various <@gd.key>Etchspace Salvage</> commissions.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_2.cn: 请点击此处，选择可完成的研发委托。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_2.en: Click here to select a Research Commission to complete

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择可完成的研发委托。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select a Research Commission to complete.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_3.cn:
可在此处查看该项委托的详情。
可通过点击物品名称以显示物品的详细信息。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_3.en: This shows the details of the commission. Click on the item name to show item details.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_3_ct.cn:
可在长按<action=common_interact>查看收集目标。
聚焦至物品名称即可显示物品的详细信息。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_3_ct.en: Press and hold <action=common_interact> to view the collection goals. Focus on the item name to show the item details.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_4.cn: 点击此处，可提交物品并完成委托。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_4.en: Click here to submit the items and complete the commission.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_4_ct.cn: 按下<action=common_interact>即可提交物品并完成委托。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_4_ct.en: Press <action=common_interact> to submit the items and complete the commission.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_5.cn: 完成委托后，我们解锁了一些<@gd.key>辅助探测技术</>。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_5.en: Completing the commission has unlocked some <@gd.key>Exploration Support Tech</> for us.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_7.cn: 可在此处，查看当前解锁的<@gd.key>辅助探测技术</>。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_7.en: This lets us view the currently unlocked <@gd.key>Exploration Support Tech</>.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_1.cn: 可按下<action=common_open_mission_panel>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处打开委托，以确认当前进度。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_1.en: Press <action=common_open_mission_panel> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the commission and verify the current progress.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_1_1_ct.cn: 请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆并选中此项，查看委托。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_1_1_ct.en: Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to select this option and view the commissions.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_1_ct.cn: 可在谷地像差的探索中查看委托，请按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_1_ct.en: There are various commissions for exploring Valley's Aberrants. To view them, open <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</>.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_1_mb.cn: 可点击此处打开委托，以确认当前进度。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_1_mb.en: Tap here to open the commission and verify the current progress.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_2.cn: 在谷地像差的探索中，可随时在此查看当前接取的委托。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_2.en: While exploring the Valley's Aberrants, visit this screen to see the commissions available.

guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_3.cn: 选择不同委托后，可以此处更改当前追踪的目标。
guide_text_weekly_raid_mission_in_3.en: After selecting various commissions, use this screen to track different commission goals.

guide_text_weekly_raid_pick_desc_1.cn: 在谷地像差中，存在许多可交互的<@gd.key>储物点</>，与之交互后可获得<@gd.key>沉积具象物</>，同时也会增长紊乱值。
guide_text_weekly_raid_pick_desc_1.en: The Valley's Aberrants have many <@gd.key>storage points</>. Interact with them to acquire <@gd.key>Precipitation Manifests</> but this will also increase Derangement.

guide_text_weekly_raid_pick_desc_2.cn:
<@gd.key>沉积具象物</>同样会保存在<@gd.key>隔绝封装器</>中。
完成探索，成功带出<@gd.key>沉积具象物</>后，其可用于各种研究用途、提升在在谷地像差中的各项能力。
guide_text_weekly_raid_pick_desc_2.en: <@gd.key>Precipitation manifests</> are also stored in the <@gd.key>Isolation Container</>. <@gd.key>Precipitation manifests</> successfully brought from exploration attempts can be used for research and improve various abilities in the Valley's Aberrants.

guide_text_weekly_raid_reward_1.cn:
可以通过<@gd.key>带出沉积结核</>或<@gd.key>完成委托</>获得行动刻度；
行动刻度每达到一定数量，即可获得对应奖励。
guide_text_weekly_raid_reward_1.en: Earn operation metrics by successfully bringing out <@gd.key>precipitation nodules</> or <@gd.key>completing commissions</>. Earn enough operation metrics to acquire rewards.

guide_text_weekly_raid_team.cn:
在谷地像差的探索中，编队中的干员无法携带战术物品。
请在准备完毕后开始探索！
guide_text_weekly_raid_team.en: Remember, no operators can equip any tacticals when exploring the Valley's Aberrants. Adjust the team accordingly and start exploring!

guide_text_weekly_raid_travelpole_desc_1.cn:
谷地像差中存在一些特别的<@gd.key>像差滑索架</>，靠近即可解锁使用。
<@gd.key>像差滑索架</>是连接各个区域的重要交通工具，请多注意其在谷地像差中的位置。
guide_text_weekly_raid_travelpole_desc_1.en: Special <@gd.key>Aberrant Zipline Pylons</> exist in the Valley's Aberrants. Get close to unlock them for use. <@gd.key>Aberrant Zipline Pylons</> offer an important mode of transport to reach various areas, so try to look out where they are.

guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_1.cn: 在所有的<@gd.key>进程委托</>完成之后，可进行<@gd.key>定向委托</>。
guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_1.en: Complete all <@gd.key>Process Commissions</> to unlock <@gd.key>Focus Commissions</>.

guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_1_ct.cn:
在所有的<@gd.key>进程委托</>完成之后，可进行<@gd.key>定向委托</>。
请按下<action=week_raid_main_commission>查看。
guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_1_ct.en: Complete all <@gd.key>Process Commissions</> to unlock <@gd.key>Focus Commissions</>. Press <action=week_raid_main_commission> to view the details.

guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_2.cn: 请点击此处，选择<@gd.key>定向委托</>。

guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_3.cn: 从现在起，每周会有随机派发的<@gd.key>定向委托</>，完成后可获得<@gd.key>行动刻度</>。
guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_3.en: From now on, random <@gd.key>Focus Commissions</> will be available every week. Complete them to earn <@gd.key>operation metrics</>.

guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_4.cn: 定向委托会<@gd.key>每周刷新</>，请记得及时完成。
guide_text_weekly_raid_weekly_4.en: Focus Commissions are <@gd.key>refreshed weekly</>. Try to complete them on time.

guide_text_weekraid_jumpmachine_desc_1.cn: 可使用<@gd.key>大型弹射装置</>进行一次<@gd.key>超长距离的跳跃</>，抵达普通跳跃无法触达的高处。站立在其上并按下<@gd.key>跳跃键</>即可使用。
guide_text_weekraid_jumpmachine_desc_1.en: Use <@gd.key>large bounce devices</> to perform <@gd.key>super jumps</> and reach heights that could not be attained by normal jumping. Simply stand on the bounce device and press the <@gd.key>jump button</> to use it.

guide_text_weekraid_oil_container_desc_1.cn: 这些桶中储藏着易燃、易爆物质，在被<@gd.key>爆炸物</>引爆后，会引发<@gd.key>周边其他的易爆物储藏桶爆炸</>。爆炸会对<@gd.key>周围的敌人造成伤害</>，且能<@gd.key>毁坏周边的可爆破物</>。
guide_text_weekraid_oil_container_desc_1.en: Highly flammable and explosive materials are stored in these barrels. When detonated by <@gd.key>explosives</>, the explosion can <@gd.key>set off similar barrels nearby</>, <@gd.key>damage enemies</>, and even <@gd.key>take out destructible objects nearby</>.

guide_text_winder_intro_des_1.cn:
<@gd.key>装备原件机</>可以将含有装备标签的材料进行合成生产，产物可用于装备制造。
典型产物为<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>，由<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>和<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>放入<@gd.key>装备原件机</>后合成获得。
guide_text_winder_intro_des_1.en: The <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</> can process materials with the [Gear] tag to produce materials for gear assembly. Typical product: <@gd.key>Amethyst Component</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Origocrust</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> in the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

guide_text_winder_intro_des_2.cn:
<@gd.key>装备原件</>是制作装备的必要材料。
装备品质不同，所需要的<@gd.key>装备原件</>也有所不同。
guide_text_winder_intro_des_2.en: Gear <@gd.key>components</> are essential for gear assembly. Different <@gd.key>components</> are needed to assemble gear of different quality.

guide_text_winder_techtree_1.cn: 生产装备原件需要研究<@gd.key>装备工艺</>工业技术。
guide_text_winder_techtree_1.en: The AIC technology <@gd.key>Gearing Tech</> must be researched to produce gear assembly components.

guide_text_winder_techtree_10.cn:
点击<@gd.key>开始模拟</>按钮即可进入模拟空间。
请尝试一下。
guide_text_winder_techtree_10.en: Click the <@gd.key>Start SIM</> button to begin the simulation. Try it out.

guide_text_winder_techtree_10_ct.cn:
按下<action=common_confirm>即可进入模拟空间。
请尝试一下。
guide_text_winder_techtree_10_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to enter the simulation. Try it out.

guide_text_winder_techtree_1_ct.cn: 生产装备原件需要研究<@gd.key>装备工艺</>工业技术。请按下<action=common_confirm>选择。
guide_text_winder_techtree_1_ct.en: The AIC technology <@gd.key>Gearing Tech</> must be researched to produce gear assembly components. Press <action=common_confirm> to select it.

guide_text_winder_techtree_2.cn: 研究工业技术需要<@gd.key>基础工业点数</>，可以点击此处查看。
guide_text_winder_techtree_2.en: Researching AIC technologies needs <@gd.key>Basic AIC Index</>. Activate Protocol Dataloggers to get more Index.

guide_text_winder_techtree_2_1_ct.cn: 请按下<action=item_tips_navi_to_obtain_ways>查看<@gd.key>基础工业点数</>的获取方式。
guide_text_winder_techtree_2_1_ct.en: Press <action=item_tips_navi_to_obtain_ways> to view ways of acquiring <@gd.key>Basic AIC Index</>.

guide_text_winder_techtree_2_ct.cn: 研究工业技术需要<@gd.key>基础工业点数</>，请<@gd.key>长按</><action=show_item_tips>查看。
guide_text_winder_techtree_2_ct.en: Researching AIC technologies needs <@gd.key>Basic AIC Index</>. <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=show_item_tips> for details.

guide_text_winder_techtree_3.cn: <@gd.key>基础工业点数</>可通过激活<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>获取，点击此处跳转至地图。
guide_text_winder_techtree_3.en: <@gd.key>Basic AIC Index</> can be acquired by activating <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</>. Click here to open the map.

guide_text_winder_techtree_3_ct.cn: <@gd.key>基础工业点数</>可通过激活<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>获取，按下<action=common_confirm>即可跳转至地图。
guide_text_winder_techtree_3_ct.en: <@gd.key>Basic AIC Index</> can be acquired by activating <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</>. Press <action=common_confirm> to open the map.

guide_text_winder_techtree_4.cn: 可在地图中找到<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>对应的标记，可点击此处追踪并前往。
guide_text_winder_techtree_4.en: Find the marker icon of the <@gd.key>Protocol Datalogger</> on the Map. Click here to track it.

guide_text_winder_techtree_4_ct.cn: 可在地图中找到<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>对应的标记，可按下<action=common_confirm>追踪并前往。
guide_text_winder_techtree_4_ct.en: Find the marker icon of the <@gd.key>Protocol Datalogger</> on the Map. Press <action=common_confirm> to track it.

guide_text_winder_techtree_6.cn: 请再次选择<@gd.key>装备工艺</>工业技术。
guide_text_winder_techtree_6.en: Now re-select the AIC technology: <@gd.key>Gearing Tech</>.

guide_text_winder_techtree_6_ct.cn: 请再次按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>装备工艺</>工业技术。
guide_text_winder_techtree_6_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> again to select the AIC Plan technology <@gd.key>Gearing Tech</>.

guide_text_winder_techtree_7.cn: 可以点击此处查看与<@gd.key>装备原件机</>相关的<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。
guide_text_winder_techtree_7.en: Click here to view <@gd.key>simulations</> for the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

guide_text_winder_techtree_7_ct.cn: 可按下<action=tech_tree_detail_related_blackbox>，查看与<@gd.key>装备原件机</>相关的<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。
guide_text_winder_techtree_7_ct.en: Press <action=tech_tree_detail_related_blackbox> to view <@gd.key>simulations</> for the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

guide_text_winder_techtree_8.cn: 可以点击此处打开对应<@gd.key>模拟空间</>。
guide_text_winder_techtree_8.en: Click here to start the specified <@gd.key>simulation</>.

guide_text_winder_techtree_9.cn: 此模拟空间对<@gd.key>装备原件机</>有详细介绍。
guide_text_winder_techtree_9.en: This simulation has detailed info about the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

guide_text_wltechbridge_desc_1.cn: 武陵地区设有以息壤材料修筑的桥，激活开关后，这些桥能够连通断开的区域。
guide_text_wltechbridge_desc_1.en: Xiranite bridges have been constructed in the region of Wuling. Activate the switches to repair these bridges and form paths to previously inaccessible areas.

guide_text_wolfgd_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 狼卫的战技能施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>。

guide_text_wolfgd_chartrain01_02_2.cn: 目标处于<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态时，狼卫的战技获得强化，不再施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>，而是消耗<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态，并追加一次射击，造成大量伤害。
guide_text_wolfgd_chartrain01_02_2.en: Wulfgard's battle skill is enhanced against targets with <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>. It no longer applies <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> but consumes the <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.conduct>Electrification</> to fire an additional shot that deals massive DMG.

guide_text_wolfgd_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 敌人被施加<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>时，可以发动狼卫的连携技。
guide_text_wolfgd_chartrain01_03_1.en: Wulfgard's combo skill is triggered when an <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> is applied to an enemy.

guide_text_wolfgd_chartrain01_03_2.cn: 狼卫的连携技会施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>。

guide_text_wolfgd_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 狼卫的终结技会施加<#ba.burning>燃烧</>。

guide_text_world_levelup_1.cn: 在经历一段时间的探索后，您的<@gd.key>探索等级</>提升了。请按下<action=common_open_watch>或者点击此处，打开协议同步器。
guide_text_world_levelup_1.en: Commitment to exploration has finally raised our <@gd.key>Exploration Level</>. Press <action=common_open_watch> or click here to open the Protosync.

guide_text_world_levelup_1_ct.cn: 在经历一段时间的探索后，您的<@gd.key>探索等级</>提升了。请按下<action=common_open_watch>，打开协议同步器。
guide_text_world_levelup_1_ct.en: Commitment to exploration has finally raised our <@gd.key>Exploration Level</>. Press <action=common_open_watch> to open the Protosync.

guide_text_world_levelup_1_mb.cn: 在经历一段时间的探索后，您的<@gd.key>探索等级</>提升了。请点击此处，打开协议同步器。
guide_text_world_levelup_1_mb.en: Commitment to exploration has finally raised our <@gd.key>Exploration Level</>. Tap here to open the Protosync.

guide_text_world_levelup_2.cn: 可在此处，查看<@gd.key>探索等级</>的详情。

guide_text_world_levelup_desc_1.cn: 探索等级的提升会产生诸多影响，包括<@gd.key>干员等级上限提升</>、<@gd.key>稀有采集物</>和<@gd.key>稀有矿物</>的<@gd.key>存在数量上限</>和<@gd.key>每日刷新数量</>提升，以及<@gd.key>协议空间</>开放等级提升等。
guide_text_world_levelup_desc_1.en: Exploration Level affects: <@gd.key>operator level caps</>; <@gd.key>availability</> and <@gd.key>daily refreshes</> of <@gd.key>rare gatherables</> and <@gd.key>rare minerals</>; and available threat levels of <@gd.key>Protocol Spaces</>.

guide_text_world_levelup_desc_2.cn: 随着探索等级的提升，世界中敌人的等级也将一并提升。您将面临更多挑战。
guide_text_world_levelup_desc_2.en: Higher Exploration Level also raises the levels of enemies in the world and makes battles more challenging.

guide_text_world_levelup_desc_3.cn:
探索等级会随着<@gd.key>主线任务</>的进度而提升。
探索等级达到3级之后，每次提升还需要完成<@gd.key>探索等级验证任务</>才能提升。
guide_text_world_levelup_desc_3.en: Exploration Level increases with <@gd.key>main mission</> progression. After reaching Exploration Level 3, special <@gd.key>Exploration Level trial missions</> must be completed first to raise it further.

guide_text_world_levelup_desc_4.cn: 可以在<@gd.key>协议同步器</>中进行探索等级的下调和还原，每次下调后将会有一定的冷却时间。
guide_text_world_levelup_desc_4.en: Use the <@gd.key>Protocol Synchronizer</> (Protosync menu) to lower or restore the Exploration Level. Lowering the Exploration Level starts a cooldown before it can be changed again.

guide_text_world_levelup_mission_1.cn:
从现在开始，需要完成<@gd.key>探索等级验证任务</>才能提升探索等级。
请点击此处前往
guide_text_world_levelup_mission_1.en: From now on, special <@gd.key>Exploration Level trial missions</> must be completed to raise it further. Click here to view the mission.

guide_text_world_levelup_mission_1_ct.cn:
从现在开始，需要完成<@gd.key>探索等级验证任务</>才能提升探索等级。
请按下<action=watch_explore>前往。
guide_text_world_levelup_mission_1_ct.en: From now on, special <@gd.key>Exploration Level trial missions</> must be completed first to raise it further. Press <action=watch_explore> to view the mission.

guide_text_world_levelup_mission_2.cn: 完成该任务，即可提升探索等级。
guide_text_world_levelup_mission_2.en: Complete this mission to increase Exploration Level.

guide_text_wuling_domain_0.cn: 可按下<action=mainhud_open_domain>或者按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_wuling_domain_0.en: Press <action=mainhud_open_domain> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the <@gd.key>Regional Development</> screen.

guide_text_wuling_domain_0_ct.cn: 可按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>并进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_wuling_domain_0_ct.en: Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</> and access the <@gd.key>Regional Development</> screen.

guide_text_wuling_domain_0_mb.cn: 可点击此处，进入<@gd.key>地区建设</>。
guide_text_wuling_domain_0_mb.en: Tap here to open the <@gd.key>Regional Development</> screen.

guide_text_wuling_domain_1.cn: 在武陵地区，同样可以进行<@gd.key>地区建设</>。可在此查看各项<@gd.key>地区建设</>的具体内容。
guide_text_wuling_domain_1.en: <@gd.key>Regional Development</> is also available in Wuling. This shows various <@gd.key>Regional Development</> details.

guide_text_wuling_domain_2.cn:
在武陵地区中的各种探索行为都会获得武陵的<@gd.key>地区建设值</>。
同样可在此处查看地区建设等级带来的具体影响。
guide_text_wuling_domain_2.en: Engage in various exploration activities in Wuling to earn <@gd.key>Regional Development Metrics</> in this region. This screen also shows the effects at various Regional Development Levels.

guide_text_wuling_domain_3.cn:
在武陵地区，会使用<@gd.key>武陵调度券</>进行各项内容的解锁与升级。
并且各项内容也会产出<@gd.key>武陵调度券</>。
guide_text_wuling_domain_3.en:
<@gd.key>Wuling Stock Bills</> are used to unlock and upgrade various Wuling Regional Development options.
Upgrades will also generate <@gd.key>Wuling Stock Bills</>.

guide_text_wuling_domain_4.cn: 当前已解锁<@gd.key>环境监测</>，可在此处进行快捷查看。
guide_text_wuling_domain_4.en: <@gd.key>Environment Monitoring</> is unlocked. Use this to check it out.

guide_text_wuling_domain_5.cn: 如果需要查看其他地区的建设情况，可点击此处进行切换。
guide_text_wuling_domain_5.en: To view the development of other regions, click here to switch.

guide_text_wuling_domain_5_ct.cn: 如果需要查看其他地区的建设情况，可按下<action=domain_main_open_switch_region>进行切换。
guide_text_wuling_domain_5_ct.en: To view the development of other regions, press <action=domain_main_open_switch_region> to switch.

guide_text_wuling_qkbar_hint.cn:
在不同的地区，会启用不同的<@gd.key>设备快捷栏</>，并互相独立。
可将符合该地区需求的设备放置于快捷栏中。
guide_text_wuling_qkbar_hint.en:
Different regions use different <@gd.key>facility hotbars</>. These hotbars are also independent from each other.
This allows different facilities to be placed in the hotbar according to the regional requirements.

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_1.cn: 请按下快捷键<action=fac_open_tech_tree>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开工业发展规划。
guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_open_tech_tree> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the AIC Factory Plan.

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_2.cn: 请点击此处，查看<@gd.key>息壤生成</>工业技术。
guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_2.en: Click here to view the AIC Plan technology: <@gd.key>Xiranite Forging</>.

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_2_ct.cn: 请按下<action=common_confirm>，查看<@gd.key>息壤生成</>工业技术。
guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to view the AIC Plan technology: <@gd.key>Xiranite Forging</>.

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_3.cn: 请点击此处，查看<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>相关的模拟空间。
guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_3.en: Click here to view simulations for the <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</>.

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_3_ct.cn: 请按下<action=tech_tree_detail_related_blackbox>，查看<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>相关的模拟空间。
guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_3_ct.en: Press <action=tech_tree_detail_related_blackbox> to view simulations for the <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</>.

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_5.cn: 通过<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>模拟空间，可以学习到如何生产息壤。
guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_5.en: Use the <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> simulation to learn how to produce Xiranite.

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_6.cn: 通过完成该模拟空间，可获得<@gd.key>息壤的产线蓝图</>，有助快速搭建产线、自动化生产息壤。
guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_6.en: Complete the simulation to acquire the <@gd.key>Xiranite production line blueprint</>. The blueprint can help quickly establish an automated production line for Xiranite.

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_7.cn: 可点击此处进入，请尝试一下。

guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_7_ct.cn: 可按下<action=common_confirm>进入，请尝试一下。
guide_text_xiranite_blackbox_7_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to enter and try it out.

guide_text_xiranite_diffuser_hint_1.cn: 在武陵地区使用<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>可以与其他<@gd.key>息壤电力</>设备<@gd.key>自动连电</>。
guide_text_xiranite_diffuser_hint_1.en: In Wuling, <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylons</> can <@gd.key>automatically connect</> with other <@gd.key>Xiranite power facilities</>.

guide_text_xiranite_hydrant_desc_1.cn:
在成功激活息壤控流节点后，可将射流无人机与其连接。
在息壤控流节点的范围内，可使用其中的<@gd.key>液化息壤</>为射流无人机提供液体。
guide_text_xiranite_hydrant_desc_1.en: Once a Xiranite flow control node is activated, it can continuously refill a jet drone within range with <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</>.

guide_text_xiranite_hydrant_desc_2.cn: 液化息壤是以液体形式存在的息壤。目前可用于消除泥侵蚀、激活息壤装置。
guide_text_xiranite_hydrant_desc_2.en: Essentially Xiranite in liquid form. It can be used to eliminate Blight mudflows and activate Xiranite facilities.

guide_text_xiranite_hydrant_desc_3.cn: 接下来，武陵地区所有的息壤控流节点，都可以在管理员激活后使用。
guide_text_xiranite_hydrant_desc_3.en: All Xiranite flow control nodes in Wuling can now be activated and used, Endministrator.

guide_text_xiranite_oven_amount_1_desc_1.cn: 扩容后，可在武陵地区放置更多的<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>，扩大息壤生产线。
guide_text_xiranite_oven_amount_1_desc_1.en: Once expanded, more <@gd.key>Forges of the Sky</> can be placed in Wuling to expand the Xiranite production line.

guide_text_xiranite_power_pole_hint_1.cn: 在武陵地区使用<@gd.key>息壤中继器</>可以与其他<@gd.key>息壤电力</>设备<@gd.key>自动连电</>。
guide_text_xiranite_power_pole_hint_1.en: In Wuling, <@gd.key>Xiranite Relays</> can <@gd.key>automatically connect</> with other <@gd.key>Xiranite power facilities</>.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_2_1.cn: 背包里已经放有<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>，可直接放置。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_2_1.en: The Backpack already has a <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</> that can be placed directly.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_2_2.cn: 请点击此处选中<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>。

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_2_3.cn: 接下来请点击<@gd.key>放置</>按钮。

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_2_4.cn: <@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>会<@gd.key>自动与附近的电力设备连接</>，请放置在水泵和给水器旁为其供电。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_2_4.en: The <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</> will <@gd.key>automatically connect with nearby power facilities</>. Place it near the Fluid Pump and Fluid Supply Unit to power them.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_3_1_weak.cn: 背包已满，<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>等设备已放入<@gd.key>仓库</>，请前往集成核心区域从仓库中取出。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_3_1_weak.en: Backpack is full. The <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</> has been placed in the <@gd.key>Depot</>. Go to the Core AIC Area to retrieve the facility from the Depot.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_desc_1.cn: 息壤中继器是武陵地区特有的设备。在集成核心区域外可<@gd.key>自动连接</>协议核心与全部息壤电力设备（80m内），但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。在集成核心区域内仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行电力传输与小范围供电。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_desc_1.en: Xiranite Relays are exclusive to the region of Wuling. When placed outside the Core AIC Area, they <@gd.key>auto-connect</> to the PAC and any Xiranite power facilities within an 80-meter radius, but cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When placed inside the Core AIC Area, they only auto-connect to the PAC. Xiranite Relays can be used for power transmission and powering facilities within a short range.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_desc_2.cn: 息壤供电桩也是武陵地区特有的设备。在集成核心区域外可<@gd.key>自动连接</>协议核心与息壤中继器（80m内）、息壤供电桩以及其他电力设备（30m内），但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。在集成核心区域内仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行范围供电与短距离电力传输。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_desc_2.en: Xiranite Pylons are exclusive to the region of Wuling. When placed outside the Core AIC Area, they <@gd.key>auto-connect</> to the PAC and Xiranite Relays within an 80-meter radius; and to Xiranite Pylons and other power facilities within a 30-meter radius. However, they cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When placed inside the Core AIC Area, they only auto-connect to the PAC. Xiranite Pylons can be used for powering facilities within range and power transmission across short distances.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_intro_1.cn: 背包里已经放有<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>，请按下快捷键<action=common_open_inventory>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_intro_1.en: The Backpack already has a <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</>. Press the hotkey <action=common_open_inventory> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_intro_1_ct.cn: 背包里已经放有<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>，可以按下<action=common_open_quick_menu_start>打开<@gd.key>系统功能轮盘</>，并进入<@gd.key>背包</>界面。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_intro_1_ct.en: The Backpack already has a <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</>. Press <action=common_open_quick_menu_start> to open the <@gd.key>System Feature Wheel</> and open the <@gd.key>Backpack</> panel.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_intro_1_mb.cn: 背包里已经放有<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>，请点击此处，打开背包。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_intro_1_mb.en: The Backpack already has a <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</>. Tap here to open the Backpack.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_put_1.cn: 点击此处选中<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>。

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_put_2.cn: 点击此处开始放置<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_put_2.en: Click here to place the <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylon</>.

guide_text_xiranite_ppole_put_3.cn: <@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>放下后会<@gd.key>自动</>与<@gd.key>附近的电力设备</>或协议核心连电。
guide_text_xiranite_ppole_put_3.en: Once placed, <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylons</> will <@gd.key>automatically</> form power connections with nearby <@gd.key>power facilities</> or the PAC.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_0.cn: 随着息壤蓝图方案已经与集成工业系统整合完毕，我们解锁了全新的工业技术系列。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_0.en: The proposed Xiranite blueprint is completely integrated with the AIC Factory system. We have unlocked a new series of AIC technologies.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_1.cn: 请按下快捷键<action=fac_open_tech_tree>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处，打开工业发展规划。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_1.en: Press the hotkey <action=fac_open_tech_tree> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to open the AIC Factory Plan.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_2.cn: 现已解锁<@gd.key>息壤工业</>系列。可研发<@gd.key>息壤</>相关的科技。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_2.en: The <@gd.key>Xiranite</> AIC Plan series is now unlocked. <@gd.key>Xiranite</>-related technologies can now be researched.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_3.cn: 当前已研发完成了<@gd.key>息壤生成</>工业技术，请点击此处查看。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_3.en: The AIC Plan technology <@gd.key>Xiranite Forging</> has been researched. Click here for details.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_3_ct.cn: 当前已研发完成了<@gd.key>息壤生成</>工业技术，请按下<action=common_confirm>查看。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_3_ct.en: The AIC Plan technology <@gd.key>Xiranite Forging</> has been researched. Press <action=common_confirm> for details.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_4.cn: 可使用<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>这一设备，制造<@gd.key>息壤</>这一产物。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_4.en: Use the AIC facility <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> to produce <@gd.key>Xiranite</>.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_5.cn: <@gd.key>天有洪炉</>作为武陵地区特有的设备，只能在<@gd.key>武陵地区</>放置，并且有放置数量的限制。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_5.en: The <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> is a special Wuling AIC facility. It can only be placed in the <@gd.key>Wuling region</>, and only a limited number of these forges can be placed.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_6.cn: 通过研究后续的工业技术，能够放置更多的<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_6.en: Additional AIC Plan technologies can be researched to allow the placement of more <@gd.key>Forges of the Sky</>.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_7.cn: 当前也研发完成了<@gd.key>武陵电力</>工业技术，可以制造并使用<@gd.key>息壤中继器</>和<@gd.key>息壤供电桩</>。在武陵地区更方便地<@gd.key>自动连电</>。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_7.en: The AIC technology of <@gd.key>Wuling Power</> has been researched. This allows the construction of <@gd.key>Xiranite Relays</> and <@gd.key>Xiranite Pylons</> that can <@gd.key>automatically form power transmitting connections</> for greater convenience. These power facilities can be used in the region of Wuling.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_desc_1.cn: 天有洪炉作为武陵地区特殊的设备，只能在武陵地区放置。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_desc_1.en: The Forge of the Sky is a special Wuling AIC facility and can only be placed in the Wuling region.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_desc_2.cn: 天有洪炉具有放置数量的限制，可通过研究后续的工业技术，来增加能够放置的数量上限。
guide_text_xiranite_tech_desc_2.en: Only a limited number of Forges of the Sky can be placed. Research certain AIC technologies to place more Forges.

guide_text_xiranite_tech_title_1.en: Forge of the Sky: Regional Limit

guide_text_xiranite_tech_title_2.en: Forge of the Sky: Placement Limit

guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_02_1.cn: 伊冯的战技可以<#ba.consume>消耗</>掉目标身上所有的<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>和<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>，对其强制施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>，并基于<#ba.consume>消耗</>的层数造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
