guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_02_1.en: Yvonne's battle skill can <#ba.consume>consume</> all <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> and <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> stacks from the target, forcibly applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>, and deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> based on the number of stacks <#ba.consume>consumed</>.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_03_1.cn: 伊冯解锁天赋<@ba.key>科技连击</>后，战技触发<#ba.frozen>冻结</>时，下一次普通攻击会直接施放<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_03_1.en: With the talent <@ba.key>Barrage of Technology</> unlocked, when Yvonne's battle skill triggers <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>, her next basic attack will be a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> instead.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_04_1.cn: 伊冯的连携技持续造成伤害，并在结束时对敌人施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_04_1.en: Yvonne's combo skill deals continuous DMG and applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> on enemies when it ends.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_05_1.cn: 伊冯的终结技会强化普通攻击。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_05_1.en: Yvonne's ultimate enhances her basic attacks (BATK).

guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_05_2.cn: 伊冯的终结技持续时间结束前的最后一次普通攻击会变为<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>，并造成大量<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>
guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_05_2.en: Yvonne's last basic attack before her ultimate ends will be a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> that deals massive <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_05_3.cn: 如果敌人处于<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态，最后一击还会造成额外<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>并<#ba.consume>消耗</>其<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrain01_05_3.en: If the enemy is <#ba.frozen>Solidified</>, the final hit also deals additional <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and then <#ba.consume>consumes</> the said enemy's <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_1.cn: 伊冯是一名通过暴击造成大量输出的干员。她可以通过技能持续施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>，施放终结技后，能获得强力的单体输出能力。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_1.en: Yvonne is a DMG dealer who leverages her critical hits. Her skills can continuously apply <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> and her ultimate makes her a powerful single-target DMG dealer.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_2.cn: 伊冯的战技能够<#ba.consume>消耗</>掉目标身上所有的<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>和<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>并强制施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>。当伊冯的战技成功施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>后，会获得天赋<@ba.key>科技连击</>的加成，使下次普通攻击直接施放<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_2.en: Yvonne's battle skill can <#ba.consume>consume</> all of the target's <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> and <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> stacks, and forcibly apply <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>. When Yvonne's battle skill successfully applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>, she gains a bonus from her talent <@ba.key>Barrage of Technology</> that converts her next basic attack into a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</>.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_3.cn: 当主控干员<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>处于<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态的敌人时，可以发动伊冯的连携技：部署速冻仔，持续攻击并<@ba.key>牵引</>周围敌人，速冻仔自爆时还会对周围敌人强制施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_3.en: Yvonne's combo skill is triggered when the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on an enemy with <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>. Her combo skill deploys the robot Frost-e-Bytee that continuously attacks and <@ba.key>pulls-in</> nearby enemies. When Frost-e-Bytee detonates itself, the explosion also forcibly applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> on nearby enemies.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_4.cn:
当敌人陷入被动，抓住时机施放伊冯的终结技，用强化普通攻击对其连续射击。
每次连续的射击会提高自身造成的伤害。
如果敌人处于<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态，最后一击还会造成额外<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>并<#ba.consume>消耗</>其<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_4.en:
When the moment is right to deal major DMG on the enemy, cast Yvonne's ultimate and unleash a continuous stream of bullets with her enhanced basic attacks.
Every shot fired during the ultimate increases the DMG she deals.
If the enemy is <#ba.frozen>Solidified</>, the last attack of the ultimate deals an additional hit of <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and <#ba.consume>consumes</> the enemy's <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_5.cn: 让其他干员先于伊冯施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>和<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>，再施放伊冯的战技，可以迅速激活天赋<@ba.key>科技连击</>，并高效触发<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>和连携技。尽可能让伊冯的战技和连携技施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>来提升作战效率。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_5.en: Use another operator to apply <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> and/or <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>, then cast Yvonne's battle skill to quickly activate her talent <@ba.key>Barrage of Technology</> to efficiently trigger her <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> and combo skill. Improve combat performance by applying <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> with Yvonne's battle skill and combo skill.

guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_6.cn: 先施放<@ba.key>埃特拉战技</>，再施放<@ba.key>伊冯战技</>，以触发伊冯需要的<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态。
guide_text_yvonne_chartrial01_01_6.en: First cast <@ba.key>Estella's battle skill</>, then cast <@ba.key>Yvonne's battle skill</> to trigger the <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> that Yvonne needs.

guide_title_belt_e1m6_limited_4.cn: 操作面板中的物流信息

guide_title_training_01_mediaGuide_1.en: Enemy skill charge ups and interrupting them

guide_tsz_pic_2.cn: 部分天师桩周边存在着辅助其运转的<@gd.key>辅桩</>。
guide_tsz_pic_2.en: Some Tianshi Pillars may have <@gd.key>auxiliary pillars</> nearby to support their operations.

guide_tsz_pic_4.cn: 爻分阴/阳两种，分别对应两类辅桩，可与对应类型的辅桩交互，点亮主桩上的爻。
guide_tsz_pic_4.en: There are 2 types of auxiliary pillars marked by their divinograms: (1) Yin and (2) Yang. Interact with them to light up the divinogram on the main pillar.

guide_tsz_pic_6.cn: 按主桩卦象<@gd.key>自下而上的顺序</>，依次点亮辅桩，则可点亮卦象。
guide_tsz_pic_6.en: The main pillar divinograms are read from <@gd.key>bottom to the top</>. Illuminate the auxiliary pillars in this sequence to activate the divinograms.

guide_vibe_vedioPic_2.cn:
可参考地面的输入箭头与输出箭头，进行管道的连接。
管道需从<@gd.key>设备与物流出口</>或<@gd.key>其他管道</>开始连接。
guide_vibe_vedioPic_2.en: Refer to the input and output arrows on the ground to make pipeline connections. The pipeline must start its connection from a <@gd.key>facility outlet, logistics outlet</>, or <@gd.key>another pipeline</>.

guide_vibe_vedioPic_4.cn:
管道的单次放置有<@gd.key>最大长度</>的限制。
当长度超过单条管道上限时，请接入其他设备或管道物流设备。
guide_vibe_vedioPic_4.en: There is a <@gd.key>limit to the length</> of pipeline that can be placed in a single action. When the single pipeline placement length limit is exceeded, connect it to a facility or pipeline logistics unit.

guide_waterButton.cn: 在充满液体的湖泊或水池附近时，<@gd.key>盛装</>选项下的便捷工具键会亮起，按下<action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处可进行液体盛装。
guide_waterButton.en: When close to a full lake or pool, the <@gd.key>Fill</> action of the Easy Tools button will be highlighted. Press <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to perform the Fill action.

guide_waterButton_ct.cn: 在充满液体的湖泊或水池附近时，<@gd.key>盛装</>选项下的便捷工具键会亮起，按下<action=general_ability_press>可进行液体盛装。
guide_waterButton_ct.en: When close to a full lake or pool, the <@gd.key>Fill</> action of the Easy Tools button will be highlighted. Press <action=general_ability_press> to perform the Fill action.

guide_waterButton_intro_1.cn: 请<@gd.key>长按</><action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>后<@gd.key>长按</>此处切换便捷工具键。
guide_waterButton_intro_1.en: <@gd.key>Long-press </> <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and <@gd.key>long-press</> here to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_waterButton_intro_1_ct.en: <@gd.key>Press and hold</> <action=general_ability_press> to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_waterButton_intro_1_mb.cn: 可以<@gd.key>长按</>此处切换便捷工具。
guide_waterButton_intro_1_mb.en: <@gd.key>Tap and hold</> this to switch the Easy Tools action.

guide_waterButton_intro_2.cn: 在武陵地区，可对液体进行<@gd.key>盛装和倾倒</>，请移动鼠标至此，切换至<@gd.key>盛装</>选项。
guide_waterButton_intro_2.en: Fluids can be <@gd.key>filled or poured</> in the region of Wuling. Move the cursor here and switch to the <@gd.key>Fill</> option.

guide_waterButton_intro_2_1.en: We have switched to the <@gd.key>Fill</> option.

guide_waterButton_intro_2_ct.cn: 在武陵地区，可对液体进行<@gd.key>盛装和倾倒</>，请推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆，切换至<@gd.key>盛装</>选项。
guide_waterButton_intro_2_ct.en: Fluids can be <@gd.key>filled or poured</> in the region of Wuling. Use the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to switch to the <@gd.key>Fill</> option.

guide_waterButton_intro_2_mb.cn: 在武陵地区，可对液体进行<@gd.key>盛装和倾倒</>，请拖动轮盘至此处，切换至<@gd.key>盛装</>选项。
guide_waterButton_intro_2_mb.en: Fluids can be <@gd.key>filled or poured</> in the region of Wuling. Drag the wheel here to switch to the <@gd.key>Fill</> option.

guide_waterButton_intro_3.cn: 在充满液体的湖泊或水池附近时，<@gd.key>盛装</>选项下的便捷工具键会亮起，可进行<@gd.key>液体盛装</>。
guide_waterButton_intro_3.en: When close to a full lake or pool, the <@gd.key>Fill</> action of the Easy Tools button will be highlighted. The button can then be pressed to <@gd.key>fill available containers</>.

guide_waterButton_intro_4.cn:
可按下<action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>后点击此处，进行盛装。
如果当前便捷工具键不是盛装，可<@gd.key>长按</>快捷键<action=general_ability_press>切换至。
guide_waterButton_intro_4.en: Press <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to fill the fluid. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Fill, <@gd.key>long-press</> the hotkey <action=general_ability_press> to switch to it.

guide_waterButton_intro_4_ct.cn:
可按下<action=general_ability_press>，进行盛装。
如果当前便捷工具键不是盛装，可<@gd.key>长按</><action=general_ability_press>切换至。
guide_waterButton_intro_4_ct.en: Press <action=general_ability_press> to fill the fluid. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Fill, <@gd.key>press and hold</> <action=general_ability_press> to switch to it.

guide_waterButton_intro_4_mb.cn:
可点击此处，进行盛装。
如果当前便捷工具键不是盛装，可<@gd.key>长按</>此处切换至。
guide_waterButton_intro_4_mb.en: Tap here to fill the fluid. If the current Easy Tools action is not set to Fill, <@gd.key>tap and hold</> this to switch to it.

guide_waterButton_mb.cn: 在充满液体的湖泊或水池附近时，<@gd.key>盛装</>选项下的便捷工具键会亮起，点击此处可进行液体盛装。
guide_waterButton_mb.en: When close to a full lake or pool, the <@gd.key>Fill</> action of the Easy Tools button will be highlighted. Tap here to perform the Fill action.

guide_waterButton_pic_2.cn:
便捷工具键可切换为<@gd.key>盛装</>选项。
在充满液体的湖泊或水池附近时，<@gd.key>盛装</>选项下的便捷工具键会亮起，可进行<@gd.key>液体盛装</>与倾倒。
guide_waterButton_pic_2.en: The Easy Tools button can be switched to the <@gd.key>Fill</> action. When close to a lake or filled reservoir, the <@gd.key>Fill</> action of the Easy Tools button will be highlighted. The button can then be pressed to <@gd.key>fill available containers</> or pour fluids out of filled containers.

guide_waterButton_pic_4.cn: 便捷工具键的<@gd.key>盛装</>功能目前<@gd.key>只能在武陵地区使用</>，无法应用于四号谷地。
guide_waterButton_pic_4.en: The <@gd.key>Fill</> action of Easy Tools is <@gd.key>only available in the region of Wuling</> and cannot be used in Valley IV.

guide_waterFill_1_1.cn:
盛装液体需要使用<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>等容器。
请点击此处，进行空容器选择。
guide_waterFill_1_1.en: The Fill action requires containers such as <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottles</> for the fluid to be filled. Click here to select an empty container.

guide_waterFill_1_1_ct.cn:
盛装液体需要使用<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>等容器。
请按下<action=liquid_pool_select_item>，进行空容器选择。
guide_waterFill_1_1_ct.en: The Fill action requires containers such as <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottles</> for the fluid to be filled. Press <action=liquid_pool_select_item> to select an empty container.

guide_waterFill_1_2.cn:
请点击此处，选择<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>进行液体的盛装。
可<@gd.key>长按</>快速增加选择的容器数量。
guide_waterFill_1_2.en: Click here to select the <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottle</> to fill the fluid. <@gd.key>Long-press</> to quickly increase the number of bottles selected.

guide_waterFill_1_2_1.cn:
由于背包已满，发放的<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>已存入仓库。可在<@gd.key>协议传送点</>或者<@gd.key>便捷存取站</>中取出。
当背包中装有<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>等容器后，即可在此处选择容器进行液体盛装。
guide_waterFill_1_2_1.en: <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottles</> have been placed in the Depot as your Backpack is full. They can be acquired at <@gd.key>TP Points</> or <@gd.key>Easy Stashes</>. Carry some Ferrium Bottles or other similar containers in the Backpack to select the containers here and fill them with fluids.

guide_waterFill_1_2_ct.cn:
请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>进行液体的盛装。
可<@gd.key>长按</>快速增加选择的容器数量。
guide_waterFill_1_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select the <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottle</> to fill the fluid. <@gd.key>Press and hold</> to quickly increase the number of bottles selected.

guide_waterFill_1_3.cn:
点击<@gd.key>确认</>即可进行液体盛装。
请多尝试几次。
guide_waterFill_1_3.en:
Click the <@gd.key>Confirm</> button to fill the containers.
Try this a few more times.

guide_waterFill_1_3_ct.cn:
按下<action=liquid_pool_confirm_item>即可进行液体盛装。
请多尝试几次。
guide_waterFill_1_3_ct.en: Press <action=liquid_pool_confirm_item> to fill the containers. Try this a few more times.

guide_waterFill_2.cn: 切换到液体交互后，当在湖泊等附近且按钮亮起时，按下<action=general_ability_press>或按住<image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3>点击此处可以进行液体盛装。
guide_waterFill_2.en: After switching to fluid interaction, being close to a lake or water body will light up the button. Press <action=general_ability_press> or hold <image="KeyIcon/icon_key_alt" scale=1.3> and click here to perform the Fill action.

guide_waterFill_2_ct.cn: 切换到液体交互后，当在湖泊等附近且按钮亮起时，按下<action=general_ability_press>可以进行液体盛装。
guide_waterFill_2_ct.en: After switching to fluid interaction, being close to a lake or water body will light up the button. Press <action=general_ability_press> to perform the Fill action.

guide_waterFill_2_mb.cn: 切换到液体交互后，当在湖泊等附近且按钮亮起时，点击此处可以进行液体盛装。
guide_waterFill_2_mb.en: After switching to fluid interaction, being close to a lake or water body will light up the button. Tap here to perform the Fill action.

guide_waterPour_1.cn:
在某些机关、水池处，也可进行液体倾倒。
请点击此处，进行已盛装液体容器的选择。
guide_waterPour_1.en:
Fluids can be poured at certain mechanisms or pools. 
Click here to select a fluid-filled bottle.

guide_waterPour_1_ct.cn:
在某些机关、水池处，也可进行液体倾倒。
请按下<action=liquid_pool_select_item>，进行已盛装液体容器的选择。
guide_waterPour_1_ct.en: Fluids can be poured at certain mechanisms or pools. Press <action=liquid_pool_select_item> to select a fluid-filled bottle.

guide_waterPour_2.cn:
请点击此处，选择<@gd.key>盛装有清水的蓝铁瓶</>进行液体的倾倒。
可<@gd.key>长按</>快速增加选择的容器数量。
guide_waterPour_2.en: Click here to select <@gd.key>Clean Water in Ferrium Bottles</> for pouring. <@gd.key>Long-press</> to quickly increase the number of bottles selected.

guide_waterPour_2_1.cn: 当背包中装有<@gd.key>盛装有清水的蓝铁瓶</>后，即可在此处选择并进行液体倾倒。
guide_waterPour_2_1.en: If the Backpack has <@gd.key>Clean Water in Ferrium Bottles</>, they can be selected here for pouring.

guide_waterPour_2_ct.cn:
请按下<action=common_confirm>，选择<@gd.key>盛装有清水的蓝铁瓶</>进行液体的倾倒。
可<@gd.key>长按</>快速增加选择的容器数量。
guide_waterPour_2_ct.en: Press <action=common_confirm> to select <@gd.key>Clean Water in Ferrium Bottles</> for pouring. <@gd.key>Press and hold</> to quickly increase the number of bottles selected.

guide_waterPour_3.cn: 点击<@gd.key>确认</>即可进行液体倾倒。

home.checkIn.intro.cn: 参与「重连签到」活动，7天可领取【嵌晶玉】× 2000等奖励！
home.checkIn.intro.en: Take part in the [Reconnection Sign-In] event for 7 days and claim [Oroberyl]×2000 and other rewards!

home.task.intro.cn: 参与「重连任务」活动，完成相关任务，可获得【基础寻访凭证】× 4等奖励！
home.task.intro.en: Take part in the [Reconnection Tasks] event and complete various tasks to acquire [Basic HH Permit]×4 and other rewards!

home.task.taskContent.daily_login.en: Log into the game 1 time per day (this can be completed 7 times)

home.task.taskContent.start_production.en: In Dijiang, claim products from any production cabin 1 time

lang_fixable_props_robot_detail.cn:
源石电路损坏，动弹不得的Delta型多功能机器人，可怜又无助。
若是可以的话，管理员，帮帮它吧。
lang_fixable_props_robot_detail.en:
Originium circuitry damaged. This Delta general purpose robot is so helpless right now. 

Please help out this poor little Delta, Endmin!

lang_int_003craneRotateHint.cn: 货物位于作业区，请将货物吊起后再转动吊臂
lang_int_003craneRotateHint.en: Cargo is in processing area. Lift the cargo first before turning the crane arm.

lang_int_box_auto_exit_toast.cn: 距离过远，箱子已停止跟随
lang_int_box_auto_exit_toast.en: Crate stopped following due to distance

lang_int_box_reset_toast.cn: 距离太远，箱子自动回到了原位
lang_int_box_reset_toast.en: You are too far. Crate has returned to its original position.

lang_int_challenge_start_point_in_cooldo.cn: 超域能量已被清理，距下次重新聚集还有{0}分钟

lang_int_crane_resist_factory_toast.cn: 货物上升或旋转路径上存在工厂建筑，当前不能进行该操作
lang_int_crane_resist_factory_toast.en: Cannot perform action. Cargo lifting/rotating path is blocked by factory building.

lang_int_crane_resist_toast.cn: 货物上升或旋转路径上存在阻挡，当前不能进行该操作
lang_int_crane_resist_toast.en: Cannot perform action. Cargo lifting/rotating path is blocked.

lang_int_fac_udpipe_toast_loader_connect.cn: 该进水口已连接其他排水口，请移除连接或选择其他进水口
lang_int_fac_udpipe_toast_loader_connect.en: This inlet is connected to another outlet. Remove the connection or select another inlet.

lang_int_fac_udpipe_toast_unloader_conne.cn: 该排水口已连接其他进水口，请移除连接或选择其他排水口
lang_int_fac_udpipe_toast_unloader_conne.en: This outlet is connected to another inlet. Remove the connection or select another outlet.

lang_int_fence_switch_poweroff_toast.en: Cannot control. Switch is not connected to power grid.

lang_int_sm1l7m2_desc1.cn: 修复机器人并完成对机器人内部结构的解析，最终进行数据提取。
lang_int_sm1l7m2_desc1.en: Repair and complete the analysis of the robot's internal structure. Perform data extraction after that.

lang_int_sm1l7m2_desc2.cn: 重新对受损机器人进行全面解析。

lang_int_xiansuo.en: Listen in to clues about Tangtang

level_toast_repatriate_count.en: Unauthorized entry detected. Force eviction in {0}s.

m0m2_desc_001.cn: 前往指定地点完成考验，提升探索等级。
m0m2_desc_001.en: Go to the marked location and complete the trial to upgrade the Exploration Level.

m0m2_desc_002.cn: 跟随神秘声音的指引，击败所有敌人。
m0m2_desc_002.en: Follow the guidance of the mysterious voice and defeat all enemies.

m0m3_desc_001.cn: 前往指定地点完成考验，提升探索等级。
m0m3_desc_001.en: Go to the marked location and complete the trial to upgrade the Exploration Level.

m0m3_desc_002.cn: 跟随神秘声音的指引，击败所有敌人。
m0m3_desc_002.en: Follow the guidance of the mysterious voice and defeat all enemies.

m0m4_desc_001.cn: 前往指定地点完成考验，提升探索等级。
m0m4_desc_001.en: Go to the marked location and complete the trial to upgrade the Exploration Level.

m0m4_desc_002.cn: 跟随神秘声音的指引，击败所有敌人。
m0m4_desc_002.en: Follow the guidance of the mysterious voice and defeat all enemies.

m0m5_desc_001.cn: 前往指定地点完成考验，提升探索等级。
m0m5_desc_001.en: Go to the marked location and complete the trial to upgrade the Exploration Level.

m0m5_desc_002.cn: 跟随神秘声音的指引，击败所有敌人。
m0m5_desc_002.en: Follow the guidance of the mysterious voice and defeat all enemies.

m1m10_desc_001.cn: 一批援助工团的物资在运输途中滞留，似乎是负责运输的Delta型多功能机器人陷入了故障。前往现场查看情况，完成故障机器人的修理。
m1m10_desc_001.en: A batch of supplies for the UWST has been delayed. The Delta general purpose robots delivering the supplies appear to have malfunctioned. Investigate the site and fix the malfunctioning Deltas.

m1m24_desc_001.cn: 为了能通过集成工业系统生产工业爆炸物，还需要做些准备，先采集一些原材料吧。
m1m24_desc_001.en: You need to prepare your AIC Factory for producing Industrial Explosives. The first step is to find the raw materials.

m1m26_desc_001.cn: 一处被侵蚀潮损坏的探测信标。需要收集信标当前的状态信息，协助天师府学院进行研究与改进工作。
m1m26_desc_001.en: There is a detection beacon damaged by the Blight Tide. An update to the beacon's current status is required. Help the Tianshi Bureau Academy perform its research and improvement tasks.

m1m26_name.cn: 拍摄侵蚀潮中损坏的信标

m1m27_desc_001.cn: 蓄水源石虫在不同生态环境下，或独行或群聚。需要进行信息收集，协助天师府学院完善对这一现象的研究。
m1m27_desc_001.en: Cistern Originium Slugs either live independently or in groups depending on the local ecology or environment. Additional information is required by the Tianshi Bureau Academy to learn more about such phenomena.

m1m28_desc_001.cn: 动力竹筏上装有避免惊扰水中生物的调试器。需要收集动力竹筏行驶时七彩鳞的反应，协助天师府学院改进调试器。
m1m28_desc_001.en: Powered bamboo rafts have been furnished with modulators to avoid disturbing aquatic organisms. Actual responses by rainbow fins towards a working bamboo raft are still required to help the Tianshi Bureau Academy make improvements to the modulators.

m1m29_desc_001.cn: 室内试验田的观测设备因维修无法使用。需要收集试验田作物的当前状态信息，协助天师府学院进行数据分析。
m1m29_desc_001.en: The indoor testing plot video cameras are down for maintenance. Gather information on the current status of the test plots to help the Tianshi Bureau Academy analyze their data.

m1m30_desc_001.cn: 古树最近发出了一些很奇怪的声响。需要进行信息收集，协助观测站对该区域进行生态监测。
m1m30_desc_001.en: Strange noises have been recently heard near the Ancient Tree. More information is required to help the monitoring center keep track of the local ecology.

m1m30_name.cn: 拍摄生长在小水潭上的古树

m1m31_desc_001.cn: 一个被弃用的天师桩。需要收集生长在倒塌天师桩上的植被信息，协助对“是否有必要搬移倒塌天师桩”的调查评估。
m1m31_desc_001.en: There is an abandoned Tianshi Pillar. Information is required about epiphytes growing on the collapsed structure to help determine the "necessity in removing the collapsed Tianshi Pillar".

m1m32_desc_001.cn: 一棵长在亭子中间，有着粉色叶子的树木。需要进行信息收集，协助观测站对“栖霞驻影”突然大量落叶的调查。
m1m32_desc_001.en: There is a pink-leafed tree growing in a certain pavilion. More information is needed to help the monitoring center determine the cause behind the sudden leaf drop of the "Eternal Sunset".

m1m32_name.cn: 拍摄生长在亭子中间的“栖霞驻影”

m1m33_desc_001.cn: 一棵长在石柱侧面，有着白色叶子的树木。需要进行信息收集，协助观测站对“‘漱玉’是否会垮塌”进行的调查。
m1m33_desc_001.en: There is a white-leafed tree growing from the sides of a stone pillar. More information is required to help the monitoring center determine if "the 'Cleansing Jade' is falling off".

m1m33_name.cn: 拍摄在石柱上侧向生长的“漱玉”

m1m41_desc_001.cn: 清波寨的寨民荆芥请求管理员帮他采集一些药材。
m1m41_desc_001.en: Jing Jie of Qingbo Stockade needs your help to collect some herbs.

m1m42_desc_001.cn: 天师学徒沐奚给管理员发来消息，请求管理员帮忙定位实验用天桩的准确位置。
m1m42_desc_001.en: Tianshi disciple Mu Xi has sent you a message. She wonders if you can give her precise locations of experimental sky pole drones.

m1m43_desc_001.cn: 运输环境监测样本的Delta型多功能机器人似乎陷入了故障，样本无法被顺利回收。前往现场查看情况，完成故障机器人的修理。
m1m43_desc_001.en: Some environment monitoring samples cannot be recovered as the Delta general purpose robots transporting them have broken down. Investigate the site and help repair the robot.

m1m6_desc_001.cn: 菲奥娜提醒附近有一处即将失控的能量淤积点，建议前去探查情况。
m1m6_desc_001.en: Fiona tells you about an Energy Alluvium going out of control and advises you to investigate it.

m1m8_desc_001.cn: 工人之家的灰医生米格尔请求管理员帮他采集一些药材。
m1m8_desc_001.en: Dusthair Miguel at the Worker Dorms is requesting you to collect some herbal samples for him.

m1m9_desc_001.cn: 安德烈给管理员发来消息，请求管理员帮忙定位受损机器人的准确位置。
m1m9_desc_001.en: Andre has sent you a message. He wonders if you can give him the precise locations of the damaged robots.

notify_stamina_recover_content.cn: 管理员，当前理智已恢复到上限！
notify_stamina_recover_content.en: Endmin, your Sanity has been restored to its limits!

rewardModal.prompt.cn: 以下奖励已发放至邮箱，请管理员注意查收
rewardModal.prompt.en: These rewards have been sent to your Mail. Don't forget to claim them, Endmin.

rewardshow_tips.cn: 参与世界探索、协议空间挑战等玩法还可获得更多<@activitybenefits.originium>衍质源石</>、<@activitybenefits.originium>嵌晶玉</>等丰富奖励！
rewardshow_tips.en: Engage in World Exploration, challenge Protocol Spaces, and take part in various activities to earn rich rewards such as <@activitybenefits.originium>Origeometries</> and <@activitybenefits.originium>Oroberyls</>.

scene_dg002_start.cn: 少女模样的佩丽卡：“你来了。”两人看向天空中的<@gd.key>巨大源石</>，幻影说那便是我们的目标。
scene_dg002_start.en: "You've arrived," said a young Perlica. Both looked upon the <@gd.key>giant Originium</> in the sky. The phantom illusion told us that would be our target.

scene_map01_lv001_sub02_tips_1.cn: 发现了落在列车上的货物，然而列车卡在了一个无法攀爬上去的位置
scene_map01_lv001_sub02_tips_1.en: Found some cargo left on the carriage, but it's stuck at a place inaccessible by climbing

scene_map01_lv001_sub02_tips_2.cn: 尝试联系物流人员并说明了情况
scene_map01_lv001_sub02_tips_2.en: Try contacting the logistics staff and describe the situation

scene_map01_lv005_sub01_tips_1.en: Access Card required to activate this

scene_map02_lv001_submit_e5m1_yujian2.cn: 拥有玉键不足，修复失败
scene_map02_lv001_submit_e5m1_yujian2.en: Not enough Jade Keys to repair

scene_map02_lv002_submit_gm02m8_2.cn: 未注入足量的息壤，符文组件激活失败。
scene_map02_lv002_submit_gm02m8_2.en: Insufficient Xiranite infused. Rune activation failed.

settlement_td_battle_desc_1.cn: 保护所有指挥核心并击败全部入侵的敌人
settlement_td_battle_desc_1.en: Protect all Command Cores and defeat all enemies

settlement_td_prepare_desc_1.cn: 在据点中布置作战设备，做好防守准备
settlement_td_prepare_desc_1.en: Prepare your defenses by placing combat facilities in the outpost

settlement_td_prepare_desc_2.cn:
在据点中布置作战设备，做好防守准备
<@gd.key>自动防御模式干员无法参战</>
settlement_td_prepare_desc_2.en:
Prepare your defenses by placing combat facilities in the outpost 
<@gd.key>Operators cannot intervene in Auto-Defense mode</>

sm1l1m10_desc_001.cn: 集成工业研究所的分管负责人希茜疑似失踪。前往求援信息指示地点，确保人员安全。
sm1l1m10_desc_001.en: Cynthia, our AIC Research Center (AIC-RC) Manager, is missing. You must find her and ensure her safety.

sm1l1m10_desc_003.cn: 灾害发生时，集成工业研究所的分管负责人希茜正在前往停车场。前去该位置查看，展开搜救。
sm1l1m10_desc_003.en: AIC-RC Manager Cynthia was heading to the parking lot when the Ankhorfall took place. Go to the parking lot and start your search and rescue mission.

sm1l1m10_desc_006.cn: 管理员顺利清理了停车场区域的天使，救出了集成工业研究所的分管负责人希茜。不过，异常聚集的天使引起了众人的注意。
sm1l1m10_desc_006.en: You clear out the Aggeloi in the parking lot and save AIC-RC Manager Cynthia. The unusual gathering of Aggeloi in this place has attracted a rather unhealthy attention.

sm1l1m10_desc_007.cn: 人们仍在顾虑终末地工业对天使的“研究”。与秦茳尺一起前去解释原委，争取信任。
sm1l1m10_desc_007.en: The locals are worried about the pulse generator and its ability to attract the Aggeloi. Work with Director Qin to calm the people and earn their trust.

sm1l1m11_desc_001.cn: 管理员在枢纽区基地帮助解决了许多问题，是时候再去和秦茳尺聊聊了。
sm1l1m11_desc_001.en: You have solved many issues at the Hub Base. Time to talk to Director Qin again.

sm1l1m1_desc_001.cn: 裂地者画下的无色涂鸦引起了一名基地警卫的注意，管理员决定设法探明这些印记隐藏的讯息。
sm1l1m1_desc_001.en: Invisible Landbreaker graffiti have attracted the attention of a security officer. You decide to uncover the truth behind these cryptic messages.

sm1l1m1_desc_002.cn: 管理员夺回了工团在袭击中失去的物资。返回源石副产物中心，将物资交给萨特。
sm1l1m1_desc_002.en: You successfully reclaim the lost UWST supplies. Return to the Originium BPPC and give them to Satyr.

sm1l1m2_desc_001.cn: 发现碾骨印记的警卫乔斯特给管理员发来了新消息，称自己的调查已有进展。
sm1l1m2_desc_001.en: Security officer Jouster who found the invisible Bonekrusher glyphs has sent you some messages. His investigation has made some progress.

sm1l1m2_desc_002.cn: 警卫乔斯特从朋友那里得到了更多关于“碾骨印记”的知识。管理员决定对这些印记展开进一步的调查。
sm1l1m2_desc_002.en: Security officer Jouster's friend has given him more information about "Bonekrusher glyphs". You decide to follow the lead.

sm1l1m2_desc_003.cn: 管理员根据涂鸦的指引发现了裂地者的营地，以及一处被封锁的山洞。观察四周，寻找开启山洞大门的方法。
sm1l1m2_desc_003.en: You follow the LB glyphs and find an LB stronghold and a sealed cave. Look around for a way to open the gate to the cave.

sm1l1m2_desc_004.cn: 找到乔斯特了解下事情的详细
sm1l1m2_desc_004.en: Find Jouster to learn more about the situation.

sm1l1m4_desc_001.cn: 枢纽区基地的物流主管莎曼已经忙得焦头烂额，也许管理员能帮她做些什么。
sm1l1m4_desc_001.en: The director of the Hub Base is overwhelmed with work. Perhaps you can help her out, Endministrator.

sm1l1m4_desc_002.cn: 哈特曼不慎将合同落在了车上。前往枢纽区基地，与哈特曼会合。
sm1l1m4_desc_002.en: Hartmann accidentally left the contract in his car. Head to the Hub Base to meet up with him.

sm1l1m4_desc_003.cn: 哈特曼的认证密钥被可疑的“裂地者”夺去。为哈特曼建立档案，等待他重新准备交易。
sm1l1m4_desc_003.en: Hartmann's verification key was stolen by suspicious "Landbreakers". Create a file on Agent Hartmann and wait for his company to resume negotiations.

sm1l1m5_desc_001.cn: 埃里克松商贸再次发来消息。查看消息，了解具体情况。
sm1l1m5_desc_001.en: Erikssohn Trading House has news again. Read their message for more information.

sm1l1m5_desc_002.cn: 新业务员亚历山大称哈特曼是“诈骗犯”。为了防止不法之徒影响业务，必须厘清个中真相。
sm1l1m5_desc_002.en: The new agent Aleksandr called Hartmann a fraud. You must find out the truth behind this incident to prevent frauds from getting into this deal.

sm1l1m5_desc_003.cn: 小小一桩业务竟有多方插手，眼下掌握的情报还不足以支持判断。更新业务员们的档案，等待事态继续发展。
sm1l1m5_desc_003.en: Multiple companies are competing for a small Endfield contract. You lack the intel to make up your mind. Update the agents' files and see how the negotiations unfold.

sm1l1m6_desc_001.cn: 真假业务员的问题仍然阻碍着交易的顺利进行。为了避免被骗，仍需展开进一步的调查。
sm1l1m6_desc_001.en: Negotiations have stalled as you now have to deal with agent identity theft. You decide to further your investigations to reveal the truth behind the fraud.

sm1l1m6_desc_002.cn: 管理员通过调查厘清了事件经过。接下来，该和两位真正的业务员合影，并更新档案信息了。
sm1l1m6_desc_002.en: You have investigated the entire incident. Take a group photograph of the 2 dedicated agents and update their files.

sm1l1m6_desc_003.cn: 真相终于水落石出。现在，是时候决定业务的合作对象了。
sm1l1m6_desc_003.en: The truth has been revealed. You must now decide who to sign the contract with.

sm1l1m7_desc_001.cn: 四号谷地的重建工程已经启动。秦茳尺希望向管理员介绍相关工作的进展。
sm1l1m7_desc_001.en: The Valley IV Rebuilding Project has begun. Director Qin hopes to give you an update of her work.

sm1l1m8_desc_004.cn: 管理员协助莱雅与莱科关闭了旧工厂区的精炼炉。化险为夷之后，该与坚持完成了使命的两人聊一聊了。
sm1l1m8_desc_004.en: You help Laeya and Lykor shut down the Old Factory Refining Unit and successfully avert a potential disaster. The team has accomplished their mission. Talk to Laeya and Lykor again.

sm1l1m8_desc_005.cn: 秦茳尺有许多来不及处理的工作需要分担。前往旧工厂区，协助处理灾害导致的问题。
sm1l1m8_desc_005.en: Qin Jiangchi is overwhelmed with pending operations. Go to the Old Factory and assist with post-disaster relief.

sm1l1m8_desc_006.cn: 为了清除旧工厂区的安全隐患，管理员需要帮助莱雅与莱科关闭不稳定的源石精炼炉。
sm1l1m8_desc_006.en: You need to help Laeya and Lykor shut down an unstable Refining Unit in the Old Factory to prevent a potential disaster.

sm1l1m9_desc_001.cn: 工人之家有人需要帮助，管理员决定前去查看情况。
sm1l1m9_desc_001.en: Someone needs help at the Worker Dorms. You decide to investigate.

sm1l1m9_desc_002.cn: 工人们不仅缺少物资，士气也很低落，埃里克希望管理员帮助改善这一局面。
sm1l1m9_desc_002.en: The workers are low on supplies and morale. Eric hopes that you can help improve the situation.

sm1l1m9_desc_007.cn: 与管理员一起为工人们送完物资之后，埃里克似乎有话要说。
sm1l1m9_desc_007.en: Having delivered supplies to the crew mates with you, Eric seems to have something to say.

sm1l2m1_desc_001.cn: 众生长地的弧光正在请求终末地的帮助。管理员决定前往谷地通道，与佩丽卡等人会合。
sm1l2m1_desc_001.en: Arclight of the Hannabit Circuit is requesting help from Endfield. You decide to head to the entrance of the Valley Pass and meet up with Perlica.

sm1l2m1_desc_002.cn: 弧光已经动身前去寻找米娅。根据卡贾的说法，米娅涂改过的裂地者涂鸦或许能成为一种线索。
sm1l2m1_desc_002.en: Arclight has gone ahead to look for Mia. According to what Karja said, the LB graffiti modified by Mia can be used to track them down.

sm1l2m1_desc_003.cn: 山洞里有一道暗门。管理员一行需要找到开启暗门的方法，前往被它封锁的区域。
sm1l2m1_desc_003.en: The Landbreaker "lab" has a secret door. You must open it and explore the hidden area.

sm1l2m2_desc_001.cn: 洞窟的铁牢中有数位受困者，必须尽快将他们解救出来。
sm1l2m2_desc_001.en: You enter the cave and see several people locked up in metal cages. You must rescue them immediately.

sm1l2m2_desc_003.cn: 管理员一行成功开启了山洞里的暗门。前方也许能找到有关米娅去向的线索。
sm1l2m2_desc_003.en: You successfully open the secret door of the Landbreaker "lab". You hope you can find clues of Mia's whereabouts.

sm1l2m3_desc_001.cn: 管理员在裂地者的囚笼中发现了一名伤痕累累的神秘人物。将他解救出来，了解在他身上发生的事。
sm1l2m3_desc_001.en: You find a heavily wounded warrior in a Landbreaker cage. He seems to be in need of help.

sm1l2m3_desc_002.cn: 瓦茨打算自行寻找丢失的剩余货物。跟上瓦茨，为他提供帮助。
sm1l2m3_desc_002.en: Waitz is determined to track down the missing cargo alone. Follow and provide backup.

sm1l2m3_desc_003.cn: 谷地要塞似乎还有需要帮助的人，也许可以前去确认实际情况。
sm1l2m3_desc_003.en: Someone at Valley Fort seems to be in need of help. Go there and investigate.

sm1l2m3_desc_004.cn: 瓦茨的行李被裂地者夺走了。调查周围地点，寻找瓦茨丢失的行李。
sm1l2m3_desc_004.en: Waitz's belongings were seized by the Landbreakers. Scout the perimeter and recover the missing supplies.

sm1l2m3_name.en: In for a Penny, In for a Pound

sm1l2m4_desc_001.cn: 管理员在谷地通道发现了碾骨氏族的“藏宝地”。探索四周，寻找进入山洞的方法。
sm1l2m4_desc_001.en: You find a Bonekrusher loot cave at the Valley Pass. Look around and find a way to get inside.

sm1l3m1_desc_001.cn: 菲奥娜收到了来自阿伯莉采石场的一条求援讯号。前往阿伯莉采石场，了解现场状况。
sm1l3m1_desc_001.en: Fiona has received a distress call from the Aburrey Quarry. Go to the Quarry and assess the situation.

sm1l3m2_desc_001.cn: 为了前往阿伯莉采石场的其他区域，管理员一行人需要寻找修复大型起重机的方法。
sm1l3m2_desc_001.en: To reach other areas of the Aburrey Quarry, you must find a way to repair the super crane.

sm1l3m2_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行人顺利修复了大型起重机，继续向阿伯莉采石场的其他区域前进。
sm1l3m2_desc_002.en: You successfully repair the super crane and continue your way to other areas of the Aburrey Quarry.

sm1l3m2_desc_003.cn: 管理员一行人经过老工人佩妮的指点，顺利通过采石作业区，准备前往深层管理区开展救援工作。
sm1l3m2_desc_003.en: You follow veteran Penny's advice and successfully make your way through the Quarry Site. You are now ready to continue your search and rescue work at the Deep Management Post.

sm1l3m3_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行人顺利到达了深层管理区。继续深入，寻找失联的工团成员。
sm1l3m3_desc_001.en: You successfully reach the Deep Management Post. Head in and try to find the missing UWST crew mates.

sm1l3m3_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行人设法修复了电梯，成功救出了被困在深层管理区的工人们。是时候返回吊运中枢，向各位报告好消息了。
sm1l3m3_desc_002.en: You repair the elevator and successfully rescue the UWST crew mates trapped at the Deep Management Post. Time to return to Lifter Central and share the good news.

sm1l5m1_desc_001.cn: 在收到法比安·柯林斯发来的信息后，管理员为了进一步了解他所说的意外状况，决定前去与他会合。
sm1l5m1_desc_001.en: You have received messages from Fabian Collins. To learn more about the "unexpected sitch" he mentioned, you decide to meet up with him.

sm1l5m2_desc_001.cn: 得知拉奎尔逃走的消息，管理员决定先与艾维文娜会合。
sm1l5m2_desc_001.en: Raquel has escaped. You decide to meet Avywenna first.

sm1l6m1_desc_001.cn: 得知了终末地发往矿区营地的药物丢失的消息，管理员决定前往矿区营地了解情况。
sm1l6m1_desc_001.en: You learn about a missing batch of Endfield medical supplies en route to the Mining Camp. You decide to go to the Mining Camp to investigate.

sm1l6m2_desc_001.cn: 为了解救莫莉，管理员一行决定深入探索气候监测站。
sm1l6m2_desc_001.en: To rescue Molly, you decide to infiltrate and search the meteorological station.

sm1l6m3_desc_001.cn: 管理员从阿丽娅处得知詹娜的病况，决定前往矿区医疗站探望她。
sm1l6m3_desc_001.en: Endmin learns about Jenner's situation from Alia, and decides to visit her at the Mining Area Clinic.

sm1l6m4_desc_001.cn: 管理员收到阿丽娅的信息，得知詹娜再次失踪，决定前往矿区营地了解详情。
sm1l6m4_desc_001.en: Endmin receives a message from Alia saying Jenner has once again gone missing, and decides to go to the Mining Camp.

sm1l7m1_desc_001.cn: 克劳的学徒安格鲁发来消息，似乎是需要管理员一行帮什么忙。
sm1l7m1_desc_001.en: Crowe's apprentice, Angro sends you a message. It seems they need your assistance.

sm1l7m1_desc_002.cn: 目前的线索暂不能断定尤莉娅有泄密行为，管理员一行决定从她的上司季米特里查起。
sm1l7m1_desc_002.en: Current evidence remains inconclusive regarding Yulia's involvement in any data breach. The Endmin's team shift focus to her immediate superior, Dmitry, for the next phase of the investigation.

sm1l7m1_desc_003.cn: 无论格奥尔基是否叛变，储藏点的异常损耗都是实证，管理员一行决定和他当面对质。
sm1l7m1_desc_003.en: Regardless of Georgi's allegiance, the storage depot discrepancies remain indisputable, prompting the Enministrator's team to confront him directly.

sm1l7m1_desc_004.cn: 虽然不是安格鲁指定的嫌疑人，但阿尔乔姆的异常行迹十分可疑。管理员一行决定顺藤摸瓜，继续查下去。
sm1l7m1_desc_004.en: Though not originally flagged by Angro, Artyom's aberrant movements now burn red across the investigation board. The Endministrator's team follows this fresh trail, wherever its coils may lead.

sm1l7m1_desc_005.cn: 调查有了一定进展，是时候找安格鲁和肖娜聊聊目前的进度了。
sm1l7m1_desc_005.en: The investigation has made some progress, and it's time to talk to Angro and Shawna about the current progress.

sm1l7m1_desc_006.cn: 收到安格鲁发来的消息，似乎是工人们得知了目前调查的内容，得加快调查进程以稳定局势。
sm1l7m1_desc_006.en: You receive a message from Angro. It seems the workers have found out about the current investigation. Speed up the investigation process to stabilize the situation.

sm1l7m1_desc_007.cn: 肖娜发来了消息，她似乎想和管理员当面聊聊。
sm1l7m1_desc_007.en: Shawna seems to want to chat with the Endmin face-to-face.

sm1l7m2_desc_001.cn: 管理员接到菲奥娜的消息，得知工团投放在供能高地的运输机器人出现了神秘的大范围故障。为了调查问题根源，管理员决定前往源石发电站获取更多情报。
sm1l7m2_desc_001.en: You receive a message from Fiona and learn that the fleet of logistics robots deployed by the UWST at the Power Plateau has suffered a large-scale breakdown. The causes are still unknown. To get to the bottom of this issue, you decide to go to the Originium Power Plant to gather more intel.

sm2l1m1_desc_001.cn: 受弭弗所托，管理员一行人前往清波寨外寨北面，查看巡卫的情况。
sm2l1m1_desc_001.en: Following Mi Fu's request, you head to the north of Qingbo Bailey to check on the watchguard.

sm2l1m1_desc_002.cn: 迷踪林似乎真的出现了异常，管理员一行人打算深入竹林，继续调查。
sm2l1m1_desc_002.en: Something really does seem off in the Stragglers Grove. You decide to venture deeper into the bamboo grove to investigate.

sm2l1m2_desc_001.cn: 管理员一行人决定跟随脚印，往西边前进，继续搜寻失踪人员。
sm2l1m2_desc_001.en: You decide to follow the footprints westward, continuing the search for the missing people.

sm2l1m2_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行人前往修复西壹号核心。
sm2l1m2_desc_002.en: You proceed to fix Core W1.

sm2l1m3_desc_001.cn: 为了寻找失踪的天师，管理员一行人决定乘竹筏前往南山。
sm2l1m3_desc_001.en: To find the missing Tianshi, you decide to take a bamboo raft to South Hill.

sm2l1m3_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行人前往修复南叁号核心。
sm2l1m3_desc_002.en: You proceed to fix Core S3.

sm2l1m4_desc_001.cn: 三个核心都修复完成后，迷踪林中似乎产生了一些变化。
sm2l1m4_desc_001.en: All three cores have been fixed. It seems that some changes have occurred in the Stragglers Grove.

sm2l1m5_desc_001.cn: 踩道南边有动静，也许是有人需要帮助。
sm2l1m5_desc_001.en: Sounds of activity come from the south side of the Treadway, perhaps someone needs your help.

sm2l1m5_desc_002.cn: 管理员一行人找到了逃跑的长耳兽，它被大桨关了起来。
sm2l1m5_desc_002.en: You find Woolsey, she's been locked up by Da Jiang.

sm2l1m5_desc_003.cn: 长耳兽再次逃离，管理员一行人不得不再次踏上寻兽之路。
sm2l1m5_desc_003.en: Woolsey runs off again. You have no choice but to set out once more on the hunting journey.

sm2l1m5_desc_004.cn: 在管理员一行人的鼓励下，阿土决定继续寻找长耳兽。
sm2l1m5_desc_004.en: With your encouragement, Ah Tu resolves to keep looking for Woolsey.

sm2l2m1_desc_001.cn: 应黎风的请求，管理员前往工农生产单位，参加驮兽科学饲养交流会。
sm2l2m1_desc_001.en: At Lifeng's request, you head to the industrial and agricultural production unit to join the Burdenbeast Care Workshop.

sm2l2m1_desc_002.cn: 工农生产单位的职农们都是饲养驮兽的高手，听听他们对此的独到见解。
sm2l2m1_desc_002.en: The farmers at the industrial and agricultural production unit are all experts at raising burdenbeasts. Listen to their unique insights.

sm2l2m1_desc_003.cn: 名叫小武的牧童前来求助，希望管理员能帮忙寻找丢失的老驮兽。
sm2l2m1_desc_003.en: Little Wu, a herdsboy, comes seeking your help, hoping you can find his Old Burdenbeast.

sm2l2m1_desc_004.cn: 找到老驮兽后，它请求管理员帮自己寻找年轻时耕作的田地。
sm2l2m1_desc_004.en: After finding the Old Burdenbeast, he asks you to help him find the farm he used to work in when he was young.

sm2l2m1_desc_005.cn: 老驮兽愤怒离去，管理员和小武需要赶紧追上它。
sm2l2m1_desc_005.en: The Old Burdenbeast leaves angrily. You and Little Wu must quickly follow him.

sm2l2m1_desc_006.cn: 应老驮兽要求，管理员为市民广场上的众人拍一张合照。
sm2l2m1_desc_006.en: At the Old Burdenbeast's request, you take a photo of the entire crowd in the Citizen Square.

sm2l2m1_desc_007.cn: 老驮兽从市民广场消失后，管理员和小武跟着照片中的脚印前往城郊寻找。
sm2l2m1_desc_007.en: After the Old Burdenbeast disappears from the Citizen Square, you and Little Wu follow the footprints in the photo to the outskirts of the city.

sm2l2m1_desc_008.cn: 老驮兽混在了驮兽群当中，想办法找出它。
sm2l2m1_desc_008.en: The Old Burdenbeast has blended in with the herd. Figure out a way to identify him.

sm2l2m1_desc_009.cn: 受到老驮兽的“胁迫”，管理员不得不前往息流总闸为它打一壶清水。
sm2l2m1_desc_009.en: Under the Old Burdenbeast's "pressure," you have no choice but to go to the main Xiranflow sluice to draw a pot of fresh water for him.

sm2l2m1_desc_010.cn: 与神秘地出现在息流总闸的老驮兽对话。
sm2l2m1_desc_010.en: Talk to the Old Burdenbeast that mysteriously appeared at the main Xiranflow sluice.

sm2l2m1_desc_011.cn: 管理员和小武闻到一股奇怪的味道，这是老驮兽留下的线索。
sm2l2m1_desc_011.en: You and Little Wu smell a strange scent left behind by the Old Burdenbeast. This might be a clue.

sm2l2m1_desc_012.cn: 清除出现在城郊的水灯虫。

sm2l2m1_desc_013.cn: 前往老驮兽真正耕作过的田地。
sm2l2m1_desc_013.en: Go to the farm where the Old Burdenbeast actually worked at.

sm2l2m1_desc_014.cn: 管理员收到了黎风发来的消息，看看他想说什么。
sm2l2m1_desc_014.en: You've received a message from Lifeng. Read what he says.

sm2l2m1_desc_016.cn: 前往市民广场寻找老驮兽。
sm2l2m1_desc_016.en: Go to the Citizen Square to find the Old Burdenbeast

sm2l2m1_desc_017.cn: 老驮兽突然消失，也许能从照片中找到一些线索。
sm2l2m1_desc_017.en: The Old Burdenbeast suddenly disappears. Perhaps the photo you took can offer some clues.

sm2l2m1_desc_018.cn: 从梦中苏醒，管理员眼前只剩下黎风。
sm2l2m1_desc_018.en: Awakening from a dream, you find only Lifeng before you.

target_blackbox_assebling_1_extra_1.cn: 让<@gd.key>2台封装机</>同时生产低容谷地电池
target_blackbox_assebling_1_extra_1.en: Produce LC Valley Batteries with <@gd.key>2 Packaging Units</> at the same time

target_blackbox_assebling_1_main_1.cn: 使用<@gd.key>封装机</>生产低容谷地电池
target_blackbox_assebling_1_main_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> to produce LC Valley Batteries

target_blackbox_assebling_1_main_2.cn: 使用电池为<@gd.key>榴弹塔</>充能
target_blackbox_assebling_1_main_2.en: Use the batteries to charge the <@gd.key>Grenade Tower</>

target_blackbox_assebling_2_extra_1.cn: 产线所有必要设备正常运转
target_blackbox_assebling_2_extra_1.en: Keep all essential facilities of the production line operational

target_blackbox_assebling_2_extra_2.cn: 野外和集成核心区所有<@gd.key>供电桩不超过2台</>
target_blackbox_assebling_2_extra_2.en: Place <@gd.key>no more than 2 Electric Pylons</> in the wilderness and the Core AIC Area

target_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_main_2.cn: 使用<@gd.key>封装机</>生产工业爆炸物
target_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_main_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> to produce Industrial Explosives.

target_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_main_3.cn: 使用<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>炸毁落石，救出受困人员
target_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_main_3.en: Use the <@gd.key>Industrial Explosives</> to blast apart the rocks and rescue the trapped victims

target_blackbox_basic_1_main_1.cn: 使用<@gd.key>精炼炉</>生产3份晶体外壳
target_blackbox_basic_1_main_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to produce Origocrust×3

target_blackbox_basic_1_main_2.cn: 使用<@gd.key>粉碎机</>生产3份源石粉末
target_blackbox_basic_1_main_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> to produce Originium Powder×3

target_blackbox_belt_1_main_1.cn: 使用<@gd.key>精炼炉</>生产5份晶体外壳并存入仓库
target_blackbox_belt_1_main_1.en: Use the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</> to produce Origocrust×5 and store them in the Depot

target_blackbox_belt_1_main_2.cn: 使用<@gd.key>粉碎机</>生产5份荞花粉末并存入仓库
target_blackbox_belt_1_main_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</> to produce Buckflower Powder×5 and store them in the Depot

target_blackbox_belt_2_extra_1.cn: <@gd.key>致密蓝铁粉末</>产率稳定在：30/分钟
target_blackbox_belt_2_extra_1.en: Reach a stable <@gd.key>Dense Ferrium Powder</> yield of: 30/min

target_blackbox_belt_2_extra_2.cn: <@gd.key>致密源石粉末</>产率稳定在：60/分钟
target_blackbox_belt_2_extra_2.en: Reach a stable <@gd.key>Dense Originium Powder</> yield of: 60/min

target_blackbox_belt_2_extra_3.cn: <@gd.key>高容谷地电池</>产率稳定在：3/分钟
target_blackbox_belt_2_extra_3.en: Reach a stable <@gd.key>HC Valley Battery</> yield of: 3/min

target_blackbox_belt_2_main_1.cn: 将砂叶放入<@gd.key>采种机</>，并使所有<@gd.key>种植机</>稳定生产砂叶
target_blackbox_belt_2_main_1.en: Place Sandleaves into the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> so that all <@gd.key>Planting Units</> can keep producing more Sandleaves

target_blackbox_belt_2_main_2.cn: 使用<@gd.key>传送带</>补齐产线，生产1块<@gd.key>高容谷地电池</>并存入仓库
target_blackbox_belt_2_main_2.en: Use the <@gd.key>transport belt</> to complete the production line, produce <@gd.key>HC Valley Battery</>×1, and store it in the Depot

target_blackbox_bus_1_extra_1.cn: 使用仓库存取线与<@gd.key>灌装机</>，生产1份荞愈胶囊并存入仓库
target_blackbox_bus_1_extra_1.en: Use the Depot Bus and <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> to produce Buck Capsules [C]×1 and store them in the Depot

target_blackbox_bus_1_main_1.cn: 使用<@gd.key>仓库取货口和存货口</>，生产5个紫晶质瓶并存入仓库

timeline_blackbox_ mix_2_01.en: <size=200%>Expand the cache of the Reactor Crucible to produce multiple formulas simultaneously.</size>

timeline_blackbox_ mix_2_02.cn: <size=200%>请帮助集成工业系统补齐产线，用一个反应池同时生产锦草溶液和芽针溶液 。</size>
timeline_blackbox_ mix_2_02.en: <size=200%>Complete the AIC Factory production line. Use 1 Reactor Crucible to produce Jincao Solution and Yazhen Solution simultaneously.</size>

timeline_blackbox_assebling_1_01.cn: <size=200%>为了增强防护，工厂区在外围增设了一批防御炮塔。</size>
timeline_blackbox_assebling_1_01.en: <size=200%>Defensive turrets have been placed outside the AIC area for protection.</size>

timeline_blackbox_assebling_1_02.cn: <size=200%>野外无电网地区的炮塔需要使用低容谷地电池进行充能后方可进行自动防御·。</size>
timeline_blackbox_assebling_1_02.en: <size=200%>Turrets placed in the wilderness and outside the power grid must be charged with LC Valley Batteries to provide automated defenses.</size>

timeline_blackbox_assebling_1_03.cn: <size=200%>请帮助工厂建立低容谷地电池的产线，并对各炮塔进行充能。</size>
timeline_blackbox_assebling_1_03.en: <size=200%>Set up an LC Valley Battery production line to charge various turrets.</size>

timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_01.cn: <size=200%>矿场附近的山体出现坍塌，有工人被困在了里面。</size>
timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_01.en: <size=200%>A landslide took place near the mining area. Several workers are trapped inside.</size>

timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_02.cn: <size=200%>需要使用工业爆炸物炸开落石，救出受困人员。</size>
timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_02.en: <size=200%>Use Industrial Explosives to blast apart the rubble and rescue the trapped victims.</size>

timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_03.cn: <size=200%>请先采集酮化灌木作为原料，前往工厂中制造工业爆炸物，再返回矿场进行救援。</size>
timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_1_03.en: <size=200%>Gather some Aketine and use it to produce Industrial Explosives at the AIC, then return to the mining area to rescue the victims.</size>

timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_2_01.cn: <size=200%>落石被清除，受困人员已获救。</size>
timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_2_01.en: <size=200%>Rubble cleared. The workers have been rescued.</size>

timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_3_01.cn: <size=200%>被困在落石缝隙中的动物也已成功逃出。</size>
timeline_blackbox_asseblingbomb_3_01.en: <size=200%>Little critters trapped in the rubble have successfully escaped as well.</size>

timeline_blackbox_basic_1_01.cn: <size=200%>矿场突然出现大面积断电，需要进行紧急抢修。</size>
timeline_blackbox_basic_1_01.en: <size=200%>Massive power outage has occurred at the mining area. Emergency repairs must be carried out.</size>

timeline_blackbox_basic_1_02.cn: <size=200%>已定位到故障原因——中继器损坏。修复此设备即可恢复供电。</size>
timeline_blackbox_basic_1_02.en: <size=200%>We found the cause of the power outage — the Relay Tower is down. Repair this facility to restore power.</size>

timeline_blackbox_basic_1_03.cn: <size=200%>请使用精炼炉和粉碎机这两种工厂设备，生产所需的材料并修复中继器。</size>
timeline_blackbox_basic_1_03.en: <size=200%>Use the Refining Unit and Shredding Unit to produce the materials needed to repair the Relay Tower.</size>

timeline_blackbox_basic_2_01.cn: <size=200%>中继器修复完成，本次模拟目标已达成。</size>

timeline_blackbox_basic_2_02.cn: <size=200%>矿场供电已恢复，所有机器运转正常。</size>
timeline_blackbox_basic_2_02.en: <size=200%>Power restored to the mining area. All machines are working again.</size>

timeline_blackbox_belt_1_01.cn: <size=200%>工厂准备对一批原料进行加工，需要在现有布局上搭建物流线连通各设备。</size>
timeline_blackbox_belt_1_01.en: <size=200%>The AIC must process some raw materials. Set up a logistics line with the existing facilities.</size>

timeline_blackbox_belt_1_02.cn: <size=200%>新原料已分别放入2个协议储物箱中。请使用传送带建立物流线，将其输送至对应设备中进行加工。</size>
timeline_blackbox_belt_1_02.en: <size=200%>Raw materials have been placed in the 2 Protocol Stashes. Use transport belts to move them to the right facilities for processing.</size>

timeline_blackbox_belt_1_03.cn: <size=200%>再使用传送带连通设备到协议中心，将加工产物从设备输送回仓库。</size>
timeline_blackbox_belt_1_03.en: <size=200%>Use transport belts again to connect the facilities to the PAC so that processed goods from the facilities are moved to the Depot.</size>

timeline_blackbox_cmpt_1_01.cn: <size=200%>由工厂到矿区的滑索出现了故障，需要维修此滑索架方可恢复。</size>
timeline_blackbox_cmpt_1_01.en: <size=200%>The zipline route from the AIC to the mining area is down. This Zipline Pylon must be repaired.</size>

timeline_blackbox_cmpt_1_02.cn: <size=200%>检查发现修复此滑索架需要使用低容谷地电池。此材料可通过封装机进行制造。</size>
timeline_blackbox_cmpt_1_02.en: <size=200%>After inspection, this Zipline Pylon can only be repaired with LC Valley Batteries. This can be produced with the Packaging Unit.</size>

timeline_blackbox_cmpt_1_03.cn: <size=200%>请先使用精炼炉和配件机，将紫晶石加工成紫晶零件。</size>
timeline_blackbox_cmpt_1_03.en: <size=200%>First, use the Refining Unit and Fitting Unit to process Amethyst Crystal into Amethyst Parts.</size>

timeline_blackbox_cmpt_1_04.cn: <size=200%>再将紫晶零件输入封装机以生产低容谷地电池，并修复滑索架。</size>
timeline_blackbox_cmpt_1_04.en: <size=200%>Move the Amethyst Parts to the Packaging Unit to produce LC Valley Batteries, then use the batteries to repair the Zipline Pylon.</size>

timeline_blackbox_filling_1_01.cn: <size=200%>为了供给救援物资，工厂准备搭建自动化的药品和食品产线。</size>
timeline_blackbox_filling_1_01.en: <size=200%>The AIC is setting up automated food and meds production lines to provide relief supplies.</size>

timeline_blackbox_filling_1_02.cn: <size=200%>场地内已经放置了制备荞愈胶囊所需的设备，使用传送带完成物流连接即可运转。</size>
timeline_blackbox_filling_1_02.en: <size=200%>This place already has facilities for a Buck Capsule [C] production line. Use transport belts to set up a working production line.</size>

timeline_blackbox_filling_1_03.cn: <size=200%>之后请再参照此方式，利用灌装机建立一条柑实罐头产线。</size>
timeline_blackbox_filling_1_03.en: <size=200%>Reference this and use the Filling Unit to set up a Canned Citrome [C] production line.</size>

timeline_blackbox_filling_4_01.cn: <size=200%>武陵地区的集成工业系统中可以使用设备的液体模式，将液体原料也输入到设备中一起进行生产。</size>
timeline_blackbox_filling_4_01.en: <size=200%>AIC facilities in Wuling can be switched to Fluid Mode (FM) that lets them process fluid raw materials for production.</size>

timeline_blackbox_filling_4_02.cn: <size=200%>场地中已经预设了所需的设备，请补齐产线利用反应池和灌装机生产锦草软饮。</size>
timeline_blackbox_filling_4_02.en: <size=200%>This area has all the facilities needed for your goal. Complete the Jincao Drink production line by using the Reactor Crucible and Filling Unit.</size>

timeline_blackbox_grinder_1_01.cn: <size=200%>工厂车间的运输中断了，请重建产线，恢复粉碎机的生产。</size>
timeline_blackbox_grinder_1_01.en: <size=200%>AIC logistics have been disrupted. Complete the production line and get the Shredding Unit producing again.</size>

timeline_blackbox_grinder_1_02.cn: <size=200%>在粉碎机车间1中，源石粉末的产线仍能正常运转。</size>
timeline_blackbox_grinder_1_02.en: <size=200%>The Originium Powder production line of Shredding Unit Area 1 is still working properly.</size>

timeline_blackbox_grinder_1_03.cn: <size=200%>请参考该产线，使用传送带搭建荞花粉末的产线，并将产物运输至指定储物箱。</size>
timeline_blackbox_grinder_1_03.en: <size=200%>Reference this production line and use transport belts to set up a Buckflower Powder production line, then move the products to the target Protocol Stash.</size>

timeline_blackbox_grinder_1_04.cn: <size=200%>该通电的储物箱会将其中存放的产物无线传输至仓库。</size>
timeline_blackbox_grinder_1_04.en: <size=200%>Protocol Stash connected to the power grid can move its contents to the Depot via belt-free transfer.</size>

timeline_blackbox_grinder_2_01.cn: <size=200%>车间1的目标已经完成，请前往车间2继续重建。</size>
timeline_blackbox_grinder_2_01.en: <size=200%>Area 1 goals completed. Go to Area 2 to set up the production line.</size>

timeline_blackbox_grinder_2_02.cn: <size=200%>在车间2中，源石已存入该储物箱中。</size>
timeline_blackbox_grinder_2_02.en: <size=200%>Originium has been stored in the Stash of Area 2.</size>

timeline_blackbox_grinder_2_03.cn: <size=200%>车间2的各设备均已断电，请使用供电桩给精炼炉、粉碎机、指定高光储物箱通电。</size>
timeline_blackbox_grinder_2_03.en: <size=200%>Area 2 facilities are disconnected from the power grid. Use Electric Pylons to power the Refining Unit, Shredding Unit, and the highlighted Protocol Stash.</size>

timeline_blackbox_grinder_2_04.cn: <size=200%>请合理规划线路，搭建晶体外壳粉末的产线，并存入指定的储物箱。</size>
timeline_blackbox_grinder_2_04.en: <size=200%>Deploy a proper logistics route to set up the Origocrust Powder production line that moves products to the target Protocol Stash.</size>

timeline_blackbox_hub_1_01.cn: <size=200%>为了供给前线救援，工厂增设了一批粉碎机以生产基础药品。</size>
timeline_blackbox_hub_1_01.en: <size=200%>The AIC has introduced the Shredding Unit to produce basic medication for supporting the frontlines.</size>

timeline_blackbox_hub_1_02.cn: <size=200%>请参考现有的晶体外壳产线，使用传送带完成粉碎机的物流搭建。</size>
timeline_blackbox_hub_1_02.en: <size=200%>Reference the existing Origocrust production line and use transport belts to set up proper logistics for the Shredding Unit.</size>

timeline_blackbox_hub_1_03.cn: <size=200%>帮助工厂建立自动化的荞花粉末产线。</size>
timeline_blackbox_hub_1_03.en: <size=200%>Set up an automated Buckflower Powder production line in the AIC.</size>

timeline_blackbox_miner_1_01.cn: <size=200%>矿场引进了一批电驱矿机，希望对新发掘的紫晶矿进行开采。</size>
timeline_blackbox_miner_1_01.en: <size=200%>Electric Mining Rigs have been delivered to the mining area to mine Amethyst Ore.</size>

timeline_blackbox_miner_1_02.cn: <size=200%>电驱矿机在通电后可自动开采矿石并将其运回仓库。在其附近放置供电桩，并从中继器连线可为其提供电力。</size>
timeline_blackbox_miner_1_02.en: <size=200%>When connected to the power grid, the Electric Mining Rig can automatically start mining and deliver minerals to the Depot. Connect the rigs to the grid by placing an Electric Pylon nearby and connect it to the Relay Tower.</size>

timeline_blackbox_miner_1_03.cn: <size=200%>将原本的源石矿机也更换为电驱矿机，还可以实现源矿的自动开采和运输。</size>
timeline_blackbox_miner_1_03.en: <size=200%>Replacing all Originium Rigs with Electric Mining Rigs also lets you automatically mine and transport Originium Ore.</size>

timeline_blackbox_mix_1_01.cn: <size=200%>武陵地区的集成工业系统中了增设了反应池来进行液体的混合生产。</size>
timeline_blackbox_mix_1_01.en: <size=200%>Reactor Crucibles have been added to Wuling AIC Factory to mix and produce various fluids.</size>

timeline_blackbox_mix_1_02.cn: <size=200%>请使用水泵和管道将清水引入到反应池中与锦草粉末进行混合。</size>
timeline_blackbox_mix_1_02.en: <size=200%>Use Fluid Pumps and pipelines to bring Clean Water to the Reactor Crucible and mix it with Jincao Powder.</size>

timeline_blackbox_mix_1_03.cn: <size=200%>再使用管道将锦草溶液输送到储液罐中进行存储。</size>
timeline_blackbox_mix_1_03.en: <size=200%>Then use pipelines to bring Jincao Solution to the Fluid Tank for storage.</size>

timeline_blackbox_planter_1_01.cn: <size=200%>工厂的荞花库存已快耗尽，不足以完成下一批荞愈胶囊订单的生产。产线已被迫暂停。</size>
timeline_blackbox_planter_1_01.en: <size=200%>The AIC is almost out of Buckflower. Production is forced to stop. The next Buck Capsule [C] production order cannot be completed.</size>

timeline_blackbox_planter_1_02.cn: <size=200%>为了解决这一问题，工厂引进了两种新的设备来循环生产更多荞花。</size>
timeline_blackbox_planter_1_02.en: <size=200%>To solve this problem, the AIC has introduced 2 new types of facilities to produce more Buckflowers.</size>

timeline_blackbox_planter_1_03.cn: <size=200%>采种机可以从植物中提取种子，种植机则可以将种子培育为植物。</size>
timeline_blackbox_planter_1_03.en: <size=200%>Seed-Picking Units can extract seeds from plants. Planting Units can grow them into mature plants.</size>

timeline_blackbox_planter_1_04.cn: <size=200%>请使用这两种设备改进产线，帮助工厂完成荞愈胶囊的生产。</size>
timeline_blackbox_planter_1_04.en: <size=200%>Use these 2 facilities to improve the production line and achieve Buck Capsule [C] production in the AIC.</size>

timeline_blackbox_planter_2_01.cn: <size=200%>武陵地区的种植机新增了液体模式，可通过管道输入清水来种植当地植物。</size>
timeline_blackbox_planter_2_01.en: <size=200%>Planting Units in Wuling can be switched to Fluid Mode (FM) and grow local plants with Clean Water.</size>

timeline_blackbox_planter_2_02.cn: <size=200%>工厂已经预设了生产锦草软饮所需的设备，请使用管道完成物流建设，将种植机接入到整条产线中。</size>
timeline_blackbox_planter_2_02.en: <size=200%>The AIC has all the facilities for making Jincao Drink. Use pipelines to provide logistics and connect the Planting Unit into the production line.</size>

timeline_blackbox_planter_2_03.cn: <size=200%>注意本次模拟中只有一个水泵，可使用管道分流器来进行管道连接，同时为多个设备供水。</size>
timeline_blackbox_planter_2_03.en: <size=200%>Reminder! There is only 1 Fluid Pump in this simulation. Connect the Pipe Splitter to the pipeline so you can supply fluids to multiple facilities at once.</size>

timeline_blackbox_powerstation_1_01.cn: <size=200%>工厂扩建了低容谷地电池产线后，设备的总耗电功率已超过了电网的发电功率。</size>
timeline_blackbox_powerstation_1_01.en: <size=200%>The AIC has expanded its LC Valley Battery production line but power consumption now exceeds power grid power output.</size>

timeline_blackbox_powerstation_1_02.cn: <size=200%>此时在存储电能耗尽后，工厂设备会由于电力不足而自动停止工作。</size>
timeline_blackbox_powerstation_1_02.en: <size=200%>Once the electrical reserves run out, the facilities will shut down due to insufficient power.</size>

timeline_blackbox_powerstation_1_03.cn: <size=200%>请使用热能池提升工厂的发电功率，让低容谷地电池产线恢复运转。</size>
timeline_blackbox_powerstation_1_03.en: <size=200%>Use Thermal Banks to raise power grid power output and get the LC Valley Battery production line working again.</size>

timeline_blackbox_powerstation_2_01.cn: <size=200%>工厂发电功率已满足需求，产线中各设备已恢复运转。</size>
timeline_blackbox_powerstation_2_01.en: <size=200%>AIC now has enough power output. Every facility is working properly again.</size>

timeline_blackbox_shaper_1_01.cn: <size=200%>工厂搭建了一条荞花粉末产线，用于向工团提供药品补给。</size>
timeline_blackbox_shaper_1_01.en: <size=200%>The AIC has set up a Buckflower Powder production line to make medication for the UWST.</size>

timeline_blackbox_shaper_1_02.cn: <size=200%>请先使用精炼炉和塑形机，将紫晶石加工成紫晶瓶。</size>
timeline_blackbox_shaper_1_02.en: <size=200%>Use the Refining Unit and Moulding Unit to process Amethyst Ore into Amethyst Bottles.</size>

timeline_blackbox_shaper_1_03.cn: <size=200%>再使用物品简制功能，将荞花粉末装入紫晶瓶以制造工团所需的简制荞愈胶囊。</size>
timeline_blackbox_shaper_1_03.en: <size=200%>Use Crafting to fill Amethyst Bottles with Buckflower Powder and make Buck Capsule [C] that the UWST needs.</size>

timeline_blackbox_storage_1_01.cn: <size=200%>矿场新开采了一批源矿并将其存放在了协议储物箱中，现在需要将这批源矿送回协议核心以供应生产。</size>
timeline_blackbox_storage_1_01.en: <size=200%>A new batch of mine Originium Ore has been stored in the Protocol Stash. These must be delivered to the PAC for processing and production.</size>

timeline_blackbox_storage_1_02.cn: <size=200%>协议储物箱在通电后可进行无线传输，将内部存储的物品直接远程发往协议核心仓库。</size>
timeline_blackbox_storage_1_02.en: <size=200%>When connected to the power grid, the Protocol Stash can move its contents directly to the PAC Depot via belt-free transfer.</size>

timeline_blackbox_storage_1_03.cn: <size=200%>请使用供电桩为剩余的协议储物箱供电，将所有源矿无线传输回仓库。</size>
timeline_blackbox_storage_1_03.en: <size=200%>Use Electric Pylon to power the rest of the Protocol Stashes so that the Originium Ore can be moved to the Depot via belt-free transfer.</size>

timeline_blackbox_storage_1_04.cn: <size=200%>注意在非工厂核心区，供电桩不会自动连电，需要从中继器拉线给供电桩以获取电力。</size>
timeline_blackbox_storage_1_04.en: <size=200%>Remember, Electric Pylons outside the AIC Area are not automatically connected to the grid. You must transmit power from a Relay Tower and plug the power cable into the Electric Pylon to achieve grid connection.</size>

timeline_blackbox_storage_2_01.cn: <size=200%>源矿已全部传输至仓库并供应后续生产，主要模拟目标已达成</size>
timeline_blackbox_storage_2_01.en: <size=200%>All Originium Ore moved to the Depot for production. Main simulation goal completed.</size>

timeline_blackbox_winder_1_01.cn: <size=200%>为了给安保队进行装备补给，工厂新引进了一批装备原件机。</size>
timeline_blackbox_winder_1_01.en: <size=200%>The AIC introduced the Gearing Unit to supply security forces with equipment.</size>

timeline_blackbox_winder_1_02.cn: <size=200%>请帮助工厂建立紫晶装备原件产线，以供应装备的生产。</size>
timeline_blackbox_winder_1_02.en: <size=200%>Help the AIC set up an Amethyst Component production line to assemble gear.</size>

timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_2.cn: 主桩的卦象全部亮起了！管理员，快去再次激活主桩，恢复天师桩的净化功能吧。
timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_2.en: All main pillar divinograms have been lit! Endmin, activate the main pillar again and restore the cleansing functions of the Tianshi Pillar.

timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_3_1.cn: 成功了！你们看，侵蚀正在快速消散！
timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_3_1.en: Success! Look, the Blight is dissipating rapidly!

timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_3_2.cn: 这就是武陵城近些年试验的尖端技术吗？
timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_3_2.en: Is this the cutting edge technology that Wuling has been testing all these years?

timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_3_3.cn: 没错，很多成果已经陆陆续续反哺给宏山总部了。
timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_3_3.en: That's right. We've also sent plenty of test results to our Hongshan HQ to support the research projects there.

timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_3_4.cn: 咦？有什么东西聚集起来，组装到一起了！
timeline_map02_lv001_TSZ_05_3_4.en: Wait! Are those things coming together? Are they assembling themselves?

toast_feces_livstock_already_pet.cn: 这只驮兽今天已经被拍过了，让它休息一天吧。
toast_feces_livstock_already_pet.en: Give this burdenbeast a break. It has already been given a pat today.

toast_general_ability_fluid_interact_map.en: Cannot fill fluids of this region

toast_map01_lv005_side_1.cn: 似乎有什么东西卡在门后了
toast_map01_lv005_side_1.en: Looks like there's something behind the door

ui_AdventureDailyPanel_all_des.cn: 当前有多项可以领取奖励的任务
ui_AdventureDailyPanel_all_des.en: Multiple mission rewards can be claimed

ui_AdventureDailyPanel_max_bp_lvlup.cn: 通行证等级提升，可前往查看奖励

ui_fac_sp_hub_self_operating_intro_desc.cn: 管理员不在时，协议核心将进入无人托管状态，自主控制集成工业系统的物流运行。若长时间未检测到管理员活动，为避免安全隐患，协议核心将自动关停物流。当管理员再次上线时将自动接管集成工业系统，此时无人托管运行时长将会重置。
ui_fac_sp_hub_self_operating_intro_desc.en: The Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) will automatically manage AIC Factory operations and logistics during your absence. However, the PAC will shut down the AIC logistics for safety considerations if you are absent for too long. The PAC will resume auto-management and reset the duration of auto-management when you reconnect.

ui_shop_credit_clear_time.cn: 距离清空溢出信用剩余

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsl.cn: 信用有缓存上限，超出缓存上限的信用会在次日清空，请及时使用。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsl.en: The Credits Cache has a storage limit. Credits that exceed this limit will be cleared out on the following day. Try to spend them on time.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn: 拜访好友飞船，对其总控中枢或舱室进行生产助力可获得信用。每次助力可固定获得<color=#fff100>20</color>点信用，每日最多可助力<color=#fff100>5</color>次。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en: Visit your friends' ships and provide production assists to their Control Nexuses or cabins to earn Credits. Each attempt earns you <color=#fff100>20</color> Credits. You can provide up to <color=#fff100>5</color> assists per day.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn: 开启会客室情报区后，可进驻干员收集线索以获取信用。每收集到1张新线索可获得<color=#fff100>20</color>点信用，没有上限。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en: Once the Reception Room Intel Section is available, assign an operator to collect clues and earn <color=#fff100>20</color> credits per clue found. There is no limit for credits earned this way.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn: 在会客室中，集齐所有线索后可开展情报交流并获得信用奖励。邀请好友参与交流还可获得额外信用奖励。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en: Gather all clues to start Clue Exchange at the Reception Room and earn credit rewards. Invite friends to join Clue Exchanges to earn even more credits.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn: 在好友开展情报交流期间，可通过拜访好友飞船，与好友进行情报交流。每参与1次交流可固定获得<color=#fff100>50</color>点信用，每日可最多与不同的好友交流<color=#fff100>5</color>次。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en: When a friend has started Clue Exchange, visit their ship to join it as well. <color=#fff100>50</color> credits can be earned per exchange, and you can join Clue Exchanges of up to <color=#fff100>5</color> different friends per day.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn: 在会客室中，接收好友赠予的线索可获得信用奖励。每日前3次接收线索可分别获得<color=#fff100>25</color>点、<color=#fff100>15</color>点和<color=#fff100>5</color>点信用，即每日获得上限为<color=#fff100>45</color>点信用。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en: While in the Reception Room, you can receive clues from your friends to earn credits. The first 3 clues received per day gives <color=#fff100>25</color>, <color=#fff100>15</color>, and <color=#fff100>5</color> credits respectively, for a max of <color=#fff100>45</color> credits per day.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn: 在会客室中，赠予好友线索可获得信用奖励，每赠予1张可获得<color=#fff100>30</color>点信用；若赠予好友所需要的线索还可额外获得<color=#fff100>10</color>点信用，没有上限。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en: In the Reception Room, sending clues to friends can earn you credits. Every clue sent gives <color=#fff100>30</color> credits, and another <color=#fff100>10</color> credits if the clue sent is the one needed by the friend. There is no limit for credits earned this way.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn: 在会客室回收线索可获得信用奖励。每回收一张线索可获得<color=#fff100>5</color>点信用，没有上限。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en: In the Reception Room, recycling clues can earn you credits. Every clue recycled gives <color=#fff100>5</color> credits. There is no limit for credits earned this way.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn: 在仓储节点接取并完成他人的运送委托可获得信用奖励。每完成一次委托可获得<color=#fff100>30</color>点信用，每天最多可完成<color=#fff100>3</color>次。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en: Accept delivery jobs posted by others at depot nodes, then complete them to earn <color=#fff100>30</color> credits for every successful delivery. Up to <color=#fff100>3</color> such delivery jobs can be completed per day.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.cn:
来访好友在物资调度终端出售货品时，可根据货品总售价提供相应的信用奖励。
通过该途径获取的信用奖励每日有上限限制，且最多保留至第二天。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditdetailsp.en:
Earn credits when a friend sells goods at the Stock Redistribution Terminal. Amount is based on the total value of the goods sold.
There is a daily limit on the amount of credits earned this way. Unclaimed credits will be removed on the following day.

ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditscrollvi.cn: 可花费信用兑换干员培养素材、武器培养素材等重要资源。
ui_shop_creditpointspopup_creditscrollvi.en: Credits can be exchanged for key resources such as operator/weapon progression materials.

ui_shop_entry_beginner_slogan.cn: 帮助新苏醒的管理员适应塔卫二的特惠寻访，可在此获得强力干员
ui_shop_entry_beginner_slogan.en: Exclusive Headhunting banner to help the newly awakened Endministrator adapt to missions on Talos-II. Use this to recruit powerful operators.

ui_shop_weapon_box_1_slogan.en: Use RELIC ISSUE to get 10 random weapons and enjoy higher drop rates for The Fifth Heirloom (6★).

ui_shop_weapon_box_2_slogan.cn: 进行【锈楔申领】，可随机获得10件武器——6星武器【楔子】获得概率提升

ui_socialbuilding_sign_limit.cn: 可放置留言信标数量已达上限，收纳留言信标以继续放置

ui_spaceship_characterwall_tips_no_resul.en: No operators who meet the criteria

ui_spaceship_charactorsummon_tipslist_ti.cn: 可通过干员联络台将干员召集到管理员身边，进行交谈或赠送礼物。
ui_spaceship_charactorsummon_tipslist_ti.en: Use the Operator Contact Panel to contact and summon operators to your side for a chat or offer them gifts.

ui_spaceship_charactorsummon_tipslist_ti.cn: 每次最多可同时召集3名干员。召集不会影响干员当前的工作或休息状态，干员将短暂停留后自动离开。

ui_worldlevel_des_1.cn:
探索等级体现了管理员对世界的探索程度。
探索等级会随主线任务推进而提升；探索等级达到3级之后，每次提升还需要完成对应的试炼任务。
探索等级会影响干员等级上限、各地区敌人等级、稀有采集物与稀有矿物的存在数量上限和每日刷新数量、能量淤积点状态、协议空间、危境再现等。
ui_worldlevel_des_1.en:
Exploration Level reflects the Endministrator's exploration of the world. 
Exploration Level increases as the Endministrator progresses through the Main Mission. After reaching Exploration Level 3, the next level up will also require the completion of a trial. 
Exploration Level affects: operator level caps; enemy levels in various areas; availability and daily refreshes of rare gatherables and rare minerals; Energy Alluvium statuses; Protocol Spaces; and RE-Crisis stages.

ui_worldlevel_des_2.cn:
当探索等级达到2级之后，可以主动降低探索等级。
探索等级降低后的24小时内，无法再次降低探索等级。
探索等级降低后仍会限制干员等级上限，对于已超出等级上限的干员，其等级保持不变。
可以随时恢复已降低的探索等级，但恢复后若再次降低探索等级，仍需等待24小时。
ui_worldlevel_des_2.en:
After reaching Exploration Level 2, you can manually lower Exploration Level.
After lowering Exploration Level, you must wait 24 hours to lower it again.
Lowering the Exploration Level will also limit operator level cap. However, operators whose levels already exceed the level cap will not be affected.
After lowering Exploration Level, you can restore it at any time. However, you must wait 24 hours to lower it again.
